Yeesu na ba sum dɛ kpɔ o nɔn lege ba sibie. Bug la ta dɛ ba sie pilo ba won dɛɛ na, dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la aa dɛ tel Jerusalam la, ba baa le Bɛtfej waa lɔ bwe bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ɔlevere Bwe la bɔr. Belaa Yeesu tomɛ o habɔteŋra la bini banɛ,
dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé la bwɛɛ nɔ waa lɔ he sie nɔ ta. Haa den dɛɛ tel o ta la, hɛɛ nao kɛ baa vɔwɛ keego bɛl ne o bie. Hé pura dɛ kpɔa ba tɛ mɛ.
Dɛ nomɛl pɛɛ heyaa waane aa, hé ŋɔ naate be ŋɔ he dɔɔ dɛ nyina. Bug la ta wɛɛ geloo he pura dɛ kpɔa ba."
Gɛ waa nɔ chigo asɛ dɛ gel waa Korowii keame faa bola la ɛ kasinteŋ. O bolɔ ŋɔ,
"Ŋɔ Jerusalam tena be ŋɔ bá nyiŋi na! Ba kooro dɛ ba ba be! O pwɛre. O soge keego ta dɛɛ ba. Keego bie taa o so."
Asɛ o habɔteŋra la la dɛ ka ɛ gɛ waa tom ba la.
Ba ba keego la ne o bie la ne, asɛ dɛ pa ba laala pa a nɛ. Yeesu so o bie la nɛɛ baa kaa.
Nɛnlaa la ba ne Yeesu aa dɛ kaa la bane pa ba laala ne ba yale pa ŋwɛnɛ la ta, asɛ bane ge kɛ papooni ba pa ŋwɛnɛ la ta ásɛ o valɛ a ta.
Nɛra baa tɔ o sie la ne banɔ la baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la bwa pɛ nyoa dɛɛ tɛo jirima ŋɔ, "Woowo! Devid Naa nɔ! Korowii kwaa naate waa valɛ o sɔn ta dɛɛ ba nɔ kwa. Ya dɛ jam Korowii waa lɔ nyundujagla la!"
Yeesu aa jo Jerusalam la, bwɛɛ la bwa lɔɔ kpu, asɛ ba bwa ɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo nɔɔ?"
Anee nɛnlaa la ŋɔ, "Korowii keamee. Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta laanee."
Yeesu kaa tel Korowii Dea bobɛl, asɛ dɛ doŋi kon-yogra ne nɛra baa dɛ yawɛ kwaa la bwa, dɛ begre nɛra baa dɛ pegri suugare la ne banɔ la baa dɛ yog brɔnomare la teeburre piigi,
dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn la bini ŋɔ, 'Baa yerɛ n dea Korowii soŋebɔree,' gɛɛ he te kpɔ bela berɛ ŋwɛɛra sɔɔhbɔr aa?"
Ba kpɔ nyoŋa ne boobie ba o be Korowii Dea bela, asɛ o chaah ba, nyoŋa la ɛɛ na, boobie la ge won vala.
Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la aa na wejena waa dɛ ɛ la ne gɛ bechale la aa dɛ si ŋɔ, "Woowo! Devid Naa hen" la, ba baah di o nɛ.

Anomanta ba pɛɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "He dɛ no gɛ bechale nɔ aa dɛ si nɔ kenɛ?" Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, n dɛ no. He ta Korowii Tɔn la bela baa chwera ŋɔ, 'Bechale ne bechasɔɔhne nyoaa he kpɔ he kpɛɛra do' la kure ka kɛɛ?"
Yeesu gel ba bwɛɛ la ta dɛ kaa Bɛtani ka chɔ.
Tɔɔ aa pera chɔɔ, Yeesu le Bɛtani dɛ berɛ baa kaa Jerusalam la, dɛ lɔr dɛ kpoo.

O na pur daa bɛl chega ŋwɛnɛ la nyoa dɛ fee la kɛ o ka nyin o nɔna di. Waa laŋa la, dɛ papooni gboo o bwa. Anee o taah daa la ŋɔ, "He te aa wola ba he ba nɔnɛ kpa bwa!" Bug la ta dɛ daa la denɔ sewɛ dɛ chure.
O habɔteŋra la aa na gɛ la, ba nyoa kpo, baa pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ pur daa nɔ den chure warane ken?"

Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, dɛ he dɔ yarada, haa tɔŋla di he bambile bini naa, hɛɛ wonoo ɛ gɛ maa ɛa dɛ gel daa nɔ sewɛ nɔ. A gbo laa. Hɛɛ wonoo kpɔ yarada ŋɔ bwé nɔ fugri ka le mpo ta, asɛ o fugri ka le mpo ta.
Dɛ he kpɔ yarada dɛɛ soŋe Korowii aa, komɛlbwa haa soŋo la, hɛɛ dɔɔ."
Yeesu berɔ la Korowii Dea, dɛ kaa chagle nɛra Korowii Wa. Asɛ Sɔfonomonome ne bwɛɛ la nomonome ba pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Kpegri besoo he dɔ dɛ kpɔ ɛɛ ɛ gɛ haa dɛ ɛ nɔɔ? Ume tenee tɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ te nɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "N gba dɔ waane mɛɛ nyin n pɛɛ heya. Dɛ he wono chaŋ mɛ kɛrɛdɛ naa, n gee chagle heyaa kpegri maa dɔa dɛɛ ɛ a gɛ waa nɔɔ.

Umee tɛ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la kpegri o kpɔ dɛɛ sɔ nɛra nee laɔ? Korowiirii tɛo waa, kɛ nɛnee tɛo?" Ate dɛ ba gbogbo berɔ kpoŋe dɔŋa dɛ ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ yaa ba o chaŋa ɔ? Ya ŋɔ Korowiirii tɛo waa, wɛɛ berɔɔ pɛɛ yaa gɛ aa ɛa yaa wola o waa yaradae.
Dɛ ya berɔ ŋɔ nɛnee tɛo waa, ya dɛ ɔmɛ waa bwɛɛla nɔ aa kpɔ ɛ yaa, dɛkalkɛ ba bwa dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ Jɔn ɛ Korowii keame."
Anomanta ba ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Yaa jemɛ." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ haa jemɛ te naa, n ge aa heyaa kpegri maa dɔa dɛɛ ɛ gɛ toma nɔɔ bagle.
"Hé no waa nɔ dɛ bagle gɛ haa naa. Baa bɛlee ira dɛ dɔ bii banɛ. Awola bɛl o la o binomoa la be dɛ ka ŋɔ, 'N bie, fini la n koo la ta ka ɛ toma.' Anee o bie la ŋɔ,
'Maa la,' asɛ a habɔɔ la o berɛ charɛ o liire dɛ ka ɛ toma koo la ta.
Asɛ baa la berɛ la o bie bechala la ge be dɛ ka ŋɔ o be gɛ waa bol o dɔɔ la be la. O te den sɛh ŋɔ, 'Yoo, mɛɛ lao,' dɛ berɛ vɛh laŋa.

Nɛra banɛ nɔ, ba bini umee ɛ o mɛɛ tetoowaa tɛo wɔ?" Anee ba ŋɔ, "O binomoa laanee." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ nɛra apoo ne jwamane tena bwa ɛɛ tɔ siee dɔ Korowii Kora la ta jo gel heya,

dɛkalkɛ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la ba he be dɛ ba chagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge la ŋɔ hé kpɔ o ta, asɛ he vɛh o waa la yaradae. Kɛ lampoo lɛɛra ne jwamane tenaa bera yarada o waa la. Hale haa bera na gɛ la, he ta he liire charɛ dɛ berɛ ba yaradao."

A habɔɔ la Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Hé no sɛgla nɔ ge. Baa bɛlee dɔ o harɛ dɛ parɛ daa ane baa kpɔ a nɔna dɛɛ ɛ sen bela. O ke koo la dɛ komɛ bɔɔ bwe bɛl ta bela baa ba harame a nɔna la nee dɛɛ do, dɛ chigri jɛŋla bá so o ta dɛɛ daah koo la. Waa ɛ gɛ bwa tonɛ la, o kpɔɔ tɛ nɛra báa ɛ koo la toma, asɛ dɛ ba baa komɛ nɔna la aa, ó tɛɛ ba ba dibɔr, dɛ kaa bwɛɛ bɛl ta.
"Nɔna la koma aa tela la, o tomɛ o bonɔɔna ŋɔ bá la nɛra la aa dɛ nyiŋi koo la ta la be dɛ ka lɛ o dibɔr ba tɛo.
Anee nɛra la lawɛ bonɔɔna la, dɛ lɔɔ bɛl, dɛ kpo bɛl, asɛ dɛ fogre bɛl ge bwea.
Baa la berɔ kwaa tomɛ bonɔɔna la banfala ba warɛ gwaa banɔ la baa tɔ sie la la, asɛ nɛra la berɛ ɛ ba ge gɛ tenten baa ɛ banɔ la la.
Name te dɛ o gbagba biee kaa ó tomɛ. Asɛ o tomɛ o bie la ge dɛ ŋɔ, 'N gbagba bie nɔ te, baa heeh o sie bɔree.'
Nɛra la aa dena na o bie la, ba den ŋɔ, 'Yoowa, koo te la gbagba biee la. Hé gel ya lawɔ dɛ kpoo ásɛ o mɛɛ kapɛrɛ la bwa berɛ ya kwa.'
Anomanta, ba lawɔ dɛ le o ne koo la ta dɛ ka kpoo ta."
Asɛ Yeesu pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Dɛ koo te la kaa ba naa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba a gɛ nɛra la baa dɛ nyiŋi koo la ta la ɛɛ yɔ?"
Anee ba chaŋo ŋɔ, "O balaa, wɛɛ ba kpoo nɛnchɔga la bwaa dɛ kpɔ koo la tɛ nɛnfala, banɔ la dɛ daa la nɔna koma telaa, baa dɛ ba on o dibɔr tɛɛ."
Yeesu pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "He ta waa nɔ Korowii Tɔn la bini nae kaa? Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, 'Bwe la mamaala faa vɛah dɛ liiro konsala laanee bera ba lawɛ dea la kpoŋe la. Korowiirii gela a ɛ gɛ, asɛ a ɛ yaa nyokpowa.'
Anomanta n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, Korowii ɛɛ lɛ o kora laanee le he be dɛ kpɔ ka tɛ banɔ la baa dɛ ba wona nyiŋi o ta kɛrɛdɛ la.
Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh a gɛ Bwe nɔ Korowii aa leo dɛ tomɔ la, wɛɛ chole o taa dɛ kuugi, asɛ nomɛlbwa ge Bwe nɔ aa le o nɛɛ la, wɛɛ pwereme naatee."
Sɔfonomonome la ne Farisii tena la aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, ba jemɔ kɛ ba waa Yeesu ɛɛ bol la.
Anomanta dɛ ba fe dɛ nyin o lawa. Kɛ ba berɔ ɔmɛ nɛnlaa la, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba te dɛ yerɛ Yeesu Korowii keame.
Yeesu berɔ kpɔ sɛgla dɛ bol waa bagle nɛra la ja,
dɛ ŋɔ, "Kenii Korowii Kora ɛɛ ba doe. Kooro bɛlee lawɛ hanfale tɛ o bie dɛ gel ba ɛ o hanfale kondikwa.
O tomɛ o bonɔɔna ŋɔ bá ka yerɛ nɛra waa yer ba ŋɔ bá ba di hanfale kondikwaa la, asɛ ba sie ta on sui dɛ vɛh bala.
"Anee o berɛ kwaa tomɛ banfala dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Hé ka ŋɔ nɛra maa yer ba la be ŋɔ ba tonɛ kondikwaa la. N kpoo nabala ne nae aa do noo kohona bwa, anomanta n tonɛ komɛlbwa kɛ bá ba.'
A bwa pɛpɛrɛ nɛ, ba vɛoh dɛ kaa ba tomare ta. Bɛl kaa o koo, bɛl ge kaa o bona dibɔr,
asɛ ba kar la ge lawɛ o bonɔɔna waa tom ba la dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa dɛ kpoo ba.
A ɛ kooro la bandia kohona dɛ gel o tomɛ o soojare ba ka kpoo banɔ la baa kpoo o bonɔɔna la, asɛ dɛ fuh ba bwɛɛ la ge.
"Anee o kwaa yerɛ o bonɔɔna bane ge ja dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Ba tonɛ n hanfale kondikwaa la, kɛ nɛra la maa yer ba ŋɔ bá ba di la, a ta ban chɛɛ.
Name te hé le kaa fɔgbaahna dɛ ka yerɛ nɛra haa na ba la bwa ba hanfale kondikwaa la mun.'
Asɛ bonɔɔna la le kaa fɔgbaahna dɛ ka yerɛ nɛra baa na ba la bwa. Nɛndɛɛga ne nɛnchɔga bwaa ba yerɛ, asɛ nɛra su bela baa lawɛ hanfale la maa ken.
"Kooro la aa dɛ jam hɔɔhra la aa baa cheme bela la, o na baa bɛl ba bini kɛ o te ta laala aa chɛ kɛŋɔ o do dɛ ba hanfale dem bela la ane doe.
Anee o bɔɔ baa la ŋɔ, 'N dam, ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa a che he ba bonɔ, haa wola laala aa chɛ kɛ he do dɛ ba hanfale dem bonɔ nɔ ane doe nɔɔ?' Waa bɔɔro gɛ la, o ta waane dɔe dɛ́ bol.
Anee kooro la den ŋɔ o bonɔɔna la be ŋɔ, 'Hé vɔrɔwe baa nɔ nɔɔra ne o nakpale dɛ kpɔɔ ka ta dahara biro ta. Belaa wii ne weweele do.' "
Yeesu aa kpɔ sɛgla nɔ bol waa bag ba tonɛ la, asɛ o ŋɔ, "Nɛra maa yer ba warɔ taeh, kɛ ba bini tamaa kenii n chale."
Farisii tena la le bokɛre dɛ ka vɔrɔwe gɛ baa ɛ dɛ́ dɔ Yeesu lawɛ webɔɔra ne.

Anomanta ba tomɛ ba habɔteŋra bane ne Hɛrɔd nɛra bane, ba ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ kasinteŋ gboo hɛɛ bol, haa nyosone teŋe. Korowii ŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ chagle nɛra kasinteŋ ne. He ta bolɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ a habɔɔ kɛŋɔ a dɛ do bane som, kɛɛ a dɛ we bane bambile nɔ. Haa nɛra sie bɔr nyiŋi dɛɛ bol wa, kɛŋɔ bɛl ɛ kooro kɛɛ nomoa kɛɛ bechala nɔ.
Anomanta chagle yaa gɛ haa na waa nɔ yá jemɛ. Ya mmarare dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ya bɔ lampoo dɛɛ tɛ Room Koojen Siisa la aa, kɛɛ waa yaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛ?"
Yeesu tɔ sie jemɛ ba liichɔga, anomanta o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ nyin dɛ har mɛ bel nɔɔ?
Hé kpɔ suuga haa kpɔa dɛɛ bɔ lampoo la tɛ mɛ ń na." Baa kpɔ suuga la ba la,
anee o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ume nyu ne o sɔnee nɔɔ?"
Anee ba chaŋo ŋɔ, "Koojen Siisa nyu ne o sɔnee." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Gɛɛ a do te naa, hé kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Koojen Siisa kwaa tɛo, dɛ kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Korowii kwaa la tɛ Korowii."
Baa no gɛ Yeesu aa bola la, ba nyoa kpoo, ba le o be dɛ kaa.
Awola tenten la, nɛra bane baa dɛ yer ba Saduki tena ba o be. Dɛ baa yarada kɛŋɔ nɛn sewaa, wɛɛ berɔɔ ir ja.
Ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, Mosis fa ŋɔ dɛ baa mo haah, o ne o ta lolɛ o sewaa, ó nime kpɔ haah la mo asɛ o ne o lolɛ bii bá ɛ baa la aa sewa la kwa.
Asɛ baa bɛl ne o nimanar banumɛlee fa lole. Nomoa la mo haah dɛ ba sewɛ, dɛ o ne haah la ta bie lolɛ, anomanta o nime waa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la kpɔ haah la mo.
O ge ne haah la ta lolɛ, o sewɛ. Gɛɛ tooro te la ne banɔ la baa kaa la mo haah la ka lɔ nyoa, dɛ ba serewe.
A habɔɔ la luhaah la ge baa sewɛ.
Taraken nɔ, dɛ tɔpere nɛra baa sewa bwa aa dɛ ba ira nɔ telaa, baala banuanɛ la bini, umee dɛ ba haah la jaa ɛɛ yɔ? Ba bwa gee moo ka."
Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He kono kwara! Haa wola Korowii Tɔn la ne Korowii kpegri jemɛ la waa.
Dɛ nɛra baa sewa la berɔ iraa, baala aa haahnaa mo, haahna ge aa yalɛ. Baa soo kɛŋɔ nyundua toroma ken.
Nɛra seo ta ira ge la nɔ, he ta gɛ Korowii aa bol he be kure dɛ no a mun kɛɛ?
O ŋɔ, 'Menee Abraham Korowii, Aesek Korowii ne Jekɔb Korowii.' Lala laa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, weeraa dɛɛ tomɔ."
Nɛnlaa la aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, ba nyoa kpo o webagla ta.
Belaa Farisii tena la aa no gɛ Yeesu aa gela Saduki tena la ta berɛ won dɔ waane dɛ́ bol kpa la, ba kaa cheme,
asɛ ba bini Tɔn Jereme bɛl pɛɛ Yeesu waane, dɛ kpɔ harɔ bel.
O pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, mmarare nɔ te bwa bini umee dena gwaa a bwa nɔ?"
Yeesu chaŋɔ ŋɔ, " 'Hé nyin N Naa Korowii he bambile bwa, he hweera ne he liire bwa ne.'
Onɔɔ gwaa a bwa dɛ tɔ a bwa sie.
Onɔ la waa jaa dɛ teŋɛ nɛɛ o waa hiah la gee kɛŋɔ, 'Nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he gbagba.'
Gɛ mmarare anɛ nɔ binii Mosis Mmara la ne waa Korowii keamere la aa bagla la bwa le."
Farisii tena la bane aa kaa pɛ so la, Yeesu pɛɛ ba ŋɔ,
"Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa laɔ? He dɛ lii kɛ ume naa yɔ?" Anee ba ŋɔ, "Devid naa."
Anee Yeesu berɛ pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛ waa Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa ir Devid nɛɛ la o berɛ yerɔ o dɔɔ nɔɔ? Devid fa ŋɔ,
'N Naa Korowii ŋɔ n Dɔɔ be ŋɔ ó so nomombɔr o dig ta ka tel kɛŋɔ waa ba o dɔma ne harɛ ásɛ o tigri ba nɛ.'
Dɛ Devid fa yerɔ o dɔɔ naa, ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa a che Kristo la berɛ ba ɛ Devid naa ɔ?"
Nomɛlbwa ta wone chaŋe waa Yeesu aa pɛɛra la nomanta, le awola tɔpere la dɛɛ kaa la, nomɛlbwa ta wone ba che o sie dɛ pɛɛro waane kpa.
Yeesu bol waa dɛ chagle nɛnlaa la ne o habɔteŋra la dɛ ŋɔ,
"Tɔn Jerema la ne Farisii tena nɔɔ dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ba chagle Mosis Mmara la bini bagle nɛra.
Anomanta a chɛ kɛ he no ba be dɛ teŋɛ waa baa dɛ bagle heyaa ŋɔ hé ɛ la bwa ta. Kɛ he bɛ ba we-ɛɛla te hweli, dɛkalkɛ baa waa baa bola dɛɛ chagle heyaa la ɛ.
Ba kpɔ ba mmarare ɛ bontɔga dɛ gel nɛra che dɛɛ koh, kɛ ba te gbagba aa berɛ ɛɛ nyin kɛ ba kpɔ nonii gba lega asɛ a ba ɛ kɛ baa chog baa gba.

"Ba we-ɛɛla bwa la, nɛraa baa nyin kɛ ba na ba dɛɛ tɛɛ ba duure. Gɛ nɛra yon chwerɛ Korowii wobol dɛ kpɔ vɔwɛ ba tili ne ba varama ta la, hé na gɛ ba te kwaa yon do pagri. Hé na gɛ ba batakaani nyoo jɔɔra aa dɛ do jaŋre.
Bela nɛra yon cheme tɔpejena dɛɛ lɛ ba sie la, ba te la bela aa, kane dɛɛga gbo taa baa nyin soga. Asɛ ba la cheremi deene bini ge aa, nomonsobɔraa baa nyin.
Ba dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ nɛra ba harɛ dɛɛ lea ba yawa ta ne fɔgbaahna dɛɛ yer ba 'Nomoa, nomoa.'
He bɛ gel nomɛlbwa yerɛ heyaa ba nomoa, dɛkalkɛ he bwa kɛrɛdɛ. Nomoa beŋkpoŋ gbo gee he dɔ.
Asɛ harɛ nɔ ta ge, he bɛ nomɛlbwa he Mɛɛ dɛɛ yerɛ, dɛkalkɛ he Mɛɛ lɔ beŋkpoŋ gbo dɛ do nyundua.
He bɛ gel nomɛlbwa ge yerɛ he bini bɛlbwa o dɔɔ, dɛkalkɛ dɔɔ beŋkpoŋ gboo lole, onee Kristo la.
He bwa bini, naate waa gwaa heyaa la chɛ kɛ o ɛ o te kɛŋɔ bechala dɛɛ tomɛ heya.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ maŋkura o te la, Korowii ɛɛ ba o ne harɛɛ, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ pwɛr o te la, Korowii ɛɛ ɛo nɛnjenii.
"Hé bwɛɛlɛ, Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena, he nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! He tɔ Korowii Kora la ŋwɛnɛ. Heyaa nɔɔ haa jo, he ge aa ŋwɛnɛɛ tɛ ásɛ banɔ la baa dɛ nyin bɔr dɛ́ jo la dɔ bɔr.

Hé bwɛɛlɛ, Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena, he nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! Heyaa yon gaage aaa gɛ haa ɛ dɛ dɔ nɛn waa wola Juda tena te ɛɛ ó ba ja he nɛɛ dɛ tomɛ Korowii. Kɛ dɛ he baa dɔ bɛl aa, he yon berɛ ɛo o chɔg kwaraa, asɛ a yon berɛ do kɛŋɔ o tenee bera chɛ Bɔnsam nii ta laŋa gwaa heya.
"Nyoŋa haa dɛ tɔ nɛra sie, hé bwɛɛlɛ! He yon dɛɛ chagle nɛra ŋɔ, 'He naate haa ŋwɛɛ Korowii Dea la, ate aa won hen waane ɛ. Kɛ suugaswɛm waa lɔ Korowii Dea bela la te, baa o te ŋwɛɛ.'
Nyoŋegɛna bane! Suugaswɛm la ne Korowii Dea la waa gela suugaswɛm la do ɔma la, umee do ɔma gwaa o dɔŋ ɔ?
He berɔ dɛɛ chagle nɛra ŋɔ, 'He naate haa ŋwɛɛ bela baa kpo kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la, a ta waane ɛɛ. Kɛ kwaa baa kpoa tɛ Korowii bela la te, baa an ŋwɛɛ.'
He nyogrɔ kwara! Kwaa baa kpoa tɛ Korowii la, ne bela baa kpo kwaa la waa gela kwaa la do ɔma la, a bini umee do ɔma gwaa o dɔŋ ɔ?
Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa ŋwɛɛ bela baa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la, bela baa kpoo kwaa la ne kwaa aa dawɛ o ta la bwaa o ŋwɛɛ la.
Asɛ nomɛlbwa waa ŋwɛɛ Korowii Dea la, Korowii ne dea la bwaa o ŋwɛɛ la.
Dɛ nomɛlbwa ge ŋwɛɛ Korowii doa aa, Korowii soŋnibɔr ne Korowii gbagbaa o ŋwɛɛ la.

"Hé bwɛɛlɛ, he Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena, he nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! He kondiili do tamaa gɛ bɛlbwa aa, he won a bini pera bɔre fi dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ aa ɛ Korowii kwaa la ka tɛo, gɛ Mmara la aa bagla la, kɛ dɛ gel Mmara la bini waa aa tɔ sie dɛɛ bagle ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ di kasinteŋ, dɛɛ na nɛra sum, asɛ dɛ gel nɛra ɛɛ yarada heyaa la te. Gɛ waa nɔɔ chɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ɛ dɛ ja anɔ la haa dɛ ɛa la ta.

Nyoŋa haa dɛ tɔ nɛra sie dɛɛ maŋkura wejegre gwaa anjena! He waa haa dɛ ɛ la do kɛŋɔ nɛn o yon nyiŋi o nenyɔɔle ta dɛ won na pereware dɛ laa kpɔ ta, kɛ dɛ nyogma te lɔ a ta naa, waa o te na, dɛ yon kpɔ lile.

Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena, nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa, hé bwɛɛlɛ! He waa haa dɛ ɛ gelɔ he do kɛŋɔ baa loo numol kɛɛ log habɔɔ o do wer asɛ doŋa su o bini te la. Dɛ ɛgre nɛn lɛ o kondɔɔh o be ne kafonyin gboo su he bwa.
Farisii tena nyoŋa bane! Hé loo doŋa aa lɔ numol la bini la mɔɔ. O bini la dɔɔ lea, dɛ o habɔɔ leɔ.
"Hé bwɛɛlɛ, Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena, nɛra haa dɛ nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! He do kɛŋɔ ŋwam baa tegɔ wɛɛ nyɛgle. O nyundua la gboo wera, kɛ o bini te, hoga ne kompɔɔhla gboo.
Gɛɛ he den do. Ba na heya aa, he wer siwi ta kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga, kɛ he bini te, negra ne wechɔga gboo su he bwa.
"Hé bwɛɛlɛ, Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena, nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! Heyaa yon kwaa bela baa huge Korowii keamere a do wer. Nɛndɛɛga baa serewa la ge, he yon kwaa ba ŋwama a do wer ken,
dɛɛ chagle kɛŋɔ dɛ heyaa fe he naanar gɛ saŋ la aa, he te fe aa wola ja dɛ kpo o Korowii keamere la.
Kɛ he ge aa berɛ ɛɛ tɔh kɛŋɔ banɔ la baa kpoo Korowii keamere la naanaree heya!
Hé takapɔ dɛ ɛ wechɔga la he naanar aa pa mun ɛa la ka tonɛ.
"Nɛnchɔga kɛ harɛkwaare, domkpule bii! Ɛrɛɛ hé ɛ haa wola Bɔnsam nii taa joɔ?

N gelɔ hɛɛ no kɛŋɔ mɛɛ tomɛ Korowii keamere, wejerema ne Tɔn Jerema he bee. Hɛɛ kpoo bane, dɛ kpaa bane pɛl dagagra ta, dɛ kpɔ chweremi lɔɔ bane cheremi deene ta, dɛ doŋ ba jo bwɛɛre ta dɛɛ nyin ba dɛ́ lawɛ.

Anomanta nɛndɛɛga baa nya ba nɛɛ dɛ kpoo ba la dɛ le kpoe baa kpo Abɛl waa wola wechɔga bɛlbwa ɛɛ la ka tel kpoe baa kpo Barakia bie Sakaria Korowii Dea la ne bela baa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛo la baah ta bela la, ba bwa waa ɛɛ gure he nɛɛ.
Kasinteŋ, nɛndɛɛga baa kpoo ba la bwa waa ɛɛ ba gure fini nɔ nɛra nɔ nɛɛ!

"Oo, Jerusalam tena! Korowii tomɛ o keamere he be naa, gɛɛ he kpoo ba, o tomɛ toroma he be naa, gɛɛ he fog ba bwea. Saŋ bɛlbwa mɛɛ nyin kɛ n kpɔ nɔn tɔ he nɛɛ kɛ jal aa lawɛ o bii dɛɛ do o kena lɔgre la, kɛ haa nyin kɛ n lawɛ heyaa pɛ.
Anomanta Korowii ɛɛ ta he waa tɛ heya.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, haa men na kpa ka tel gɛ saŋ maa ba ja, asɛ he ŋɔ, 'Woowo! Korowii Biee chegɛ o sɔn ta dɛɛ ba la!' "
Yeesu aa le Korowii Dea bela dɛɛ kaa la, o habɔteŋra la baa ŋɔ ó nyiŋi na Korowii Dea la kan waa doa ne gɛ waa wera.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi deene nɔ bwa kɛrɛdɛ. N dɛ ŋɔ he be kɛ baa ba kuugi a bwaa ta. Bwe bɛlbwa aa lee do dɛ ta chɔŋɛ o dɔŋ nɛɛ kpa."

Yeesu teehnɔ ka so bwe bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ɔlevere Bwe la doa. Belaa o habɔteŋra la gbo ka puu bela, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Chagle yaa gɛ saŋ gɛ waa nɔ bwa aa dɛ ba chiga, ne waa aa dɛ ba bala dɛ chagle kɛŋɔ he bala saŋ la ne waa bwa jaga saŋ la telo."
Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ gel nomɛlbwa negre heya.
Nɛra ɛɛ warɔɔ taeh dɛ ba negre heya, dɛ kpɔ n sɔn dɛɛ bol wa, hale dɛ ŋɔ banee Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la, dɛ negre nɛra kɛrɛdɛ bwa.
Hɛɛ no laa gbɔgaa he jwɛh, asɛ dɛɛ no ane ge gbɔga bojaŋa. Kɛ dɛ he baa dɛɛ na gɛ naa, he bɛ ɔmɛ. A chɛ kɛ gɛ waa nɔ bwa chig, kɛ dɛ a laa dɛɛ chagle kɛ waa bwa jaga saŋ la telo.
Harɛre ane ɛɛ dɛɛ yo dɔŋaa, koranar ge yo dɔŋa. Lɔr ɛɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlaa, asɛ harɛ ɛɛ jijigri bobɛla ge.
Kɛ anɔ bwa do kɛŋɔ haah loltea yon tɔ sie lɔɔ dɛ o lola ta tele mɔɔ la.
"Asɛ mɔɔ ba ta lawɛ heyaa tɛ nɛra, ba ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa dɛ kpoo heya. Nomɛlbwa ɛɛ koh n waa hah heya.
A ba gɛ naa, nɛra baa teŋɛ n nɛɛ nɔ kɛrɛdɛ ɛɛ le n habɔɔ, dɛ le ba bala tɛ, asɛ dɛ hah dɔŋa.
Asɛ nɛra ir dɛ teŋe nyosone kɛŋɔ ba ɛ Korowii keamere dɛ negre nɛra kɛrɛdɛ.
Wechɔga ɛɛ perɛ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwaa, asɛ nɛra bane aa won nyin ba dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ kpa.
Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa wola n habɔɔ leɛ, dɛ won teŋɛ n nɛɛ ka tonɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
Baa bol Korowii Kora Amanesoma nɔ waa harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa asɛ nɛwɛnyini te bɛlbwa no mɔɔ waa bwa jaga saŋ la tel.
"Hé naate haa kure tɔn nɔ bonɔ la no a mun kɛrɛdɛ. Hɛɛ na konchɔgechɔge Korowii keame Daneɛl faa bol o waa ŋɔ o dɛ pagre bwɛɛ la chega Korowii bodɛɛge bela.
Gɛ saŋ la telaa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ Judia harɛ tena chwa le Judia ka sɔh bwejena la baah.
Nɛn waa lɔ sal dea doa la bɛ berɛ ŋɔ o dɛ tu ka jo dea ka kpɔ o laala bɛlbwa kpa.
Nɛn waa lɔ koo ta bɛ berɛ ŋɔ o dɛ kaa dem ka kpɔ o yal kpa.
Gɛ saŋ la aa no tekpoŋra ne haahna ba taa kpoŋe bechale nɔn taa.
Hé soŋe Korowii asɛ gɛ waa nɔ aa dɛ ba chiga he chwaage nɔ bɛ waa saŋ chig, dɛ bɛ Ona Tɔpere ta chig,
dɛkalkɛ, dɛ le harɛ nɔ mumpar bwa ba le fini, wahala aa dɛ we dɛ do ɔma gɛ dɔŋ ta chige bwa. Asɛ wahala aa do ɔma gɛ dɔŋ ge aa chig kpa bwa.
Kɛ dɛ Korowii fe ta tɔpera la ane teŋe ta aa, nomɛlbwa fe aa o nyuu dɔ. Anomanta gɛ aa ɛ ásɛ Korowii nɛra waa chal ba dɛ lɛɛ ba la dɔ ba nyu la, o teŋe tɔpechɔga la ane ta.
Gɛ saŋ la dɛ nomɛl ŋɔ he be ŋɔ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la lɔ bonɔ kɛɛ le naa, he bɛ on yarada,

dɛkalkɛ nɛra ɛɛ ba teŋe nyosonee ŋɔ banee Kristo la, asɛ bane ge teŋe nyosone ŋɔ ba ɛ Korowii keamere. Baa ɛ wejena ne nyokpowaa, asɛ ba fe ɛɛ wonoo kwaraa naa, bá che ba we-ɛɛla ta dɛɛ nyin dɛ negre nɛra Korowii aa chal ba dɛ lɛɛ ba la gba.
N felo dɛɛ bol waa nɔ he be noo, ásɛ he pu sie jemɛ a wa.
"Dɛ nomɛl ŋɔ he be ŋɔ Kristo la lɔ kpɔg bini naa, he bɛ bela la. Dɛ nomɛl ge ŋɔ, 'Ŋyiŋi na, o sɔh dea nɔ bini' naa, he bɛ yarada,
dɛkalkɛ men Nɛn Bie bala ɛɛ ɛo kɛŋɔ bwaala yon nyɛgle le wee leebɔr kaa wee cholibɔr la. Gɛɛ maa wola n balaa kpɔ sɔh nomɛlbwa.
Nomonome ŋɔ, 'Bela konlala aa lole la, bela kokosakiri ɛɛ warɛ.'
"Wahala ne sibegra la aa chig dɛ den dɛɛ tonɛ la, bug la ta 'wee ɛɛ biruu, asɛ korobie ge vɛh bɔr chaahna. Weweela ɛɛ chugruu le nyundua lee harɛ, asɛ koŋkwaa aa lɔ nyundua la bwa begre.'
"A taa hɛɛ ba waane nyundua nae a chagle n Nɛn Bie la bane, asɛ harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa na dɛ wi, asɛ dɛ na kɛŋɔ n Nɛn Bie la aa le nyundua baamare ta dɛɛ ba kpegri ne jirima tenten ne.
Nɛra ɛɛ no Korowii bɛla la sii, asɛ Korowii tomɛ o nyundua toroma bá ba harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa dɛ ka boa o nɛra waa chal ba dɛ lɛɛ ba la bwa nyoa.
"Hé kpɔ pur daa nɔna hweli wa. O baa fogre dɛɛ le papo-lwɛɛne, dɛ nomɛlbwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ bɔwɔb saŋ telo tonɛ.
Gɛɛ dɛ waa nɔ maa bol he be nɔ bwa baa dɛɛ chig aa, asɛ hé jemɛ kɛ tɔpere maa dɛ bol o waa la bala telo.
Kasinteŋ, he banɔ haa soge le nɔ bwa aa sewa ba mɔɔ gɛ waa nɔ chig.
Nyundua ne harɛ bwa ɛɛ ba chɔgoo, aa wola lee do kpa, kɛ n waa maa bola te bwa ɛɛ do lee saŋ te bɛlbwa.
"Nomɛlbwa aa tɔpere la ne saŋ gɛ waa la aa dɛ ba chiga jemɛ. Nyundua toroma la ne n Nɛn Bie la gba aa jemɛ. N Mɛɛ la gboo jema.
N Nɛn Bie bala ɛɛ pigri nɛraa kɛ Nowa saŋ nesuuli la aa baa pigri nɛra la.
Gɛ saŋ nee la aa wola sui dɛ chɔg harɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ nɛra dɛ di kwaa dɛɛ lɛ ba sie, dɛɛ mo haahna, dɛɛ yalɛ jaranar. Ba lɔ gɛ waa nɔ ta dɛɛ ɛ dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ Nowa aa jo gberjen la bini gel ba.
Kɛ ba ta wone jemɛ waa aa dɛ ba bala ka tel gɛ saŋ nee aa sua dɛ ba kpɔ ba bwa kaa. Gɛɛ n Nɛn Bie la bala la ɛɛ ba nɛra pigra.
Gɛ saŋ la, nɛra banɛ ɛɛ dɛ ɛ toma koo taa, asɛ ba ba kpɔ beŋkpoŋ kaa dɛ gel bɛl.
Haahna banɛ ɛɛ pɛo dɛɛ namɛ kwaa nambwe ta, ba ba kpɔ beŋkpoŋ kaa dɛ gel bɛl bela.
Anomanta hɛ́ɛ do dɛɛgɔ, dɛkalkɛ haa tɔpere la ne saŋ la he Dɔɔ la aa ba jemɛ.
Hɛ́ɛ no. Dɛ dem te fe jemɛ gɛ saŋ ŋwɛɛ aa ba ŋwɛo waa, o fe aa domii chɔ dɛ gel o ba jo dem dɛ ŋwɛo.
Gɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ he ge kpɔ he te dɛ so kpa, dɛkalkɛ pigraa n Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ ba ba pigri heya.
"Bonɔɔ waa dɔ kasinteŋ dɛ dɔ liire la nɔn taa o dɔɔ kpɔ o dem tena dɛɛ do, dɛ ŋɔ bɔr dɛ magre aa, ó tɛɛ ba kondikwa.
Dɛ o dɔɔ la baa puu, dɛ o dɛ ɛ gɛ waa kpɔa do o nɔn ta la aa, o sie ɛɛ lɛo.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, o dɔɔ la ɛɛ kpɔ o komɛlbwaa do o nɔn ta ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi a ta.
Kɛ dɛ o ɛ bonɔnchɔge, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, 'N dɔɔ ŋwɛnɛ nɔ waa kaala nɔ, waa ba taraken,'
dɛ do o bonɔndɔŋa la nɛɛ dɛɛ lɔɔ, dɛɛ di kwaa waa dɛ nyin, o ne sennyɔɔra ɛɛ dɛɛ raa, amɔ wɛɛ na waa.
Tɔpebeŋkpoŋii o dɔɔ la ɛɛ ba bala ba pigru,
dɛ tɛr o deŋne taeh, dɛ doŋu ka pu nɛra baa dɛ nyiŋi nɛra sie bɔr mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ waa la. Belaa wɛɛ ba doe dɛɛ wi dɛɛ na weweele.
"N Nɛn Bie bala la telaa, kenii Korowii Kora ɛɛ ba doe. O dɛ ba doe kɛŋɔ toli fi bane baa ira dɛ kpɔ ba kandere dɛɛ la ká cheme hanfale jaa.
Ba bini banue ɛ gɛna, banue ge ɛ wejerema.
Gɛna la ta noo kpɔe ásɛ dɛ ba kandere la bini noo tonaa ba kpɔ do.
Kɛ wejerema la te kpɔ noo do loŋa ta dɛ ja ba kandere la ta.
Hanfale jaa la ta fele ba, anomanta dom chugli bitoli la, ba bwa chɔɔge doromi.
"Harambaŋa la, nɛra bane nao kɛŋɔ hanfale jaa la dɛ ba, asɛ dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, 'Hanfale jaa laanee la oo! Hé le ka chemo!'
Bitoli fi la bwa ir doromi ta, dɛ kwaa ba kandere.
Gɛna banue la ŋɔ wejerema la be ŋɔ, 'Hé tɛ yaa he noo nɔ ane. Gɛ laa aa, ya kandere dɛ dirimi.'
Anee wejerema la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Aa ya ne he bwaa tel, anomanta hé chwa la bela baa dɛ yoga la ka yawɛ ane.'

Gɛ saŋ bitoli gɛna la aa chig ŋwɛnɛ ta kaa noo la yawa la taa hanfale jaa la ba. Wejerema la aa kpɔ ba te la, ba dɔ bɔr teŋɛ hanfale jaa la nɛɛ dɛ ka di hanfale kondikwaa la. Baa joa tonɛ la, dem te den laa gbera la tɔ.
"A habɔɔ la banɔ la balɔ dɛ baa yerɛ ŋɔ, 'Ya dɔɔ, ya dɛ soŋe, ya yaa ásɛ ya jo.'
Anee hanfale jaa la ŋɔ, 'Kasinteŋ, maa heyaa jemɛ.' "
Yeesu aa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o berɛ ŋɔ, "Anomanta hé gel he sie do le hɛɛ kpa, dɛkalkɛ haa tɔpere la ne gɛ saŋ maa dɛ ba bala la jemɛ."
Yeesu berɛ ŋɔ, "Awola n Nɛn Bie la aa ba la, kenii Korowii Kora la ɛɛ ba doe. Baa bɛlee ira dɛɛ ba o ŋwɛnɛ bɛl kaala, dɛ yerɛ o bonɔɔna dɛ kpɔ o suuga bwa do ba nɔn ta.
Gɛ del ba bɛlbwa aa dɛ ba wona kpoŋe la taa o nyiŋi dɛ bɔne tɛɛ ba. O tɛ sitɔte la bɔre anue, dɛ tɛ nɛɛte la bɔre anɛ, asɛ dɛ tɛ tooro te la ge bɔrbeŋkpoŋ, mɔɔ dɛ kaa o ŋwɛnɛ la.
A ta bigre bɛlbwa onɔ la waa dɔ bɔre anue la den kpɔ o kwaa ka ɛ toma dɛ berɛ dɔ a dɔŋa ja a ta.
Gɛ tentenee onɔ la waa dɔ bɔre anɛ la ge berɛ dɔ a dɔŋa ja o kwaa ta.
Bonɔɔ la waa dɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ la te kpɔ o kwaa ka huge harɛ.
"Aa baa bigri la bonɔɔna la dɔɔ la balɔ dɛ ba ŋɔ bɛ́lbwa ba chagle gɛ waa ɛ suuga waa kpɔa tɛɛ ba la ne.
Bonɔɔ la waa tɛo bɔre anue la kpɔ anɔ la waa dɔa ja la ja anɔ waa kpɔa tɛo la ta dɛ ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, bɔre anuee he tɛ mɛ, kɛ n ge berɔ dɔ a dɔŋa ja a ta. Anee la.'
Anee o dɔɔ la ŋɔ, 'Jam, bonɔndɛɛge, kasinteŋ te! Tama nɔ haa kpɔ kasinteŋ dɛ ɛ a ne toma nɔ, mɛɛ kpɔe so andamanta nyoa. Ba puu mɛ so silɛɛ ta.'
"Bonɔɔ nɛɛte la ge ba dɛ ba ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, bɔre anɛɛ he tɛ mɛ, kɛ n ge berɔ dɔ a dɔŋa ja a ta. Anee la.'
Anee o dɔɔ la ŋɔ, 'Jam, bonɔndɛɛge, kasinteŋ te! Tama nɔ haa kpɔ kasinteŋ ɛ a ne toma nɔ, mɛɛ kpɔe so andamanta nyoa. Ba puu mɛ so silɛɛ ta.'
"Asɛ bonɔɔ waa dɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ la ge ba, dɛ ba ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, n jemɔ kɛ he waa kpegri. Bela haa wola mea due laanee hɛɛ koma, asɛ bela haa wola kwaa ane komɛ laanee hɛɛ nyin a chegbɔr.
Anomanta n ɔmɔ dɛ kpɔ suuga haa tɛ mɛ la ka huge harɛ. Anee la.'
Anee o dɔɔ la ŋɔ, 'Bonɔnchɔge bɔhwaah kohona! He jemɔ kɛ bela maa wola mea duee mɛɛ koma, asɛ bela maa wola kwaa komɛ laanee mɛɛ nyin a chegbɔr aa?
A fe chɛ kɛŋɔ he kpɔ n suuga la ka cheg nɛra baa kpɔ suuga dɛɛ cheg ba be ba kpɔ dɛɛ kemɛ nɛra la be, asɛ n balaa, ń ka lɛ n kwaa ne a nee bwa.
Anomanta hé lɛ o kwaa la o be dɛ kpɔ tɛ onɔ maa tɛo anue o dɔ a dɔŋa ja a ta la.
Naate waa dɔa la, baa jao anee ó dɔ kohona a gwaa o nɛ, asɛ naate waa wola komɛlbwa dɔe la, tama kwaraa waa dɔa la ɛɛ le o nɔn taa.
Bonɔnsala nɔ te, hé kpɔɔ le dahara ka ta biro ta, bela wii ne weweele do.'
"Dɛ n Nɛn Bie la balɔ jirima ne, nyundua toroma la ja n nɛ aa, mɛɛ ba so n kookara taa,
asɛ nɛwɛnyina baa lɔ harɛ bɛlbwa ta ba cheme n sie. Mɛɛ pegri ba bini bɔre anɛɛ gɛ petegre aa dɛ pegri o peera ne o boohna bini la.
Mɛɛ kpɔ wedɛɛga tena laanee che n nɔndig ta, asɛ ba kar la ge che n nɔŋgal ta.
Belaa mɛɛ ba n ŋɔ banɔ la baa lɔ dig ta la be ŋɔ, 'He banɔ n Mɛɛ aa swee andɛɛga tɛ heyaa la, hé ba di kora waa le harɛ mumpar dɛ kwaa cheg heyaa la,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ lɔr aa dɛ kpo mɛ la, he tɛ mɛ kondikwaa n di, nyɔgre aa dɛ kpo mɛ la, he tɛ mɛ nee n nyɔ. Maa ɛ hɔɔh la, he kpɔ mɛ kaa he deremi,
maa valɛ muŋgbal la, he tɛ mɛ yal n tɔ. N bwara wee mɛ, he nyiŋi n nɛ, asɛ baa do mɛ dea ge la, he kaa na mɛ.'
"A taa wedɛɛga tena la ɛɛ ba ŋɔe ŋɔ, 'Ya Dɔɔ, bɛweeree ya na kɛŋɔ lɔr aa dɛ kpoe ya tɛɛ kondikwaa he di, asɛ nyɔgre ge kpoe ya tɛɛ nee he nyɔɔ?
Bɛweeree ya na kɛŋɔ he ɛ hɔɔh ya kpɔe kaa ya deremi, dɛ berɛ na kɛŋɔ haa valɛ muŋgbal ya tɛɛ yal he tɔɔ?
Bɛweeree ya na kɛ he bwara wee kɛɛ ba doe dea asɛ ya ka nae nɔ?'
Asɛ ń ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Kasinteŋ, gɛ haa cha n nimanar waa nɔ dɔŋa aa puu ba la, hale nyaa ne nɛŋgwɛgre la, menee he cha la.'
"Asɛ ń berɛ ŋɔ banɔ la baa lɔ n gal ta la be ŋɔ, 'He banɔ Korowii nyotaahna aa lawɛ heyaa la, hé le n sie bonɔ dɛ ka jo nii aa wola dime bwa ba mara tɛ Bɔnsam ne o toroma la ta,
dɛkalkɛ lɔr kpo mɛ, he ta men kondikwaa tɛɛ ń di, nyɔgre kpo mɛ, he ta men nee tɛɛ ń nyɔ.
Maa ɛ hɔɔh la, he ta men lawɛ kaa dem, maa valɛ muŋgbal ge la, he ta men yal tɛɛ ń tɔ. N bwara wee mɛ, ba do mɛ dea ge, kɛ he ta balɛ dɛ́ ba na mɛ.'
"Asɛ bá ge chaŋo ŋɔ, 'Ya Dɔɔ, bɛweeree ya na kɛ lɔr ne nyɔgre dɛ kpoe, kɛɛ he ɛ hɔɔh, kɛɛ dɛɛ valɛ muŋgbal, kɛɛ he bwara wee, kɛɛ ba doe dea asɛ ya ta balɛ dɛ ba chae nɔ?'
Asɛ ń ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Kasinteŋ, gɛ haa wola n nimanar waa nɔ dɔŋa aa puu ba la bɛlbwa chae, hale nyaa ne nɛŋgwɛgre la, menee haa wola chae la.'
Banɔ te ɛɛ kaa weweele aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la taa, asɛ wedɛɛga tena la te dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la."
Yeesu aa chag ba gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ,
"Gɛ haa jema la, kerele gbosoroo baa di Galekaa kondikwaa la. A taa baa ba men Nɛn Bie lee tɛ nɛra bá kpaa mɛ pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpo mɛ."
Anee Sɔfonomonome ne bwɛɛ nomonome ka cheme Sɔfore Nomoa Kaefas dem,
dɛ ka so dɛɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ baa che o ta dɛ lawɛ Yeesu dɛ kpoo nomɛlbwa aa wola jemɛ.
Baa chema la dɛ ba berɔ ŋɔ, "Yaa won lawɛ baa nɔ gɛ tɔpere nɔ ta, dɛkalkɛ nɛra noɔ waa, aa werii do. Bwɛɛ nɔ ɛɛ vuuguu."
Dɛ Yeesu lɔ Bɛtani dɛ do Seemɔn weechɔga faa chɔg o bwadabii la dem.
Yeesu aa lɔ dem bela dɛɛ di kwaa la, haah bɛl kpoŋe nosɔɔhsoma ane a yog aa kpega a su loŋ bɛl dɛ ba o be, asɛ dɛ ba kpɔ do Yeesu nyu ta.
Yeesu habɔteŋra la aa na gɛ haah la aa ɛa la, a di ba baah, ba kpɔ bandia pɛɛ ŋɔ, "Kwaa nɔ ge chɔga nɔ mun ɔ?
O fe yog nosɔɔhsoma nɔ aa, o fe aa suuga dɔ a warɛ ó kpɔ tɛ nyaara aa?"
Yeesu aa no gɛ baa dɛ bol la, o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa hɛɛ pwah haah nɔ nɔɔ? Wedɛɛga tentenee o ɛ tɛ mɛ la.
Nyaara te, he ne banee lole tɔperee bwa, kɛ n te aa he bee do ka tonɛ.
Haah nɔ nosɔɔhsoma nɔ waa fuga do n nyu ta nɔ, n seo waa o ɛ gɛ la.
Kasinteŋ, harɛ nɔ ta bela bwa baa bol Amanesoma nɔ la, baa bol waa haah nɔ aa ɛa nɔ belaa, a ɛ sɔn tɛo dɛɛ la."
Asɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bini beŋkpoŋ baa dɛ yerɔ Judas Eskareɔt la la Sɔfonomonome la be
dɛ ka pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Dɛ n ba Yeesu ne ba tɛ heyaa aa, aŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ ba n tɛɛ yɔ?" Anee Sɔfonomonome la kure suugapoŋa fifraatoro do o nɔn ta.
Dɛ le gɛ saŋ la, Judas pa mun dɛɛ nyiŋi ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge waa won che o ta dɛ le Yeesu do ba nɔn ta.
Galekaa dii tɔpere waa tɔ sie baa wola paanoo iisi aa lɔ o ta di la, Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la ba o be dɛ ba pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Leperaa hɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya ka ɛ he Galekaa kondikwaa chege nɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé la bwɛɛ bini, hɛɛ na baa bɛl maa jemɔ asɛ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Nomoa la ŋɔ o tɔpere telo ŋɔ o ne o habɔteŋra dɛ ba ba di Galekaa kondikwaa la he dem.' "
Yeesu habɔteŋra la kaa ŋɔ gɛ waa ŋɔa la, asɛ dɛ daa Galekaa kondikwaa la cheg bela.
Bɔr aa joa la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la laŋɔ dɛ ka so dɛɛ di kwaa la.
Baa dɛ di kwaa la, Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, he bini bɛlee dɛɛ ba n lee tɛ ba kpo mɛ."
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o habɔteŋra la teene bini chɔgɔ kohona, asɛ baa pɛɛro beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, menee kɛɛ? N Dɔɔ, menee kɛɛ?"
Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Naate n ne waa pɛ nɔn hɛna beŋkpoŋ bini laanee.
Men Nɛn Bie nɔ ɛɛ sewɔɔ gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa dɛ bagle la, kɛ naate waa lee mɛ tɛ ba kpo la, bwɛɛlɛ. Dɛ ba fe ta naate lolɛ gba fe bɔ!"
Anee Judas waa dɛ ba o lee tɛ la ge pɛɛro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, menee kɛɛ?" Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Anee he bol la."
Baa dɛ di kwaa la la, Yeesu kpɔ paanoo la baa dɛ di la bɛl dɛ jam Korowii o wa, asɛ dɛ bɔne tɛ o habɔteŋra la dɛ ŋɔ, "N bo-olii la. Hé lɛ dɛ di."
Asɛ dɛ berɛ kpɔ nomol ne sen dɛ jam Korowii dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé bwa nyɔ sen nɔ ane.
Sen nɔɔ chega tɛ n chal maa dɛ ba nɛra kɛrɛdɛ waa koah dɛ fuge ta ásɛ Korowii che a ta dɛ kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba. Aa ɛ fɔo dɛ chɔ Korowii ne nɛwɛnyini baah ta.
Kasinteŋ, maa sen nɔ anee nyɔ kpa bwa ka tel gɛ saŋ n ne haa berɛ ba nyɔ anfala n Mɛɛ Kora la ta."
Asɛ ba go yel kpɛɛ Korowii dɛ ir le kaa Ɔlevere Bwe la ta.
Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Jwaana nɔ ne he bwa ɛɛ chwao kaa gel mɛ, gɛ baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, 'Korowii ɛɛ kpo petegre laanee, asɛ peera la bwa lɔ pegre' la.
Kɛ dɛ n iro le seo ta naa, mɛɛ tɔ siee kaa Galilia harɛ ta he nɛ."
Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Dɛ n bala nɔ bwa chwao gele naa, n te aa chwa gele bwa."
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ Pita be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, jabal ne sii fini, dɛ he tɔɔh kera atoro ŋɔ haa men jemɛ."
Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, n ne hɛɛ sewɔɔ, kɛ maa tɔh ŋɔ maa hen jemɛ bwa." Asɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra baa jaa la bwa ge bol gɛ.
Asɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la kaa bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Gɛtsɛmane, asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé so bonɔ ń la le ka soŋe Korowii dɛ ba."
O kpɔ Pita ne Sebedii bii banɛ la dɛ kaa bela. Dɛ o loo kuu, o ta nae gɛ bwa waa ɛ o te.
Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Gɛ n tea bini aa chɔga la gelɔ n loo ku. Lokua nɔ ɛɛ kpo mɛɛ kwara. Hé cha mɛ dɛ so bonɔ dɛɛ were."
Yeesu la sie tama dɛ ka kpɔ sie pi harɛ dɛ soŋe Korowii ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, dɛ a fe ɛɛ magroo waa, he bɛ gel a gɛ wahala nɔ ba n nɛ. Kɛ anla aa too n tea laa mɛɛ nyin, kɛ ɛ he tetoowa."
Yeesu berɔ ba o habɔteŋra batoro la be dɛ ba na kɛ ba chɔɔge doromi, asɛ o ŋɔ Pita be ŋɔ, "He ta wone cha mɛ dɛ so were dɔŋ beŋkpoŋ gba naa?
Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ won negre heya. He bambile fe dɛ nyin wedɛɛga ɛɛ, kɛ he bwadabii pwɛre."
Yeesu berɔ ka soŋe Korowii ja dɛ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, dɛ nae chɛ kɛŋɔ n na gɛ wahala nɔ, asɛ he laa kpɔ n nɛɛ aa wola magre aa, ɛa gɛ aa too he tea."
Yeesu aa bera ba o habɔteŋra la be ja la, dɛ ba fe ŋɔ bá hamɛ sie dɛ bɛ dom chɔ, kɛ ba ta wone, dɛ chɔɔge doromi.
Yeesu berɔ gel ba ja dɛ ka soŋe Korowii tooro tena gɛ o faa soŋo la tenten,
dɛ berɛ ba o habɔteŋra la be dɛ ba pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Domii he chɔ dɛɛ onaa? Saŋ baa dɛ ba n Nɛn Bie la kpɔe do wechɔg-ɛɛra nɔn ta la telo.
Hé ir ya kaa. Hé na, baa la waa dɛ ba n lee tɛ ba kpo mɛ laanee la."
Yeesu nyoa taa lɔ waa ta wɛɛ bol la, dɛ Judas waa ɛ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bini bɛl la denɔ ba. Dɛ nɛnlaa tenten Sɔfonomonome ne bela nomonome aa tom ba kpoŋe keri ne gule ja Judas nɛɛ ba ba.
Dɛ Judas tɔ sie ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Baa la maa gbaaro pɛl n bambile dɛ mo o lwɛɛma la, amɔ dɛ onee. Hé den lawɔ dɛɛ la o ne."
Judas den pa sie Yeesu be dɛ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he leaa?" dɛ gbaaro pɛl o bambile dɛ mo o lwɛɛma.
Anee Yeesu pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Dam, ɛrɛ balaa he ba bonɔ nɔɔ?" Belaa nɛra la den ba gugri Yeesu dɛ lawɔ.
Nɛra baa ja Yeesu nɛɛ la bɛl pamɛ o kere le o tɔɔ ta dɛ kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ Sɔfore Nomoa bonɔɔ deŋne laa cha.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kpɔ he kere la do o tɔɔ ta. Nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ kere dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, kere nee baa ba o ge kpoe.
Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ n fe ɛɛ wonoo yerɛ n Mɛɛ ŋɔ ó ba cha mɛ, asɛ o gel nyundua toroma baa wola nyoa dɔe ba dɛ ba yo lɛɛ mɛ kɛɛ?
Kɛ n gelɔ a ba gɛ naa, dɛ waa baa chwera bil ŋɔ gɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ a ba la ta berɛ ɛ gɛ kpa."
Anee Yeesu pɛɛ nɛra la ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛɛree men he kpɔ keri ne gule dɛɛ ba dɛ ba lag me naa? Tɔpere bwa n ne heyaa yon so Korowii Dea bela mɛɛ bagle nɛra wa, kɛ he ta men bela lawɛ.
Anɔ bwa ɛo ásɛ waa Korowii keamere la aa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛ kpela." Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋra la bwa chwa pegre a kao.
Nɛra la baa lawɛ Yeesu la kpɔɔ kaa Sɔfore Nomoa Kaefas dem, dɛ Tɔn Jerema ne bwɛɛ nomonome la cheme bela.
Baa dɛ kaa la, Pita ge teŋɛ ba nɛɛ bojaŋ dɛ ka jo Sɔfore Nomoa la dem, dɛ ka pu nɛra baa dɛ daah dem bela la so, dɛɛ nyin o na gɛ bwa baa dɛ ba kpɔe ɛ Yeesu.
Sɔfonomonome ne Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la bwa nyoa pɛo baa nyin waa dɛ́ kpɔ dawɛ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ́ won che a ta kpoo.
Anomanta nɛra kɛrɛdɛ bwa teŋe nyosone dawɛ o nɛ, kɛ ba ta wone dɔ waane dɛ́ che a ta dɛ dɔɔ kpo. Anee nɛra banɛ bane den le che baah ta
dɛ ŋɔ, "Baa nɔɔ fa ŋɔa wɛɛ wonoo pagre Korowii Dea nɔ dɛ kpɔ tɔpera atoro mao ja la."
Anee Sɔfore Nomoa la ir che dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he na waa nɔ baa kpɔa dawɛ he nɛɛ nɔɔ? He ta waane dɔe hé chaŋe aa?"

Yeesu mwaa o ne, o ta wobɛlbwa chaŋɛ. Anee Sɔfore Nomoa la berɛ ŋɔ o be ja ŋɔ, "N ŋwɛɛ Korowiijen nɔ kɛŋɔ, dɛ henee o Bie Kristo la waa bagɛ yaa nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la aa, gel ya jemɛ fini."
Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Anee he bol la. Kɛ n berɔ dɛɛ ŋɔ he bwa be ŋɔ, tɔpebɛl hɛɛ ba na n Nɛn Bie nɔɔ Korowii be kɛŋɔ n soge nomombɔr o dig ta, asɛ dɛ na gɛ n ne baamare aa le nyundua dɛɛ ba!"
Belaa Sɔfore Nomoa la laa o gbagba laala waa doa la laa pee dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé no musu wa! Bɔkwa danseɛ yá berɛ nyin jaɔ? Kɛ he bwa no musu waa nɔ waa dena bol nɔɔ?
Ɛrɛɛ he na waa nɔɔ, bwɛɛla?" Ba bwa den pɛ nyoa ŋɔ, "O chɛ kpoe."
Ba ta nentane ta o sie bɔr dɛ lɔɔro, dɛ tɔɔ kande. Banɔ la baa dɛ kpaa o lwɛrɛme dɛɛ chugru kwɛɛrɛre la yon berɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ,
"Dɛ henee Kristo la aa, na chaahna dɛ won jemɛ naate waa lɔe nɔ!"
Dɛ Pita soge buse dem baah bela, asɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la tolo bɛl ba o be dɛ ŋɔ, "Kɛ he ge fa teŋɛ Yeesu waa le Galilia harɛ la nɛɛ lao?"
Asɛ Pita tɔh pelepelepele ken ba bwa sie dɛ ŋɔ, "Waa nɔ haa dɛ bol nɔ, maa a bini jemɛ kwara!"
Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o le bela dɛ ka che dem la doonyoa. Tolo bɛl berɛ nao bela dɛ ŋɔ nɛra baa chegɛ bela la be ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ ɛ Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la habɔteŋra la bɛl."
Asɛ Pita bere tɔh dɛ ŋwɛɛ ŋɔ waa on jemɛ.
A ta bigre bɛlbwa asɛ nɛra baa chegɛ bela la ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Kpela, haa won tɔh ŋɔ Yeesu nɛra la bɛl laa hen, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he dɛ bol Galilia tena wobol."
Asɛ Pita ŋɔ, "N ŋwɛɛ Korowii kɛ dɛ n jemɛ baa nɔ bobɛlbwa o bɛ men gel!" Bug la ta dɛ jabal sio,
asɛ Pita lii gɛ Yeesu aa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Jabal ne sii dɛ he tɔɔh ŋɔ haa men jemɛ kera atoro bwa" la. Waa lii a gɛ waa nɔ la, o le dahara dɛ ka wi lokua ne.
Tɔɔ aa pera chɔmbibi la, Korowii Dea Sɔfonomonome bwa ne ba harɛ la nomonome chemo dɛ vɔrɔwe Yeesu kpoe vɔrɔwa,
dɛ vɔrɔwe o nɔɔra, dɛ kpɔɔ ka tɛ Room nomoa Paelet waa dɛ nyiŋi bela harɛ la.

Judas la waa le Yeesu tɛ ba dɔɔ lawɛ la aa bera na kɛ ba dɛ nyin ba kpo Yeesu la, a we o nɛ, asɛ o berɛ charɛ o liire kɛŋɔ o fe jemaa, o fe ta suuga la lɛɛ dɛ le Yeesu tɛ, asɛ dɛ berɛ kpɔ suugapoŋa fifraatoro la ka tɛ Sɔfonomonome la ne bwɛɛ nomonome la, dɛ ŋɔ,
"N ɛ wechɔga kɛ maa le nɛn waa wola wechɔga bɛlbwa ɛɛ tɛ heyaa ŋɔ hé ka kpoo nɔ." Anee nɛra la ŋɔ, "Ya te waane laa, a bwa do kɛ hen."
Anee Judas kpɔ suugapoŋa la vigri Korowii Dea bela, asɛ dɛ ka sagɛ o te.
Sɔfonomonome la pa suuga la dɛ ŋɔ, "Suuga nɔ ɛ chal suuga, asɛ ya mmarare ge aa yaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛ kɛŋɔ ya won kpɔ suuga nɔ ja Korowii Dea suuga ta."
Anomanta ba bwa nyoa pɛo kɛŋɔ bá kpɔ suuga la ka yawɛ harɛ bɛl waa ɛ vimamaa harɛ ásɛ dɛɛ huge hɔɔhra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bela.
A waa gela baa yerɛ bela harɛ la Chal Harɛ dɛ ba le fini la.
Waa Korowii keame Jɛremaya faa bola la ɛ kpela. O fa ŋɔ, "Ba lɛ suugapoŋa fifraatoro, gɛ Israel tena nyoa aa pɛa ba di o yog la,
asɛ dɛ kpɔ gɛ suuga la ka yawɛ vimamaa harɛ la gɛ Korowii aa ŋɔ n be la."
Dɛ Yeesu ge chegɛ nomoa Paelet sie. Asɛ Paelet bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Henee Juda tena kooro ɛ?" Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Anee he bol la."
Sɔfonomonome ne harɛ nomonome la teŋe nyosone dawɛ Yeesu nɛ, kɛ Yeesu ta ban chaŋɛ.
Asɛ Paelet bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Wedamanta nɔ bwa baa kpɔa dɛɛ dawɛ nɔ, haa no kɛɛ?"
Yeesu ta wobɛlbwa chaŋɛ, o ta a bɛlbwa tɔeh, asɛ nomoa Paelet nyoa kpo kohona.
Dɛ o dɔ we-ɛɛle bɛl waa dɛ ɛ bena bɛlbwa. A gɛ tɔpejen la baa tel aa, wechɔg-ɛɛ te bɛlbwa baa doo dea asɛ bwɛɛla la ŋɔ ó fooru ta la, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o fooru ta.
A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ ba do baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Barabas nomɛlbwa dɛ no o sɔn dea.
Asɛ baa ba Paelet be o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Barabas ne Yeesu baa dɛ yerɔ Kristo la, ba bini umee hɛɛ nyin n fooru ta tɛ heya ɔ?"
Dɛ o gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ bɔweela waa ba che Yeesu nɛɛ pɛɛpɛɛ dɛ kpɔɔ ba o be la.
Nomoa Paelet aa soge o kara ta dɛɛ bol waa la, o haah tomɛ nɛn o be ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ baa la wobɛlbwa ɛ. Nɛndɛɛge tentenee. Gɛ maa dee o waa fini nɔ la, a we n nɛɛ taeh."
Jaah dɛ Sɔfonomonome ne bwɛɛ nomonome la do nɛnlaa la bwa ŋɔ bá ŋɔ Barabasee baa nyin kɛ Paelet foo ta asɛ dɛ kpo Yeesu.
Anee Paelet bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Nɛra banɛ nɔ bini umee hɛɛ nyin n foo ta tɛ heya ɔ?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Barabas."
Belaa o berɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ he ŋɔ ń ɛ Yeesu nɔ baa dɛ yerɔ Kristo nɔɔ?" Asɛ ba bwa pɛ ŋɔ, "Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!"
Anee Paelet bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ yɔ? Bɔkwa wechɔgaa o ɛɔ?" Ate dɛ ba berɔ kwaa ŋɔ kohona ŋɔ, "Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!"

Nomoa Paelet aa nao kɛ dɛ o ŋɔ o sagɛ waa la ta naa, waa aa ba la aa wer doe ba la, o ɛ nee dɛ samɛ o nɔɔra nɛnlaa la bwa sie dɛ ŋɔ, "N laa dɛɛ do heyaa ŋɔ hé kpo nɛndɛɛge nɔ. He gbagbaa dɛɛ ɛ he wa!"
Anee nɛra la ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, hé te gel o seo wobɛlbwa dawɛ ya ne ya naanar nɛ!"
Belaa Paelet le Barabas ta, gɛ baa dɛ nyin la, dɛ gel ba lɔɔ Yeesu bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra ne mɔɔ dɛ kpɔɔ tɛ ŋɔ bá ka kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta.
Asɛ soojare la kpɔ Yeesu le kaa nomoa Paelet dem, dɛ yerɛ ba bala soojare la bwa ba ba baro cheme,
dɛ laa o laala foo, dɛ kpɔ yaswɛm bɛl kɛŋɔ ba bela kooro yal ba tɔɔ,
dɛ kpɔ sɔɔhne sɔh koogbɛrɛ piu, dɛ kpɔ daa bɛl do o nɔndig ta, dɛɛ guŋu harɛ kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ɛ kooro la dɛɛ taramo dɛɛ si, "Woowo, Juda tena kooro!"
Asɛ dɛɛ ta nentane dɛɛ ta o nɛ, dɛ kpɔ daa la dɛɛ cha o nyu.
Baa mugli o baah tonɛ la, ba laa yal la foo o bwara ta, dɛ kpɔ o gbagba laala o faa doa wubwa la doo, dɛ kpɔɔ le dɛɛ kaa dɛ́ ka kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta.
Baa dɛ kaa la, ba kaa na Sairini baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn. Ba ɛgro o lɛ Yeesu dagagre la che.
Asɛ ba ba bela baa dɛ yerɔ Gɔlgɔta la. Gɔlgɔta munii Nyuhog Bɔr.
Asɛ ba kpɔ koŋkpelakpela ane koo sen ta dɛ kpɔ tɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ó nyɔ. Waa daga na la, o vɛh nyɔe.
Ba foo o laala, dɛ kpaa o nɔɔra ne o nakpale pɛl dagagre ta. Dɛ soojare la dɛ nyin Yeesu laala bɔna, dɛ ta chacha mɔɔ dɛ́ won jemɛ laala ba bɛlbwa aa di.
Gɛɛ ba ɛ mɔɔ dɛ ba so dɛɛ nyiŋu.
Ba chwerɛ o wechɔga waa ɛa ba koh a waa kpoo la pɛl o dagagre la ta o nyundua. A gɛ waa laanee: |scYEESU, JUDA TENA KOOROO KEN|d.
Belaa ba kpaa ŋwɛɛra banɛ pɛl dagagra ta ja Yeesu nɛ, bɛl sagɛ o dig ta, bɛl ge sagɛ o gal ta.
Nɛra baa kpɔ bela bɔr baa kaa la chɛgre Yeesu dɛɛ mugli o baah ŋɔ,
"Chwa! Nɛn waa dɛ pagre Korowii Dea dɛ won kpɔ tɔpera atoro mao la laa nɔ gbao? Lɛ he te! Dɛ henee Korowii Bie la aa, le dagagre la doa tu harɛ yá na!"
Gɛɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema ne bwɛɛ nomonome mugli o baah gɛ banɔ la aa ɛa la,
dɛ ŋɔ, "Ao! O won bane te lɛɛ, kɛ waa won lɛ o te gbagba. Kɛ Israel tena kooroo yɔ. Hé gel o tu le dagagre la doa ba harɛ yá na asɛ dɛ yaradao.
O ŋɔ Korowii nɛɛ o sie dawɛ, dɛ ŋɔ Korowii Biee on. Dɛ o waa dɛ lɛ Korowii sie te naa, amɔ Kórowii ba lɛo taraken."
Dɛ gɛɛ ŋwɛɛra baa kpaa ba pɛl dagagra ta ja o nɛɛ la gee chɛgro.
Wee aa baa che nyufala la, bɔr biro jumaa ken dɛ ka tel wekee saŋ mɔɔ dɛ berɛ chaah ja.
Wekee saŋ aa baa tel la, Yeesu do lɔŋɔ kpegri nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?" O munii kɛŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ Korowii, n Mɛɛ Korowii, ɛrɛɛ he chwa mɛ nɔɔ?"
Nɛra baa chegɛ bela la aa no gɛ la, ba ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ no! Elaejaa wɛɛ yerɛ la."
Asɛ bɛl chwa bug la ta dɛ ka kpɔ konjɔgɔjɔgɔ bɛl waa dɛ lɛ nee ka li sennyɛga ta dɛ kpɔ toh daa ta, dɛ kpɔ pao ó nyɔ.
Nɛra aa kaa la ge ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya na, dɛ Elaeja ɛɛ ba lɛo waa?"
Belaa Yeesu berɛ do lɔŋɔ kohona, asɛ dɛ gel o doma kaa, o ta.
Waa sewa la, ate dɛ yal waa teŋe Korowii Dea la baah ta la pere anɛ le nyundua ba ta harɛ. Harɛ jigro, asɛ bwetala bini pegri,
lalbɔɔne pili, asɛ Korowii nɛra baa serewa kɛrɛdɛ ir seo ta.
Yeesu aa ir seo ta la, ba ge le ba lalbɔɔne bini dɛ ka jo Jerusalam, asɛ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ na ba.
Sooja nomoa ne o soojare baa dɛ daah Yeesu la aa na gɛ harɛ aa jigra ne waa aa chiga la, ba ɔmɔ, asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Korowii Biee baa nɔ kpela!"
Dɛ haahna warɔ dɛ che bojaŋ dɛɛ nyiŋi. A gɛ haahna nɔɔ teŋɛ o nɛɛ le Galilia harɛ dɛ daa kondikwaa dɛɛ tɛo.
Ba bini banee Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la, ne Jems ne Josef nya Mɛɛre, ne Sebedii bii la nya.
Awola jɔmɔra la baa bɛl waa ɛ Arimatea te dɛ ɛ suuga te ba. Dɛ o gba ɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra bɛl,
dɛ ge la Paelet be dɛ ka soŋo ŋɔ ó tɛo ŋwɛnɛ ó ka kpɔ Yeesu lale la. Paelet sɛh dɛ kpɔ tɛo.
Anee Josef kpɔɔ, dɛ kpɔ yapoŋ ondɛɛge bɛl dɛ fɔrɔwo,
dɛ kpɔɔ ka huge lalbɔɔ o gbagba aa forɛ bwe bɛl ta o do kɛŋɔ dea ken baa wola nomɛlbwa o bini huge mɔɔ la, dɛ gbili bwejen bɛl tɔ o nyoa, asɛ dɛ le bela kaa.
Dɛ Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la ne o dɔŋ Mɛɛre la soge bela, asɛ ba sie pa lalbɔɔ la ta baa nyiŋi.
Awola la Juda tena dɛ kpɔ ba te asɛ tɔɔ peraa, bá di ba Ona Tɔpere. Tɔɔ aa pera la Sɔfonomonome ne Farisii tena la kaa cheme nomoa Paelet dem,
dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, gɛ saŋ a gɛ nyosonteŋni nɔ aa wola sewɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ o dɛ bol ŋɔ dɛ o sewaa, tɔpera atoro wɛɛ iruu ja.

Anomanta, do nɛra bá kaa daah lalbɔɔ la mɔɔ tɔpetooro wee la tel. A waa laa aa, o habɔteŋra la ɛɛ ka ŋwɛ lale laanee le bɔɔ la bini, dɛ ka teŋe nyosone bagle nɛra bwa ŋɔ iraa ba Dɔɔ la ir. Dɛ gɛ laa aa, negra baa dɛ ba dɔe ka negre nɛra nɔ ɛɛ dɔ bɔree che gwaa gɛ baa tɔ sie negre nɛra la bwa."
Anee nomoa Paelet ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Soojaree la. Hé gel ba ka daah bɔɔ la. Ŋwɛnɛ te bɛlbwa haa kpɔ o ta asɛ ba bɛ won ka ŋwɛ lale la la, hé kpɔ o ta."

Anee ba ka ɛ gɛ baa ɛ bwa nɛn bɛ won ka ŋwɛ lale la. Ba kaa maa lalbɔɔ la ne bwe la baa kpɔa tɔ o nyoa la bobɛl pɛ gɛ aa ɛ dɛ nomɛl ŋwɛo jo bɔɔ la bini aa, ba won jemɛ, asɛ dɛ berɛ kpɔ soojare so bela ŋɔ báa daah bela.
Ona Tɔpere la aa gara, asɛ tɔɔ ɛɛ ba pera Kwasiara la, Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la ne o dɔŋ Mɛɛre la iro ŋɔ ba dɛ la ka nyiŋi bela baa huge Yeesu la.
Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nyundua torome bɛl le nyundua tu harɛ, asɛ harɛ jigri kohona. O la bɔɔ la ta dɛ ka gbili bwejen la le o nyoa, dɛ so o ta.
Dɛ he nao waa, o dɛ jajare sie kɛŋɔ bwaala nyɛgla ken, asɛ o laala waa doa la ge to kpelkpel ken.
Soojare baa dɛ daah bela la aa nao la, ba ɔmɔ taeh, ba bwara ɛɛ sa, dɛ bwa serewe chɔɔge kɛŋɔ nɛra baa serewa ken.
Anee nyundua torome la ŋɔ haahna la be ŋɔ, "He bɛ ɔmɛ. N jemɔ kɛ Yeesu baa kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta o sewɛ la bɔree hɛɛ nyin.
O toole bonɔ kpa. O iro gɛ o faa ŋɔ he be la. Hé ba na bela baa hugo la,
asɛ dɛ ɛ warane dɛ la ka bagle o habɔteŋra be kɛŋɔ o ir seo ta, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ o tɔ ba sie dɛɛ kaa Galilia harɛ ta. Belaa baa ba o nae. Waa maa dɔa dɛ́ bol he be laanee la."
Asɛ haahna la chwa le bɔɔ la bɔr bela. Ɔmee lag ba. Ba sie ge garɛ lɛ taeh. Ba lawɛ ŋwɛnɛ dɛ chwa la ká taa waa la bagle Yeesu habɔteŋra la.
Bug la ta, Yeesu chem ba ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ chɔɔ ba, asɛ ba tel o be dɛ guŋi lawɛ o napaala dɛɛ duuru.
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ ɔmɛ. Hé la ka ŋɔ n nimanar la be kɛ bá kaa Galilia harɛ. Belaa baa ba n nae."
Haahna la taa lɔ ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa la, soojare la baa dɛ daah lalbɔɔ la bane chwao kaa Jerusalam dɛ taa waa aa chiga la bwa bagle Sɔfonomonome.
Sɔfonomonome la ne bwɛɛ nomonome chemo dɛ vɔrɔwe, dɛ nyin suuga damanta tɛ soojare la,
dɛ lɔ ba nyoa ŋɔ, "He ɛo waa, hé ŋɔ dɛ he chɔɔge doromi harambaŋa, asɛ o habɔteŋra la ba ŋwɛo kaa,
asɛ dɛ Paelet noɔ kɛ dɛ doromii he chɔ dɛ gel ba won ba ŋwɛ Yeesu chɔɔ la, dɛ gel ba la he ne kɔɔto aa, yá bol tɛ heyaa ásɛ he kon do som."
Soojare la aa lɛ suuga la, gɛ Sɔfonomonome la aa do ba ŋɔ bá bol laanee ba taa bagle nɛra bwa. Hale kpoŋe ba le fini, gɛ waa laanee Juda tena ta kpoŋe.
Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la Galilia harɛ ta ka chemo bwe bɛl o faa ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ o baa ir seo ta naa bá chemo bela la.
Baa nao la, ba duuru, kɛ dɛ bane dɛ tɔŋle ŋɔ Yeesu laa ba na la.
Yeesu tel ba jwɛh dɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii kpɔ nyundua ne harɛ nɔ ta bwa kpegri do n nɔn ta.
Anomanta hé valɛ kaa harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa dɛ ka nyin nɛra bwa bini nɛra bá ba teŋɛ n nɛ, dɛ sɔ ba Korowii ne ásɛ dɛ kpɔ ba do n Mɛɛ ne men o Bie ne o Domadɛɛge la nɔn ta,
asɛ dɛ chag ba ŋɔ báa teŋɛ n waa maa chagle heyaa la bwa ta. Kasinteŋ, mɛɛ che he habɔɔ dɛ ja he nɛɛ tɔpere te bɛlbwa dɛ ka tel wobɛlbwa jaga saŋ."
N dɛ nyin n bagle heyaa amanesoma aa le Korowii Bie Yeesu Kristo waa la ta. A mumparee nɔ:
Korowii keame Aesaya chwerɛ gɛ Korowii aa bol nɛn waa dɛ ba Yeesu sie tɔe la waa o Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ tomɛ n toromee ó tɔ he sie dɛ kwaa bɔr tɛɛ."
Dɛ berɛ chwerɛ ŋɔ, "Nomɛl dɛ bol waa takpeg ne pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ ta, ŋɔ nɛ́ra gel ba we-ɛɛla togre, dɛ kpɔ ba te dɛɛ kpa ba Dɔɔ bala."

Gɛɛ a do baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Jɔn ir dɛ ba pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo la ta dɛ ba bol Korowii Waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra, dɛɛ ŋɔ bá charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta, ásɛ Korowii kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba, ásɛ o ge sɔ ba Korowii ne.
Belaa nɛra baa le Judia harɛ, ne Jerusalam tena bwa le kaa Jɔn be ka no wa, dɛ bol ba wechɔga dɛɛ baglo, asɛ o sɔ ba Korowii nee Jɔɔdan Moo ta.
Jɔn nɔ yal waa tɔɔ la, nyogma pona nee ba sɔɔh, ol tɔn gee ɛ o kriso. Dɛ tontombɛ ne toohnee ɛ o kondikwa.
O ŋɔ nɛra la be ŋɔ, "Nomɛl dɛ ba n habɔɔ dɛ gwaa mɛ. Maa o napaa tee kwaraa dɔ.
Maa sɔ heyaa Korowii nee la, nee gbagbaa n kpɔ sɔ heya. Kɛ o te ɛɛ kpɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee sɔ heya."
Belaa Yeesu le Nasarɛt waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta dɛ ba Jɔn be, asɛ o sɔɔ Korowii nee Jɔɔdan Moo ta.
Bug la ta Yeesu aa le nee la ta la, o nao kɛŋɔ baama bini pilo, asɛ Korowii Doma kpɔ bela dɛ tu ba o be kɛŋɔ brɔnoma.
Asɛ o no taa bɛl nyundua kɛ, "Henee n bie maa dɛ nyin he wa, he wa ɛɛ su n siwi."
Anee Korowii Doma la den gel o kaa pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta,
bela kpɔg bini ola aa lole, asɛ o do bela tɔpera fifraanaarɛ. Dɛ Bɔnsam dɛ ba o be bela dɛ baa daahno dɛɛ na kɛŋɔ o fe charɛ nyoa. Dɛ nyundua toroma ge dɛ ba o be dɛ baa chao.
Belaa ba lawɛ Jɔn do dea. A habɔɔ la, Yeesu la Galilia harɛ dɛ ka bol Korowii Amanesoma bag ba.
O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Tɔpere la telo! Korowii Kora pu heyaa tonɛ! Hé charɛ he liire dɛ le he wechɔga ta, asɛ dɛ yarada Amanesoma nɔ!"
Belaa Yeesu aa dɛ valɛ Galilia Moo la nyoa la, o na nɛra banɛ bane baa dɛ ɛ nee toma dɛɛ ta asau, Seemɔn ne o nime Andriu.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gel he pɛŋa la nyina dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛ, asɛ n bagle heyaa gɛ baa nyin nɛra baa tɛ Korowii."
Bug la ta la, ba gel ba asauri la dɛ teŋɛ o nɛ.
Baa le bela dɛ la sie tama ken la, o na baala banɛ bane, Sebedii bii Jems ne o nime Jɔn, baa lɔ ba gbera bini dɛɛ tɔɔge ba asauri.
Belaa Yeesu yer ba, asɛ ba gel ba mɛɛ Sebedii ne paa tena baa kpɔ ba ja ba nɛɛ la gbera la bini dɛ ka teŋɛ o nɛ.
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la Kapeeneɔm, asɛ Ona Tɔpere la, o la cheremi dea dɛ ka bagle wa.
O webagla ɛɛ ba nyokpoa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ta do kɛ gɛ Tɔn Jerema la yon dɛɛ bagle la. O te dɛ bol waa kɛ nɛn waa dɔ waa bwa kpegri ken.
Belaa baa bɛl kwaa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ ba cheremi dea bela dɛ ba nyɛg ŋɔ,
"Yeesu Nasarɛt te, bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin ya be nɔ? Ya chɔgaa he ba kɛɛ? N jemɛ he nɛnsoo. Henee Korowii Bikaih la waa ŋɔa ŋɔ o dɛ ba bala la."
Anee Yeesu kɔr kwaa la aa lɔ baa la nɛɛ la ŋɔ, "Hé tɔ nyoa dɛ le o nɛ."
Asɛ a ir o nɛɛ dɛ gel o beŋri, dɛ dooge lɔŋɔre mɔɔ dɛ le o nɛ.
Gɛ waa nɔ ɛ nɛra la bwa nyokpoa, asɛ ba bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa nɔɔ? A ge ɛ webaglefala kɛɛ? He ta nae kɛŋɔ o dɔ kpegri dɛ bol waa kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ be a no dɛɛ kaa laa?"
Bug la ta Yeesu waa perɛ Galilia harɛ bobɛlbwa.
Baa le cheremi dea bela la, ba ne Jems ne Jɔn pa sie kaa Seemɔn ne Andriu dem.
Dɛ Seemɔn helahaah bwara wɔrɔbɔ o chɔ kalaŋ ta. Yeesu aa bala la, ba bol haah la waa baglo.
Asɛ o la o be dɛ ka lawɔ ir. Belaa haah la bwara sɔɔh, asɛ o ir dɛ daa kwaa dɛɛ tɛɛ ba.
Wee aa joa la, ba kpɔ weela tena ne nɛra kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ bwa ba Yeesu be.
Asɛ bwɛɛ la tena la bwa ba che dem la doonyoa.
O chah nɛndamanta weela bwa soosiwi aa lɔ ba nɛ, dɛ doŋi kwaa ge le nɛndamanta nɛ. O ta kwaa la ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ a won bol wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a jemɛ o nɛnsoo.
Tɔɔ raa pera chɔmbibi la, Yeesu iro le dem bela dɛ kaa bela aa hela, dɛ ka soŋe Korowii.
Belaa Seemɔn ne o bala la ir dɛ kaa gaage o bɔr.
Baa nao la, ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nɛra bwa dɛ nyin he bɔr."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya kaa bwɛɛre aa bɛne bonɔ nɔ ta ásɛ n ka bol waa a ge ta, dɛkalkɛ a waa n koh ba."
Anomanta o valɛ Galilia harɛ bwa dɛɛ bol waa ba cheremi deene bini dɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ.
Asɛ baa bɛl weechɔga aa ɛ o bwara ba Yeesu be dea, dɛ ba guŋi harɛ dɛ soŋo ŋɔ, "Hɛɛ sɛoh waa, hɛɛ wonoo gel n bwara kwaa."
O waa do Yeesu sum, o tɛr o nɔn lego dɛ ŋɔ, "N sɛoh. N gelɔ he bwara kwaa."
Bug la ta la, weela la den le o nɛ, asɛ o bwara kwaa.
Anee Yeesu kaoh ŋɔ, "Bɛ nomɛlbwa be ŋɔ. Pa sie kaa Sɔfo be dɛ kpɔ he te ka baglo ó pɛne, asɛ hé kpɔ kwaa ka tɛo ó kpo, gɛ Mosis aa bagla la á bagle kɛ he weela la toole he nɛɛ kpa."
Waa kaoh tonɛ la, o gelɔ o le kaa.

Baa la aa lea la, o kpɔ waa la perɛ bobɛlbwa. A gelɔ Yeesu ta wone valɛ kɛrɛdɛ gɛ waa dɛ nyin kpa. Anomanta bwɛɛ bɛlbwa waa la o ta la, gɛɛ o ka so bwɛɛ la dahara, asɛ nɛra yon le bobɛlbwa dɛ ba o be.
Tɔpere bɛl habɔɔ la, Yeesu berɔ la Kapeeneɔm. Belaa o waa perɛ bwɛɛ la ta kɛ o lɔ dem.
Anomanta nɛra cheme dem bela kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ bɔr toole doonyoa kwaraa, asɛ Yeesu bol waa bag ba.
Belaa nɛra banaarɛ bane kpɔ baa bɛl waa kuuga dɛɛ ba Yeesu be.
Bɔr aa fara la, ba ta wone kpɔ baa la ba o be. Anee ba teeh dea la dɛ forɛ sal la bela Yeesu aa chega la, dɛ kpɔ baa la ne o kalaŋ waa chɔ o ta la dɛ che bela dɛ kpɔɔ bil Yeesu sie.
Belaa Yeesu aa naa kɛ ba yaradao kɛrɛdɛ la, o ŋɔ baa la waa kuuga la be ŋɔ, "N bie, n kpɔ he wechɔga kɛɛ."
Tɔn Jerema baa soge bela la lii ba nyu bini dɛ ŋɔ,
"Ɛrɛɛ o do dɛɛ bol waa gɛ nɔɔ? Korowii gboo won wechɔga kpɔe dɛ kɛ. Aa! O dɛ ɛ Korowii nɛnhɛla."
Belaa Yeesu aa jemɛ waa baa liira la, asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii gɛ nɔɔ?
Maa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ n kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo nɔ, ne kɛŋɔ maa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ir dɛ kpɔ o kalaŋ valɛ, a bini umee kpega ɔ?
Mɛɛ chagle heyaa kɛŋɔ n Nɛn Bie dɔ kpegri harɛ nɔ ta kɛ n kpɔ nɛra wechɔga kɛ ba."
Belaa o ŋɔ weela te la be ŋɔ, "No n be! Ir kpɔ he kalaŋ kaa dem."
Asɛ baa la ir bug la ta dɛ kpɔ o kalaŋ nɛra la bwa siwi ta bela dɛ kaa. A gelɔ nɛra la bwa nyoa kpo, asɛ ba kpɛɛ Korowii ŋɔ ba ta a dɔŋa nae bwa.
Yeesu berɔ la Galilia Moo la nyoa. Belaa nɛra warɛ dɛ ba o be, asɛ wɛɛ bag ba wa.
Waa vala baa kaa la, o na baa bɛl waa soge o toma ta dɛɛ lɛ lampoo, baa yerɔ Lewi, o mɛɛ ge sɔne Alfeɔs. Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ba teŋɛ n nɛ." Asɛ o ir dɛ teŋɛ o nɛ.
A habɔɔ la, Yeesu la Lewi dem dɛ ka so dɛɛ di kwa. Lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ nɛra apoo ne wechɔg-ɛɛra yon warɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ. Ba ne Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la so tig ta.
Anee Farisii tena Tɔn Jerema la aa na Yeesu ne lampoo lɛɛra ne wechɔg-ɛɛra la aa pɛa dɛɛ di kwaa la, ba bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ o ne gɛ nɛra nɔ pɛ dɛɛ di kwaa nɔɔ?"
Yeesu aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Weela tenaa hiah tɛɛga te, bokpega tena laa." Dɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te nɛndɛɛga waa laa n ba. Wechɔg-ɛɛra waa n ba ásɛ ba charɛ ba liire."

Awola bɛl, Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la habɔteŋra ne Farisii tena vɔwɛ ba nyoa, asɛ nɛra bane ba Yeesu be dɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa Jɔn habɔteŋra ne Farisii tena habɔteŋra te ɛɛ vɔwɛ ba nyoa, asɛ he habɔteŋra nɔ te aa wola nyoa vɔwɛ nɔɔ?"
Anee Yeesu sɛg ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Baa lawɛ hanfale dɛ yerɛ o daamanar ŋɔ bá ba lɛ ba sie nɔ, baa berɔɔ so lɔr aa? Baa lɔree so.
Kɛ tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao kɛŋɔ baa lawɛ hanfale jaa laanee le ba bini. Gɛ saŋ la te, baa vɔwɛ nyoaa.
"Baa yafale yakwara kpɔe dɛɛ tɔ yabene bɔɔ. Gɛ laa aa, onfale la ɛɛ kɛɛroo le yabene la ta, asɛ bɔɔ la berɛ do kan kohona.
"Baa senfala kpɔe dɛɛ do loŋbena aa kɔɔhna bini dɛɛ tɔ a nyoa. Dɛ he ɛ gɛ naa, senfala la baa peraa, aa do kpegrii dɛ pere loŋa la a chɔg, asɛ sen la fuge. Senfala chɛ loŋfala."
Awola Ona Tɔpere bɛl, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra kpɔ mea koo bɛl ta, asɛ o habɔteŋra la kuugi mea la ane.
Anee Farisii tena bane aa naa la, ba ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi na! He habɔteŋra la dɛ ɛ toma dɛɛ to ya Ona Tɔpere mmara la."
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "He ta gɛ ya naa Devid aa ɛa saŋ la Abiata aa ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la kure kɛɛ? Gɛ saŋ la Devid nyao, asɛ lɔr ɛɛ kpo o ne nɛra baa ja o nɛɛ la.
O la Korowii Dea dɛ ka di paanoo aa ɛ Korowii kwa, nomɛlbwa fe aa wola ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ o di la atane kɛ Sɔfore la gbo, asɛ o di dɛ tɛ o nɛra baa ja o nɛɛ la ge ba di."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ja ŋɔ, "Nɛn waa Korowii cheg Ona Tɔpere. Ona Tɔpere te waa laa o ta nɛn.
Anomanta n Nɛn Bie dɔ Ona Tɔpere gba kpegri."
Yeesu la cheremi dea bela ja, dɛ baa bɛl o nɔn aa sewa lɔ bela.
Dɛ nɛra bane lɔ bela dɛɛ nyiŋi Yeesu kɛ wɛɛ chah baa laanee Ona Tɔpere la ta ásɛ ba dɔ o waa dɛ bol.
Asɛ Yeesu yerɛ baa la o nɔn aa sewa la ŋɔ ó ir ba che ba sie.

Belaa o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ ya mmara la ɛɛ bagle yaa ŋɔ yá ɛ Ona Tɔpere laɔ? Dɛ a ɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛ ya ɛ nɛra wedɛɛga kɛɛ yá fig baɔ? A ɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛ ya lɛ nɛra mkpa kɛɛ yá chɔg baɔ?" Waa bɔɔ ba gɛ la, ba ta wone bol wobɛlbwa.
Asɛ Yeesu nyiŋi ba bwa, o baah di. Gɛ ba liire aa do toŋgboŋ kohona la ta o sie lɛɛ. Anee o ŋɔ baa la be ŋɔ ó tɛr nɔn. Waa tɛr o nɔn la, dɛ o nɔn la berɔ do kpegri.
Anomanta Farisii tena la le buse, asɛ ba ne Hɛrɔd nɛra la ka cheme dɛ vɔrɔwe Yeesu vɔrɔwa dɛ́ fee kpoo.
Asɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra le kaa Galilia Moo la ta. Belaa nɛnlaa bane baa le Galilia harɛ teŋɛ o nɛ. Nɛra baa le Judia harɛ
ne Jerusalam ne Idumia harɛ ne Jɔɔdan Moo wee lee bɔr, ne nɛra baa le Taaya ne Sidon pera bwa no o wa, dɛ ba o be.
Nɛra la warɔ kohona, anomanta Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ bá nyin gbera bɛl tɛo ó jo o bini ásɛ nɛra la che baŋ dɛ bɛ o nɛɛ tɔ.
Waa chah nɛra kohona nomanta, weela tena la kar ta dɛ nyinu dɛ lege.
Banɔ la kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ la nao waa, gɛɛ ba chogli o sie dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ bol waa o be, ŋɔ, "Henee Korowii Bie la!"
Anee Yeesu kah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ o nɛnsoo bagle.
Asɛ Yeesu ka che bwe bɛl ta, dɛ yerɛ nɛra waa dɛ nyin, anee ba ba o be.
Belaa o kpɔ ba bini fi dɛ banɛ dɛ ŋɔ bá teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛɛ bol Korowii Wa.
O ŋɔ baa dɔ kpegrii dɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ.
Yeesu nɛra fi dɛ banɛ waa kpɔ ba laanee nɔ: Seemɔn waa pa o sɔn Pita la,
Sebedii bii Jems ne o nime Jɔn waa pa ba ge sɔn Bɔɔnɛɛjes la, o munii kɛ Sikpeg Tena,
ne Andriu, Felep, Batolomeo, Maatiu, Tɔmas ne Alfeɔs bie Jems, ne Tadeɔs, ne Seemɔn waa le Keenan,
dɛ Judas Eskareɔt waa le Yeesu tɛ ba kpoo la.
Yeesu aa kaa dem la, nɛnlaa baa cheme o nɛɛ ja, o ne o habɔteŋra la ta bɔr dɔe dɛ́ di kwaa kwara.
Belaa Yeesu nɛra aa noa la, ba ba kpɔɔ le ba baah, dɛkalkɛ nɛra dɛ bol ŋɔ o dɛ we chogla.
Asɛ Tɔn Jerema bane le Jerusalam ba dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Bɛlsebul waa ɛ kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ bwa nomoa laanee tɛo kpegri o kpɔ dɛɛ doŋi kwaa la."
Anee Yeesu yer ba dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ Bɔnsam ɛɛ ba wona doŋi o tenten nɔ?"
Dɛ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Dɛ harɛ bɛl ta tena bini pere anɛ asɛ baa yo aa, o dɛ pagre.
Dɛ waane ba dem bɛl ta asɛ ba baah pere anɛ ba gbo ɛɛ yo aa, dem la aa won che.
Dɛ Bɔnsam ge kora bini peraa, waa won che. O dɛ ba chɔga."
O berɛ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa aa won jo bokpega te dea dɛ ŋwɛ o laala, nemenɛ o tɔ sie won vɔrɔwo mɔɔ, dɛ won jo o dea dɛ pa o laala."
Belaa o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, Korowii won nɛra wechɔga ne nɛnhɛla baa dɛ ɛo la kpɔe dɛ kɛ ba.
Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la nɛnhɛla la te, waa kpɔ kɛo. Naate wechɔga ɛɛ dawɛ o nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwaa."
Waa nɛra aa dɛ bol kɛ kwaa ir Yeesu nɛɛ la waa o bol gɛ waa nɔ.
Yeesu aa lɔ dem bela la, o nya ne o nimanar baa che buse dɛ tomɛ nɛn ŋɔ ó yerɔ.
Dɛ nɛra warɔ dɛ so baro cheme, anee ba ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, he nya ne he nimanar chegɛ buse dɛɛ yerɛ."
Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Umee n nya ne n nimanar ɔ?"
Anee o laa nyu ir dɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa soga baro la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé na n nya ne n nimanar.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ waa Korowii aa dɛ nyin laanee n nime ne n nimambie ne n nya."
Yeesu berɔ la Galilia Moo la nyoa dɛ kaa bagle nɛra wa. Nɛra baa chega baro la warɔ, anomanta o jo gbera bini dɛ ka so nebaah tama, asɛ nɛra la ge che baŋ.
Belaa o kpɔ sɛgla dɛ bol waa chag ba ŋɔ,
"Hɛ́ɛ no. Baa bɛlee ira dɛ kaa merɛ mea.
Waa ka dɛ merɛ mea la, ane lee ŋwɛnɛ nyoa, asɛ jumbii ba tɔɔ di.
Asɛ ane ge lee bwetala ta dɛ le warane. Teera aa wola toole bela kohona la, a lune ta wone kaa bini.
Belaa wee aa lɔa la, a jwalɛ dɛ serewe.
Ane lee sɔɔhne baah dɛ le, asɛ sɔɔhne la kpeg dɛ lawa, a ta wone ɛ.
Asɛ anɔ la aa lee harɛdɛɛge ta la le, dɛ do wer dɛ ɛ. Ane ma bie fifraatoro, ane ma fifraanumɛl, asɛ ane ge ma lafare."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin dɛ no la, ó no."
Aa ka Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la ne nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ o nɛɛ la, ba bɔɔro sɛgla la mun.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Korowii ta o Kora bini wobɛlbwa kpɔe sɔh he te. Kɛ nɛra baa kaa la te, sɛgla nee mɛɛ ba waa ba be bola, ásɛ a ɛ gɛ baa chwera ŋɔ,
'Baa nyiŋuu kohona, kɛ baa a mun jema ba. Baa noo kohona, kɛ baa a jema ba, dɛkalkɛ baa ba liire chara ba bwa, ásɛ Korowii kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba.' "
Belaa Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He ta sɛgla la mun noɛ yaa? Dɛ he ta onɔ mun noɛ yaa, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ no sɛgla bwa mun nɔ?
Nɛn la waa dɛ merɛ kwaa la, o chegɔ tɛ naate waa dɛ bol Korowii Wa.
Asɛ nɛra baa dɛ no Waa la bane do kɛ mea la aa lee ŋwɛnɛ nyoa jumbii tɔɔ di la, dɛkalkɛ ba baa no Korowii Waa la aa, bug la ta dɛ Bɔnsam baa laa kpɔ ba nyu bini.
Nɛra baa dɛ no Waa la bane ge do kɛ mea la aa lee bwetala ta bela teera aa wola toole kohona kɛŋɔ a lune won kaa bini la, dɛkalkɛ ba baa no Korowii Waa la, dɛ ba sie lɛo.
Kɛ Waa la aa wola ban joogɛ la gelɔ aa won ba nyu bini ka. A chegɛ Korowii Waa ta waane puu ba aa, dɛ ba horɔ.
Asɛ nɛra baa dɛ no Waa la bane ge do kɛ mea la aa lee sɔɔhne baah la,
dɛkalkɛ ba baa no Korowii Waa la, kɛ dɛ ba soga bini ne kondɔɔh waa ne wepuu aa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta begre ba sie, baa gelɛ Waa la ɛɛ dɔ tɔnɔ.
Nɛra baa dɛ no Waa la bane ge do kɛ mea la aa lee harɛdɛɛge ta dɛ le, asɛ dɛ ma fifraatoro ne fifraanumɛl ne lafare la, dɛkalkɛ ba no Korowii Waa la aa, ba dɛ kpoŋe a bini, dɛ gel a dɔ tɔnɔ."
Yeesu bɔɔ ba ja ŋɔ, "Ba choŋi kandea dɛ kpɔ kon dɛɛ pi o ta kɛɛ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ do mpa lɔga ɔ? Kon ta laa ba kpɔ dɛɛ chɔŋaa?
Komɛlbwa waa sɔah ɛɛ le bochaahnee nɛra nao. Waa bwa baa tɔ a ta ɛɛ ba leo nɛra jemɛ.
Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin dɛ no la, ó no."
Yeesu bolɔ ŋɔ, "Hé pese waa nɔ haa noa nɔ kɛrɛdɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ kpelaa ba ŋɔ, 'Kon haa kpɔa magɛ kwaa tɛ he dɔŋ la tentenee baa ba kpɔe magɛ tɛ he ge la, dɛ berɛ jae ane.'
Nɛn waa dɔa la, baa jao anee, asɛ nɛn waa wola komɛlbwa dɔe la, tama kwaraa waa dɔa la ɛɛ le o nɔn taa."
Yeesu ŋɔ, "Korowii Kora do kɛ baa bɛl waa du kwa,
asɛ dɛ chɔ, dɛɛ ir tɔpere bɛlbwa, asɛ kwaa la le. O ta jemɛ gɛ aa ɛa a le.
Harɛ laanee gela a le dɛ kpeg dɛ nɔnɛ.
Belaa kwaa la aa ɛa dɛ be la, o kpɔ kere ka koma, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ a koma telo."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa konee yaa ba kpɔe dɛ magɛ Korowii Kora laɔ? Sɛgla besoo yaa ba kpɔe bagle o mun ɔ?
O waa tamaa won yɛɛra kɛŋɔ baa bɛl aa ira dɛ kpɔ mastad bii dɛ ka du. O do jegaa ken gwaa harɛ nɔ ta kwaa bwa bie.
Kɛ o baa le dɛ kpeg aa, o kan gwaa konduula bwa, dɛ pegri kpaljena, asɛ jumbii sɔh kɔne do o papooni lɔgre."
Gɛɛ Yeesu kpɔ sɛgla nɔ bwa dɔŋa dɛ bol waa ka tel kɛ nɛra la aa wona no a mun.
Sɛgla gbo nee wɛɛ bol waa ba be. Kɛ o ne o habɔteŋra la gbo te, o dɛ bag ba a bini.
Awola tenten jɔmɔra ne la, Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ bá gel ba kaa Galilia Moo la baŋ.
Belaa ba gel nɛra la bela dɛ jo gbera Yeesu aa lɔ o bini la bini, asɛ dɛ kpɔ gbeni la aa lɔ bela la ane ja.
Baa dɛ kaa la, bug la ta peujen bɛl tao dɛ kpɔ nehaŋma dɛɛ jo ba gbera la bini wɛɛ ba sui.
Dɛ Yeesu te serɛ o kapuri dɛɛ chɔ dom gbera la mun ta. Anee o habɔteŋra la chumu dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, yaa dɛ ba mora nɔ, he waane laa kɛɛ?"
Asɛ Yeesu ir dɛ kɔr peu la ŋɔ, "Gel!" Dɛ berɛ ŋɔ nehaŋma la be ŋɔ, "Hel!" Belaa peu la gel, asɛ bɔr hel kerker ken.
Yeesu bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Oo! Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ɔmɛ kohona gɛ nɔɔ? Ba le saŋ nɔ haa men yarada aa?"
Ba bwara hwah o waa taeh, ba bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo siwii nɔ, peu ne nee ɛɛ no o wobol nɔɔ?"
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la tawɔ kaa Galilia Moo la baŋ Gerasa harɛ ta.
Belaa Yeesu aa le gbera la bini la, baa bɛl kwa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ wɛɛ chɔ lala hugribɔr den ba chemo.
A gɛ baa nɔ, ba fa yon lawɔ dɛ doo kpɛɛ, asɛ o yon laa kpɛɛ la kuugi. Hale ba dɛ doo jɔgrɔre, asɛ o yon laa cha.
Anomanta nomɛlbwa aa won on lawɛ dɛɛ doo kpɛɛ ne jɔgrɔre kpa.
Asɛ o chwa ka do lala hugribɔr ne bela bwea ane aa lole. Belaa o do chɔɔ ne jwaana bɛlbwa dɛɛ valɛ bwea la dor dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre, dɛ kpɔ bwea dɛɛ mɔne o bwara.
Gɛ a do baa nɔ aa na Yeesu bojaŋ kɛ o dɛ ba la, o chwa dɛ ka guŋi Yeesu sie,
dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Yeesu, Korowiijen Bie, bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin n be nɔ? N kpɔ Korowii dɛɛ soŋe, bɛ men weweele do."
Baa la bol gɛ waa nɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Yeesu tɔ sie ŋɔ, "Konchɔge, le baa nɔ nɛ!"
Belaa Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He sɔne ɛrɔɔ?" O ŋɔ, "N sɔne Dɔm, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya warɔ pirim."
Anee o soŋe Yeesu kohona ŋɔ o bɛ an doŋi le harɛ la ta.
Bela la, dɛ prakooni damanta ane lɔ diŋgoŋ bɛl ta dɛɛ di.
Anee kwaa la aa dɛ ir baa la nɛɛ la soŋe Yeesu ŋɔ ó gel a kaa prakooni la nɛ.
Asɛ Yeesu tɛa ŋwɛnɛ, a le baa la nɛɛ dɛ ka jo prakooni la nɛ. Belaa prakooni damanta dɛ ɛ kagboŋa anɛ la bwa chwa biribiribiri dɛ wili diŋgoŋ bɛl dɛ ka lee moo la ta dɛ serewe kwaraa.
Belaa nɛra baa dɛ tegɛ prakooni la chwa dɛ la bwɛɛ la ta ne daamune aa bɛne bela la ta dɛ ka bol waa aa chiga. Asɛ nɛra la le ba bwɛɛre ta dɛ́ ka na waa aa chiga,
dɛ la bela Yeesu aa lole la, dɛ ka na kɛ baa la konchɔga damanta faa ir o nɛɛ la, a bwa kaalɔ, o liire ba harɛ, o do laala dɛ so. Baa nao la, ba ɔmɔ.
Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ na la bol nɛra be waa aa chig baa la ne prakooni la nɛ.
Belaa ba soŋe Yeesu ŋɔ ó le ba harɛ ta dɛ kaa.
Waa dɛ jo gbera bini la, anee baa la soŋo ŋɔ ó gel o ne o kaa.
Asɛ Yeesu vɛh dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kaa dem he nɛra be dɛ ka bol wejena Korowii aa ɛa tɛɛ, ne he sum waa naa la chag ba."
Baa la chig ŋwɛnɛ ta kaa, dɛ ka bol bela bwɛɛre fi ane aa pɛa baa yera Dekapɔles la tena be wejena Yeesu aa ɛa tɛo, asɛ a ɛ ba bwa nyokpoa.
Yeesu aa jo gbera bini dɛ berɛ kaa moo la baŋ le la, nɛnlaa bane baro cheme, o do nee nyoa.
Belaa cheremi dea nomonome la bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Jaerɔs ba bela dɛ ba na Yeesu, dɛ guŋi o sie dɛ lawɛ o nakpala,
dɛ soŋo ŋɔ, "N poori, nomoa, n bihaah bwara dɛ weo wɛɛ ba sewa. Ba dɛ ba kpɔ he nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛɛ ásɛ o bwara do kpegri o ir."
Baa la ne Yeesu aa dɛ kaa la, dɛ nɛnlaa bane teŋɛ o nɛ dɛ fiilo do baah ta dɛɛ tagɔ.
Dɛ haah bɛl ge lole chal ɛɛ fugo bene fi dɛ anɛ,
o chah, o komɛlbwa tonɛ, kɛ weela la ge ta gwaa o nɛ.
Waa no Yeesu gbɔga la, o lii o nyu bini kɛŋɔ dɛ o la bela dɛ ka dɔ bɔr jo nɛnlaa la bini dɛ ka lege Yeesu batakaare kwaraa naa, wɛɛ gbaŋroo.
Dɛ ir dɛ la bela dɛ ka jo ba baah ta, dɛ ka che Yeesu habɔɔ dɛ lege o batakaare.
Bug la ta, chal la aa dɛ fugo la teŋe. O na o bwadabii bini kɛ o weela la kaalɔ.
Belaa Yeesu na kɛŋɔ kpegri ane le o bini. O berɛ habɔɔ nɛnlaa la baah ta dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Umee lege n batakaare nɔɔ?"
Anee o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "He gbabir nao kɛŋɔ nɛnlaa nɔ aa bare cheme dɛɛ tagɛ dɔŋa nɔ warɔ, gɛɛ he berɛ ŋɔ nomɛl lege naa?"
Anee Yeesu nyiŋi nɛra la bini kɛŋɔ o ken fe ɛɛ na naatee yaa?
Haah la aa naa gɛ Yeesu aa ɛa tɛo la, o kpɔ ɔmee ne bochela dɛ ba guŋi o sie, dɛ bol o weela la bwa waa baglo.
Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Tolo, he yarada lɛɛ. Kaa bosɔɔhna ne, asɛ he bwara do kpegri."
Yeesu nyoa taa lɔ waa waa dɛ bol la ta la, nɛra bane le cheremi dea nomoa la dem dɛ ba ŋɔ nomoa la be ŋɔ, "He bihaah la sewɔ. Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ha nomoa nɔ jaɔ?"
Yeesu ta waa baa dɛ bol la ta teŋɛ, dɛ ŋɔ nomoa la be ŋɔ, "Bɛ ɔmɛ, kɛ yarada mɛ."
Yeesu ta gelɛ nomɛlbwa teŋɛ o nɛ, nemenɛ Pita ne Jems ne Jɔn waa ɛ Jems nime la.
Baa tel nomoa la dem la, Yeesu na nɛra baa dɛ do gbɔga dɛɛ wi kohona.
Waa jo bela la, o ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ do gbɔga dɛɛ wi nɔɔ? Bie la ta sewɛ, domii wɛɛ chɔ."
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba mamɔ. Anee o doŋi ba bwa le buse, dɛ kpɔ bie la mɛɛ ne o nya ne o habɔteŋra batoro la baa ja o nɛɛ la jo bela bie la aa chɔa la,
dɛ ka lawɛ bie la nɔn, dɛ kpɔ ba wobol ŋɔ, "Talita kumi!" O munii kɛ, "Tolo, n ŋɔ hé ir che."
Bug la ta bitolo la ir che dɛ valɛ. Ba bwa bwara yɔr.
Yeesu kah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ gel nomɛlbwa no, kɛ bá nyin kwaa tɛ bie la ó di. Gɛ saŋ la dɛ bie la dɔ bene fi dɛ anɛ.
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la le bela dɛ ba o gbagba bwɛ.

Ona Tɔpere la aa tela la, o la cheremi dea dɛ ka chagle wa. Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ no la, a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa. Ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ baa nɔ ge ɛ dɛ jemɛ waa nɔ nɔɔ? Bɔkwa wejemaa o dɔ ken dɛ won nyokpowaa nɔ bwa dɔŋa ɛɛ nɔɔ?
Kapenta te la laa aa? Mɛɛre bie la laa aa? Jems ne Josef ne Judas ne Seemɔnwa dɔɔ la laa aa? O nimambii laa lɔ ya be bonɔ naa?" Anomanta ba siwi ta on sui.
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Korowii keame dɔ sɔn bobɛlbwa, kɛ o bwɛɛ ne o nɛra ne o dem tena be te, o ta sɔn dɔe."
O ta wone ɛ nyokpowaane bela, nemenɛ weela tena tamaa banee o kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ chaah ba.
Yeesu bwara yɔr ba yarada baa wola on yaradae la wa. Asɛ o la bwɛɛre la aa bɛne bela la ta ka bol Amanesoma la chag ba.
Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la ba cheme o sie, dɛ pɛ ba banɛnɛ dɛ tɛɛ ba kpegri kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ la nɛ, dɛ tom ba ŋɔ bá ka ɛ o toma,
dɛ kah ba ŋɔ, "He bɛ komɛlbwa sese kpɔ, nemenɛ daŋgbale gbosoroo. He bɛ kondikwaa kwaraa kpɔ. He bɛ pure kpɔ. He bɛ suuga ge kpɔ.
He won naŋgawa doe, kɛ he bɛ batakaani bele anɛnɛ kpɔ."
Dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, "Bwɛɛ bɛlbwa haa la o ta la, dem haa ka jo o ta la, hé so bela ka tel kɛŋɔ haa le bwɛɛ la ta.
Dɛ ba ta heyaa lɛɛ silɛɛ ne bwɛɛ la ta naa, hé jwii he napaala teera ta bela, ásɛ a bagle kɛŋɔ he kpɔ Korowii Waa ba ba be ba vɛah."
Belaa ba ge le dɛ ka bol waa la ŋɔ nɛ́ra charɛ ba liire dɛ le wechɔga ta.
Ba doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ pirim, dɛ kpɔ noo fɔgle weela tena baa wara, dɛ chaah ba weela.
Yeesu waa perɛ bobɛlbwa, nomɛlbwa no o wa. Kooro Hɛrɔd ge noɔ. Bane ŋɔ, "Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la, onee. O weero le seo ta, a waa o won nyokpowaa nɔ ɛɛ la."
Nɛra bane ge ŋɔ, "Korowii keame Elaejaa." Asɛ bane ge ŋɔ o ɛ keame kɛŋɔ keamebena la ken.
Belaa Kooro Hɛrɔd aa no waa nɔ la, o ŋɔ, "Jɔn maa gela ba teŋe o nyu la weero."
Dɛ kooro la mo o gbagba nime Felep haah baa yerɔ Hɛrɔdeas, asɛ Jɔn ŋɔ o be ŋɔ o ta an kɛrɛdɛ ɛɛ.
Jɔn aa ŋɔ gɛ la nomanta, kooro la gelɔ ba lawɔ dɛ doo kpɛɛ dɛ kpɔɔ ka do dea.
Hɛrɔdeas lɛ Jɔn kɔrɔ dɛɛ nyinu dɛ́ kpo, kɛ o ta wone.
Kooro la ɔmɛ Jɔn, dɛkalkɛ Jɔn ɛ nɛŋkaih o waa do wer, anomanta o nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ. Jɔn aa dɛ bol waa la, kooro la bwara yɔrɔ, kɛ ane a bwa o no waa la silɛɛ ne.
Tɔpere aa tela kɛ kooro la di o lola tɔpere la, o ɛ kondikwaa dɛ yawɛ sene dɛ hɛlɛ dɛ lɛ o koranar baa sawɔ ne Galilia nomonome bwa sie.
Asɛ Hɛrɔdeas bihaah ba dɛ ba sa, o waa lɛ kooro la ne nɛra o ne baa cheme bela la sie. Anee kooro la ŋɔ tolo la be ŋɔ, "Bagle kon haa dɛ nyin ásɛ n kpɔ tɛɛ."
Kooro la ŋwɛɛ ntam bagle tolo la kɛ, "Komɛlbwa haa dɛ nyin la, mɛɛ tɛɛ, hale n kora pera."
Anee bihaah la le kaa o nya be dɛ ka bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa konee ń lɛɔ?" Namee Hɛrɔdeas dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ o kpo Jɔn. O ŋɔ o bie la be ŋɔ ó ka ŋɔ ó tɛo Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la nyu.
Tolo la berɛ ba warane dɛ ba ŋɔ kooro la be ŋɔ, "N dɛ nyin kɛ he kpɔ Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la nyu dawɛ korɔ ta ba tɛ mɛ taraken."
Waa nɔ we kooro la nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ, kɛ o ntam waa ŋwɛɛra la ne nɛra baa soge bela la nomanta, waa nyin kɛŋɔ o to o ntam la.
Bug la ta o tomɛ o sooja bɛl ŋɔ ó ka teŋe Jɔn nyu ba. O kpɔ o kere dɛ ka teŋe Jɔn nyu dea bela baa doo la,
dɛ kpɔ dawɛ korɔ ta, dɛ kpɔ ba tɛ tolo la. Tolo la ge kpɔ ka tɛ o nya.
Jɔn habɔteŋra la aa no waa nɔ la, ba balɔ dɛ ba kpɔɔ ka huge.
Nɛra Yeesu aa tom ba la berɔ ba o be, dɛ ba bol anla baa ɛa ne anla baa bagla dɛ chaglo.
Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé ba ya kaa bobɛl nomɛlbwa aa wola toole ásɛ he ka onɛ tama," dɛkalkɛ nɛra baa bala dɛɛ kaa la warɔ, ba ta bɔr dɔe dɛ́ di kwaa kwara.
Anomanta Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la gbo jo gbera bini dɛɛ kaa bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole.
Jaah nɛra pirim na ba kɛ baa dɛ kaa, dɛ jemɛ kɛ banee, dɛ le bwɛɛre ta chwa dɛ ti ba.
Yeesu aa le gbera la bini la, dɛ nɛnlaa tenten lɔ bela. Ba waa do o sum, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba do kɛ peera aa wola tegre dɔe ken. Anomanta o chag ba waa taeh.
Bɔr aa dɛ ɛ jɔmɔra la, o habɔteŋra la ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Nomoa, bonɔ ɛ kpɔg bini, bɔr ge dɛ jo.
Anomanta ŋɔ ba be bá kaa bwɛɛre aa bar bonɔ nɔ dɛ ka yawɛ kwaane di."
Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Hé nyin kwaa tɛɛ ba bá di." Anee ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Yaa wonoo dɔ suuga damanta kɛŋɔ denaarere lafraanɛ dɛ yawɛ paanoo tɛ nɛra nɔ bwa dɔŋ bá di aa?"
Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Paanoo aŋwɛnɛɛ he dɔɔ? Hé ka nyiŋi na." Baa kaa nyiŋi na la, ba ba dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya dɔ paanoo anue ne pɛŋa anɛ."
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá gel nɛra la pɛ dɛ so kpɔglor la ta.
Asɛ ba pɛ dɛ so, bane lafare, bane ge fifraanunue.
Yeesu kpɔ paanoo anue la ne pɛŋa anɛ la dɛ ha sie dɛ nyiŋi nyundua dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ mɔne paanoo la do o habɔteŋra la nɔɔra ta dɛ ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛɛ ba, dɛ mɔne pɛŋa la ge tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛɛ ba,
ba bwa di dɛ vagre.
Baa dia tonɛ la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la tɔɔ paanoo la ne pɛŋa baa dia a ka la pɛ do wɛgrɛjena fi dɛ anɛ bini, a bwa su.
Nɛra baa di paanoo la, ba baala gbo ɛɛ ɛ kagboŋa banuee.
Belaa o gel o habɔteŋra la jo gbera bini dɛ tɔ sie kaa baŋ bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Bɛtsaeda, asɛ o ge gel nɛra la pegre.
Nɛra la aa kaala la, o teehnɔ kaa bwe bɛl doa dɛ ka soŋe Korowii bela.
Bɔr aa baa garɛ bwa, dɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la lɔ mobaah, asɛ a ka o gbo che baŋ.
O nao kɛŋɔ baa won tawɛ kɛrɛdɛ kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ peu tao dɛɛ chem ba. Jabal logla sii saŋ la, o valɔ kpɔ nee la sie dɛɛ kaa ba be, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin o tel ba kɛrɛdɛ.
Ba nao kɛŋɔ waa dɛ valɛ nee sie, dɛ lii kɛŋɔ lalee, dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre.
Ba bwa sekwara aa nao la, ba jum jaoh. Asɛ Yeesu bol waa ba be warane ŋɔ, "Hé lawɛ bambile. Menee! He bɛ ɔmɛ."
O jo ba be gbera la bini. Waa joa la, peu la helɔ. O habɔteŋra la bwa bwara hwaoh taeh.
Ba liire aa do toŋgboŋ baa wola paanoo la waa la mun noɛ la, a gelɔ ba bwara hwah.
Ba tawɔ ka chuge moo la baŋ le Gɛnɛsarɛt harɛ ta, dɛ lawɛ gbera la vɔwɛ.
Bug la ta baa le gbera la bini la, nɛra jemɛ Yeesu.
Anomanta ba chwao jo bwɛɛre aa lɔ bela la ta, dɛ che weela tena le ba kalaŋre ta dɛ kpɔ ba ba bela baa noa kɛ Yeesu lole la.
Bobɛlbwa Yeesu aa laŋa, bwɛjegre ta, bwɛjena ne daamune ta la, ba kaa che weela tena ba bil yaware ta, dɛ soŋo ŋɔ ó gel weela tena la lege o batakaare nyoa. Banɔ la baa lego la bwa gbaŋrɔ.
Farisii tena la ne Tɔn Jerema la bini bane baa le Jerusalam la pɛ nyoa dɛ ba cheme Yeesu sie.
Farisii tena la ne ba dɔŋa Juda tena la bwa ta ba nɔɔra samɛ ŋwɛnɛ saŋ la tena la aa bagla la ta naa, baa kwaa di, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba kii.
Dɛ ba le yawa ta ba naa, ba dɔ yagla bɛl baa dɛ yagle kondikwaa baa kpɔa le yawa ta ba la, dɛɛ loo ba numoli ne polowiine ne loga gɛ saŋ la tena aa bagla la mɔɔ dɛɛ di kwa.
Farisii tena la ne Tɔn Jerema la aa cheme Yeesu sie la, ba nao kɛ o habɔteŋra la bane chɔg ba kii la. Ba ta nɔɔra samɛ gɛ, dɛ kpɔ "nɔndoŋa" dɛɛ di kwa.
Ba bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa he habɔteŋra nɔ ɛɛ jo ya kii nɛɛ baa wola sama yaa naanar aa bagle yaa ŋɔ yá samɛ la samɛ mɔɔ dɛɛ di kwaa nɔɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! Korowii keame Aesaya na he waa bol kɛrɛdɛ kɛ waa ŋɔa ŋɔ, 'Nɛra nɔ te, nyoa gbo nee baa duu mɛ, kɛ ba tea bini te ta toe.
Nɛwɛnyini mmarare taa baa bagle ŋɔ nɛ́ra teŋɛ. Anomanta pɛɛpɛɛ baa tom mɛ.'
Korowii waa he gel, dɛ berɛ lawɛ he saŋ la waa bini."
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ ba be ja ŋɔ, "Hé na gɛ haa vɛh Korowii waa la bil dɛ lawɛ he saŋ la waa bini!
Mosis Mmara la bini o ŋɔ, 'Duu he nya ne he mɛɛ,' dɛ, 'Nomɛlbwa waa bol o nya ne o mɛɛ bwara wechɔge la, a chɛ kɛ ba kpoo.'
Kɛ he te dɛ bagle he saŋ la waane kɛŋɔ dɛ nɛn dɔ komɛl dɛ́ won kpɔ cha o nya ne o mɛɛ, dɛ ŋɔ kon la ɛ Kɔɔban aa, Kɔɔban munii kɛŋɔ Korowii konee,
amɔ haa sɛh ó kpɔ kon la cha o nya ne o mɛɛ kpa.
He kpɔ he saŋ la waa la haa dɛ bagle la dɛɛ chɔg Korowii waa la. Waa haa dɛ ɛa ken warɔ."
Yeesu yerɛ nɛra la ba o be ja dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé bwa no n be dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ
kwaa nɛn aa dɛ di la laa gela o ɛ nɛnchɔge, anɔ la aa dɛ le o nyoa wɛɛ bol la, anee gela o ɛ nɛnchɔge.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ deŋna dɛ no la, ó no."
Yeesu gel nɛnlaa la bela dɛ ba dem, anee o habɔteŋra la bɔɔro sɛgla la mun.
O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He ge aa a mun jemaa? Haa jemɛ kɛ kwaa haa dɛ di aa won gel he ɛ nɛnchɔge aa?
Aa he bambile bini kaa. He teene binii aa kaa, asɛ dɛɛ berɛ dahara." Yeesu aa bol waa nɔ la, o baglɔ kɛ kondikwaa bɛlbwa wer. Aa won gel nɛn ɛ nɛnchɔge.
Dɛ ŋɔ, "Waa aa le nɛn bambile bini la, anee gela o ɛ nɛnchɔge.
Liichɔga, jwamane, ŋwɛɛ, nɛŋkpoa,
dɔŋa haahna nyina, kwaa ta sibegra, musu wa, nɛra faahra, pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla, kayɛglɛ, dɔŋa ŋwala, karamani wa, ne liire bɛ dɔe, bambile binii a le.
Anee gela nɛn ɛ nɛnchɔge."
Yeesu berɔ ir le bela kaa Taaya pera, dɛ ka jo dem bɛl ta, dɛ fee so bela tama asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ jemɛ, kɛ o ta wone sɔh.
Belaa haah bɛl kwaa aa dɛ ir o bihaah nɛɛ no Yeesu waa dɛ ba guŋi o sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ ó doŋi kwaa la le o bihaah la nɛɛ tɛo.
Haah la ta Juda te ɛɛ, kɛ lola bini te, Siiria harɛ bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Finiisia tee.
Waa wola Juda te ɛɛ la, Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛ bechale di kwaa vagre mɔɔ nyootena ge di. Aa were kɛ ba kpɔ bechale kondikwaa tɛ nyootena."
Haah la wono no a mun dɛ ŋɔ, "Kpelaa he ŋɔ, Nomoa, kɛ nyootena aa bechale kondikompugrere aa leera la ge di aa?"
Yeesu ŋɔ, "Waa nɔ haa bola nɔ nomanta, kaa dem. Kwaa la le he bihaah la nɛ."
O la dem dɛ kwaa la le o bihaah la nɛ, asɛ o chɔ mpa ta.
Yeesu berɔ le Taaya harɛ dɛ kpɔ Sidon ne Dekapɔles harɛ dɛ kaa Galilia Moo la ta.
Nɛra bane kpɔ baa bɛl waa wola waa no, wobol waa do kpegri tɛo ba Yeesu be, dɛ soŋo ŋɔ ó kpɔ o nɔn dawɛ o nɛɛ ásɛ wɛɛ no waa dɛ won waa bola.
Yeesu kpɔ baa la le nɛra la baah ta, o ne o gbo ka che bokɛre, asɛ o kpɔ o nonie do baa la deŋna bini, dɛ berɛ ta nentane dɛ kpɔ lege o nyondoŋe,
dɛ ha sie nyiŋi nyundua dɛ hwee fuuu, dɛ ŋɔ baa la be ŋɔ, "Efata!" O munii kɛŋɔ, "Pili."
Bug la ta la, baa la deŋna pilo, asɛ o nyoa chaa, o won waa bola kɛrɛdɛ.
Yeesu aa chah baa la tonɛ la, o kah nɛra la ŋɔ ba bɛ nomɛlbwa be ŋɔ. Waa dɛ kah ba la, ate taa ba taa bol waa la kwara.
Belaa nɛra baa noa la nyoa kpo taeh, ba ŋɔ, "O ɛ wobɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ, hale o gelɔ amumure ɛɛ no wa, dɛ won waa bola."
A ta bigre bɛlbwa nɛnlaa bane ba cheme Yeesu sie ja, kɛ dɛ ba ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ di. Anee Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra la ba o sie dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
"Nɛra nɔ waa dɛ domɛ n tea, dɛkalkɛ n ne baa soga tɔpera atoroo nɔ, taraken ba ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ di.
Dɛ n gel ba gɛ ba kpɔ lɔr kaa laa, baa gwɛgre ŋwɛnɛ taa. Bane ge le bojaŋa."
Belaa o habɔteŋra la chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ dɛ dɔ paanoo tɛ gɛ nɛra nɔ dɔŋ bá di kpɔg nɔ baah nɔ?"
Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Paanoo aŋwɛnɛɛ he dɔɔ?" Anee ba ŋɔ anuanɛ.
Belaa o ŋɔ nɛnlaa la be ŋɔ bá so harɛ, asɛ o kpɔ paanoo anuanɛ la dɛ jam Korowii dɛ mɔne do o habɔteŋra la nɔɔra ta dɛ ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛ nɛnlaa la, ba ge bɔne tɛɛ ba.
Dɛ ba dɔ pɛŋa tama ge, asɛ o kpɔa jam Korowii dɛ ŋɔ bá bɔne a ge tɛɛ ba. Ba bɔnɔ tɛɛ ba,
asɛ ba di dɛ vagre. Anɔ la aa kaa la, ba paa a su wɛgrɛjena anuanɛ.
Nɛra baa di kwaa la ɛɛ ɛ nɛra kagboŋa banaarɛɛ.
Yeesu gelɔ ba pegre. O ne o habɔteŋra la jo gbera bini dɛ chagɛ Dalmanuta pera dɛ kaa.
Belaa Farisii tena bane ba Yeesu be dɛ ba tɔŋlo dɛ daahno na dɛɛ nyin o ɛ nyokpowaane bá na dɛ jemɛ o waa kɛŋɔ o le Korowii be kpela.
Yeesu hweero fuuu dɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ fini nɔ nɛra ɛɛ nyin nyokpowaa dɛ́ na nɔɔ? Kasinteŋ, maa wobɛlbwaa ɛ fini nɔ nɛra na."
Asɛ dɛ gel Farisii tena la bela dɛ berɛ jo gbera bini kaa baŋ bɛl.
Yeesu habɔteŋra la soɔh, ba ta kondikwaa kpɔe, dɛ ba ge ta komɛlbwa dɔe ba be gbera la bini nemenɛ paanoo beŋkpoŋ.
Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ Farisii tena ne Hɛrɔd iisi wa."
Ba ta o sɛgla la mun noɛ, dɛ bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ paanoo baa wola dɔe waa o ken ɛɛ bol.
Belaa Yeesu aa no waa baa dɛ bol la, o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa hɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa paanoo bɛ dɔe waa nɔɔ? Saŋ la bwa haa waa mun no mɔɔ naa? Ɛrɛɛ he liire do toŋgboŋ ken?
He dɔ sibie kɛ haa na naa? He dɔ deŋna ge kɛ haa waa no aa? Haa waa lii kɛɛ?
Maa mɔne paanoo anue tɛ nɛra kagboŋa banue ba di ka la, a kabora haa paa la, wɛgrɛre aŋwɛnɛɛ he dɔɔ?" Anee ba ŋɔ fi dɛ anɛ.
O berɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Asɛ maa mɔne paanoo anuanɛ tɛ nɛra kagboŋa banaarɛ la, wɛgrɛ dela aŋwɛnɛ gee he dɔɔ?" Ba ŋɔ anuanɛ.
O ŋɔ, "He ta a mun noɛ ja aa?"
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la Bɛtsaeda. Asɛ nɛra bane kpɔ baa bɛl waa nyoŋa ba o be, dɛ ba soŋo ŋɔ ó kpɔ nɔn lege nyoŋe la ó sie pili.
Belaa Yeesu lawɛ nyoŋe la nɔn dɛ kpɔɔ le bwɛɛ la dahara dɛ ka ta nentane do o sie ta, dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛ, dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He dɛ na bɔr aa?"
Nyoŋe la laa sie ir dɛ ŋɔ, "N na nɛra baa valɛ, kɛ n dɛ na ba kɛ daa ken."
Yeesu berɔ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o sie ta ja, o nyiŋi bɔr jeiih ken, dɛ a magrɔ, name te wɛɛ na bɔr gereŋ.
Asɛ Yeesu kaoh ŋɔ ó kaa o dem dɛ bɛ a waa bol tɛ nomɛlbwa bwɛɛ bini.
Belaa Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la la bwɛɛre aa lɔ Sisaaria Felepae lɔga. Baa dɛ kaa la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo nɛra ɛɛ lii mɛ nɔ?"
Anee ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nɛra bane ŋɔ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee hen. Bane ŋɔ Korowii keame Elaejaa hen. Asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Korowii keamere la bɛlee hen."
O berɔ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo he gee lii mɛ nɔ?" Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa laanee hen."
Yeesu kah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ o waa bol bagle nomɛlbwa.
Belaa Yeesu pa mun dɛɛ bagle o habɔteŋra la kɛ a chɛ kɛ o Nɛn Bie la na wahala kohona waa bwa ta, asɛ nomonome ne Sɔfore ne Tɔn Jerema vɛoh, asɛ ba kpoo, asɛ a tɔpera atoro wee la o ir seo ta.
O bol gɛ waa nɔ ba be kaih ken. Anee Pita lawɔ le bokɛre dɛ kaoh ŋɔ o bɛ gɛ bol.
Belaa Yeesu ha sie dɛ nyiŋi o habɔteŋra la dɛ kah Pita dɛ ŋɔ, "Le n jwɛh, Bɔnsam! Haa anla Korowii aa dɛ nyin la lii nemenɛ nɛra tetoowa."

Belaa o yerɛ nɛnlaa ne o habɔteŋra la dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ nyin kɛ o teŋɛ n nɛ aa, ó gel o tetookwaa nyina, dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ dɛ sɛh wahala nae ne seo bwa, dɛ baa teŋɛ n nɛɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔ dagagre che bá ka kpaaro pɛl o ta la,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa o sie aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge waa koh n ne Korowii Amanesoma nɔ waa dɛ kpɔ o nyu ta la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
Dɛ nɛn dɔ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa bwa dɛ nyogre o nyu aa, dɛ bɔkwa tɔnɔɔ o dɔɔ?
Bɔkwaa nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ ba wona kpɔ dɛ charɛ o nyu ɔ?
