Wechɔg-ɛɛra baa vɛh n waa fini nɔ, baa ba nyuu dɔ n bala tɔpere. Naate sihiih aa dɛ kpoe n ne waa nɔ waa taraken nɔ la, awola n Nɛn Bie ne nyundua toromedɛɛga la aa ba n Mɛɛ jirima ne la, maa he heehra ba awola tɔpere."
Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, Korowii ɛɛ ba di o Koraa kpegri nɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta, dɛ he bini bane ta soge le dɛ nao."
Aa di tɔpera anumɛl la, Yeesu tɔ Pita ne Jems ne Jɔn sie ba ka teeh bwejen bɛl, dɛ gbo ka pɛ so o doa bobɛl. Baa soga la, dɛ Yeesu begrɔ,
asɛ o laala bwa to dɛɛ nyɛgle al-al ken dɛ to kohona gwaa gɛ baa chɛgɛ laala a yon to la.
Ba ne ŋɔ ba nyiŋi dɛ Elaeja ne Mosis ja o nɛɛ ba ne wɛɛ bol wa.
Asɛ Pita ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, a wer taeh kɛŋɔ yaa lɔ bonɔ nɔ. Gel ya do kukure atoro ásɛ he kpɔ bɛl, Mosis kpɔ bɛl, Elaeja ge kpɔ bɛl."
Ɔmee lag ba kohona dɛ gel Pita aa dɛ bol waa kwaraa la, dɛ waa waa waa dɛ bol la mun jemɛ.
Belaa bam bɛl ba tɔ ba nɛ, asɛ ba no taa bɛl bam la bini kɛ,
"N Bie maa dɛ nyinuu nɔ. Hé cheg deŋne dɛ no o be." Ba te ne taa la noe tonɛ dɛ ke nyiŋi dɛ nomɛlbwa toole bela. Yeesu gboo ba na kɛŋɔ o ja ba nɛɛ bela.
Baa le bwe la doa dɛɛ ba la, Yeesu ja ba ŋɔ, "He bɛ waa nɔ haa naa nɔ taa bagle nomɛlbwa bwa dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ n Nɛn Bie la aa sewɛ dɛ ir mɔɔ."
Anomanta ba ta nomɛlbwa be ŋɔe, kɛ dɛ ba te gbagba dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Seo bini ira nɔ te munii ɛrɛ te nɔ?"
Anee ba bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛ waa Tɔn Jerema la ɛɛ bagle ŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ Elaeja tɔ sie ba mɔɔ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la ge ba nɔɔ?"
Asɛ o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Elaejaa dɛ tɔ sie ba kpela, dɛ́ ba kwaa ŋwɛnɛ mɔɔ. Kɛ ɛrɛ waa Korowii Tɔn la ŋɔ Nɛn Bie la dɛ ba wahala nae kohona, kɛ nɛwɛnyini sie aa o tɔga ba laɔ?
Kasinteŋ, Elaeja balɔ dɛ kaa. Waa bala la, ba tetooraa ba ɛo. Gɛɛ ba chwerɛ o waa Korowii Tɔn bini la."
Baa baa tel o habɔteŋra la kabora la be la, dɛ nɛnlaa bar ba cheme, asɛ ba ne Tɔn Jerema bane ɛɛ tɔŋle wa.
Nɛra la aa na Yeesu la, ba bwara yɔrɔ, asɛ ba chwa dɛ ba jaamo.
Asɛ o bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa he ne baa tɔŋle laɔ?"
Baa bɛl le nɛra la bini dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, kwaa dɛ ir n bie nɛɛ dɛ gel waa won waa bol, asɛ n kpɔɔ ba he be.
A iraa, gɛɛ a goo harɛ, asɛ fufug ɛɛ le o nyoa, dɛ o dɛ chwe o nyena, dɛ beŋri chɔ. N soŋe he habɔteŋra la ŋɔ bá doŋi kwaa la ta, asɛ ba doŋa kahonɛ."

Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Oo! Ɛrɛɛ he fini nɔ nɛra aa wola yarada dɔe bwa nɔɔ? Tɔpera aŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ nyin kɛ ń lawɛ bambile dɛ so he be mɔɔ he yarada Korowii ɔ? Maa tɔpere bɛl dii ba he be kpa oo! Hé kpɔ bie la ba tɛ mɛ."
Asɛ ba kpɔ bie la ba tɛo. O kwaa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ la aa na Yeesu la, a tagɔ ta, asɛ o chɔ dɛɛ yo gɛ gbuŋgbuŋri te aa dɛ ɛ la, dɛɛ gbili bɔr bwa, dɛ fufug dɛ le o nyoa.
Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ bie la mɛɛ ŋɔ, "Saŋ besoo weela nɔ lawɔ wɔ?" Asɛ o mɛɛ la ŋɔ, "O bechale saŋ bwaa a lawɔ.
Kwaa la ir o nɛɛ aa, dɛ a dɛ nyin o kpoe. Tɔpebɛla a tagɔ dɛɛ ta nii ta, tɔpebɛla ge a tagɔ dɛɛ ta nee ta. Dɛ hɛɛ wonoo chaoh waa, na ya sum dɛ chaoh tɛ yaa."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ wonoo chaoh waa, a lɔ he be. Nɛn waa yarada Korowii la, Korowii won wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ tɛo."
Bug la ta dɛ baa la sɛoh takpeg ne ŋɔ, "N yaradao, kɛ n yarada aa kanɛ. Cha mɛ ń yaradao kohona."

Asɛ Yeesu aa baa na kɛŋɔ nɛra wuro dɛɛ ba ba tɔ ba nɛɛ la, o den kɔr kwaa aa dɛ ir bie la nɛɛ la ŋɔ, "He konchɔga haa dɛ ir bie nɔ nɛɛ waa wola waa no, waa berɛ won dɛɛ bol waa ge nɔ, n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ hé le o nɛ! He bɛ o nɛɛ ba so kpa bwa!"
Ate dɛ kwaa la sio kpegri ne dɛ tagɛ bie la ta harɛ, asɛ o chɔ dɛɛ yo kɛŋɔ gbuŋgbuŋri te ken mɔɔ a le o nɛ. Anee o chɔ kɛŋɔ waa sewa ken. Asɛ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ ŋɔ o sewɔ.
Belaa Yeesu lawɛ o nɔn o ir.
Yeesu aa ba dem a ka o ne o habɔteŋra la gbo la, ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa ya te aa wola wone kɔr kwaa la á le nɔɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Korowii soŋa gboo won a gɛ kwaa nɔ doŋa."
O ne o habɔteŋra la le bela dɛ kpɔ Galilia harɛ ta kaa. Dɛ waa nyin kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa jemɛ bela waa lole,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ bagle o habɔteŋra la wa, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ba dɛ ba n Nɛn Bie lee do nɛra nɔn ta, asɛ ba kpo mɛ, asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la, n ir seo ta."
Dɛ ba ta Yeesu waa waa bola la mun noɛ, kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ bá bɔɔro a mun.
Asɛ ba ba Kapeeneɔm. Baa baa jo dea la, Yeesu bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa he tɔŋle ŋwɛnɛ ta laɔ?"
Ba ta wone chaŋo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba dɛ nyin ba jemɛ ba bini onɔ la waa ɛ ba bwa nomoa, dɛɛ di a gɛ tɔŋla.
Asɛ Yeesu so harɛ dɛ yer ba dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Naate waa dɛ nyin kɛ o ɛ he bwa nomoa la, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o ɛ o te bechala dɛɛ tomɛ heya."
Anee o lawɛ bechajega bɛl ba che ba baah ta, dɛ kpɔɔ, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
"Nomɛlbwa waa koh n waa dɛ nyiŋi bie nɔ dɔŋ nɛɛ la, dɛ menee o nyiŋi la. Nomɛlbwa ge waa nyiŋi n nɛɛ la, dɛ n gbo laa o nyiŋi. Dɛ naate waa tom mɛ la nɛɛ o nyiŋi la."
Jɔn ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya na baa bɛl waa kpɔ he sɔn dɛɛ doŋi kwaa nɛra nɛ, asɛ ya kaoh ŋɔ ó gel, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ta ya bini bɛl ɛɛ."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "He bɛ on kah ŋɔ ó gel, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won che n sɔn ta ɛ a gɛ nyokpowaa nɔ dɔŋa dɛ berɛ yerɛ n sɔnchɔge kpa.
Nomɛlbwa waa wola ya nɛɛ chegɛ la, dɛ ya somee.
Kasinteŋ, nomɛlbwa waa koh kɛ he ɛ men Kristo nɛra nomanta dɛ tɛ heyaa nee hé nyɔ la, waa o kembɔr paŋa ba bwa.
"Nomɛlbwa waa negre bechajegre nɔ dɔŋ bɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada mɛ nɔ asɛ o ɛ wechɔga la, dɛ ba fe vɔwɛ nambwe do o baŋa dɛ kpɔɔ ka ta moo vil ta kwaraa fe bɔ.
Dɛ he nɔn ɛɛ negree he ɛ wechɔga aa, teŋo ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he kpoŋe nɔmbeŋkpoŋ dɛ dɔ Korowii be kaa bɔ haa kpoŋe nɔɔra anɛ dɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii aa wola dime bwa la ta.
Dɛ he nakpala gee negree he ɛ wechɔga aa, teŋo ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ he nakpale teŋno he dɔ Korowii be kaa laa, a bɔ kɛŋɔ haa dɔ nakpale anɛ dɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii ta.
Dɛ he siwi gee geloo he ɛ wechɔga aa, fomo ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he kpoŋe siwi beŋkpoŋ dɛ ja Korowii Kora ta bɔ kɛŋɔ haa kpoŋe sibie anɛ dɛ kaa Bɔnsam nii ta,
belaa dudule aa dɛ di ba ola la aa wola sewɛ bwa, nii aa dɛ fuuh ba la ge aa dime bwa.
Anomanta Korowii ɛɛ kpɔ niinii ɛ nɛra bwa kɛŋɔ ba yon kpɔ yar merɛ kwaa ta la.
"Yar wer. Kɛ dɛ aa somɛ kpa aa, ɛrɛɛ baa ba a ɛɛ a do som jaɔ? Anomanta hé ne he dɔŋa so kɛrɛdɛ dɛ do som gɛ yar aa soma la. Hé gel he nyoa pɛ."
Asɛ Yeesu le bela dɛ la Judia harɛ ta, dɛ ka le Jɔɔdan Moo la baŋ. Nɛndamanta wur dɛ ba tɔ o nɛɛ ja, asɛ o bag ba waa gɛ o yon dɛɛ ɛ la.
Farisii tena bane ba bela dɛ baa hagro bela dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin dɛ́ lawɔ. Ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Mmara dɛ tɛ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ baa vɛh o haah naa?"
Anee o ge berɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ Mosis Mmara bagle heyaa laɔ?"
Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Mosis tɛ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ baa chwerɛ tɔn dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o vɛh o haah, dɛ vɛoh."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bambikpeg waa Mosis chwerɛ a gɛ mmara nɔ tɛ heyaa la.
Gɛ laa a fa do wubwa. Korowii aa ta kwaa bwa mumpar la, 'Baa ne haahnee o ta.
A waa baa ɛɛ ba o nya ne o mɛɛ jwɛɛh lee, dɛ kpɔ o te ka pɛl o haah,
ásɛ ba nɛra banɛ la pɛ ɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ la. Anomanta baa nɛra banɛ ɛɛ ba kpa, ba pɛo ɛ beŋkpoŋ.'
Dɛ Korowii lawɛ nɛra banɛ pɛ aa, ŋwɛnɛ toole kɛŋɔ nɛn berɛ pere ba baah kpa."
Baa la dem la, o habɔteŋra la berɔ bɔɔro a gɛ waa nɔ ja.
Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh o haah dɛ ka mo onfale la, dɛ o ɛ o haah la wechɔga dɛ bɔ jwamane.
Dɛ haah ge vɛh o jaa dɛ ka yalɛ banfale aa, dɛ o ge ɛ o jaa la wechɔga dɛ bɔ jwamane."
Dɛ nɛra bane kpɔ ba bii dɛɛ ba o be, dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ o kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛ. Asɛ o habɔteŋra la ɛɛ tɔ ba ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ bá kpɔ ba bii le le!
Yeesu aa na gɛ baa dɛ ɛ la, o baah di ba nɛ, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ bii la ŋwɛnɛ tɔ. Hé gel ba ba n be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ banɔ dɔŋa nɔɔ Korowii koobii la.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, naate waa wola o te kpɔe tɛ Korowii dɛ yaradao gɛ bechala aa dɛ ɛ la, waa bɔree dɔ dɛ ba ja o Kora la ta."
Asɛ o kpɔ bii la, dɛ kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ swee ba andɛɛga.
Yeesu aa bera dɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ ta lee dɛ kaa la, baa bɛl chwao dɛ ba guŋi o sie dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomondɛɛge, ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ́ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe yɔ?"
Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he yer mɛ nɛndɛɛge nɔɔ? Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge. Korowii gbosoo ɛ nɛndɛɛge.
Kɛ he jemɛ Korowii mmarare laɔ? Anee, 'Bɛ nɛn kpo, bɛ jwamane bɔ, bɛ ŋwɛ, bɛ nyosone teŋe dawɛ he dɔŋ nɛ, bɛ he dɔŋ faah, dɛɛ duu he nya ne hɛɛh.' "
Anee o ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, n bechale saŋ bwaa n le dɛ teŋɛ anɔ bwa ta."
Yeesu nyiŋu, o sie lɛ o nɛ, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A ka he webeŋkpoŋ. La ka yog kwaa haa dɔa bwa, asɛ dɛ kpɔ a suuga kɛ nyaara. He ɛ gɛ naa, hɛɛ dɔ kondɔɔh cheg Korowii doa. Ka ɛ gɛ asɛ dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛ."
Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, ate dɛ o tea bini chɔgɔ, asɛ o berɛ gure nyu su, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɔ kwaa kɛrɛdɛ.
Asɛ Yeesu ke nyiŋi o habɔteŋra la dɛ ŋɔ, "Aa do kpegrii tɛ dɔɔhna kɛŋɔ bá dɔ bɔr ja Korowii Kora la ta."
A gɛ waa la Yeesu aa bola la gelɔ o habɔteŋra la bwara yɔr. O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Biiwa, a kpegri kɛŋɔ nɛn dɔ bɔr ja Korowii Kora la ta.
Aa do pwɛree tɛ nyogma kɛŋɔ ó won jo tɔɔge bɔɔ ta gwaa kɛŋɔ dɔɔh naa wona ja Korowii Kora ta."
Yeesu aa bol gɛ la, dɛ o habɔteŋra la bwa bwara yɔrɔ, asɛ baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Amɔ te, umee dɛɛ ba o nyu dɔe yɔ?"
Belaa Yeesu pa sie nyiŋ ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛwɛnyini bee a do kpegri, kɛ Korowii be te, wobɛlbwa aa kpege. Wobɛlbwa pwɛre Korowii be."
Belaa Pita ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi na, ya te gel komɛlbwa yaa dɔa dɛ ba teŋɛ he nɛ."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa koh n ne Amanesoma nɔ waa dɛ gel o bwɛɛ tena ne o nimanar ne o dɔɔranar ne o nahaahnanar, ne o nya ne o mɛɛ, ne o bii ne o kooni la,

wɛɛ dɔ a gɛ bwɛɛre ne nimanar ne dɔɔranar ne nyawa ne bii ne kooni nɔ bɛlbwa kembɔree kera lafa harɛ nɔ ta dɛ ja hɔhɔrɔwa nɛra aa dɛ ba o haeh dɛ ɛo la ta. A bwa habɔɔ la, wɛɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe gee nyundua ja.
Nɛra baa tɔ sie taraken kɛrɛdɛ ɛɛ ba ka munii, asɛ nɛra baa ka mun taraken nɔ kɛrɛdɛ ba tɔ sie."

Dɛ ba lɔ ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam, asɛ Yeesu tɔ ba sie. Dɛ o habɔteŋra la bwara yɔrɔ, asɛ nɛra la baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la bwa gee ɔmɛ. Asɛ Yeesu berɛ lawɛ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la kaa bokɛre dɛ ka taa waa aa dɛ ba o ɛɛ la bwa bag ba,
dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Yaa dɛ kaa Jerusalam nɔ, baa ka le n Nɛn Bie laanee tɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la. Baa pa mɛ bolchɔgee dɛ ŋɔ bá kpo mɛ, dɛ kpɔ mɛ do nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la nɔn ta.
Baa di n loroo, dɛ tata nentane ta n nɛ, dɛ chacha mɛ chweremi, dɛ kpaa mɛ pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpo mɛ. Kɛ a tɔpetooro wee mɛɛ berɔɔ ir seo ta."
Asɛ Sebedii bii Jems ne Jɔn ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya dɛ nyin he ɛ waane tɛ yaa."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa yɔ?"
Belaa ba chaŋe ŋɔ, "He baa di he kora waa dɔ jirima dɛ so he kookara ta naa, ya dɛ nyin kɛ he gel ya so pɛle, bɛl so he dig ta, bɛl ge so he gal ta."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Haa waa haa dɛ bol nɔ mun jemɛ. Hɛɛ wonoo nyɔ n tɛgkpela maa dɛ ba nyɔe nɔ ane kenɛ? Hɛɛ wonoo na hɔhɔrɔwa maa dɛ ba nae nɔ dɔŋa aa?"
Anee ba sɛh ŋɔ, "Yaa wonoo." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kpelaa! Hɛɛ nyɔ n tɛgkpela nɔ anee dɛ na n hɔhɔrɔwa nɔ dɔŋa.
Kɛ n ta kpegri dɔe dɛ́ chagle naate waa so n dig ta ne n gal ta. Korowii gboo jemɛ nɛra waa kwaa a gɛ bɔra la cheg dɛ́ kpɔ ba ka so bela."
Yeesu habɔteŋra kabora la baa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, ba baah di Jems ne Jɔn nɛ.
Anomanta Yeesu yerɛ ba bwa ba o be dɛ ŋɔ, "He jemɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la te, ba nomonome dɛ di kpegri ba nɛ, dɛ yon gel baa tom ba.
Kɛ gɛ laa chɛ kɛŋɔ a do he te be. Dɛ he bini bɛl dɛ nyin o ɛ he bwa nomoa aa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o kpɔ o te ɛ bechala dɛɛ tomɛ heya.
Dɛ he bini bɛl dɛ nyin o ɛ o te sitɔɔ raa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o sɛh dɛ berɛ o te kɛ he bwa bonɔɔ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ n Nɛn Bie kwaraa ta balɛ kɛ nɛ́ra baa tom mɛ. N te balɔ dɛ́ ba tomɛ nɛwɛnyini, dɛ kpɔ n nyu charɛ nɛndamanta mkpa."
Ba ba Jeriko, asɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la ne nɛnlaa bane aa le bela dɛɛ kaa la, dɛ Temeos binyoŋe Baatemeos o yon dɛɛ soŋe kwaa saŋ bɛlbwa la soge ŋwɛnɛ la keŋkeŋ.
Waa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt laanee la, dɛ o dɛ yerɛ Yeesu takpeg ne dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Devid Naa Yeesu, na n sum!"
Asɛ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ kaoh ŋɔ ó tɔ nyoa. Kɛ o ta ban chaŋɛ. Namee o ta do lɔŋɔ kohona dɛɛ yerɛ, "Devid Naa Yeesu, na n sum!"
Asɛ Yeesu che dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé yerɔ." Asɛ ba yerɛ nyoŋe la dɛ ŋɔ, "Sɔɔh bwara dɛ ir! O dɛ yerɛ."
Asɛ o wur o yal vigri, dɛ jah ir che dɛ ba Yeesu be.
Belaa Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa he ŋɔ ń ɛ tɛɛ nɔ?" Asɛ nyoŋe la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, n dɛ nyin n won dɛɛ na."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kaa. He yarada haa yarada mɛ la gelɔ he dɔ bokpega." Bug la ta dɛ o wono dɛɛ na, dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta.
Baa dɛ tel Jerusalam dɛɛ bɛne Bɛtfej ne Bɛtani la, Ɔlevere Bwe la bɔr bela la, o tomɛ o habɔteŋra la banɛ ŋɔ bá tɔ sie,
dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé la bwɛɛ nɔ waa lɔ sie le nɔ ta. Haa dɛɛ tel bela la, hɛɛ nao kɛŋɔ baa vɔwɛ keego bie bɛl nomɛlbwa aa wola on teehnɛ bwa. Hé puru dɛ kpɔ ba bonɔ.
Asɛ dɛ nomɛl bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ bɔkwaa hɛɛ ba o ne ɛɛ yaa, hé ŋɔ he dɔɔ la dɛ nyinu dɛ́ ɛ waane, asɛ he berɛ kpɔ ba taraken."
Asɛ ba la dɛ ka na keego bie bɛl baa lawɔ vɔwɛ ŋwɛnɛ nyoa doonyoa bɛl jwɛh.
Baa dɛ puru la, nɛra baa chegɛ bela la bane bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa he pur keego bie la dɛ́ɛ ɛɔ?"
Asɛ ba bol gɛ Yeesu aa ŋɔa bá bol la, asɛ nɛra la tɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ.
Ba kpɔ keego bie la ba tɛ Yeesu dɛ pa ba yale darawe o habɔɔ, asɛ Yeesu so o ta.
Nɛndamanta tɛo jirima dɛ pa ba yale pa ŋwɛnɛ ta, asɛ bane ge kɛ papooni bela kooni la ta dɛ pa ŋwɛnɛ la bwa ta.
Dɛ nɛra baa tɔ Yeesu sie ne banɔ la baa ka mun la bwa dɛ si, "Woowo! Korowii kwaa naate waa dɛ ba o sɔn ta nɔ kwa!
Korowii swee ya Naa Devid kora nɔ waa dɛ ba ira ja nɔ andɛɛga! Korowii jam!"
Yeesu la Jerusalam dɛ ka jo Korowii Dea bini dɛ nyinyiŋi waa aa dɛ ɛ bela la bwa. Bɔr aa dɛ jo la nomanta, o ne o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la kaa Bɛtani.
Tɔɔ aa pera, ba le Bɛtani dɛɛ ba la, dɛ lɔr lawɛ Yeesu.
O na pur bɛl bojaŋ dɛ o mogɛ papooni sukuu ken, dɛ fe la o mun ŋɔ o ken fe ɛɛ dɔ o nɔna anee di kɛɛ? Waa tel bela la dɛ papooni gboo tɔ daa la bwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ pure nɔna ta tele mɔɔ.
Belaa Yeesu taah pur daa la ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa aa he nɔna dii ba kpa bwa." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o habɔteŋra la noɔ.

Baa tel Jerusalam la, Yeesu jo Korowii Dea bobɛl dɛɛ doŋi kon-yogra ne kon-yarawa baa lɔ bela la. O berɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛɛ pegri suuga la teeburre bwa piigi, dɛ tagɛ banɔ la baa dɛ yog brɔnomare la bwa kane tata.
O ta sɛɛh nomɛlbwa kpɔ bone bɛlbwa kpɔ Korowii Dea la bini.
Asɛ o bol waa dɛɛ bag ba ŋɔ, "Ba ta chwerɛ ŋɔ, 'Baa yerɛ n dea nɛwɛnyina bwa Korowii soŋebɔr' yaa? Gɛɛ he te berɛ kpɔɔ berɛ ŋwɛɛra sɔɔhbɔr aa?"
Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la aa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, belaa ba pa mun dɛɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ dɛ́ kpo Yeesu. Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o webagla dɛ kpo nɛra bwa nyoa.
Bɔr aa ba dɛ jo la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la le bwɛɛ la ta.
A tɔɔ aa pera chɔmbibi ne ba valɛ ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa la, ba kaa le pur daa la ta, dɛ o sewɔ kwaraa le o nyundua ka le o lune bwa ta.
Belaa Pita lii gɛ aa ɛa mɔɔ daa la sewɛ la, dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, na. Pur daa la haa taahno la sewɔ!"
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé yarada Korowii.
Kasinteŋ, nomɛlbwa waa won kpɔ yarada ŋɔ bwe nɔ be ŋɔ ó ir ka le moo ta, waa wola tɔŋlɛ o bambile ta tamaa bɛlbwa, dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ wonoo ɛ gɛ la, aa ɛo tɛo kpela ge.
Anomanta, kasinteŋ, dɛ he dɛ soŋe Korowii komɛl aa, hé yarada kɛŋɔ he dɔɔ dɔ kon la. Dɛ he wono yarada gɛ naa, komɛlbwa haa soŋe la, Korowii ɛɛ tɛ heyaa.
Dɛ he iro che dɛɛ soŋe Korowii ge aa, wobɛlbwa he bala bane aa ɛ heyaa la, hé kpɔ kɛ ba ásɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la ge kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heya."
Asɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra berɛ ba jo Jerusalam ja. Yeesu aa ba dɛ valɛ Korowii Dea la bini la, Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema ne bela nomonome la ba o be
dɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Umee tɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ he ɛ gɛ waa nɔ haa dɛ ɛ nɔɔ? Umee tɛɛ kpegri kwaraa te nɔ?"
Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Ń bɔɔ heyaa webeŋkpoŋ, dɛ he wono jemaa, mɛɛ bagle heyaa naate waa tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ mɛɛ ɛ gɛ waa nɔ.
Umee tɛ Jɔn kpegri wɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laɔ? Korowii tɛo waa, kɛ nɛwɛnyinii tɛo wɔ? Hé bag mɛ naate."
Ate dɛ ba gbogbo dɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Dɛ ya ŋɔ Korowiirii tɛo waa, wɛɛ ŋɔɔ, 'Aah ɛrɛɛ haa wola Jɔn yaradae yɔ?'
Kɛ dɛ ya ŋɔ nɛwɛnyinii tɛo ge aa, aa werii do." Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ ba gbagba nɛra la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ nomɛlbwa yaradao kɛŋɔ Korowii keamee Jɔn.
Anomanta ba waa baa bola laanee kɛŋɔ, "Yaa jemɛ." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Gɛ haa wola jemɛ la, gɛɛ n ge aa wola heyaa naate waa tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ mɛɛ ɛ a gɛ waa nɔ maa dɛ ɛ nɔɔ bagle.

"Baa bɛlee parɛ kwaa ane baa kpɔa dɛɛ daa sen, dɛ ke a gɛ koo la, dɛ kwaa bɔr baa dɛɛ harame a nee dɛɛ do, dɛ chigri jɛŋla bela, bá so o ta dɛɛ daah koo la, dɛ kpɔ nɛra báa ɛ koo la toma, a koma telaa, ba dɔ ba bɔr. A habɔɔ la o kpɔ koo la tɛɛ ba bá nyiŋi o ta tɛo, dɛ kaa harɛ bɛl ta.
Koma saŋ aa baa tel la, o tomɛ o bonɔɔ bɛl ŋɔ ó ka lɛ o dibɔr ba tɛo.
Bonɔɔ la aa laŋa la, nɛra la lawɔ dɛ lɔɔro dɛ doŋu o kaa. Ba ta on komɛlbwa tɛɛ o kaa.
Koote la berɔ tomɛ o bonɔn-nɛɛte, asɛ ba lɔɔ o ge dɛ doo bol o nyu ta dɛ ɛo wilewile ken.
Asɛ koo te la berɛ tomɛ o bonɔɔna la bɛl ja, asɛ nɛra la lawɔ dɛ kpoo. Gɛɛ o tomɛ toroma bane ja, asɛ ba lɔɔ bane dɛ kpo bane ge.
"Dɛ nɛn waa kaa ó tomɛ bwaa o gbagba bie waa dɛ nyinu gwaa komɛlbwa. O bonɔɔna la bwa aa baa tonɛ la, o bie laanee o ka mun tomɛ dɛ ŋɔ, 'Ba na n bie nɔ te naa, baa heehroo.'
Nɛra la aa na o bie la la, ba den ŋɔ, 'Yoowa, baa la gbagba biee la. O mɛɛ toole naa, on dɛɛ ba o kapɛrɛ dii. Hé gel ya kpoo, asɛ dɛ o mɛɛ baa sewaa, dɛ kwaa la ɛ ya kwa.'
Ba lawɛ bie la dɛ kpoo dɛ kpɔɔ vigri koo la baŋ."
Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ a gɛ koo te nɔ ɛɛ ɛo wɔ?" Dɛ ŋɔ, "Wɛɛ ba kpo a gɛ nɛra laanee dɛ kpɔ koo la do nɛnfala nɔn ta.
Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn la bini ŋɔ, 'Bwe la mamaala aa vɛoh dɛ liiru konsala laanee bera ba lawɛ dea la kpoŋe la.
Korowiirii ɛa gɛ, a ɛ nyokpowa.' He ta a gɛ waa nɔ kure ka aa?"
Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ dɛ kpɔ sɛgle la, dɛ Juda tena nomonome la dɛ nyin bɔr dɛ́ lawɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ banee o sɛgle. Kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ nɛnlaa baa lɔ bela la, dɛ gelo dɛ kaa.
Baa kaala la, ba kaa tomɛ Farisii tena ne Hɛrɔd habɔɔ tena bane ŋɔ bá ba hagre Yeesu bela webɔɔre ne dɛ lawɔ.

Asɛ ba ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ he dɛ bol kasinteŋ. He ta waa bolɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ a habɔɔ kɛŋɔ a dɛ do bane som, kɛɛ a dɛ we bane bambile nɔ. Haa nɛra sie bɔr nyiŋi dɛɛ bol waa kɛŋɔ bɛl ɛ kooro kɛɛ nomoa kɛɛ bechala nɔ. Korowii ŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ bagle nɛra kasinteŋ ne. Webeŋkpoŋii yaa nyin ya jemɛ. Onee kɛŋɔ ya mmara nɔ dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ ya bɔ lampoo dɛɛ tɛ Room koojen Siisa la aa, kɛɛ waa yaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛ?"
Dɛ Yeesu jemɛ ba webɔɔre la mun dɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ hagre mɛ bela nɔɔ? Hé kpɔ suuga bwe ba ń na."
Anee ba kpɔ bɛl tɛo, asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ume nyu ne o sɔnee dawɛ suuga nɔ ta nɔɔ?" Asɛ ba chaŋe ŋɔ koojen Siisa laanee.
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Oo. Amɔ hé kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Siisa kwaa la tɛo, dɛ kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Korowii kwaa la tɛ Korowii." Asɛ o waa ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa.
Saduki tena ba Yeesu be. Dɛ baa yarada kɛŋɔ nɛn sewaa, wɛɛ berɔɔ ir ja.
Ba baa bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nomoa, Mosis fa chwerɛ mmara bɛl tɛ yaa ŋɔ dɛ baa sewɔ gel o haah dɛ o ta bii dɔe yaa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o nime kɛɛ o dɔɔ kpɔ haah la mo dɛ logle bii, ásɛ a gɛ bii la ɛ lale la bii.
Hahbeŋkpoŋ bibaala banuanɛɛ fa lole, asɛ o binomoa la ba mo haah dɛ ba sewɛ, dɛ o ta bie dɔe.
Asɛ onla waa teŋɛ binomoa la nɛɛ la ge kpɔ haah la mo dɛ ba sewɛ, dɛ o ge ne o ta bie lolɛ. Gɛɛ bitooro te la ge mo haah la dɛ ba sewɛ, dɛ o ta bie dɔe.
Bii la bwa mo haah la ka lɔ nyoa dɛ ba serewe, dɛ ba ta bii dɔe. A bwa habɔɔ la, haah la ge baa sewɛ.
Aah dɛ nɛra bwa seo bini ira tɔpere la baa tel asɛ bibaala la bwa ir aa, ba bini umee dɛɛ ba haah la jaa ɛɛ yɔ? Ba nɛra banuanɛ la bwa gee fa moo."
Belaa Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He kono kwaraa! He jemɛ kon la aa gela he koni aa? Haa wola Korowii Waa baa chwera ne o kpegri waa jemɛ la waa.
Nɛra baa ir seo ta naa, baa soo kɛŋɔ Korowii toroma baa lɔ nyundua la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa haahna moe ba, baa jaranar ge yala ba.
Nɛra seo ta ira ge la nɔ, dɛ he dɛ lii Mosis Tɔn bini waa ane aa dɛ bagle dawii fuih la wa aa, ba chwerɛ bela gɛ Korowii aa ŋɔ Mosis be ŋɔ, 'Menee Abraham Korowii ne Aesek Korowii ne Jekɔb Korowii.'
Lala laa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, weeraa dɛɛ tomɔ. Anomanta he kono kwaraa!"
Dɛ Tɔn Jereme bɛl ge ba bela dɛɛ no waa baa dɛ pɛɛro wɛɛ bagle a bini la, dɛ na kɛŋɔ waa la ŋwɛnɛ taa Yeesu bola la. O ge bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Mosis Mmarare la bini umee ɛ onjen gwaa a bwa nɔ?"
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "A bwa bini onjen laanee nɔ: 'Israel tena, hé no. N Naa Korowii nɔ habɔɔ dɔɔ bɛlbwa toole kpa.
Hé nyin N Naa Korowii he bambile bwa, he hweera, he liire, ne he bokpega bwa ne.'
Onjen waa teŋa nɛɛ laanee nɔ: 'Nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he gbagba.' Mmara bɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ onjen dɛ gwaa anɛ nɔ."
Asɛ Tɔn Jereme la ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Jam, he ɛ wa, Nomoa. He waa nɔ bwa ɛ kasinteŋ. Korowii beŋkpoŋ gboo lole. Komɛlbwa toole dɛ dɔ yaa ka ja o nɛ.

A chɛ kɛŋɔ ya nyinu ya bambile ne ya liire ne ya bokpega bwa ne, dɛ nyin ya dɔŋa kɛŋɔ yaa dɛ nyin ya gbagba la. A gɛ mmarare anɛ nɔ ta teŋaa wera gwaa gɛ bwa yaa kpoo kwaa dɛ fuah dɛɛ tɛ Korowii, dɛ che kwaa kaa tɛo."
Yeesu aa naa kɛŋɔ baa la chaŋe waa la wejema ne la, o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He sie dɛ chaah Korowii Kora waa la ta." A habɔɔ la nomɛlbwa ta berɛ hɛlɛ waa dɛ bɔɔro waane kpa.
Yeesu aa ba dɛ bagle waa Korowii Dea la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛ waa Tɔn Jerema la ŋɔ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la ɛɛ ɛ Devid naa nɔɔ?
Dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge fa ir Devid nɛɛ dɛ gel o bagle Kristo waa dɛ ŋɔ, 'N Naa Korowii ŋɔ n Dɔɔ be ŋɔ ó ba so nomombɔr o dig ta ka tel kɛŋɔ waa ba o dɔma ne harɛ ásɛ o tigri ba nɛ.'
Aah Devid kwaraa faa dɛ yerɔ o dɔɔ nɔ, ɛrɛɛ a berɛ ɛ o ɛ Devid naa ɔ?" Nɛnlaa la no o wobol la silɛɛ ne.
Waa dɛ bag ba la, o ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi Tɔn Jerema la kɛrɛdɛ. Ban yon do laalajena ásɛ nɛra bwa na ba dɛɛ guŋi ba harɛ yaware.
Ba dɛ nyin nomombɔra soga kohona cheremi deene, ne nomombɔra soga tɔpejena dii cheremi bɔra la.
Ba sie begre kwa, dɛɛ kam kwaa luhaahna deremi, dɛ berɛ saah dɛɛ soŋe Korowii wobojaŋa ne nɛra sie ta. Ba kembɔr ɛɛ do kanee taeh!"
Yeesu kaa so Korowii Dea suuga tae daka bɔr dɛɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa ta suuga dɛɛ do o bini la, dɛ dɔɔhna bane dɛ do suugajena tenten.
Belaa luhaah nyaa bɛl ge ba do suuga bwea jegre anɛ.
Asɛ Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra la dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, luhaah nyaa nɔ do suugajena dɛ gwaa nɛra nɔ bwa,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ o dea suuga bwaa o gbaa ba do daka nɔ bini la. Kɛ dɔɔhna la te suuga bini tama baa naa kɛŋɔ ba laa kpɔ aa, aa ba nɛɛ we la, anee ba kpɔ baa do la."
Yeesu aa dɛ le Korowii Dea la, o habɔteŋra la bɛl ŋɔ, "Nomoa, na bwea baa kpɔa ma deene nɔ aa bara gɛ. Deene la kakan bee! A wer ge laa nɔ!"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kɛ he na dejena nɔ kenɛ? Ba ta ɛɛ pagre a bwaa kwara, asɛ a bwe beŋkpoŋ kwara aa lee do dɛ ta chɔŋɛ o dɔŋ ta kpa."
Ba le Korowii Dea dɛ kaa Ɔlevere Bwe la bɔr. Asɛ Yeesu so bwe la doa dɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii Dea la, asɛ Pita ne Jems ne Jɔn ne Andriu gbo ba o be, dɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ,
"Waa la haa bola la, saŋ besoo aa ba chiga ɔ? Bɔkwaa dɛɛ ba bagla kɛ gɛ waa nɔ chiga teloo?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ heyaa negre.
Nɛra ɛɛ warɔɔ dɛ kpɔ n sɔn ba dɛ ba ŋɔ banee men. Ba bɛlbwa ɛɛ ŋɔɔ onee Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ nɛra la dɛ negre nɛra pirim.
"Dɛ he baa no laa yoi waa ne laa gbɔga bobɛlbwa ge aa, he bɛ gel a ɛ heyaa wepigra, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ a ɛ gɛ. A gɛ waa nɔ bwa chɛ kɛŋɔ a chig, dɛ wobɛlbwa jaga la ta tele mɔɔ.
Bwɛɛre ne ba bwɛɛre dɔŋa ɛɛ yo laalee, koranar ge ne ba koranar dɔŋa ɛɛ yo dɔŋa. Harɛ ɛɛ jigri bobɛlaa, asɛ lɔr ge ba. A gɛ waa nɔ kaa chaa haah loltea wee o yon dɛɛ weo kɛ dɛ o lola ta tele mɔɔ la.
"Hé gbagba ge nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ. Baa larawe heyaa dɛ la he ne nomonome sie, dɛ lɔɔ heyaa cheremi deene bini. N nomanta hɛɛ che Abane nomonome ne koranar siinii dɛ bol Korowii Amanesoma la bag ba.
Baa bol Amanesoma laanee bagle nɛwɛnyina bwa mɔɔ wobɛlbwa jaga la ba.

Dɛ ba baa lawɛ heya, dɛ la he ne nomonome sie naa, he bɛ gel waa haa dɛ ba bola la hiah heya. A baa tel kɛŋɔ hé bol wa aa, hé bol wobɛlbwa aa le he nyoa la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ waa haa bol la aa he be lee ba. Korowii Domadɛɛge la bee aa ba lee.
"Nɛra ɛɛ le ba gbagba lolanaree tɛ ŋɔ bá kpoo ba, baala ɛɛ le ba gbagba biirii tɛ ŋɔ bá kpo, asɛ bii ge ir che ba nyare ne mɛɛnanar nɛɛ dɛ gel baa kpoo ba.
Nɛra bwa ɛɛ koh n waa hah heya. Kɛ naate waa dɛ ba wona dɛ lawɛ bambile ka tonɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.

"Hɛɛ na konchɔgechɔge laanee kɛŋɔ o chegɛ bela aa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba nao. (Bonɔ kpegri. Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa kuro la kwaa nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ.) He baa na gɛ naa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ Judia harɛ tena chwa ka nyin sɔɔhbɔr ba bwea la ta.
Naate waa soge o sal dea doa la ge, o bɛ berɛ koh o te ŋɔ o dɛ tu dɛ jo dea dɛ́ kpɔ komɛl. A chɛ kɛŋɔ o chwa dɛ dɔ o nyu.
Nomɛlbwa waa lɔ koo ta la bɛ berɛ la dem dɛ́ ka kpɔ o yal.
Ei! Aa do kpegrii tɛ tekpoŋra ne haahna baa kpoŋe bechasɔɔhne a gɛ saŋ nɔ noo!
Hé soŋe Korowii asɛ a gɛ waa nɔ bɛ waa saŋ chig oo!
Dɛkalkɛŋɔ a gɛ wekpega nɔ dɔŋa ta ɛɛ bwa. A ɔma! Dɛ den le saŋ la Korowii aa ta harɛ la dɛ kpoŋe ba le fini nɔ, nɛwɛnyini ta a dɔŋa nae bwa. A gɛ waa nɔ ɛo waa, a dɔŋa aa ɛɛ ba kpa.
Dɛ Korowii fe ta tɔpera la ane teŋe ta aa, nomɛlbwa fe aa lee ba. Kɛ o koh o nɛra waa chal ba ba teŋɛ o nɛɛ la waa dɛ teŋe tɔpechɔga la ane ta.
"A gɛ saŋ la bane ɛɛ dɛɛ ŋɔɔ, 'Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa laanee nɔ!' Asɛ bane ge ŋɔ, 'On ka lɔ le la!' A gɛ waa nɔ bwa baa ɛ aa, he bɛ a bɛlbwa yarada,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra ɛɛ bao dɛ ba teŋe nyosone ŋɔ Kristo laanee ban, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Korowii keameree ban. Baa baa ɛ nyokpowaa ne bebeewaa dɛɛ nyin bɔr dɛ́ negre nɛra Korowii aa chal ba la kwara.
Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ! N dɔɔ bagle waa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ mɔɔ tɔpere la ba.
"A gɛ wekpega nɔ baa ɛ dɛ kaa laa, wee aa bɔr chaahna ba kpa, korobie ge aa bɔr chaahna ba kpa.
Weweela dɛ ba nyundua lee dɛ lee harɛ, asɛ Korowii doa bwa yiigi dɛ chɔg.
Belaa baa ba n Nɛn Bie nae kɛŋɔ maa lɔ baama bini dɛɛ ba kpegri waa wola dɔŋ dɔe ne jirima ne.
Mɛɛ tomɛ nyundua toromaa harɛ nɔ bobɛlbwa bá valɛ lawɛ n nɛra maa chal ba la bwa ba pɛ.
"Hé kpɔ pur daa nɔna hweli wa. O baa fogre dɛɛ le papo-lwɛɛne, dɛ nomɛlbwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ bɔwɔb saŋ telo.
Gɛɛ dɛ he ba dɛ na a gɛ waa nɔ naa, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ tɔpere la tuuhno tel dɛɛ nyin joe.
Kasinteŋ, a gɛ waa nɔ bwa dɛ ba ɛɛ mɔɔ fini nɛra nɔ bwa serewe.
Nyundua ne harɛ ɛɛ chɔgoo. Aa lee ba do kpa. Kɛ n waa la te kpegri ɛɛ do lee dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa.
"A gɛ tɔpere nɔ te, nomɛlbwa aa tɔpere la bala saŋ jemɛ. Korowii toroma baa lɔ nyundua la kwara aa tɔpere la jemɛ. O bie la gbabir aa jemɛ. O gboo jemɛ tɔpere la.
Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, hɛ́ɛ do dɛɛgɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ haa tɔpere la jemɛ.
Aa ɛo kɛŋɔ nomoa bɛl aa dɛ ba bobɛl kaala dɛ bagle o bonɔɔna tomare, dɛ ŋɔ baa waa dɛ nyiŋi o dem la ta be ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi o ta kɛrɛdɛ la.
Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ta wone jemɛ tɔɔ la wee dem te la aa dɛ ba bala. Bɛl lole jwaanaa wɛɛ ba bala. Gɛ laa ge aa, harambaŋa ne. Bɛl lole o ta jabala siiga saŋ balaa, chɔɔbɔree wɛɛ ba bala.
He bɛ gel o ba pigri heya, dɛ he dɛ chɔ doromi.
Waa nɔ maa dɛ bol he be nɔ, nɛra bwa bee mɛɛ ŋɔ la. Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋu ŋwɛnɛ kɛrɛdɛ!"

A baa ka tɔpera anɛ ásɛ ba di ba bena nyoa baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la. A gɛ bena nyoa nɔ tɔpera taa baa di paanoo baa wola iisi a ta do la. Dɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la dɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ́ sɔh lawɛ Yeesu dɛ kpoo,
dɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛndamanta nɔ aa dɛ ba chema ya bena nyoa nɔ dii ta nɔ, dɛ ya kpoo gɛ tɔpera nɔ ta naa, baa lɛ gaeeh."

Yeesu la Bɛtani dɛ ka chog Seemɔn weechɔga faa chɔg o bwara ka la dea. Baa dɛ di kwaa la, haah bɛl kpɔ nosɔɔhsoma a yog aa kpega loŋbir bɛl ba jo ba be. O baa pagre loŋ la dɛ wee tulalee la dɛɛ do Yeesu nyu ta.
Dɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la bane baah diu, baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Aah tulalee nɔ ge ken chɔga nɔ munii ameo?
Ba fe yoga aa, o fe ɛɛ le suugajena tentenee ba fee kpɔ tɛ nyaara. A gɛ fe ta bɔe kɛŋɔ gɛ nɔ waa ɛa nɔ naa?" Dɛ chwee haah la kohona.
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé gelo ken. Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ hao gɛ nɔɔ? Wedɛɛgee o ɛɛ mɛ la.
Nyaara aa he be paŋa ba bwa. Dɛ he dɛ nyin ban wedɛɛga ɛɛ yaa, hɛɛ wonoo dɛɛ ɛɛ ba saŋ bɛlbwa. Kɛ n te, maa he bee do ka tonɛ.
Anla waa won ɛ laanee o ɛ la. N huga laalee o pu sie dɛɛ kpɔ dɛ fuge tulalee dɛɛ do n nyu ta la.
Kasinteŋ, bobɛlbwa baa bol Amanesoma nɔ harɛ ta bobɛlbwa la, baa bol waa waa ɛa nɔ waa dɛ kpɔ liiru."
Asɛ Judas Eskareɔt waa ɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bɛl la ir la Sɔfonomonome be dɛ ka ŋɔ wɛɛ wonoo cha ba ásɛ ba lawɛ Yeesu.
Baa no gɛ la, ba sie lɛo, dɛ ŋɔ baa tɛo suugaa. Asɛ Judas pa mun dɛɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ́ won gel ba dɔɔ.

Ba bena nyoa nɔ dii tɔpelogle taa baa kpɔ ba te dɛ laa iisi kwaa kpɔ ba deremi dɛɛ kpoo pebiiri ásɛ dɛ kpɔ di Galekaa kondikwaa la. Awola la Yeesu habɔteŋra la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Lee hɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya ka ɛ Galekaa kondikwaa la tɛɛ he dio?"
Belaa o tomɛ ba nɛra banɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé la bwɛɛ bini. He kaa na baa bɛl o che vii ne nee aa, hé teŋɛ o nɛ
dɛ ka jo dem waa jo o ta la. He laŋaa, hé ŋɔ dem te la be ŋɔ nomoa la ŋɔ lee dea o ne o habɔteŋra aa dɛ ba Galekaa kondikwaa o bini dii la dɔɔ?
Asɛ ó bagle heyaa abrɔsane doa dea bɛl baa kwaaro dɛ nyin kane bwa cheg o bini kɛrɛdɛ la. Belaa hɛɛ ba ya kondikwaa bwa ɛɛ dɛ cheg."
O habɔteŋra la aa la bwɛɛ la ta la, gɛ waa bagla la tentenee ba ka na, asɛ dɛ daa ba Galekaa kondikwaa la bela.
A jɔmɔra ne la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la ba bela.
Baa soga dɛɛ di kwaa la, Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, he nɛra n ne haa pɛ nɔn dɛɛ di kwaa nɔ bini bɛlee dɛɛ ba n yoga tɛ nɛra la."
Ate dɛ ba teene bini chɔgɔ, ba berɛ dɛɛ bɔɔro beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa ŋɔ, "Menee kɛɛ? Menee kɛɛ?"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "He nɛra fi dɛ banɛ nɔ n ne haa dɛ pɛ nɔn hɛna beŋkpoŋ bini nɔ bɛlee.
N Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ sewɔɔ gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla kɛŋɔ mɛɛ ɛo la. Kɛ naate waa yog mɛ tɛ ba kpo mɛ la, bwɛɛlɛ! Ba fe ta on lolɛ kwaraa fe bɔ!"
Baa dɛ di kwaa la, Yeesu kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ kuu, dɛ kpɔ tɛ o habɔteŋra la, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé lɛ paanoo nɔ dɛ di. N bo-olii."
Asɛ o berɛ kpɔ numol ne sen ge dɛ jam Korowii dɛ kpɔ tɛɛ ba, asɛ ba nyɔ ka tɛ dɔŋa.
Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Sen nɔ chegɔ tɛ n chal maa dɛ ba nɛra kɛrɛdɛ waa koeh dɛ fuge ta. A ɛ fɔo dɛ chɔ Korowii ne nɛwɛnyini baah ta.
Kasinteŋ, maa a gɛ sen nɔ anee nyɔ kpa bwa, nemenɛ kɛŋɔ awola maa ba nyɔ anfala Korowii Kora la ta."
Asɛ ba go yel bɛl dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ le kaa Ɔlevere Bwe la ta.
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bwa ɛɛ ba chwao gel mɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ, 'Korowii ɛɛ kpo petegre laanee, asɛ peera la bwa lɔ pegre.'
Kɛ dɛ Korowii baa ir mɛ seo ta naa, mɛɛ tɔ he siee la Galilia harɛ ta."
Anee Pita ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ n bala nɔ bwa chwao gele kwara naa, n te aa chwa gele!"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ Pita be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, jabal ne sii kera anɛ kere chɔmbibi ne dɛ he tɔɔh kera atoro ŋɔ haa men jemɛ kwaraa!"
Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, n ne hɛɛ sewɔɔ, kɛ maa tɔh ŋɔ maa hen jemɛ bwa!" Gɛɛ o habɔteŋra la bwa ŋɔ baa o habɔɔ le bwa.
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra aa tel bela baa dɛ yerɛ Gɛtsɛmane la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé so bonɔ asɛ ń ka soŋe Korowii ba."
O kpɔ Pita ne Jems ne Jɔn kaa bá ka doo. Waa dɛ kaa la, dɛ ɔmee ne bambiteŋa lawɔ kohona.
Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N tea bini chɔgɔ kohona to. A gbo ɛɛ kpo mɛɛ kwara. Hé so bonɔ dɛɛ were ń la ba."
Asɛ o la sie tama dɛ ka pi harɛ dɛ soŋe Korowii ŋɔ a fe ɛɛ magroo waa, waa aa dɛ ba la fe bɛ o nɛɛ chig.
Dɛ berɛ soŋo ja ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, wobɛlbwa toole haa wola won ɛ. N poori, bɛ gel n na a gɛ wahala nɔ, kɛ ɛ he tetoowaa dɛ gel n tetoowa."
Asɛ Yeesu berɛ ba ba be dɛ ba na o habɔteŋra batoro la kɛŋɔ ba chɔɔge doromi. Anee o bɔɔ Seemɔn Pita ŋɔ, "Chɔe he chɔ aa? He ta wone were tamaa bɛlbwa naa?"
Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ won negre heyaa. He bambile fe dɛ nyin wedɛɛga ɛɛ, kɛ he bwadabii pwɛre."
Asɛ o berɛ la dɛ ka soŋe Korowii gɛ o faa kaa soŋe la,
dɛ berɛ ba ba be, dɛ ba chɔɔge doromi, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ dom dɛ chug ba taeh. Baa jemɛ gɛ baa bol o be kpa.
Waa bera ka ba tooro tena dɛ ba dɛ chɔɔge doromi ja, anee o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He ta chɔɔ dɛɛ onaa? A tonɔ. Saŋ la baa dɛ ba n Nɛn Bie kpɔe dɛ do wechɔg-ɛɛra nɔn ta la telo.
Hé ir yá kaa. Baa la waa lee mɛ tɛ baa ba n kpoe laanee la."
Yeesu taa dɛ bol waa, dɛ o habɔteŋra la bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Judas balɔ. Nɛnlaa banee teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛ kpoŋe tokobie ne keri ne gule. Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la ne bela nomonomee tomɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ.
Baa dɛ ba la, Judas ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Naate maa gbaaro pɛl n bambile dɛ mo o lwɛɛma la, hé lawɔ dɛ nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ o bɛ won lɛ o te dɛ chwa."
Waa baa tel Yeesu be la, o gbaaro pɛl o bambile dɛ mo o lwɛɛma dɛ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ!"
Belaa ba lawɔ.
Asɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la bɛl laa o kere kpɔ dɛ ŋwɛnɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la bonɔɔ deŋne bɛl dɛ laa cha.
Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛɛree men he kpɔ keri ne gule dɛɛ ba hé ba lag mɛ naa?
Saŋ la bwa maa lɔ Korowii Dea dɛɛ bagle waa la, ɛrɛɛ haa wola men lawɔɔ? Gɛ aa ɛ asɛ waa baa chwera la bwa ɛ kpela la waa anɔ bwa ɛɛ ɛ nɔ."
Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋra la bwa lɔ pegre dɛ chwao.
Dɛ bonɔɔ bɛl kpɔ yapoŋ mile chara dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ, asɛ ba fe ɛɛ nyin o lawa,
asɛ o gel yapoŋ la dɛ chwa kaa gɛ.
Belaa ba kpɔ Yeesu la Sɔfore Nomoa la dem. Dɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema ne ba bela nomonome bwa cheme bela.
Dɛ Pita teŋɛ ba nɛɛ bojaŋ dɛ ba jo nomoa la dem baah. Dɛ o ne soojare baa dɛ daah doonyoa la sogo dɛɛ ŋwee nii.
Sɔfonomonome ne Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la bwa nyin ŋwɛnɛ la bwa ta baa che dɛ́ di waa la bɔ Yeesu dɛ́ fee gel ba kpoo kahonɛ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ teŋe nyosone dawɛ Yeesu nɛ, kɛ dɛ ba webagla la aa beŋkpoŋ ɛ.
Asɛ baala bane ir dɛ teŋe nyosone ŋɔ,
"Ya noɔ waa dɛ bol ŋɔ wɛɛ pagre Korowii Dea nɔ nɛwɛnyini aa mao nɔɔ dɛ berɛ kpɔ tɔpera atoro ma onla nɛwɛnyini aa wola mae."
Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ gba webagla la ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ.
Belaa Sɔfore Nomoa la ir che nɛra la bwa baah ta dɛ bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Amɔ he ta wobɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ chaŋe waa nɔ baa dɛ bol nɔ bɛlbwa naa?"
Asɛ Yeesu tɔ nyoa, o ta wobɛlbwa chaŋɛ. Asɛ nomoa la berɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Henee Korowii Bie Kristo la waa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la aa?"
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Menee, kɛ hɛɛ na n Nɛn Bie laanee kɛŋɔ maa soge nomombɔr Korowii waa ɛ kpegri bwa Dɔɔ la dig ta dɛɛ ba baamare ta!"
Asɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la laa o gbagba laala waa doa la pee dɛ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa danseɛ yá berɛ so dɛɛ nyin jaɔ?
He ta nɛnhɛlwobol waa dɛ bol Korowii noɛ yaa? Ɛrɛɛ he na nɔ?" Ate dɛ ba bwa ŋɔ, "O ɛ wechɔga. Hé kpoo!"
Dɛ ba bane ta nentane dɛɛ ta o nɛ, asɛ bane ge kpɔ nɔɔra tɔ o sie dɛɛ lɔɔro dɛɛ tɔɔ kande dɛ ŋɔ ó jemɛ naate waa lɔɔ. Asɛ soojare baa dɛ daah bela la kpakpaa o lwɛrɛme.
Pita ta lɔ dem baah bela, asɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la tolo bɛl ba
dɛ ba nao dɛ o dɛ ŋwee nii, dɛ nyiŋu jeiih ken dɛ ŋɔ, "Kɛ he ge fa teŋɛ Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la nɛɛ laɔ?"
Asɛ Pita tɔh pelepelepele ken, dɛ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa hɛɛ bol nɔɔ? Maa a bini jemɛ kwara!" Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o kaa dem la doonyoa bɔr.
Sɔfore Nomoa tolo la berɔ nao ja dɛ ŋɔ nɛra baa chegɛ bela la be ŋɔ, "Nɛra la bini bɛlee baa nɔ!"
Asɛ Pita berɛ tɔh ŋɔ waa Yeesu jemɛ ja. A ta bigre bɛlbwa asɛ nɛra baa chegɛ bela la ŋɔ, "Haa won tɔh ŋɔ Yeesu nɛra la bɛl laa hen, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Galilia tee hen."
Asɛ Pita ŋwɛɛ ŋɔ, "Maa baa nɔ haa dɛ bol o waa nɔ jemɛ kwara!"
Bug la ta dɛ jabal nɛɛtena sio, asɛ Pita lii gɛ Yeesu aa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Jabala ne sii kera anɛ dɛ he tɔɔh kera atoro bwa ŋɔ haa men jemɛ bwa" la. Waa lii a gɛ waa nɔ la, dɛ o dɛ wi.

Tɔɔ aa pera chɔmbibi ne la, Sɔfonomonome ne bwɛɛ nomonome ne Tɔn Jerema bwa, Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ nyiŋi ba waa bini la te bwa, chemo dɛ vɔrɔwe Yeesu vɔrɔwa, dɛ vɔrɔwe o nɔɔra, dɛ kpɔɔ ka tɛ Room nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi bela harɛ asɛ baa yerɔ Paelet la.
Belaa Paelet bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Henee Juda tena kooro ɛ?" Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Anee he bol la."
Sɔfonomonome la teŋe nyosone dawɛ Yeesu nɛ.
Asɛ Paelet bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "He ta wobɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ bol aa? Haa won chaŋe wedamanta nɔ bwa baa kpɔa dɛɛ dawɛ nɔ bini ane aa?"
Yeesu ta wobɛlbwa chaŋɛ, asɛ Paelet nyoa kpo.
A gɛ tɔpejen la baa tel aa, wechɔg-ɛɛ te bɛlbwa baa doo dea asɛ bwɛɛla la ŋɔ bá leo ta la, a chɛ kɛŋɔ ba leo ta.
A gɛ saŋ la, nɛra bane fa vuugi Room nomonome baa dɛ nyiŋi bela harɛ la dɛ kpoo nɛra a gɛ waa la ta. Dɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Barabas ja a gɛ nɛra nɔ nɛ, asɛ ba do ba bwa dea.
Asɛ nɛnlaa la ba Paelet be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó le wechɔg-ɛɛra la bɛl ta, gɛ baa dɛ ɛ bena bɛlbwa la.
Belaa o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ń foo Juda tena kooro la ta kɛɛ?"
Dɛ o gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ bɔweela waa Sɔfonomonome la che Yeesu nɛɛ pɛɛpɛɛ dɛ kpɔɔ ba o be la.
Jaah dɛ Sɔfonomonome la do nɛnlaa la bwa ŋɔ bá ŋɔ Barabasee baa nyin, dɛ ŋɔ Páelet leo ta.
Belaa Paelet bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ he ŋɔ ń ɛ baa la haa dɛ yerɔ Juda tena kooro laɔ?"
Asɛ ba bwa kparɛ si ŋɔ, "Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!"
Anee Paelet bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yɔ? Bɔkwa wechɔga o ɛɔ?" Ate dɛ ba berɔ kwaa si kohona ŋɔ, "Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!"
Paelet aa wola nyin kɛŋɔ nɛnlaa la bwaawee ir o nɛɛ la, o le Barabas ta tɛɛ ba dɛ gel ba lɔɔ Yeesu bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra ne mɔɔ dɛ kpɔɔ tɛ ŋɔ bá ka kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta.
Asɛ soojare la kpɔ Yeesu le kaa Paelet dem baah dɛ yerɛ ba bala soojare bwa,
dɛ kpɔ yaswɛm bɛl kɛŋɔ ba bela kooyal tɔ Yeesu, dɛ kpɔ sɔɔhne sɔh koogbɛrɛ piu,
dɛ ba dɛ guŋi o sie dɛɛ si, "Woowo, Juda tena kooro!"
Asɛ ba kpɔ chweremi dɛɛ cha o nyu, dɛ ta nentane dɛɛ ta o nɛ, dɛɛ guŋu harɛ kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ɛ kooro la.
Baa mugli o baah tonɛ la, ba laa yaswɛm la foo o bwara ta, dɛ kpɔ o gbagba laala la doo, dɛ kpɔɔ le dɛɛ kaa dɛ́ ka kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta.
Baa dɛ kaa la, ba kaa na Sairini baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn, dɛ o le bobɛl dɛɛ ba. Ba ɛgro o lɛ Yeesu dagagre la che. Dɛ a gɛ Seemɔn la biirii Alɛksanda ne Rufus.
Asɛ ba kpɔ Yeesu kaa bela baa dɛ yerɛ Gɔlgɔta la. Gɔlgɔta munii Nyuhog Bɔr.
Asɛ ba kpɔ tɛɛga ane baa dɛ yera mire aa wona dɛɛ sɔɔh bwadabii wee nyoa do sen ta dɛ kpɔ tɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ó nyɔ, asɛ o vɛh nyɔe.
Ba foo o laala, dɛ kpaa o nɔɔra ne o nakpale pɛl dagagre ta. Dɛ soojare la dɛ nyin Yeesu laala bɔna, dɛ ta chacha mɔɔ dɛ́ won jemɛ laala ba bɛlbwa aa di.
Koola nenyɔɔ saŋee ba kpaa Yeesu pɛl dagagre ta.
Ba chwerɛ o wechɔga waa ɛa ba koh a waa kpoo la pɛl o dagagre la ta. A gɛ waa laanee, |scJUDA TENA KOORO|d.
Ŋwɛɛra banɛɛ ba kpaa pɛl dagagra ta ja Yeesu nɛ. Bɛl sagɛ o dig ta, bɛl ge sagɛ o gal ta.
Asɛ waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ "Ba yerɔ wechɔg-ɛɛ" la ɛ kasinteŋ.
Nɛra baa kpɔ bela bɔr baa kaa la chɛgre Yeesu dɛɛ mugli o baah ŋɔ, "Chwa! He nɛn haa pagre Korowii Dea dɛ berɛ kpɔ tɔpera atoro mao laanee nɔ naa?
Lɛ he te dɛ tu harɛ yá na!"
Gɛɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la mugli o baah dɔŋa be dɛ ŋɔ, "Ao! Nɛra gboo o won lɛɛ, kɛ waa won lɛ o te.

He nɛn haa ŋɔa henee Israel tena kooro Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la, le dagagre la doa tu harɛ yá na dɛ won yaradae." Asɛ ŋwɛɛra baa kpaa ba pɛl dagagra ta ja o nɛɛ la gee chɛgro.
Wee aa baa che nyubaah la, bɔr biro jumaa ken dɛ ka tel wekee saŋ mɔɔ bɔr berɛ chaah ja.
Wekee saŋ aa tela la, Yeesu do lɔŋɔ kpegri nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?" O munii kɛŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ Korowii, n Mɛɛ Korowii, ɛrɛɛ he chwa mɛ nɔɔ?"
Nɛra baa chegɛ bela la aa no gɛ la, ba ŋɔ, "Na, Elaejaa wɛɛ yerɛ la!"
Asɛ bɛl chwa dɛ ka kpɔ konjɔgɔjɔgɔ waa won nee lɛɛ ka li sennyɛga ta dɛ kpɔ toh daa ta tɛo ó nyɔ, dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya na, dɛ Elaeja ɛɛ ba leo dagagre nɔ taa yaa?"
Belaa Yeesu do lɔŋɔ kohona, asɛ o doma le o sewɛ.
Asɛ yal waa teŋe Korowii Dea baah ta la pere anɛ le nyundua ba ta harɛ.
Soojare lafa nomoa waa dɛ daah Yeesu aa na gɛ Yeesu hweera aa teŋa la, o nyoa kpoo, asɛ o ŋɔ, "Korowii Biee baa nɔ kpela!"
Dɛ haahna bane ge chegɛ bojaŋ dɛɛ nyiŋi. Ba bini banee Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la, ne Jemsbechala ne Josis nya Mɛɛre, ne Salome.
A gɛ saŋ waa lɔ Galilia harɛ la, dɛ a gɛ haahna nɔɔ daa kondikwaa dɛɛ tɛo. Dɛ haahna bane ba faa teŋɛ o nɛɛ pirim ba Jerusalam la bwa lɔ bela.
Awola tɔpere la taa baa nyin ba kwaa bwa dɛɛ cheg ásɛ dɛ tɔɔ peraa ba di Ona Tɔpere la.

Dɛ Josef waa le Arimatea la ɛ ba bela nomonome la bini nɛn nɛra bwa aa dɛ tɛo duure. O ge dɛ kpa saŋ la Korowii aa di kora dɛ lɛɛ ba la. Awola jɔmɔra la, o lɔ bambile dɛ la Paelet be dɛ ka soŋo ŋɔ ó tɛo ŋwɛnɛ ó ka kpɔ Yeesu lale la.
Asɛ a pigri Paelet kɛŋɔ Yeesu aa dena sewɛ la. Anee o yerɛ soojare lafa nomoa la dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Yeesu sewɔ kpela aa?"
Nomoa la aa sɛah ŋɔ Yeesu sewɔ la, Paelet tɛ Josef ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ ó ka kpɔ o lale la.
Asɛ Josef yawɛ yapoŋ dɛ ka laa Yeesu kpɔ dagagre la doa dɛ kpɔ yapoŋ la fɔrɔwo dɛ hugo. Bwe bɔɔ bɛl baa kwiu kɛŋɔ dea binii ba hugo, dɛ gbili bwe tɔ bɔɔ la nyoa.
Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la ne Josis nya Mɛɛre na bela baa hugo.
Ona Tɔpere la aa gara la, Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la ne Jems nya Mɛɛre ne Salome yawɛ tɛɛga ane a sɔɔh aa soma ŋɔ bá fee kpɔ ka fɔgle Yeesu lale la.
Yawanyoa tɔpelogle chɔɔ ne wee aa dena le la, dɛ ba tel bela baa huge Yeesu la.
Baa dɛ ba la, dɛ ba dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Umee dɛɛ ba bwe la gbila le bɔɔ la nyoa tɛ yaa ɔ?"
Baa ta sie nyiŋi la, dɛ bwejen la gbilo le bɔɔ la nyoa.
Baa jo bɔɔ la bini dɛ bonɔɔ bɛl soge o dig pera, dɛ do wurpoŋ, asɛ ba bwara yɔr.
O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ gel he bwara yɔr," dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt baa kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta la lalee hɛɛ nyin nɔ naa? O toole bonɔ kpa. Waa sewa la, o iro. Hé na bela baa hugo la.
Hé la dɛ ka ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la ne ba dɔŋ Pita be ŋɔ o dɛ tɔ sie kaa Galilia harɛ. Belaa hɛɛ ba o nae gɛ o faa bola la."
Asɛ ba nyoa kpo, ba kpɔ bochela chwa le bɔɔ la bini. Baa dɛ kaa la, dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ, anomanta ba ta wobɛlbwa bolɛ nomɛlbwa be.
Yawanyoa tɔpelogle la ta chɔmbibi ne Yeesu aa ir seo ta la, o tɔ sie kpɔ o te bagle Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la. Yeesu fa doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ anuanɛ gɛ haah nɔ nɛ.
Mɛɛre laŋɔ dɛ ka ŋɔ nɛra ba faa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la be waa la waa naa la. Waa la ba be, dɛ ba koh Yeesu seo la waa dɛɛ ɛ lwe dɛɛ wi siniire mɛrmɛr ken.
Waa ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ Yeesu berɔ ir seo ta dɛ ŋɔ o te nao la, ba ta on yaradae.
A habɔɔ la Yeesu berɔ begre o te dɛ ba ba nɛra banɛ be, dɛ ba le Jerusalam dɛɛ kaa.
Ba ge aa laŋa ka bol ba bala kabora la be la, ba ta yaradae.
A habɔɔ la, o kpɔ o te bagle o habɔteŋra fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la, dɛ ba dɛ di kwa. O pwaah ba ba yarada nyae ne ba bambikpeg la waa kɛŋɔ baa wola ba bala baa tɔ sie nao la yaradae la.
Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé kaa harɛ ta bobɛlbwa dɛ ka bol Amanesoma la bagle nɛwɛnyina bwa.
Nomɛlbwa waa yarada asɛ ba sɔɔ nee la, Korowii ɛɛ kpɔ o wechɔgaa kɛo. Kɛ naate waa wola yaradae la, wɛɛ di bolchɔgee.
Nɛra baa yarada n waa la ɛɛ ɛ wejenaa ásɛ nɛra na dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ n nɛraa ban. Baa dɔ kpegrii dɛ won che n sɔn ta dɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ. Korowii Domadɛɛge ɛɛ ir ba nɛɛ baa bol wobofala.
Dɛ harɛkwaa dom ba aa, wobɛlbwa aa ba ɛɛ ba. Dɛ ba nyɔ tɛgchɔga kwara naa, baa sewa ba. Baa wonoo kpɔ ba nɔɔra dawɛ weela tena nɛɛ bá dɔ bokpega."
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu aa bol waa ba be tonɛ la, Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua, o ka so nomombɔr o dig ta.
Asɛ o habɔteŋra la kaa bobɛlbwa dɛ kaa bol Korowii Waa la. Dɛ Korowii teŋɛ ba nɛɛ asɛ ba we-ɛɛla baa dɛ ɛ la gel nɛra jemɛ kɛŋɔ ba waa baa bola dɛɛ gaage la ɛ kpela.
Nomoa Teɔfelɔs, nɛra warɔ dɛ takapɔ dɛ chwerɛ waa aa chig yabala la bini.
Ba chwerɛ waa baa noa dɛ le nɛra baa kpɔ siwi naa mumpar la, dɛ faa ɛ a toma dɛɛ bol Korowii Waa la be.
Nomoa, n gbagba nyiŋi a gɛ waa nɔ bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛ le mumpar, anomanta n liiro kɛ aa magroo kɛ n chwerɛ dɛ bagle a bini gɛ aa teŋa beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa dɛ tɛɛ,
ásɛ he won jemɛ waa baa bol he be la bini kasinteŋ bwa kɛrɛdɛ.
Gɛ saŋ Hɛrɔd aa ɛ kooro Judia harɛ la, dɛ Sɔfo bɛl lole baa yerɔ Sakaria, asɛ o ɛ Abia be pera Sɔfore la bɛl. Dɛ o haah sɔne Ɛlesabɛt. Dɛ Sɔfore deene la bɛl biee o ge.
Dɛ gɛ nɛra banɛ nɔ bwa ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa aa su Korowii siwi, baa no Korowii wa, dɛɛ teŋɛ a bwa ta kɛrɛdɛ.
Sakaria moo, ba bwa ba hwɛɛh, kɛ dɛ ba ta bie dɔe, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Ɛlesabɛt ɛ hambara.
Awola bɛl Abia be pera Sɔfore toma telo, asɛ Sakaria do Korowii Dea dɛɛ ɛ o Sɔfo toma.
Gɛ Sɔfore yon dɛɛ ɛ la, ba ta chacha mɔɔ dɛ leo ŋɔ ó jo Korowii Dea dɛ ka fuh konsɔɔhsoma.
O jo bela, asɛ nɛnlaa la bwa che buse dɛɛ soŋe Korowii ásɛ o fuh konsɔɔhsoma la tonɛ.
Belaa nyundua torome forɛ le ba Sakaria be Korowii Dea bela dɛ ka che bela waa dɛ fuh konsɔɔhsoma la dig bɔr.
Sakaria aa na nyundua torome la la, a ɛo anebɛlbwa, asɛ ɔmee lawɔ.
Anee nyundua torome la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Sakaria, dɛɛ berɛ ɔma! Korowii no he wesoŋa. He haah Ɛlesabɛt ɛɛ lolɛ bibaalee tɛɛ, asɛ hé pa o sɔn Jɔn.
Dɛ o lolaa, he bambile ɛɛ sɔɔhnee he sie lɛ, nɛra sie lɛ pirim, ba hɛgre.
Wɛɛ ɛ nɛnjen Korowii bee. Waa sen kɛɛ kwaa aa dɛ dɛɛ te bɛlbwa nyɔe ba. Waa lɔ o nya tea bini kwaraa la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la dɛ ba o nɛɛ soga kpegri nɛ.
Wɛɛ geloo Israel tena charɛ ba liire dɛ ba N Naa Korowii be.

Wɛɛ dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge ne kpegrii kɛŋɔ Korowii keame Elaeja ken, dɛ tɔ ya Dɔɔ sie, dɛ gel eehnanar ne ba bii nyoa pɛ, dɛ berɛ deŋnekpeg tena liire ba nɛra ba wa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi ŋwɛnɛ ta. Gɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ nyin nɛra cheg ya Dɔɔ, ásɛ o balaa, ba won lɛo dɛ tomɔ."
Belaa Sakaria bɔɔ nyundua torome la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hé ɛ n jemɛ kɛ gɛ waa nɔ ɛ kpela ɔ? Dɛkalkɛŋɔ n ne n haah bwa hwɛɛhrɔ."
Anee nyundua torome la chaŋo ŋɔ, "Menee Gabreɛl maa dɛ che Korowii sie la. Onee tom mɛ ŋɔ ń ba bol amanesoma nɔ he be.
Kɛ haa wola n waa nɔ yaradae dɛɛ tɔŋ mɛ nomanta, hɛɛ berɛ amumuu dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ waa nɔ bwa aa ɛa dɛ ɛ kpela mɔɔ he won bol wa. Jemɛ kɛŋɔ waa nɔ maa bola nɔ saŋ telaa, a bwa ɛɛ ɛo kɛrɛdɛ ken."
Gɛ saŋ Sakaria aa lɔ Korowii Dea bela la, dɛ nɛra chegɛ buse dɛɛ kpao. A ɛɛ ba nyokpoa kɛ waa bigri bela la.
Waa le Korowii Dea bela dɛ ba buse la, o ta wone bol waa nɛra la be. Anomanta ba nao kɛŋɔ o na komɛl dea bela. Anee gela waa wola won waa bol dɛ ɛ amumu dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra ne nyu dɛɛ bagle waa la.
Sakaria toma aa tonɛ Korowii Dea bela gɛ saŋ la, o kaa o bwɛ.
Waa nɔ habɔɔ la, Sakaria haah Ɛlesabɛt jo tea dɛ kpɔ o te sɔh dem korobie anue.
Ɛlesabɛt chegɛ a gɛ waa nɔ ta, dɛ ŋɔ, "Name te N Naa Korowii laa sihiih kpɔ n sie ta asɛ n won jo nɛra bini."
Ɛlesabɛt tea la korobie numɛl ta la, Korowii nyundua torome baa dɛ yerɔ Gabreɛl la le Korowii be dɛ ba bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Nasarɛt waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta la ta.
Tolo bɛl waa wola baa jemɛ bwa baa yerɔ Mɛɛre bee o ba. Dɛ Mɛɛre dɛ ba baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Josef yala gɛ saŋ. Kooro Devid deaa Josef le.
Nyundua torome la ba Mɛɛre be dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Korowii nɛnnyini, jam. N Naa Korowii chegɛ he habɔɔ."
Waa nyundua torome la aa baa bol Mɛɛre be la ɛo anebɛlbwa, asɛ o lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa nɔɔ?"
Belaa nyundua torome la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ berɛ ɔma, kɛ Korowii tɛɛ hɛɛra.
Hɛɛ kpoŋe tea dɛ lolɛ bibaa asɛ dɛ pa o sɔn Yeesu.
Wɛɛ ɛ nɛnjenii, asɛ baa yerɔ Korowiijen Bie. N Naa Korowii dɛ ba on o naa Devid kora la dɔŋ chega o di.
Wɛɛ ɛ Jekɔb naanar bwa sekwaraa kooro o kora aa wola jaga dɔe."
Anee Mɛɛre ŋɔ nyundua torome la be ŋɔ, "Maa wola baa jemɛ mɔɔ nɔ, ɛrɛɛ waa nɔ ɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won magre ɔ?"
Belaa nyundua torome la ŋɔ, "Korowii Domadɛɛge ɛɛ ba he bee, asɛ Korowii kpegri tɔ he nɛ, asɛ he kpoŋe tea. Anɔ taa aa ba chega bie haa dɛ ba lola la ɛ nɛŋkaih, asɛ baa yerɔ Korowii Bie.
Dɛɛ no! He lole Ɛlesabɛt baa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o hwɛɛhrɔ ŋɔ waa lolɛ la, taraken o jo tea. Korobie anumɛlee nɔ, kɛ o ge fe ɛ hambara.
Na, wobɛlbwa ta Korowii ɛɛ tele."
Anee Mɛɛre ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowiirii dɔɔ mɛ, anomanta ó ɛɛ mɛ gɛ bwa haa ŋɔa nɔ." Asɛ nyundua torome la le Mɛɛre be dɛ kaa.
A gɛ waa nɔ ta la, Mɛɛre iro dɛ kpɔ yɔra chig ŋwɛnɛ ta ka le Judia bwe harɛ bobɛl dɛ kaa Sakaria bwɛ,
dɛ ka jo Sakaria dem dɛ ka chɔɔ Ɛlesabɛt.
Ɛlesabɛt aa no Mɛɛre taa la, anee bie la aa lɔ o tea bini la lɔ kpegri nɛ, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ba so Ɛlesabɛt nɛ.
Belaa o kpɔ takpeg bol waa ŋɔ, "Korowii sweere andɛɛga gwaa haahna bwa, dɛ swee he bie waa lɔ he tea bini la ge andɛɛga.
N gee umeo n Dɔɔ nya ɛɛ ba ba chɔɔ mɛ nɔɔ?
Bug la ta he wobol aa chole n deŋna ta la, bie waa lɔ n tea bini la den kpɔ silɛɛ ne hɛgra dɛ lɔ.
He na som kɛ haa no n Naa Korowii wobol dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ gɛ waa la ɛɛ ɛo nɔ."
Anee Mɛɛre ŋɔ, "N dɛ kpɛɛ Korowii n bambile bwa ne.
N sie lɛ Korowii waa lɛɛ mɛ la nɛ.
O nyiŋi n ge maga nɔ dɔŋ maa ɛ nɛŋgwɛgre nɔ nɛ, dɛ gel nomɛlbwa ɛɛ ba taraken lee dɛɛ bol n waa ŋɔ n na som,
dɛkalkɛ Korowiijen ɛ wejena tɛ mɛ. O chɛ duura.
Nɛra te bwa baa dɛ ɔmɔ la, o dɛ na ba sum, dɛɛ na ba biirere sum, dɛɛ na ba ge biirere ne ba naanar bwa sum.
O chagle o kpegri dɛ doŋi nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te nɛnjena la ba pegre.
O ir kpegnɛra ba kora ta, dɛ gɔɔ nɛŋgwɛgra baa di kpegri.
O tɛ nyaara kondɛɛga ba di, dɛ doŋi dɔɔhna ba kpɔ nɔŋgbagla kaa.
O lii nyobaga waa bagɛ ya naanar la, dɛ lawɛ o Israel tena bini kpoŋe wobɛlbwa ta, dɛɛ sune ba nɛ
gɛ tenten waa bagɛ Abraham ne o naanar kɛ wɛɛ na ba sumii saŋ bɛlbwa la."
Belaa Mɛɛre so Ɛlesabɛt be dɛ ɛ korobie atoro mɔɔ dɛ kaa o bwɛ.
Ɛlesabɛt lola aa tela la, o lolɛ bibaa.
O nɛra ne o bala aa no gɛ Korowii aa na o sum dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga tɛo la, o ne ba bwa sie lɛo.
Bie la aa dɔ yawanyoa la, ba balɔ ŋɔ ba ba teŋe o pen, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin ba kpɔ o mɛɛ Sakaria sɔn pao.
Anee o nya Ɛlesabɛt ŋɔ, "Akai! A chɛ kɛ ya pao Jɔn!"
Belaa ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Aah, he lole bɛlbwa ta gɛ sɔn nɔ dii yɔ!"
Asɛ ba kpɔ nɔɔra dɛ bagle waa Sakaria be, dɛ bɔɔro sɔn waa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ba kpɔ pa o bie la.
Belaa Sakaria gel ba nyin dapɛga tɛo, asɛ o chwerɛ o ta dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ, "Bie la sɔne Jɔn." Nɛra baa lɔ bela la ŋɔ ba ta nyokpowaa nɔ dɔŋa nae bwa.
Bug la ta la, Sakaria o faa wola won bol waa la nyoa chaarɔ, o won bol wa, dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ waa ɛ wejena tɛo la.
Belaa ɔmee lawɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa, asɛ ba kpɔ gɛ waa nɔ perɛ Judia bwe harɛ bwɛɛre la bwa ta.
Nomɛlbwa waa no waa nɔ la, o liira o nyu bini ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ gɛ bie nɔ ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?" Ba nao kɛŋɔ Korowii teŋɛ bie la nɛ.
Jɔn mɛɛ Sakaria ge la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la baa so o nɛ, asɛ o won bol waa aa dɛ ba bala kerekere, dɛ ŋɔ,
"Hé gel ya jam Israel tena Korowii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o cha o nɛra dɛ lɛ ya le wahala ta.
O tɛ yaa nɛnjen o le o bonɔɔ Devid dea dɛ ŋɔ ó ba lɛ yaa.
O chegɛ o keamere la nɛɛ dɛ bol wubwa
ŋɔ wɛɛ lɛ yaa le ya dɔma ne nɛra baa hah yaa bwa sekwaraa nɔn taa,
dɛ na ya sum gɛ waa bagɛ ya naanar nyoa la, dɛ lii o fɔo o ne baa fɔwa la.
O ne ya naa Abrahamee fɔwɛ fɔo la, asɛ o ŋwɛɛ ntam baglo
kɛŋɔ wɛɛ lɛ yaa le ya dɔma nɔn taa ásɛ ya tomɔ yaa wola ɔmɛ,
ásɛ ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga ne nɛŋkaihre o sie ya soga bini bwa."
Anee Sakaria bol waa o bie la be ŋɔ, "N bie, baa yerɛɛ Korowiijen keamee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ hɛɛ tɔ ya Dɔɔ siee dɛ kwaa bɔr tɛo ásɛ o ba,
ásɛ dɛ ŋɔ o nɛra be ŋɔ, dɛ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta naa, wɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛ ba dɛ lɛɛ ba.
N Naa Korowii tea aa dɛ domɛ nɛn nɛɛ kohona nomanta, wɛɛ geloo o wee ɛɛ chaah yaa,
asɛ dɛ chaah ya banɔ la yaa lɔ biro ta dɛɛ ɔmɛ seo la, dɛ chagle yaa deŋnesɔɔhna ŋwɛnɛ."
Kenii a do asɛ Jɔn kpeg, dɛ dɔ nomonliire. O soge pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ tɔpere waa pa o toma mun Israel tena bini aa tela.
A gɛ saŋ la Room koojen bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ɔgɛstas la do mmara ŋɔ bá kure nɛra baa lɔ harɛ bobɛlbwa.
A gɛ nɛra kura nɔɔ tɔ sie. Dɛ Kwiriniosii dɛɛ nyiŋi Siiria harɛ ta a gɛ saŋ.
Anomanta dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ kaa o bwɛɛ dɛ́ ka chwerɛ o sɔn.
Anee Josef le Nasarɛt waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta la, dɛ chig ŋwɛnɛ ta kaa Bɛtlɛham waa ɛ Devid bwɛɛ dɛ do Judia harɛ ta la dɛ́ ka chwerɛ o sɔn, dɛkalkɛŋɔ belaa ɛ o naa Devid bwɛ.
Josef ne Mɛɛre ba bwa nɛra aa sɛah ŋɔ ba so la bwaa la Bɛtlɛham sɔna chwera la ta. Dɛ Mɛɛre kpoŋe tea gɛ saŋ.
Baa lɔ bela la, lol lɔɔ,
asɛ o lolɛ o binyoa, o ɛ bibaa. O kpɔ yal fɔrɔwo dɛ kpɔɔ bil kon jagre aa dɛ di kwaa o bini la bini, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ bɔr toole bela hɔɔhra aa dɛ chɔ bwɛɛ la ta la kwara bá chɔ.
A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ petegra bane tegɛ ba peera kaa dibɔr, asɛ bɔr jo, asɛ ba chɔ bela dɛɛ daah ba peera la.
Belaa nyundua torome bɛl forɛ le ba nɛ, asɛ Korowii jirima chaah bela. Ɔmee lag ba taeh.
Anee nyundua torome la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ berɛ ɔma! Amanesoma aa dɛ ba silɛɛ ne bala ba tɛ nɛra bwa la nee n ba.
Jwaana nɔ ne, ba lolɛ he Lɛɛ. He Dɔɔ Kristo Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ heyaa laanee ba lole Devid bwɛɛ la.
Waa haa che a ta jemɔ laanee nɔ: Hɛɛ na bie laanee kɛŋɔ baa kpɔ yal fɔrɔwo o chɔ kon jagre aa dɛ di kwaa o bini la bini."
Bug la ta dɛ nyundua toroma bane denɔ warɛ dɛ ja onɔ la nɛ, dɛ go yela dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii, dɛɛ ŋɔ,
"Hé tɛ Korowii waa lɔ nyundua la sɔn, asɛ dɛ gel nɛwɛnyina baa lɔ harɛ ta Korowii siwi aa su ba la ge dɔ bosɔɔhna."
Nyundua toroma la aa le petegra la be dɛ kaa nyundua la, ba ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya la Bɛtlɛham dɛ ka na waa aa chig bela asɛ N Naa Korowii che nyundua toroma nɔ nɛɛ dɛ ba bol ya be nɔ."
Ba chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ la bela warane, dɛ ka na Mɛɛre ne Josef, dɛ na bie la ge kɛ waa chɔ kon jagre aa dɛ di kwaa o bini la bini.
Belaa petegra la aa na bie la la, ba bol nɛra baa cheme bela la be gɛ nyundua torome la aa baa bol bie la waa ba be la.
Nɛra baa cheme bela aa no waa nɔ la, ba bwa nyoa kpo waa petegra la aa bola la ta.
Asɛ Mɛɛre kpɔ waa la bwa do o nyu bini dɛɛ kari.
Petegra la berɔ dɛɛ kaa. Gɛ nyundua torome la aa bol ba be la tentenee ba ka na. Anomanta ba go yela dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
Bie la aa dɔ yawanyoa la, ba kpɔ kere chɔgɔ, dɛ pa o sɔn Yeesu, gɛ tenten nyundua torome la aa ŋɔa mɔɔ o nya kpoŋe o tea la.
Tɔpere aa tela kɛŋɔ Mɛɛre sɔ o lola doŋa ta gɛ Mosis Mmara la aa bagla la, o ne Josef kpɔ ba bie Yeesu ja ba nɛɛ dɛ la Korowii Dea Jerusalam dɛ́ kpɔɔ ka bagle Korowii,
gɛ Mmara la aa bagla kɛ bie baa tɔ sie lolɔ o ɛ bibaa la, bá kpɔɔ tɛ Korowii la.
Ba laŋɔ asɛ dɛ ka ɛ saraha tɛ Korowii gɛ Mmara la aa bagla ŋɔ bá kpɔ brɔnomare anɛ kɛɛ kulukukure anɛ la Korowii Dea dɛ ka jaamo la.
A gɛ saŋ la dɛ baa bɛl lɔ Jerusalam baa yerɔ Semeɔn. O ɛ nɛndɛɛge, dɛɛ ɔmɛ Korowii, dɛ o dɛ nyiŋi naate waa dɛ ba ó ba lɛ Israel tena ŋwɛnɛ. Dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ir o nɛ,
dɛ gel o jemɛ kɛŋɔ o siwi ɛɛ na Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ Israel tena la mɔɔ dɛ sewɛ.
Awola la Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpɔ Semeɔn kaa Korowii Dea, asɛ Josef ne Mɛɛre ge kpɔ Yeesu la bela ásɛ ba ɛo ba we-ɛɛla gɛ Mmara la aa bagla la.
Baa joa la, Semeɔn kaa kpɔ Yeesu pɛl o bambile dɛ jam Korowii dɛ kpɛɛro,
dɛ ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii, he teŋɛ he nyobaga ta. Name te hɛɛ wonoo gel men maa ɛ he bonɔɔ sewɛ sɔnɔnɔɔ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ n siwi na ya Lɛɛ,
haa leo tɛ yaa ŋɔ nɛ́ra bwa nao la.
On dɛɛ ba he waa kpɔe dɛ bagle nɛnhɔɔhra, ásɛ he nɛra Israel tena dɔ jirima la."
Gɛ Semeɔn aa bol Yeesu waa la kpo Yeesu nya ne o mɛɛ nyoa.
Semeɔn soŋe wedɛɛga tɛ Yeesu nya ne o mɛɛ, dɛ ŋɔ o nya be ŋɔ, "Hé no waa nɔ! Bie nɔ chegɔ tɛ Israel tena bane kwaara ne bane chɔga. Wɛɛ berɔɔ che tɛ Korowii, asɛ nɛra bol waa yagɔ,
asɛ nomɛlbwa bambile bini waa chɔ baŋ. Gɛ baa dɛ ba o ɛɛ la, aa we he nɛɛ kɛŋɔ baa kpɔ kere dɛɛ tɔge he bambile ken."

A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ luhaah bɛl lole dɛ ɛ Korowii keame, baa yerɔ Hana. Dɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Fanoɛl la bihaahnee on, asɛ o le Aasa dea. Dɛ o hwɛɛhrɔ. O yalɔ o toli saŋ, o ne o jaa so bene anuanɛ asɛ o jaa la ba sewɛ.
O ta yalɛ kpa, dɛ ba di bene fifranuatoro dɛ anaarɛ. O ta o Korowii toma kpɔe bil harɛ. Chɔɔ ne jwaana dɛ o lɔ Korowii Dea, dɛ yon dɛɛ vɔwɛ nyoa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii.

Bug la ta Yeesu nya ne o mɛɛ aa lɔ Korowii Dea la, Hana ge jo bela dɛ ka che ba jwɛh, dɛ kpɔ jam ne kpɛɛra tɛ Korowii, dɛ bol Yeesu waa bagle nɛra baa soga dɛɛ kpa Korowii kɛ ó ba lɛ Jerusalam tena ta la.
Josef ne Mɛɛre aa tona gɛ Korowii Mmara la aa bagla la, ba berɔ kaa ba bwɛɛ Nasarɛt waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta la.
Yeesu kpego, dɛ do kpegri, dɛ dɔ liire, asɛ Korowii chao wɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga.
Bena nyoa bɛlbwaa Yeesu nya ne o mɛɛ la Jerusalam dɛ kaa di ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la.
Gɛ saŋ Yeesu aa di bene fi dɛ anɛ la, o ne o nya ne o mɛɛ la Jerusalam dɛ ka di a gɛ tɔpere la, gɛ ba yon dɛɛ ɛ wubwa la.
Baa di tɔpere la tonɛ dɛ berɛ dɛɛ kaa ba bwɛɛ la, Yeesu pere o te le ba nɛ, dɛ ka mun so Jerusalam, dɛ o nya ne mɛɛ ta jemɛ.
Dɛ ba dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o lɔ nɛra baa pɛa dɛɛ kaa la bini. Anomanta ba valɔ tɔpebir mɔɔ dɛ ta kaa nyin o bɔr ba lolanar ne ba jerema be.
Baa nyin o bɔr kahonɛ la, ba berɔ la Jerusalam dɛ kaa gaage o bɔr.
A tɔpetooro wee la, ba kaa nao Korowii Dea, dɛ o ne Juda tena baa dɛ bagle Korowii waa sogo, wɛɛ no ba wa, dɛɛ bɔɔ ba wa.
Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛɛ no waa la bwa nyoa kpo gɛ waa jemɛ waa kohona, ne gɛ baa dɛ bɔɔro waa asɛ o won dɛɛ bagle a bini kɛrɛdɛ la ta.
O nya ne o mɛɛ aa nao la, ba nyoa kpoo, anee o nya bɔɔro ŋɔ, "N bidɛɛge, bɔkwa waa he ɛ yaa ken? N ne he mɛɛ bwa siwi swɛɛrɔ, ya kpɔ sibegra dɛɛ gaage he bɔr."
Belaa o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he gaage dɛɛ nyin n bɔr nɔɔ? He ta wone jemɛ kɛŋɔ n Mɛɛ Korowii deemii n do kɛɛ?"
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba ta a mun noɛ.
Belaa Yeesu ir ba chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ kaa Nasarɛt. Waa lɔ o nya ne o mɛɛ be la, dɛ o dɛ no ba deŋna wa. O nya kpɔ waa la bwa do o nyu bini dɛɛ kara.
Dɛ Yeesu dɛ kpeg dɛɛ jemɛ wa, asɛ o we-ɛɛla ɛɛ lɛ Korowii ne nɛra sie.

Gɛ saŋ Siisa Tibeereɔs aa di Room kora bene fi dɛ anue la, dɛ Pɔnteɔs Paelet ɛ Judia harɛ nomoa, asɛ Hɛrɔd ɛ Galilia harɛ kooro, asɛ o dɔɔ Felep ɛ Ituria ne Trakonaetes kooro. Dɛ Laiseenias ɛ Abilini kooro,
asɛ Anas ne Kaefas ɛ Sɔfonomonome Jerusalam. Gɛ saŋee Korowii kpɔ o waa do Jɔn waa ɛ Sakaria bie la nyoa pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ ta la,
asɛ o ir dɛ bol Korowii Waa la bwɛɛre aa bar Jɔɔdan Moo la bwa ta dɛɛ ŋɔ nómɛlbwa charɛ o liire dɛ le o wechɔga ta ásɛ ba sɔɔ Korowii nee ásɛ Korowii kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo.
Gɛ waa nɔɔ Korowii keame Aesaya chwerɛ o tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Nomɛl dɛ bol waa takpeg ne pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta dɛ ŋɔ nɛ́ra gel ba we-ɛɛla togre, dɛ kpɔ ba te dɛɛ kpa ba Dɔɔ bala.
Fɛlembɔɔ te bɛlbwa chɛ kɛŋɔ he tɔɔ, dɛ bur deŋgare ne bwe te bɛlbwa. Ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa waa gola la chɛ kɛŋɔ he togro, dɛ kwaa ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa bɔɔne bɔɔnere aa lɔ o ta ó chɔ kpantalaŋ.
Nɛwɛnyina bwa ɛɛ nao gɛ lɛɛ Korowii aa dɛ ba yaa lɛɛ la aa doa."
Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ nɛra baa lea ba o be ŋɔ ó sɔ ba nee la be ŋɔ, "Nɛnchɔga kɛŋɔ harɛkwaa baa do nii kpɔg ta asɛ a le dɛ chwa dɛɛ kaa! Umee ŋɔ he be ŋɔ hɛɛ wonoo chwa le Korowii bandia ta nɔ?

Hɛ́ɛ ɛ waa aa dɛ chagle kɛŋɔ he charɛ he liire le he wechɔga ta kpela. He bɛ he hwɛga kpɔ do Abraham nɛɛ kɛ o ɛ he nabaa nomanta hɛɛ wonoo chwa Korowii bandia. Hé gel n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, Korowii ɛɛ wonoo gel bwea nɔ begre Abraham naanar.
He do kɛŋɔ daa. Daa bɛlbwa waa wola nɔndɛɛga nɔnɛ la, baa teŋo ta dɛ fuuh. Gɛɛ Korowii ge gɔɔ o kpanfɛ nɛra baa wola ba liire charɛ la nɛɛ dɛɛ ba ba teŋna ta, dɛ kpɔ ba do nii ta ba fuh."
Anee nɛnlaa la aa baro cheme la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Aah, ɛrɛɛ yá ɛɔ?"
Asɛ o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ batakaani bele anɛ la, ó kpɔ bɛl tɛ nɛn waa wola bɛl dɔe kwaraa, asɛ nomɛlbwa o ge aa dɔ kondikwaa dɛ́ di la ge ɛ gɛ tenten."
Belaa lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ apoo bane ba ŋɔ ó sɔ ba Korowii ne, dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ ya ɛɔ?"
Anee o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He bɛ suuga lɛ dɛɛ gwaa gɛ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ lɛ."

Soojare bane ge ba o be dɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Asɛ ya ge sɛh? Ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ ya gee ɛɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ ba ge be ŋɔ, "He bɛ nɛra ɛgre dɛɛ lɛ suuga ba be, dɛ bɛ nomɛlbwa ge suuga lɛ dɛ tɔ o wechɔga ta. Hé gel he kembɔa ɛɛ su he siwi."
Nɛnlaa la hɛgra den ir waa aa dɛ ba bala la ta, baa lii ba nyu bini kɛŋɔ Jɔn kenii Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la.
Anomanta Jɔn ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nee tenten nee mɛɛ sɔ heya. Kɛ nomɛl ta dɛ ba dɛ gwaa mɛ, maa wola o napaa teera kwaraa dɔ. O te, Korowii Domadɛɛge ne nii nee wɛɛ ba heyaa sɔe.
O do kɛŋɔ paa waa chegɛ o pɛla ta dɛ kpɔ o te dɛɛ ba kwaa pala. Wɛɛ palɛ a bwaa kɛrɛdɛ ken, asɛ dɛ pa do kon ta ka cheg. Kɛ a pɛga la te, wɛɛ kpɔ nii aa wola dime bwaa fuah."
Waa Jɔn aa bola dɛ kpɔ ja nɛra dɛ gel baa no Amanesoma la te ta nyoa dɔe.
Jɔn ŋɔ Galilia kooro Hɛrɔd be ŋɔ moe waa mo o nime haah Hɛrɔdeas la, ne wechɔga bwa waa ɛa ja la ta magrɛ.
Gɛ waa nɔ Jɔn aa bol o be la nomanta, o gelɔ ba lawɔ do dea dɛ den do anam kwara.
Gɛ saŋ Jɔn faa dɛ sɔ nɛra la bwa Korowii nee la, o sɔ Yeesu ge. Yeesu nee sɔe ta, waa dɛ soŋe Korowii la, nyundua pilo,
asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la tu ba o nɛɛ dɛ do kɛŋɔ brɔnoma, asɛ ba no taa bɛl nyundua kɛŋɔ, "Henee n bie maa dɛ nyin he wa, he waa ɛɛ su n siwi."

Gɛ saŋ Yeesu aa pa mun dɛɛ ɛ o toma la, dɛ o di bene dɛ ɛ fifraatoro, dɛ nɛra dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Josef biee. Josef ge mɛɛɛ Heli, Heli ge mɛɛɛ Matat, Matat ge mɛɛɛ Lewi, Lewi ge mɛɛɛ Mɛlke, Mɛlke ge mɛɛɛ Janai, asɛ Janai la ge mɛɛɛ Josef. Josef ge mɛɛɛ Matateas, Matateas ge mɛɛɛ Emɔs, Emɔs ge mɛɛɛ Neehum, Neehum ge mɛɛɛ Esli, Esli ge mɛɛɛ Nagae, asɛ Nagae la ge mɛɛɛ Maat. Maat ge mɛɛɛ Matateas, Matateas ge mɛɛɛ Semein, Semein ge mɛɛɛ Josek, Josek ge mɛɛɛ Jɔda, Jɔda ge mɛɛɛ Jɔhanan, asɛ Jɔhanan la ge mɛɛɛ Risa. Risa ge mɛɛɛ Sɛrubabɛl, Sɛrubabɛl ge mɛɛɛ Sealteɛl, Sealteɛl ge mɛɛɛ Nɛre, Nɛre ge mɛɛɛ Mɛlke, Mɛlke ge mɛɛɛ Adi, asɛ Adi la ge mɛɛɛ Kosam. Kosam ge mɛɛɛ Elmadam, Elmadam ge mɛɛɛ Er, Er ge mɛɛɛ Josua, Josua ge mɛɛɛ Eliesa, Eliesa ge mɛɛɛ Jorim, asɛ Jorim la ge mɛɛɛ Matat. Matat ge mɛɛɛ Lewi, Lewi ge mɛɛɛ Semeɔn, Semeɔn ge mɛɛɛ Judas, Judas ge mɛɛɛ Josef, Josef ge mɛɛɛ Jonam, asɛ Jonam la ge mɛɛɛ Eliakim. Eliakim ge mɛɛɛ Mɛlea, Mɛlea ge mɛɛɛ Mɛna, Mɛna ge mɛɛɛ Matata, Matata ge mɛɛɛ Netan, Netan ge mɛɛɛ Devid, asɛ Devid la ge mɛɛɛ Jese. Jese ge mɛɛɛ Obɛd, Obɛd ge mɛɛɛ Boas, Boas ge mɛɛɛ Sala, Sala ge mɛɛɛ Naasɔn, Naasɔn ge mɛɛɛ Aminadab, asɛ Aminadab la ge mɛɛɛ Admin. Admin ge mɛɛɛ Aani, Aani ge mɛɛɛ Hɛsrɔn, Hɛsrɔn ge mɛɛɛ Pɛrɛs, Pɛrɛs ge mɛɛɛ Juda, Juda ge mɛɛɛ Jekɔb, asɛ Jekɔb la ge mɛɛɛ Aesek. Aesek ge mɛɛɛ Abraham, Abraham ge mɛɛɛ Tɛɛra, Tɛɛra ge mɛɛɛ Neehɔ, Neehɔ ge mɛɛɛ Sɛrɔg, Sɛrɔg ge mɛɛɛ Reu, asɛ Reu la ge mɛɛɛ Pɛlɛg. Pɛlɛg ge mɛɛɛ Iba, Iba ge mɛɛɛ Sala, Sala ge mɛɛɛ Keinan, Keinan ge mɛɛɛ Afaksad, Afaksad ge mɛɛɛ Sɛm, asɛ Sɛm la ge mɛɛɛ Nowa. Nowa ge mɛɛɛ Lamɛk, Lamɛk ge mɛɛɛ Mɛtusala, Mɛtusala ge mɛɛɛ Inɔk, Inɔk ge mɛɛɛ Jarɛd, Jarɛd ge mɛɛɛ Mahalalel, asɛ Mahalalel la ge mɛɛɛ Keinan. Keinan ge mɛɛɛ Enos, Enos ge mɛɛɛ Sɛt, Sɛt ge mɛɛɛ Adam, asɛ Korowiirii ge ta Adam.
Yeesu aa le o Korowii nee sɔe la bɔr dɛɛ kaa dem la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir o nɛ, dɛ kpɔɔ kaa pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta, asɛ o ka do bela tɔpera fifraanaarɛ.
Asɛ Bɔnsam ka daahno na a gɛ tɔpera nɔ ta. Dɛ waa komɛlbwa di, anomanta a habɔɔ la, dɛ lɔr lawɔ.
Bela la, Bɔnsam ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ henee Korowii Bie la kpela aa, gel bwe nɔ berɛ paanoo hé di."
Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Kondikwaa gbo laa dɛɛ tɛ nɛn mkpa.' "
Asɛ Bɔnsam berɛ kpɔɔ ka cheg bobɛl kɛŋɔ bwejeŋ bɛl doa ken, dɛ ka kpɔ harɛ nɔ bobɛlbwa baa dɛ di kora gale o sie ta,
dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he kpɔ duure tɛ mɛ naa, mɛɛ kpɔ a kpegri ne a kondɔɔh bwaa tɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a bwa sekwaraa lɔ n nɔn ta. Nɛn maa dɛ nyin laanee ń kpɔ dɛɛ tɛ.
Dɛ he kpɔ duure tɛ mɛ naa, a bwa dɛ ba he kwaa ɛɛ, he di a kpegri."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Dɛɛ duu N Naa Korowii dɛɛ tomɛ o gbo.' "
Belaa Bɔnsam kpɔɔ kaa Jerusalam, dɛ kpɔɔ ka cheg Korowii Dea nyundujagla, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ henee Korowii Bie la kpela aa, che bonɔ dɛ jah le harɛ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Korowii ɛɛ geloo o nyundua toroma ɛɛ nyiŋi he nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
Baa lawɛɛ haa wola nakpala kwaraa lɔ.' "
Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, 'Bɛ N Naa Korowii daah na.' "
Bɔnsam aa daah Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta kɛ ó fe ɛ wechɔga dɛ kahonɛ la, o gelo dɛ kaa tama mɔɔ.
Dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri lɔ Yeesu nɛ, asɛ o berɛ la Galilia harɛ. Belaa o waa perɛ baah bela bwɛɛre la bwa ta.
O la ba cheremi deene bini dɛ ka bol Korowii Waa nɛra be, ba bwa kpɛɛro.
Asɛ o ba Nasarɛt bela baa dɛɛro la asɛ, gɛ o yon dɛɛ ɛ Ona Tɔpere bɛlbwa la, o la cheremi dea, dɛ ir che ŋɔ o kure Korowii Tɔn la.
Asɛ ba kpɔ Korowii keame Aesaya tɔn la ba do o nɔn ta. O pili tɔn la, dɛ na bela baa chwera ŋɔ,

"Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir n nɛ, dɛ lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ba bol amanesoma bagle nyaara, dɛ ŋɔ nɛra baa do ba dea la be ŋɔ ba Lɛɛ balɔ, dɛ gel nyoŋa sibie pili ba won dɛɛ na, dɛ lɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa la ba dɔma nɔn ta,
asɛ dɛ gel nɛra bwa jemɛ kɛ tɔpere ya Dɔɔ aa dɛ ba o nɛra lɛɛ la telo."
Yeesu kure tɔn la tonɛ dɛ laa tɔ, dɛ kpɔ do nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi cheremi dea bela la nɔn ta, dɛ so harɛ. Asɛ nɛra baa lɔ cheremi dea bela la bwa kpɔ sie pa o nɛɛ dɛɛ nyiŋu fuuu ken.
O berɔ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Fini, waa haa noa le Korowii Tɔn bini nɔ chigo gɛ Korowii aa bola ŋɔ aa ɛo la."
Belaa nɛra la bwa kpɛɛro. Ba nyoa kpo gɛ o nyoa ne wobol aa soma la, asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Josef bie la laa nɔ naa?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N jemɔ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ sɛg mɛɛ ŋɔ, 'Tɛɛga te, chah he te. Gɛ yaa noa kɛ he ɛ Kapeeneɔm la, ɛ ane he gbagba bwɛɛ bonɔ ge.' "
Dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be kɛ Korowii keame ta sɔn dɔe o gbagba bwɛ.
Gɛ saŋ Korowii keame Elaeja faa lole hwel che bene atoro korobie anumɛl bwaala aa wola nɛ asɛ lɔr chole harɛ la bwa ta la, dɛ luhaahna warɔ dɛ do Israel tena bini,
kɛ Korowii ta Elaeja tomɛ ba bini bɛlbwa be. Luhaah bɛl waa lɔ Sidon harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa yerɔ Sarɛpta la gbo bee o tomɔ.
Gɛ saŋ Korowii keame Elaesa faa lole la, dɛ Israel tena weechɔga ane aa chɔg ba bwadabii warɔ. Kɛ o ta ba bɛlbwa chaeh. Siiria harɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Naaman la gboo o chah."
Nɛra baa lɔ cheremi dea bela la aa no waa nɔ la, dɛ bwaawee lag ba.
Dɛ ba bwɛɛ la chɔŋɛ bwe ta. Ba iro dɛ tɛgre Yeesu le bwɛɛ la ta, dɛ kpɔɔ ka che bwe la doa bobɛl waa wila su, dɛ fee tagɔ ta, ásɛ o nyu ba yagɛ harɛ.
Anee o valɛ jo nɛra la baah dɛ valɛ o tetoora kaa.
Yeesu la Galilia harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kapeeneɔm la ta, dɛ kaa bag ba Korowii Waa Ona Tɔpera ta,
asɛ gɛ waa dɛ bagle Korowii Waa la ɛ ba bwa nyokpoa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ bol waa kpegri ne.
Cheremi dea bela la, dɛ baa bɛl lɔ bela, kwaa ɛɛ ir o nɛ, asɛ o do lɔŋɔ ŋɔ,
"Aa! Yeesu Nasarɛt te, bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin ya be nɔ? Ya chɔgaa he ba kɛɛ? N jemɛ he nɛnsoo. Henee Korowii bikaih la waa ŋɔa ŋɔ o dɛ ba bala la."
Anee Yeesu kɔr kwaa la aa lɔ baa la nɛɛ la ŋɔ, "Hé tɔ nyoa dɛ le o nɛ!" Belaa a lɔ baa la bil nɛra la siwi ta. A ta on wobɛlbwa ɛɛ, dɛ le o nɛɛ dɛ kaa.
Nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa nyoa kpoo, ba ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa nɔɔ! Hé na gɛ baa nɔ aa kpɔ kpegri bol waa bagle kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ asɛ a kaa!"
Anomanta Yeesu waa perɛ baah bela bwɛɛre la bwa ta.
Yeesu le cheremi dea bela dɛ la Seemɔn dem, dɛ Seemɔn helahaah bwara wɔrɔbɔ tenten, asɛ ba bol o waa Yeesu be ŋɔ ó chaoh.
Belaa o la weela te la be o chɔɔbɔr, dɛ ka che o jwɛh, dɛ kɔr o weela la, asɛ a le o nɛ, o dɔ bokpega bug la ta dɛ nyiŋ ba.
Wee aa dɛ jo la, nɛra baa dɔ chamenetena baa we weela bwa soosiwi la kpɔ ba ba Yeesu be, asɛ o kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ chah ba bwa sekwaraa.

Kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ la le ba nɛɛ pirim. Aa dɛ le dɛ a dɛ dooge lɔŋɔre dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Henee Korowii Bie la!" Yeesu kah kwaa la, o ta gelɛ a bol wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a jemɔ kɛŋɔ onee Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ o nɛra la.
Bɔr aa dɛ chaah la, Yeesu le bwɛɛ la ta dɛ ka so bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole. Dɛ nɛra iro dɛɛ nyin o bɔr. Baa nao la, ba ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ kɛ o kaa bobɛlbwa, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ bá ne o so.
Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛŋɔ n bol Korowii Kora Amanesoma la bwɛɛre ane ge ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ anee Korowii tom mɛ ŋɔ ń ba ɛ."
Anomanta o valɔ dɛɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛɛ bagle nɛra cheremi deene bini Judia harɛ bwa.
Awola bɛl dɛ Yeesu chegɛ Gɛnɛsarɛt Moo la nyoa, asɛ nɛnlaa bane ba baro cheme, dɛ tagɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ ba o be dɛ́ ba no Korowii Waa waa dɛ bol la.
Yeesu na gbeni anɛ ane nɛra bane baa dɛ ɛ nee toma aa lawa vɔwɛ dɛ le kaa chɛgɛ ba asauri.
Belaa o ka jo gbera la bɛl bini. Dɛ Seemɔn konee. O ŋɔ Seemɔn be ŋɔ ó tagɛ gbera la do tama. Anee o tagɛ do tama, asɛ Yeesu so o bini dɛ bol waa bagle nɛnlaa la.
Waa bol waa bagle nɛra la tonɛ la, o ŋɔ Seemɔn be ŋɔ, "Hé ne he bala la pa he asauri la do gbera nɔ bini dɛ ɛgɛ do baah ta dɛ ka ta."
Anee Seemɔn ŋɔ, "E! N Dɔɔ, jwaana ne bwaa ya le ta asauri nɔ, ya ta komɛlbwa dɔe. Kɛ haa dɔa ŋɔ gɛ nɔ te naa, mɛɛ geloo ya ka ta."
Baa tagɛ gbera la do nebaah ta la, ba kaa ta asau la bɔle pɛŋedamanta ane nɛ, asɛ wɛɛ ba kɛɛra.
Anomanta ba laa nɔn ir ba bala bane ba ne baa dɛ ɛ tonsiwi beŋkpoŋ dɛ do gbera bɛl bini la ŋɔ bá ba, asɛ ba ba dɛ ba cha ba, dɛ tɛgre pɛŋa la do gbeni anɛ la bwa bini a su dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin dɛ morɛ.
Seemɔn Pita aa na a gɛ waa nɔ la, o kaa guŋi Yeesu sie dɛ ŋɔ, "Oo, n Dɔɔ, wechɔg-ɛɛree men! N poori, le n be."
Pɛŋedamanta Seemɔn ne nɛra baa ja o nɛɛ la aa dɔa la ɛ ba bwa nyokpoa.

Gɛ tentenee a ɛ ba bala Sebedii bii Jɔn ne Jems la nyokpoa. Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ Seemɔn be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ berɛ ɔma. Le fini dɛɛ kaa, hɛɛ gel pɛŋa nyinaa dɛ baa teŋɛ n nɛ, asɛ n bagle heyaa gɛ baa nyin nɛra baa tɛ Korowii."
Baa tawɛ ba gbeni la ba chuge dɛ lawa vɔrɔwe la, ba gel wobɛlbwa dɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
Awola bɛl dɛ Yeesu lɔ bwɛɛ bɛl ta, dɛ baa bɛl lɔ bela asɛ weechɔga ɛ o bwara bwa. Waa na Yeesu la, o baa guŋi o sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, dɛ he sɛoh ŋɔ hɛɛ chaah mɛɛ yaa, hɛɛ wonoo gel n bwara kwaa."
Anee Yeesu tɛr nɔn lego, dɛ ŋɔ, "N sɛoh. He bwara kwaarɔ." Bug la ta dɛ o weela la denɔ le o nɛ, o bwara kwaa.
Asɛ Yeesu kaoh ŋɔ, "Bɛ nomɛlbwa be ŋɔ, kɛ la Sɔfo be ó ka pɛne, asɛ hé kpɔ kwaa ka tɛo ó kpo, gɛ Mosis aa bagla la, ásɛ nɛra bwa na dɛ jemɛ kɛ he weela la toole he nɛɛ kpa."
Waa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ o bɛ nomɛlbwa be ŋɔ la, name tenee a ɛ anam. Yeesu waa perɔ kohona, asɛ nɛra ɛɛ ba o be pirim dɛ́ baa no o waa la, wɛɛ chah ba weela.
Dɛ ba dɛ ba o be gɛ naa, gɛɛ o yon laa o te kpɔ ba bini dɛ kaa bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole dɛ kaa soŋe Korowii.

Awola bɛl dɛ Yeesu dɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Wa, asɛ Farisii tena bane ne Tɔn Jerema baa le Galilia harɛ ne Judia harɛ bwɛɛre la bwa ta ne Jerusalam ba dɛ ba so bela, dɛ Korowii tɛo kpegri asɛ wɛɛ chah weela tena.
Belaa baala bane che baa bɛl waa kuuga ne o kalaŋ ba, asɛ dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin bɔr dɛ kpɔɔ jo dem bela Yeesu aa lole la dɛ́ kpɔɔ ka bil o sie.
Bɔr aa fara la, ba ta wone kpɔ baa la ba o be, anee ba teeh dea la dɛ ka forɛ sal la bela Yeesu aa chega la dɛ kpɔ baa la ne o kalaŋ waa chɔ o ta la dɛ che bela kpɔɔ bil Yeesu sie nɛra la baah ta.
Yeesu aa na gɛ baa yaradao la, o ŋɔ baa la waa kuuga la be ŋɔ, "Baa, n kpɔ he wechɔga kɛɛ."
Asɛ Tɔn Jerema la ne Farisii tena baa soge bela la lii ba nyu bini ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ o do dɛɛ bol nɛnhɛlwaa gɛ nɔɔ? Dɛ Korowii laa aa, umee dɛ won kpɔ nɛn wechɔga kɛo wɔ?"
Yeesu aa na waa baa dɛ lii la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii gɛ waa nɔ nɔɔ?
Maa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ n kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo nɔ, ne kɛŋɔ maa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ir dɛ valɛ, a bini umee kpega ɔ?
Mɛɛ chagle heyaa kɛŋɔ n Nɛn Bie dɔ kpegri harɛ nɔ ta kɛ n kpɔ nɛra wechɔga kɛ ba." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o ŋɔ weela te la be ŋɔ, "Men ŋɔ he be, ir dɛ kpɔ he kalaŋ kaa dem!"
Asɛ baa la ir bug la ta dɛ kpɔ o kalaŋ nɛra la bwa siwi ta bela, dɛ kpɛɛ Korowii dɛɛ kaa.
Yeesu aa ɛ gɛ la, nɛra la bwa nyoa kpoo, ɔmee lag ba, asɛ baa kpɛɛ Korowii dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa nyokpowaa ya na fini ken?"
Anɔ habɔɔ la, Yeesu valɔ baa kaa dɛ na lampoo lɛɛ bɛl kɛŋɔ waa soge o toma ta dɛɛ lɛ lampoo. Dɛ o sɔne Lewi. Yeesu aa nao la, o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir ba teŋɛ n nɛ."
Anee Lewi gel wobɛlbwa dɛ ir teŋɛ o nɛ.
Lewi gelɔ ba ɛ kondikonjena o dem dɛ hɔɔh Yeesu, asɛ o ne Yeesu ne lampoo lɛɛra pirim ne nɛra bane ka so dɛɛ di kwaa la.
Belaa Farisii tena ne ba bini Tɔn Jerema la pwah o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ne lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ nɛra apoo ne wechɔg-ɛɛra pɛ dɛɛ di kwaa nɔɔ?"
Yeesu aa no gɛ waa nɔ la o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Weela tenaa dɛɛ gaage tɛɛga te bɔr, bokpega tena laa."
Dɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te nɛndɛɛga waa laa n ba. Wechɔg-ɛɛra waa n ba ásɛ ba charɛ ba liire."
Asɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ waa Jɔn habɔteŋra la ne Farisii tena la yon vɔwɛ nyoa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii, asɛ he habɔteŋra nɔ te aa wola gɛ ɛ nɔɔ?"
Anee Yeesu sɛg ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Baa laa dɔa kpɔ hanfale dɛ yerɛ o daamanar ŋɔ bá ba bá lɛ ba sie nɔ, baa berɔɔ so lɔr aa? Baa lɔree so.
Kɛ tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao kɛŋɔ baa lawɛ men hanfale jaa laanee le ba bini. Gɛ saŋ la te, baa vɔwɛ nyoaa."
Belaa o berɛ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Baa yafale mɔnɛ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ tɔ yabene bɔɔ. Dɛ he ɛ gɛ naa, dɛ he chɔg onfale la, o ne ombene la ge aa dɔŋaa le."
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Baa senfala kpɔe dɛɛ do loŋbena aa kɔɔhna bini dɛɛ tɔ a nyoa. Dɛ he ɛ gɛ naa, senfala la baa peraa, aa do kpegrii dɛ pere loŋa la a chɔg, asɛ sen la fuge.
Senfala chɛ loŋfala.
Nomɛlbwa aa sen aa peraa nyɔ dɛ berɛ kaa nyin anɔ la aa wola pere bɔr kpa, dɛkalkɛ ampera la wer tɛo."
Awola Ona Tɔpere bɛl, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra kpɔ mea koo bɛl ta, asɛ o habɔteŋra la kuugi mea la ane dɛ fɔga dɛɛ chwe.
Baa dɛ ɛ gɛ la, Farisii tena bane na dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ɛ toma dɛɛ to ya Ona Tɔpere mmara nɔɔ?"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "He ta gɛ ya naa Devid aa ɛa saŋ la lɔr aa dɛ kpo o ne nɛra baa ja o nɛɛ la kure kɛɛ?
O la Korowii Dea dɛ ka di paanoo aa ɛ Korowii kwa, nomɛlbwa fe aa wola ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ o di atane kɛ Sɔfore gbo la. O diu, dɛ tɛ o nɛra ge ba di."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "N Nɛn Bie laanee dɔ Ona Tɔpere kpegri."
Awola Ona Tɔpere bɛl, Yeesu la cheremi dea dɛ ka bagle wa. Dɛ baa bɛl lɔ bela, asɛ o nɔndig sewɛ.
Dɛ Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena lole dɛɛ nyiŋi Yeesu kɛ wɛɛ chah baa laanee Ona Tɔpere la ta, ásɛ ba dɔ o waa dɛ bol.
Dɛ Yeesu te jemɛ waa baa dɛ lii, anee o yerɛ baa la o nɔndig aa sewa la, dɛ ŋɔ ó ir ba che ba sie. Asɛ o ir dɛ ba che ba sie.

Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N dɛ bɔɔ heya. Ɛrɛɛ Korowii Waa la ɛɛ bagle yaa ŋɔ yaa ɛ Ona Tɔpere ta laɔ? Dɛ́ a ɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛ yaa ɛ nɛra wedɛɛga kɛɛ ya fig baɔ? A ɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛ ya lɛ nɛra mkpa kɛɛ ya chɔg baɔ?"
Yeesu nyiŋi nɛra la bwa, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ baa la be ŋɔ ó tɛr o nɔn. Waa tɛr o nɔn la, dɛ o nɔn la berɔ do kpegri.
Belaa Tɔn Jerema la ne Farisii tena la baah di baa bol dɔŋa be gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ba ɛ Yeesu.
Yeesu aa le bela la, o la deŋgare bɛl ta bela nomɛlbwa aa wola toole, dɛ ka do bela dɛɛ soŋe Korowii jwaana la bwa.
Tɔ aa pera la, o yerɛ o habɔteŋra la, asɛ dɛ kpɔ ba bini fi dɛ banɛ dɛ ŋɔ o toromaa ban.
O kpɔ Seemɔn waa pao Pita la, ne Pita nime Andriu, dɛ Jems ne Jɔn ne Felep ne Batolomeo,
dɛ kpɔ Maatiu ne Tɔmas ne Alfeɔs bie Jems, dɛ Seemɔn baa dɛ yerɔ Sɛlɔt la,
dɛ kpɔ Jems bie Judas ne Judas Eskareɔt waa leo tɛ ba kpoo la.

Waa kpɔ o toroma la tonɛ la, o ne ba le deŋgare la doa dɛɛ tu harɛ, dɛ ba pu o habɔteŋra la bane, asɛ o ne ba che bobɛl waa chɔ harɛ. Ba warɔ pirim dɛ le Judia harɛ, ne Jerusalam, ne mpo nyoa bwɛɛre baa dɛ yera Taaya ne Sidon,
dɛ ba o be dɛ́ ba no o wa, asɛ ó chaah ba weela. Nɛra kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ a ɛɛ ba weela bwa ba bela, asɛ o doŋa ta ba.
Dɛ nɛra la bwa siwi swɛɛrɔ baa nyin dɛ lego, dɛkalkɛŋɔ kpegri bɛl le o bini dɛɛ chah ba bwa.
Yeesu nyiŋi o habɔteŋra la, dɛ ŋɔ, "He nɛra haa ɛ nyaara la, he na som, dɛkalkɛ heyaa dɛɛ ba Korowii koobii ɛɛ.
He banɔ la lɔr aa dɛ kpo heyaa taraken la, he na som, dɛkalkɛŋɔ hɛɛ ba vagɔɔ. He banɔ la haa dɛ wi taraken la, he na som, dɛkalkɛ hɛɛ ba mamɔɔ.
Dɛ nɛra koh n Nɛn Bie nɔ waa dɛ hah heya, dɛ vɛh heya, dɛ chɛgre heya, dɛ yerɛ he sɔnchɔge aa, he na som.
Dɛ a ba gɛ naa, hé gel he sie lɛ kohona asɛ he hɛgre, dɛkalkɛ he kembɔr warɔ taeh Korowii be. Gɛ tentenee ba naanar ɛ Korowii keamere ba faa lole la.
He banɔ la haa ɛ kondɔɔhna la, hé bwɛɛlɛ! He silɛɛ bwaa hɛɛ na la.
He banɔ nɔ haa vagra taraken nɔ, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Lɔr ɛɛ ba kpo heyaa taeh. He banɔ nɔ haa dɛ mamɛ taraken nɔ, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Hɛɛ ba wiu.
He banɔ la nɛra aa dɛ bol he bwara wedɛɛge nɔ, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Gɛ tentenee ba naanar kpɛɛ keamechɔga baa wola Korowii nyoa waa bolɛ la.
"He banɔ la haa dɛ no n waa nɔ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyin he dɔma wa, dɛɛ ɛɛ ba wedɛɛga.
Hé swee andɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ banɔ la baa dɛ taah heya, dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ banɔ la baa dɛ ɛ heyaa wechɔga la ge.
Dɛ nomɛl kpaa he lwɛɛma aa, berɛ baŋ bɛl ge tɛo ó kpaa ja. Dɛ nomɛl lɛ he yal he be naa, kpɔ he batakaare ge jao.
Dɛ nomɛl soŋe komɛl aa, tɛo. Dɛ nomɛl kpɔ he komɛl aa, bɛ o be lɛ kpa.
Gɛ haa dɛ nyin kɛ nɛra ɛ dɛɛ tɛ heyaa la, hé ge ɛ gɛ tenten dɛɛ tɛɛ ba.
"Dɛ he dɛ nyin nɛra baa dɛ nyin he waa gbo aa, dɛ he wedɛɛga haa dɛ ɛ a gwaa la, anee ameo? Wechɔg-ɛɛra gba dɛ nyin nɛra baa dɛ nyin ba wa.
Dɛ he ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ heyaa wedɛɛga gbo aa, dɛ he chɛ jam aa? Wechɔg-ɛɛra gba aa gɛ ɛa?
Dɛ nɛra baa dɛ bɔ heyaa gboo hɛɛ kemɛ kwaa aa, bɔkwa kembɔree hɛɛ ba dɔe yɔ? Wechɔg-ɛɛra gba dɛ kemɛ ba bala wechɔg-ɛɛra kwa, ásɛ ba baa dɔ aa, ba bɔ ba.

Hɛ́ɛ nyin he dɔma wa, dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. He dɛ kemɛ nɛra kwaa aa, he bɛ a lɛɛ waa dɛɛ lii. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, anee hɛɛ ba kembɔr dɔe kohona dɛ ɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la bii. O te dɛ nyiŋi wechɔg-ɛɛra ne boniayɛ tena bwa.
Hɛ́ɛ sune nɛra nɛ, gɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la aa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ la.
"He bɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ pwah, asɛ Korowii ge bɛ heyaa pwah. He bɛ dɔŋa bolchɔge dɛɛ pa, asɛ Korowii ge bɛ heyaa bolchɔge pa. Hé kpɔ he dɔŋa wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ ba, asɛ Korowii ge kpɔ he wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ heya.

Hɛ́ɛ tɛ dɔŋa kwa, asɛ Korowii gee tɛ heyaa a do kan kohona. Korowii dɛ ba he tɛɛ yaa, wɛɛ magaa, dɛ jwiira, dɛ ɛgra a jo kɛrɛdɛ dɛ su porrr ken dɛɛ ta. Kon haa kpɔa magɛ kwaa tɛ he dɔŋ la tentenee baa ba kpɔe magɛ tɛ he ge."
Yeesu berɔ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Nyoŋe ɛɛ wonoo lawɛ o dɔŋ nyoŋe daa a magre aa? Ba bwa aa bɔɔ taa ka le dɛ chogli aa?
Nɛn waa dɛ hweli toma la ta o dɔɔ gwaalɛ, kɛ dɛ o dɔɔ hweli toma dɛ jemɛ tonɛ kwaraa naa, o ne o dɔɔ ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
"Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ bol he dɔŋ wechɔga tama waa haa wola he te wechɔgdamanta waa dawɛ nɔɔ?

A do kɛŋɔ dabor aa lɔ he siwi ta haa wola on kpɔe, dɛ ŋɔ he dɔŋ be ŋɔ, 'N dam, gel n laa dapugri kpɔ he siwi ta.' Nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra sie mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ waa la! Tɔ sie laa dabor la kpɔ he siwi ta mɔɔ dɛ́ won na kɛrɛdɛ dɛ laa dapugri waa lɔ he dɔŋ siwi ta la kpɔ.
"Dadɛɛge aa won nɔnɛ nɔnchɔga, gɛɛ dachɔge ge aa wola won nɔnɛ nɔndɛɛga.
Daa bɛlbwa nɔna waa nɔna la taa ba che dɛɛ jemɔ. Sɔɔh da aa pur nɔna nɔnɛ, gɛɛ kontromoo ge aa wola lomporo nɔnɛ.

Nɛndɛɛge wedɛɛga ɛɛ taa a che baa jemɛ wedɛɛga aa lɔ o bambile bini. Gɛɛ ba che nɛnchɔge ge wechɔga ɛɛ ta dɛɛ jemɛ wechɔga damanta aa lɔ o bambile bini, dɛkalkɛ waa aa lɔ nɛn bambile ta laanee o nyoa ɛɛ bol.
"Ɛrɛ waa hɛɛ yer mɛ he dɔɔ, haa wola waa maa dɛ bol he be ɛ nɔɔ?
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ba n be dɛ baa no n waa nɔ dɛɛ ɛa la, mɛɛ chagle heyaa gɛ waa doa.
Naate do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ ba o dea doe, dɛ kwi o mun pae bɔɔ ka jagɛ bwetal ta mɔɔ dɛ ma dea la. Asɛ nee palɛ ba jo dea la mun, o ta chole, dɛkalkɛ o doo kɛrɛdɛ.

Nomɛlbwa ge waa no n waa nɔ, waa wola gɛ aa bagla la ɛ la, o do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa do o dea, o ta o mun pae bɔɔ kwii ka jagɛ bwetal ta mɔɔ dɛ den doo la, asɛ nee aa pala ba jo dea la mun ta la, o chole dɛ chɔg kwaraa."
Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ bwa bagle nɛra la tonɛ la, o le bela dɛ kaa Kapeeneɔm.
Dɛ Room sooja nomoa bɛl lɔ bela dɛ dɔ bonɔɔ bɛl dɛɛ nyin o waa kɛrɛdɛ. Dɛ bonɔɔ la bwara dɛ weo, a ka jɛɛ ken o sewɛ.
Sooja nomoa la aa no Yeesu waa la, o tomɛ Juda tena nomonome bane ŋɔ bá ka soŋo o ba chah o bonɔɔ la tɛo.
Baa la Yeesu be la, ba soŋo kohona ŋɔ ó ba chah nomoa la bonɔɔ la tɛo, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A wer kɛŋɔ he cha nomoa nɔ,
dɛkalkɛ o dɛ nyin ya Juda tena wa, hale o do cheremi dea tɛ yaa kwara."
Baa ŋɔ gɛ la, Yeesu iro, o ne baa kaa. Aa ka tama o tel dem bela la, sooja nomoa la tomɛ o daamanar o be ŋɔ bá ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ o ta chɛɛ kɛ Yeesu ba o dem, anomanta o bɛ o te koh,
dɛ ŋɔ o gbagba ge ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ o ba Yeesu be. Kɛ Yéesu bol waa waa ba o dem dɛ ba bol la ásɛ o bonɔɔ la gbaŋre.

O bolɔ ŋɔ, "N ɛ nɛn maa lɔ nomonome bane lɔga, dɛ dɔ soojare ba do n ge lɔga. Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ bɛl be ŋɔ, 'Ba,' o ba, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ onfale be, 'Kaa,' o ge kaa. Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ n bonɔɔ be ŋɔ, 'Ɛ ken tɛ mɛ,' asɛ o ɛ."

Yeesu aa no waa nɔ la, o nyoa kpoo yarada waa yaradao la wa, asɛ o berɛ habɔɔ dɛ ŋɔ nɛnlaa baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n ta nɛn waa yarada mɛ ken nae bwa. N ta o yarada dɔŋ nae Israel tena kwaraa bini."
Belaa nɛra sooja nomoa la aa tom ba la berɛ kaa o be. Baa tel o dem la, ba nao kɛŋɔ o bonɔɔ la gbaŋrɔ.
Aa ɛ tama la, Yeesu leɔ dɛɛ kaa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Neen la ta. Waa dɛ kaa la, dɛ o habɔteŋra ne nɛnlaa bane ja o nɛ.
Waa dena dɛɛ tel bwɛɛ la ta la, dɛ ba chegɛ baa bɛl waa sewa dɛɛ kaa ka huge. Dɛ gɛ nɛn waa sewa la ɛ luhaah bɛl bibeŋkpoŋ waa dɔa. Dɛ bwɛɛ la tena bane teŋɛ luhaah la nɛɛ pirim.
Belaa Yeesu aa na haah la la, o waa do o sum, asɛ o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ berɛ wii."
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o kaa lege lale la baa fɔrɔwo la, asɛ nɛra baa chegɔɔ la jagɛ che bobeŋkpoŋ, asɛ o ŋɔ, "Bonɔɔ, n ŋɔ hé ir!"
Belaa bonɔɔ la fugri ir so, dɛ den dɛɛ bol wa. Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ haah la be ŋɔ, "He biee la."
Ɔmee lawɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa, asɛ baa kpɛɛ Korowii dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii keamejen bɛl ba ya bini bonɔ! Korowii balɔ dɛ́ ba lɛ o nɛra!"
Yeesu waa waa ɛa la perɛ Judia harɛ ne harɛre aa baro cheme la bwa ta.
Anee Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la habɔteŋra ba Jɔn be dɛ ka bol a gɛ waa nɔ bwa baglo.
Asɛ o yerɛ ba bini banɛ, dɛ tom ba Yeesu be ŋɔ bá ka bɔɔro ŋɔ onee nɛn Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo o ba la aa, kɛɛ o laa ɔ, asɛ báa nyiŋi naate habɔɔ?

Jɔn habɔteŋra la aa ba Yeesu be la, ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee tomɛ yaa he be dɛ ŋɔ yá ba bɔɔre ŋɔ, henee naate Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo o ba la aa, kɛɛ he laa ɔ, asɛ yáa nyiŋi naate habɔɔ?"
A gɛ saŋ la dɛ Yeesu chah weela tena taeh, dɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ a le ba nɛ, asɛ dɛ gel nyoŋa gee na bɔr.

Anee Yeesu ŋɔ Jɔn toroma la be ŋɔ, "Hé ka bagle Jɔn be waa haa baa na ne anɔ la haa baa no. Hé ŋɔ o be ŋɔ nyoŋa dɛ na bɔr, boobie ɛɛ valɛ, asɛ nɛra weechɔga aa chɔg ba bwadabii la ge bwara kwaa. Hé ŋɔ o be ŋɔ amumure dɛ no wa, lala ir seo ta, asɛ nyaara ge dɔ Amanesoma la dɛɛ no.
He naate haa wola men tɔŋle la, he na som."
Jɔn toroma la aa kaala la, Yeesu bol Jɔn waa nɛnlaa la be ŋɔ, "Haa la pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo la ta bela la, bɔkwaa he fe ɛɛ nyin kɛ he na laɔ? Kpɔg bɛl peu aa dɛ ta wɛɛ yiigi waa he la bela kɛɛ?
