Dɛ gɛ laa ge aa, dɛ bɔkwa tenee he la ŋɔ he ka nyiŋi ɔ? Nɛn waa do laaladɛɛgaa he la ka nyiŋi kɛɛ? Nɛra baa dɛ do laaladɛɛga dɛɛ di ba tetookondikwaa la, koodemii ba do.
Hé den bag mɛ, bɔkwa tenee he la bela ka nyiŋi ɔ? Korowii keamee kɛɛ? Kasinteŋ, Korowii keamee he na la, kɛ o gwaa Korowii keame kwara.
Jɔn nɔ waa ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, 'Korowii ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ tomɛ n toromee ó tɔ he sie dɛ kwaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ" ' la.
N dɛ ŋɔ he be, ba lolɛ nɛnjena harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ Jɔn gwaa ba bwa. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ bechala Korowii Kora la ta te berɔ gwaalo."
Nɛmpɛɛne la ne lampoo lɛɛra la kwaraa baa dɛ bɔ nɛra apoo aa no Yeesu waa la, ba sɛoh ŋɔ Korowii waa dɔ kasinteŋ. Gɛ nɛra nɔɔ Jɔn faa sɔ Korowii nee la.
Kɛ ba nomonome ne Farisii tena la ne Tɔn Jerema la te vɛh Korowii waa aa wera tɛɛ ba la. Dɛ ba te fa ta gelɛ Jɔn sɔ ba Korowii ne.
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa konee mɛɛ ba fini nɛra nɔ kpɔe dɛ magɔɔ? Bɔkwa nɛraa ban ɔ?
Ba do kɛŋɔ bechale bane aa dɛ hɛlɛ fɔgbaah, asɛ bane ŋɔ ba bala be ŋɔ, 'Ɛrɛɛ ya go silɛɛ yela asɛ he sie ta lɛɛ hé sa, ya berɛ ta wiile ge, he loo ta kui hé wi nɔɔ?'
Jɔn waa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la aa bala la, dɛ waa sen nyɔ, dɛ yon lawɛ o nyoa vɔwɛ, asɛ he ŋɔ kwaa dɛ ir o nɛ!

Asɛ n Nɛn Bie ge aa bala nɔ, n dɛ di kwaa dɛɛ nyɔ sen, asɛ he ŋɔ, 'Hé na baa nɔ! Kondikondidii ne sennyɔɔree on. Lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ nɛra apoo ne wechɔg-ɛɛraa o daamanar.' " Yeesu aa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ,
"Wejereme bɛlbwa we-ɛɛla taa a che baa jemɛ kɛ o ɛ wejereme."
Farisii te bɛl yerɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ó ba ó ne o di kwa, asɛ Yeesu la o dem ba ka so tig ta, dɛɛ ba kwaa dii.
Bwɛɛ la ta la, dɛ haah bɛl dɛ bɔ jwamane dɛ do bela. Waa noa kɛ Yeesu lɔ Farisii te la dem dɛɛ di kwaa la, anee o ka kpɔ nosɔɔhsoma loŋjega bɛl del
dɛ ba guŋi Yeesu jwɛh dɛ wi ta o napaala ta, dɛ kpɔ o nyumpona fee o sinii la waa wia ta Yeesu napaala ta la, dɛ mo o napaala, dɛ fuge nosɔɔhsoma la fɔgla.

Belaa Farisii te la waa yerɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ó ba di kwaa la aa na a gɛ waa nɔ la, o lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ fe ɛ Korowii keame tenten naa, o fe jemɛ haah nɔ hahsoo waa dɛ lego nɔ. O fe jemɛ o wechɔga waa lɔ a ta bwɛɛ nɔ ta."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Seemɔn, n dɔ waane dɛ́ bol he be." Asɛ baa la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, bol."
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛra banɛ banee di baa bɛl kem. Ba bwa di o kem te, kɛ bɛl kwaa gwaa o dɔŋ kwaa kera fi.
A gɛ kema la nɛra banɛ la aa dia la, ba bɛlbwa ta wone bɔ, asɛ o kpɔ kɛ ba. A gɛ waa nɔ aa do gɛ nɔ, ba bini umee hɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ wɛɛ nyin baa la waa kohonaa yɔ?"
Anee Seemɔn chaŋo ŋɔ, "N dɛ lii kɛ naate o kem aa kana la, onee dɛ nyin baa la waa kohona." Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kpelaa he ŋɔ."

Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, o berɛ sie ta haah la be, dɛ ŋɔ Seemɔn be ŋɔ, "Kɛ he na haah nɔ kenɛ? Maa ba he dem bonɔ la, he ta men nee tɛɛ ń sarame n nakpale. Kɛ haah nɔ te wio ta n nakpale ta dɛ kpɔ o nyumpona feera kɛrɛdɛ ken.
He ta men lɛɛ silɛɛ ne dɛ mo n lwɛɛma. Kɛ maa baa so nɔ bwa, o ta n napaala moe gelɛ bwa.
He ta men nee tɛɛ ń sarame n nakpale gɛɛ mɛɛ bol noo maa kpɔ fɔgle n nyu wa aa? Kɛ o te fuge nosɔɔhsoma fɔgle n nakpale.

Anomanta mɛɛ dii kasinteŋii. Nyina haah nɔ aa nyin n waa kohona nɔ baglɔ kɛ Korowii kpɔ o wechɔga damanta waa ɛa la bwa kɛo. Naate waa wola wechɔga ɛɛ kohona a ɛ kɛŋɔ he kpɔa kɛo la, nyina waa dɛ nyin he waa la aa kan do. Waa Korowii jam kohona kɛ nɛn waa ɛ anjena la."
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ haah la be ŋɔ, "Korowii kpɔ he wechɔga kɛɛ."
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, anee nɛra baa soge tig ta bela dɛ ja o nɛɛ la ɛɛ lii ba nyu bini ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo baa nɔ o kpɔ wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ nɛra nɔɔ?"
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ haah la be ŋɔ, "He yarada haa yarada mɛ nɔ lɛɛ. Ir dɛɛ la. Kórowii tɛɛ bosɔɔhna."
Aa ɛ tama la, Yeesu jo bwɛjena ne bwɛjegre ta dɛɛ bol Amanesoma la kɛ Korowii Kora la dii telo. Dɛ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la,
ne haahna bane waa doŋi kwaa ba nɛɛ dɛ chaah ba weela la ja o nɛ. Gɛ haahna nɔ bɛlee Mɛɛre waa le Magdala Yeesu faa doŋi kwaa bele anuanɛ le o nɛɛ la.
Bɛl gee Joana waa ɛ Kusa waa ɛ nomoa dɛɛ nyiŋi Kooro Hɛrɔd dem la haah, ne Susaana ne ba bala bane baa wara dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la nɛ, dɛ kpɔ ba gbagba suuga dɛ yawɛ kwaa tɛɛ ba baa di la.
Dɛ nɛra teŋo le bwɛɛre aa teŋɛ dɔŋa nɛɛ la ta dɛɛ ba Yeesu be. Nɛnlaa la aa wara dɛ bar Yeesu cheme la, o kpɔ sɛgla dɛ bol waa bag ba ŋɔ,
"Baa bɛlee ira dɛ kaa merɛ mea o koo ta. Waa dɛ merɛ mea la la, ane lee ŋwɛnɛ ta, asɛ nɛra tigri a ta, jumbii ge ba tɔɔ di.
Mea la ane ge lee bwetala ta. Aa lea la, a jwalɔ dɛ serewe, dɛkalkɛŋɔ sɔn toole bela.
Mea la ane lee sɔɔhne baah dɛ le, sɔɔhne la kpeg dɛ lawa a serewe.
Ane ge lee harɛdɛɛge la ta dɛ le, dɛ do wer kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ mendaa bɛlbwa ɛ bie lafa." Yeesu aa bol waa nɔ tonɛ la, o kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa no la, ó no!"
Yeesu aa tonɛ o wobol la o habɔteŋra la bɔɔro sɛgla la mun.

Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Korowii ta o Kora bini wobɛlbwa kpɔe sɔh he te. Kɛ nɛra baa kaa la te, sɛgla nee mɛɛ ba waa ba be bola, ásɛ a ɛ gɛ baa chwera ŋɔ, 'Ba dɔ sibie, kɛ baa na, dɛ dɔ deŋna kɛ baa no, baa waa mun jemɛ.'
"Hé no sɛgla la mun. Mea la chegɔ tɛ Korowii Waa la.
Asɛ anɔ la aa lee ŋwɛnɛ nyoa asɛ jumbii ba tɔɔ di la chegɔ tɛ nɛra baa no Korowii Waa la, asɛ bug ta dɛ Bɔnsam baa laa kpɔ ba nyu bini asɛ ba bɛ ba te kpɔ tɛ Korowii o lɛɛ ba la.

Anɔ la ge aa lee bwetala ta bela teera aa wola toole kohona asɛ a lune aa wola wone kaa bini asɛ a jwalɛ dɛ sewɛ la, a do kɛ nɛra ba yon no waa la, dɛ ba sie lɛo, kɛ aa wola won ban jooge dɛɛ ka ba nyu bini la. A chegɛ Korowii Waa ta waane puu ba aa, dɛ ba horɔ.
Asɛ anɔ la ge aa lee sɔɔhne baah, sɔɔhne la lawa a sewɛ la gee nɛra baa no Korowii Waa la, asɛ ba soga bini ne kondɔɔh waa ne wepuu aa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta begre ba sie, baa gelɛ waa la ɛɛ dɔ tɔnɔ la.
Anɔ la ge aa lee harɛdɛɛge ta dɛ le dɛ do wer dɛ ma kohona la gee nɛra baa no waa la dɛ kpoŋe a bini kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ dɔ bambile dɛ teŋɛ a ta, dɛ gel a dɔ tɔnɔ la.
"Nomɛlbwa aa kandea choŋi dɛ kpɔ kon dɛɛ pi o ta, kɛɛ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ do mpa lɔga. Ba choŋi kandea aa, kon taa ba kpɔɔ dɛɛ chɔŋɛ ásɛ wɛɛ chaah nɛra bwa.
Komɛlbwa waa sɔah la ɛɛ le bochaahnee ba nao. Waa bwa baa tɔ a ta la ɛɛ ba leo nɛra jemɛ.

Anomanta hé no kɛrɛdɛ dɛ jemɛ waa nɔ mun. Dɛ he wono no a mun aa, mɛɛ ja heyaa anee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ naate waa dɔa la, baa jao anee, asɛ nɛn waa wola komɛlbwa dɔe la, tama kwaraa waa dɔa la ɛɛ le o nɔn taa."
Yeesu nya ne o nimanar la bela waa lole la, kɛ nɛnlaa la nomanta, ba ta wone tel o be.
Anee nomɛl ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He nya ne he nimanar chegɛ buse dɛɛ nyin ba nae."
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N nya ne n nimanaree nɛra baa dɛ no Korowii Waa dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta la."
Awola bɛl, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la kaa jo gbera bini, asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá kaa moo baŋ le, asɛ ba tagɛ gbera la do.
Baa tawa dɛɛ kaa la, Yeesu chɔ dom gbera la bini. Bug la ta dɛ peujen bɛl dɛ ta dɛ kpɔ nehaŋma dɛɛ jo ba gbera la bini, asɛ gbera la ɛɛ ba mora.
Anee o habɔteŋra la chumu dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya serewɔ tonɛ!" Belaa o ir dɛ kɔr peu la ne nehaŋma la, asɛ a hel, asɛ bɔr hel kerker ken.
Bɔr aa hela la, o bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ haa wola men yarada nɔɔ?" Ba ɔmɔ, ba bwa bwara hwah, asɛ baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo siwii nɔ, wɛɛ bol waa peu ne nehaŋma ɛɛ no o wobol nɔɔ?"
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la tawɛ gbera kaa Galilia Moo la baŋ, Gerasa harɛ ta.
Yeesu aa le gbera la bini la, baa bɛl waa ɛ bwɛɛ la te kwa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ baa chemo. Dɛ kwaa la aa ir o nɛɛ bigro, asɛ o foo o laala ta, dɛ chwa le dem dɛ ka so lala hugribɔr.
Gɛ baa nɔ aa na Yeesu la, o chwao dɛ ba guŋi o sie, dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Yeesu, Korowiijen Bie, bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin n be nɔ? N dɛ soŋe, bɛ men weweele do."

Pɛɛ laa baa la do lɔŋɔ la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Yeesu tɔ sie ŋɔ kwáa la le o nɛ. Gɛɛ kwaa la yon dɛɛ ir o nɛ, asɛ baa lawɔ dɛɛ doo kpɛɛ. Ba doo kpɛɛ aa, gɛɛ o yon kuuga, asɛ kwaa la yon kaa o ne pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta.
Belaa Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He sɔne ɛrɔɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "N sɔne Dɔm." Dɛ kwaa la warɔ pirim dɛ do o nɛ, a waa o ŋɔ o sɔne Dɔm la.
Anee kwaa la soŋe Yeesu ŋɔ o bɛ an doŋi ka ta bela baa dɛ ba wechɔg-ɛɛra bwa hɔhɔrɔwa doe la.
Bela la, dɛ prakooni damanta ane lɔ diŋgoŋ bɛl ta dɛɛ di. Anee kwaa la soŋe Yeesu ŋɔ ó gel a kaa prakooni la nɛ, asɛ o tɛa ŋwɛnɛ.
A le baa la nɛɛ dɛ ka jo prakooni la nɛ, asɛ prakooni damanta la bwa chwa biribiri, dɛ wili diŋgoŋ la dɛ ka lee moo ta dɛ serewe kwaraa.
Belaa nɛra baa dɛ tegɛ prakooni la aa na waa aa chiga la, ba chwa dɛ la bwɛɛ la ta ne bwɛjegre ne daamune aa bɛne bela la ta, dɛ ka bol waa aa chiga la bela tena be.

Bela tena aa noa la, ba le ba bwɛɛre ta dɛ́ ba na waa aa chiga la. Baa ba Yeesu be la, dɛ baa la kondamanta faa lɔ o nɛɛ la, dɛ o kwaa la bwa kaalɔ, o liire ba harɛ, o do laala dɛ so Yeesu sie. Baa na gɛ waa nɔ la, ba ɔmɔ.
Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ na gɛ Yeesu aa chah baa la kwaa faa lɔ o nɛɛ la bol a waa ba bwɛɛ tena la aa ba bela la be.
Yeesu aa ɛ gɛ la, nɛra baa le baah bela la soŋo ŋɔ ó le ba harɛ ta dɛ kaa, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ɔmee tenten chole ba nɛ, asɛ o jo gbera bini dɛ kaa.
Yeesu aa dɛ kaa la, anee baa la kwaa faa lɔ o nɛɛ la soŋo ŋɔ, "Gel n ne he kaalɔ." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ,
"Kaa he nɛra be dem dɛ ka bol wejena Korowii aa ɛa tɛɛ la." Baa la laŋɔ dɛ ka bol waa Yeesu aa ɛa tɛo la bwɛɛ la bwa ta.
Yeesu aa bera kaa moo la baŋ le la, nɛra baa lɔ bela la jaamo silɛɛ ne, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba sogo dɛɛ kpao.
Belaa cheremi dea nomoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Jaerɔs la ba dɛ ba guŋi Yeesu sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ o dɛ nyinu o dem.
Dɛ gɛ baa nɔ bibeŋkpoŋ waa dɔɔ, o ɛ bihaah dɛ di bene fi dɛ anɛ la bwara dɛ weo wɛɛ ba sewa. Yeesu aa dɛ kaa la, dɛ nɛnlaa bane teŋɛ o nɛ, dɛ fiilo do baah ta dɛɛ tagɔ.
Dɛ haah bɛl ge lole chal ɛɛ fugo bene fi dɛ anɛ, o chah, o komɛlbwa tonɛ tɛɛga tena be. Kɛ nomɛlbwa ta wone chaoh.
O jo nɛra la baah ta dɛ ka che Yeesu habɔɔ dɛ lege o batakaare nyoa. Bug la ta dɛ chal la aa dɛ fugo la teŋo.
Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ ŋɔ, "Umee leg mɛ nɔɔ?" Waa bɔɔra la, nomɛlbwa ta sɛɛh. Anee Pita ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, nɛnlaa nɔ aa bare cheme dɛɛ tagɛ dɔŋa nɔ, anee he berɛ dɛɛ bɔɔ naate waa lege naa?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "N nao kɛ nomɛl leg mɛ, dɛkalkɛ kpegri ane le n bini."
Belaa haah la aa naa kɛŋɔ waa won kpɔ o te sɔh la, o kpɔ bochela dɛ ka guŋi Yeesu sie nɛra la bwa siwi ta, dɛ bagle wee la aa bala o lego la, ne gɛ o weela la aa kaala bug la ta la.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Tolo, he yarada haa yarada mɛ la gelɔ he gbaŋre. Dɛɛ la. Korowii tɛɛ bosɔɔhna."
Yeesu nyoa taa lɔ waa waa dɛ bol la ta la, torome le cheremi dea nomoa la dem dɛ ba ŋɔ nomoa la be ŋɔ, "He bihaah la sewɔ. Bɛ berɛ ha nomoa la kpa."
Ajaah Yeesu no waa la torome la aa baa bol la, anomanta o ŋɔ Jaerɔs be ŋɔ, "Bɛ ɔmɛ, kɛ yarada mɛ. Wɛɛ berɔɔ dɔ bokpega ja."
Yeesu aa tel dem bela la, o ta gelɛ nomɛlbwa ja o nɛɛ dɛ jo bela bie la aa chɔa la, nemenɛ Pita ne Jɔn ne Jems ne bie la nya ne o mɛɛ gbosoroo.
Dɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la koh bie la waa dɛɛ wi. Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ wi. Bie la ta sewɛ, domii o chɔ!"
Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, dɛ ba dɛ mamɔ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba jemɔ kɛ o sewɔ.
Waa ba bie la jwɛɛh la, o lawɛ o nɔn dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Bie, ir!"
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, bie la hweera berɔ ba ja, asɛ o fugri ir bug la ta, asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ bá nyin kwaa tɛo o di.
Bie la nya ne o mɛɛ bwa bwara yɔrɔ, asɛ Yeesu kah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ nomɛlbwa be waa aa chiga la bol.
Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la ba cheme o sie, dɛ tɛɛ ba kpegri ne ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ bá doŋi kwaa nɛra nɛ, dɛ chah weela ge,
dɛ tom ba ŋɔ bá ka bol Korowii Kora la wa, dɛ chah weela tena.
Waa dɛ tom ba la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ komɛlbwa kpɔ kpoŋe he ŋwɛnɛ nɔ kaala ta. He bɛ daŋgbale kpɔ, dɛ bɛ pure kpɔ, dɛ bɛ kondikwaa kpɔ, dɛ bɛ suuga kɛɛ batakaare bele anɛnɛ kpɔ.
Bwɛɛ bɛlbwa haa la o ta la, dem haa ka jo o ta la, hé so bela ka tel kɛŋɔ haa le bwɛɛ la ta.
Dɛ bwɛɛ la tena ta heyaa lɛɛ silɛɛ ne naa, hé jwii he napaala teera ta bela mɔɔ dɛ le bela, ásɛ a bagle kɛŋɔ he kpɔ Korowii Waa ba ba be ba vɛah."
Asɛ ba le kaa, dɛ kaa bol Amanesoma la bela bwɛɛre la ta, dɛɛ chah weela tena bobɛlbwa.
Kooro Hɛrɔd waa dɛ nyiŋi Galilia harɛ ta aa no waa Yeesu aa dɛ ɛ la bwa la, o liire ɛo sakaa ken, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ nɛra bane dɛ bol ŋɔ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la ir seo ta.
Bane ŋɔ Korowii keame Elaejaa ir seo ta, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Korowii keamebena la bɛlee weera.
Anee Kooro Hɛrɔd ŋɔ, "Jɔn te, n gelɔ ba teŋe o nyu, aah nɛn besoo ge waa mɛɛ no ken nɔɔ?" Asɛ dɛ swɛɛ siwi kɛŋɔ wɛɛ na Yeesuu.
Yeesu habɔteŋra la balɔ dɛ ba bol waa baa kaa ɛ o be, asɛ o kpɔ ba le nɛnlaa la bini ba kaa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛtsaeda la ta.
Nɛra aa no o waa la, ba tiu bela, asɛ o lɛɛ ba silɛɛ ne dɛ bol Korowii Kora la waa bag ba, dɛ chah ba bini banɔ la ba bwara aa dɛ wee ba la.
Wee aa dɛ jo la, o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la la o be dɛ ka ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Tɛ nɛnlaa nɔ ŋwɛnɛ ba kaa bwɛɛre aa bar bonɔ nɔ dɛ́ ka nyin kondikwaa ne chɔɔbɔra, dɛkalkɛ bonɔ ɛ kpɔg baah."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé tɛɛ ba kwaa bá di." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba chaŋo ŋɔ, "Paanoo anue ne pɛŋa anɛɛ ya dɔ. Nemenɛ ya la dɛ ka yawɛ kondikwaa ba tɛ nɛra nɔ bwa nɔ."
Dɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la, ba baala ɛɛ ɛ nɛra kagboŋa banuee. Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá pɛɛge so fifraanunue."
Anee o habɔteŋra la gel nɛra la pɛɛge dɛ so gɛ.
Asɛ Yeesu kpɔ paanoo anue la ne pɛŋa anɛ la, dɛ ha sie dɛ nyiŋi nyundua dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ mɔne do o habɔteŋra la nɔɔra ta ŋɔ bá bɔne tɛ nɛra la.
Baa bɔne paanoo la tɛ nɛra la la, ba bwa diu dɛ vagre, ane ka. O habɔteŋra la tɔɔ anɔ la baa dia ka la pɛ, asɛ a su wɛgrɛjena fi dɛ anɛ.
Awola bɛl, dɛ Yeesu gbo lɔ bobɛl dɛɛ soŋe Korowii, asɛ o habɔteŋra la la o be. Anee o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo nɛra ɛɛ lii mɛ nɔ?"
Anee ba ŋɔ, "Bane ŋɔ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee hen. Bane ŋɔ Elaejaa hen, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Korowii keamebena la bɛlee weera."
Asɛ o bɔɔ ba ge ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo he gee lii mɛ nɔ?" Anee Pita chaŋo ŋɔ, "Henee Kristo la Korowii aa ŋɔa wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la."
Belaa Yeesu kah ba kohona ŋɔ ba bɛ gɛ nomɛlbwa be bol.
Asɛ o berɛ ŋɔ, "Men Nɛn Bie la chɛ kɛŋɔ n na waa nomonome ne Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema nɔn ta, asɛ ba vɛɛh mɛ, dɛ kpo mɛ, asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la, n ir seo ta."

O berɛ ŋɔ ba bwa be ŋɔ, "Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ nyin kɛ o teŋɛ n nɛ aa, ó gel o tetookwaa nyina, dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa kɛ wɛɛ sɛh wahala nae ne seo bwaa, dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔ dagagre che bá ka kpaaro pɛl o ta la,
dɛkalkɛ nomɛlbwa o sie aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge o sie aa wola harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta lɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
Dɛ nɛn dɔ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa bwa dɛ paŋɛ o nyu aa, bɔkwa tɔnɔɔ o dɔɔ?
Nomɛlbwa sihiih aa dɛ kpoo n ne n webagla nɔ ta la, awola men Nɛn Bie ne nyundua toromedɛɛga aa ba n Mɛɛ jirima ne la, maa naatee heeh awola tɔpere.
Kasinteŋ, Korowii ɛɛ ba di o Kora harɛ nɔ taa, dɛ he bini bane ta soge le dɛ nao."
Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ la, a yawa nyoa la, o kpɔ Pita ne Jɔn ne Jems, o ne ba teeh bwe bɛl dɛ kaa o doa, dɛ ka soŋe Korowii.
A gɛ saŋ Yeesu aa dɛ soŋe Korowii la, o sie bɔr begrɔ, asɛ o laala waa doa la to dɛɛ nyɛgle al-al ken.
Ba ne ŋɔ ba nyiŋi, dɛ o ne nɛra banɛ dɛ bol wa. Dɛ Korowii keamebena Mosis ne Elaejaa.
Baa bala dɛ Korowii jirima lɔ ba nɛ, baa bol gɛ Yeesu aa dɛ ba sewa Jerusalam ásɛ Korowii waa la ɛ kpela.
Dɛ Pita ne o bala la dɛ chɔ doromi. Ba iro dɛ na Yeesu kɛŋɔ o laala aa toa dɛɛ nyɛgle al-al ken. Ba na nɛra banɛ la baa ja Yeesu nɛɛ la ge.
Nɛra banɛ la aa le Yeesu be dɛɛ kaa la, Pita ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, a wer kɛŋɔ yaa lɔ bonɔ nɔ. Gel ya do kukure atoro, hé kpɔ bɛl, Mosis kpɔ bɛl, asɛ Elaeja ge kpɔ bɛl." Dɛ waa jemɛ waa waa dɛ bol.
Pita taa dɛ bol waa nɔ la, bam bɛl denɔ ba tɔ ba nɛ, asɛ ɔmee lag ba kɛŋɔ bam la chunchule aa baa tɔ ba nɛɛ la.
Belaa taa bɛl le bam la bini ŋɔ, "N Bie maa leo laanee la. Hé no o be!"
Wobol la aa chiga la, dɛ a ka Yeesu gbo, asɛ o habɔteŋra la hel jeiih ken gɛ waa nɔ ta, ba ta nomɛlbwa be waa baa naa la bolɛ gɛ saŋ.
Tɔ aa pera la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra batoro la le bwe la doa tu harɛ, asɛ nɛnlaa bane ba chemo.
Belaa baa bɛl kpɔ takpeg bol waa nɛra la bini ŋɔ, "Nomoa! N dɛ soŋe, nyiŋi n bie nɔ nɛɛ tɛ mɛ. O gboo n bie.
Kwaa dɛ ir o nɛ. A ir o nɛ aa, gɛɛ o pigri do lɔŋɔ, asɛ a won kpɔɔ go harɛ o beŋri chɔ, asɛ fufug ɛɛ le o nyoa. A dɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa mɔɔ dɛ le o nɛ.
N soŋe he habɔteŋra la ŋɔ bá doŋa o nɛɛ tɛ mɛ, kɛ ba ta wone."

Anee Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Oo! Fini nɔ nɛra wechɔga aa lɔ he nɛɛ nɔ, he ta yarada dɔe! Tɔpera aŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ nyin kɛ n lawɛ bambile dɛ so he be mɔɔ he yarada Korowii ɔ? Maa tɔpere bɛl dii ba he be kpa oo! Kpɔ he bie la ba bonɔ."
Bie la aa dɛ ba la, kwaa la goo harɛ dɛ gel o beŋri. Yeesu kɔr kwaa la, dɛ chah bie la, dɛ kpɔɔ tɛ o mɛɛ.
Nɛra la bwa nyoa kpo Korowii kpegri la nɛ. Ba nyoa aa kpoa ba taa kooga la, Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ,
"Hé cheg deŋne dɛ no waa nɔ maa dɛ ba he be bola nɔ, asɛ dɛ bɛ soh! Ba dɛ ba men Nɛn Bie lee do nɛra nɔn ta."
O habɔteŋra la ta waa la mun noɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii kpɔɔ sɔɔh ba. Dɛ ba ge dɛ ɔmɛ, anomanta ba bɔɔro waa la mun kahonɛ.
Wetɔŋla chole o habɔteŋra la baah ta, asɛ baa nyin ba jemɛ ba bini onɔ la waa ɛ ba bwa nomoa.
Baa wola a ne baŋ leɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ Yeesu jemɛ waa baa dɛ lii. Belaa o lawɛ bechala bɛl ir che o jwɛh,

dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa koh n waa dɛ nyiŋi bie nɔ nɛɛ la, dɛ menee o nyiŋi la. Nomɛlbwa ge waa nyiŋi n nɛɛ la, dɛ naate waa tom mɛ laanee o nyiŋi la. Naate waa ɛ o te bechala he bini la, onee nomoa."
Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ya na baa bɛl waa kpɔ he sɔn dɛɛ doŋi kwaa nɛra nɛ, asɛ ya kaoh ŋɔ ó gel, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ta ya bini bɛl ɛɛ."
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ Jɔn ne o bala la be ŋɔ, "He bɛ on kah ŋɔ ó gel. Nomɛlbwa waa wola he nɛɛ chegɛ la, he somee on."
Tɔpere aa dɛ tel kɛ Korowii kpɔ Yeesu kaa o be nyundua la, Yeesu kpɔ o te, dɛ den chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ pa sie dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam.
O tomɛ nɛra bane ŋɔ bá tɔ o sie dɛ la Samaria harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl ta dɛ́ ka nyin bɔr tɛo ó chog.
O sie aa chagɛ Jerusalam la nomanta, bela tena ta on lɛɛ.
Yeesu habɔteŋra Jems ne Jɔn aa na gɛ waa nɔ la, ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he dɛ nyin kɛ ya gel nii le nyundua ba dɛ ba fuuh ba kɛɛ?"
O habɔteŋra la aa ŋɔ gɛ la, o ta ban gelɛ. O laa o te berɛ dɛ do ba nee ba samɛ.
Asɛ o ne o habɔteŋra la kaa ba sie bwɛɛ bɛl ta.
Baa vala dɛɛ kaa la, baa bɛl ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Bobɛlbwa haa dɛ la la, mɛɛ teŋɛ he nɛɛ kaa."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Manyajegre kwaraa dɔ bɔɔne dɛɛ chɔ a bini, asɛ jumbii aa dɛ gah nyundua ge dɔ a kɔne, kɛ n Nɛn Bie la te ta bobɛlbwa dɔe ń chɔ dɛ onɛ."
Asɛ o berɛ ŋɔ baa bɛl ge be ŋɔ, "Teŋɛ n nɛ." Anee baa la ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, gel n la, asɛ n mɛɛ baa sewaa, ń hugo mɔɔ dɛ ba."
Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Gel nɛra baa wola Korowii mkpa dɔe la huge ba dɔŋa, asɛ hé ka bol Korowii Kora la bini waa bagle nɛra."
Asɛ baa bɛl ge ŋɔ o be ja ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, mɛɛ teŋɛ he nɛ, kɛ gel n ka kal n haahna ne bii mɔɔ dɛ ba."

Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o ge be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa pa mun dɛɛ ba para dɛ ka kpɔ par, o nyu bini berɛ dɛɛ ɛo anɛnɛ la aa won parɛ a magre. Gɛɛ a do kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o te kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ja Korowii Kora la taa la bɛ berɛ dɔ liire anɛ kpa."
Anɔ habɔɔ la Yeesu yerɛ o habɔteŋra fifraanuanɛ dɛ banɛ bane, dɛ pɛ ba banɛnɛ, dɛ tom ba ŋɔ bá tɔ sie bwɛɛre ne bela waa dɛ ba a ta laŋa la ta.
O kpɔ nɛwɛnyini magɛ konduula, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Koo kondikwaa la kan, kɛ tom-ɛɛra la lɔ tamaa ken dɛɛ ba a koma. Anomanta hé soŋe Koo Te la ásɛ o kpɔ tom-ɛɛra la bane ba ja bá ka ɛ a toma.
Hé kaa. N dɛ tomɛ heyaa he ka koo he dɔma baah ta.
He bɛ suuga pure kpɔ, he bɛ pure haa kpɔ laala dɛɛ do a bini gba kpɔ, he bɛ naŋgawa bele anɛnɛ kpɔ. He bɛ ka jagɛ che ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ jam nɛra wobohweeh ne.
Dem haa ka chog o ta la, hé tɔ sie ŋɔ, 'Kórowii tɛ dem nɔ tena bosɔɔhna!'
Dɛ nɛn Korowii aa ŋɔa o dɔ bosɔɔhna lɔ bela aa, Korowii ɛɛ tɛo wedɛɛga haa soŋa laanee. Dɛ gɛ nɛn toole ge aa, he wedɛɛga haa soŋa la ɛɛ berɔɔ ba he gbagba be.
Hé so a gɛ dem la ta, dɛɛ di ba kondikwaa baa dɛ di dɛ tɛ heyaa la ane, dɛkalkɛŋɔ tom-ɛɛ kembɔr chɛo. A gɛ dem la te habɔɔ, he bɛ le ka so dem bɛlbwa ta kpa.
"Bwɛɛ bɛlbwa haa la o ta asɛ bela tena lɛ heyaa la, kwaa baa tɛ heyaa ŋɔ hé di la, hé lɛ dɛ di.
Hé chah bela tena ba bwara aa dɛ wee ba la weela, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Korowii Kora la pu heya.'
Dɛ he la bwɛɛ bɛl ta, ba ta heyaa lɛɛ yaa, he bɛ o ta so. Haa dɛɛ le la, hé ŋɔ,
'Hale ya jwii he bwɛɛ nɔ teera aa ɛ ya napaala la ta, dɛ́ bagle kɛŋɔ ya kpɔ Korowii Waa ba he be he vɛah. Kɛ a chɛ kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Kora la pu heya.'
Kasinteŋ, Sodom tena baa ɛ wechɔga asɛ Korowii fuuh ba la, baa bɔ gɛ bwɛɛ la tenaa awola Korowii aa ba dɛ ba pa bole la.

"Korasen tena, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Bɛtsaeda tena ge, hé bwɛɛlɛ! Dɛ nomɛl fe ɛ gɛ nyokpowaa nɔ maa ɛa he siwi ta nɔ Taaya ne Sidon aa, ba fe charɛ ba liire le ba wechɔga ta bigri. Ba fe ta lwe yale tɔe dɛ so sibegra ta naa?
Awola Korowii aa ba pa bole la, wɛɛ na Taaya ne Sidon tena sumii gwaa heya.
Asɛ he Kapeeneɔm tena ge, ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ n bol he waɔ? He dɛ nyin kɛ he ir kaa Korowii be nyundua kɛɛ? Hɛɛ ba harɛɛ Bɔnsam nii taa."
Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa ka no he be la, n bee o no, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa ka vɛh he waa la, n waa o vɛh. Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh n waa la, naate waa tom mɛ la waa o vɛh."

Yeesu habɔteŋra fifraanuanɛ dɛ banɛ la la o toma la dɛ ba silɛɛ ne, asɛ ba ne o cheme. Ba ne waa chema la, ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, yaa kaa che he sɔn ta dɛ bol waa la, kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ kwaraa ɔmɛ yaa."
Belaa Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He pɔ Bɔnsam nɛ. N nao kɛŋɔ waa le nyundua ba le harɛ kerabeŋkpoŋ kɛŋɔ bwaala aa nyɛgla ken.
Hɛ́ɛ no! N tɛ heyaa kpegri kɛŋɔ he tigri harɛkwaare ne nɔrɔme nɛ, dɛ pɔ ya dɔm ne o toroma bwa nɛ, wobɛlbwa aa wola won ɛ heya.
He bɛ gel a do he som kɛŋɔ kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ aa no he wobol nɔ. Waa aa chɛ kɛ he koh a waa dɛ gel he sie lɛ laanee kɛŋɔ ba chwerɛ he sɔna nyundua ja Korowii bii nɛ."

Gɛ saŋ dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ gel o sie lɛ, asɛ o ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, nyundua ne harɛ bwa Dɔɔ! N dɛ jaame kɛŋɔ haa kpɔ waa nɔ sɔh sipila tena ne wejerema, dɛ kpɔ bagle nɛra baa wola wobɛlbwa jemɛ nɔ. Jam, n Mɛɛ. Gɛɛ wera he be."
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ kpɔ wobɛlbwa do n nɔn ta. Nomɛlbwa aa men Korowii Bie jemɛ nemenɛ n Mɛɛ la gbo, asɛ nomɛlbwa ge aa n Mɛɛ la jemɛ nemenɛ n ne nɛra maa dɛ nyin kɛ n gel ba jemɔ la."
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la gbo aa baa so la, o berɛ sie ta ba be, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He nɛra he siwi aa na wejena maa dɛ ɛ nɔ la, he na som.
Kasinteŋ, Korowii keamere ne koranar kɛrɛdɛ fe dɛ nyin waa haa dɛ na dɛɛ no nɔ, dɛ no dɛ na, kɛ ba ta dɔe."
Tɔn Jereme bɛl balɔ dɛ ba kpɔ wobol kɛ wɛɛ daah Yeesuu dɛ jemɛ o liire, dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ́ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa nɔ?"
Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ Korowii Tɔn la bagle ɔ? Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ no a mun ɔ?"
Asɛ baa la ŋɔ, "Dɛ́ hé nyin N Naa Korowii he bambile bwa, he hweera, he bokpega ne he liire bwa ne, dɛ nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he gbagba."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kpelaa he ŋɔ. Dɛɛ ɛ gɛ, hɛɛ dɔ gɛ mkpa laanee."
Dɛ Tɔn Jereme la dɛ nyin kɛ o bagle kɛ o te dɛ ɛ waa Yeesu aa bɔɔra la bwa, dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Umee n dɔŋ ɔ?"

Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee le Jerusalam dɛɛ kaa Jeriko, dɛ ka pu ŋwɛɛra ŋwɛnɛ baah ta, ba den gugru, dɛ lɔɔro, dɛ pirao, tamaa kaa o sewɛ, dɛ laa o laala bwa lɛ o be, dɛ gelo o chɔ ŋwɛnɛ baah ta bela dɛɛ ba sewa.
Dɛ Sɔfo bɛl ge kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ la ta dɛ baa kaa, dɛ na baa la, dɛ fɛrɔ ba kaa.
Dɛ Lewi te bɛl waa dɛ ɛ toma Korowii Dea ge kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ la tenten ta dɛ ba pu baa la, dɛ ge fɛrɔ kaa.
Dɛ Samaria tena ba ne Juda tena aa wola jo la bɛl kpɔ a gɛ ŋwɛnɛ la tenten ta dɛ baa kaa, dɛ ba pu baa la, dɛ o chɔ o bug ta bela. Waa nao la, dɛ o waa sum o be.

O chog o bone cheg, dɛ nyiŋi a bini, dɛ laa noo ne tɛɛga kpɔ dɛ suuh tel o be, dɛ kpɔ noo la ne tɛɛga la do o ŋwɛra la ta. O vɔrɔwa, dɛ gɔɔro so o konteehne waa soge o ta la ta, dɛ kpɔɔ kaa bela dem bɛl hɔɔhra yon dɛɛ chog o ta la ta, dɛ ka nyiŋu.

Tɔ aa pera la Samaria te la kpɔ suugapoŋa anɛ tɛ naate waa dɛ nyiŋi hɔɔhra dem la ta la, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó nyiŋi weela te la nɛ, dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ berɔɔ ba kaa, asɛ dɛ ba bɔɔ komɛlbwa waa chɔg o nɛɛ la kem."
Yeesu aa bol waa nɔ tonɛ la, o bɔɔ Tɔn Jereme la ŋɔ, "Nɛra batoro nɔ, ba bini umee nyiŋi baa la ŋwɛɛra aa lɔɔro dɛ pirao la kɛŋɔ o dɔŋ ɔ?"
Belaa Tɔn Jereme la chaŋe ŋɔ, "Onɔ la waa na o sum dɛ nyiŋu laanee." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kaa dɛ kaa ɛ gɛ tenten."
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la aa dɛ kaa la, ba kaa tel bwɛɛ bɛl ta, belaa haah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Maata lɛo dɛ kaa o ne o dem.
Dɛ Maata dɔ o nime bihaah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Mɛɛre. Dɛ gɛ Mɛɛre nɔ, dɛ o soge Yeesu be dɛɛ no o webagla la.
Dɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la kondikwaa toma gwaa Maata nɛ, anee o la Yeesu be dɛ ka ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he ta nae kɛŋɔ n nime aa kpɔ toma la bwa ta n gbo nɛ aa? Anomanta ŋɔ o be ó ba cha mɛ!"
Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Eei, Maata! Wedamanta begre he sie, a lɛ he liire bwa. Kɛ webeŋkpoŋ gee hiaah.
Waa aa weraa Mɛɛre kpɔ la, anomanta maa won ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó gel."
Awola bɛl, dɛ Yeesu lɔ bobɛl dɛɛ soŋe Korowii. Waa tona la, o habɔteŋra la bɛl ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, bagle yaa Korowii soŋa, gɛ Jɔn aa bagle o habɔteŋra la."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, hé ŋɔ, 'Ya Mɛɛ haa lɔ nyundua, henee chɛ duura. Bagle he Kora dii harɛ nɔ ta.
Tɛ yaa ya fini kondikwa,
dɛ kpɔ ya wechɔga kɛ yaa, gɛ yaa kpɔ ya dɔŋa wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ ba la. Dɛɛ ke yaa wechɔga lugri ta.' "
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "He kpɔ kɛŋɔ he bini bɛl dɔ o dam, dɛ la ka chumu harambaŋa, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'N dam, kem mɛ pea atoro.
N dam bɛl le bobɛl ba chog mɛ taraken, n ge ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ tɛo ó di.'
Dɛ he soŋo gɛ naa, wɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ hé gelo, ŋɔ he bɛ o dom chɔg ŋɔ o karɛ o gbera o ne o bii chɔ, anomanta waa won ir dɛ tɛɛ komɛlbwa naa? Akai! Waa won ŋɔ gɛ.
Kasinteŋ, dɛ a ka darame la gbo wa aa, o fe aa ir dɛ tɛɛ komɛlbwa. Kɛ haa wola kaalɛ, dɛ ta che dɛɛ soŋo la nomanta, wɛɛ tɛɛ komɛlbwa haa dɛ nyin laanee.
"Anomanta gɛɛ a do hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa. Hɛ́ɛ nyin he konnyina o be, hɛɛ dɔɔ. Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ lɔ gbera, wɛɛ ya heyaa.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ soŋo la dɛ dɔ, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o konnyina dɛɛ le o be la, o dɛ tɛo. Gɛɛ Korowii ɛɛ ba gbera yae dɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ lɔ la.
"He bini umee o bie ɛɛ nyin pɛŋe, ó ka lawɛ harɛkon ba tɛo wɔ?
Kɛɛ dɛ o dɛ nyin jahal aa, ó ka lawɛ nɔm ba tɛo wɔ?
Dɛ he wechɔg-ɛɛra nɔ kwaraa jemɔ dɛ kpɔ kondɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ he bii aa, ɛrɛ waa he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la te aa wola nɛra baa dɛ soŋo o Domadɛɛge la tenee tɛo!"
Dɛ Yeesu dɛ doŋi kwaa aa lɔ baa bɛl nɛɛ o berɛ amumu. Kwaa la aa le baa la nɛɛ la, o bol wa. Nɛnlaa la aa lɔ bela la nyoa kpoo.
Bane te ŋɔ, "Kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ bwa nomoa baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛlsebul la, onee tɛo kpegri wɛɛ doŋi kwaa la."
Dɛ bane ge dɛ nyin dɛ daahno na dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ɛ we-ɛɛla ane asɛ dɛ bagle kɛ onee nɛwɛnyini Lɛɛ la.

Yeesu aa jemɛ waa baa dɛ lii la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ harɛ bɛl ta tena bini pere anɛ ba gbo ɛɛ yo aa, harɛ la dɛ pagre. Gɛɛ dɛ waane ba lola bɛl bini asɛ ba pere anɛ dɛ gbo ɛɛ yo aa, lola la aa won ɛ lola.
Anomanta dɛ Bɔnsam kora bini pero baa yo aa, o kora la aa won ɛ kora. Heyaa ŋɔa ŋɔ Bɛlsebulee tɛ mɛ kpegri n won kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ doŋa.
Dɛ Bɛlsebul nɛɛ n che dɛɛ doŋa aa, a wer. Aah dɛ he ge, umee tɛ he habɔteŋra nɔ kpegri ba won a doŋa ɔ? He gbagba habɔteŋra la we-ɛɛlaa dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he kono kwara!
Korowii kpegri nee mɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ la. Anomanta hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Kora dii la telo tonɛ.
"Dɛ bokpega te kpɔ o dɔmkwaa dɛɛ daah o dem kɛrɛdɛ naa, o komɛlbwa aa chɔg.
Kɛ dɛ bɛl ge berɔ do kpegri gwaalo dɛ ka puu dɛ pɔ o nɛ aa, o dɛ kpɔ o dɔmkwaa waa kpɔ o sie dawɛ a ta la, dɛ kpɔ o kondɔɔh ja.
"Nomɛlbwa waa wola n nɛɛ jae la aa n waa nyin. Nomɛlbwa waa wola men chae dɛɛ boa n nɛra nyoa dɛɛ pɛ la lɔ ba dɛɛ pegre.

"Fini nɔ nɛra do kɛŋɔ nɛn Bɔnsam aa gela o torome bɛl do o nɛɛ dɛ chɔg o da. A habɔɔ la naate charɛ o liire, asɛ Bɔnsam torome la le o nɛɛ dɛ kaa ka nyin bofale dɛ́ so. O gaagaa, o ta wone dɔ bɔr dɛ́ so onɛ, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ kaa n bug ta bela maa lea ba laanee,'
dɛ berɛ ka na kɛ baa la liire bini chaahnɔ kɛŋɔ dea baa chaaro dɛ kwaaro kɛrɛdɛ ba ta nɛn kpɔe do o ta dɛ gel o chɔ pɛɛ la.
Gɛɛ o yon la ka kpɔ o bala anuanɛ aa gwaalo kwara. A bwa won ba so naate la nɛ, dɛ chɔg o da gwaa gɛ o faa doa wubwa la. Gɛɛ aa ba doe fini nɔ nɛra baa ɛ nɛnchɔga nɔ nɛ."
Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, haah bɛl bol waa o be takpeg ne nɛra la baah ta, dɛ ŋɔ, "Haah waa lolɛ dɛ dɛɛre la na som."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa dɛ no Korowii Waa dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta laanee na som."

Nɛra la aa bar Yeesu cheme pirim la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ fini nɔ nɛra ɛ nɛnchɔga ken?" Ba dɛ nyin nyokpowaa dɛ na mɔɔ dɛ yarada kɛ Korowii bee n le, kɛ baa dɔ na. Waa aa pu Korowii keame Jona la dɔŋa gboo dɛɛ ba n ge pui ásɛ he che a ta dɛ jemɛ n nɛnsoo.
Gɛ Korowii aa ɛ Jona dɛ bagle Niniwe tena kɛ on tomɔ la, gɛ tentenee wɛɛ ba men Nɛn Bie la ge ɛɛ dɛ bagle fini nɔ nɛra kɛ on tom mɛ.

Awola nɛra bwa aa ir seo ta dɛ ba che Korowii sie asɛ o bol ba waa dɛ pa bole la, Seba kooro waa ɛ haah la ɛɛ bol waa bɔ fini nɔ tena, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o valɔ le o harɛ ta bojaŋ le dɛ́ ba no Kooro Solomɔn wejemwa. Kɛ kasinteŋ, naate waa gwaa Kooro Solomɔn lɔ bonɔ, asɛ he ŋɔ haa o bee no.
Niniwe tena gba ɛɛ bol waa bɔ fini nɔ tena, dɛkalkɛ ba te no Korowii Waa Jona aa bola la mun dɛ charɛ ba liire le ba wechɔga ta. Kɛ kasinteŋ, naate waa gwaa Jona lɔ bonɔ, asɛ he ŋɔ haa o bee no.
"Nomɛlbwa aa kandea choŋi asɛ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ sɔh dea bini, bela nomɛlbwa aa wola on na, kɛɛ dɛ kpɔ kon pi o ta. Ba choŋi kandea aa, ba kpɔɔ dɛɛ chɔŋɛ kon ta asɛ wɛɛ chaah nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ba bela.

Sibie do kɛ kandea dɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyini. He sibie wer aa, he dɛ na bɔr. Dɛ a chɔgɔ ge aa, amɔ dɛ he lɔ biro ta. Gɛɛ a do, dɛ he sie begre Korowii waa ta naa, dɛ he wobɛlbwa ta chaahnɔ. Kɛ dɛ he sie begre harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta naa, he lɔ biro ta.
Anomanta hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ he sie won chaah waa Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la ta, he bɛ biro ta so.
Dɛ he sie begre Korowii waa ta, asɛ he gel wetɔŋla ne dachɔge bɛlbwa dɛ lɛ Korowii wa aa, gɛɛ he sie ɛɛ ba chaahna kɛrɛdɛ Korowii waa la ta, kɛŋɔ baa choŋi kandea asɛ wɛɛ chaah bɔr kohona la."
Yeesu aa bol waa tonɛ la, Farisii te bɛl yerɔ ŋɔ ó ba di kwaa o dem. Anee o la baa la dem dɛ ka so dɛɛ ba kwaa dii.
A ɛ Farisii te la nyokpoa kɛ waa dɛ ba kwaa dii la, o ta nɔɔra samɛ gɛ ba nawee wa aa dɛ bagle la.
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He Farisii tena do kɛŋɔ baa loo numoli ne hɛne bwara dɛ gel a bini la. Nɛra sie ta waa gboo hɛɛ ɛ, kɛ he bambile bini te, wechɔga ne kwaa ta sibegra gboo he bwa.
Gɛna! Korowii waa ta yaa nɔ, o laa ɛ ya bini ne ya baŋ bwa kɛɛ?
Hé kpɔ kwaa haa nyina cheg la dɛɛ kɛ nyaara he bambile bwa ne ásɛ komɛlbwa do wer tɛ heya.
"He Farisii tena, hé bwɛɛlɛ kɛ haa dɛ tɛ Korowii o bɔr he par nyoa kondikonjegre kwaraa ta, kɛ dɛ vɛh kasinteŋ ne Korowii nyina te la. Anɔ nɔɔ chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛ, kɛ he bɛ anɔ la aa jaa la gel.
Farisii tena, hé bwɛɛlɛ kɛ haa dɛ nyin sobɔrdɛɛga cheremi deene bini, dɛɛ nyin kɛ baa duu heyaa nɛra baah ta nɔ.
Hé bwɛɛlɛ! He do kɛŋɔ ŋwama nɛra aa wola a waa jemɛ dɛɛ valɛ a ta ken."
Belaa Tɔn Jerema la bɛl ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, dɛ he ŋɔ gɛ naa, dɛ he jo ya gba nɛ."
Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "He Tɔn Jerema haa dɛ bagle Korowii Waa la ge, hé bwɛɛlɛ. He kpɔ wekpega aa do kɛŋɔ bone dɛ dawɛ nɛra nɛ, kɛ dɛ te berɛ laa nɔn kpɔ a ta.
Hé bwɛɛlɛ. Heyaa ma kwaa chɔŋre Korowii keamere ŋwama ta la. Gɛ nɛra nɔ laa he naanar kpoo la aa?
Kwaa haa maa chɔŋre Korowii keamere la ŋwama la ta la baglɔ kɛŋɔ he gbabir sɛh waa he naanar aa ɛa la ta.
Anɔ waa Korowii bol o Tɔn la baa dɛ yerɔ Wejema la bini ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ tomɛ n keamere ne toroma ba bee, baa kpoo banee dɛ fiigi bane' la.
Anomanta Korowii ɛɛ pɛɛ fini nɔ nɛra o keamere nɛra aa kpoo ba le harɛ mumpar la bwa waa.
Dɛ le Abɛl kpoe ta ka tel Sakaria baa kpoo bela baa dɛ fuh kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii ne Korowii Dea la tenten baah ta la. Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, Korowii ɛɛ pɛɛ fini nɔ nɛra ba bwa waa.
Hé Tɔn Jerema ge bwɛɛlɛ! He do kɛŋɔ nɛra baa laa dea Korowii wejema aa lɔ o bini karɛ, dɛ laa koŋkare la kpɔ haa wola o binii jo, he ge aa nɛra ŋwɛnɛɛ tɛ ba jo dɛ ka hweli."
Yeesu aa le bela kaa la, Tɔn Jerema la ne Farisii tena la mugli o baah taeh, dɛ gel o bol waa kohona,
dɛ hagro bela dɛ́ lawɛ o nyoa.

Aa ɛ tama la, nɛra kagboŋa baa cheme Yeesu sie. Baa wara nomanta, dɛ ba dɛ tigri dɔŋa nakpale ta. Belaa Yeesu tɔ sie bol waa o habɔteŋra la be dɛ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ Farisii tena iisi wa. Nɛra sie baa nyiŋi dɛɛ ɛ wa.
Wobɛlbwa nɛra aa tɔ a ta la ɛɛ le baŋee, asɛ waa aa sɔah bwa ge le nɛra jemɛ.
Taraken waa haa bola biro ta la, aa le bochaah taa ba no, asɛ waa haa sɔah bol nɛn be dea he ne o gbo la, baa bola nɛnlaa baahnee.
"Yabala, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, he bɛ nɛra baa dɛ ba wona kpo heyaa baa wola won ɛ waane kpa la ɔmɛ.
Kɛ mɛɛ bagle heyaa naate aa chɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ɔmɛɛ. Hɛ́ɛ ɔmɛ Korowii waa dɛ ba wona kpo heya, dɛ berɛ won kpɔ heyaa kaa Bɔnsam nii ta la. Onee chɛ kɛŋɔ he ɔmɛ.
He nao kɛ pɛtoprɛ ta yog dɔe, kɛ Korowii ta beŋkpoŋ kwaraa waa soɛh.
He nyumpona kwara, Korowii jemɛ a nyoa. He bɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ. He ta pɛtoprɛ gwaalɛ wobɛlbwa ta naa?

"Hé gel n ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa won che nɛra baah ta dɛ sɛh ŋɔ o ja n nɛɛ la, awola Korowii aa ba dɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la, n Nɛn Bie la gee yerɛ naate sɔn nyundua toroma siee kɛ o ja n nɛ.
Nomɛlbwa ge waa vɛɛh mɛ nɛra baah ta, dɛ ŋɔ o ta n nɛɛ jae la, awola Korowii aa ba dɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la, n gee vɛh naatee nyundua toroma sie ŋɔ n ne o laa.
Nomɛlbwa waa bol waa yagɛ n Nɛn Bie la, Korowii ɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛo, kɛ naate waa ɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la nɛnhɛla la te, Korowii aa o wechɔgaa kpɔ kɛo.
"Dɛ ba yerɛ heyaa ka che cheremi deene bini ne harɛ nɔ ta nomonome sie naa, he bɛ gel gɛ haa bol dɛ lɛ he te la hiah heya,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ɛɛ bagle heyaa bug la ta gɛ haa dɛ ba bola."
Belaa baa bɛl waa ja nɛnlaa la nɛɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ŋɔ n dɔɔ be ásɛ o gel ya bɔne kpanjogo ya mɛɛ aa sewa dɛ gel tɛ yaa a do o be la bini."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nɛmbaa, umee kpɔ mɛ cheg ŋɔ ń bol he waa dɛ bɔne he kapɛrɛ ɔ?"
O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gel he sie chɔ harɛ he nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ kwaa dɛɛ kam, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini kondɔɔh kohona laa o mkpa."
Yeesu sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Suuga te bɛlee fa lole o koo kondikwaa ɛ taeh.
Belaa o so dɛ lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, 'Ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ? Bela maa chea do la aa kanɛ,'
dɛ ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ pagre n dɔndɔŋre nɔɔ dɛ ɛa a do kan ásɛ n mea ne n kwaa bwa dɔ bɔr jo a bini.'
O lii waa o nyu bini dɛ ŋɔ, 'N dɔ kwaa dɛ́ di la sie, mɛɛ diu dɛ lɛ n sie dɛ so dɛɛ onɛ.'
Anee Korowii ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Gɛne! Fini jwaana nɔ ne hɛɛ sewɔɔ, asɛ kwaa haa kwaara cheg la, lee hɛɛ ba a bɔr nae jaɔ?' "
Waa Yeesu aa bola dɛ kpɔ teŋe gɛ waa la ta laanee kɛ, "Gɛɛ aa ba nɛra la baa kwaa kondɔɔh dɛɛ cheg ba te harɛ ta bonɔ baa wola kembɔr bɛlbwa dɔe Korowii be la nɛɛ doe."
Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Anomanta, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, he bɛ gel he sie begre he soga bini kwaa haa di ne kwaa haa tɔ wa.
He mkpa gwaa kondikwa, he bwadabii ge gwaa yal.
Hé ta sie nyiŋi jumbii na. Aa kwaa du, aa komɛ, a ta bela aa komɛ kwaa dɛɛ do dɔe. Korowiirii dɛɛ tɛa kondikwa. He gwaa jumbii bam!
He bini umee dɛ won kpɔ sibegra ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ kpɔ tɔpebeŋkpoŋ ja o mkpa ta nɔ?
Dɛ haa won ɛ a gɛ wetamaa nɔ gba naa, ɛrɛɛ he gel he sie ɛɛ begre anɔ la aa kaa waɔ?

"Hé ta sie nyiŋi kpɔg bini koŋkwaa aa dɛ fe a fee yon do wer la dɛ na. Aa toma ɛɛ dɛɛ koh, aa yabi ta. Kɛ n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, Kooro Solomɔn gba ne o kondɔɔh bwa, o laala ta wer doe kɛ a gɛ kwaa nɔ bwa.
Kpɔga haa naa a do wer fini, asɛ kere gbo dɛ a serewɔ ba fuah nɔ, dɛ Korowii gelɔ a do wer ken naa, ɛrɛɛ waa wola won tɔ heyaa yal gwaala ɔ? He yarada aa kanɛ kwara!
Anomanta he bɛ gel he sie begre hɛɛ nyin anɔ la haa di ne anɔ la haa nyɔ.
Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ baa wola Korowii tomɛ la liiree dɛɛ do a gɛ kwaa nɔ ta. He Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la jemɔ kɛ he dɛ nyin anɔ bwa.
Hé gel he sie begre Korowii Kora la ta, asɛ ó kpɔ anɔ haa dɛ nyin nɔ bwa tɛ heya.
"Anomanta, Korowii toroma, haa kanɛ, kɛ he bɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ, dɛkalkɛ a dɛ ɛ he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la silɛɛ kɛ he ja o Kora la ta.

Hé yog kwaa haa dɔa asɛ dɛ kpɔ a suuga la kɛ nyaara. He ɛ gɛ naa, hɛɛ dɔ pure aa wola chɔg ne kondɔɔh aa wola tonɛ bwa Korowii doa. Belaa kondɔɔh aa wola mule, dɛkalkɛ ŋwɛɛra aa won la ka ŋwɛa, kwaa ge aa wola won chwea.
Bela he kondɔɔh aa lole laanee he liire ge do.
"Hé kpɔ he te dɛɛ kpa toma ɛɛ. Hé kpɔ he te dɛ gel he kandere ɛɛ hɔ,
kɛŋɔ bonɔɔna ba dɔɔ aa kaa hanfale chema asɛ ba so kpao, ásɛ dɛ o balɔ dɛ ba lɔ gbera aa, bug la ta ba yao la.
Bonɔɔna baa soga kpa ba dɔɔ, ba ta dom chɔe o ba puu ba la, ba sie dɛ lɛ. Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, wɛɛ kpɔ o tenee dɛ yer ba so tig ta, asɛ dɛ tɛɛ ba kwaa ba di.
Dɛ ba dɔɔ la balɔ jwaana kɛɛ harambaŋa dɛ ba puu ba kɛ ba sogo kpao waa, ba sie ɛɛ lɛo.
Hɛ́ɛ no. Dɛ dem te fe jemɛ gɛ saŋ ŋwɛɛ aa ba ŋwɛo waa, o fe aa gel o won ba jo o dem dɛ ŋwɛo.
Gɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ hé ge kpɔ he te dɛ so kpa, dɛkalkɛ pigraa n Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ ba ba pigri heya."
Anee Pita ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, yanee hɛɛ sɛgle nɔ kɛɛ nomɛlbwa jao wɔ?"
Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Bonɔɔ waa dɔ kasinteŋ dɛ dɔ liire la nɔn taa o dɔɔ kpɔ o dem tena la dɛɛ do, dɛ ŋɔ bɔr dɛ magre aa, ó tɛɛ ba kondikwa.
Dɛ bonɔɔ la dɔɔ la baa puu, dɛ o dɛ ɛ gɛ waa kpɔa do o nɔn ta la aa, bonɔɔ la sie ɛɛ lɛo.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, o dɔɔ la ɛɛ kpɔ o komɛlbwaa do o nɔn ta ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi a ta.
Kɛ dɛ bonɔɔ la ta gɛ liire, dɛ ŋɔ, 'N dɔɔ ŋwɛnɛ nɔ waa kaala nɔ, waa ba taraken,' dɛ do o dɔŋa bonɔɔna la ne toli baa kaa la nɛɛ dɛɛ lɔɔ, dɛ di kwaa dɛ nyɔ sen dɛɛ dɛɛ raa, amɔ wɛɛ na waa.
Tɔpebeŋkpoŋii o dɔɔ ɛɛ ba bala ba pigru, asɛ dɛ ba tɛr o deŋne taeh kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ɛ nɛra baa wola Korowii yarada la ken.
"Bonɔɔ waa jemɛ gɛ o dɔɔ raa dɛ nyin, kɛ dɛ vɛh o te kpɔe dɛ ɛ gɛ tɛo la, o dɔɔ ɛɛ geloo ba lɔɔro taeh.

Kɛ bonɔɔ waa wola gɛ o dɔɔ raa dɛ nyin jemɛ, dɛ ɛ lɔɔra waa la, baa lɔɔroo tamaa ken dɛ́ kpɔ dɛɛ tɛr o deŋne. Nɛn Korowii aa chao o jemɛ waa kohona la nɛɛ o kpɔ wedamanta ɛɛ dawɛ. Nɛn baa kpɔ waa do o nɔn ta kohona la bee baa bɔɔ waa kohona.
"N balɔ dɛ́ ba kpɔ nii ta harɛ nɔ ta ó fuh. Dɛ nii la fe dɔɔ dɛɛ hɔ aa, a fe ɛɛ do n somee taeh.
Wahala ane chɔ n sie a chɛ kɛŋɔ ba do mɛ a ta kɛŋɔ ba dɛ sɔ nɛn Korowii ne aa, ba yon doo nee ta la. Dɛ n ta a gɛ wahala la nae tonaa, n bambile ta men sɔɔhnɛ.
He dɛ lii kɛ n ba nyopɛo ne harɛ nɔ ta kɛɛ? Akai, n balɔ ásɛ nɛra ne ba lolanar dɔm.
Le fini dɛɛ kaa, dem beŋkpoŋ nɛra banue aa lɔ o ta la, ba baah dɛ ba pera asɛ batoro hah banɛ, asɛ banɛ la ge hah batoro la.
Mɛɛnanar dɛ ba ba bibaala haeh, asɛ bibaala ge hah ba mɛɛnanar. Nyare ɛɛ hah ba bihaahnaa, asɛ bihaahna hah ba nyare. Haahna ɛɛ hah ba bii haahnaa, asɛ ba bii haahna hah ba."
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ nɛnlaa la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he na baama dɛ kaa mun ta naa, gɛɛ he ŋɔ bwaala dɛ ba nɛɛ, dɛ o nɛo.
He jemɛ bela peu aa le dɛɛ ta he ŋɔ bɔwɔb ɛɛ bao, dɛ o balɔ kpela.
Nɛra haa dɛ nyiŋi nɛn sie bɔr mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa, he won nyundua ne harɛ nyiŋa dɛ jemɛ waa aa dɛ ba chiga, aah ɛrɛ waa haa wola won jemɛ waa aa dɛ chig taraken nɔ te mun nɔɔ?
"He te aa won nyiŋi dɛ na waa aa wera dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta naa?
Dɛ he ne he dɔŋ dɔɔ, asɛ o kpɔe dɛɛ kaa kɔɔto aa, larawe naate hé ne o pɛ. Dɛ gɛ laa, o tel he ne bela aa, kɔɔto nomoa waa dɛ pa bole la dɛ ba he kpɔe dɛ tɛ prosiri, asɛ ba ka doe dea.
Belaa hɛɛ ba doe ka tel kɛ haa bɔ suuga baa dɛ lɛɛ la bwa ka tonɛ, kapɛrɛ gba aa wola ka."
Gɛ saŋ la dɛ nɛra bane lɔ bela dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ Galilia tena bane fa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii, asɛ Paelet kpoo ba, asɛ ba chal koo kwaa baa kpoa tɛ Korowii la chal ta.
Asɛ Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "He dɛ lii kɛŋɔ waa aa pu a gɛ Galilia tena nɔ dɛ bagle kɛ ba wechɔga gwaa Galilia tena baa kaa la kwaa kɛɛ?
N dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, gɛ laa a do. Dɛ he ta he liire charɛ le he wechɔga ta naa, he bwa gee serewoo."
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Asɛ nɛra fi dɛ banuatoro bane dejaŋ bɛl aa kua chole ba nɛɛ Siloam ba bwa serewe la geɔ? He liire dɛ ɛ heyaa kɛ ba wechɔga gwaa nɛra baa lɔ Jerusalam bwa kwaa kɛɛ?
N dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, gɛ laa a do. Dɛ he ta he liire charɛ dɛ le wechɔga ta naa, he bwa gee serewoo."
Yeesu sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛ du daa bɛl o koo ta. O laŋɔ ŋɔ ó ka nyin o nɔna togri, o ta nɔn beŋkpoŋ kwaraa dɔe o ta.
Anee o ŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔɔ wɛɛ nyiŋi koo la ta la be ŋɔ, 'Na, bene atoroo nɔ maa dɛ ba bonɔ dɛ baa nyin daa nɔ nɔna, kɛ maa ane dɔ. Anomanta teŋo ta! Ɛrɛɛ o che bonɔ dɛ lɛ bɔr dɛɛ ɛɔ?'
Asɛ nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi koo la ta la ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, gel o che benanyoa beŋkpoŋ ja yá na. Mɛɛ kwi o munii dɛ che nabena do o mun ta.
Dɛ benanyoa chemo o nɔnaa, amɔ te dɛ anee. O ta wone nɔnɛ ge aa, asɛ hé teŋo ta.' "
Awola Ona Tɔpere bɛl, dɛ Yeesu dɛ bagle waa ba cheremi dea bɛl ta.
Dɛ haah bɛl kwa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ weela ta o nɛɛ bene fi dɛ anuatoro dɛ guro waa wola won pee o te kwaraa lɔ bela.
Yeesu aa nao la, o yerɔ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Haah, le fini dɛɛ kaa, he weela kaalɔ, aa ba kpa."
Yeesu kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ haah la nɛ, asɛ bug la ta o won pee o te, dɛ jam Korowii.

Cheremi dea bela nomoa la baah diu kɛ Yeesu aa chah nɛn Ona Tɔpere ta la, dɛ ŋɔ nɛra la aa lɔ bela la be ŋɔ, "Tɔpera anumɛlee chɛ kɛŋɔ ya kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ toma. Anomanta a gɛ tɔpera la taa chɛ kɛ he baa chah he weela, kɛ Ona Tɔpere te ta laa!"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛra haa dɛ nyiŋi nɛn sie bɔr mɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ wa! Haa he nae ne keegore yae dɛɛ ta Ona Tɔpere dɛ tega la nee ta á kaa nyɔ ne aa?
Haah nɔ, Abraham naa on. Bene fi dɛ anuatoroo la Bɔnsam aa soge o nɛɛ dɛ chɔgo, aah aa were kɛ ba doŋi Bɔnsam la le o nɛɛ Ona Tɔpere dɛ lɛo ta aa?"
Yeesu aa bol gɛ la, sihiih kpo o dɔma la. Kɛ nɛnlaa baa kaa la te sie lɛ nyokpowaa waa ɛa la ta.
Anee Yeesu berɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛ tenee Korowii Kora waa la doɔ? Bɔkwa konee mɛɛ ba o kpɔe dɛ magɔɔ?
O waa tamaa bɛlbwa won yɛɛra kɛŋɔ baa bɛl aa ira dɛ kpɔ mastad bii waa do jegaa gwaa daa bɛlbwa bi, dɛ kpɔ ka du, asɛ o le dɛ ɛ da, jumbii sɔh kɔne do o kpala ta."
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa konee ń berɛ kpɔ Korowii Kora waa la magɛ jaɔ?
A won komɛlbwa begra kɛŋɔ haah bɛl aa ira dɛ kpɔ iisi tama ka koo men logbaa del ta, asɛ a won gel men la bwa uge."
Yeesu chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam. Waa dɛ kaa la, o kpɔ bwɛjena ne bwɛjegre ta dɛɛ bagle nɛra wa.
Anee nomɛl bɔɔro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, nɛra tama kenii Korowii ɛɛ ba lɛɛ yaa?" Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
"Hé takapɔ dɛ kpɔ doonyoa waa do feelɔɔ o ta joe do kpegri la ta dɛ jo ka ja Korowii Kora la ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra ɛɛ warɔɔ dɛɛ nyin dɛ jo bela, kɛ baa won dɔ bɔr jo.
Dem te la ɛɛ iruu dɛ ba laa gbera la tɔ, a ka heyaa che baŋ, asɛ hɛɛ lɔ gbera dɛɛ soŋo ŋɔ, 'N poori, nomoa! Laa gbera ya yaa ásɛ ya jo.' Asɛ o ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, 'Maa heyaa jemɛ bobɛlbwa.'
Belaa hɛɛ ba ŋɔe ŋɔ, 'Ya ne he fa pɛ nɔn di kwa, asɛ he bol waa bagle yaa ya bwɛɛ ka.'
Asɛ o berɛ ŋɔ he be ja ŋɔ, 'N ŋɔ maa heyaa jemɛ bobɛlbwa. Hé le n nɛɛ kaa, nɛnchɔga bane!'
"Bela la, hɛɛ na Abraham ne Aesek ne Jekɔb ne Korowii keamere la bwa Korowii Kora la taa, asɛ Korowii doŋi he te ta. Belaa aa ba he nɛɛ wee, asɛ hɛɛ wi.
Nɛra ɛɛ le wee leebɔr ne wee cholibɔr ne harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwaa dɛ ba ja Korowii Kora la ta, asɛ dɛ pɛ nɔn di kwaa dɛ lɛ sie.
Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa ka mun taraken ɛɛ ba tɔ siee, asɛ nɛra baa tɔ sie la ge ba kaa mun ta."
Yeesu taa chegɛ bug la ta la, Farisii tena bane ba o be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛ he le bonɔ dɛ kaa bobɛl, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Kooro Hɛrɔd dɛ nyini dɛ́ kpoe."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé ka ŋɔ baradeɛre te la be ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ so lee dɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ, dɛɛ chah weela tena tɔpera anɛ mɔɔ dɛ tonɛ n toma.'
Mɛɛ sewɔɔ te, kɛ a chɛ kɛ n valɛ ŋwɛnɛ tɔpera anɛ dɛ kaa Jerusalam. Bela laa baa kpoo Korowii keamere aa?

"Oo, Jerusalam tena! Korowii tomɛ o keamere he be naa, gɛɛ he kpoo ba, o tomɛ toroma he be naa, gɛɛ he fog ba bwea. Saŋ bɛlbwaa mɛɛ nyin kɛ n kpɔ nɔn tɔ he nɛɛ kɛ jal aa lawɛ o bii dɛɛ do o kena lɔgre la, kɛ haa nyin kɛ n lawɛ heyaa pɛ.
Taraken te, Korowii ta he waa tɛ heya. Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, haa men na kpa ka tel gɛ saŋ maa ba ja, asɛ he ŋɔ, 'Woowo! Korowii Biee chegɛ o sɔn ta dɛɛ ba la!' "
Awola Ona Tɔpere bɛl, Yeesu la Farisii tena nomonome la bɛl dem dɛɛ la ka di kwa, asɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela la ɛɛ nyiŋu dɛɛ kari waa waa dɛ ɛ bwa.
Dɛ baa bɛl waa suuga soge Yeesu sie bela,
anee Yeesu bɔɔ Tɔn Jerema la ne Farisii tena la ŋɔ, "Ya mmarare la dɛ tɛ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ba chah nɛn Ona Tɔpere aa?"
Asɛ ba bwa hel. Anee o lawɛ baa la dɛ chaoh dɛ kpɔɔ ta o kaa.
Asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He bini umee o bie kɛɛ o nao le kɔlɔŋ bini Ona Tɔpere, waa wola on lawɛ le kɔlɔŋ la bini warane Ona Tɔpere la tenten ta nɔ?"
Ba ta wone dɔ waane chaŋo a gɛ waa la ta.
Nɛra baa yer ba ŋɔ bá ba di kwaa la aa bala la, dɛ ba dɛ pɛne sobɔrdɛɛga dɛ́ so. Anee Yeesu aa na ba gɛ la, o kpɔ sɛgla bol waa bag ba ŋɔ,
"Dɛ nomɛl baa yerɛ heyaa hanfale kondikwaa mun ŋɔ hé ba di kwaa aa, he bɛ nomonsobɔra ka pɛne dɛɛ so. Aa bao kɛ o ken ka yerɛ nomɛl o nomonome aa gwaale.
Dɛ o balaa, naate waa yerɛ he bwa la ɛɛ ba ŋɔ he bee ŋɔ hé ir dɛ kpɔ nomombɔr la tɛ nomoa la. Belaa hɛɛ ba sihiih kpɔe dɛ ir ka so bechasobɔr nɛra la bwa habɔɔ.

Dɛ ba yerɛ a gɛ yer nɔ dɔŋ bɔr aa, ka so bechasobɔr, asɛ dɛ naate waa yerɛ la balaa, ó ba ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, 'N dam, ir kaa sie nomombɔr bela ka so.' An dɛ tɛɛ jirima nɛra baa yerɛ he ne ba bwa la siwi ta.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ maŋkura o te la, Korowii ɛɛ ba o ne harɛɛ, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ pwɛr o te la, Korowii ɛɛ ɛo nɛnjenii."

Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ baa la waa yer ba ŋɔ bá ba di kwaa la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ɛ kondikonjena webaŋa kɛɛ jwaana dɛɛ yerɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá ba di aa, bɛ he daamanar, he nimanar, he lola, kɛɛ he dɔŋa kondɔɔhna gbo yerɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba gee ɛ anee dɛ yerɛ, amɔ dɛ he kwaa la kemee ba bɔe la.
Dɛ he ɛ gɛ kondikwaa nɔ soosiwi aa, yerɛ nyaara ne boobie ne nɛra ba nakpale aa teŋna, ne nyoŋa bá ba di,
ásɛ Korowii ɛɛ andɛɛga, dɛkalkɛ ba ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ kpɔ bɔe kem. Awola nɛndɛɛga aa ir seo ta la, Korowii ɛɛ bɔe a kemee."
Belaa nɛra Yeesu ne baa soge kondibɔr la bɛl no gɛ waa la, dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa ba ja Korowii Kora la ta dɛ di kwaa la, ba sie ɛɛ lɛo kɛrɛdɛ!"
Anee Yeesu sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛ ɛ kondikonjena, dɛ yerɛ nɛra pirim ŋɔ bá ba di.
Bɔr magrɔ kɛ bá ba kondikwaa la dibɔr, asɛ o tomɛ bonɔɔ ŋɔ ó ka yerɛ nɛra waa yer ba la ŋɔ bá ba, kɛ o tonɛ komɛlbwa.

Bonɔɔ la aa la ba be la, ba bwa ŋɔ ba ta bɔr dɔe, dɛ vɛh. Sitɔte la ŋɔ bonɔɔ la be ŋɔ o yawɛ harɛ bɛl a chɛ kɛ o la dɛ ka nao, anomanta bónɔɔ la ka ŋɔ o dɔɔ be ŋɔ o bɛ gel a ɛ waane kɛ waa wola bɔr dɔe dɛ ba la.
Bɛl ge ŋɔ o yawɛ nae fi dɛ vɔrɔwe kwaa doa dɛɛ kaa a ne koo dɛ́ ka parɛ a ne dɛ na, kɛ tórome la ka ŋɔ o dɔɔ be ŋɔ o bɛ gel a ɛ waane kɛ waa wola bɔr dɔe dɛ ba la.
Bɛl ge ŋɔ waa mo haah ta bigre, anomanta waa won ba.

"Asɛ bonɔɔ la la dɛ ka ŋɔ o dɔɔ la be gɛ baa bola la. Anee o dɔɔ la baah di, o ŋɔ o bonɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'Ɛ warane kaa fɔgbaah ne lomoola ta dɛ ka yerɛ nyaara ne boobie ne nyoŋa ne nɛra ba nakpale aa teŋna ásɛ ba ba di kwaa la.'
A ta bigre bɛlbwa bonɔɔ la ba dɛ ba ŋɔ o dɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'N la he tom la, kɛ sobɔra ane ta chɔ le pɛɛpɛɛ.'
Anee o berɛ ŋɔ bonɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'La ŋwɛnɛre ta ne dahare, nomɛlbwa haa nao la, lawɔ ba ásɛ n dem bonɔ su.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nɛra n faa yer ba la bini bɛlbwa aa n kondikwaa nɔɔ di kpa!' "
Awola bɛl, nɛnlaa bane ja Yeesu nɛɛ o ne baa kaa, asɛ o ka berɛ o te dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
"Dɛ nomɛlbwa ba n be o ta men nyine gwaa o mɛɛ ne o nya, ne o haah ne bii, o dɔɔranar ne nimanar ne nimambii dɛ o gbagba aa, waa won ɛ n habɔteŋre.
Nomɛlbwa waa wola won kpɔ o te tɛ, dɛ sɛh wahala nae ne seo bwa, dɛ teŋɛ n nɛɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa kpɔ dagagre che bá ka kpaaro pɛl o ta la waa won ɛ n habɔteŋre.
Dɛ he bini bɛl dɛ nyin kɛ o do abrɔsane aa, waa nyiŋi na kɛŋɔ o dɔ suuga aa dɛ ba wona tel la aa?
O ta nyiŋe kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛ pa dea la mun, dɛ o ta ba wone tonɛ dea la doe yaa, nɛra ɛɛ mamɔɔ,
dɛ ŋɔ, 'Baa nɔ laa fe dɛ do dem la aa? O laa hora naa?'
"Dɛ kooro ne o koodɔŋ bɛl dɔ yoi, o dɔ nɛra kagboŋa fi o dɔŋ la ge dɔ nɛra kagboŋa fifraanɛ naa, waa so dɛ lii kɛ wɛɛ wonoo kpɔ o nɛra la ka pu o dɔŋ la waa dɔ nɛra gwaalo la mɔɔ dɛ le ka puu wa?
O ne o dɔŋ la baah taa jaŋa o na kɛŋɔ waa won puu yo la, wɛɛ do toromaa bá ka larawo ásɛ ba pɛ.
Gɛ tentenee a chɛ kɛ he so lii mɔɔ. Nomɛlbwa ta o komɛlbwa gelaa, waa won ɛ n habɔteŋre.
"Yar wer, kɛ dɛ aa somɛ kpa a, ɛrɛɛ bá berɛ dɛɛ ba a ɛɛ á do som jaɔ?
A ta wejema bɛlbwa dɔe kpa. Aa harɛ gba kwaa. Fugaa a den chɛ kɛŋɔ ba fuga ta. He naate haa no la, no."
Awola bɛl lampoo lɛɛra baa dɛ bɔ apoo ne wechɔg-ɛɛra teŋɔ dɛ ba bar Yeesu cheme dɛ́ no o wa.
Anee Farisii tena ne Tɔn Jerema bane ŋwalɔ dɛ ŋɔ, "Gɛ baa nɔ dɛ lɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra o ne ba yon pɛ nɔn dɛɛ di kwa."
Belaa Yeesu sɛg ba ŋɔ,
"He bini umee dɛ dɔ peera lafa, asɛ beŋkpoŋ nyograa, waa wola o bɔree gaage ɔ? Wɛɛ gel fifraanuanaarɛ dɛ anuanaarɛ laanee a dibɔr tama dɛ ka gaage beŋkpoŋ waa nyogra la bɔr ka tel kɛŋɔ waa nao.
Dɛ naate na a gɛ pee nɔ naa, silɛɛ kohona nomanta, wɛɛ kpɔɔ dawɛ vam ba dem.
O ba dem aa, wɛɛ ŋɔ o daamanar ne nɛra o ne baa soga bwa bee ŋɔ, 'N sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ maa na n pee waa nyogra nɔ. Anomanta hé ba yá lɛ ya sie.'

Kasinteŋ, gɛɛ aa ba Korowii doa ge doe. Wechɔg-ɛɛ beŋkpoŋ charɛ o liire dɛ le o wechɔga ta naa, Korowii ne o nyundua toroma sie ɛɛ lɛ o nɛɛ dɛ gwaa nɛra fifraanuanaarɛ dɛ banuanaarɛ baa dɛ lii kɛ ba ɛ nɛndɛɛga baa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta.
"Gɛ laa ge aa, haah besoo lole dɛ dɔ suugapoŋa fi, asɛ dɛ beŋkpoŋ nyograa, waa wola niinii choŋi dɛ chaa o dea dɛ gaage o bɔr sibegra ne ka tel kɛŋɔ waa nao wɔ?
O nao waa, wɛɛ yerɛ o daamanar ne nɛra o ne baa soga laanee dɛ ŋɔ, 'N sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ maa na n suugapoŋ waa nyogra nɔ. Anomanta hé ba yá lɛ ya sie.'
Kasinteŋ, gɛɛ aa ba Korowii doa ge doe. Wechɔg-ɛɛ beŋkpoŋ charɛ o liire dɛ le o wechɔga ta naa, Korowii ne o nyundua toroma sie ɛɛ lɛ o nɛɛ taeh."
Yeesu berɔ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Baa bɛl fa dɔ bibaala banɛ.
O bii la bini ombechala la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó bɔne o kpanjogo bini, asɛ dɛ tɛo o bɔr. Asɛ baa la bɔne o kpanjogo la bini tɛ o bii la, dɛ kpɔ o bie bechala la bɔr tɛo.
A ta tɔpere bɛl dii, o bie bechala la yog o te kwaa la bwa, dɛ kpɔ o suuga jo pua bojaŋ kaa. Waa laŋa la, o kaa ɛ suuga la sagasaga ken.
Waa baa di suuga la bwa la, a ta tɔpere bɛl dii, asɛ lɔrjen bɛl chole harɛ la ta bela waa lole la, dɛ o ta suuga dɔe, o ta kondikwaa ge dɔe dɛ́ di.
Aa do gɛ la, o kpɔ o te ka pɛl bela te bɛl, asɛ o gel o kaa nyiŋi o prakooni nɛ.
Lɔr la nyoa baa do kpegri kohona, asɛ o baa pɛlɛ prakooni la kondikwaa kwaraa nɛ, kɛ nomɛlbwa ge ta on komɛlbwa tɛɛ.
"Asɛ o sie aa baa ba harɛ la, o sogo dɛ lii o mɛɛ waa dɛ ŋɔ, 'N mɛɛ bonɔɔna kwaraa baa lɔ o sie la di kwaa dɛɛ ka, asɛ n do bonɔ lɔr ɛɛ kpo mɛ la.
Mɛɛ iruu dɛ la n mɛɛ be dɛ ka ŋɔ, "N mɛɛ, n ɛ wechɔga dɛ jo he ne Korowii bwa nɛ.
N ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he yer mɛ he bie kpa. Kɛ n poori, lɛɛ mɛ dɛ kpɔ mɛ ɛ he bonɔɔna la bɛl." '
Bie la aa lii gɛ la, o iro chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa o mɛɛ be. Waa dɛ kaa o mɛɛ be la, o mɛɛ lɔ dem dɛ nao bojaŋ, asɛ o tea domɔ, o chwa dɛɛ chemo dɛ ka gbaaro pɛl o bambile.
Belaa bie la ŋɔ, 'N mɛɛ, n jo he ne Korowii nɛ. N ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he yer mɛ he bie kpa.'
Bie la nyoa ta lee mɔɔ dɛ o mɛɛ yerɛ o bonɔɔna ŋɔ, 'Hé chwa ka nyiŋi n yale la bwa bini ondɛɛge ba tɛo ó tɔ, dɛ kpɔ nonisegdɛɛge ba doo, dɛ nyin naŋgawa ba tɛo ó do.
He tonaa, hé ka lawɛ nabie la bwa bini ondɛɛge dɛ ba kpo, ásɛ ya di kwa dɛ lɛ ya sie,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ n fa liiro kɛŋɔ n bie nɔ sewɔ, asɛ o berɛ ba nɔ. O faa nyogra la, taraken te n nao.' Ate ba ɛ kondikwaare dɛɛ di dɛɛ lɛ ba sie tenten.
"Waa nɔ bwa aa dɛ ɛ la, dɛ binomoa la le koo dɛɛ ba. Waa dɛ tel ba dem la, o no gboŋri ne yela ne sae gbɔga dem bela.
Anee o yerɛ o mɛɛ bonɔɔna la bɛl dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, 'Bɔkwa waa chig deemɔ?'
Anee o ŋɔ, 'He nime la waa joa kaa la, onee bala, asɛ he mɛɛ gel ya kpo nabie la bwa bini ondɛɛge la dɛ ɛ kondikwaa dɛ di dɛɛ lɛ ya sie, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa ta on ɛɛ.'
Asɛ binomoa la baah di, o kire ŋɔ waa deemii jo. Asɛ o mɛɛ ba larawo ŋɔ ó ba dem.
Belaa bie la ŋɔ o mɛɛ be ŋɔ, 'N mɛɛ, n ge aa dena dɛɛ tomɛ saŋ la bwa, n ta he toma vɛɛh bwa, bɔkwa konee he tɛ mɛ nɔ? He ta bombie kwaraa lawɛ tɛ mɛ ŋɔ ń kpo, n ge ne n daamanar kpɔ lɛ sie bwa.
Kɛ he bie nɔ waa kaa chɔg o suuga haahna nɛɛ dɛ ba nɔ, he berɔ garɛ kpo nabidɛɛge tɛo.'
Anee baa la ŋɔ, 'N bidɛɛge, n ne haa lole nɔ, n komɛlbwa maa dɔa la, hen dɔa.
He nime nɔ aa nyogra dɛ berɛ ba nɔ, a chɛ kɛŋɔ ya gel ya sie lɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya ŋɔ o sewɔ, o berɛ ba nɔ, ya ŋɔ o nyogrɔ, kɛ taraken ya nao.' "
Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛ ɛ kondɔɔh, dɛ kpɔ o kwaa bwa do o bonɔɔ bɛl nɔn ta ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi a ta. Belaa nɛra ka ŋɔ suuga te la be ŋɔ o bonɔɔ la dɛ di o suuga sagasaga.

Anee suuga te la tomɛ nɛn o ka yerɛ o bonɔɔ la, asɛ o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'N dɛ no waane kɛ he dɛ di n suuga. Ka kpɔ he tɔn ba dɛ ba bag mɛ suuga aa jo he nɔn ta, ne gɛ haa ɛ a ne, asɛ dɛ kpɔ n kwaa do n nɔn ta, dɛkalkɛ maa gel he nyiŋi n kwaa ta kpa.'
"Asɛ bonɔɔ la kaa dɛ ka lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, 'N dɔɔ dɛ ba men toma ta lee. Ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ? N ge aa kpege dɛ́ parɛ di, asɛ n sie ge garɔ ne kwaa soŋa.
N jemɛ gɛ maa ɛ, asɛ dɛ ba lee mɛ toma ta naa, ń dɔ daamanar baa nyiŋ mɛ.'
O yerɛ nɛra baa di o dɔɔ kema la beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa, dɛ bɔɔ sitɔte la ŋɔ, 'Aŋwɛnɛɛ he di n dɔɔ kem ɔ?'
Anee o ŋɔ, 'N di kem ŋgo garare lafa.' Anee bonɔɔ la ŋɔ, 'Lɛ tɔn warane, dɛ so harɛ dɛ chwerɛ fifraanue.'
Asɛ o berɛ bɔɔ nɛɛte ge ŋɔ, 'Kem aŋwɛnɛɛ he ge dio?' Asɛ o ŋɔ, 'N di kem mea baagere kagboŋ.' Anee bonɔɔ la ŋɔ, 'Lɛ tɔn dɛ so harɛ dɛ chwerɛ lafraanuatoro.'

Anee bonɔɔ naŋgarawa te nɔ dɔɔ la aa noa la, o kpɛɛro ŋɔ o ɛa wejema ta." Yeesu aa sɛg ba tonɛ la, o ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire la, ba dɔ wejema ba ne ba bala kpoŋa dɛ gwaa nɛra ba sie aa chaah Korowii waa ta la."
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ ja ŋɔ, "Hé kpɔ he laala ne suuga aa ɛ harɛ nɔ ta kondɔɔh la dɛɛ nyin daamanar, asɛ dɛ a baa hiah heya aa, bá won lɛ heyaa silɛɛ ne bwɛɛ waa wola chɔg bwa la ta.
"Naate waa wona dɔ kasinteŋ kontamaa ta la, wɛɛ wonoo dɔ kasinteŋ anjena ge ta. Naate waa wola wone dɔ kasinteŋ kontamaa ta la, waa won dɔ kasinteŋ anjena ge ta.
Dɛ he ta wone nyiŋi harɛ nɔ ta kondɔɔh a kwara aa ɛ konsale nɔ ta naa, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba wona nyiŋi kondɔɔh tenten ta nɔ?
Dɛ he ta wone nyiŋi nomɛl kon ta naa, umee dɛɛ ba he gbagba kwaa kpɔe dɛ do he nɔn ta nɔ?

"Nomɛlbwa aa won tomɛ dɔɔranar banɛ. Dɛ a ba gɛ naa, wɛɛ dɛɛ nyin bɛl waa dɛ gwaa bɛl. A laa ge aa, o sie ɛɛ dɛɛ lɛ bɛl bee dɛ gwaa bɛl. Haa won tomɛ Korowii dɛ berɛ won nyin harɛ nɔ ta kondɔɔh a magre."
Farisii tena la aa no gɛ la, ba chwee Yeesu, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba dɛ nyin suuga taeh.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He dɛ ɛ he te kɛ he ɛ nɛndɛɛga he waa aa su Korowii siwi, kɛ Korowii jemɛ gɛ he liire aa doa. Kon waa ɛ konjen nɛwɛnyini sie ta la, Korowii te aa on komɛlbwa bu.

"Mosis Mmara la ne Korowii keamere la waa la baa chwera laanee lole baa bagle mɔɔ dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la aa bala. Le gɛ saŋ waa bala dɛ baa bol Korowii Kora la Amanesoma la, nomɛlbwa siwi swɛɛrɔ wɛɛ nyin bɔr dɛ ja Korowii Kora la ta.
Kɛ, nyundua ne harɛ ɛɛ chɔgoo, dɛ ba ta Mmara la bini wejegaa bɛlbwa berɛ.
"Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh o haah dɛ berɛ ka mo hanfale la, o ɛ wechɔga dɛ bɔ jwamane, asɛ nomɛlbwa ge waa mo haah o jaa raa vɛoh la, o ge bɔ jwamane.
"Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛ dɔ suuga, dɛɛ do laaladɛɛga dɛ dɔ kwaa nɔ bwa, asɛ dɛɛ di kondɛɛga tɔpere bɛlbwa, dɛɛ lɛ o sie tenten.
Dɛ baa bɛl ge lole dɛ nya, asɛ ŋwɛra ɛ o bwa baa yerɔ Lasorɔs. Ba yon kpɔɔ ka bil suuga te la dem doonyoa,
asɛ wɛɛ do hwɛga kondikwaa suuga te la aa di ka asɛ o bonɔɔna kpɔ ba ta la ta. Hale dɛ nyootena ba dɛ kpɛle o ŋwɛra la.
"Nyaa la baa sewɛ, asɛ nyundua toroma ba kpɔɔ kaa nyundua o ka so Abraham be. Suuga te la ge baa sewɛ, asɛ ba hugo,
asɛ o ka jo Bɔnsam nii ta. Dɛ o dɛ na nii taeh. On ŋɔa o nyiŋi, dɛ na Abraham bojaŋ le, asɛ Lasorɔs so o be.
Anee o ha nyoa yerɛ Abraham dɛ ŋɔ, 'N Naa Abraham! Na n sum, asɛ dɛ tomɛ Lasorɔs ásɛ o kpɔ o nonii ka lege nesɔn dɛ kpɔ ba lege n nyondoŋe. N lɔ nii ta n bwara ɛɛ nyɛg mɛ.'
Anee Abraham ŋɔ, 'N bie, lii kɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ he faa lɔ harɛ ta la, he di yɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ Lasorɔs na wahala. Taraken nɔ o dɛ di yɛɛ, asɛ he gee na wahala.

Hale n ŋɔ o ba bela kwaraa noo, waa won ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ bɔjen bɛl lɔ ya ne he baah ta, nomɛlbwa waa lɔ bonɔ dɛɛ nyin o ba bela haa lole la aa wola won ba, asɛ nɛra baa lɔ he be bela dɛɛ nyin dɛ ba bonɔ la ge aa won ba.'
"Anee suuga te la ŋɔ, 'Amɔ te n dɛ soŋe, n Naa, tomɔ ó la n mɛɛ dem,
dɛ ka kah n nimanar banue bane baa lɔ bela la ŋɔ, gɛ maa ɛa la, ba bɛ gɛ ɛ asɛ dɛ ba ba bonɔ maa lole dɛɛ na wahala nɔ.'
Asɛ Abraham ŋɔ, 'He nimanar la dɔ tɔne Mosis ne Korowii keamere la aa chwera la á ja ba. A chɛ kɛ ba kura dɛ no waa baa dɛ bol.'
Anee suuga te la ŋɔ, 'Akai, baa no, n Naa. Kɛ dɛ nomɛl iro le seo ta dɛ ka ŋɔ ba be te naa, anee ba no dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta.'
Anee Abraham ŋɔ, 'Dɛ baa tɔne Mosis ne Korowii keamere la aa chwera la waa no aa, nomɛl iro le seo ta dɛ la ba be kwara noo, baa no.' "
Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "A ɛ wobɛlbwa, waa aa dɛ ba gela nɛn ɛ wechɔga la ɛɛ bao. Kɛ naate aa che o nɛɛ dɛ ba la, bwɛɛlɛ.
Dɛ ba vɔwɛ nambwe do naate baŋa dɛ kpɔɔ ka ta moo vil ta kwara naa, a fe bɔ kɛŋɔ waa gela bechajegre nɔ dɔŋ bɛlbwa ɛ wechɔga.
Anomanta hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ! "Dɛ he dɔŋ ɛɛ wechɔga aa, ŋɔ o be. Dɛ o no a mun dɛ charɛ o liire aa, kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo.
Dɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa o ɛɛ wechɔga kera anuanɛ, asɛ dɛ ba he be dɛ ba ŋɔ waa waa ɛɛ la, o kon chɔgaa, kpɔ kɛo."
Yeesu habɔteŋra la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, cha yaa dɛ gel ya dɔ yarada kohona."
Asɛ Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Dɛ he yarada fe kan kɛŋɔ sipon gba aa, he fe ɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ dajen nɔ aa chega nɔ be ŋɔ ó chugri ka che moo ta, asɛ o no dɛ ɛ gɛ."
Yeesu berɔ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He bini umee dɛ dɔ bonɔɔ wɛɛ parɛ he koo kɛɛ wɛɛ nyiŋi he peera ta, asɛ waa le toma ta ba dem la, he den ŋɔ o be ó ba di kwaɔ?
Akai! Haa o be gɛɛ ŋɔ. Hɛɛ ŋɔ o bee ŋɔ, 'Ɛ n kondikwaa ka cheg mɛ, asɛ dɛ kpɔ he te ba che n be tig ta dɛ ɛ n wobɛlbwa tɛ mɛ ń di kwaa tonɛ mɔɔ he ge ka di he kwa.'
Bonɔɔ la ɛɛ dɔ jaamee waa o dɔɔ la aa doo a ta laanee yaa? Akai.
Gɛ tentenee he waa do. Dɛ he ɛ waa Korowii aa do heyaa a ta ŋɔ hé ɛ aa, he bɛ he te kpɛɛ. Hé ŋɔ, 'Ya ɛ bonɔɔna yaa wola tɔnɔ dɔe. Toma aa chɛ kɛŋɔ ya ɛ la gboo ya ɛ la.' "
Yeesu aa dɛ kaa Jerusalam la, o kpɔ Samaria harɛ ne Galilia harɛ jwɛh ta.
Asɛ waa dɛ jo bwɛjega bɛl ta la, baala fi bane bwadabii weechɔga ane aa lɔ ba nɛɛ pa sie o be dɛɛ ba dɛ ba chemo. Ba chegɛ bojaŋ,
dɛ ha nyoa ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu, na ya sum!"
Belaa Yeesu aa na ba la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé kpɔ he te ka bagle Sɔfore la ásɛ ba nyiŋi heyaa na." Baa chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa la, ba weela la kaalɔ, ba bwara kwaa.
Ba bini beŋkpoŋ aa naa kɛŋɔ o weela la kaalɔ o bwara kwaa la, o laa berɛ dɛ baa jam Korowii takpeg ne,
dɛ ba guŋi Yeesu sie dɛ jaamo. Dɛ gɛ baa la ɛ Samaria tee.
Anee Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He lɔ nɛra fi n chah heya, leperaa banuanaarɛ la te dɔɔ?
Ɛrɛɛ baa nɔ waa wola Juda te ɛɛ nɔ gbo won kpɔ jam ba tɛ Korowii nɔɔ?"
Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir kaa, yarada haa yarada mɛ nɔɔ gela he dɔ he te."
Awola bɛl Farisii tena bane bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Bɛweeree Korowii Kora la ɛɛ ba bala ɔ?" Anee o ŋɔ, "Korowii Kora la ta komɛl haa dɛ ba o nae ɛɛ.
O ta komɛl yaa dɛ ba ŋɔe ŋɔ, 'Onee nɔ, kɛɛ onee ka lɔ le nɔ' ɛɛ. Bambile binii o do."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Aa ba tel saŋ bɛlee asɛ hɛɛ nyin dɛ fe dɔ n Nɛn Bie la kɛŋɔ n ne haa soga tɔpebeŋkpoŋ gbo gba, kɛ haa gɛɛ dɔ.
Nɛra bane ɛɛ ba ŋɔ he bee ŋɔ n lɔ bonɔ kɛɛ le nɔ. He bɛ ka nyiŋi.
Gɛ bwaala yon nyɛgle nyundua bwa chaah la, gɛɛ n Nɛn Bie la bala ɛɛ ba doe, nomɛlbwa na mɛ.
Kɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ n na wahala kohona asɛ fini nɔ nɛra vɛɛh mɛ, mɔɔ anɔ bɛlbwa ba ɛ.
"Gɛ aa ɛa Nowa bere saŋ la, gɛɛ n Nɛn Bie la ge bala saŋ ɛɛ ba ɛɛ.

Nowa bere saŋ la, dɛ ba dɛ di kwa, dɛɛ nyɔ sene, dɛɛ mo haahna, dɛ lawɛ haahna tɛ baala baa mo, dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ awola Nowa aa jo o gberjen la bini, asɛ bwaala nɛ aaa, mpo ne neerare bwa su tɔ harɛ bwa, asɛ ba bwa serewe kwaraa.
"Gɛ tenten aa ɛa Lɔt bere saŋ ge asɛ Sodom tena ɛɛ di kwa, dɛɛ nyɔ sene, dɛɛ di bona, dɛɛ parɛ, dɛɛ ma deene la, gɛɛ aa ba ɛɛ.
Awola Lɔt aa le Sodom dɛɛ kaa la, Korowii gelɔ nii ne jebɔrɔwe aa dɛ fuh le nyundua dɛ ba fuh Sodom tena bwa kwaraa.
"Gɛ tentenee aa ba ɛɛ awola n Nɛn Bie la aa ba ja la.
Awola tɔpere la, nomɛlbwa waa lɔ sal dea doa o laala do dea la, o bɛ tu ba kpɔ kpa. Gɛ tentenee nomɛlbwa ge waa do koo ta la, o ge bɛ dem ba dɛ́ ba kpɔ komɛlbwa kpa.
Hé lii waa aa pu Lɔt haah la.
Nomɛlbwa o siwi aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge o siwi aa wola harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta lɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu.
Kasinteŋ, awola jwaana la, nɛra banɛ ɛɛ pɛo dɛ chɔ kalaŋ beŋkpoŋ ta, asɛ Korowii ba kpɔ beŋkpoŋ kaa dɛ gel bɛl.
Haahna banɛ ɛɛ pɛo dɛɛ tuge kwa, asɛ Korowii ba kpɔ bɛl kaa, dɛ gel bɛl.
Baala banɛ ɛɛ do koo taa, asɛ o ba kpɔ bɛl kaa dɛ gel bɛl."
Anee o habɔteŋra la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, leperaa aa ba chiga ɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Bela konlale aa lole la, belaa kokosakiri ɛɛ cheme."
Yeesu kpɔ sɛgla bol waa bagle o habɔteŋra la, dɛ ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ baa soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ bɛ bɔhwaah dɛɛ ɛ.
O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nomoa bɛlee fa lole dɛɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole kɔɔto, dɛ do bwɛɛ bɛl ta. Dɛ waa Korowii ɔmɛ, waa nɛn ge heeh.
Dɛ bwɛɛ la tenten ta la, dɛ luhaah bɛl ge lɔ bela, o yon dɛɛ la nomoa la be dɛ kaa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Cha mɛ asɛ dɛ lɛɛ mɛ le n dɔm nɔn ta.'
Dɛ kɔɔto nomoa la aa sie do o be, dɛ gel a bigri. A habɔɔ la o lii o nyu bini ŋɔ, 'Maa Korowii ɔmɛ, maa nɛn ge heeh,
kɛ luhaah nɔ mare nɔ waa dɛ ɛɛ mɛ nɔ nomanta, mɛɛ nyiŋuu, dɛ gel o di bole, ásɛ o laa o melee waane kpɔ n nɛ.' "
Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "He no gɛ kɔɔto nomonchɔge la aa bola aa?
Dɛ nɛn waa do ken wono lɛ nɛn aa, ɛrɛɛ Korowii aa wola won cha o nɛra baa wia dɛɛ noo chɔɔ ne jwaana la dɛ lɛɛ ba le ba dɔma nɔn ta nɔ? Aa bigruu mɔɔ o cha ba aa?
N dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, Korowii ɛɛ wonoo cha ba. Wɛɛ ɛa warane gee. Dɛ n Nɛn Bie la balaa, mɛɛ ba pu nɛra baa dɔ yarada harɛ nɔ taa te naa?"
Yeesu sɛgle nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te kɛŋɔ ba ɛ nɛndɛɛga gwaa nɛra bwa la ŋɔ,
"Awola bɛl nɛra banɛ bane la Korowii Dea dɛ kaa soŋe Korowii. Dɛ bɛl ɛ Farisii te asɛ bɛl ge ɛ nɛnchɔga baa dɛ lɛ lampoo la bɛl.

Belaa Farisii te la ir che dɛ soŋe Korowii o nyu bini ŋɔ, 'Korowii, n dɛ jaame kɛŋɔ maa wola doe kɛ n bala baa dɛ bɔ apoo, baa wola kasinteŋ bol, dɛɛ bɔ jwamane nɔ. N dɛ jaame kɛŋɔ maa wola doe kɛŋɔ banchɔge nɔ waa dɛ lɛ lampoo nɔ.
N dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa tɔpera anɛ yawanyoa bɛlbwa ta, dɛɛ bɔne kwaa maa dɛ dɔ bwa bini bɔre fi dɛ kpɔ beŋkpoŋ dɛ baa tɛ hen Korowii.'
"Lampoo lɛɛ la te chegɛ bojaŋ, o ta sie hae dɛ nyiŋi nyundua kwara, kɛ dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ nyu dɛ ŋɔ, 'Oo, N Naa Korowii, wechɔg-ɛɛree men. Na n sum dɛ kpɔ n wechɔga kɛ mɛ.' "

Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "N dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, lampoo lɛɛ la bee Korowii no dɛ kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo dɛ doo nɛndɛɛga bini, asɛ o kaa o dem. Farisii te la te, o ta o be noɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ gɔɔ o te la, Korowii dɛ ba o ne harɛ, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ o te nɛŋgwɛgre la, Korowii dɛ gɔɔro."
Nɛra bane kpɔ ba bii ba o be ŋɔ ó kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ swee andɛɛga tɛɛ ba. O habɔteŋra la aa na ba la, ba kɔr ba kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ɛ gɛ la.
Belaa Yeesu yerɛ bechale la ba o be, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "He bɛ bechale la ŋwɛnɛ tɔ. Hé gel ba ba n be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ banɔ dɔŋa nɔɔ Korowii koobii la.
Kasinteŋ, naate waa wola o te kpɔe tɛ Korowii dɛ yaradao kɛŋɔ bechale nɔ la, waa Korowii Kora la ta dɔe ba dɛ ja bwa."
Asɛ Juda tena nomoa bɛl bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nomondɛɛge, ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ n ɛ dɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa waa wola jaga dɔe bwa nɔ?"
Anee Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he yer mɛ nɛndɛɛge nɔɔ? Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge, nemenɛ Korowii gbo.
Kɛ he jemɛ Korowii mmarare la aa dɛ bagle kɛ, 'Bɛ jwamane bɔ, bɛ nɛn kpo, bɛ ŋwɛ, bɛ nyosone teŋe dawɛ he dɔŋ nɛ, dɛɛ duu he nya ne he mɛɛ' laɔ?"
Anee baa la ŋɔ, "Gɛ saŋ maa ɛ bechala la bwaa n le dɛ teŋɛ anɔ bwa ta."
Yeesu aa no gɛ la, o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "A ta kae webeŋkpoŋ. Ka yog kwaa haa dɔa, asɛ dɛ kpɔ a suuga kɛ nyaara. He ɛ gɛ naa, hɛɛ dɔ kwaa cheg Korowii doa. Ka ɛ gɛ asɛ dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛ."
Baa la aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, o tea bini chɔgɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɔ suuga taeh.
Yeesu nyiŋu dɛ na kɛŋɔ o tea bini chɔgɔ, asɛ o ŋɔ, "A kpegri kɛŋɔ dɔɔh dɔ bɔr ja Korowii Kora la ta.
Aa do pwɛree tɛ nyogma kɛŋɔ o won jo tɔɔge bɔɔ ta gwaa kɛŋɔ dɔɔh naa wona jo Korowii Kora ta."
Nɛra baa no waa nɔ la ŋɔ, "Amɔ te umee dɛɛ ba o nyu dɔe yɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Waa aa kpega tɛ nɛn, waa wola won ɛ la, aa kpege Korowii te be. Wɛɛ wonoo ɛ."
Asɛ Pita ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi na, ya te, ya gel komɛlbwa yaa dɔa dɛ baa teŋɛ he nɛɛ la."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, nomɛlbwa waa koh Korowii Kora nɔ waa dɛ gel o dem, kɛɛ o haah ne bii, kɛɛ o nya ne mɛɛ, kɛɛ o dɔɔranar ne o nimanar la,
wɛɛ dɔ banee dɛ gwaa gɛ harɛ ta bonɔ. A bwa habɔɔ la, wɛɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe nyundua laanee ja."
Yeesu kpɔ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la le bokɛre asɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé no! Ya dɛ kaa Jerusalam. Belaa men Nɛn Bie wobɛlbwa Korowii keamere la aa chwera la ɛɛ ba kpela ɛɛ.
Baa kpɔ mɛɛ do nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Korowii tomɛ la nɔn ta, asɛ ba di n loro, dɛ chɛg mɛ, asɛ dɛ ta nentane ta n nɛ.
Baa lɔɔ mɛɛ dɛ kpo mɛ, asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la, n ir seo ta."
Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa la ba be la, ba ta a bɛlbwa mun noɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Korowii kpɔ a mun noe sɔɔh ba. Ba ta gɛ waa dɛ bol la mun noɛ.
Baa dɛ tel Jeriko la, dɛ baa bɛl waa nyoŋa soge ŋwɛnɛ nyoa dɛɛ soŋe kwa.
Waa no nɛnlaa la gbɔga ba baa kaa la, o bɔɔ waa aa bala.
Anee ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt laanee ba dɛɛ kaa."
Belaa o kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Devid Naa Yeesu, na n sum dɛ cha mɛ!"
Asɛ nɛra baa tɔ sie la kaoh ŋɔ ó tɔ nyoa. Dɛ name tenee o taa bola kohona kwara, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Devid Naa, na n sum dɛ cha mɛ!"
Anee Yeesu jagɛ che, dɛ ŋɔ bá lawɛ baa la waa nyoŋa la ba tɛo. Baa ba o ne o be la, Yeesu bɔɔro ŋɔ,
"Bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin kɛ n ɛ tɛɛ nɔ?" Asɛ baa la ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n poori, gel n berɛ dɛɛ na ja."
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He yarada lɛɛ. N chaeh. Na bɔr."
Ate bug la ta dɛ o dɛ na bɔr, dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ, dɛɛ jam Korowii. Asɛ nɛra la bwa aa naa la, ba kpɛɛ Korowii.
Yeesu la Jeriko dɛ kaa valɛ bwɛɛ la bini.
Dɛ lampoo lɛɛra nomoa bɛl lɔ bwɛɛ la ta dɛ ɛ suuga te baa yerɔ Sakeos.
Dɛ o dɛ nyin dɛ na gɛ Yeesu aa doa, kɛ nɛnlaa la nomanta o ta on nae, dɛkalkɛ o ɛ nɛmbora.
Anee o chwa tɔ nɛnlaa la sie, dɛ ka teeh daa bɛl waa chegɛ bela Yeesu aa dɛ ba kpɔe ba kaa la, ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ na.
Yeesu aa baa tel daa la mun la, o ha sie dɛ nyiŋi o doa dɛ ŋɔ Sakeos be ŋɔ, "Ɛ warane dɛ tu harɛ ba. He deaa mɛɛ ba choga fini."
Asɛ Sakeos tu harɛ warane dɛ ba kpɔ Yeesu kaa o dem silɛɛ ne.
Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ na la ŋwalɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o kaa chog wechɔg-ɛɛ dea.

Sakeos iro che dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa! N dɛ soŋe, no. Mɛɛ bɔne n laala bini bɔre anɛɛ, dɛ kpɔ beŋkpoŋ kɛ nyaara. Dɛ n kpɔ apoo ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ lɛ nomɛl kwaane aa, mɛɛ bɔ kwaa la bele anaarɛɛ tɛ naate."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Fini tɔpere nɔ Korowii lɛ dem nɔ tena, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Abraham naaa Sakeos gba.
Nɛra baa nyogra waa n Nɛn Bie ba dɛ́ ba nyin ba bɔr dɛ lɛɛ ba."
Dɛ ba dɛ tel Jerusalam, asɛ nɛra la ɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii Kora dii tɔpere la denɔ dɛɛ ba bala. Baa dɛ no o be la, Yeesu berɔ bol waa sɛgla ne ba be.
O ŋɔ, "Koobie bɛlee fa lole dɛɛ ba bojaŋ bwɛɛ bɛl ta kaala bá ka chego kora ásɛ o ba dɛ ba ɛ kooro.
Waa dɛ ba kaala la, o yerɛ o bonɔɔna fi, dɛ tɛ bɛlbwa suugaswɛm bwe, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá kpɔ dɛɛ di bona ka tel gɛ saŋ waa ba.
"Waa kaala la, o waa ta o bwɛɛ tena tea toorɛ, asɛ ba tomɛ toroma bá tiu dɛ ka ŋɔ, 'Yaa baa nɔ nyin kɛ o ɛ ya kooro.'
"Kɛ ane a bwa o dɔ o kora la, dɛ laa berɛ ba. Waa bala la, o gelɔ ba yerɛ o bonɔɔna waa tɛɛ ba suuga la tɛo, ásɛ o na suuga baa dɔa.
Sitɔte la aa bala la, o ŋɔ nomoa la be ŋɔ, 'Nomoa, suugaswɛm bwe haa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la, n kpɔɔ di bona dɛ dɔ suugaswɛm bwea fi dɛ ja onɔ la haa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la ta.'
Anee nomoa la ŋɔ, 'Jam, bonɔndɛɛge, he ɛ wa! Gɛ haa di kasinteŋ tamaa nɔ ta nɔ, mɛɛ geloo he nyiŋi bwɛɛre fi ta.'
"Belaa bonɔn-nɛɛte ba, dɛ ba ŋɔ o dɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'Nomoa, n dɔ suugaswɛm bwea anue dɛ ja onɔ la haa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la ta.'
Anee nomoa la ŋɔ o ge be ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ geloo he nyiŋi bwɛɛre anue ta.'
"Asɛ bɛl ge ba dɛ ba ŋɔ, 'Nomoa, suugaswɛm bwe haa tɛ mɛ laanee la. N kpɔɔ vɔwɛ duku ta dɛ kpɔ sɔh.
N ɔmɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bambile kpegri, he ɛ nɛn haa dɛ kpɔ kwaa aa wola he kwaa ɛɛ, dɛɛ komɛ kwaa haa wola due.'
Anee nomoa la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Bonɔnchɔge kohona! He gbagba nyoa wobol taa mɛɛ ba chega dɛ pae bolchɔge. He jemɔ kɛ n ɛ bambikpeg te, dɛɛ kpɔ kwaa aa wola n kwaa ɛɛ, dɛɛ komɛ kwaa maa wola due kenɛ?
Aah ɛrɛɛ haa wola n suuga kpɔe ka cheg mɛ baŋge ásɛ n fee ba lɛ a ne a nee bwa nɔ?'
"Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ bonɔɔna la kar baa chegɛ o be la be ŋɔ, 'Hé laa suuga la lɛ o be dɛ kpɔ ka tɛ bonɔɔ la waa dɔ suugaswɛm bwea fi dɛ ja o kon ta la.'
Anee ba ŋɔ ba dɔɔ la be ŋɔ, 'Nomoa, kɛ o dɔ suugaswɛm bwea fi ɔɔ?'
Asɛ nomoa la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Hé gel n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, nomɛlbwa waa dɔ kwaa la, baa berɔɔ jao ane ja. Nomɛlbwa ge waa wola komɛlbwa dɔe la, tama kwara waa dɔa la, aa le o nɔn taa.
N dɔma la baa ŋɔa baa men nyin kɛ n ɛ ba kooro la ge, hé lag ba ba n siwi ta bonɔ dɛ ba kpoo ba!' "
Yeesu aa bol a gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o tɔ sie ba nɛɛ dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam.
Baa dɛ tel Bɛtfej ne Bɛtani bwɛɛre ta, Ɔlevere Bwe bɔr la, o tomɛ o habɔteŋra la bini banɛ ŋɔ bá tɔ sie,
dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé la bwɛɛ nɔ waa lɔ he sie nɔ ta. Haa dɛɛ tel bela la, hɛɛ nao kɛŋɔ baa vɔwɛ keego bie bɛl baa wola o ta soge bwa. Hé lao pur dɛ kpɔɔ ba.
Dɛ nomɛl bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ bɔkwaa hɛɛ puru dɛ ɛ aa, hé ŋɔ naate be ŋɔ he Dɔɔ dɛ nyinu."
Asɛ ba la, dɛ ka na gɛ waa la tenten Yeesu aa ŋɔ ba be la.
Baa dɛ pur keego la la, kontena bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa hɛɛ pur keego bie nɔ dɛ́ ka ɛɔ?"
Anee ba ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ dɛ nyinu."
Asɛ ba kpɔ keego la ba tɛ Yeesu, dɛ kpɔ ba yale darawe o nyaŋ ta dɛ gɔɔ Yeesu so o ta.
Waa soge keego la ta baa kaa la, nɛra pa ba yale pa ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ tɛo jirima, asɛ o kpɔ keego la valɛ a ta.
Baa wili Ɔlevere Bwe la dɛɛ tel Jerusalam la, Yeesu habɔɔ nɛra la bwa sie lɛo, baa kpɛɛ Korowii kohona kɛŋɔ waa ɛ nyokpowaa ba na la.
Dɛ ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii jam! Korowii swee andɛɛga tɛ Kooro waa chegɛ o sɔn ta dɛɛ ba nɔ, dɛ gel nyundua tena bwa bwara sɔɔh ba. Ó jam!"
Bela la, dɛ Farisii tena lɔ nɛnlaa la bini. Ba ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, kah he habɔɔ nɛra nɔ ásɛ ba hel!"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ ba helaa, bwea kwara ɛɛ mooluu."
Baa dɛ ba Jerusalam tela la, Yeesu nyiŋi bwɛɛ la dɛ wi tɛ o tena.
O wio ŋɔ, "Alako he fe jemɛ gɛ haa ɛ dɛ dɔ bosɔɔhna fini! Korowii kpɔɔ sɔh heya, anomanta haa won jemɛ.
Tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao asɛ he dɔma ba ma danjwɛɛ bar he bwɛɛ nɔ, dɛ tɔ heyaa do haa wola won le.

Baa wuruu jo he bwɛɛ nɔ ta, dɛ pagre he deene dɛ kpoo heya. Baa kuugi he deene bwaa buruburu ken, bwe beŋkpoŋ kwara aa wola ka dɛ dawɛ o dɔŋ ta kpa. Anɔ bwa ɛɛ ɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he lɛɛ tɔpere aa tela la, he ta sie doe."
Asɛ Yeesu la Korowii Dea dɛ den kaa doŋi nɛra baa kpɔ bela berɛ bona dibɔr la.
O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn bini o ŋɔ, 'N dea ɛ Korowii soŋebɔr,' gɛɛ he te berɛ kpɔ bela berɛ ŋwɛɛra sɔɔhbɔr aa?"
Dɛ o dɛ la Korowii Dea tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ kaa bagle wa. Dɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema ne nɛra la bini nomonome la dɛ nyinu dɛ́ kpo,
kɛ ba ta gɛ baa ɛ dɛ dɔɔ nae, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o wobol dɛ do nɛra bwa som, baa wola won kaa dɛ gel o wobol la, dɛ che dɛɛ no.
Awola bɛl dɛ Yeesu lɔ Korowii Dea dɛɛ bagle nɛra wa, dɛɛ bol Amanesoma la, asɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema ne nɛra la bini nomonome ba,
dɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Umee tɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ hé ɛ gɛ waa nɔ haa dɛ ɛ nɔɔ? Umee tɛɛ kpegri te nɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gel n bɔɔ heyaa webeŋkpoŋ. Hé bag mɛ,
Jɔn kpegri waa dɔa dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ sɔ nɛra nee la, Korowiirii tɛo waa, kɛ nɛnee?"
Waa bɔɔ ba gɛ la, dɛ ba gbo dɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Dɛ ya ŋɔ a le Korowii be naa, wɛɛ bɔɔ yaa waa aa bala ya ta Jɔn yaradae.
Dɛ ya berɔ ŋɔ nɛn bee a le ge aa, nɛra nɔ baa lɔ bonɔ nɔ bwa ɛɛ fogre yaa bwea dɛ kpoo yaa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba te bwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ Jɔn fa ɛ Korowii keame."
Anee ba ŋɔ, "Yaa jemɛ bela kpegri la aa lea."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "N ge aa kpegri maa dɔa dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ waa nɔ leebɔree bagle he be."

Yeesu kpɔ sɛgla bol waa bagle nɛra la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Baa bɛlee fa lole dɛɛ parɛ kwaane baa kpɔa dɛɛ daa sen. O kpɔ nɛra báa ɛ koo la toma, a koma telaa, ba dɔ ba bɔr. A habɔɔ la, o kpɔ koo la tɛɛ ba bá nyiŋi o ta dɛɛ tɛo, dɛ kaa harɛ bɛl ta, dɛ ka bigri.
Kwaa la koma saŋ aa baa tel la, o tomɛ o bonɔɔ bɛl ŋɔ ó ka lɛ o dibɔr ba tɛo. Belaa nɛra la lɔɔ bonɔɔ la dɛ doŋu, ba ta on komɛlbwa tɛɛ o kaa.
Belaa koo te la berɛ tomɛ bonɔn-nɛɛte, asɛ ba lɔɔ o ge dɛ ɛo wilewile ken, dɛ doŋu o kaa, ba ta on komɛlbwa tɛɛ.
Anee koo te la berɛ tomɛ o bonɔn-tooro te ja, asɛ nɛra la pira o ge dɛ kpɔɔ ta koo la baŋ.
"Belaa koo te la ŋɔ, 'Ɛrɛɛ ń ɛ jaɔ? Mɛɛ tomɛ n bibeŋkpoŋ maa dɛ nyin o waa nɔɔ. O te ba nao baa heehroo!'
Nɛra la aa na o bie la la, ba den ŋɔ, 'Yoowa, baa la gbagba bie la. O mɛɛ toole naa, on dɛɛ ba o kpanjogo dii. Hé gel ya kpoo ásɛ dɛ o mɛɛ baa sewaa, dɛ kwaa la ɛ ya kwa.'
Anee ba lawɛ bie la dɛ kpoo dɛ kpɔɔ vigri koo la baŋ." Anee Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ koo te nɔ dɛ ba ba ɛɛ yɔ?
Wɛɛ ba kpoo a gɛ nɛra laanee dɛ kpɔ koo la do nɛnfala nɔn ta." Nɛra la aa no gɛ la, ba ŋɔ, "Korowii ɛɛ la a ne bojaŋ!"
Yeesu nyiŋ ba dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ ɛrɛ tenee hɛɛ no Korowii Tɔn bini waa mun ɔ? 'Bwe la mamaala faa vɛoh dɛ liiru konsala laanee baa lawɛ dea kpoŋe la.'
Nomɛlbwa waa chole Bwe la waa lawɛ dea la kpoŋe la ta la, wɛɛ kuuguu. O berɔ le ba le nomɛlbwa nɛɛ ge aa, wɛɛ pweremoo."
Dɛ Tɔn Jerema la ne Sɔfonomonome la siwi swɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ baa lawɔɔ bug la ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba jemɔ ŋɔ banee o sɛgle. Kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ nɛnlaa la.

Anomanta ba sie lɔ o nɛɛ baa kpaahno dɛ́ dɔɔ. Ba tɛ nɛra bane suuga, dɛ tom ba ŋɔ bá ka hagre Yeesu bela webɔɔre ne, a do kɛŋɔ siswɛm waa baa bɔɔ, ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ lawɛ, dɛ kpɔɔ do ba harɛ la Room nomoa nɔn ta.

A gɛ nɛra la ba Yeesu be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ he dɛ bol kasinteŋ. Haa nɛra sie nyiŋe mɔɔ dɛɛ bol wa. Korowii ŋwɛnɛɛ hɛɛ bagle nɛra kasinteŋ ne ásɛ ya won jemɛ gɛ waa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya ɛ.
Webeŋkpoŋii yaa nyin kɛŋɔ ya jemɛ. Onee kɛŋɔ ya mmarare dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ya bɔ lampoo dɛɛ tɛ Room Koojen Siisa kɛɛ ya bɛ dɛɛ bɔɔ?"
Dɛ Yeesu jemɛ ba webɔɔre la mun, dɛ ŋɔ,
"Hé kpɔ suuga bwe ba n na." Anee ba kpɔ bɛl ba, asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ume nyu ne o sɔnee dawɛ o ta nɔ?" Asɛ ba chaŋe ŋɔ Koojen Siisaa.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Oo. Amɔ hé kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Koojen Siisa kwaa tɛo, dɛ kpɔ kwaa aa ɛ Korowii kwaa la tɛ Korowii."
Ba ta wone dɔ wobɛlbwa dɛ́ che a ta lawɔ nɛra siwi ta, asɛ ba nyoa kpo ba che surumm ken.
Belaa Saduki tena bane ba Yeesu be. Dɛ Saduki tena la aa yarada kɛŋɔ kerekere nɛra ɛɛ ir seo taa.
Ba baa bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, Mosis fa chwerɛ mmara bɛl tɛ yaa ŋɔ, dɛ baa sewɔ gel o haah dɛ ba ta bii dɔe yaa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o nime kɛɛ o dɔɔ kpɔ haah la mo dɛ logle bii, ásɛ a gɛ bii la ɛ lale la bii.
Hahbeŋkpoŋ bibaala banuanɛɛ fa lole, asɛ binomoa la mo haah dɛ sewɛ, dɛ o ta bie dɔe.
Asɛ onɔ la waa teŋɛ binomoa la nɛɛ la kpɔ haah la mo dɛ ba sewɛ, dɛ o ge ne o ta bie lolɛ.
Asɛ bitooro te la ge mo haah la dɛ sewɛ, dɛ o ta bie dɔe. Gɛ tentenee ba bwa mo haah la ka lɔ nyoa ta dɛ ba serewe, dɛ ba ta bii dɔe.
A habɔɔ la, haah la ge baa sewɛ.
Aah taraken dɛ nɛra bwa seo ta ira tɔpere la baa tel asɛ bibaala la bwa iraa, ba bini umee dɛɛ ba haah la jaa ɛɛ yɔ?"
Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Fini nɔɔ baala ne haahna ɛɛ mo dɔŋa nɔ,
kɛ nɛra baa dɛ ba seo ta ira dɛ won dɔ bɔr ja Korowii Kora la ta la te aa haahna moe ba, baa jaranar ge yala ba.
Baa sewɛ kpa bwa. Baa doo kɛŋɔ Korowii toroma baa lɔ nyundua la, dɛ ɛ Korowii bii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba iro le seo ta.
Mosis gba fa bol seo ta ira nɔ waa kaih ken. Hé nyiŋi bela waa chwerɛ dawii fuih wa, dɛ bol Korowii waa ŋɔ onee Abraham Korowii ne Aesek Korowii ne Jekɔb Korowii la.
Lala laa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, weeraa dɛɛ tomɔ. Korowii te be, nomɛlbwa ɛ wee."
Asɛ Tɔn Jerema la bane ŋɔ, "Nomoa, he bola a ŋwɛnɛ ta!"
Ba ta wone bɔɔro wobɛlbwa kpa.

Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Aah Devid gbabir bol waa Korowii Kpɛɛra Tɔn la bobɛl ŋɔ, 'N Naa Korowii ŋɔ n Dɔɔ be ŋɔ ó so nomombɔr o dig ta ka tel kɛŋɔ waa ba o dɔma ne harɛ asɛ o tigri ba nɛ.' Waa bol gɛ nɔ, dɛ ɛrɛ waa ba ŋɔ Devid naa dɛ ɛ Kristo la nɔɔ?
Devid faa dɛ yerɔ o Dɔɔ nɔ, aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ Kristo la berɛ ɛ dɛ ɛ Devid naa ɔ?"
Yeesu chegɛ nɛra la bwa siwi ta dɛ ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ,
"Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi Tɔn Jerema la kɛrɛdɛ. Ban yon do laalajena ásɛ nɛra bwa na ba dɛɛ guŋ ba harɛ yawa ta la. Ba dɛ nyin nomombɔra soga cheremi deene ne bela nɛra aa chema dɛɛ di tɔpejena.
Ba sie begre kwa, dɛ yon kpɔ Korowii soŋa wobojaŋa ne tɔ sie dɛɛ kam kwaa luhaahna deremi. Korowii ɛɛ tɛr ba deŋnee taeh."
Yeesu aa lɔ Korowii Dea la, o nao kɛŋɔ dɔɔhna ta ba suugare dɛɛ do suuga log bini.
Belaa luhaah nyaa bɛl ge ba do suuga bwejegre anɛ.
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, luhaah nyaa nɔ do suugajena dɛ gwaa nɛra nɔ bwa,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ o dea suuga bwaa o kpɔ ba do log nɔ bini la. Kɛ dɔɔhna nɔ te suuga bini tama baa naa kɛŋɔ a waa aa ba nɛɛ we la, anee ba kpɔ ba do la."
Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋra la bane ɛɛ bol Korowii Dea la waa o be, gɛ bwea baa kpɔa mao, ne kondɛɛga nɛra aa ɛa tɛ Korowii ba kpɔ kwaa o danjwɛɛ la wer aa doa. Anee Yeesu ŋɔ,
"Tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao asɛ anɔ haa naa nɔ, ba ta ɛɛ pagre a bwaa asɛ bwe beŋkpoŋ bɛlbwa aa wola lee do dɛ chɔŋɛ o dɔŋ nɛɛ kpa."
Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, saŋ besoo aa ba chiga ɔ? Bɔkwaa dɛɛ ba bagla kɛ gɛ waa nɔ dɛ ba chiga ɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ heyaa negre. Nɛra pirim ɛɛ kpɔ n sɔnee ba dɛ ba ŋɔ banee men, dɛ ŋɔ tɔpere la telo. He bɛ ba nɛɛ teŋɛ.
Dɛ he baa no laa yoi waa ne harɛ vuuga waa bobɛlbwa naa, he bɛ ɔmɛ. A chɛ kɛ gɛ waa nɔ bwa chig. Kɛ dɛ wobɛlbwa jaga la ta tele mɔɔ."
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Harɛre ne ba dɔŋa harɛre ɛɛ yo laalee, asɛ koranar ne ba dɔŋa koranar ge yo dɔŋa laa.
Harɛ ɛɛ jigri bobɛlaa taeh, asɛ lɔr ne weela bwa soosiwi ba bobɛla. Hɛɛ na ɔmewaa aa wola balɛ bwa nyunduaa.

"Mɔɔ gɛ waa nɔ bwa chig la, baa tɔ sie larawe heya, dɛ ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa, dɛ lawɛ heyaa la cheremi deene bini dɛ ka bol he waa dɛ do heyaa dea. Baa koh n waa dɛ lawɛ heyaa ka che nomonome ne koranar siini.
Belaa hɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ dɔe dɛ bol Amanesoma la bag ba.
Ba baa lawɛ heya aa, he bɛ gel waa haa ka bol la hiah heya.
Menee dɛɛ ba n tɛ heyaa waa haa ka bol la, dɛ tɛ heyaa wejema asɛ he dɔma bɛ won di bɔ heyaa kɛɛ dɛ tɔŋle heya.
He mɛɛnanar ne nyare, ne he dɔɔranar ne nimanar, ne he lolanar ne daamanar ɛɛ le heyaa tɛ ásɛ ba kpoo he bane.
N nomanta nɛra ɛɛ hah heyaa.
Mɛɛ cha heyaa asɛ he nyumpon beŋkpoŋ kwara aa harɛɛ le.
He lawɛ bambile aa, hɛɛ dɔ he nyuu.
"He baa na kɛŋɔ soojare bar Jerusalam cheme aa, amɔ te hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ o pagra telo.
Amɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa lɔ Judia harɛ gɛ saŋ la chwa kaa bwea dor dɛ ka sɔh. Nɛra baa lɔ Jerusalam la chɛ kɛŋɔ ba le warane, asɛ bɛlbwa waa wola toole bwɛɛ la bini a gɛ saŋ la bɛ o bini jo.
A gɛ saŋee Korowii ɛɛ ba o nɛra deŋne tɛra, asɛ waa Korowii Tɔn la aa bagla la bwa ɛ kpela.
Tekpoŋra ne haahna baa dɔ bii baa ɔr la, bwɛɛlɛ! Dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra ɛɛ na wahala harɛ nɔ ta kohonaa, asɛ Korowii baah di ba nɛɛ o tɛr ba deŋne.
Baa kpɔ kerii kpoo bane, asɛ dɛ larawe bane dɛ kpɔ ba kaa harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa, asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ɛ Jerusalam bwa posaposa ken ka tel kɛŋɔ ba ge saŋ aa ba kaa.
"Hɛɛ na nyokpowaa wee ne korobie ne weweela taa. Harɛ ta ge, mpo ɛɛ jigruu dɛɛ lɔ nehaŋma kohona, asɛ nɛra bwa ɔmɛ, ba bwara yɔr.
Nɛra bambile ee teŋoo kohona, ba lii waa aa dɛ ba bala la wa, ba hwaahge, dɛkalkɛ Korowii doa bwa ɛɛ yiiguu dɛ chɔg.
Belaa baa ba n Nɛn Bie nae kɛŋɔ maa lɔ baama ta dɛɛ ba kpegri ne jirima a dɔŋ aa wola toole ne.
Dɛ gɛ waa nɔ baa pa mun dɛɛ ɛ aa, hé kpɔ he te dɛɛ kpa, dɛkalkɛ he lɛɛ tɔpere la telo."
Yeesu berɔ kpɔ sɛgla bol waa ba be ŋɔ, "Hé ta sie nyiŋi pur daa ne daa aa kaa nɔ dɛ na.
O ba dɛ fogre aa, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ bɔwɔb saŋ telo.
Gɛ tentenee dɛ he ba dɛ na a gɛ waa nɔ naa, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Kora la dii telo.
"Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ fini nɔ nɛra bwa laa dɛɛ ba serewa mɔɔ waa nɔ bwa chig.
Nyundua ne harɛ ɛɛ chɔgoo, kɛ n waa la te aa begre bwa. Aa che gɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwa.
"Hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ! He bɛ gel bodia kondikwaa dii ne sen nyɔe ne he weliira gwaa he nɛ, asɛ tɔpere la bɛ heyaa ba pigri kɛŋɔ nɛn yon gbarɛ bel la,
dɛkalkɛ o bala tɔpere la ɛɛ pigri nɛra baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwaa.
Hé gel he sie chɔ harɛ hɛɛ kpa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ́ dɔ bokpega dɛ le a gɛ waa aa chig la nyoa, asɛ dɛ won che n Nɛn Bie sie."
Dɛ tɔpere bɛlbwaa Yeesu bol waa dɛɛ bag ba Korowii Dea, asɛ bɔr baa jo aa, o yon kaa bwe bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ɔlevere Bwe la doa dɛ ka chɔ.
Asɛ tɔɔ perɔ chɔmbibi aa, o yon fel ba Korowii Dea bela, asɛ nɛra yon la o be dɛ́ ka no o waa la.
Aa ka tama ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa baa kpɔ paanoo baa wola iisi a ta do dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ diu la tel la,
dɛ Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la dɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ́ che o ta kpo Yeesu, kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ bela tena la.
Belaa Bɔnsam ba so Judas baa dɛ yerɔ Eskareɔt la nɛ. Dɛ o ɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bɛl.
O la Sɔfonomonome ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea bela la nomonome be, o ne ba ka vɔrɔwe gɛ waa dɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ́ le Yeesu tɛɛ ba.
Ba sie lɛo taeh, ba bagɔ nyoa ŋɔ dɛ o wono gel ba dɔɔ waa, baa tɛo suugaa.
O sɛh dɛɛ nyin saŋ waa wera nɛnlaa la aa wola Yeesu be do ásɛ o leo tɛɛ ba.
