Ba tɔpere baa dɛ kpo pebiiri dɛ kpɔ di Galekaa la telo,
asɛ Yeesu tomɛ Pita ne Jɔn dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé kaa dɛ ka ɛ Galekaa kondikwaa ásɛ ya ba di."
Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Leperaa hɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya ɛa chegɔ?"
O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Haa dɛɛ jo bwɛɛ la ta la, hɛɛ nao kɛŋɔ baa bɛl chegɛ vii ne ne. Hé teŋɛ o nɛɛ kaa dem waa dɛ kaa o ta la ta,
asɛ dɛ ka ŋɔ dem te la be ŋɔ, 'Ya nomoa ŋɔ dea haa dɛ ba kpɔe tɛ o ne o habɔteŋra ásɛ ba ba so o bini dɛ di Galekaa kondikwaa la sɛ?'
Wɛɛ bagle heyaa abrɔsane doa dea bɛl waa kwaa o bini dɛ kpɔ kane ne teeburre cheg bela. Belaa hɛɛ ba kwaa la ɛɛ cheg."
Pita ne Jɔn laŋɔ dɛ ka na wobɛlbwa gɛ tenten Yeesu aa ŋɔ ba be la, asɛ ba ɛ kondikwaa la cheg bela.
Bɔr aa magra kɛŋɔ bá di Galekaa kondikwaa la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la kaa so dɛɛ ba kwaa dii.
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "A gɛ Galekaa kondikwaa nɔ waa fa lɔ n bambile bini wubwa, asɛ mɛɛ nyin kɛ n ne he dia mɔɔ ba ɛɛ mɛ hɔhɔrɔwa.
N gelɔ hɛɛ no kɛŋɔ maa a gɛ kondikwaa nɔ anee di kpa, nemenɛ waa Galekaa nɔ aa chega tɛ la aa ɛa Korowii Kora la ta."
Belaa Yeesu kpɔ numol ne sen dɛ jam Korowii dɛ kpɔ tɛ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Hé nyɔ ka tɛ dɔŋa."
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Fini habɔɔ, maa sen nɔ anee nyɔ kpa ka tel gɛ saŋ Korowii aa ba di kora."
Asɛ o berɛ kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii dɛ mɔne tɛɛ ba, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Anɔ chegɔ tɛ n bo-ol maa koh he waa dɛ kpɔ tɛ nɛra bá kpo mɛ. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ lii mɛ."
Gɛ tentenee baa di kwaa la tonɛ la, o kpɔ numol ne sen la tɛɛ ba dɛ ŋɔ, "Sen nɔɔ chega tɛ n chal maa dɛ ba he waa koeh dɛ fuge ta. Aa ɛ fɔofalee dɛ chɔ Korowii ne nɛwɛnyini baah ta."
O berɔ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé no! Naate waa lee mɛ tɛ la lɔ bonɔ n ne o pɛ nɔn dɛɛ di kwa.
Gɛ Korowii aa bagla la taa aa ba chega n Nɛn Bie la sewɛ, kɛ naate waa lee mɛ tɛ ba kpo mɛ la, ó bwɛɛlɛ."
Ate dɛ ba dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Ya bini umee su baah dɛɛ ba ó ɛ gɛ waa nɔ nɔɔ?"
Webegra berɔ ba chole o habɔteŋra la baah ta kɛ ba bini umee ɛ ba nomoa ɔ?
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Korowii tomɛ la, ba koranaree yon dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ baa di kpegri ba nɛra nɛ, ba nomonjena gee nyin baa yer ba nomonjena.
He te ne gɛ waa la jaŋne. He bini nomoa la, ó ɛ o te kɛ bechala, asɛ ónɔ la waa dɛɛ nyiŋi he nɛɛ la ge ɛ o te kɛŋɔ somanji.
Nɛn waa soga o dɔŋ ɛɛ bɔne kwaa ne naate waa dɛ bɔne kwa, ba bini umee ɛ nomoa ɔ? Naate waa soga la laa aa? Kɛ n te aa lɔ he bini nɔ, n ɛ n te kɛ somanji.
Heyaa ja n nɛɛ n wahala bwa bini.
Anomanta n dɛ tɛ heyaa kora hé di, gɛ n Mɛɛ aa tɛ mɛ la.
N ne hɛɛ pɛ nɔnee di kwaa n kora ta, asɛ he so kookane ta dɛ bol Israel deene fi dɛ banɛ la bwa waa dɛ pa bole.
"Seemɔn, no! Bɔnsam soŋe Korowii ŋwɛnɛ dɛ́ daah heyaa dɛ́ fe vuugi heyaa sagasaga ken.
Kɛ n soŋe Korowii tɛɛ asɛ he yarada nyoa bɛ sɔɔh. Dɛ he berɔ berɛ he liire ba n be naa, hé lawɛ he bala la bá do wɔrɔbe."
Anee Pita chaŋo ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n chegɔ kɛ bá do n nee dea. Seo kwaraa yaa, n ne hɛɛ sewɔɔ."
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ae, Pita! Jabal logle ne sii fini dɛ he tɔɔh kera atoro ŋɔ haa men jemɛ."
Asɛ Yeesu bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "N faa tomɛ heyaa ŋɔ hé ka bol Amanesoma la, dɛ ŋɔ he bɛ suuga kpɔ, he bɛ bone ne naŋgawa kpɔ la, komɛl nya heya aa?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Komɛlbwa sese ta yaa nyae."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Name te nomɛlbwa waa dɔ suuga kɛɛ bone la, ó kpɔ, asɛ nómɛlbwa waa wola dɔmkon dɔe la ge yog o yal dɛ kpɔ yawɛ bɛl.
Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, 'Ba kuro ja wechɔg-ɛɛra bini.' N waa baa chwera la bwa dɛ ba chiga taraken."
Belaa o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, tokobie anɛɛ la." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "A magrɔ."
O le bwɛɛ la ta dɛ kaa Ɔlevere Bwe la ta, gɛ o yon dɛɛ ɛ la, asɛ o habɔteŋra la teŋɛ o nɛɛ kaa.
Baa tel bela la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ won negre heya."
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o le ba jwɛɛh dɛ kaa sie tama, dɛ ka guŋi dɛɛ soŋe Korowii,
dɛ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, hɛɛ sɛoh waa, bɛ gel n na a gɛ wahala haa ŋɔa ń na nɔ. Kɛ ɛ he tetoora dɛ gel n tetoora."
Asɛ nyundua torome den ba o be dɛ ba doo gbemba.
O tea bini aa chɔga kohona la, o soŋe Korowii siswɛm ne, asɛ bɔwɔb le o nɛɛ dɛ kor dɛɛ lee kɛŋɔ chal ken.
Waa soŋe Korowii tonɛ dɛ berɛ la o habɔteŋra la be la, lokua kohona nomanta dɛ ba chɔɔge doromi.
Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he chɔɔge nɔɔ? Hé ir dɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ won negre heya."
Yeesu nyoa taa lɔ waa ta wɛɛ bol la, dɛ Judas waa ɛ o habɔteŋra la bini bɛl la kaa tɔ nɛnlaa bane sie dɛ ba ba ne Yeesu be dɛ fe gbaaro pɛl o bambile dɛ mo o lwɛɛma.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Lwɛɛma moe nee hɛɛ ba n Nɛn Bie la lee dɛ tɛ aa?"
O habɔteŋra o ne baa lɔ bela la aa na waa aa dɛ ba bala la, ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, yá kpɔ ya tokobie nɔ ya ne ba yo aa?"
Asɛ ba bini bɛl kpɔ o tokobi dɛ ŋwɛnɛ Sɔfore Nomoa bonɔɔ dig deŋne dɛ laa cha.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé gel," dɛ kpɔ nɔn ka lege bonɔɔ la deŋne la bug la ta dɛ chaoh.
Belaa Yeesu bɔɔ Sɔfonomonome ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea nomoa ne ba bwɛɛ nomonome baa bala dɛ́ ba lawɔ la ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛɛree men he kpoŋe tokobie ne gule dɛ́ ba lag mɛ naa?
N ne haa lɔ Korowii Dea tɔpere bɛlbwa la, ɛrɛɛ haa wola men lawɛ bela ɔ? Taraken nɔ bɔr aa bira nɔ he dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ he ba lag mɛ."
Ba lawɔ dɛ kpɔɔ dɛɛ kaa Sɔfore Nomoa dem, dɛ Pita ne ba baah tɛrɔ, asɛ o teŋɛ ba nɛ.
Dɛ ba mar nii dem baah bela, asɛ Pita ka pu gɛ nɛra la so a jwɛh.
Pita aa soge nii la jwɛɛh la, Sɔfore Nomoa la tolo bɛl nao, dɛ nyiŋu jeiih ken, dɛ ŋɔ, "Yeesu habɔteŋree baa nɔ."
Anee Pita tɔh pelepele ken dɛ ŋɔ tolo la be ŋɔ, "Maa on jemɛ kwara!"
Aa bera la sie tama ken la, baa bɛl na Pita dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ba bini bɛlee he gba!" Anee o ŋɔ, "Akai, n ta ba bini jae!"
A habɔɔ dɛ ɛ dɔŋhwere beŋkpoŋ la, baa bɛl ge berɔ dalwe Pita jae waa ja Yeesu nɛɛ la ta ja, dɛ ŋɔ, "Galilia tee baa nɔ, anomanta tɔŋla bɛlbwa toole kɛŋɔ o ta Yeesu nɛɛ jae!"
Belaa Pita ŋɔ baa la be ŋɔ, "Maa waa haa dɛ bol nɔ bini jemɛ!" O nyoa taa lɔ waa la ta wɛɛ bol la jabal den si.
Asɛ Yeesu ke nyiŋi Pita siwi ta, asɛ o lii waa Yeesu faa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ jabal logle ne sii dɛ o tɔɔh kera atoro ŋɔ waa on jemɛ la.
Ate Pita le buse dɛ ka wi kɛrɛdɛ.
Nɛra baa lawɛ Yeesu la mugli o baah dɛ lɔɔro.
Ba kpɔ kon vɔwɛ o sie dɛɛ tɔɔ kande dɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ jemɛ, umee lɔe nɔɔ?"
Dɛ bolo nɛnhɛlwaa kohona.
Tɔ aa pera la, ba kpɔ Yeesu ka cheme Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa dɛ pa bole ne Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema sie,
dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ henee Kristo Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la aa, bol ya no!" Anee o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ n ŋɔ he be gɛ noo, haa men yarada,
n berɔ bɔɔ heyaa waane ge oo, haa men chaŋe.
Le taraken dɛɛ kaa la, n Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ so nomombɔree Korowii waa dɔ kpegri bwa dig ta."
Asɛ ba bwa ŋɔ, "Amɔ he ɛ Korowii Bie kɛɛ?" Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Anee he bol la."
Belaa ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ o gbagba aa bola nɔ, danseɛ besoo yá berɛ dɛɛ nyin jaɔ?"
Nɛra la tagɛ ba kane ta dɛ ir, ba kpɔɔ la harɛ nomoa Paelet be,

dɛ ka haŋɛ o nyoa ŋɔ, "Ya lawɛ baa nɔ kɛ waa dɛ chɔg ya harɛ. O dɛ do nɛra dochɔga ŋɔ ba bɛ lampoo bɔ dɛɛ tɛ Room Koojen Siisa kpa, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ ɛ o te ya Juda tena kooro Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ yaa nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo o ba ba lɛ yaa la."
Anee Paelet bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Henee Juda tena kooro ɛ?" O ŋɔ, "Anee he bol la."
Asɛ Paelet ŋɔ Sɔfonomonome ne nɛnlaa baa cheme o sie la be ŋɔ, "N ta wechɔga baa nɔ aa ɛa nae."
Dɛ nɛra la nyoa ta kpegri, ba bol ane dɛɛ dawɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "O kpɔ o webagla dɛɛ chɔg nɛra liire Juda tena harɛ bwa ta taraken. Galilia harɛ taa o pa mun, dɛ kpɔ ba le bonɔ!"
Paelet aa no gɛ la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Galilia tee yaa?"
Baa bola ŋɔ Galilia tee la, dɛ Hɛrɔd waa ɛ Galilia kooro gɛ saŋ la ba Jerusalam, asɛ o gel ba kpɔɔ la o be.
Waa na Yeesu la, dɛ o sie lɛo taeh. Waa no o waa dɛ fe ɛɛ nyinu o ɛ nyokpowaa ó na bigro, anomanta dɛ o dɛ nyinu dɛ́ na.
Kooro Hɛrɔd bɔɔro waa taeh, asɛ o mwaa o ne.
Belaa Sɔfonomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la bol waa takpeg ne dɛɛ dawɛ o nɛ.
Asɛ Kooro Hɛrɔd ne o soojare ɛɛ mugli o baah dɛɛ mamɔ, dɛ ka kpɔ koowur ba doo dɛ berɛ kpɔɔ ka tɛ Paelet.
Dɛ Kooro Hɛrɔd ne Paelet faa somɛ, kɛ le awola la, ba kpɔ darame.
Paelet yerɛ bela tena ne Sɔfonomonome ne bwɛɛ nomonome ba cheme,
dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Heyaa lawɛ baa nɔ ba n be dɛ ŋɔ o dɛ do nɛra dochɔga ŋɔ bá lɛ gaeh harɛ nɔ ta. N bɔɔro a bini he bwa siwi ta bonɔ dɛ na kɛŋɔ o ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Kpɔe he kpɔ waa la dɛɛ dawɔ.
Gɛɛ Kooro Hɛrɔd ge aa wola wechɔga bɛlbwa o nɛɛ nae dɛ berɛ kpɔɔ ba tɛ yaa. Wobɛlbwa ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ yá kpoo.
Kɛ mɛɛ geloo ba lɔɔro bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra ne dɛ kpɔɔ ta."
Dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la we-ɛɛla aa doa la, o telaa, ba yon le wechɔg-ɛɛra baa do ba dea la beŋkpoŋ ta ó kaa.
Belaa nɛnlaa la bwa kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Kpoo! Le Barabas ta ó kaa!"
Gɛ Barabas nɔ ɛ nomɛl waa ja waane ba faa ir a ne dɛ vuugi Room Koojen nomonome ba faa dɛ nyiŋi ba harɛ la ta, asɛ dɛ kpoo nɛra ge ja, asɛ ba lawɔ ka do dea.
Paelet bambile bini la, dɛ o dɛ nyin kɛ o gel Yeesu o kaa, asɛ o berɛ bol waa bagle nɛnlaa la ja.
Ane a bwa ba ta noɛ, dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta! Kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!"
O bɔɔ ba tooro tena ŋɔ, "Wechɔga besoo o ɛɔ? N ta wechɔga waa ɛa a chɛ kɛ ba kpoo nae! Mɛɛ geloo ba lɔɔro chweema ne dɛ kpɔɔ ta."
Dɛ gɛ baa dɛ bol la taa ba ta do, dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ ŋɔ o chɛ kpaara pɛl dagagre ta. Ba nyoa baa gwaa Paelet nɛ,
asɛ o sɛh gɛ baa dɛ nyin tɛɛ ba, dɛ kpɔ waa la dawɛ Yeesu nɛ.
Paelet le baa la waa ja waane ba faa ir a ne dɛ vuugi Room Koojen nomonome dɛ kpoo nɛra ba doo dea la ta la o kaa, asɛ dɛ kpɔ Yeesu tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ka ɛo gɛ bwa baa dɛ nyin.

Soojare la aa kpɔɔ dɛɛ kaa dɛ́ ka kpoo la, ba kaa cheme baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn. Sairini tee. Dɛ o le koo dɛɛ ba, asɛ soojare la lawɔ dɛ lɛ dagagre Yeesu aa dɛ chegɔɔ la, dɛ gel Seemɔn cheo teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
Dɛ nɛnlaa tenten teŋɛ o nɛ, ba bini bane ɛ haahna dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ nyu dɛɛ dooge lɔŋɔre dɛ wi dɛɛ tɛo.
Asɛ Yeesu berɛ o te dɛ ŋɔ, "Jerusalam haahna, he bɛ wi tɛ mɛ. He wi tɛ he nyuune ne he bii,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ tɔpere bɛl dɛ ba bala asɛ he ŋɔ, nɛra baa wola lolɛ bwa ne banɔ la baa wola bii ɔrɛ bwa la na som.
A gɛ saŋee 'nɛra ɛɛ ba bwea ne deŋgarere be ŋɔe ŋɔ á ba tɔ ba nɛɛ bá sɔh a lɔgre.'
Da-lwɛɛ dɛ fuh aa, dahole te ta pɔeh yaa?"
Soojare la kpɔ wechɔg-ɛɛra banɛ bane ja o nɛɛ dɛɛ la ka kpoo ba.
Ba kaa tel bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Nyuhog Bɔr. Belaa ba kpaa Yeesu pɛl dagagre ta, dɛ kpaa wechɔg-ɛɛra la ge pɛl dagagra ta, dɛ kpɔ bɛl pa Yeesu dig ta, bɛl ge pa o gal.
Yeesu ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba. Baa waa baa dɛ ɛ nɔ jemɛ." Soojare la kpɔ o laala bil dɛɛ ta chacha ŋɔ naate waa di la, ó kpɔ onɔ la waa dɛ nyin.
Nɛnlaa chegɛ bela dɛɛ nyiŋu. Juda tena nomonome mugli o baah ŋɔ, "Kɛ he wono lɛ bane oo? Dɛ he ŋɔ henee Kristo la Korowii aa leo la aa, lɛ he te yá na!"
Gɛɛ soojare la ge mamɔ dɛ mugli o baah, dɛ tuuh tel o jwɛh, dɛ kpɔ sennyɛga tɛo ŋɔ ó nyɔ,
dɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ŋɔ henee Juda tena kooro la aa, lɛ he te!"
O nyundua bɔr dagagre la ta la, ba chwerɔ ka pɛl bela ŋɔ, |scJUDA TENA KOORO LAANEE LA|d.
Wechɔg-ɛɛra baa ja o nɛɛ la bɛl bol waa yagɔ ŋɔ, "He laa Kristo la kɛɛ? Lɛ he te dɛ lɛ ya geo."
Asɛ nɛɛte la aa jaa la kaoh ŋɔ, "Jamɔ haa Korowii ɔmɛ kɛɛ? Gɛ baa ɛ yaa nɔ, gɛɛ ba ɛ o ge.
O te kwara wechɔga bɛlbwa toole o nɛ. Kɛ ya te, waa yaa ɛa la, kenii a chɛ kɛ ya na."
Dɛ ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Yeesu, he baa di he kora aa, asɛ hé lii n wa."
Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, hale fini, hɛɛ ja n nɛɛ nɛndɛɛga silɛɛ bwɛɛ nyundua belaa."
Dɛ wee gel lɔe dɛ ka tel wekee saŋ,
asɛ yal baa kpɔa teŋe Korowii Dea bini la baah pere anɛ.
Yeesu kpɔ takpeg do lɔŋɔ dɛ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, he nɔn taa n lileo do!" Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o doma le, o sewɛ.
Sooja nomoa waa lɔ bela dɛ na waa aa chiga la, o ŋɔ, "Kpelaa, wechɔga toole baa nɔ nɛ," dɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
Nɛra baa bala dɛ́ ba nyiŋi la loo kuu, ba kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ nyu dɛ kaa dem.
Kɛ nɛra baa jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ la ne haahna baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛ le Galilia harɛ la te ta chegɛ bojaŋ dɛɛ nyiŋu.
Dɛ baa bɛl sɔne Josef, o ɛ Juda te dɛ le bela bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Arimatea. Dɛ o ja nomonome baa bol Yeesu waa la ne, dɛ o dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge.
O te fe ta sɛɛh teŋɛ ba nɛɛ kɛ bá kpo Yeesu.
Gɛ baa la la Paelet be dɛ ka soŋe Yeesu lale,
dɛ lao kpɔ le dagagre la ta, dɛ kpɔ yapoŋ baago dɛ kpɔɔ ka bil bwe bɔɔ baa komɔ kɛŋɔ dea bini. Dɛ ba ta lale kpɔe do o bini bwa.
Dɛ awola ɛ Fiara, asɛ baa kpɔ ba te dɛ́ di Ona Tɔpere la.
Haahna baa teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ le Galilia harɛ la la bwe bɔɔ la ta bá ka na bela ne gɛ baa kpɔ lale la bil bɔɔ la bini.
Asɛ ba berɛ kaa dem dɛ ka ɛ kwaane a sɔɔh aa soma dɛɛ ba kpɔe ka ɛ lale la. Ona Tɔpere la, ba onɔ gɛ mmara la aa bagla la.
Tɔɔ aa pera Kwasie tomun aa dɛ kpɔ la, haahna la kpɔ kwaa a sɔɔh aa soma la la bwe bɔɔ la ta,
dɛ ka na kɛŋɔ nomɛl gbili bwe baa kpɔa tɔ bɔɔ la le o nyoa,
asɛ ba jo dɛ na kɛŋɔ ba Dɔɔ Yeesu lale la toole.
Ba nyoa aa kpoa ba che bela la, dɛ baala banɛ bane baa do laalapoŋa aa nyɛgle al-al ken denɔ ba che ba jwɛh.
Ɔmee lag ba taeh, asɛ ba gure nyuune suugi harɛ. Anee baala la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he baa nyin nɛnwee lala bɔr ɔ?
Waa o faa bol he be Galilia harɛ la, he soɔh kɛɛ? O toole bonɔ, o iro.
O fa ta ŋɔe ŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ ba le o Nɛn Bie tɛ nɛnchɔga, ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la o ir seo ta naa?"
Belaa haahna la ta lii gɛ waa la,
dɛ laa berɛ kaa dem dɛ ka taa bagle Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la ne nɛra baa ja ba nɛɛ la.
Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la ne Joana ne Jems nya Mɛɛre ne haahna bane baa jaa laanee bol waa la bagle o habɔteŋra la.
Yeesu habɔteŋra la kpɔ waa la ɛ mola, ba ta kpɔe ɛ wobɛlbwa.
Belaa Pita te kpɔ chwae dɛ la bwe bɔɔ la ta, dɛ ka boŋɛ dɛ haah o bini dɛ na yapoŋ baa kpɔa baage lale la gbo chɔe. Dɛ kpɔ nyokpoa kaa dem.
Awola tenten la, Yeesu habɔɔ nɛra la bini banɛ bane chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ le Jerusalam dɛɛ kaa Emɛyas. Bela ne Jerusalam ɛɛ ɛ kwansini anuanɛɛ.
Dɛ ba dɛ bol waa dɔŋa be, dɛɛ bagle dɔŋa waa aa chiga.
Baa dɛ bol waa sibegra ne dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa dɛɛ kaa la, Yeesu gbagba kaa puu ba, ba ne wɛɛ kaa.
Ba nao, kɛ ba ta wone jemɔ.
Belaa Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa he valɛ dɛɛ ba dɛɛ bol dɔŋa be nɔɔ?" Asɛ ba jagɛ che sum ne surumm ken.
Asɛ ba nɛra banɛ la bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kliopas la chaŋo ŋɔ, "He te ta waa aa chig bonɔ tɔperaanɛ nɔ noɛ kɛɛ? Jerusalam nɛnhɔɔhree hen kɛɛ?"
Anee Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa yɔ?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Waa aa pu Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la waa yaa bol. O ɛ Korowii keame dɛ dɔ kpegri wobol ne we-ɛɛla ta, Korowii ne nɛra bwa jemɛ o wa.
Ya Sɔfonomonome ne ya bela nomonome kpɔɔ tɛ ŋɔ bá di o wa, dɛ kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo.
Kɛ ya te, ya fa dɔ hwɛga kɛ onee naate o fe aa dɛ ba dɛ́ ba lɛ Israel tena la. Waa nɔ aa chiga tɔpera atoroo la.
Anɔ la ge aa jaa, haahna bane baa ɛ ya bini bane la gelɔ ya nyoa kpo. Ba felo dɛ la bela baa hugo,
kɛ ba ta o lale nae. Asɛ ba ba dɛ ba ŋɔ ba na nyundua toroma bela, ba chagle kɛŋɔ Yeesu ir seo ta.
Belaa yabala la bane baa ɛ o habɔteŋra la bane la bela baa hugo la, dɛ ka na a gɛ waa la tenten, dɛ a ɛ kpela gɛ haahna la aa bola la. Kɛ Yeesu gbagba te, ba ta on nae."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nfɛrɛ nyaara! Ɛrɛɛ haa wola Korowii keamere waa baa bola la yarada nɔɔ?
A ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ Kristo la Korowii aa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la na gɛ wahala nɔ bwa mɔɔ asɛ dɛ dɔ Korowii Kora la di kɛɛ?"
Asɛ Yeesu bag ba o bwara waa aa lɔ Korowii Tɔn la bwa bini. O pa mun le anɔ la aa lɔ Mosis Tɔne la bini dɛ bagle kaa anɔ la aa lɔ Korowii keamere kwaa la ta.
Baa tel bwɛɛ la baa dɛ kaa o ta la, Yeesu ɛo kɛŋɔ waa dɛ kaa sie,
kɛ ba ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ, dɛ soŋo ŋɔ, "Wee joɔ, bɔr dɛ bir, anomanta ba yá chɔ." Asɛ o sɛh o ne ba ka so.
Kondiiga saŋ aa tela ba ka cheme tig ta la, o kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii dɛ kuugi do ba nɔɔra ta.
Belaa ba sie ta chole o nɛɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesuu. Bug la ta o den nyogre ba siwi ta.
Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "A waa laa wɛɛ bagle Korowii Tɔn la waa ŋwɛnɛ ta asɛ a jo ya bini gɛ la aa?"
Bug la taa ba ir dɛ berɛ kaa Jerusalam a wola jɔmɔra la ne, dɛ ka na Yeesu habɔteŋra fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la.
Dɛ ba ne nɛra baa jaa la pɛo so dɛɛ bol ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ la iro kpela! O kpɔ o te bagle Seemɔn!"
Gɛ nɛra banɛ la bagle waa aa chig Emɛyas ŋwɛnɛ ta gɛ saŋ baa dɛ kaa asɛ Yeesu ka puu ba la bini chag ba, dɛ bagle gɛ aa ɛa o kuugi paanoo tɛɛ ba mɔɔ ba ta jemɔ.
A gɛ saŋ nɛra banɛ la aa bol gɛ waa la dɛɛ bag ba la, bug la ta dɛ Yeesu denɔ ba che ba baah ta dɛ ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna."
Ba jarɔ, ɔmee lag ba, ba lii kɛŋɔ lalee ba ken na.
Asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa gela he bambile chɔg nɔɔ? Bɔkwa waa hɛɛ ɛ aahna-aahna nɔɔ?
Hé nyiŋi n nɔɔra ne n napaala, asɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ menee. Hé lag mɛ dɛ na, dɛkalkɛŋɔ lale ta bwadabii ne hoga dɔe gɛ haa na mɛ n che nɔ."
Yeesu bol gɛ waa nɔ dɛ kpɔ o nɔɔra ne o napaala bag ba.
Ba sie lɛo, kɛ dɛ ba bwara hwaoh, asɛ ba taa tɔŋle. O bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He dɔ kondikwaa ane bonɔ naa?"
Asɛ ba tɛo pɛŋe baa ŋwiiro pera,
asɛ o lɛ dɛ chwe ba siwi ta,

dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Anɔ waa gɛ saŋ n ne haa lole la, n yon dɛɛ bol he be ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n bwara wobɛlbwa baa chwera Mosis Mmara la bini ne Korowii keamere tɔne la bini ne Korowii Kpɛɛra Tɔn bini la ɛ kpela la."
Anee o kpɔ lii ba, ba no Korowii Tɔn la mun.
Dɛ berɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ Kristo la chɛ kɛŋɔ o na wahala nɛra nɔn ta ba kpoo, asɛ o seo habɔɔ tɔpera atoro la, o ir seo ta,
ásɛ ba che o sɔn ta dɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛ ŋɔ nɛ́ra charɛ ba liire dɛ le wechɔga ta ásɛ Korowii kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba, dɛ pa mun le Jerusalam dɛ bagle gɛ waa nɔ harɛ bobɛlbwa.
Heyaa waa nɔ danseɛ tena.
Kɛ hé no, n gbabir ɛɛ tomɛ kon n Mɛɛ aa bagɛ heyaa nyoa laanee he be. Anomanta hé so bwɛɛ nɔ ta ka tel kɛŋɔ kpegri la aa le nyundua ba he be."
Belaa o kpɔ ba le Jerusalam kaa Bɛtani dahare dɛ ka laa o nɔɔra ir dɛ soŋe Korowii tɛɛ ba.
O Korowii soŋa dɛ tɛɛ ba ta la, o le ba jwɛh, asɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua.
Ba berɛ kpɔ silɛɛ kaa Jerusalam,
dɛ yon ka jo Korowii Dea dɛɛ jam Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa.
Wobɛlbwa mumpar Korowii aa wola nyundua ne harɛ tae mɔɔ la, dɛ Korowii Nyoa Wobol la lole. Dɛ o ne Korowiirii lole, asɛ o ne o bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
Dɛ onee ja Korowii nɛɛ mumpar la.
O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ta komɛlbwa. Kontaale bɛlbwa toole waa wola o nɛɛ chegɛ dɛ tao.
Korowii Nyoa Wobol la bee Korowii mkpa do, asɛ gɛ mkpa nɔ ge ɛ kɛŋɔ nii dɛɛ chaah nɛwɛnyini sie.
Nii nɔ lole dɛɛ chaah biro ta, kɛ biro ta wone tɔɔ ŋwɛnɛ ó chaah bɔr kahonɛ bwa.
Dɛ baa bɛl lole baa yerɔ Jɔn. Korowiirii tomɔ
ŋɔ ó ba bol nii la waa dɛ chaah nɛwɛnyini sie la waa nɛra be, ásɛ ba no dɛ yarada.
Dɛ Jɔn gbagba laa gɛ nii la. Balaa o ba dɛ ba bol nɛn waa ɛ nii tenten la waa ásɛ nɛra jemɛ o wa.
Korowii Nyoa Wobol laanee nii kasinteŋ waa dɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ ba pili nɛwɛnyini sie la.
O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ta nɛwɛnyini, kɛ waa ba harɛ ta bonɔ la, nɛwɛnyini ta on jemɛ.
O ba o gbagba harɛ ta, asɛ o gbagba nɛra vɛoh.
Kɛ nɛra la te bwa baa lɛo dɛ yaradao la, o tɛɛ ba kpegri kɛŋɔ bá ɛ Korowii bii.
Ŋwɛnɛ nɛwɛnyini aa chegɛ o ta dɛɛ lolɛ bii la, kɛɛ nɛwɛnyini pɛla, kɛɛ nɛwɛnyini tetoora ta laa ba lol ba ba ɛ Korowii bii. Korowii kpegri taa a che ba berɛ o bii.
Korowii Nyoa Wobol la baa berɛ nɛwɛnyini, dɛ ba so ya be. Ya na o jirima waa dɔa, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Bibeŋkpoŋ laanee on. Dɛ o wobɛlbwa wer, asɛ o dɔ kasinteŋ ge kohona.
O waa Jɔn faa bol kohona dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛn n faa dɛ bol o waa dɛ ŋɔ men tɔ sie o nɛɛ kɛ o gwaa mɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o lole mɔɔ ba lol mɛ la, on la."
Korowii chao kohona asɛ o ge na ya sum dɛɛ tɛ yaa andɛɛga saŋ bɛlbwa, waa wola gel bwa.
Mosis nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ba Mmara la ne. Yeesu Kristo ge nɛɛ nɛn nɛɛ suna ne kasinteŋ bwa che dɛ ba harɛ ta.
Nomɛlbwa ta Korowii nae bwa. O Bibeŋkpoŋ waa pɛlo la, on gela nɛwɛnyini jemɔ.
A wola bɛl, Juda tena nomonome baa lɔ Jerusalam la tomɛ ba Sɔfore ne Tɔn Jerema bane ŋɔ bá ka bɔɔ Jɔn o nɛnsoo. Waa waa bola dɛ kpɔ di Yeesu danseɛ laanee nɔ.
Baa bɔɔro gɛ la, o ta nyoa tɔe. O bol kasinteŋ ŋɔ, "Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la laa men."
Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Aah dɛ umee hen ɔ? Elaejaa hen kɛɛ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "O laa men." Anee ba ŋɔ, "Korowii keame laanee hen kɛɛ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Akai."
Belaa ba ŋɔ, "Bagle he nɛnsoo yá jemɛ, dɛ won dɔ wobɛl ka bol nɛra baa tomɛ yaa la be. Nɛn besoo hɛɛ lii he te nɔ?"

Belaa Jɔn kpɔ Korowii keame Aesaya waa o faa bola la chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Menee naate waa dɛ bol waa takpeg ne pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ ta dɛɛ ŋɔ, 'Hé gel he we-ɛɛla togre, dɛ kpɔ he te dɛɛ kpa he Dɔɔ bala' la."
Anee nɛra Farisii tena la aa tom ba la
bɔɔ Jɔn ŋɔ, "He ŋɔ Kristo la laa hen, Elaeja ge laa hen, Korowii keame la ge laa hen, aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ he ɛ dɛ won dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii ne ɔ?"
Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ, "Nee n te kpɔ dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii ne. Nomɛl lɔ he bini taraken haa wola on jemɛ.
Men bala mɔɔ o ba, kɛ o gwaa mɛ. Maa o napaa tee kwaraa dɔ."
Bwɛɛ baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛtani o do Jɔɔdan Moo la wee leebɔr pera la, belaa a gɛ waa nɔ chig. Dɛ belaa Jɔn ɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii ne.
Tɔ aa pera la, Jɔn na Yeesu kɛŋɔ waa dɛ ba o be. Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ nɛra o ne baa chega la be ŋɔ, "Hé na Korowii Pebie waa dɛ ba nɛra bwa wechɔga laa dɛ kpɔ ba nɛɛ la!
O waa n faa bol ŋɔ, 'Nomɛl lɔ n habɔɔ dɛɛ ba, dɛ gwaa mɛ, dɛkalkɛ o lole mɔɔ ba lol mɛ' la.
Dɛ n gbabir faa on jemɛ, kɛ o waa n ba dɛ baa sɔ nɛra Korowii nee ásɛ Israel tena jemɔ."
Jɔn bol Yeesu waa ja ŋɔ, "N na Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa le nyundua kɛŋɔ brɔnoma, dɛ ba so o nɛ.

N te fe aa jemɛ kɛ onee, kɛ Korowii waa lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ba kpɔ nee dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee laanee gela n jemɔ. O ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Hɛɛ na n Domadɛɛge laanee o ba so naate nɛ. On dɛɛ ba n Domadɛɛge kpɔe dɛ sɔ nɛra la.'
A gɛ waa nɔ chigo n na, anomanta n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ Korowii Biee on."
Tɔ aa pera la, dɛ Jɔn ne o habɔteŋra banɛ chegɛ bela ja.
O na Yeesu o baa kaa, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé na Korowii Pebie la!"
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o habɔteŋra banɛ la noɔ, dɛ ka teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
Belaa Yeesu ke nyiŋi dɛ na kɛ baa teŋɛ o nɛ, asɛ o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwaa hɛɛ nyin ɔ?" Asɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Rabae, lee he dem doɔ?" (Rabae munii nɛn waa dɛ chagle wa.)
Belaa o ŋɔ, "Hé ba na." Asɛ ba la dɛ ka na o dem. Dɛ a bɔ jɔmɔra dɔŋ anaarɛ, asɛ ba so o be bela wee ba jo.
Dɛ Andriu ɛ nɛra banɛ la Jɔn aa bol waa ba no dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la bini bɛl. Seemɔn Pita nimee on.
Waa waa tɔ sie ɛ laanee kɛŋɔ o kaa nyin o dɔɔ Seemɔn bɔr, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya na Mɛsaya la." (Mɛsaya munii Kristo.)
O la Seemɔn ne Yeesu be. Belaa Yeesu nyiŋu dɛ ŋɔ, "He sɔne Seemɔn. Jɔn biee hen. Taraken baa dɛɛ yerɛɛ Sefas." (Grik tena ge dɛ yerɛ Sefas Pita. O munii Bwe.)
Tɔ aa pera la, Yeesu ɛo kɛŋɔ wɛɛ la Galilia harɛ taa. O kaa na baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Felep dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Baa teŋɛ n nɛ!"
Dɛ Felep bwɛɛ Bɛtsaeda, belaa Andriu ne Pita ge le.

Felep ge kaa na baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Nataaneɛl, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ya na naate Mosis aa chwerɛ o waa Korowii Tɔn bini la. O waa Korowii keamere la ge chwerɛ la. O sɔne Yeesu. Josef waa le Nasarɛt la biee."
Belaa Nataaneɛl ŋɔ, "Nasarɛt ge, kondɛɛge besoo dɛ won le bela ɔ?" Anee Felep ŋɔ, "Ba ba na nɔ!"
Yeesu aa na Nataaneɛl wɛɛ ba o be la, o ŋɔ, "Israel te tentenee nɔ. O waa dɔ kasinteŋ kɛrɛdɛ!"
Belaa Nataaneɛl bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ɛ jem mɛ nɔ?" Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Haa lɔ pur la mun la, n nae mɔɔ Felep ka yerɛ la."
Anee Nataaneɛl ŋɔ, "Nomoa, Korowii Biee hen. Henee Israel tena Kooro la."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Maa ŋɔ he be ŋɔ n nae pur la mun la waa he den yarada mɛ nɔ naa? Hɛɛ na wejenaa a gwaa anɔ!"
Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, hɛɛ nao nyundua aa pila, asɛ nyundua toroma che bela tu dɛɛ ba men Nɛn Bie be, dɛ berɛ teeh dɛɛ kaa."
A habɔɔ tɔpetooro wee la, dɛ ba dɛ ɛ hanfalewaa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Keena o do Galilia harɛ ta la. Dɛ Yeesu nya Mɛɛre lɔ bela.
Ba yerɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la bane ge hanfale waa la bɔr bela.
Dɛ ba dɛ tɛ nɛra la aa cheme bela la sen, asɛ a bo. Belaa Yeesu nya ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ba sen bwa tonɔ."
Anee Yeesu bɔɔ o nya ŋɔ, "N nya, aah ɛrɛ waa he berɛ dɛɛ nyiŋi n te siwi ta nɔɔ? Gɛ saŋ maa dɛ ba n toma ɛɛ la ta tele mɔɔ."
O nya berɔ ŋɔ bonɔɔna baa dɛ do sene la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ o baa ŋɔ hé ɛ wobɛlbwa naa, hé ɛ."
Dɛ vɛɛhna anumɛl chegɛ bela asɛ ba kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ ba nawee bɛl. Ba yon ɛ nee do a bini ásɛ nɛra yon dɛɛ sarame ba sarama bɛl soo mɔɔ dɛɛ di kwa. Dɛ vɛɛhna la bɛlbwa won nee haŋkorɔ fah lɛɛ.
Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá do nee vɛɛhna la bini á su, asɛ ba do nee a su laŋlaŋ ken.
Baa do nee vɛɛhna la bini la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé ɛ ane la ka tɛ hanfale dea nomoa la." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba la nee la ne ka tɛo. Baa tɛo la, dɛ senee.
Nomoa la aa dagɛ nee aa berɛ sen la na la, o ta wone jemɛ bela aa lea ba, kɛ dɛ bonɔɔna baa dɛ do sen la te jemɔ.

Anomanta o yerɛ hanfale jaa la dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa dɛ ba nɛra sen tɛɛ yaa, andɛɛga nee o yon tɔ sie le, asɛ nɛra bwa aa baa nyɔ vagɛ la, mɔɔ o yon le anɔ la aa wola somɛ la ne asɛ baa nyɔ. Ɛrɛɛ he te tɔ sendɛɛga cheg dɛ ka mun dɛɛ ba a ne nɔɔ?"
Yeesu nyokpowaa waa tɔ sie ɛa laanee la. Keena waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta laanee o ɛa, dɛ chagle o nɛnsoo ne kpegri waa dɔa, asɛ o habɔteŋra la na dɛ yaradao.
A habɔɔ la, Yeesu ne o nya ne o nimanar ne o habɔteŋra la la Kapeeneɔm dɛ ka so bela tɔpera anɛ.
Dɛ Juda tena tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la joɔ tonɛ, anomanta Yeesu la Jerusalam.
Bela la, o nao kɛŋɔ nɛra bane aa dɛ yog nae ne peera ne brɔnomare Korowii Dea bobɛl. Dɛ nɛra baa dɛ pegri suugare ge soge ba teeburre ta dɛɛ ɛ ba toma.
Belaa Yeesu pɛrɛ bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra dɛ kpɔ doŋi peera ne nae ne kondɛɛra la bwa bela. O tagɛ nɛra baa dɛ pegri suugare la teeburre piigi, dɛ lɔ ba suugare merɛ,
dɛ kɔr banɔ la baa dɛ yog brɔnomare la ŋɔ bá le a ne bela, dɛ ŋɔ ba bɛ o Mɛɛ dem kpɔ berɛ bonadibɔr.
Bela la, o habɔteŋra la liiro kɛŋɔ baa chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini bobɛl kɛŋɔ, "Korowii Dea waa swɛɛ n siwi taeh" la.
Belaa Juda tena nomonome la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa nyokpowaa hɛɛ ba wona ɛ dɛ́ chagle kɛŋɔ he dɔ ŋwɛnɛ dɛ won ɛ a gɛ waa nɔ nɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "He kuugi Korowii Dea nɔ naa, n gee kpɔ tɔpera atoroo doo."
Belaa ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Dea baa kpɔ bene fifraanaarɛ dɛ anumɛl mao la, hen dɛ won kpɔ tɔpera atoro gbo doo waa?"
Dɛ Yeesu gbagba bwadabii waa wɛɛ bol dɛ kpɔ magɛ Korowii Dea la.
Anomanta la, Korowii aa ir Yeesu seo ta la, belaa o habɔteŋra la lii kɛŋɔ Yeesu fa bol a gɛ waa nɔ. A gelɔ ba yarada waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la, ne waa Yeesu aa bola la.
Yeesu taa lɔ Jerusalam dɛɛ di Galekaa la la, nɛra warɔ dɛ che o nyokpowaa waa ɛa ta dɛ yaradao kɛŋɔ onee Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ nɛwɛnyina la.
Kɛ Yeesu ta ban yaradae kɛŋɔ ó kpɔ o te tɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o jemɛ nɛwɛnyini da kɛrɛdɛ.
A ta hiaih kɛ nɛn baglo gɛ nɛwɛnyini aa doa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o gbagba jemɛ waa aa lɔ nɛn bambile bini.
Dɛ Juda tena nomoa bɛl lole baa yerɔ Nikodeemɔs. Dɛ o ɛ Farisii te.
Awola bɛl jwaana, o ba Yeesu be dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, nomɛlbwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii tomɛ ŋɔ hé ba bagle nɛra wa, dɛkalkɛ dɛ Korowii ta nɛn habɔɔ chegaa, waa won ɛ nyokpowaa nɔ haa dɛ ɛ nɔ."
Belaa Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin Korowii Kora la ta dɛ ja la, nemenɛ ba berɛ lolɔ ja."
Anee Nikodeemɔs pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Nɛn waa kpega la, ɛrɛɛ bá ɛ dɛ berɛ won lolɔ jaɔ? Wɛɛ wonoo berɛ jo o nya tea bini ja asɛ o lolɔ waa?"
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, dɛ ba ta nomɛlbwa lolɛ nee ne Korowii Domadɛɛge ne naa, waa Korowii Kora ta jae ba.
Nɛwɛnyini lola lole, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ge lola do le. Nɛwɛnyini lola ɛ bwadabii wa, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge lola ge ɛ lileo wa.
He bɛ gel waa maa bola ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ ba berɛ lolɛ heyaa la kpo he nyoa.

Bela peu aa dɛ nyin laanee o ta dɛɛ kaa. O dɛ ta aa, he dɛ no o gbɔga kɛ haa on na, haa won jemɛ bela waa lea ne bela waa dɛ kaa. Gɛɛ nomɛlbwa Korowii Domadɛɛge aa lolɔ la do. Dɛ o we-ɛɛla laa aa, komɛlbwa toole dɛɛ bagle kɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge lolɔ."
Belaa Nikodeemɔs pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ waa nɔ ɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won magre ɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ɛ Juda tena nomonjen dɛɛ bagle Korowii Wa, haa wola gɛ waa nɔ jemɛ nɔɔ?
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, waa yaa jema la, ne waa ya sie aa naa la, anee yaa bol, kɛ haa ya be no.
Aah dɛ maa dɛ bol waa aa lɔ harɛ ta bonɔɔ haa wola men yarada nɔ, dɛ n bol waa aa lɔ Korowii doa aa, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won yarada a te nɔ?
Dɛ n Nɛn Bie laa aa, nomɛlbwa ta Korowii be nyundua laŋɛ mɔɔ. N gboo le o be nyundua dɛ tu ba harɛ.
Gɛ saŋ ya naanar aa lɔ pua la, Korowii keame Mosis la fa kpɔ buni dɛ logɛ harɛkon dɛ kpɔ do daa ta dɛ gɔɔro ásɛ nɛra nyiŋu dɛ bɛ dɛɛ sewɛ. Gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ ba gɔɔ n Nɛn Bie la.
Dɛ ba baa gɔɔ mɛ gɛ naa, nomɛlbwa waa yarada n waa la, wɛɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa laanee.
"Korowii dɛ nyin nɛwɛnyini taeh. A waa o gel men maa ɛ o Bibeŋkpoŋ gbo waa dɔɔ la ba harɛ nɔ ta, asɛ nomɛlbwa waa yarada n waa la bɛ sewɛ, kɛ ó dɔ o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la.
Korowii aa tom mɛ harɛ la, o ta ŋɔe ŋɔ ń ba bol he waa dɛ pa heyaa bolchɔge. Kɛ o tom mɛ ŋɔ ń ba nyin ŋwɛnɛ tɛ heyaa ásɛ o won lɛ heya.
Nomɛlbwa waa yarada n waa la, Korowii aa o waa bol a ba ɛ kɛ wɛɛ di bolchɔgee. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa wola n waa yaradae la, Korowii pao bolchɔge tonɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ta o Bibeŋkpoŋ la waa yaradae.
Ba bolchɔge pae munii kɛŋɔ nii waa dɛ chaah bɔr la ba harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ nɛwɛnyini berɔ dɛɛ nyin biro gwaa nii la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba wobɛlbwa ɛ wechɔga.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, waa bochaah nyin, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o le bochaah ta naa, nɛra ɛɛ na o wechɔga laanee.
Naate waa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la te, waa bochaah lee ɔmɛ. Wedɛg-ɛɛ bɛlbwa dɛ ɛ o waa bochaah ta ásɛ nɛra bwa na dɛ jemɛ kɛ o jemɛ Korowii."
A habɔɔ la, Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la la Judia harɛ ta, asɛ o ka di tɔpera anɛ ba be dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee bela.
Dɛ Jɔn ge dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Aenɔn o ne Salem aa wola jaŋɛ la ta. Dɛ nee lɔ Aenɔn taeh, asɛ nɛra ɛɛ ba Jɔn be wɛɛ sɔ ba Korowii ne.
A gɛ saŋ la dɛ ba ta Jɔn lawɛ do dea mɔɔ.
Dɛ nɛra baa teŋɛ Jɔn nɛɛ la ne Juda te bɛl dɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa ba bela Korowii toma waa aa ɛ nɔɔra ne naa sarama ne nee sɔe wa.
Ba la Jɔn be dɛ ka pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, he dɛ lii kɛ he ne baa bɛl faa chegɛ Jɔɔdan Moo la wee leebɔr pera la aa? O waa he faa bol la. O dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii ne, asɛ nɛra bwa chwa dɛɛ kaa o be."
Belaa Jɔn ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won dɔ komɛl dɛ Korowii laa tɛo.
Maa ŋɔa ŋɔ n laa Kristo la, dɛ ŋɔ tomaa ba tom mɛ ŋɔ ń tɔ o sie la, he ta noɛ yaa?
Hanfale jaaree dɔ o haah. Kɛ, dɛ hanfale jaa la dam lɔ hanfale la waa bɔr dɛ no o nyoa bela aa, dɛ o sie lɛo. Gɛɛ n ge bwara sɔɔh mɛ kohona.
A chɛ kɛ o sɔn ɛɛ le kohona asɛ n te sɔn ɛɛ ba harɛ.
"Nɛn waa le nyundua la gwaa nomɛlbwa. Nɛn waa le harɛ bonɔ la, harɛ waa o jemɛ, a waa gee o won bola. Kɛ nɛn waa le Korowii be nyundua la te gwaa nomɛlbwa.
Waa o siwi aa naa ne waa waa noa Korowii be laanee wɛɛ bol, kɛ nɛwɛnyini aa o be no.
Nomɛlbwa sɛh Korowii wa aa, o gbagba wono dɛɛ jemɛ kɛ Korowii waa dɔ kasinteŋ.
Nɛn Korowii aa tomɔ la, Korowii wobolee wɛɛ bol, dɛkalkɛ Korowii tɛo o Domadɛɛge la tɛɛ tenten.
Korowii nyin o Bie la taeh, dɛ kpɔ wobɛlbwa kpegri do o nɔn ta.
Nomɛlbwa waa yarada Korowii Bie la waa la, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa aa wola jaga dɔe bwaa. Nomɛlbwa waa wola Korowii Bie la waa yaradae la, waa mkpa dɔe ba. Korowii bandia ɛɛ do o nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwaa."
Farisii tena la noɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu berɔ dɛɛ dɔ nɛra kohona dɛɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee kohona dɛɛ gwaa Jɔn.
Kasinteŋ, dɛ Yeesu gbagba aa nɛra Korowii nee sɔ. Dɛ o habɔteŋra laanee dɛɛ sɔ ba Korowii ne.
Yeesu aa no gɛ baa dɛ bol o waa la, o le Judia harɛ dɛ́ kaa Galilia harɛ ta.
Dɛ Samaria harɛ taa chɛ kɛ o kpɔ dɛ won kaa Galilia harɛ ta.
O baa le Samaria bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seka la ta. Dɛ a gɛ bwɛɛ la ne harɛ la Jekɔb aa kpɔa tɛ o bie Josef la aa jaŋɛ.
Dɛ Jekɔb kɔlɔŋ bɛl lɔ bela. Yeesu aa vala dɛ koh la, o kaa so kɔlɔŋ la nyoa. Dɛ wee chegɛ nyufala.
Samaria haah bɛl balɔ ŋɔ ó ba dɔ ne, asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Tɛ mɛ nee ń nyɔ."
Dɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la kaa bwɛɛ la ta dɛ́ ka nyin kondikwaa ba.
Belaa haah la nyoa kpo, o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Fini te Juda te dɛ soŋe Samaria haah ne aa?" Dɛ Juda tena dɛ kɔgɛ Samaria tena taeh, dɛ baa sɛh ba ne baa pɛ numoli ne loga kwara.
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he fe jemɛ kon Korowii aa dɛ nyin he tɛɛ nɔ, dɛ jemɛ naate waa dɛ soŋe nee nɔ naa, he fe ɛɛ soŋoo ásɛ o fee tɛɛ nee aa won tɛɛ mkpa."
Belaa haah la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, bule nɔ aa luŋa, asɛ haa wola kon baa kpɔa dɛɛ ta kɔlɔŋ dɔe nɔ, lee hɛɛ ba a gɛ nee aa dɛ tɛ mkpa nɔ dɔe yɔ?
He dɛ lii kɛ he gwaa ya naa Jekɔb waa tɛ yaa a gɛ bule nɔ la kɛɛ? O ne o bii ne o kondɛɛra bwaa fa dɛ nyɔ nee bule nɔ ta."
Belaa Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa nyɔ nee nɔ la, nyɔgre ɛɛ kpoo ja.
Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa nyɔ nee maa dɛ tɛo la te, nyɔgre aa on kpo bwa. Nee maa tɛo la ɛɛ ɛo kɛŋɔ bule o bini dɛɛ bule nee aa dɛ tɛ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa."
Belaa haah la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, amɔ te, tɛ mɛ a gɛ nee la ane asɛ nyɔgre bɛ men kpo kpa, asɛ n bɛ bonɔ ba ba dɔ nee kpa."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ka yerɛ o jaa ba.
Asɛ o ŋɔ, "N ta jaa dɔe." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ŋɔ he ta jaa dɔe yaa, kpelaa he ŋɔ.
He yalɛ baala banue bwa, kɛ onɔ la he ne waa lole taraken la, he jaa laa on, anomanta kpelaa he ŋɔ."
Asɛ haah la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, maa naa nɔ, Korowii keamee hen.
Bwe nɔ taa ya Samaria tena naanar faa tomɛ Korowii saŋ la. Aah ɛrɛ waa he Juda tena ŋɔ Jerusalamee chɛ Korowii toma nɔɔ?"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, aa ba tel saŋ bɛlee nɛra aa wola Korowii tomɛ bwe nɔ ta, baa on tomɛ Jerusalam ge.
He Samaria tena te, ɛɛ he gee ɛ te, kɛ haa kon haa dɛ tomɛ jemɛ. Kɛ ya Juda tena te jemɛ kon yaa dɛ tomɛ, dɛkalkɛ ya nɛɛ aa ba chega asɛ Korowii lɛ nɛwɛnyina bwa.

Korowii toma te lɔ bambile bini. Aa ba tel saŋ bɛlee, asɛ nɛra baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii kpela kpela la che o Domadɛɛge la ta dɛɛ tomɔ bambile bini, dɛɛ tomɔ kasinteŋ ne, dɛkalkɛ gɛɛ wɛɛ nyin kɛ baa tomɔ. A gɛ tɔpere la telo tonɛ.
Korowii ɛ lileo. Anomanta dɛ ya dɛ tomɔ waa, yá che o Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛ kpɔ kasinteŋ dɛɛ tomɔ bambile bini."
Anee haah la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya Lɛɛ la baa dɛ yerɔ Kristo la ɛɛ bao. O balaa, wɛɛ bagle yaa wobɛlbwaa."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Onee he ne wɛɛ bol waa la. Kristo laanee men."

Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋra la ba. Baa baa na o ne haah naa chega dɛɛ bol waa la, a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa. Kɛ ba bɛlbwa ge ta berɛ won bɔɔ haah la kon la waa dɛ nyin Yeesu be. Bɛlbwa ta wone bɔɔ Yeesu wee la aa bala o ne haah la ɛɛ bol waa la.
Haah la gel o vii waa dɛ ba o ne nee dɔe la bela dɛ chwa la bwɛɛ la ta ka ŋɔ bela tena be ŋɔ,
"Hé ba ba na noo! Baa bɛl wono bagle n waa maa dɛ ɛ bwa! Jamɔ Kristo laanee kɛɛ?"
Haah la aa ŋɔ gɛ la, bela tena chwao le ba bwɛɛ la ta dɛɛ ba Yeesu be.
Haah la aa kaa bwɛɛ la ta la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la soŋo jande jande ŋɔ, "Nomoa, lɛ kondikwaa di!"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "N dɔ kondikwaa ane haa wola a waa jemɛ."
Anee o habɔteŋra la ɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Nomɛl baa tɛo kondikwaa o di gbaɔ?"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "N kondikwaa kɛ maa dɛ ɛ n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la tetoora, ne kɛ maa ɛ o toma waa tɛ mɛ la bwa tonɛ.
He laa yon ŋɔ ba du kwa aa, korobie anaarɛɛ aa di mɔɔ baa koma la aa? Kasinteŋ, he bɛ chɔ. Hé ta sie na koo kwaa bwa aa bea ne koma gɛ!
Nɛn waa komɛ kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la dɛ dɔ o kembɔr. Nɛwɛnyinaa naate ɛɛ komɛ, dɛɛ lɛɛ ba ásɛ ba dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la, ásɛ naate ne nɛn waa dua la bwa sie lɛ.
Baa ŋɔa, 'Bɛlee dɛɛ du, bɛl gee komɛ' la, kpelaa.
N waa nɔ maa gela hɛɛ bagle nɔ, a do kɛŋɔ maa gela hɛɛ komɛ kwaa bela haa wola parɛ la. Bane tɔ sie koh mɔɔ he baa na som la."
Samaria tena baa lɔ bwɛɛ la ta kɛrɛdɛ yarada Yeesu, dɛkalkɛŋɔ haah la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "O bol waa maa dɛ ɛ bwa n be."
Anomanta Samaria tena la aa ba Yeesu be la, ba soŋo ŋɔ ó so ba be. O soge ba be tɔpera anɛ dɛɛ bag ba Korowii Wa.
Yeesu waa waa dɛ bol la gelɔ nɛra pirim berɛ yarada o waa la ja,
dɛ ŋɔ haah la be ŋɔ, "A ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ he waa haa bola la gboo gela ya yaradao. Ya gbagba ge aa kpɔ deŋne no o waa la name la, anee gela ya yarada dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra bwa Lɛɛree nɔ kpela."
Yeesu aa di tɔpere anɛ bela la, o le bela dɛɛ kaa Galilia harɛ.
O gbabir fa bolɔ ŋɔ, "Korowii keame bɛlbwa ta sɔn dɔe o gbagba bwɛɛ bwa."
Waa jo Galilia harɛ la, bela tena lɛo silɛɛ ne, dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa la Galekaa dii Jerusalam la, ba na waa waa ɛa Galekaa dii la ta bwa.
Yeesu la Galilia bwɛɛ Keena. Belaa o faa kpɔ nee berɛ sen la. Waa la bela la, dɛ Abane nomoa bɛl bibaa bwara dɛ weo Kapeeneɔm.
Nomoa la aa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesu le Judia harɛ ba Galilia harɛ la, o ba o be dɛ ba soŋo ŋɔ ó la Kapeeneɔm dɛ́ ka chah o bie waa dɛ ba sewa la.
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He bɛlbwa ta nyokpowaa ne wekpega ane nae yaa, haa men yarada bwa."
Asɛ nomoa la soŋo ŋɔ, "Nomoa, yá kaa. A waa laa aa, n bie la ɛɛ sewɔɔ."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ la he bwɛ, he bie la ɛɛ gbaŋroo!" Baa la yarada Yeesu waa waa bola la, dɛ berɛ kaa o bwɛ.
Waa dɛ kaa la, o bonɔɔna chemo ŋwɛnɛ ta, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He bie la gbaŋrɔ!"
Belaa o bɔɔ ba saŋ la yiso o bie la weela la nyoa aa ba harɛ, asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Dɛ ɛ webaŋa dɔŋ beŋkpoŋ saŋee o bɔwɔrɔba la le o nɛ."
Belaa nomoa la lii kɛŋɔ a gɛ saŋ la tentenee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He bie la ɛɛ gbaŋroo" la. A taa a che o ne o dem tena bwa yarada Yeesu waa la, dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo.
Yeesu aa le Judia harɛ ba Galilia harɛ la, nyokpowaa nɔɔ jaa nɛɛ waa ɛa.
A habɔɔ la, dɛ Juda tena tɔpejen bɛl telo, asɛ Yeesu la Jerusalam.
Dɛ tam bɛl chɔ Jerusalam asɛ Juda tena ɛɛ yerɔ Bɛtsata. O chɔɔ bɛne doonyoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Peera Doonyojen la. Tam la nyoa la, ba ɛ soŋnibɔra bele anue dɛ tɔa.
Soŋnibɔra bela la, weela tena kɛŋɔ nyoŋa, boobie ne banɔ la ba peri aa serewa warɔ dɛ chɔ bela.
Dɛ baa bɛl ja weela tena la nɛɛ o weela do o nɛɛ bene fifraatoro dɛ anuatoro dɛ o ta chaeh dɔe.
Yeesu aa baa na o chɔe la, o wono jemɛ kɛŋɔ weela la aa lɔ o nɛɛ bigro, anomanta o bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He dɛ nyin kɛ he dɔ bokpega aa?"
Anee o ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh. Kɛ tam la poraa, maa nɛn dɔ ó kpɔ mɛ kaa do o ta. Maa takapɔ ŋɔ ń ka jo o ta, dɛ n dɔŋ tɔ n sie."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir che dɛ kpɔ he kalaŋ dɛ kaa!"
Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, baa la gbaŋrɔ dɛ ir che dɛ kpɔ o kalaŋ dɛ valɛ dɛɛ kaa. Ona Tɔpere taa a gɛ waa nɔ chig.
Asɛ Juda tena nomonome ŋɔ weela te la Yeesu aa chaoh la be ŋɔ, "Fini ɛ Ona Tɔpere, anomanta he jo ya kii nɛɛ kɛŋɔ haa kpɔ he kalaŋ che la!"
Asɛ o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Naate waa chaah mɛ laanee ŋɔa ŋɔ ń ir kpɔ n kalaŋ dɛ kaa."
Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Umee su baah ŋɔ hé ir dɛ kpɔ he kalaŋ che nɔɔ?"
Baa la ta wone jemɛ naate la nɛnsoo waa chaoh la, dɛkalkɛ dɛ nɛnlaa tentenee lɔ bela asɛ Yeesu koo ba bini kaa.
A habɔɔ la, Yeesu na baa la Korowii Dea asɛ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He nao kenɛ, taraken haa dɔ bokpega nɔ, gel wechɔga ɛɛ, asɛ anɔ la aa gwaa logla kwaa la bɛ he nɛɛ ba chig kpa."
Belaa baa la aa le bela la, o la Juda tena nomonome la be dɛ ka chagle kɛŋɔ Yeesuu chaoh la.
Baa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesuu ɛ a gɛ waa nɔ Ona Tɔpere ta la, belaa ba pa mun haoh, dɛkalkɛ dɛ o chɔg ba Ona Tɔpere mmara.
Anee Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ te dɛ ɛ o toma saŋ te bɛlbwa, anomanta gɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ n gee ɛ."

Gɛ waa nɔ Yeesu aa bola la ɛɛ ba bwaawee kohona dɛ gel baa nyinu dɛ́ kpo kwara, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Ona Tɔpere la gbo laa wɛɛ chɔg. O berɔ ŋɔ o Mɛɛ waa lolɔɔ Korowii, asɛ dɛ kpɔ o te dɛɛ magɔ kɛŋɔ o ne o ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
Belaa Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, toma Korowii aa dɛ ɛ laanee o Bie gee ɛ, dɛkalkɛ waa won kpɔ o gbo liire dɛɛ ɛ gɛ waa dɛ nyin. Anɔ la Korowii aa dɛ ɛ laanee o Bie ge nyiŋi dɛɛ ɛ.
Dɛkalkɛ Korowii dɛ nyin o bie asɛ dɛɛ baglo waa wɛɛ ɛ o we-ɛɛla dɔŋa. Anomanta wɛɛ bagloo wɛɛ ɛ wejena aa gwaa anɔ kwara ásɛ a ɛ heyaa nyokpoa.
Gɛ Korowii aa dɛ chum nɛra baa serewa asɛ dɛ gel baa dɔ mkpa la, gɛ tentenee o Bie la gee ba wona chum bɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin dɛ tɛo mkpa.
Korowii gbagba aa nomɛlbwa waa bol dɛ pa bole. O tɛ o Bie la ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ ó bol nomɛlbwa waa dɛ pa bole.
Dɛ ŋɔ nómɛlbwa tɛ o Bie la jirima gɛ tenten baa dɛ tɛo jirima la. Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa wola o Bie la jirima tɛ la, dɛ gɛɛ waa wola o Mɛɛ la waa tomɔ la jirima tɛ.

"Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa no n waa la dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta asɛ dɛ yarada n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la, onee dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la. Maa naate waa bol dɛ pa bole kpa, dɛkalkɛ o le seo nɔn ta dɛ berɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ja kɛŋɔ saŋ bɛl ɛɛ bao asɛ nɛra baa serewa no men Korowii Bie la taa, asɛ banɔ la baa dɛ no la dɔ Korowii mkpa. Tɔpere la dɔɔ tel kwara.
Gɛ Korowii aa dɔ mkpa dɛɛ tɛ la, gɛɛ o gel o Bie la ge dɔ mkpa dɛɛ tɛ,
asɛ dɛ tɛo ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ó won dɛɛ bol nɛra waa dɛɛ pa bole, dɛkalkɛ o Bie laanee Nɛn Bie la.
He bɛ gel anɔ ɛ heyaa nyokpoa, dɛkalkɛ tɔpere bɛl dɛ ba asɛ nɛra baa serewa la no n taa,
asɛ bɛlbwa le o bɔɔ bini. Banɔ la baa ɛ wedɛɛga la te ɛɛ berɔɔ dɔ Korowii mkpa, asɛ banɔ la ge baa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra la, o berɛ chɔg ba.

"N gbo aa won ɛ wobɛlbwa n bambile ta, nemenɛ anɔ la Korowii aa chag mɛ la. A taa n che dɛ bol nɛra waa dɛɛ pa bole. An gela n bole pae togre nɔ, dɛkalkɛ waa n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la aa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la gboo mɛɛ ɛ dɛ gel n bambile wa.
Dɛ n ŋɔ mɛɛ di danseɛ tɛ n gbagba aa, nɛra ɛɛ ŋɔɔ nyosonee mɛɛ teŋe.
Kɛ nomɛl lole dɛ di danseɛ dɛɛ tɛ mɛ, asɛ n jemɛ kɛŋɔ o danseɛ dii ɛ kpela.
Jɔn bee he tomɛ he toroma asɛ o di mɛ kasinteŋ la danseɛ bagle heya.
Maa n te kpɔe dɛɛ dawɛ nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ ó di mɛ danseɛ. N dɛ bol anɔ ásɛ he yarada Korowii ó won lɛ heya.
A gɛ Jɔn nɔ fa do kɛ kandea baa choŋu wɛɛ chaah bɔr kohona, asɛ hɛɛ nyin o bɔr chaahna la som dɛ na tama mɔɔ.
"Kɛ n dɔ danseɛ bɛl waa kpega dɛ gwaa Jɔn danseɛ waa baa di tɛ mɛ la kwara. Anee kɛ toma n Mɛɛ Korowii aa kpɔa do n nɔn ta ŋɔ ń ɛ la. Anee dɛɛ bagle kɛ onee tom mɛ.
Asɛ n Mɛɛ la waa tom mɛ laanee dɛɛ di mɛ danseɛ. He ta o taa noɛ bwa a ba ɛ kɛŋɔ he na o sie bɔr ka,
he ta o waa la ge kpɔe do he bambile bini, dɛkalkɛ he ta nɛn waa tomɔ he be la yaradae.
He swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ kure Korowii Tɔn la, asɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ hɛɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe le a ta. Asɛ gɛ tɔn nɔ bini waa gee di danseɛ dɛɛ tɛ mɛ.
Kɛ haa nyin kɛ he ba n be dɛ́ ba dɔ mkpa la.
Maa sɔn nyin nɛwɛnyini be.
He te, n jemɛ heyaa dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ he bambile ta Korowii waa lawɛ.
N Mɛɛ Korowii sɔn nee n ba he vɛɛh mɛ, kɛ dɛ nomɛlee fe bala o gbagba sɔn ta naa, he fe ɛɛ no o bee.
He dɛ nyin sɔn dɔŋa be, kɛ a ta wehiah ɛɛ tɛ heyaa kɛŋɔ hé nyin sɔn Korowii te be. He do ken aa, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba wona dɛ yarada mɛ nɔ?
"He bɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ menee dɛ che Korowii sie dɛɛ bagle he wechɔga haa ɛa. Me laa. Mosis haa kpɔ he hwɛga bwa do o nɛɛ la, on dɛɛ bagla.
He fe yaradao waa, he fe yarada n ge, dɛkalkɛ onee chwerɛ n waa o tɔn bini.
Haa wola waa waa chwera yaradae nɔ, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba wona yarada n waɔ?"
A habɔɔ la Yeesu le Galilia Moo baa dɛ yerɔ Tibeerias Moo la.
Belaa nɛnlaa tenten teŋɛ o nɛ, dɛkalkɛ ba nao kɛ waa ɛ nyokpowaa weela tena chaeh ta ka.
Belaa Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la bwa deeh kaa bwe bɛl doa dɛ ka so bela.
Dɛ a ka tama Juda tena tɔpejen bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Galekaa la tel.
Yeesu baa ha sie dɛ nyiŋi dɛ na kɛŋɔ nɛnlaa bane dɛ ba o be, asɛ dɛ bɔɔ o habɔteŋra la bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Felep la ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ dɛ dɔ kondikwaa dɛ tɛ nɛndamanta nɔ bwa dɔŋa bá dio?"
Yeesuu saahna bɔɔ Felep gɛ waa nɔ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ daahno dɛ́ na. Kɛ o te la, dɛ o jemɛ anɔ la waa dɛ ba ɛɛ.
Asɛ Felep ge ŋɔ, "Dɛ yaa dɔ suuga damanta kɛŋɔ denaarere lafraanɛɛ dɛ yawɛ paanoo kwaraa naa, bɛlbwa aa won dɔ tama tama kwaraa di."
Anee Yeesu habɔteŋra la bini bɛl waa ɛ Seemɔn Pita nime baa yerɔ Andriu la ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ,
"Bibaa bɛl lɔ ya bini bonɔ dɛ dɔ paanoo anue ne pɛŋa anɛ. Aah ɛrɛɛ a gee ba wona ɛ nɛndamanta nɔ bwa nɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gel ba bwa so harɛ." Dɛ kpɔglor warɛ bela, asɛ ba so a ta. Dɛ ba bini baala gbo ɛɛ ɛ kagboŋa banue.
Belaa Yeesu kpɔ paanoo la dɛ jam Korowii dɛ bɔne tɛ nɛnlaa la. Gɛ tentenee o kpɔ pɛŋa la dɛ jam Korowii dɛ bɔne tɛɛ ba ja. Asɛ bɛlbwa dɔ gɛ aa magre o ne.
Baa dia tonɛ dɛ bwa vagre la, o ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé tɔɔ anla baa dia ka la pɛ asɛ a bɛ chɔg ta."
Asɛ ba tɔɔ paanoo anue la nɛnlaa la aa dia a ka la pɛ, asɛ a su wɛgrɛre fi dɛ anɛ.
Nɛnlaa la aa na a gɛ nyokpowaa nɔ Yeesu aa ɛa la, ba ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Kpelaa! Onɔɔ Korowii keame baa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ bao la."
Belaa Yeesu na kɛŋɔ nɛra la dɛ nyin kɛ ba lawɔ dɛ chego kora kpegri ne ó di, asɛ o sɔh le ba bini dɛ gbo ka so bwe la doa ja.
A jɔmɔra ne la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la bwa berɔ tu ba moo la nyoa
asɛ dɛ ba jo gbera bini, dɛ berɛ gale moo la dɛ fe ɛɛ kaa Kapeeneɔm. Bɔr baa jo dɛ Yeesu ta ba be balɛ mɔɔ.
Gɛ saŋ la ge, dɛ peujen bɛl dɛ ta dɛɛ begre nee la, asɛ nehaŋma tɔ o bwa.
O habɔteŋra la aa tawa dɛ kaa dɛ ɛ kwansini atoro kɛɛ anaarɛ la, ba nao kɛŋɔ Yeesu aa valɛ nee la sie dɛɛ ba ba be, asɛ ɔmee lag ba taeh.
Belaa waa na gɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Menee! He bɛ ɔmɛ!"
Baa naa kɛ Yeesuu la, ba sie lɛo, asɛ ba gel o ba jo gbera la bini. A ta bigre bɛlbwa ba tel bela baa dɛ la.
Tɔ aa pera la, nɛnlaa la baa soge moo la nyoa la nao kɛŋɔ dɛ gbera beŋkpoŋ gboo fa chegɛ legbɔɔ bela. Yeesu habɔteŋra la gboo jo gbera la bini dɛ kaa, o te ta ba nɛɛ jae.
Asɛ gbeni ane le bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Tibeerias la ta dɛ ba legbɔɔ la ta bela nɛra la aa soga Yeesu kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii a waa dɛ bɔne tɛɛ ba ba di la.
Anomanta nɛnlaa la aa naa kɛŋɔ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la bini bɛlbwa toole bela la, ba jo gɛ gbeni la bini dɛ kaa o bɔr gaaga Kapeeneɔm.
Nɛra la aa tel bela la, ba kaa na Yeesu kɛ waa lɔ moo la baŋ bela, asɛ dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, saŋ besoo he ba bonɔ nɔ?"
Belaa o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, paanoo la he dɛ aa dia vagɛ la waa hɛɛ gaage n bɔr la. Menɛkɛsɛ he no nyokpowaa la bɛlbwa mun.

He bɛ kondikwaa aa won chɔga nɔ ta dɛɛ koh. Hɛ́ɛ koh kondikwaa aa wola chɔg dɛɛ tɛ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la ta. Gɛ kondikwaa nɔɔ n Nɛn Bie la ɛɛ ba heyaa tɛɛ, dɛkalkɛ menee Korowii tɛ kpegri kɛŋɔ kooro aa tomɛ o bie faahna ne la."
Anee ba pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ asɛ dɛ won ɛ waa Korowii aa dɛ nyin ɔ?"
Asɛ Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin laanee kɛ nómɛlbwa yarada o Bibeŋkpoŋ waa tomɔ la asɛ dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo."
Asɛ ba berɛ bɔɔro ja ŋɔ, "Aah bɔkwa nyokpowaa hɛɛ ba ɛɛ ásɛ ya na dɛ yaradae nɔ? Ɛ waane yá na.

Ya naanar fa di kondikwaa ane soo aa le nyundua baa yera maana gɛ saŋ baa dɛ valɛ pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ ta la. Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini kɛŋɔ 'O tɛɛ ba kondikwaa aa le nyundua ba asɛ ba di la.' "
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, Mosis laa tɛ heyaa kondikwaa aa le nyundua la. N Mɛɛ gboo won kondikwaa tenten aa le nyundua la kpɔe dɛ tɛ.
Kondikwaa la Korowii aa tɛ yaa laanee nɛn waa le o gbagba be nyundua dɛ ba mkpa ne ba tɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa la."
Anee nɛnlaa la ŋɔ, "Nomoa, tɛ yaa gɛ kondikwaa nɔ tɔpere bɛlbwa yaa di."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Menee kondikwaa aa dɛ tɛ Korowii mkpa la. Nomɛlbwa waa ba n be la, lɔr aa on kpo. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge waa yarada mɛ dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ mɛ la, nyɔgre gba aa o kpoe ba bwa.
N ŋɔ he be ŋɔ he na mɛ, kɛ he ta men yaradae dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ mɛ mɔɔ.
Nomɛlbwa n Mɛɛ Korowii aa kpɔ tɛ mɛ la ɛɛ ba n bee dɛ ba teŋɛ n nɛ. Maa nomɛlbwa ge waa ba n be laanee doŋi ta bwa,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ n gbagba tetoowaa waa laa n le nyundua ba. Naate waa tom mɛ la tetoowaa waa n ba.
N Mɛɛ Korowii waa tom mɛ la tetoowaa kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la bɛ n nɔn ta le, asɛ tɔpera bwa jaga wee la, ń iru seo ta.
Dɛkalkɛ gɛ n Mɛɛ la aa dɛ nyin laanee kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa na men maa ɛ o Bie la dɛ yarada mɛ dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ mɛ la ɛɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe, asɛ ń iru seo ta, tɔpera bwa jaga wee."
Belaa Juda tena la ɛɛ nagre o waa kɛŋɔ o ŋɔ onee kondikwaa tenten aa le nyundua ba la.
Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ Josef bie Yeesu la laa kɛɛ? Ya jemɛ o nya ne o mɛɛ bwa. Aah ɛrɛɛ o berɛ ŋɔ nyunduaa o te le ba nɔɔ?"
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé gel n waa nagra dɔŋa be gɛ.
Nomɛlbwa aa won ba n be nemenɛ n Mɛɛ la gbagba waa tom mɛ la tɛro ba n be, asɛ tɔpera bwa jaga wee la, ń iru seo ta.
Ba chwerɔ do Korowii keamere tɔne bini ŋɔ, 'Korowiirii dɛɛ ba nomɛlbwa waa bagla.' Anomanta nomɛlbwa Korowii aa dɛ baglo o waa la asɛ wɛɛ hweli la, wɛɛ ba n bee.
A ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛl na Korowii siwi ne ka, nemenɛ men maa le o be nyundua dɛ ba la gbo.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe.
Menee kondikwaa waa dɛ tɛ Korowii mkpa la.
He naanar fa di kondikwaa ane soo baa yera maana aa le nyundua, kɛ ba serewɔ.
Kondikwaa nɔ maa dɛ bol o waa nɔ, nyunduaa o ge le, kɛ nomɛlbwa waa di a gɛ kondikwaa nɔ soo la waa sewɛ.
Menee kondikwaa aa le nyundua ba dɛ dɔ mkpa la. Nomɛlbwa waa di gɛ kondikwaa nɔ la ɛɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe. Asɛ kondikwaa maa kpɔ tɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa bá di dɛ dɔ mkpa laanee n bo-ol."
Belaa Juda tena la berɛ dɛɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba wona tɛ yaa o bo-ol yaa di o?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, dɛ nomɛlbwa ta n Nɛn Bie la bo-ol dii asɛ dɛ nyɔ n chal aa, amɔ dɛ o ta mkpa la dɔe.
Nomɛlbwa waa di n bo-ol asɛ dɛ nyɔ n chal ge la dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe, asɛ tɔpera bwa jaga wee la, ń iru seo ta.
N bo-olii kondikwaa tenten, asɛ n chal gee nee tenten.
Nomɛlbwa waa di n bo-ol asɛ dɛ nyɔ n chal la, n ne wɛɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋii, waa wola won dagre o te n nɛɛ kpa.
N Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ laanee mkpa dɔɔ la, anomanta o gelɔ n ge dɔ mkpa. Gɛɛ nomɛlbwa waa di n bo-ol la, mɛɛ ba gela o dɔ mkpa.
Kondikwaa aa le nyundua ba dɛɛ tɛ mkpa laanee nɔ, o ta do kɛŋɔ he naanarwa kondikwaa baa dia mkpa aa wola toole a ta ba serewe la. Nomɛlbwa waa di kondikwaa nɔ la ɛɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe."
Kapeeneɔm cheremi deaa Yeesu do dɛɛ bagle nɛra waa dɛ bol a gɛ waa nɔ.
O habɔteŋra la aa no gɛ la, ba kɛrɛdɛ ŋɔ, "Waa nɔ te kpegri kohona to, yaa won ɛ gɛ."
Yeesu aa naa kɛ o habɔteŋra la dɛ nagre waa la waa la, o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Gɛ waa nɔ kpegri tɛ heyaa kɛɛ?
Dɛ he fe na n Nɛn Bie la n berɛ dɛɛ kaa nyundua bela maa lea ba la ge sɛh?
Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge gbosoroo dɛɛ tɛ mkpa. Nɛwɛnyini bokpega te ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. Waa maa dɛ bol he be nɔ dɛ ba Korowii Domadɛɛge la ne asɛ dɛɛ tɛ heyaa mkpa.
Kɛ he bini bane ta yaradae." Mumpar la bwa dɛ Yeesu te jemɛ ba bini banɔ la baa wola yaradae dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo ne naate waa leo tɛ bá kpoo la.
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "Anɔ waa n ŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa won ba n be nemenɛ n Mɛɛ Korowii leo tɛ mɛ la."
A gɛ waa nɔ taa a che nɛra ba faa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la kɛrɛdɛ le mumur dɛ gel o nɛɛ teŋa.
Anee o bɔɔ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la ŋɔ, "He ge dɛ nyin kaala kɛɛ?"
Asɛ Seemɔn Pita ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, dɛ ya le he be naa, ume bee yaa ba kaala ɔ? He wobol taa mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe do.
Ya dɛ yaradae, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee Korowii Bidɛɛge la."
Belaa Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Menee le he nɛra fi dɛ banɛ nɔ, kɛ he bini bɛl ɛ Bɔnsam nɛn."
Dɛ Seemɔn Eskareɔt bie Judas waa wɛɛ bol la. O habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bɛlee, kɛ onee dɛ ba leo tɛ.
Anɔ habɔɔ la, dɛ Galilia harɛ ta gboo Yeesu do dɛɛ gaage. Dɛ waa nyin kɛ o la Judia harɛ te ta, dɛkalkɛ dɛ bela nomonome la dɛ nyin o bɔr dɛ́ kpoo.
Gɛ saŋ la dɛ a ka tama Juda tena tɔpejen bɛl ba yon dɛɛ do kukure dɛɛ so a bini tɔpera anuatoro la tel bá di.
Anee Yeesu nimanar ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Le bonɔ dɛ kaa Judia harɛ ta ásɛ he habɔteŋra baa lɔ bela la ka na he nyokpowaa haa dɛ ɛ nɔ.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin kɛ nɛra jemɛ o waa la, waa o waa ɛɛ dɛɛ sɔh. Anomanta gel nɛra bwa na he we-ɛɛla nɔ."
O nimanar la gbabir ta on yaradae.
Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He te, tɔpere bɛlbwa wer tɛ heyaa kɛ he la bela, kɛ n te tɔpere ta tele mɔɔ.
Heyaa harɛ nɔ ta nɛra aa wola haeh, kɛ ba hah n te, dɛkalkɛ saŋ bɛlbwaa mɛɛ bol ŋɔ ba we-ɛɛla aa were.
Hé kaa ka di tɔpejen la. Tɔpere n te aa ba bela la ta tele mɔɔ."
Waa bol gɛ la, o kwaarɔ so Galilia harɛ ta.
Yeesu nimanar la aa kaa gɛ tɔpejen la dii la, a habɔɔ o ge ir dɛ la bela. O kpɔ o te sɔh, o ta nɛra baah valɛ.
Dɛ Juda tena nomonome la dɛ gaage o bɔr tɔpejen la dii ta asɛ dɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Leperaa baa la doɔ?"
Dɛ nɛnlaa la kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ŋwalɛ o wa. Bane ŋɔ, "O ɛ nɛndɛɛge." Bane ge ŋɔ, "Akai, nɛra gboo wɛɛ negre."
Bɛlbwa ta bolɛ asɛ a le baŋ nɛra no, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ Juda tena nomonome la.
Baa di Kukure tɔpera la tel baah ta la, Yeesu kaa jo Korowii Dea dɛ pa mun dɛɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Wa.
O webagla la ɛ Juda tena la nyokpoa kohona, asɛ baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ gɛ baa nɔ won jemɛ anɔ bwa, dɛ o ta tɔnjereme ɛɛ nɔɔ?"
Belaa o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Waa maa dɛ bagle nɔ ta n gbagba be leɛ, a bwa le Korowii waa tom mɛ la be.
Dɛ nomɛlbwa sɛoh kɛ wɛɛ ɛ Korowii tetoowaa te naa, wɛɛ won jemɛ kɛŋɔ kasinteŋ waa aa le Korowii bee mɛɛ bol la. N gbagba webagla laa.
Dɛ nɛn kpɔ o kpegri dɛɛ bagle wa aa, o nyin sɔn dɛɛ tɛ o gbagba. Nɛn waa nyin sɔn dɛɛ tɛ nɛn waa tomɔ la te la, o waa dɔ kasinteŋ, waa nɛra negre.
"Mosis ta heyaa Korowii mmara la tɛɛ yaa? Asɛ he bini bɛlbwa toole dɛ teŋɛ a ta. Aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin mɛ dɛ kpo nɔɔ?"
Belaa nɛnlaa la bane ŋɔ, "Dɛ kpoe nɛ? Jamɔ komɛl gale he sie. Umee dɛɛ nyini dɛ kpo ɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Webeŋkpoŋ gboo n ɛ asɛ he nyoa kpo gɛ la.
Mosis bee he dɔ penteŋa mmara la. O be laa penteŋa le te, he naanaree pa a mun. Anomanta he won bie pen teŋa Ona Tɔpere kwaraa ta.
Dɛ he lolɛ bie o yawanyoa chig Ona Tɔpere ta naa, he dɛ teŋe o pen, dɛkalkɛ haa nyin he chɔg Mosis Mmara la. Dɛ gɛɛ te naa, ɛrɛɛ he baah berɛ di n nɛɛ kɛ maa chah nɛn Ona Tɔpere ta nɔ?
Hɛ́ɛ pese wobɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛɛ bola. He bɛ ŋɔ waane aa were dɛ he ta a bini nyiŋe."
Bela la dɛ Jerusalam tena bane dɛ bol ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ laa baa nyin o bɔr dɛ́ kpo la kɛɛ?
Na, onee chegɛ nɛra baah ta dɛɛ bol waa asɛ ba bwa tɔ nyoa che la. Nomonome ken nao kɛŋɔ onee Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la.
Akai! Baa nɔ te, ya jemɔ dɛ jemɛ o lee bɔr, kɛ Kristo la te, dɛ o balaa, nomɛlbwa aa o leebɔree jemɛ."
Dɛ Yeesu chegɛ Korowii Dea bela dɛɛ bol wa. Aa ba gɛ la o kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "He jem mɛ dɛ jemɛ bela maa lea. N gbagba kpegri ne laa n ba. Korowii waa ɛ kasinteŋ te laanee tom mɛ. Haa on jemɛ.
N te jemɔ, dɛkalkɛ o bee n le, on tom mɛ n ba nɔ."
Anɔ nomanta ba fe dɛ lawɔ, asɛ ba ta wone, dɛkalkɛ dɛ o tɔpere ta tele mɔɔ.
Nɛnlaa la kɛrɛdɛ bwa yaradao, asɛ dɛɛ bol ŋɔ, "Amɔ dɛ Kristo la baa ba naa, wɛɛ won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa kohona dɛ gwaa anɔ baa nɔ aa dɛ ɛ nɔ kenɛ?"
Farisii tena la aa noa kɛŋɔ nɛnlaa la dɛ ŋwalɛ Yeesu waa dɔŋa be la, ba ne Sɔfonomonome la tomɛ nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la ŋɔ bá ka lawɔ.
Dɛ Yeesu dɛ bol ŋɔ, "Tɔpera anɛ bɛlee mɛɛ ba he be bonɔ soga. Maa bigri asɛ dɛ berɛ kaa naate waa tom mɛ la be.
Hɛɛ baa nyin n bɔree, kɛ haa men na, dɛkalkɛ bela maa do la, haa won ba bela."

Anee Juda tena nomonome la bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Amɔ leperaa baa nɔ ɛɛ nyin kaala asɛ yaa wola on ba na kpa nɔɔ? O ken ɛɛ kaa Juda tena baa jo pua ka so Grik tena harɛ ta la bee, dɛ́ kaa chagle Grik tena o waa la kɛɛ?
O ŋɔ, yaa ba nyin o bɔree kɛ yaa on na, asɛ bela waa dɛ kaa ge la, bɛlbwa aa won ba o be. Aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ chagle nɔɔ?"
Ba Kukure tɔpera la dii ta tɔpere waa baa ka mun dɛ ɛ tɔpejen tenten la, Yeesu iro che dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa nyɔgre aa dɛ kpoo la, ó ba n be ń tɛo nee ó nyɔ.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada mɛ la, mɛɛ ɛo gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla laanee. Dɛ́, 'Nee waa dɔ mkpa la ɛɛ dɛɛ le o nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwaa kɛŋɔ moo aa dɛ palɛ la.' "
Nee nɔ waa bol o waa nɔ, Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa ba kpɔ do nɛra baa yaradao la nɛɛ la waa o bol la. Gɛ saŋ la dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ta balɛ mɔɔ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ Yeesu ta o jirima dɔe mɔɔ.
Nɛnlaa la bini bane no o waa waa bola la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii keame laanee baa nɔ kpela."
Bane ŋɔ, "Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa laanee." Asɛ bane ge tɔŋle ŋɔ, "Galilia harɛ taa Kristo la ɛɛ ba lee ba naa?
Korowii Tɔn ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ Kristo la ɛɛ ɛ Devid naanar la bɛlee dɛ le o bwɛɛ Bɛtlɛham aa?"
Anomanta nyopɛo ta ba bini balɛ kpa, Yeesu gbosoroo wa.
Asɛ bane ɛɛ nyin dɛ lawɔ, kɛ nomɛlbwa ta wone kpɔ nɔn lego.
Belaa nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la berɛ kaa Sɔfonomonome ne Farisii tena la be dɛ ka bol, asɛ ba ge bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ta on lawɛ ba nɔ?"
Anee ba ŋɔ, "Baa la waa waa dɛ bol la, nomɛlbwa ta o wobol dɔŋa bolɛ bwa."
Asɛ Farisii tena la berɛ pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Jamɔ o wono negre he ge kɛɛ?
He na ya nomonome nɔ bini bɛl kɛŋɔ waa dɛ yaradao waa? Kɛɛ he na Farisii tena la bɛl kɛ waa dɛ yaradao?
A gɛ nɛnlaa nɔ te la, baa Mosis Mmara la jemɛ. Dɛ Korowii nyotaahna lag ba."
Belaa Nikodeemɔs waa ɛ Farisii te dɛ faa la Yeesu be ka la bɔɔ ba ŋɔ,
"Mosis Mmara ta, yaa wonoo pa nɛn bolchɔge dɛ ya ta on yerɛ dɛ bɔɔro dɛ jemɛ waa waa ɛa mɔɔ naa?"
Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Jamɔ he ge le Galilia harɛ kɛɛ? Dɛ he pese Korowii Tɔn la bini dɛ na naa, hɛɛ nao kɛŋɔ Korowii keame aa Galilia harɛ taa le ba bwa."
Belaa ba bwa ir kaa ba deremi.
Asɛ Yeesu kaa bwe baa dɛ yerɔ Ɔlevere Bwe la ta.
Bɔr aa dɛ chaah chɔmbibi la, o berɛ kaa Korowii Dea. Belaa nɛnlaa ba o be dɛ ba baro cheme, asɛ o so harɛ dɛɛ chag ba Korowii Wa.
Asɛ Tɔn Jerema ne Farisii tena lawɛ haah bɛl waa dɛ bɔ jwamane dɛ ba o ne Yeesu be, dɛ gel o ba che ba bwa baah ta.
Asɛ ba ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya lawɛ haah nɔ dɛ o ne baa bɛl waa wola o jaa ɛɛ chɔɔ.
Mosis Mmara dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ haah waa do ken la chɛ kɛŋɔ ba fogro bwea kpo. Amɔ taraken ɛrɛɛ he ge ŋɔɔ?"
Ba pɛɛro gɛ waa nɔ dɛ́ kpɔ daahno dɛ na kɛŋɔ wɛɛ bol waanee ásɛ ba fee dɔ o nyoa lawɛ. Belaa Yeesu joŋi asɛ dɛ kpɔ o nonii dɛɛ chwerɛ harɛ.
Ba taa chega dɛɛ pɛɛro waa gɛ la, o iro che asɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé bini bɛlbwa waa wola wechɔga ɛɛ bwa la tɔ sie ta bwe forɔ."
Asɛ dɛ berɛ kwaa joŋi dɛɛ chwerɛ harɛ ja.

Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, bɛlbwa lii o wechɔga waa ɛa. Bɛlbwa ta wone kpɔ kon forɔ kpa, dɛ bwa pegre. Ba nomonomee tɔ sie dɛ kaa beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa a ba tel bechale nɛɛ dɛ ba tonɛ, a ba ka Yeesu ne haah la o ta che bela gɛ.
Asɛ Yeesu ir che, dɛ pɛɛ haah la ŋɔ, "Leperaa ba kaalɔ? Ba bini bɛlbwa toole dɛ́ pae bolchɔge kpaa?"
Anee o ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, n Dɔɔ, bɛlbwa toole." Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ate n ge aa hen bolchɔgee pa kpa. Kaa, kɛ bɛ wechɔga ka ɛ kpa."
Yeesu bol waa bagle Farisii tena la ja, dɛ ŋɔ, "N ɛ kandea dɛ chaah harɛ nɔ ta nɛra. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ teŋɛ n nɛɛ la aa biro taa valɛ bwa, wɛɛ valɛ bochaah taa dɛ dɔ mkpa."
Belaa Farisii tena la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Henee bol he waa dɛ gbagba berɛ di he te danseɛ, anomanta nyosonee hɛɛ teŋe."
Anee o ŋɔ, "Akai. A lole kɛ n dɛ di n gbagba danseɛ te, kɛ kasinteŋii mɛɛ bol, dɛkalkɛ n jemɛ bela maa lea ne bela maa dɛ kaa. Haa n leebɔr ne n kaabɔr jemɛ.
Harɛ nɔ ta liiree he kpɔ nyiŋi nɛn dɛɛ bol wa, kɛ n te aa bole pa.
Dɛ mɛɛ ɛ gɛ kwaraa yaa, mɛɛ ɛa a togre, dɛkalkɛ n gbo laa, n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la ja n nɛ.
He mmarare la dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ webeŋkpoŋ nɛra banɛ bwa aa bol la ɛ kpela.
N gbagbaa dɛɛ di n te danseɛ, asɛ n Mɛɛ la waa tom mɛ la ge ɛ danseɛ dɛ ja n nɛɛ wobɛlbwa maa dɛ ɛ ta."
Asɛ ba pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Leperaa he mɛɛ nɔ doɔ?" Anee o ŋɔ, "Gɛ haa wola men jemɛ nɔ, gɛɛ haa wola n Mɛɛ la ge jemɛ," dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛ he fe jem mɛ naa, he fe jemɛ n Mɛɛ la ge."
Korowii Dea suuga tae dakare bɔr belaa Yeesu do dɛɛ bagle waa dɛ bol gɛ waa nɔ. Bɛlbwa ta wone lawɔ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ o tɔpere ta tele mɔɔ.
Asɛ Yeesu berɛ bol waa bagle nɛra la ja ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ ba kaaloo he gaage dɛɛ nyin n bɔr, kɛ haa men na. He wechɔga taa hɛɛ ba sewa. Bela maa kaa la, haa won ba bela."
Anee Juda tena nomonome la bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "O ŋɔ yaa won la bela waa dɛ kaa! Jamɔ wɛɛ kpo o tenee kɛɛ?"
Belaa Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Harɛ nɔ ta nɛraa heya, asɛ n ge le nyundua. He le harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ n te, harɛ nɔ ta laa n le.
A waa n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, hɛɛ sewɛ he wechɔga taa la. Dɛ nomɛlbwa ta men yaradae kɛŋɔ menee men te naa, hɛɛ sewɛ he wechɔga taa."
Belaa ba bɔɔro ja ŋɔ, "Henee ume o?" Asɛ o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Anee n ŋɔ he be chɔɔ bwa la.
N fe dɔ he waa dɛ́ bol kohona he di bolchɔge a ta, kɛ maa bol. Naate waa tom mɛ la waa dɔ kasinteŋ nomanta n wobɛlbwa maa bol la ɛ waa aa le o be."
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, ba ta o waa la mun noɛ kɛŋɔ o Mɛɛ Korowii la waa wɛɛ bol.

Anomanta o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Awola haa gɔɔ n Nɛn Bie la nyundua la, belaa hɛɛ ba n nae kɛŋɔ menee men kpela, asɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ n gbagba kpegri ne laa mɛɛ ɛ wa, kɛ anɔ la n Mɛɛ la aa ŋɔ n be laanee mɛɛ bol.
Naate waa tom mɛ la ja n nɛ, o ta men tae, dɛkalkɛ n dɛ ɛ anɔ la aa dɛ too o tea."
Nɛra baa no Yeesu waa la kɛrɛdɛ yaradao.
Asɛ o ŋɔ Juda tena baa yaradao la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he gelɔ n waa maa bagle heyaa la do he bambile bini hɛɛ teŋɛ a ta te naa, dɛ he ɛ n habɔteŋra kpela,
dɛ won jemɛ kasinteŋ la asɛ kasinteŋ la gel he dɔ he te."
Anee ba ŋɔ, "Abraham naanaree ya te, nomɛlbwa nɛndɔɔla laa yan. Aah, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ yaa dɔ ya tenee yaa wola nɛndɔɔlaa ɛ kpa nɔɔ?"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la ɛ nɛndɔɔle. Wechɔga yawɔ yom.
Nɛndɔɔle aa o dɔɔ deemii do ka tonɛ, kɛ dem te bie te ɛɛ do dem belaa saŋ bɛlbwa.
Anomanta dɛ men Korowii Bie la lɛ heyaa dɛ gel he dɔ he te naa, amɔ te dɛ he dɔ he te kɛrɛdɛ.
"N gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ he ɛ Abraham naanar, kɛ he berɔ dɛɛ nyin mɛ dɛ kpo, dɛkalkɛ haa n webagla yarada.
Waa n Mɛɛ aa bag mɛɛ mɛɛ bol he be la, asɛ he gee ɛ anɔ la he mɛɛ aa bola he no."
Anee ba ŋɔ, "Ya mɛɛɛ Abraham." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Dɛ Abraham bii tentenee heya aa, he fe dɛ ɛ o we-ɛɛla siwi.
N waa maa dɛ bol saŋ bɛlbwa la ɛ kasinteŋ waa maa noa le Korowii be, kɛ he dɛ nyin mɛ dɛ kpo. Gɛɛ Abraham ɛ aa?
He ge mɛɛ toma siwii hɛɛ ɛ la." Anee ba ŋɔ, "Nyoasɛm bii laa yan oo, Korowii gboo ya Mɛɛ."
Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he mɛɛɛ Korowii kpela aa, he fe dɛ nyin n wa, dɛkalkɛ o bee n le ba dɛ do bonɔ taraken nɔ. N gbagba kpegri ne laa n ba, onee tom mɛ.
Ɛrɛɛ haa wola n waa mun no nɔɔ? Haa wola nyin kɛ he teŋɛ a ta la waa.

Bɔnsam biirii heya. Waa waa dɛ nyin ɛɛ laanee he gee nyin ɛɛ. Chɔɔ bwaa o le nɛŋkpoa we-ɛɛla ne, waa kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ kpɔ nemenɛ nyosone gbo. O ŋɔ o bol wa aa, nyosone gboo wɛɛ teŋe, dɛkalkɛ o daa. O ɛ nyosonteŋni, asɛ nyosone bwa kooro on.
Kɛ n te maa dɛ bol kasinteŋ la waa haa wola men yarada la.
He bini umee dɛ won chagle kɛ n ɛ wechɔga ka ɔ? Aah dɛ n dɛ bol kasinteŋ aa, ɛrɛɛ haa wola men yarada ɔ?
Nomɛlbwa waa ɛ Korowii bie la dɛ no o wa. Haa wola o bii ɛɛ la waa haa wola o waa nyin dɛ no la."
Belaa Juda tena la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nyosonee yaa teŋe kɛ yaa ŋɔa ŋɔ, he ɛ Samaria te kwaa do he nɛɛ la aa?"
Anee o ŋɔ, "Kwaa toole n nɛ, n Mɛɛ sɔnee mɛɛ kwaa, asɛ he te ɛɛ chɔg mɛ.
Sɔn laa mɛɛ nyin. Nɛn waa nyin sɔn dɛɛ tɛ mɛ la lole. Onee dɛ ba pa nomɛlbwa bole.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa waa no n waa nɔ dɛ teŋɛ a ta la aa sewɛ bwa."
Anee Juda tena la ŋɔ, "Ya ta ŋɔe yaa? Kwaa lɔ he nɛ. Ya nabaa Abraham ne Korowii keamere la gba serewɔ, gɛɛ he te ŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa no he waa nɔ dɛ teŋɛ a ta la aa sewɛ bwa naa?
He gwaa ya nabaa Abraham waa sewa la kɛɛ? Korowii keamere la ge serewɔ. Aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii he te nɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "N gbagba dɛ nyin sɔn aa, a ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ, kɛ n Mɛɛ la haa dɛ bol o waa ŋɔ onee he Korowii laanee dɛɛ tɛ mɛ sɔn.
Haa on jemɛ, kɛ n te jemɔ. Dɛ n ŋɔ maa on jemaa, dɛ n ɛ nyosonteŋni kɛ heya. N jemɔ asɛ dɛɛ no o deŋna wa.
He nabaa Abraham sie lɛo wɛɛ tamane n bala wa. O nao o baah sɔɔhno."
Asɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He ta bene fifraanue gba dii mɔɔ, gɛɛ he na Abraham aa?"
Anee o ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, baa wola Abraham lolɛ mɔɔ la dɛ n lole."
Belaa ba pa bwea ŋɔ ba dɛ fogro, asɛ o sɔh dɛ le Korowii Dea bela kaa.
Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra aa dɛ valɛ la, o na baa bɛl baa lolɔ nyoŋe.
Belaa o habɔteŋra la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, baa nɔ ne o nya ne o mɛɛ, ba bini ume wechɔgaa ba nyoŋa nɔ ne nɔɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ ne o lolanar bini bɛlbwa wechɔga be laa a le. Gɛ Korowii aa chagle o kpegri o nɛɛ waa a ba gɛ la.
A wer kɛŋɔ bɔr aa chaahna nɔ, ya swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ Naate waa tom mɛ la toma, dɛkalkɛ bɔr dɛ ba bira nomɛlbwa aa wola won ɛ toma bɛlbwa kpa.
N taa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bonɔ nɔ, menee kandea dɛɛ chaah nɛra bwa."
Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o ta nentane ta harɛ dɛ tegɛ a ne teera, dɛ kpɔ fɔgɛ baa la sie.
Asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "La tam la baa dɛ yerɔ Siloam la ta dɛ ka samɛ he sie." Gɛ sɔn Siloam la munii kɛŋɔ "Ba tomɔ." Waa laŋa dɛ ka samɛ o sie la tonɛ la, dɛ o dɛ na, dɛ berɛ ba buse.
Belaa o bala ne nɛra ba faa nao ka kɛ o fa nyoŋɔ dɛɛ soŋe kwaa la ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ laa fa yon so dɛɛ soŋe kwaa la aa?"
Bane ŋɔ, "Onee," asɛ bane ge ŋɔ, "Akai, o laa, lee wɛɛ leo." Asɛ baa la ge gbagba ŋɔ, "Menee!"
Anee ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ a ɛ he berɛ ɛɛ na nɔɔ?"
Belaa o ŋɔ, "Baa la baa dɛ yerɔ Yeesu laanee ta nentane dɛ tegɛ a ne teera pɛ dɛ kpɔ fɔgɛ n sie, dɛ ŋɔ ń la Siloam ta dɛ́ ka samɛ ta. Asɛ maa laŋa dɛ ka samɛ la, bug la ta mɛɛ na la."
Anee ba pɛɛro ja ŋɔ, "Leperaa o dɔɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Maa jemɛ bela waa lole."
Belaa ba lawɛ baa la o faa nyoŋa la dɛ kaa o ne Farisii tena sie.
Dɛ tɔpere Yeesu aa tegɛ nentane pɛ teera ta dɛ kpɔ chaoh la ɛ Ona Tɔpere.
Belaa Farisii tena la berɛ pɛɛro gɛ aa ɛa asɛ o won dɛɛ na. Anee o ŋɔ, "Kpechɛgree o kpɔ maa n sie asɛ n samɛ ta taraken dɛ won dɛɛ na la."
Asɛ Farisii tena la bane ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ ta Korowii be leɛ, dɛkalkɛ o chɔg Ona Tɔpere." Bane ge ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ ɛɛ ba wona ɛ nyokpowaa nɔ dɔŋa baa nɔ aa ɛa nɔɔ?" A chegɛ a ta ba nyoa ta pɛɛ kpa.
Asɛ Farisii tena la berɛ pɛɛ baa la ja ŋɔ, "He ŋɔ o chaeh dɛ gel hɛɛ na bɔr, taraken nɔ, ɛrɛɛ he na o wa ɔ?" Anee o ŋɔ, "Korowii keamee on."
Dɛ Juda tena nomonome la te dɛ tɔŋle ŋɔ, ba fe aa yarada kɛŋɔ o fa nyoŋɔ ka asɛ dɛ berɛ dɛɛ na, nemenɛ baa na o nya ne o mɛɛ mɔɔ.
Ba yer ba dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He bie nɔ naa? He ŋɔ haa lolɔ dɛ o nyoŋɔ ɛ? Aah ɛrɛɛ a ɛ asɛ o berɛ won dɛɛ na nɔ?"
Anee ba ŋɔ, "Ya jemɔ kɛ ya biee. Yaa lolɔ dɛ o nyoŋɔ.
Kɛ yaa gɛ aa ɛa asɛ wɛɛ na ne naate waa gela wɛɛ na te waa jemɛ. Amɔ hé pɛɛ o gbagba na nɔ, dɛkalkɛ o kpego dɛ won bol wa."
Dɛ Juda tena nomonome laanee baa ɔmɛ waa ba ŋɔ gɛ. Nomonome la ɛ nyoa beŋkpoŋ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔ Yeesu ɛ Kristo la, baa doŋi naatee o bɛ ba cheremi dea jo kpa.
A waa o nya ne o mɛɛ ŋɔ o kpego ŋɔ bá pɛɛro la.
Ba berɔ yerɛ baa la o faa nyoŋa la nɛɛtena, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi Korowii dɛ bol kasinteŋ. Ya te jemɔ kɛ baa nɔ waa chaeh nɔ ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ."
Belaa o ŋɔ, "Dɛ o ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ ne o ta ɛɛ yoo, n te aa jemɛ. Webeŋkpoŋ maa jema laanee kɛ, n fa nyoŋɔ asɛ taraken dɛ berɛ dɛɛ na."
Anee ba berɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ o ɛɛ nɔ? Bɔkwa waa o ɛ dɛ won pili he sie nɔɔ?"
Anee o ŋɔ, "N faa bol he be wubwa la, he vɛh noe. Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ nyin kɛ n bol ja ɔ? He ge dɛ nyin he ɛ o habɔteŋra kɛɛ?"
Belaa ba chɛgro kohona, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Henee o habɔteŋre! Ya te, Mosis habɔteŋraa yan.
Gɛ yaa jema laanee kɛ Korowii bol waa dɛ bagle Mosis, kɛ baa nɔ te, yaa o leebɔr jemɛ."
Asɛ baa la chaŋe ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa nɔɔ? Heyaa ŋɔa haa o leebɔr jemɛ, kɛ o gelɔ n te won dɛɛ na.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii deŋna toole wechɔg-ɛɛra be. O deŋna lɔ banɔ la baa dɛ duuru dɛɛ ɛ waa waa dɛ nyin la be.
Le harɛ mumpar bwa, umee noa kɛŋɔ nomɛl wono pili nɛn baa lolɔ dɛ o nyoŋɔ sie bwa nɔ?
Dɛ Korowii be laa baa nɔ le ba naa, o fe aa won ɛ waa nɔ dɔŋa."
Anee ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He ne he wechɔgaa ba lolɛ. Gɛɛ he ŋɔ hé chagle yaa wa aa?" Asɛ ba doŋu cheremi dea bela bala kwara.
Yeesu aa noa kɛŋɔ ba doŋu cheremi dea bala la, o nyin o bɔr asɛ dɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, "He dɛ yarada Nɛn Bie la aa?"
Asɛ o pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Nomoa, umee naate la ásɛ he chag mɛ n jemɔ dɛ yaradao wɔ?"
Anee o ŋɔ, "Naatee he den na gɛ la, o ne henee dɛɛ bol waa la."
Belaa baa la ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n dɛ yaradae!" Asɛ dɛ guŋi o sie dɛ tɛo duure.
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole waa n ba harɛ nɔ ta, ásɛ nyoŋa berɛ dɛɛ na, ásɛ banɔ la ge baa dɛ na la berɛ nyoŋa."
Dɛ Farisii tena bane lɔ bela. Baa no gɛ la, ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Amɔ ya ge ɛ nyoŋa kɛɛ?"
Anee Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Dɛ he fe sɛoh kɛŋɔ he ɛ nyoŋa kwaraa naa, wechɔga fe toole he nɛ, kɛ haa ŋɔa he dɛ na nomanta, he ta lɔ wechɔga ta."
Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, dɛ nomɛlbwa jo peera leg bini, dɛ o ta doonyoa chegɛ jo dɛ ka che baŋ bɛl dɛ teeh jo a be naa, dɛ ŋwɛɛree on.
Kɛ petegre waa ɛ peera te la te, doonyoaa o che dɛɛ jo a be.
Dɛ o balaa, onee naate waa dɛ daah doonyoa la ɛɛ ba pila tɛ o dɔ bɔr jo a be. Peera la ɛɛ no o taa asɛ o yerɛ anla aa ɛ o kwaa la sɔna a teŋɛ o nɛɛ o le a ne kaa.
O le o gbagba kwaa la ne naa, o dɛ tɔ a sie asɛ a teŋɛ o nɛ, dɛkalkɛ a jemɛ o taa.
Aa nɛnhɔɔh nɛɛ teŋɛ bwa. Aa chwao, dɛkalkɛ aa nɛnhɔɔhra taa jemɛ."
Sɛglaa o kpɔ dɛ bag ba gɛ waa nɔ, kɛ ba ta a mun noɛ.
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ ba be ja ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, n do kɛŋɔ peera leg doonyoa la.
Nɛra baa tɔ n sie dɛ ba la bwa, peera la ta deŋne ba be doe, dɛkalkɛ ba ɛ ŋwɛɛra.
Menee doonyoa la, gɛ peera aa chegɛ doonyoa dɛ jo dɛɛ le, dɛ dɔ kwaa dɛɛ di la, gɛɛ nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la ɛɛ ba mkpa dɔe.
Ŋwɛɛ balaa, o balɔ dɛ́ ba ŋwɛ dɛ kpo dɛ chɔg kwa. Wedɛɛga waa laa wɛɛ ba. Kɛ n te balɔ dɛ́ ba tɛ heyaa mkpa ásɛ he dɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
"Menee Petegredɛɛge la. Dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, mɛɛ kpɔ n nyu charɛ n peera.
Nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi peera ta dɛɛ lɛ suuga la, o ta do kɛ petegre peera la aa ɛ o kwa. Paa te la na gbolo bala aa, wɛɛ chwao gela, asɛ o jo a bini dɛ lawɛ ane, dɛ lɔ a kar pegre.
Wɛɛ chwao gela, dɛkalkɛ o gbabir kwaa laa, o waane laa a wa. O kembɔr gbo waa wɛɛ ɛ.
"Menee Petegredɛɛge la. Gɛ maa jemɛ n peera la, gɛɛ a ge jem mɛ,
kɛŋɔ n Mɛɛ aa jem mɛ asɛ n ge jemɔ la. Dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, mɛɛ kpɔ n nyuu charɛ dɛ lɛa.
N peera ane ta lɔ lega ane bini. Mɛɛ nyin a ge bɔree dɛ tɔ a sie dɛ kpɔa ba ja anɔ ta, asɛ aa no n taa dɛ bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ pɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ n nɛ.
Maa sɛah kɛŋɔ mɛɛ koh n peera waa dɛ sewɛ dɛ berɛ ir seo ta la nomanta n Mɛɛ la dɛ nyin mɛ taeh.
Lao seo laa mɛɛ ba sewa nɔ. N tetoosewee mɛɛ ba sewa. N dɔ kpegri kɛ ń kpɔ n te tɛ dɛ sewɛ, dɛ berɛ dɔ kpegri kɛŋɔ ń ir seo ta. Gɛɛ n Mɛɛ ŋɔ ń ba ɛ."
Yeesu aa bol gɛ la, dɛ Juda tena la nyoa ta pɛɛ ba tɔŋle dɔŋa ja.
Asɛ ba bini kɛrɛdɛ bwa ŋɔ, "Komɛlee gale o sie ta le! O nyu toole! Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ do deŋne onɔ ge be dɛɛ no o waa nɔɔ?"
Ba bini bane ge ŋɔ, "Dɛ komɛl gale nɛn sie aa, wɛɛ won dɛɛ bol waa ken aa? Chogla te ɛɛ won chah nyoŋe wɛɛ na naa?"
Dɛ alalawo saŋee, asɛ baa di tɔpejen bɛl baa kpɔa dɛɛ le Korowii Dea kwaara bini Jerusalam la.
Dɛ Yeesu dɛ valɛ Korowii Dea doonyoa bela baa dɛ yerɔ Solomɔn Doonyoa la,
asɛ Juda tena ba baro cheme dɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ta gel yaa ɛ he waa aahna-aahna ken nɔɔ? Dɛ henee Kristo la aa, den gel ya jemɛ."
Anee o chaŋe ŋɔ, "N ŋɔ he be wubwa, kɛ haa men yarada. N we-ɛɛla bwa maa ɛa la, n Mɛɛ la kpegri nee mɛɛ ɛa asɛ aa di mɛ danseɛ.
Haa wola n peera ɛɛ waa haa wola men yarada la.
N peera dɛ no n taa asɛ n jema aa teŋɛ n nɛ,
asɛ mɛɛ tɛa mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa. Aa sewɛ bwa ge. Nomɛlbwa ge aa won toa n nɔn ta.
N Mɛɛ la waa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la kpegri gwaa komɛlbwa kpegri, anomanta nomɛlbwa aa won toa o nɔn ta.
N ne n Mɛɛ la bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ."
Belaa Juda tena la pa bwea ja ŋɔ baa fogroo kpo.
Asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N baa ɛ wedɛɛga kohona n Mɛɛ la kpegri ne he bwa siwi ta asɛ he na. Aah dɛ wedɛɛga nɔ bini ame waa hɛɛ ba men bwea fogra nɔɔ?"
Anee ba chaŋe ŋɔ, "He wedɛɛga te ɛɛ waa laa yaa ba he kpoe nɔ, kɛ he musu waa haa dɛ bol la waa. Nɛwɛnyinii hen, kɛ he berɔ dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he ɛ Korowii."
Yeesu chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, 'He bɛlbwa ɛ Korowii.' He ta kure dɛ na kɛɛ?
Dɛ o yerɛ nɛra waa kpɔ o waa la bagle la Korowii aa, dɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ waa yaa wola won vɛh,
dɛ men n Mɛɛ Korowii aa lee mɛ dɛ tom mɛ harɛ nɔ ta la ŋɔ Korowii Biee men aa, ɛrɛɛ he ŋɔ n dɛ bol musu waa nɔɔ?
Dɛ maa n Mɛɛ la we-ɛɛla ɛ te naa, he bɛ men yarada.
Kɛ dɛ n dɛ ɛ o we-ɛɛla aa ɛ nyokpowaa te, dɛ haa men yarada kwaraa naa, hé yarada o nyokpowaa la te asɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛ n ne o ɛ beŋkpoŋ bɛlbwa aa wola won dagre o te o dɔŋ nɛ."
Bela la, dɛ ba fe dɛ nyin Yeesu dɛ́ lawɔ ja, asɛ o laa o te kpɔ fɛmm dɛ kaa.
Yeesu le Jɔɔdan Moo la ja dɛ kaa o baŋ bela Jɔn faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la, dɛ ka so bela.
Nɛra ba o be pirim asɛ dɛ baa bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Jɔn ta nyokpowaa bɛlbwa ɛɛ, kɛ baa nɔ bwara waa Jɔn aa bagla la bwa ɛ kpela."
Bela la, nɛra yarada Yeesu pirim.
Baa bɛlee fa lole baa yerɔ Lasorɔs. Dɛ o bwara dɛ weo. Bwɛɛ waa lɔ o ta sɔne Bɛtani. Dɛ gɛ bwɛɛ nɔ taa Mɛɛre ne o nahaah Maata ge do.
A gɛ Mɛɛre nɔɔ fa fuge nosɔɔhsoma ɛ Yeesu nakpale dɛ kpɔ o nyumpona feera la. O nimambiee Lasorɔs o bwara aa dɛ weo nɔ.
Asɛ o nimambii la tomɛ nɛra ba ka ŋɔ Yeesu be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he dandɛɛge la bwara dɛ weo."
Yeesu aa no gɛ la, belaa o ŋɔ, "Serewe weela laa wɛɛ we nɔ. Gɛ aa ɛ Korowii dɔ jirima ásɛ a che a ta Korowii Bie la ge dɔ jirima waa a ba gɛ."
Dɛ Yeesu dɛ nyin Maata ne Mɛɛre ne Lasorɔs bwa taeh.
Kɛ waa no Lasorɔs weela waa la, o soge bela tɔpera anɛ mɔɔ.
A habɔɔ la, o ŋɔ o habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya berɛ kaa Judia harɛ ta."
Anee ba ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he laa baah bɛl ta bela tena fe ɛɛ nyini dɛ́ fogre bwea kpo la kɛɛ, gɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin bela laŋa taraken ja aa?"
Anee o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Le chɔɔ wee aa le ka tel jɔmɔra wee aa jo la, dɔŋhwere fi dɛ anɛ laa aa? Dɛ bɔr chaahnɔ nɛn ɛɛ valaa, waa naa lɔ bwa, dɛkalkɛ wee leɔ bɔr chaah.
Kɛ dɛ nɛn dɛ valɛ biro ta naa, anee wɛɛ lɔ na, dɛkalkɛ o ta kon dɔe wɛɛ chaahno bɔr. Korowiirii wola o sie chaahnɛ la."
Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o berɔ ŋɔ, "Domii ya dam Lasorɔs chɔ, anomanta mɛɛ lao dɛ́ ka chumu."
Belaa o habɔteŋra la chaŋo ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, dɛ domii o chɔ te naa, wɛɛ iruu dɛ dɔ bokpega."
Dɛ Lasorɔs seo waa wɛɛ bol ba be, asɛ ba ge ta a mun noɛ dɛɛ lii o dom chɔe waa la.
Belaa Yeesu pili a bini chasee ŋɔ, "Lasorɔs sewɔ.
Kɛ he nomanta la, a do n som kɛ maa wola toole bela o sewɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ an dɛ gel he yarada mɛ. Hé ir yá kaa o be bela!"
Belaa Tɔmas baa dɛ yerɔ Kpar la ŋɔ o bala Yeesu habɔteŋra la be ŋɔ, "Hé gel ya pu nomoa ásɛ ya ne o bwa kaa, asɛ dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, yá ne o sewɛ."
Baa tel bela la, Yeesu noɔ kɛŋɔ o sewɔ ba hugo o dɔ tɔpera anaarɛ.
Bɛtani ne Jerusalam baah nɛɛ ɛ kwansini anɛɛ.
Asɛ Juda tena warɛ dɛ ba Maata ne Mɛɛre be dɛ baa bwɛɛ ba ba nimambie la seo wa.
Maata aa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesu dɛ ba la, o leɔ dɛ ka chemo, asɛ Mɛɛre te ta so dem.
Maata aa chemo la, o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he fe lɔ bonɔ naa, n nimambie nɔ fe ta sewɛ nɔ.
Kɛ n jemɔ kɛŋɔ taraken kwara, komɛlbwa haa soŋe Korowii la, wɛɛ ɛo tɛɛ."
Belaa o chaŋo ŋɔ, "He nimambie la ɛɛ ir seo taa dɛ dɔ mkpa."
Anee Maata ŋɔ, "N jemɔ kɛ tɔpera bwa jaga wee la lala bwa aa ir seo ta la, o gee iruu."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Menee dɛɛ chum nɛra seo ta, menee dɛɛ tɛɛ ba mkpa. Nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la, dɛ o sewɔ kwaraa naa, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa.
Asɛ nomɛlbwa waa soge le dɛɛ yarada mɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa, waa sewɛ bwa. He dɛ yarada gɛ waa nɔ naa?"
Anee o sɛh ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, n Dɔɔ, n yaradao kɛŋɔ henee Korowii Bie Kristo baa bola ŋɔ wɛɛ ba harɛ nɔ taa la."
Maata aa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o berɔ la dem dɛ ka sɔh bol Mɛɛre be ŋɔ, "Nomoa la balɔ dɛɛ pɛɛ he wa."
Mɛɛre aa no gɛ la, o iro warane asɛ dɛɛ kaa o be.
Dɛ Yeesu ta bwɛɛ bini joɛ mɔɔ. Dɛ o ta lɔ bela Maata aa baa chemo la.
Juda tena bane baa lɔ Mɛɛre be dem bela dɛɛ larawe o bwara la aa naa kɛŋɔ o iro dɛ ɛ warane le buse la, ba ge iro teŋɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ o ken dɛ kaa bela baa bil o nimambie la ka wi.
Mɛɛre aa tel bela Yeesu aa lole asɛ dɛ nao la, o kaa guŋi o sie dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, he fe lɔ bonɔ naa, n nimambie nɔ fe ta sewɛ nɔ."
Yeesu aa na gɛ waa dɛ wi asɛ Juda tena baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ la gee wi la, o loo kuu asɛ chal valɛ o bwara bini.
Belaa o pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Leperaa he bilu wɔ?" Anee ba ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ba dɛ ba na."
Yeesu wio.
Asɛ Juda tena la ɛɛ bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Hé na nyina waa dɛ nyinu dɛɛ wi gɛ!"
Bane ge ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ laa wona gel nyoŋe na la aa? Dɛ o lɔ bonɔ naa, o fe ta wone chah onɔ o fe bɛ sewaa?"
Belaa Yeesu loo ku, chal valɛ o bwara bini ja, asɛ ba la bela Lasorɔs aa chɔa la. O bɔɔ la, bwee ba komɛ dɛ gbili bwe tɔ o nyoa.
Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé laa bwe la gbili le bɔɔ la nyoa." Belaa Maata waa ɛ Lasorɔs nimambie la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ. "N Dɔɔ, taraken o ken ka chɔgɔ dɛ do sɔɔh, dɛkalkɛ o tɔpera anaarɛɛ la."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ dɛ he yarada mɛ naa, hɛɛ na gɛ Korowii aa dɔ jirimaa yaa?"
Ba laa bwe la gbili le bɔɔ la nyoa, asɛ Yeesu ha sie nyundua dɛ ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, n dɛ jaame kɛ haa dɛ no n wa.
N te jemɔ kɛ tɔpere bwaa hɛɛ no n wa. Nɛra baa ja n nɛɛ bonɔ nɔ waa mɛɛ bol gɛ ásɛ ba won jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee tom mɛ la."
Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o kpɔ takpeg dɛ yerɛ lale la ŋɔ, "Lasorɔs, le ba!"
Asɛ o ir dɛ le bɔɔ la bini. Dɛ yal baa kpɔa vɔrɔwe o nakpale ne o nɔɔra la ta vɔwɔ gɛ, asɛ botire ge vɔwɛ o nyu. Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé pur laala la bwa ásɛ o kaa."
Juda tena la baa ba Mɛɛre be la aa na gɛ waa nɔ Yeesu aa ɛa la, ba kɛrɛdɛ yaradao.
Kɛ ba bini bane te berɔ la Farisii tena la be asɛ dɛ ka bol waa Yeesu aa ɛa la bwa.
Anomanta Sɔfonomonome ne Farisii tena kaa cheme ba Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ nyiŋi ba waa bini la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Aah, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ taraken ɔ? Na nyokpowe-ɛɛla nɔ bwa dɔŋa baa nɔ aa dɛ ɛ.
Dɛ ya gelo waa, nɛra kɛrɛdɛ bwa ɛɛ yaradao, asɛ a che a ta ya dɔɔranar Room tena dɔ bɔr dɛ ba lɛ ya Korowii Dea nɔ ne harɛ nɔ bwa kpegri dɛɛ di."
Belaa ba bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kaefas o ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa a gɛ benanyoa la ta la ŋɔ, "He ta liire dɔe ken aa?
Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ lɛ nɛra bwa seo dɛ sewaa, a ta bɔ kɛ harɛbir bwa aa pagraa?"
Kaefas gbagba liire laa o kpɔ bol gɛ waa nɔ. Waa ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa laanee Korowii tɛo gɛ liire la o bola ŋɔ Yeesu ɛɛ lɛ Juda tena bwa sewee sewɛ la.
Juda tena gbo laa. Ba ne Korowii nɛra baa lɔ bobɛlbwa la bwa sewee wɛɛ ba lɛɛ sewɛ dɛ́ lawɛ ba bwa pɛ ásɛ ba ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
Awolaa ba le pɛ nyoa dɛɛ nyin Yeesu dɛ́ kpo.
Anomanta dɛ waa o te kpɔe dɛɛ jo Juda tena la bini kpa. O joɔ kaa pua bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ifram ta, asɛ o ne o habɔteŋra la ka so bela.
Juda tena Galekaa tɔpere la aa dɛ tel la, nɛra kɛrɛdɛ le ba bwɛɛre ta dɛ kaa Jerusalam dɛ kaa ɛ we-ɛɛla ane dɛ́ laa doŋa kpɔ ba nɛɛ dɛ́ won di tɔpere la.
Belaa nɛra baa ba Jerusalam la ɛɛ gaage Yeesu bɔr dɛ che Korowii Dea dɛɛ pɛɛ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Wɛɛ ba ya tɔpejen nɔ taa kɛɛ waa ba nɔ? Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ lii rɔ?"
Dɛ Sɔfonomonome la ne Farisii tena la te dɔɔ bol ŋɔ, dɛ nomɛlbwa jemɛ bela waa lole naa, ó bag ba ásɛ ba ka lawɔ.
Aa baa ka tɔpera anumɛl bá di Galekaa tɔpere la la, Yeesu berɔ ba Bɛtani dɛ la Lasorɔs la waa chumu seo ta la dem.
Ba hɔɔhro, o ne nɛra bane ne Lasorɔs so dɛɛ di kwaa la, asɛ Maata tɔɔ dɛɛ tɛɛ ba.
Anee Mɛɛre kpɔ nosɔɔhsoma loŋbir a yog aa kpega dɛ do wer kohona ba fɔgle Yeesu napaala dɛ kpɔ o nyumpona feera. Asɛ dea la bini bwa sɔɔh do som ken.
Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋra la bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Judas Eskareɔt o taa dɛ ba Yeesu lee tɛ la ŋɔ,
"Ba fe yog nosɔɔhsoma nɔ dɛ lɛ suugajena dɛ bɔne tɛ nyaara ta bɔ naa?"
Menɛkɛsɛ ŋɔ nyaara waa hiaoh waa o ŋɔ gɛ la. Waa ɛ ŋwɛɛ waa o ŋɔ gɛ. Dɛ onee dɛɛ kpoŋe ba suuga, asɛ dɛ yon ŋwɛ ane dɛɛ di.
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé gelo jeih ken. Noo o kpɔ dɛɛ hug mɛ.
He ne nyaara ɛɛ do lee saŋ bɛlbwa. Kɛ n te, maa he bee so ka tonɛ."
Belaa Juda tena pirim aa noa kɛŋɔ Yeesu lɔ Bɛtani la, ba ba bela dɛɛ nyinu dɛ́ na. O gbo waa laa, Lasorɔs waa chumu seo ta la ge jao.
Anomanta Sɔfonomonome la vɔrɔwɔ kɛŋɔ bá kpo Lasorɔs gba,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ o waa Juda tena kɛrɛdɛ vɛh ba nɛɛ teŋa dɛɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo.
Tɔ aa pera la, nɛnlaa baa ba Jerusalam dɛɛ ba ba di Galekaa la noɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu dɛ ba bela.
Belaa ba nyin bambie papooni dɛ kpɔ le bwɛɛ bini ka chemo ŋwɛnɛ ta silɛɛ ne dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Woowo! Korowii jam! O swee Israel tena Kooro waa valɛ o sɔn ta dɛɛ ba nɔ andɛɛga."
Dɛ Yeesu nyin keego bie bɛl, dɛ so o ta gɛ baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ,
"Saayɔn tena, he bɛ ɔmɛ! Hé nyiŋi na! He Kooroo soge keego bie ta dɛɛ ba la."
Dɛ o habɔteŋra la ta o waa nɔ mun noɛ logla la, dɛ ka tel kɛ Korowii aa tɛo jirima mɔɔ ba ta lii kɛŋɔ ba chwerɛ o bwara waa Korowii Tɔn bini gɛ, asɛ ba ɛo gɛ kpela.
Dɛ nɛnlaa Yeesu aa yerɛ Lasorɔs lalbɔɔ bini o ir seo ta ba siwi ta la bol gɛ waa ɛa la bwa dɛɛ bagle nɛra.
Nɛnlaa baa noa kɛŋɔ o ɛ wejena nɔ la koh a waa dɛ ka chemo.
Belaa Farisii tena la bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Hɛlaa yaa hɛlɛ la! Yaa won ɛo wobɛlbwa noo! Na nɛra bwa aa wura teŋɛ o nɛɛ gɛ!"
Dɛ Grik tena bane ja nɛra baa kaa Jerusalam dɛɛ la ká tomɛ Korowii Galekaa tɔpere la ta la nɛ.
Ba la Felep waa le Galilia harɛ bwɛɛ baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛtsaeda la be, dɛ ka soŋo ŋɔ, "Nomoa, ya dɛ nyin Yeesu dɛ́ nao."
Belaa Felep ka ŋɔ Andriu be, asɛ ba bwa la ka bol Yeesu be.
Anee o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "N Nɛn Bie la tɔpere telo kɛŋɔ Korowii tɛ mɛ jirima.
Kasinteŋ, dɛ ba ta mebii kpɔe du o pɔh aa, waa won ya. O gboo dɛ do le. Dɛ he duu te naa, o dɛ le dɛ ya kɛrɛdɛ.
Nomɛlbwa o siwi aa swɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta la, wɛɛ paŋɛ o nyuu. Asɛ nomɛlbwa ge o siwi aa wola harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ kwaa ta lɛ la, wɛɛ dɔ o nyuu dɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la.
Nomɛlbwa waa sɛh dɛɛ tom mɛ la, wɛ́ɛ teŋɛ n nɛ. Bobɛlbwa maa do la, belaa n toroma gee ba doe. N Mɛɛ la ɛɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ tom mɛ la sɔnee.
"Taraken n liire ta bobeŋkpoŋ chegɛ. Ɛrɛɛ ń soŋe n Mɛɛ ŋɔɔ? Ń soŋo ŋɔ, 'N Mɛɛ, lɛɛ mɛ le waa nɔ nyoa' aa? Akai! A ta gɛ magrɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ waa nɔ waa n ba."
Asɛ o ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, gel he sɔn dɔ jirima!" Belaa ba no taa bɛl le nyundua kɛŋɔ, "N gelɔ n sɔn dɔ jirima, kɛ mɛɛ berɔɔ gel o dɔ ja."
Nɛnlaa baa ja o nɛɛ bela la aa no taa la la, bane ŋɔ bwaalaa kɔra, asɛ ba bane ge ŋɔ nyundua torome bɛlee bol waa o be.
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "N waa laa ya no gɛ taa nɔ. He waa.
Tɔpere Korowii aa bol harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la telo, asɛ name gee mɛɛ ba n doŋi Bɔnsam waa ɛ harɛ nɔ ta kpegnɛn la ta.
Men, baa sag mɛ nyunduaa. Ba baa sag mɛ naa, mɛɛ tɛr nɛra bwaa ba n be."
Anɔ waa bola nɔ dɛ bagle seo la soosiwi waa dɛ ba sewa.
Belaa nɛnlaa la chaŋe ŋɔ, "Ya noɔ Korowii Tɔn la ɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ dɛ Kristo la balaa, waa sewɛ bwa. Aah, ɛrɛɛ he te berɛ ŋɔ Nɛn Bie la chɛ kɛŋɔ ba sagɔ nyundua ɔ? Umee Nɛn Bie nɔ kwaraa te nɔ?"
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Bɔr taa dɛ chaah he nɛɛ tɔpera anɛ nɔ, hɛ́ɛ valɛ o ta. Dɛ gɛ laa aa, bɔr ɛɛ biruu he nɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ valɛ biro ta la aa bela waa dɛ kaa jemɛ.
Bɔr taa dɛ chaah he nɛɛ nɔ, hé yarada bochaah la dɛ berɛ bochaah nɛra." Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o le ba baah asɛ dɛ ka sɔh.
O ɛ nyokpowaa kohona ba siwi ta, kɛ a ne a bwa ba ta on yaradae.
Anɔ dɛ bagle kɛ Korowii keame Aesaya waa waa bola la ɛ kpela. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ya faa bol he waa la, umee yarada yaa ɔ? Ba na he kpegri, kɛ umee wona jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee yɔ?"
Gɛɛ a do ba ta waa la yaradae, asɛ Aesaya berɛ bol ja ŋɔ,
