"Korowii tɔɔge ba sie, dɛ gel ba bambile do kpegri, gɛ aa ɛ ba sibie bɛ na, asɛ ba liiree bini bɛ chaah ba no a mun, a ba ɛ kɛ baa charɛ ba liire dɛ ba o be o chaah ba."
Yeesu jirimaa Aesaya na asɛ dɛ bol o waa gɛ la.
Juda tena nomonome kɛrɛdɛ gba yarada Yeesu, kɛ baa dɛ ɔmɛ Farisii tena nomanta, ba ta bolɛ nomɛlbwa no, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba bolaa, aa geloo ba doŋ ba cheremi dea joe.
Nɛra bee baa nyin sɔn dɛ gwaa kɛ Korowii aa tɛɛ ba sɔn.
Belaa Yeesu kpɔ takpeg dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la, n laa wɛɛ yarada. Naate waa tom mɛ laanee wɛɛ yarada la.
Nomɛlbwa waa na mɛ la, dɛ naate waa tom mɛ laanee o na gɛ la.
N ba harɛ nɔ ta kɛŋɔ kandea dɛ baa chaah nɛra bwa, ásɛ nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la bɛ biro ta do kpa.
Dɛ nɛn no n waa la dɛ waa a ta teŋaa, n laa dɛ bol o waa dɛ pa bole, dɛkalkɛ nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole waa laa n ba harɛ nɔ ta. Nɛra bwa lɛɛ waa n ba.
Kɛ nɛn waa vɛh n ne n waa maa dɛ bol la ɛɛ di bolchɔgee. N waa maa dɛ bol nɔɔ dɛ pao bolchɔge tɔpere bwa jaga wee.
Dɛkalkɛ n gbabir kpegri ne laa mɛɛ bol waa nɔ. N Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ laanee do mɛ dɛ chag mɛ gɛ maa bol o wa.
N jemɔ kɛŋɔ o waa la dɛ tɛ mkpa aa wola jage dɔe, anomanta anɔ la waa bol n be laanee n gee bol."
Aa ka tama ba di tɔpejen Galekaa la la, dɛ Yeesu jemɔ kɛŋɔ tɔpere telo kɛ ó le harɛ nɔ ta dɛ berɛ kaa o Mɛɛ be. Dɛ o dɛ nyin o nɛra baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta la kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ka tonɛ.
O ne o habɔteŋra aa lɔ tig ta jɔmɔra la, Bɔnsam tɔ sie kpɔ liichɔga ba do Seemɔn Eskareɔt bie Judas bini kɛŋɔ ó le Yeesu tɛ.
Dɛ Yeesu te jemɔ kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa kpegrii o Mɛɛ Korowii kpɔ tɛo, asɛ dɛ berɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ waa le o be ba la, gɛɛ o berɛ dɛɛ ba o be kaala.
Belaa o ir kondikwaa la ta, dɛ foo o batakaare, dɛ kpɔ bwarabwaa mile chara,
asɛ dɛ fuge nee do kon bini dɛ pa mun kpɔ dɛɛ sarame o habɔteŋra la nakpale, asɛ dɛ kpɔ bwarabwaa waa kpɔa mile chara la dɛɛ feera.
Waa baa tel Seemɔn Pita be la, anee Seemɔn Pita pɛɛro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n nakpalee hɛɛ ba sarama aa?"
Anee Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Haa n waa maa dɛ ɛ nɔ mun jemɛ taraken mɔɔ. A habɔɔ hɛɛ ba jema."
Asɛ o berɛ ŋɔ, "Akai! Maa sɛh he sarame n nakpale bwa." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ta gelɛ n sarame he nakpale aa, amɔ n ne he toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa."
Anee o berɛ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, amɔ dɛ gɛɛ te naa, bɛ n nakpale gbo sarame ɔ. Den sarame n nɔɔra ne n nyu bwa ja."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Nɛn waa sɔ nee la, dɛ nakpale laa o ba sarame aa, waa berɛ sɔ nee kpa, dɛkalkɛ doŋa toole o nɛ. Anomanta doŋa toole he bɛlbwa nɛ, nemenɛ he bini beŋkpoŋ."
Dɛ Yeesu te jemɛ naate waa dɛ nyin o leo tɛ. A waa o tɔ sie ŋɔ doŋa toole ba bɛlbwa nɛ, nemenɛ ba bini beŋkpoŋ la.
Waa sarame ba bwa nakpale tonɛ la, o berɔ kpɔ o batakaare la do dɛ berɛ ka so o soŋnibɔr, asɛ dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He jemɛ waa aa bala asɛ n ɛ heyaa gɛ nɔ naa?
He dɛ yer mɛ he dɔɔ kɛɛ he nomoa aa, a ŋwɛnɛ taa, dɛkalkɛ gɛɛ a do.
Too, taraken he dɔɔ kɛɛ he nomoa aa sarame he nakpale nɔ, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ he gee sarame dɔŋa kwa.
Anɔ maa ɛa nɔ chɔ le dɛ tɛ heya, hé nyiŋa dɛ gee ɛ a dɔŋa.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, yom ta o dɔɔ gwaalɛ, torome ge ta nɛn waa tomɔ gwaalɛ.
Dɛ he jemɛ gɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ ɛa ge te naa, hɛɛ na somee.
"He bwa waa laa mɛɛ bol, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n jemɛ banɔ la maa lee ba. Anɔ gelɔ waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ 'N dansom n ne waa pɛ nɔn di kondikwaa la, onee ɛɛ mɛ dɔm.'
N pu sie dɛɛ bagle heyaa mɔɔ asɛ dɛ gɛ waa nɔ baa ba naa, he jemɛ dɛ yarada kɛ menee Kristo la.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, nomɛlbwa maa tomɔ asɛ he lɛo la, dɛ menee he lɛ. Gɛɛ nomɛlbwa waa lɛɛ mɛ la ge, dɛ naate waa tom mɛ laanee o lɛ."
Yeesu aa bol gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ la, o bambile chɔgɔ kohona, o ta wobɛlbwa kpɔe sɔɔh ba kpa, dɛ ŋɔ, "Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, he bini bɛlee dɛ lee mɛ tɛ."
O habɔteŋra la ta wone jemɛ naate waa dɛ bol o wa, dɛ nyiŋi dɔŋa sie.
Dɛ ba bini bɛl Yeesu aa dɛ nyinu kohona la sogo kpagɔ.
Belaa Seemɔn Pita lɔ sie o be ŋɔ ó bɔɔro ó bagle ba bini bɛl waa ŋɔa.
Anee o kpɔ o te pɛl Yeesu dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ya bini umee yɔ?"
Asɛ o chaŋe ŋɔ, "Nɛn maa dɛ ba paanoo kpɔe li dɔr tɛo la, onee dɛ lee mɛ tɛ." Belaa o kpɔ paanoo li dɔr dɛ kpɔ do Seemɔn Eskareɔt bie Judas nɔn ta.
Waa tɛr nɔn dɛ lɛ paanoo la la, Bɔnsam den ba so o nɛ. Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir ka ɛ waa haa dɛ ba ɛɛ la warane."
Nɛra baa soga ja o nɛɛ tig ta bela la ta waa waa bola la mun noɛ.
Dɛ Judasee chɔ ba suuga bwa nyoa. Anomanta dɛ ba bini bane dɛ lii kɛ Yeesu ken dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó ka nyin tɔpejen la kondikwa. Dɛ gɛ laa ge aa, amɔ o ken ŋɔ ó ka tɛ nyaara suuga.
Judas aa lɛ paanoo la dɛ di tonɛ la, o den le ba be bela kaa. Dɛ jwaanaa.
Waa kaala la, Yeesu ŋɔ ba be, "Korowii tɛ n Nɛn Bie la jirima name, asɛ a che n nɛɛ o ge dɔ jirima.
Dɛ a chegɛ n nɛɛ Korowii dɔ jirima aa, aa che o nɛɛ n ge dɔ jirima, dɛ dɔa taraken.
N bii, maa he be bonɔɔ bigri bɛlbwa. Hɛɛ baa nyin n bɔree. Gɛ maa bol Juda tena nomonome be laanee mɛɛ bol he be la. Anee kɛŋɔ haa won ba bela maa kaa la.
N dɛ do heyaa wefala ta. Anee kɛŋɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa. Gɛ maa nyin heyaa la, gɛɛ chɛ kɛŋɔ he gee nyin dɔŋa.
Dɛ he dɛ nyin dɔŋa aa, aa geloo nɛra bwa jemɛ kpela kɛŋɔ he ɛ n habɔteŋra."
Anee Seemɔn Pita pɛɛro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, leperaa hɛɛ kaalɔ?" Asɛ Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "Taraken nɔ, haa won teŋɛ n nɛɛ la bela maa dɛ kaa nɔ, kɛ he ta ɛɛ ba ti mɛɛ."
Belaa o pɛɛro ja ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ɛrɛ waa maa wola won teŋɛ he nɛɛ taraken ɔ? Dɛ seo kwaraa yaa, mɛɛ koh he waa sewɛ."
Anee Yeesu berɛ bɔɔ ŋɔ, "Kpelaa kɛŋɔ hɛɛ won koh n waa sewaa? Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, jabal-logle ne sii dɛ he tɔɔh kera atoro ŋɔ haa men jemɛ kwaraa."
Yeesu berɔ ŋɔ, "He bɛ gel he bambile chɔg! Hɛ́ɛ yarada Korowii asɛ dɛɛ yarada n ge.
Deene lɔ n Mɛɛ Korowii dem taeh. Dɛ gɛ laa a do aa, n fe aa he bee ŋɔ n dɛ la ka kwaa sobɔr cheg heyaa bela.
Dɛ n kaa kwaa bɔr cheg heyaa bela aa, mɛɛ berɔɔ ba asɛ dɛ ba kpɔ heyaa kaa bela maa lole, asɛ bela maa so la, hé ge do bela.
He jemɛ bela maa dɛ ba kaala la ŋwɛnɛ."
Anee Tɔmas pɛɛro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, aah yaa wola bela haa dɛ kaa jemɛ nɔ, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba wona jemɛ ŋwɛnɛ dɛ́ ba he be bela ɔ?"
Belaa o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Menee ŋwɛnɛ, menee kasinteŋ, menee mkpa. Dɛ nomɛlbwa ɛɛ la n Mɛɛ la bee yaa, nemenɛ ó che n nɛ.
He fe jem mɛ kɛrɛdɛ naa, he fe jemɛ n Mɛɛ la ge. Taraken he jemɔ. Onee he na la."
Anee Felep ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, bagle yaa he Mɛɛ la, ásɛ ya baah sɔɔh yaa."
Asɛ Yeesu chaŋe ŋɔ, "N ne haa lole le saŋ la bwa nɔ, amɔ he ta wone jem mɛ mɔɔ naa, Felep? Nomɛlbwa waa na mɛ la, dɛ n Mɛɛɛ o na la. Ɛrɛɛ he berɛ ŋɔ ń bagle heyaa n Mɛɛ la nɔɔ?
Haa yarada kɛŋɔ n ne n Mɛɛ la pɛo dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ, o joo mɛ n ge joo kɛɛ? N waa maa bol la bwa ta n gbabir be leɛ. N Mɛɛ laanee joo mɛ asɛ dɛɛ ɛ o toma.
Hɛ́ɛ yarada mɛ kɛ maa ŋɔa ŋɔ, n jo n Mɛɛ asɛ o ge joo mɛ la. Dɛ gɛ laa ge aa, hé yarada mɛ n nyokpowe-ɛɛla la wa.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, nomɛlbwa waa yarada mɛ la, wɛɛ ɛ n we-ɛɛla dɔŋa bwa soosiwii. Wɛɛ won dɛɛ ɛ anɔ la aa gwaa n kwaa nɔ kwaraa, dɛkalkɛ mɛɛ berɔɔ kaa n Mɛɛ be.
Asɛ komɛlbwa haa che n sɔn ta dɛ soŋe la, mɛɛ ɛo. Anɔ taa aa ba chega ń lɛ jirima tɛ n Mɛɛ Korowii.
Dɛ he chegɛ n sɔn ta soŋe komɛlbwa naa, mɛɛ ɛo.
"He dɛ nyin n wa aa, hɛ́ɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ n waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la taa.
Mɛɛ soŋe n Mɛɛ Korowiirii ó berɛ tɛ heyaa Habɔchekpaa ja wɛ́ɛ cha heya, dɛ soŋe dɛɛ tɛ heya, asɛ he ne o so saŋ bɛlbwa.

Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee. Wɛɛ geloo he jemɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa la. Nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire aa won yarada o Domadɛɛge wa, dɛkalkɛ baa won nao asɛ dɛ jemɔ. Kɛ he te jemɔ, dɛkalkɛ o ne heyaa lole, asɛ o so he nɛ.
N baa kaa laa, maa heyaa ta kɛ bilalbii, mɛɛ berɔɔ ba he be.
A ka tama, nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire aa men na kpa, kɛ he te ɛɛ na mɛɛ. Maa dɔ mkpa nomanta, he gee dɔ mkpaa.
Tɔpere la telaa, hɛɛ jemɔɔ kɛŋɔ n ne n Mɛɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ, bɛl aa wola won dagre o te o dɔŋ nɛ, asɛ n ne he ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ gɛ tenten.
Nomɛlbwa waa lɛ n waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta la, onee dɛɛ nyin mɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin mɛ la, n Mɛɛ la ɛɛ nyinuu, asɛ n ge nyin naate, dɛ kpɔ n te baglo."
Belaa Judas (Judas Eskareɔt la laa) pɛɛro ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba he te kpɔe bagle ya gbosoo, asɛ dɛ gel nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire nɔɔ?"
Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin mɛ la, wɛɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ n webagla la taa. N Mɛɛ ɛɛ nyinuu, n ne o bwa ba o be ya ne o so.
Nomɛlbwa waa wola men nyin la, waa n webagla ta teŋɛ. Waa haa dɛ no nɔ ta n be leɛ, a bwa le n Mɛɛ waa tom mɛ la be.
"N taa lɔ he be nɔɔ mɛɛ bol gɛ waa nɔ he be.
Korowii Domadɛɛge waa ɛ Habɔchekpaa la, onee n Mɛɛ ɛɛ ba toma ó che n sɔn ta ba dɛ ba bagle heyaa wobɛlbwa, dɛɛ lii heyaa anɔ la bwa n faa bol he be la.
Deŋnesɔɔhnaa n kpɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, n gbabir deŋnesɔɔhnaa. Harɛ nɔ ta deŋnesɔɔhna laa, anomanta he bɛ gel he bambile teŋe asɛ hɛɛ ɔmɛ.
"N bol he be he no kɛŋɔ 'Mɛɛ kaaloo asɛ dɛ berɛ ba he be.' Dɛ he fe dɛ nyin mɛ naa, he sie fe ɛɛ lɛo kɛŋɔ maa kaa n Mɛɛ be, dɛkalkɛ o gwaa mɛ.
N pu sie dɛɛ bol he be mɔɔ a ba ɛ gɛ, ásɛ dɛ a ɛ gɛ naa, he yarada mɛ.
N ne haa won bol waa kohona kpa, dɛkalkɛ harɛ nɔ ta kpegnɛn dɛ ba. O ta kpegri bɛlbwa dɔe n nɛ,
kɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa jemɛ kɛ n dɛ nyin n Mɛɛ la, a waa mɛɛ ɛ anɔ la bwa waa do mɛ ŋɔ ń ɛ la. Hé ir, yá le bonɔ."
Yeesu berɔ sɛg ba ŋɔ, "Menee konduule tenten waa dɛ nɔnɛ, asɛ n Mɛɛ gee paa la.
N kpale bɛlbwa waa wola nɔnɛ la, o teŋo dɛɛ ta, kɛ n kpale waa won nɔna la te, o dɛ kuu o nyoo ó won nɔnɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
A chegɛ waa maa bagle heyaa la ta he do kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ kpala baa kuu a nyoo a won nɔna kɛrɛdɛ la.
Hé kpɔ he te pɛl mɛ asɛ n ge lawɛ heyaa pɛl n te. Konduule kpale aa won nɔnɛ dɛ o ta o tenten ta choŋe. Gɛ tentenee dɛ he ta he te kpɔe pɛl mɛ naa, haa wola won ɛ wobɛlbwa.
"Menee konduule la, asɛ he gee o kpala. Dɛ he bɛlbwa choŋi n nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ asɛ n ge lawɔ pɛl n te naa, anee o won nɔnɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Dɛ he ta n nɛɛ chegɛ te naa, haa won ɛ wobɛlbwa.
Dɛ he bɛlbwa ta o te kpɔe pɛl mɛ naa, wɛɛ ɛo kɛŋɔ konduule kpale baa teŋo ta asɛ o hol la. Kpala aa do ken la, pae ba paa dɛɛ do nii ta, aa fuh.
He kpɔ he te pɛl mɛ asɛ n webagla ge do he liire bini naa, he dɛ soŋe komɛlbwa haa dɛ nyin aa, hɛɛ dɔɔ.
Dɛ he wono dɛɛ ɛ n Mɛɛ tetoowaa kɛŋɔ kpale waa dɛ nɔnɛ kɛrɛdɛ naa, wɛɛ dɔ jirimaa. Anee dɛ bagle kɛ n habɔteŋraa heyaa kpela.
"Gɛ n Mɛɛ la aa dɛ nyin mɛ laanee n gee nyin heya. Anomanta he bɛ he te laa kpɔ n nyina maa dɛ nyin heyaa la ta bwa.
He dɛ teŋɛ waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la ta naa, haa he tenee laa kpɔ n nyina maa dɛ nyin heyaa la ta, kɛŋɔ maa teŋɛ waa n Mɛɛ aa kpɔa tɛ mɛ la ta maa wola n te laa kpɔ o nyina ta la.
N bagle heyaa waa nɔ ásɛ he dɔ n silɛɛ dɔŋ, asɛ he sie lɛ ka tonɛ.
Waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa laanee la: Hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa gɛ maa dɛ nyin heyaa la.
Nyina bɛlbwa toole dɛ gwaa kɛŋɔ nɛn aa wona koh o daamanar waa dɛ sewɛ.
He dɛ teŋɛ n waa maa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la ta te naa, amɔ dɛ n daamanaree heya.
Maa heyaa n bonɔɔna yerɛ kpa, dɛkalkɛ bonɔɔ naa won jemɛ o nomoa waa bini. N daamanaree mɛɛ yerɛ heyaa name te, dɛkalkɛ n gelɔ he jemɛ wobɛlbwa maa noa dɛ le n Mɛɛ be.
He laa lee mɛ, menee le heya. Gɛ kpaldɛɛge aa dɛ nɔnɛ la, gɛɛ mɛɛ nyin kɛ he do, dɛɛ ɛ n Mɛɛ tetoowa, dɛ bɛ an gel bwa. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, komɛlbwa haa soŋe n sɔn ta la, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa.
Waa maa kpɔa dɛɛ tɛ heyaa laanee kɛŋɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa.
"Dɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire gbo hah heya aa, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ menee ba tɔ sie hah.
Dɛ he fe ɛ ba bini bane aa, ba fe ɛɛ nyin heyaa. Kɛ maa le heyaa le ba bini he ɛ n nɛra la waa ba hah heyaa la.
Hɛ́ɛ lii gɛ n faa bol he be ŋɔ, yom ta o dɔɔ gwaalɛ la. Dɛ ba ɛɛ mɛ hɔhɔrɔwa aa, gɛɛ baa ba he ge ɛɛ. Dɛ ba teŋɛ n webagla ta naa, baa teŋɛ he ge kwaa ta gɛɛ.
Anɔ bwaa baa ba n waa koeh dɛɛ ɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa naate waa tom mɛ la jemɛ.
N fe ta balɛ dɛ ba bol waa chag ba aa, ba fe aa bolchɔgee di. Kɛ taraken baa noa dɛ laa ba liire kpɔ a ta nomanta, ba ta nyoa dɔe dɛ́ bol le kpa.
Bɛlbwa waa hah mɛ la, dɛ o hah n Mɛɛ la ge.
Dɛ n fe ta waa nɛwɛnyini bɛlbwa aa wola ɛɛ ka ɛ ba siwi ta te naa, ba fe aa bolchɔgee di. Kɛ ba na n nyokpowe-ɛɛla bwa, dɛ garɛ hah n ne n Mɛɛ bwa.
Anɔ ɛ gɛ ásɛ waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛ kpela kɛŋɔ, 'Ba hah mɛ pɛɛ.'
"Mɛɛ tomɛ Habɔchekpaa laanee o le n Mɛɛ be dɛ ba he be. Onee Korowii Domadɛɛge waa dɛ bagle Korowii kasinteŋ waa la. Dɛ o balaa, onee dɛ ɛ n danseɛ.
He gee bol n waa bagle nɛra, dɛkalkɛ chɔɔ bwaa n ne he do le.
"N bagle heyaa waa nɔ bwa, asɛ wobɛlbwa bɛ won gel he le habɔɔ.
Nɛra ɛɛ doŋi heyaa cheremi deene binii, asɛ a ba saŋ bɛl kɛŋɔ bá kpoo heya, dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii tetoowaa baa ɛ gɛ la.
Anɔ bwaa baa ba heyaa ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa n ne n Mɛɛ jemɛ.
N bol waa nɔ he be, ásɛ dɛ a baa ba gɛ naa, he won lii dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ n fa bol he be. N faa lɔ he be la waa maa wola he be bolɛ chɔɔ bwa la.
"Taraken mɛɛ berɔɔ kaa Naate waa tom mɛ la be, kɛ he bini bɛlbwa ta men bɔɔrɛ bela maa dɛ ba kaala.
Maa bol gɛ waa nɔ he be nomanta, he tea bini chɔgɔ.
Kasinteŋii mɛɛ bol he be la, a wer tɛ heyaa kɛ ń kaa. Dɛ n ta kaalaa, Habɔchekpaa la aa he bee ba. Kɛ dɛ n baa kaalaa, mɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba he be.
Dɛ o balaa, wɛɛ di nɛra kasinteŋii dɛ gel ba jemɛ waa aa ɛ wechɔga, ne waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi, ne gɛ Korowii bole pae waa aa doa.
Wɛɛ di ba kasinteŋii ba wechɔga ɛɛ ta, dɛkalkɛ baa men yarada,
dɛ di ba kasinteŋ waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi la ta, kaala maa dɛ kaa n Mɛɛ be haa wola men na kpa la nomanta.
Wɛɛ di ba kasinteŋii Korowii bole pae la ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii bol harɛ nɔ ta kpegnɛn la waa dɛ pao bolchɔge.
"N fe dɔ waa kohona dɛ́ bol bagle heya, kɛ aa gwaa he nɛɛ kɛ he won no a mun bug nɔ ta.

Kɛ dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa dɛ chagle Korowii kasinteŋ waa la balaa, wɛɛ pili wobɛlbwa binii tɛ heyaa hé no a mun. O gbabir nyu bini waa laa wɛɛ ba bola bagle heya. Anɔ la waa noa le Korowii be laanee wɛɛ ba bola, dɛ chagle heyaa waa a taa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala.
Onee dɛ tɛ mɛ jirima, dɛkalkɛ on dɛ kpɔ n wobɛlbwa dɛ ba bol he be.
Komɛlbwa n Mɛɛ la aa dɔa la ɛ n kon. A waa n ŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee dɛ kpɔ n wobɛlbwa dɛ bol he be la.
"A ka tamaa ken haa men na kpa, asɛ a berɔ ɛ tama ge aa, he na mɛ ja."
O habɔteŋra la bane bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "O waa nɔ waa dɛ bol nɔ munii ɛrɔɔ? O ŋɔ, a ka tama yaa on na, asɛ a berɔ ɛ tama ge aa, ya nao ja, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, o Mɛɛ la bee wɛɛ kaa waa yaa wola on na kpa la."
Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ 'a ka tama' nɔ waa bola nɔ ɛɛ bagle ɔ? Yaa a mun jemɛ!"
Belaa Yeesu aa jema kɛŋɔ ba dɛ nyin ba bɔɔro gɛ wobol la mun la, o ŋɔ, "Amɔ maa ŋɔa ŋɔ a ka tama haa men na, asɛ a berɔ ɛ tama ge aa, he na mɛ ja nɔ, a waa hɛɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa a mun nɔ naa?
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, he loo ɛɛ kuu he wi, asɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire sie lɛ. He tea bini ɛɛ chɔgoo, kɛ he tebinichɔg la ɛɛ berɛ heyaa silɛɛ.
Dɛ lol tea lɔ haah naa, o tea bini dɛ chɔg, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o bonyɛga saŋ telo. O baa lolɛ tonaa, o dɛ soh o bonyɛga la asɛ o sie berɛ lɛ kɛŋɔ waa lolɛ bie do harɛ ta la.
Gɛɛ a do he ge be. Taraken te, he tea bini chɔgɔ, kɛ maa berɛ ba na heyaa la taa he sie ɛɛ ba lɛɛ kohona. Gɛ silɛɛ la, nomɛlbwa aa won lɛ he be.
Tɔpere la telaa, haa men wobɛlbwaa bɔɔ kpa. Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, dɛ he soŋe komɛlbwa n Mɛɛ be naa, wɛɛ koh n waa dɛ tɛ heya.
He ta n sɔn kpɔe dɛ soŋe komɛlbwa bwa. Kɛ taraken te, hé kpɔ n sɔn soŋe, hɛɛ dɔɔ ásɛ he sie lɛ kohona.
"Anɔ maa bola bagle heyaa nɔ ɛ sɛgla, kɛ tɔpere bɛl dɛ ba bala maa wola heyaa sɛgle kpa. Mɛɛ bol n Mɛɛ la waa he bee dɛ pili a bini chasee ken.
Tɔpere la telaa, hɛɛ kpɔ n sɔnee soŋe Korowii. N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ n dɛ che he naa ta dɛ soŋe tɛ heya.
N Mɛɛ gbabir dɛ nyin heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he dɛ nyin mɛ, dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ o bee n le ba.
O bee n le dɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta, taraken n berɔ dɛɛ le bonɔ dɛ́ kaa o be."
Anee o habɔteŋra la ŋɔ, "Taraken te haa yaa sɛgle kpa. He dɛ pili waa bini chasee.
Ya nao name kɛŋɔ he jemɛ wobɛlbwa aa lɔ nɛn nyu bini mɔɔ wɛɛ pɛɛre. A ta chɛ kɛŋɔ bɛlbwa pɛɛre waane kpa. A gelɔ ya yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii bee he le."
Anee Yeesu bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He berɔ dɛɛ yarada mɛ taraken te naa?
Tɔpere bɛl dɛ ba, o joɔ tonɛ, he bwa dɛ ba chwae pegre kaa he deremi asɛ a ka n gbo. N ne n Mɛɛ aa lole saŋ bɛlbwa nomanta, aa n gbo kae ba.
A waa mɛɛ bagle heyaa waa nɔ ásɛ he dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna dɛ le pɛɛ n ne haa pɛa la ta la. Hɛɛ na hɔhɔrɔwaa harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ hé lawɛ bambile, dɛkalkɛ n fagɛ harɛ nɔ ta komɛlbwa nɛ."
Yeesu aa bol waa nɔ tonɛ la, o ha sie dɛ nyiŋi nyundua asɛ dɛ jam Korowii ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, tɔpere la telo. Tɛ men maa ɛ he Bie jirima ásɛ n ge won kpɔ jirima tɛɛ.
He tɛ mɛ kpegri nɛra bwa nɛ, asɛ n won kpɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe tɛ nɛra haa kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ la.
Banɔ la baa jemɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛ he gboo Korowii kasinteŋ la, dɛ berɛ jem mɛ kɛ menee Yeesu Kristo haa tomɔ la, banee dɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la.
N tɛɛ jirima harɛ nɔ ta kɛŋɔ maa tonɛ toma haa kpɔa do n nɔn ta ŋɔ ń ɛ la bwa.
Anomanta, n Mɛɛ, maa chegɛ he sie taraken nɔ, tɛ mɛ jirima n ne haa dɔa wubwa mɔɔ dɛ ta harɛ nɔ la.
"Nɛra haa lee ba le harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bini dɛ kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ la, n gelɔ ba jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Henee dɔɔ ba dɛ kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ, asɛ ba sɛh dɛɛ teŋɛ he waa la ta.
Taraken ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ komɛlbwa haa tɛ mɛ la, he bee a le.
N bol waa haa bag mɛ la bag ba, asɛ ba sɛh a ta. Ba jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ he bee n le ba, dɛ yarada kɛ henee tom mɛ.
N dɛ soŋe dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. Harɛ nɔ ta nɛra bwa laa n soŋe dɛɛ tɛ. Banɔ la haa kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ laanee n soŋe dɛɛ tɛ, dɛkalkɛ henee dɔɔ ba.
N komɛlbwa ɛ he kon, asɛ he ge komɛlbwa ɛ n kon. Ba waa n dɔ jirima.
N dɛ ba he be bela. Maa harɛ nɔ taa bigri, kɛ ba te ɛɛ ka harɛ nɔ taa. Anomanta, n Mɛdɛɛge, kpɔ sɔn haa tɛ mɛ la kpegri tɔ ba nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ ba ɛ beŋkpoŋ gɛ n ne haa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la.

N faa lɔ ba be la, n kpɔ sɔn haa tɛ mɛ la kpegri tɔ ba nɛ, ba bɛlbwa ta n nɔn ta nyogrɛ, nemenɛ onɔ la baa chwerɛ o waa he Tɔn bini ŋɔ wɛɛ nyogroo la, o gbosoroo nyogra, ásɛ he Tɔn bini waa la ɛ kpela.
"Taraken n berɔ dɛɛ ba he be bela, kɛ n taa lɔ harɛ ta nɔ, n dɛ bol waa nɔ ásɛ ba won dɔ silɛɛ maa dɔa la kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ.
Maa bol he Amanesoma la bag ba la, a gelɔ ba ta nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire nɛɛ jae kpa, gɛ maa wola ba nɛɛ jae la. Anomanta ba hah ba.
Maa soŋe ŋɔ hé laa ba kpɔ le harɛ nɔ ta, kɛ n dɛ soŋe ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ kee ba Bɔnsam nɛ.
Gɛ maa wola nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire nɛɛ jae la, gɛɛ ba ge aa wola ba nɛɛ jae.
Che he kasinteŋ waa la ta dɛ laa doŋa bɛlbwa kpɔ ba nɛɛ bá won ɛ he gbo nɛra. He waa ɛ kasinteŋ.
Gɛ haa tom mɛ harɛ nɔ ta la, gɛ tentenee n gee tom ba.
Ba nomanta n kpɔ n te tɛɛ dɛ ɛ he gbosoroo nɛn ásɛ ba ge gba won berɛ he gbosoroo nɛra, teŋa baa dɛ teŋɛ he kasinteŋ la ta nomanta.
"Ba gbo laa n soŋe dɛɛ tɛ. Nɛra baa ba che banɔ nɔ waa baa dɛ bol ta dɛ yarada mɛ la bwaa n soŋe dɛɛ tɛ.

N dɛ soŋe kɛ hé ɛ ba bwa beŋkpoŋ. N Mɛɛ, gɛ n ne haa ɛ beŋkpoŋ bɛl aa wola won dagre o te o dɔŋ nɛɛ la, gɛɛ mɛɛ soŋe kɛ ya ne ba won ɛ beŋkpoŋ ásɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire bwa won yarada kɛŋɔ henee tom mɛ.
Gɛ haa tɛ mɛ jirima laanee n ge tɛɛ ba ásɛ ba won ɛ beŋkpoŋ gɛ n ne haa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la.

N ne ba ɛ beŋkpoŋ, n ne he ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ, bɛl aa wola won dagre o te o dɔŋ nɛ aa, anee dɛ gel ba beŋkpoŋri la won che kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire la jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee tom mɛ dɛɛ nyin ba gɛ haa dɛ nyin mɛ la.
"N Mɛɛ, henee kpɔ ba tɛ mɛ. N dɛ nyin kɛ ba ja n nɛɛ bela maa lole ásɛ dɛ won na n jirima haa kpɔa tɛ mɛ. He tɔ sie nyin mɛ mɔɔ dɛ ta harɛ, a waa he tɛ mɛ jirima la.
N Mɛdɛɛge, nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire aa hen jemɛ, kɛ n te jemɛ, asɛ banɔ nɔ ge jemɛ kɛŋɔ henee tom mɛ.
N gelɔ ba jemɛ, mɛɛ geloo baa jemɛ, ásɛ ba won dɛɛ nyin dɔŋa gɛ haa dɛ nyin mɛ la, ásɛ n ne ba won pɛ."
Yeesu aa soŋe Korowii tonɛ la, o ne o habɔteŋra la leɔ dɛ ka le nenabɔɔ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kedrɔn. Dɛ ba du daa ane bela, asɛ ba ka jo a baah.
Dɛ Judas waa leo tɛ la jemɛ bela, dɛkalkɛ Yeesu ne o habɔteŋra la dɛ cheme bela warawara.
Anomanta Judas na Sɔfonomonome ne Farisii tena, asɛ ba tɛo soojare ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la bane. Asɛ ba kpɔ kandere ne kapɛle ne dɔmkwa, asɛ Judas kpɔ ba la daa la baah bela.
Dɛ Yeesu jemɛ waa aa dɛ ba o nɛɛ chiga bwa, anomanta o leɔ ka chem ba, asɛ dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ume bɔree hɛɛ nyin ɔ?"
Anee ba ŋɔ, "Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la bɔree yaa nyin." Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Menee nɔ!" Dɛ Judas waa le Yeesu tɛ la ja soojare la ne nɛra la nɛɛ ba che bela.
Yeesu aa ŋɔa men nɔ la, ba le habɔɔ dɛ chogli.
Belaa o berɛ kwaa pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ume bɔree hɛɛ nyin ɔ?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la."
Anee o ŋɔ, "N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ menee nɔ naa? Dɛ n bɔree hɛɛ nyin aa, amɔ hé gel nɛra baa ja n nɛɛ nɔ te kaa."
Gɛ aa ɛ asɛ waa o faa bola o Mɛɛ be la ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ o faa ŋɔa ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ, nɛra haa tɛ mɛ la bɛlbwa ta n nɔn ta nyogrɛ" la, a waa o bol gɛ.
Dɛ Seemɔn Pita dɔ kere o be bela. O pamɛ kere la dɛ ŋwɛnɛ Sɔfore Nomoa bonɔɔ dig deŋne dɛ laa cha. Gɛ bonɔɔ la sɔne Malkus.
Pita aa ɛ gɛ la, Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kpɔ kere la su o tɔɔ ta! N bɛ wahala n Mɛɛ aa chega ŋɔ ń na la na kɛɛ?"
Room soojare ne ba nomoa ne Juda tena baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea lawɛ Yeesu dɛ vɔrɔwo,
dɛ tɔ sie la o ne Anas be. Dɛ Kaefasee Sɔfore Nomoa a gɛ bena la ta. Dɛ o mo Anas bie.
A gɛ Kaefas nɔɔ fa ŋɔ Juda tena nomonome be ŋɔ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ lɛ nɛra bwa seo sewaa, a bɔ harɛbir bwa aa pagra la.
Baa dɛ kaa Yeesu ne la, Seemɔn Pita ne o dɔŋa habɔteŋra la bɛl teŋɛ o nɛ. Dɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la jeremee a gɛ habɔteŋre nɔ, anomanta o teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ jo Sɔfore Nomoa la dem bela.

Baa jo dem bela la, Pita te kaa jagɛ che dem la doonyoa. Dɛ tolo bɛlee dɛɛ daah doonyoa la. Asɛ Yeesu habɔteŋre la Sɔfore Nomoa la aa jemɔ la berɛ le buse dɛ ba bol waa tolo la be dɛ kpɔ Pita jo dem bela.
Belaa tolo la bɔɔ Pita ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ habɔteŋre laa hen aa?" Anee o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, o habɔteŋre laa men."
Dɛ waa lole, anomanta dɛ Sɔfore Nomoa bonɔɔna ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la do nii hɔla ta dɛ cheg dɛɛ ŋwee, asɛ Pita ka ja ba nɛɛ dɛ gee ŋwee.
Sɔfore Nomoa la bɔɔ Yeesu o habɔteŋra ne o webagla la wa.
Anee o ŋɔ, "Tɔpere bɛlbwaa mɛɛ bagla nɛra baah ta ba bwa ɛɛ no. Korowii Dea ne cheremi deene ya Juda tena bwa aa dɛ cheme a bini la, belaa mɛɛ bagla. N ta sɔeh dɛ bagle wobɛlbwa ge bwa.
Amɔ ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ bɔɔ mɛ gɛ nɔɔ? Bɔɔ nɛra baa noa la, banee dɛ jemɛ waa maa bag ba dɛ́ bagle."
Yeesu aa chaŋe waa la gɛ la, dɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la bonɔɔ bɛl chegɛ o jwɛɛh asɛ dɛ kpaa o lwɛɛma, dɛ kɔro ŋɔ, "Kenii chɛ kɛ he chaŋe Sɔfore Nomoa aa?"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Waa maa bola a ta magrɛ la, bagle nɛ́ra bwa no. Dɛ gɛ laa ge aa, n lɔe nɔ munii ɛrɔɔ?"
Asɛ Anas gel ba la Yeesu ne Sɔfore Nomoa Kaefas be, dɛ o nɔɔra ta vɔrɔwɔ gɛ.
Dɛ Seemɔn Pita ta chegɔ dɛɛ ŋwee nii la, asɛ ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Baa la habɔteŋra la bɛl laa hen aa?" Asɛ o tɔh pelepele ŋɔ, "Bɛl laa men!"
Dɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la bonɔɔ Pita aa ŋwɛnɛ o deŋne dɛ laa cha la lole bɛl lɔ dem bela. O bɔɔrɔ ŋɔ, "Kɛ dɛ he ja baa la nɛra la nɛɛ daa la baah bela laɔ?"
Anee o tɔh ja ŋɔ, "Akai!" Bug la taa jabal si.

Tomun aa dɛ kpɔ la, Juda tena nomonome la kpɔ Yeesu la Kaefas be dɛ ba o ne Room nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi ba harɛ ta la be koodem. Dɛ Galekaa tɔpere telo, anomanta Juda tena nomonome la te ta dem bela joɛ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba jo bela aa, baa kah doŋaa baa wola won di Galekaa kondikwaa la.
Baa vɛh bela joe la, ba harɛ nomoa Paelet leɔ ba ba be, dɛ ba bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa o ɛ aa wola magrɛ hɛɛ bɔɔro wɔ?"
Anee ba chaŋe ŋɔ, "Dɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ laa aa, ya fe ta o ne he be balɛ."
Asɛ Paelet ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé gbabir kpɔɔ kaa ka bol o waa gɛ he mmara aa dɛ chagle." Anee ba ge chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ya ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛŋɔ yá bol nɛn waa dɛ pao bolchɔge bá kpoo."
Gɛ waa nɔ chigo ásɛ nɛra jemɛ kɛ Yeesu waa waa bola dɛ bagle seo la soo waa dɛ ba sewa la ɛ kpela.
Asɛ Paelet berɛ jo o koodem bela, dɛ yerɛ Yeesu ba o be, dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Henee Juda tena kooro ɛ?"
Belaa o chaŋo ŋɔ, "He gbagbaa na waa nɔ dɛɛ bɔɔ mɛ kɛɛ nɛra banee bol n waa he be nɔ?"
Anee Paelet ŋɔ, "Haa na mɛ nɔ, Juda tee men aa? He gbagba bwɛɛ tena ne he Sɔfonomonomee ba he ne n be. Bɔkwa wechɔgaa he ɛɔ?"
Asɛ Yeesu chaŋo ŋɔ, "Harɛ ta bonɔ laa mɛɛ di kora. Dɛ harɛ ta bonɔɔ mɛɛ di kora aa, n nɛra fe aa sɛh bá kpɔ mɛ tɛ Juda tena, ba fe ɛɛ yoo lɛɛ mɛ. Kɛ harɛ ta bonɔ kora laa mɛɛ di."

Yeesu aa ŋɔ gɛ la, anee Paelet bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Amɔ kooroo hen kpela kenɛ?" Asɛ o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Henee ŋɔa kooroo men. Kasinteŋ bola waa ba lol mɛ. A waa n ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ́ ba bol kasinteŋ la nɛra bwa be. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin kasinteŋ la, on dɛɛ no n be."
Anee Paelet ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa gee kasinteŋ nɔɔ?" Waa bol gɛ la, o berɔ le dɛ ka ŋɔ Juda tena la be ŋɔ, "N ta waa maa che a ta pao bolchɔge nae,
kɛ gɛ he Juda tena yon gel n foo wechɔg-ɛɛ beŋkpoŋ dɛɛ ta he Galekaa kondikwaa tɔpere ta la, ń foo Juda tena kooro nɔ ta gɛ kɛɛ?"
Belaa ba bwa nyɛg kohona ŋɔ, "Bɛ on foo! Foo Barabas!" Dɛ gɛ Barabas nɔ, ŋwɛɛree.
Belaa Paelet gel o soojare ka lawɛ Yeesu, dɛ lɔɔro bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra ne.
Ba koh o baah mugla waa dɛ kpɔ sɔɔhne sɔh koogbɛrɛ piu, dɛ kpɔ yaswɛm bɛl o do kɛŋɔ ba bela koranar wur ken dɛ doo.
Dɛ ba dɛ ba o be dɛɛ si, "Woowo, Juda tena kooro!" dɛɛ kpaa o lwɛrɛme.
Baa ɛo gɛ la, Paelet le buse ja dɛ ba ŋɔ Juda tena la be ŋɔ, "Hɛ́ɛ no bonɔ, mɛɛ le o ne busee tɛ heya, ásɛ he jemɛ kɛ n ta wobɛlbwa o nɛɛ nae dɛ́ che a ta dɛ pao bolchɔge."
Anomanta o gelɔ Yeesu le buse, dɛ sɔɔhne koogbɛrɛ piu, asɛ o do wurswɛm la. Asɛ Paelet ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Onee la."

Sɔfonomonome ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la aa nao la, ba kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Gel ba kpoo! Gel ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!" Anee Paelet chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Hé gbagba ba kpɔɔ ka kpaa pɛl dagagre ta. N te ta wobɛlbwa o nɛɛ nae dɛ́ che a ta dɛ gel ba kpoo."
Belaa Juda tena la berɛ chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ya dɔ mmara bɛl waa dɛ bagle kɛ o chɛ kpoe, dɛkalkɛ o dɛ yerɛ o te Korowii Bie."
Paelet aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, a taa o berɛ ɔmɛ kohona kwara.
Anomanta o berɔ jo koodem bela, asɛ dɛ ka bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Lepetenee he leɔ?" Kɛ o ta on chaŋɛ.
Anee o berɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Haa men chaŋe kɛɛ? Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ n dɔ kpegri dɛ won gel ba foori ta, dɛ berɛ won gel ba kpaare pɛl dagagre ta kɛɛ?"
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Korowiirii sɛah dɛ gel he dɔ kpegri n nɛ. O fe ta sɛɛh yaa, he fe ta kpegri dɔe n nɛ. Nɛn waa lee mɛ tɛ dɛ gel he dɔɔ mɛ la wechɔga gwaa he kwa."

Paelet aa no gɛ la, dɛ o dɛ nyin ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ fee kpɔ Yeesu ta ó kaa. Ate nɛnlaa la kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yerɛ o te kooro la ɛ Room Koojen Siisa dɔm! Anomanta dɛ he kpɔ baa nɔ ta aa, amɔ dɛ Room Koojen la dɔmee hen!"
Paelet aa no gɛ la, o kpɔ Yeesu le buse dɛ ba so bela waa soga dɛɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la. Bwea nee ba mao o ir nyundua. Juda tena dɛ yerɛ bela Gabata.
Awola la ɛ tɔpere Juda tena bwa aa dɛ kpɔ ba te dɛ daa kondikwaa dɛɛ cheg dɛ́ won di Ona Tɔpere waa lɔ ba Galekaa la ta la. Dɛ wee tel nyufala tonɛ, asɛ Paelet ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He kooro laanee la!"

Anee ba nyɛg kohona ŋɔ, "Gel ba kpoo! Gel ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta!" Asɛ Paelet bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "He kooro gbabirii he ŋɔ ń gel ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta naa?" Anee Sɔfonomonome la chaŋo ŋɔ, "Ya ta kooro bɛlbwa dɔe ka ja Koojen Siisa nɛ!"
Ate Paelet kpɔ Yeesu tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ka kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta. Asɛ soojare la kpɔɔ kaa.
Ba kpɔɔ le koodem bela dɛ gel o che dagagre baa dɛ ba o kpaara pɛl o ta la dɛ ba tel bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Nyuhog Bɔr, asɛ Juda tena gee yerɛ bela Gɔlgɔta.
Baa tel bela la, ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre la ta. Ba kpaa nɛra banɛ ja o nɛ, bɛl do o dig ta, asɛ bɛl ge do o gal ta, asɛ o do ba bwa baah ta.
Belaa Paelet gel ba chwerɛ waane ka pɛl Yeesu dagagre la nyundua. Waa baa chwera laanee kɛ, |scJUDA TENA KOORO YEESU WAA LE NASARƐT LAANEE LA|d.
Dɛ bela ne Jerusalam aa jaŋɛ, anomanta Juda tena kɛrɛdɛ bwa na gɛ waa la dɛ kura. Ba chwera Juda tena wobol ne Room tena wobol ne Grik tena wobol ta.
Anomanta Juda tena Sɔfonomonome la ŋɔ Paelet be ŋɔ, "Gɛ haa chwera ŋɔ, 'Juda tena kooroo on' nɔ aa were. Chwerɛ ŋɔ 'Onee ŋɔa Juda tena kooroo on.' "
Anee Paelet chaŋe ŋɔ, "N te dɔɔ chwerɛ tonɛ."
Soojare la aa kpaa Yeesu pɛl dagagre ta tonɛ la, ba bɔne o laala bini bɔre anaarɛ, asɛ bɛlbwa kpɔ beŋkpoŋ. Kɛ o batakaare waa doo lɔga la te, ba sɔɔh kombir, ba ta bobɛlbwa nyarɛ pɛ.

Anomanta soojare la ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "He bɛ gel ya kɛɛro. Hé gel ya ta chacha, naate waa di la ó kpɔ." Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Baa kpɔ n laalaa bɔne dɔŋa, dɛ ta chacha dɛ́ na naate waa di n batakaare." Gɛ baa chwera laanee soojare la ɛ, dɛ gel a ɛ kpela.
Dɛ Yeesu nya ne Yeesu nyajen ne Kliopas haah Mɛɛre ne Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la chegɛ Yeesu dagagre la jwɛɛh bela.
Yeesu aa na o nya ne o habɔteŋre waa dɛ nyinu kohona la kɛŋɔ baa chegɛ dɔŋa jwɛh, asɛ o ŋɔ o nya be ŋɔ, "N nya, he biee la,"
dɛ ŋɔ o habɔteŋre la ge be ŋɔ, "He nyaa la." Le awola la, o habɔteŋre la lawɛ Mɛɛre kaa o dem o ka so o be.
A habɔɔ Yeesu aa naa kɛŋɔ o wobɛlbwa tonɔ la, o ŋɔ, "Nyɔgre dɛ kpo mɛ," ásɛ waa aa lɔ Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛ kpela.
Dɛ vii bɛl ne sennyɛga chegɛ bela, asɛ ba kpɔ komɛl kɛŋɔ yabii vɔwɛ daa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ hesop dajaŋ ta, dɛ kpɔ li sennyɛga la dɛ kpɔ su o nyoa ó nyɔ.
Yeesu aa nyɔa tonɛ la, o ŋɔ, "A tonɔ," asɛ dɛ gure o nyu dɛ gel o doma le, o sewɛ.

Dɛ awola tɔpere la ɛ tɔpere Juda tena aa dɛ kpɔ ba te, dɛkalkɛ tɔɔ peraa dɛ ba jo Ona Tɔpere waa ɛ ba tɔpejen tenten la ta. Dɛ baa nyin kɛŋɔ Yeesu ne nɛra la sagɛ ka tel tɔpejen la ta. Anomanta ba kaa soŋe Paelet ŋɔ ó gel soojare kuugi ba nakpale bá sewɛ warane, ásɛ ba dɔ bɔr laa ba kpɔ dagagre la ta.
Baa soŋe ŋwɛnɛ la, soojare la kaa kuugi nɛra la baa kpaa ba ne Yeesu pɛl dagagre ta la, nakpale.
Baa tel Yeesu be la, ba nao kɛŋɔ o te dɔɔ sewɛ, anomanta ba ta o te nakpale kuuge.
Kɛ soojare la bɛl kpɔ lampea dɛ yagɛ Yeesu loŋi ta. Bug la ta, chal ne nee le.
Naate waa di waa nɔ danseɛ la naa siwi ne, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ kasinteŋii, dɛɛ bola ásɛ he ge no dɛ yarada.
Anɔ gelɔ waa baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Baa o hog beŋkpoŋ kwaraa ku" la ɛ kpela.
Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn la bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "Baa nyiŋi nɛn baa yagɔ lampea ne laanee."

Anɔ bwa habɔɔ la, baa bɛl waa le Arimatea baa yerɔ Josef la Paelet be dɛ ka soŋo Yeesu lale. Dɛ a gɛ Josef nɔ dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ, kɛ o koh Juda tena ɔma waa dɛɛ sɔh o te a gɛ bɔr. Paelet tɛo ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ ó ka kpɔ lale la kaa, asɛ o ka kpɔɔ kaa.

Nikodeemɔs waa la Yeesu be jwaana bɛl la, o ne Josefoo la Yeesu hugribɔr bela. Nikodeemɔs la konsɔɔhsoma baa kpɔa dɛɛ fɔgle ba lala ne bela. A kan dɛ do tɔgre dɛ ɛ men baa kpɔa dɛ ɛ paanoo la baage del.
Ba nɛra banɛ la kpɔ Yeesu lale la dɛ kpɔ konsɔɔhsoma la fɔglo, dɛ kpɔ yapoŋ vɔrɔwo, gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ ɛ ba lala dɛɛ hug ba la.
Bela baa kpo Yeesu la, dɛ ba du daa ane bela, asɛ ba forɛ lalbɔɔ bwe bɛl ta kɛŋɔ dea ken. Dɛ ba ta nomɛlbwa o bini huge bwa.
Dɛ lalbɔɔ la bɛne bela, asɛ ba Ona Tɔpere ge telo tonɛ, anomanta ba denɔ kpɔ Yeesu ka huge o bini.
Tomun aa dɛ kpɔ Kwasiara la, Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la la bela baa huge Yeesu la, dɛ ka na kɛŋɔ bwe baa kpɔa tɔ bɔɔ la nyoa la le o nyoa.
Waa na gɛ la, o chwao la Seemɔn Pita ne o dɔŋ Yeesu aa dɛ nyinu kohona la be dɛ ka ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ba laa ya Dɔɔ kpɔ lalbɔɔ la bini, yaa jemɛ bela baa kpɔɔ bil."
Pita ne o dɔŋ habɔteŋre la iro dɛ la bela baa huge Yeesu la.
Dɛ chwae baa chwa, asɛ Pita dɔŋ la chwa warane dɛ felu tel bɔɔ la ta.
O boŋɔ haah dɛ na yapoŋ la chɔe, kɛ o ta lalbɔɔ la bini tenten joɛ.
Belaa Pita waa ka mun la ba dɛ ba jo bɔɔ la bini, dɛ na yapoŋ la bela,
dɛ na yapoŋ baa kpɔa vɔwɛ o nyu la kɛŋɔ waa gula chɔ pera.
Belaa Yeesu habɔteŋre waa tɔ sie tel bela la ge berɛ jo lalbɔɔ la bini, dɛ na a bwa. Waa naa la, o den yarada.
Dɛ ba ta waa aa lɔ Korowii Tɔn bini bobɛl dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ Yeesu ir seo ta la mun noɛ mɔɔ.
Yeesu habɔteŋra la berɛ kaa ba deremi.
Kɛ dɛ Mɛɛre te ta chegɛ bɔɔ la nyoa dɛɛ wi. Waa dɛ wi la, o boŋɔ dɛ haah lalbɔɔ la bini,
asɛ dɛ na nyundua toroma banɛ. Ba do kompoŋa so bela baa kpɔ Yeesu lale bil la. Bɛl soge o nyu bɔr, asɛ bɛl so o nakpale bɔr.
Belaa nyundua toroma la bɔɔro ŋɔ, "N nya, bɔkwa waa hɛɛ wi ken nɔ?" Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Ba kpɔ n Dɔɔ kaa. Maa jemɛ bela baa kpɔɔ ka bil."
Waa bol gɛ tonɛ dɛ berɛ o te, dɛ Yeesuu chega, kɛ o ta jemɛ kɛ onee.

Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "N nya, bɔkwa waa bala hɛɛ wi ken nɔ? Ume bɔree hɛɛ nyin ɔ?" Dɛ Mɛɛre dɛ lii kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi daa baa dua bela la ta laanee, anomanta o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Nomoa, dɛ henee ba kpɔ n Dɔɔ kaa laa, hé gel n jemɛ bela haa kpɔɔ ka bil, ásɛ dɛ la ka kpɔɔ."
Anee Yeesu yerɔ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛre." Asɛ o berɛ sie o be dɛ kpɔ Juda tena wobol ŋɔ, "Raboni!" (o munii Nomoa), dɛ ka lawɔ kpoŋe.
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "Kpɔ mɛ ta, n ta n Mɛɛ be laŋɛ mɔɔ. Kaa ka ŋɔ n nimanar be ŋɔ, 'N berɔ dɛɛ kaa nyundua n ne he bwa Mɛɛ waa ɛ ya bwa Korowii la be.' "
Asɛ Mɛɛre waa le Magdala la la Yeesu habɔteŋra la be dɛ ka ŋɔ, "N na ya Dɔɔ la!" O bol waa Yeesu aa bola la ba be.

Awola Kwasiara la jwaana la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la cheme dea bɛl bini. Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ Juda tena, anomanta ba tɔɔge gbeni la dɛ laa karɛ ba nɛ. Belaa ba ŋɔ ba nyiŋi, dɛ Yeesu baa che ba baah dɛ ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛ heyaa bambisɔɔhna."
Waa bol gɛ la, o kpɔ o nɔɔra ne o loŋi bag ba, asɛ ba sie lɛ kohona kɛŋɔ baa na ba Dɔɔ la.
Yeesu berɔ bol ja ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛ heyaa bambisɔɔhna. Gɛ n Mɛɛ aa tom mɛ la, gɛɛ n gee tomɛ heya."
Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o hweero ta ba nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Hé lɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la.
Dɛ he ŋɔ Korowii kpɔ nɛra wechɔga kɛ ba aa, wɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛ ba, kɛ dɛ he ŋɔ Korowii bɛ nɛra wechɔga kpɔ kɛ ba aa, aa do ba nɛɛ."
Dɛ Tɔmas baa dɛ yerɔ Kpar o ɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la bini bɛl la toole o bala la be gɛ saŋ Yeesu aa ba bela la.

Anomanta dɛ ba dɛ bol o be ŋɔ, "Ya na ya Dɔɔ la." Asɛ o chaŋ ba ŋɔ, "Dɛ n te ta dadowɛre la buge aa lɔ o nɔɔra ta la nae, dɛ kpɔ n nonii do bela, dɛ berɛ kpɔ n nɔn do o loŋi bela baa kpɔ lampea yagɛ la aa, maa waa nɔɔ yarada."
A yawanyoa la, Yeesu habɔteŋra la berɔ ba cheme dea la bini ja, dɛ Tɔmas ja ba nɛ. Ba kagre dea la gbeni, kɛ Yeesu baa jo che ba baah, dɛ ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛ heyaa bambisɔɔhna!"
Asɛ dɛ ŋɔ Tɔmas be ŋɔ, "Kpɔ he nonii ba do n nɔɔra bɔɔne la ta, dɛ kpɔ he nɔn do n loŋi bɔɔ la ge ta, dɛɛ yarada mɛ, dɛ gel aahna-aahna la haa dɛ ɛ la."
Asɛ Tɔmas ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, n Korowii!"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Haa na mɛ nɔ waa he yarada mɛ nɔ kɛɛ? Nɛra baa wola men nae dɛ yarada mɛ la, ba na som."
Nyokpowaa Yeesu aa ɛa o habɔteŋra la siwi ta warɔ taeh. A bwa laa n chwerɛ do tɔn nɔ bini.
Kɛ n chwerɛ anɔ ásɛ he che a ta dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ bao la, onee Korowii Bie la, ásɛ a che he yarada haa dɛ yaradao la ta he dɔ Korowii mkpa.
A habɔɔ la, Yeesu kpɔ o te ba bagle o habɔteŋra la Tibeerias Moo la ta ja. Kenii a ɛ ba nao.
Dɛ o habɔteŋra Seemɔn Pita ne Tɔmas baa dɛ yerɔ Kpar la, ne Nataaneɛl waa le Keena waa lɔ Galilia harɛ ta, ne Sebedii bii, ne ba bini banɛ pɛo so.
Asɛ Seemɔn Pita ŋɔ o bala la be ŋɔ, "N dɛ la ń ka ta asau." Anee ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ te ya ne hɛɛ lao." Asɛ ba bwa ka jo gbera bini dɛ ka ɛ toma aaa tɔɔ ba per, dɛ ba ta komɛlbwa dɔe.
Tɔ aa pera la, dɛ Yeesu chegɛ nee nyoa bela, kɛ o habɔteŋra la aa nao la, ba ta jemɛ kɛ onee.
Belaa o yer ba ŋɔ, "Bwɛɛla, he ta pɛŋa dɔe yaa?" Anee ba ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, ya ta komɛlbwa dɔe."
Asɛ o ŋɔ, "Hé ta asau la ta gbera la dig bɔr, hɛɛ dɔ anee." Belaa ba ta do bela, asɛ asau la lawɛ pɛŋa kohona, ba ta wone tɛro do gbera la bini.
Anee Yeesu habɔteŋre waa dɛ nyinu kohona la ŋɔ Pita be ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔree." Dɛ Seemɔn Pita foo o batakaare bil. Waa noa kɛŋɔ ba Dɔɔree la, o berɛ kpɔ do, dɛ le nee la ta.
Asɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la kar la tawɛ gbera la dɛ tɛr asau la ne pɛŋa la teŋɛ dɛ ba ta baŋ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba ne baŋ aa jaŋɛ kohona. Wɛɛ ɛ nagale lafaa.
Baa baa chuge la, ba na hɔla nii asɛ pɛŋe dawɛ a doa, asɛ paanoo chɔ bela.
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé kpɔ pɛŋa haa lawa la ane ba."
Belaa Seemɔn Pita ka jo gbera la bini dɛ tɛr asau la le baŋ, dɛ pɛŋejena su o bwa. A lɔ lafa fifraanue dɛ atoro, kɛ a ne a wara bwa, asau la bobɛlbwa ta kɛɛrɛ.
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Hé ba chɔɔ nyoa." O habɔteŋra la bɛlbwa ta wone lɔ bambile dɛ pɛɛro o nɛnsoo, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ ba Dɔɔree.
Asɛ Yeesu ka kpɔ paanoo la tɛɛ ba, dɛ kpɔ pɛŋe la tɛɛ ba gɛ tenten.
Korowii aa iru seo ta la, anɔɔ jaa tooro waa kpɔ o te bagle o habɔteŋra la.

Belaa baa di kwaa tonɛ la, o bɔɔ Seemɔn Pita ŋɔ, "Jɔn bie Seemɔn, he dɛ nyin mɛ dɛ gwaa banɔ nɔ naa?" Anee Pita ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, n Dɔɔ, he jemɔ kɛŋɔ n dɛ nyin he wa." Anee Yeesu berɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ nyini n pebiiri nɛ."
O berɔ pɛɛro nɛɛtena ŋɔ, "Jɔn bie Seemɔn, he dɛ nyin mɛ naa?" Anee o ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, n Dɔɔ, he jemɔ kɛŋɔ n dɛ nyin he wa." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ nyiŋi n peera nɛ."

Yeesu berɔ kwaa pɛɛro tooro tena ŋɔ, "Jɔn bie Seemɔn, he dɛ nyin n waa aa?" Waa nɔ gelɔ Seemɔn Pita bambile chɔg kohona kɛ waa bera bɔɔro tooro tena ŋɔ, "He dɛ nyin n waa" la. Asɛ o ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, he jemɛ wobɛlbwa, he gbabir jemɔ kɛ n dɛ nyin he wa." Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ dɛɛ n peera.
Kasinteŋ, n dɛ ŋɔ he be, he faa ɛ bonɔɔ la, he won kriso vɔwa dɛ kaa bela bwa haa dɛ nyin. Kɛ dɛ he baa hwɛɛhraa, hɛɛ tɛr nɔɔraa asɛ nomɛl vɔrɔwe dɛ kaa he ne bela haa wola nyin laŋa."
O bol anɔ dɛ kpɔ ɛɛ bagle seo la soo Pita aa dɛ ba sewa, á che a ta Korowii dɔ jirima. Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ Pita be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ teŋɛ n nɛ."

Baa dɛ kaa la, Pita keo nyiŋi dɛ na kɛŋɔ o dɔŋ habɔteŋre Yeesu aa dɛ nyinu kohona la teŋɛ ba nɛ. Onee fa soga kpagɛ Yeesu gɛ saŋ o ne o habɔteŋra la aa chema tig ta, asɛ dɛ bɔɔro naate waa dɛ ba o lee tɛ la.
Pita aa nao la, o bɔɔ Yeesu ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, aah baa nɔ ge sɛh?"
Belaa o chaŋo ŋɔ, "Dɛ n dɛ nyin kɛ o so le dɛ ka tel saŋ maa ba kwaraa naa, he waanee yaa? Hé te dɛɛ teŋɛ n nɛ!"

Yeesu aa bol gɛ la, dɛ o habɔteŋra la dɛ bol bobɛlbwa ŋɔ, amɔ ba dɔŋ habɔteŋre la aa sewɛ bwa. Kɛ gɛ laa Yeesu ŋɔ. Waa waa bolaa kɛŋɔ, dɛ o dɛ nyin o habɔteŋre la so ka tel gɛ saŋ waa ba naa, Pita waane laa.
A gɛ habɔteŋre nɔɔ bagle gɛ waa nɔ dɛ chwerɛ a bwa bil. Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ a ɛ kpela.
Waa Yeesu aa ɛa warɔ taeh. A bwa laa ba chwerɛ do tɔne ta. Dɛ ba fe wono chwerɛ a bwa do tɔne ta naa, a gɛ tɔne la fe aa bɔr dɔe ba dɛ jo harɛ nɔ ta.
Nomoa Teɔfelɔs, n tɔn la maa tɔ sie chwerɛ la, n le Yeesu toma la mumpar dɛ bagle o we-ɛɛla ne o webagla waa bwa
ka tel awola Korowii aa kpɔɔ kaa nyundua la. O chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta dɛ bagle baala la waa kpɔa ŋɔ bá ɛ o toroma la waa baa dɛ ba ɛɛ la, asɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua.
Waa sewa dɛ ir la, o kpɔ o te bagle o toroma la kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa tɔpera fifraanaarɛ baah ta, dɛɛ bol Korowii Kora waa ba be. Gɛ baa nao la gelɔ ba jemɛ kpelakpela kɛŋɔ o ir seo ta.
Ba ne waa bera ba cheme ja la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ Jerusalam le mɔɔ. Hé so kpa koŋkɛɛle la maa ŋɔa n Mɛɛ bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tɛ heyaa la.
Nee nee Jɔn sɔ nɛra Korowii ne, kɛ aa tɔpere bɛlee di asɛ Korowii kpɔ o Domadɛɛge la sɔ heya. Anomanta hé so kpao."
Ba ne waa baa cheme la, ba bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, taraken te hɛɛ geloo ya Israel tena berɛ di ya kora la gbaɔ?"
Belaa Yeesu ŋɔ, "N Mɛɛ nɔn taa wobɛlbwa ne a tɔpere bwa do. He ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛŋɔ he jemɛ tɔpere la waane aa dɛ ba chiga.
Kɛ dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la baa so he nɛ aa, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa kpegrii asɛ he di danseɛ tɛ mɛ Jerusalam fɔgbaah, ne Judia harɛ kabora bwa ta, ne Samaria harɛ ta, ne harɛ jaga bwa."
Waa bol a gɛ waa nɔ tonɛ ba ta che dɛɛ nyiŋu la, dɛ Korowii baa kpɔɔ dɛɛ kaa nyundua, asɛ baamare ba tɔ o nɛɛ nyundua bela, ba ta on nae kpa.
Waa dɛ kaa, dɛ ba sie ta pa nyundua haah ken. Bug la ta baala banɛ bane baa do laalapoŋa baa che ba jwɛh,
dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Galilia tena, ɛrɛɛ he che bonɔ dɛɛ nyiŋi nyundua haah gɛ nɔɔ? Yeesu nɔ Korowii aa baa kpɔɔ le he be kaa nɔ, wɛɛ berɔɔ ba gɛ tenten haa nao wɛɛ kaa nyundua nɔ."
Asɛ Yeesu toroma la le Ɔlevere Bwe la ta baa chega o kaa nyundua gel ba la ta dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam. A ka tama bwe la ne Jerusalam ɛ kwansini beŋkpoŋ.

Dɛ ba dɔ dea abrɔsane bɛl doa Jerusalam. Ba la Jerusalam dɛ ka jo o bini. Ba nɛra baa jo dea la bini laanee: Pita ne Jɔn, ne Jems ne Andriu, ne Felep ne Tɔmas, ne Batolomeo ne Maatiu, ne Alfeɔs bie Jems, ne Seemɔn Sɛlɔt, ne Jems bie Judas.
Dɛ ba ne haahna la ne Yeesu nya Mɛɛre ne Yeesu nimanar la pɛo cheme dɛ yon dɛɛ soŋe Korowii warawara.
Aa baa di tɔpera anɛ la, ba bala la bwa chemo. Baa tel nɛra lafa fifraanɛɛ. Asɛ Pita ir che ba baah ta dɛ ŋɔ,
"Yabala, Korowii Domadɛɛge chegɛ Devid nɛɛ dɛ pu sie bagle Judas waa tɔ nɛra sie dɛ bag ba Yeesu ba lawɔ la wa. Gɛ waa bagla laanee chɛ kɛ a ɛ. A waa a ɛ gɛ la.
O fa ja ya nɛ. Ya ne o bwaa fa dɛ ɛ Korowii toma nɔ."
(Waa yog Yeesu la, o kpɔ o tonchɔga la suuga dɛ ka yawɛ harɛ bɛl. A gɛ harɛ nɔ taa o chole, o tea pere, o looni le, asɛ o sewɛ.
Jerusalam tena bwa no o seo la wa. Anomanta ba pa a gɛ harɛ la sɔn ba wobol ta Akɛldama. O munii Chal Harɛ.)
Pita ŋɔ, "Ba chwerɛ Korowii Kpɛɛra Tɔn la bini ŋɔ, 'Hé gel o dem chɔ pɛɛ, nomɛlbwa bɛ o ta do.' Dɛ berɛ chwerɛ ŋɔ, 'Hé berɛ o toma tɛ nomɛl.'
Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛl ba ja ya nɛɛ dɛ di ya Dɔɔ Yeesu seo ta ira la danseɛ. Nɛra ya ne ba faa teŋɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛɛ gaage la,
dɛ kpoŋe le gɛ saŋ la Jɔn faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la dɛ ba le saŋ la Korowii aa baa kpɔ ya Dɔɔ le ya be kaa nyundua la, a gɛ nɛra nɔ bɛlee dɛ won ja ya nɛɛ dɛ di o seo ta ira la danseɛ."
Asɛ ba kpɔ nɛra banɛ dɛ ŋɔ bá ta bie tɛɛ ba dɛ́ won jemɛ naate aa chɛ kɛ o ja ba nɛɛ la. Josef baa dɛ yerɔ Baasabas (dɛ berɛ dɛɛ yerɔ Jastos la) ne Matayasee ba kpɔ,
dɛ soŋe Korowii ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ, hen jemɛ nomɛlbwa nyu bini. Anomanta bagle yaa nɛra banɛ nɔ bini onɔ la haa dɛ nyin
kɛŋɔ o chig Judas naa ta dɛɛ ɛ he toma Judas aa vɛah dɛ kaa bela aa chɛ kɛ o do la."
Baa ta bie la, Matayasee dia, asɛ ba kpɔɔ ja Yeesu toroma fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la nɛ.
Ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Pɛntekɔs la telo, asɛ ba bwa cheme bobeŋkpoŋ.
Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ komɛl dɛ gbɔgre nyundua dɛɛ si kɛŋɔ peujen bɛl aa dɛ ta ken. Asɛ a gɛ gbɔga la tɔ dem la baa lɔ o ta la bwa.
Asɛ ba na kwaane kɛŋɔ ninlao ken, asɛ a pegri dɛ ba so ba nɛra baa lɔ bela la te bɛlbwa nɛ.
Ate dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge baa so ba bwa nɛɛ kpegri ne dɛ ir ba nɛ, asɛ baa bol wobofala. Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee gela ba won dɛɛ bol a gɛ wobofala la la.
Dɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii dɛɛ tomɔ gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la le harɛ ta bobɛlbwa dɛ ba su Jerusalam bwa.
Baa no gbɔga la la, ba bwa baa cheme bela, asɛ a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa kɛŋɔ nɛra la aa dɛ bol waa ba bɛlbwa bwɛɛ wobol ta la.
Belaa ba nyoa aa kpoa kohona la, baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Galilia tena laa nɛra nɔ kɛɛ?
Aah ɛrɛɛ ba ɛ dɛ won dɛɛ bol ya bɛlbwa wobol nɔɔ?
Ya bwa harɛre kokogrɔ. Ya bane le Paatea, bane le Midia ne Elam, bane ge le Mɛsopoteemea ne Judia, ne Kapadoosia. Ya bane ge le Pɔntos ne Eesia,
bane le Frejea ne Pamfiilia, bane le Ijipt ne Lebya harɛ, Sairini jwɛɛh bela. Ya bane le Room.

Ba lolɛ ya bane Juda tena harɛ, bane ge ɛ hɔɔhra, kɛ ya bwa ge dɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la. Ya bane ge le Kret ne Arebia. Kɛ ya bwa dɛ no kɛŋɔ baa dɛ bol waa ya gbagba wobol ta dɛɛ bagle wejena Korowii aa ɛa!"
Asɛ ba nyoa kpo kohona, baa bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ, "Aah bɔkwa soo waa nɔɔ?"
Asɛ bane gee mamɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la ŋɔ senee ba nyɔ.
Belaa Pita ne o bala Yeesu toroma fi dɛ beŋkpoŋ la ir che, asɛ Pita ɛɛ bol waa takpeg ne dɛ ŋɔ, "Yabala Juda tena ne he nɛra haa cheme Jerusalam bwa, hé cheg deŋne dɛ no waa nɔ aa dɛ ɛ nɔ mun.
Gɛ haa dɛ lii ŋɔ senee nɛra nɔ nyɔ nɔ, sen laa ba nyɔ. Chɔɔ laa ta naa?
Waa Korowii keame Joel faa bola laanee hɛɛ na chɔɔ nɔ ne la. O bolɔ ŋɔ,
'Korowii ŋɔ, "Harɛ chɔga tɔpera aa ka mun la ta la, mɛɛ tɛ nɛra bwa soosiwii n Domadɛɛge la kohona, asɛ ba bibaala ne bihaahna bwa bol n waa la, asɛ ba bonɔɔna na chaahna, asɛ ba banjeni dee deera.
Gɛ saŋ la, mɛɛ geloo n Doma la ir n yombaala ne yomhaahna gba kwaraa nɛɛ ásɛ ba bol n waa la.
Mɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa nyundua ne harɛ ta, asɛ nɛra na chal ne nii ne ninchuu kohona.
Wee dɛ ba bira, asɛ korobie swɛɛ kɛŋɔ chal ken mɔɔ n tɔpejen la ba.
A gɛ saŋ la, nomɛlbwa waa yerɛ men Korowii sɔn la, mɛɛ lɛo." '

"N bala Israel tena, hé no waa nɔ. Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la fa ɛ nɛn bɛl Korowii aa gela o won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa, asɛ he na dɛ won jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii kpegri nee wɛɛ ɛ o toma kpela. A gɛ waa nɔ ta heyaa wehɔɔhra ɛɛ.
Korowii jemɛ Yeesu waa bwa wubwa dɛ chega ken mɔɔ a tel nɔ. O ɛa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ kpɔɔ do he nɔn ta, asɛ he gel wechɔg-ɛɛra kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo.
Asɛ Korowii lɛo seo nɔn ta dɛ iru seo ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ seo ta kpegri dɔe o nɛɛ dɛ́ lawɔ o bɛ won ir.
O waa Devid bol ŋɔ, 'N ne Korowii lole saŋ bɛlbwa. Maa ɔmɛ bwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o chegɛ n habɔɔ.
Anomanta n sie lɛo, n wobol ge bwa ɛ bansɔɔhna wobol. Maa n bwadabii waa jar, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n sie dawɛ Korowii nɛ.
N Naa Korowii, haa he bidɛɛge waa soeh ba lala bwɛ. Haa gel o chɔ bɔɔ bini pɔh.
He bag mɛ ŋwɛnɛ maa kpɔ dɛ dɔ bokpega. Saŋ bɛlbwa maa na he siwi la, n bwara ɛɛ sɔɔh mɛɛ.'
"Yabala, mɛɛ wonoo bol n naa Devid wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya bwa jemɛ o waa kɛrɛdɛ. O sewɔ, ba hugo, hale o ŋwam ta lole fini nɔ.
Kɛ o ɛ Korowii keame, dɛ berɛ jemɛ nyoa Korowii aa ŋwɛɛ ntam bagɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo Devid naa bɛl ba di o kara la.

Devid na chaahna dɛ won jemɛ waa Korowii aa dɛ ba ɛɛ kerekere. Anomanta Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la seo ta ira waa o faa bol ŋɔ Korowii ta o waa soɛh lala bwɛ, o ta bɔɔ bini chɔe pɔh la.
A gɛ Yeesu nɔɔ Korowii ir seo ta la. Ya bwa kpɔ ya sie nao dɛɛ diu danseɛ.
O Mɛɛ Korowii aa kpɔɔ kaa nyundua dɛ gel o so nomombɔr o dig ta la, o tɛo o Domadɛɛge la gɛ o faa bagɛ nyoa la, asɛ Yeesu ge berɛ kpɔ tɛ yaa. O tomaa hɛɛ na dɛɛ no la.
He jemɔ kɛŋɔ Devid gbagba laa ira kaa nyundua, kɛ waa waa bola laanee nɔ. O ŋɔ, 'N Naa Korowii ŋɔ n Dɔɔ be ŋɔ ó so nomombɔr o dig ta bela
ásɛ o ba o dɔma ne harɛ ásɛ o tigri ba nɛ.'
"Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ Israel tena bwa jemɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu laanee Korowii ɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa dɔɔ la. Onee Kristo la. Kɛ o laa he kpaa pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo la aa?"
Nɛra la aa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, ba nao kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga, asɛ ba tea bini chɔg, ba bɔɔ Pitawa ŋɔ, "Aah ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ yɔ, yabala?"

Anee Pita ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛŋɔ he bini bɛlbwa charɛ o liire dɛ le wechɔga ta, dɛ gel ba sɔɔ Korowii nee ásɛ o teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛ, ásɛ Korowii kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo. He ɛ gɛ naa, Korowii ɛɛ tɛ heyaa o Domadɛɛge laanee,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ne he naanar ne bojaŋ tena Korowii aa dɛ yer ba ŋɔ bá ba o be la bwa waa o bagɛ nyoa la la."
O bol waa kohona dɛ ja ba dɛ gbɛgbɛ ba ŋɔ, "Fini nɛra wechɔga kan ga. Hé takapɔ dɛ laa he te le nɛnchɔga la Korowii aa dɛ ba ba wechɔga kpɔe dɛ bɔ ba kem la bini."
Nɛra la kɛrɛdɛ yarada Pita wobol la, asɛ ba sɔ ba Korowii ne. Ba nɛra kagboŋa batoroo yarada Yeesu waa dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo awola tɔpere la ta dɛ ba ja ba nɛ.
A gɛ nɛra la balɔ dɛ baa hweli Korowii waa Yeesu toroma la be warawara. Dɛ ba ne Yeesu toroma laanee pɛa dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa, dɛɛ di kwaa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii.
Dɛ Korowii chegɛ Yeesu toroma la nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ tomkpega, asɛ nɛra bwa nyoa kpo baa ɔmɛ.
Dɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa dɛ ɛ asɔre tena la bwa pɛo dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa, dɛɛ bɔne komɛlbwa baa dɔa.
Dɛ ba dɛ yog ba koŋkwaare ne harɛre dɛ kpɔ a suuga la dɛɛ bɔne dɔŋa gɛ bɛlbwa aa hiah, asɛ bɛlbwa won yawɛ o konnyina.
Tɔpebii te bɛlbwaa baa cheme Korowii Dea, dɛ pɛ dɛɛ di kwaa ba deremi silɛɛ ne tepoŋ ne.
Dɛ ba dɛ jam Korowii, dɛ nɛra dɛ kpɛɛ ba taeh. Asɛ Korowii lɛ nɛnfala tɔpebii te bɛlbwa ba ba baa ja o nɛra la nɛ.
Awola bɛl Pita ne Jɔn la Korowii Dea wekee saŋ. A gɛ saŋ nɔɔ nɛra la bwa cheme dɛɛ soŋe Korowii webaŋa.

Baa kaa tel dea la doonyoa la baa dɛ yerɔ Doonyodɛɛge la ta la, dɛ baa bɛl soge bela. Dɛ a gɛ baa la soge boobi o bechale saŋ bwa. Asɛ tɔpere bwa ba yon cheo ka so a gɛ doonyoa bela o kaa soŋe suuga nɛra baa dɛ jo Korowii Dea bela la be.
Pita ne Jɔn aa dɛ ba dea bela joe la, o soŋ ba ŋɔ bá tɛo komɛl.
Belaa ba pa sie o be, asɛ Pita ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi yaa!"
Anee o nyiŋ ba dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ baa tɛo komɛlee.
Belaa Pita ŋɔ, "N ta suuga dɔe dɛ́ tɛɛ, kɛ mɛɛ tɛɛ kon n ge aa dɔa laanee. Yeesu Kristo waa le Nasarɛt la sɔn ta, ir dɛ valɛ!"
Asɛ Pita lawɛ boobi la nɔndig dɛ gɔɔro ir. Bug la ta dɛ baa la nakpale ne o nalurumi denɔ do kpegri,
o chugri ir che o naa anɛ la ta dɛɛ valɛ, asɛ o ne ba jo Korowii Dea bela. O kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ valɛ dɛɛ sa, dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
Nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa nao kɛŋɔ waa dɛ valɛ dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
Baa naa kɛŋɔ boobi la o faa dɛ soŋe kwaa Doonyodɛɛge la ta laanee dɛɛ valɛ la, ba nyoa kpoo ba chara jegre kɛŋɔ waa bera won ir che dɛɛ valɛ la.

Baa la toɔh pɛl Pita ne Jɔn, asɛ ba ne o ka tel Korowii Dea la bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Solomɔn Pato la, asɛ nɛra la aa nao la, ba nyoa kpoo, asɛ ba bwa chwa biribiri ken dɛ ba Pita ne Jɔn ne baa la be bela.

Pita aa na nɛra la la, o bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Yabala Israel tena, ɛrɛɛ waa nɔ kpo he nyoa hɛɛ nyiŋi yaa gɛ nɔɔ? He dɛ lii ŋɔ ya gbagba kpegri ta kɛɛ ya nɛndɛɛga ɛɛ kohona waa baa nɔ won ir che dɛɛ valɛ nɔ kɛɛ?

Gɛ laa. Korowii la ya naanar faa dɛ tomɛ la, Abraham ne Aesek ne Jekɔbwa Korowii la, on tɛ o bonɔɔ Yeesu sɔn gɛ la. Onee he kpɔ tɛ nomonome ŋɔ bá bol o waa dɛ kpoo la. Harɛ nomoa Paelet aa ŋɔa ó tao la, he ta ŋɔe ŋɔ haa sɛah?
Wechɔga bɛlbwa toole o nɛ, wedɛɛga gboo o ɛ. Kɛ he ŋɔ haa on nyin, dɛ ŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ kpo nɛra laanee hɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ Paelet foo ta dɛ gelo.
Korowii nɛn nɛwɛnyini aa che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ mkpa la, onee he kpo la, asɛ Korowii lawɔ ir seo ta. Ya na a gɛ waa nɔ. A danseɛ yaa di la.

O sɔnee ya yerɛ asɛ baa nɔ gbaŋre la. Yarada yaa dɛ yarada Yeesu la, a taa a che waa nɔ haa naa nɔ won ɛ la. O waa la yaa dɛ yarada la, a gbosoroo chah baa nɔ he bwa aa jemɔ nɔ la. He bwa gee naa kɛŋɔ o gbaŋrɔ.
"Yabala, n jemɔ kɛŋɔ bɛ jemaa gela he ne he nomonome ɛ Yeesu waa haa ɛo la.
Korowii tɔ sie gel o keamere la bwa bagle ŋɔ o Kristo la waa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ yaa la dɛ ba waa nae. A gɛ waa la, kenii Korowii chega a ba ɛ.
Anomanta hé charɛ he liire le he wechɔga ta dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii ásɛ o kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heya, dɛɛ tɛ heyaa bambisɔɔhna, dɛɛ do heyaa gbemba.
Wɛɛ berɔɔ tomɛ Yeesu waa ɛ Kristo la he be. Onee o le ŋɔ ó ba lɛ heyaa la.
A chɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu do nyundua dɛ ka tel tɔɔ la wee Korowii aa ɛ wobɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ ken, gɛ waa gela o keamedɛɛga la bagle la.
Mosis baglɔ ŋɔ, 'N Naa Korowii ɛɛ tomɛ o keamee ó ba bol o waa dɛɛ tɛ heyaa gɛ waa tom mɛ la. He gbagba dwee binii wɛɛ ba o lee. A chɛ kɛŋɔ he cheg deŋne dɛ no o wobol, dɛ ɛ gɛ bwa waa dɛ bagle.
Nomɛlbwa waa wola o wobol noɛ la, baa pero le Korowii nɛra binii dɛ kpoo!'
Korowii keamere baa dɛ bagle Korowii waa la, le Samoɛl bere saŋ ne banɔ la baa teŋɛ o nɛɛ bwa, ba bwaa bagle waa aa dɛ ɛ fini nɔ wa.

Korowii nyoa la waa baga dɛ gel o keamere bol la, heyaa o bagɛ tɛ. Fɔo la Korowii ne he naanar aa fɔwa la laworomɛɛ hɛɛ di la. O ŋɔ Abraham be ŋɔ, 'He naanar nɛɛ aa ba chega n ɛ wedɛɛga tɛ harɛ ta nɛra bwa.'
A waa Korowii le o torome la dɛ tɔ sie tomɔ he be ásɛ o ba ɛ heyaa wedɛɛga dɛ gel bɛlbwa charɛ o liire dɛ le o wechɔga ta la."
Pita ne Jɔn aa chega dɛɛ bol waa nɛra la be la, Sɔfore bane ne nɛra baa dɛ daah Korowii Dea la nomoa ne Saduki tena bane balɔ. Dɛ Saduki tena la aa yarada kɛŋɔ nɛra bwa ɛɛ ir seo taa tɔpebɛl.
Ba baah diu kɛŋɔ Pita ne Jɔn aa dɛ bol nɛra la be ŋɔ Yeesu ir seo ta la. A gɛ la baglɔ kɛŋɔ serewa ɛɛ ba ir seo taa.
Anomanta ba lawɛ Pita ne Jɔn ka do dea ásɛ bɔr chaah mɔɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ baa lag ba la dɛ jɔmɔraa.
Nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛɛ no waa la dɛ yaradaa warɔ. Dɛ baala baa yarada waa la ba nɛra kagboŋa banue.
Tɔ aa pera la, Juda tena nomonome, ne bwɛɛ nomonome, ne Tɔn Jerema bwa cheme Jerusalam.
Ba ne Sɔfore Nomoa Anas ne Kaefas, ne Jɔn, ne Alɛksanda ne Sɔfore Nomoa dea nɛra la bwaa chema.
Asɛ ba kpɔ Pita ne Jɔn ba che nɛra la baah ta, dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa a che he ɛ gɛ nɔɔ? Ume sɔn taa he che ɛ gɛ waa nɔɔ?"
Belaa Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir Pita nɛɛ kpegri nɛ, asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Bwɛɛla sitɔɔra ne nomonome,
dɛ bɔɔraa hɛɛ bɔɔ yaa dɛ́ jemɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta aa chega ya won ɛ boobi nɔ wedɛɛge nɔ dɛ won chaoh weela aa,
amɔ te hé no, asɛ Ísrael tena bwa no, kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo waa le Nasarɛt, haa kpoo dagagre ta asɛ Korowii iru seo ta la, o sɔn kpegri taa a che baa nɔ waa chega nɔ dɔ bokpega la.
Yeesu nɔ bwara waa ba bagle Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, 'Bwe la he mamaala aa vɛah dɛ liiru konsala la, on baa lawɛ dea la kpoŋe la.'
Dɛ Yeesu laa aa, nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won lɛ yaa. Nomɛlbwa toole harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa yá yerɔ o won lɛ yaa ka ja Yeesu nɛ."

Dɛ Pita ne Jɔn aa tɔn jemɛ kohona bɛlbwa, dɛ ɛ nɛmpɛɛne baa wola Korowii waa hwele kohona bɛlbwa. Nomonome la aa na bambile la soo baa wona kpoŋe dɛɛ bol waa la, dɛ a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa. Belaa ba sie chaah ba nɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba fa teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛɛ hwelu. An gela ba jemɛ waa dɛ dɔ bambile gɛ la.
Nomonome la ta berɛ won bol wobɛlbwa kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba gbabir na baa la baa chaoh la. Dɛ o chegɛ Pita ne Jɔn be.
Asɛ ba ŋɔ Píta ne Jɔn le dea la bini ka che dahara. Dɛ ba dɛ bɔɔ dɔŋa ŋɔ,
"Aah ɛrɛ tenee yaa ba baala nɔ ɛɛ yɔ? Jerusalam tena bwa nao dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ nyokpowaa ba ɛ gɛ nɔ. A te ta tɔŋla dɔe.
Hé gel ya aah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ wobɛlbwa bol Yeesu sɔn ta bobɛlbwa kpa, asɛ waa nɔ bɛ won kaa bojaŋ kpa."
Asɛ ba berɛ yer ba jo dea dɛ aah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ too bol wobɛlbwa bobɛlbwa Yeesu sɔn ta kpa!
Anee Pita ne Jɔn chaŋe ŋɔ, "Hé gbabir di kasinteŋ. He ɔma ne Korowii ɔma, amee magra Korowii be nɔ?
Waa ya gbagba aa naa dɛ no la, yaa won gel a bola bwa!"
Belaa nomonome la kwaa aah ba kohona gwaa logla la, dɛ gel ba. Ba nao kɛŋɔ ba ŋɔ bá ham ba ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta naa, nɛra la aa ban sɛh,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ baa la baa chaoh la gwaa bene fifraanaarɛ o weela la ta, asɛ nɛra la bwa na gɛ baa chaoh la dɛɛ kooga dɛɛ jam Korowii.
Baa gel Pita ne Jɔn la, ba la ba bala la be dɛ ka bagle gɛ Sɔfore Nomoa ne nomonome la aa bola la.
Ba bala la aa no waa la la, ba bwa pɛo soŋe Korowii ŋɔ, "Ya Dɔɔ haa ɛ komɛlbwa dɔɔ, hen ta nyundua ne harɛ ne mpo ne kwaa aa lɔ a ta bwa!
He chegɛ he Domadɛɛge ta dɛ gel ya naa Devid waa ɛ he bonɔɔ la ŋɔ, 'Ɛrɛɛ nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la lɛ gaeh, dɛɛ le jina dɛɛ koh ba te pɛɛ nɔɔ?
Harɛ ta koranar kpɔ ba te dɛ cheme, dɛ yo N Naa Korowii ne o Kristo la.'
Kpela ge, Hɛrɔd, ne Pɔnteɔs Paelet ne nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ, ne Israel tena bwa cheme bwɛɛ nɔ ta. Ba yo Yeesu, he gbagba bonɔɔ waa wola wechɔge bɛlbwa dɔe la. Onee he ɛ he Kristo la.
Ba bwa chemo dɛ ɛ waa he gbagba aa kpɔ he kpegri ne he tetoora vɔrɔwe ŋɔ aa ɛo la.
N Naa Korowii, berɛ na gɛ baa dɔa aah he bonɔɔna, dɛ́ tɛɛ ba kpegri ba won bol he waa bansua bwa ne.
Tɛɛ ba kpegri ba won dɛɛ chah weela, dɛ gel ba che he gbagba bonɔndɛɛge Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ ɛ wekpega ne nyokpowa."
Baa soŋe Korowii tonɛ la, dea baa lɔ o bini la jigro. Korowii Domadɛɛge la baa so ba nɛ, asɛ baa bol Korowii Waa la bansua bwa ne.
Dɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la dɛ ɛ asɔre tena la bwa dɔ nyopɛo, ba liire bwa ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Bɛlbwa ta o gbagba kondɔɔla kpɔe ɛ o gbo kwa. Dɛ bɛlbwa dɔ kon aa, o dɔŋ konee.
Kpegri tenten nee Yeesu toroma la di o seo ta ira la danseɛ. Asɛ Korowii cha ba, dɛ gel ba won dɛɛ bonyen nɛra.
Dɛ ba bɛlbwa toole aa noo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ banɔ la baa dɔ deene ne harɛre la dɛ yoga,
dɛ kpɔ a suuga dɛɛ ba Yeesu toroma la be, asɛ baa bɔna gɛ aa chɛ kɛ bɛlbwa dɔ.
Dɛ ba bini bɛl le Lewi dea, ba lolɔ Saepros, asɛ baa yerɔ Josef. Dɛ Yeesu toroma la dɛ yerɔ Banabas. O sɔn la munii "Nɛn waa dɛ do nɛra gbemba."
O kaa yog o harɛ bɛl dɛ kpɔ a suuga ba tɛ Yeesu toroma la.
Dɛ baa bɛl sɔne Ananias, o haah ge sɔne Safaera. O ne o haah yog ba harɛ bɛl,
asɛ ba nyoa pɛ, asɛ o kpɔ suuga la ane sɔh, dɛ kpɔ a kabora ba tɛ Yeesu toroma la.
Belaa Pita bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Ananias, ɛrɛɛ he gel Bɔnsam won negre dɛ gel he ba negre Korowii Domadɛɛge la, dɛ kwaa he suuga la pera sɔh nɔɔ?
Haa wola harɛ la yoge mɔɔ la, dɛ hen dɔ he kon. Haa yogu tonɛ la ge la, dɛ suuga la ge ɛ he kwa. Aah dɛ bɔkwaa gela he ɛ gɛ nɔɔ? Nɛwɛnyini laa he negre nɔ. Korowiirii he negre la!"
Ananias aa dena no waa nɔ la, o den chole, dɛ sewɛ ge. Nɛra baa no a gɛ waa nɔ la bwa ɔmɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
Belaa bonɔɔna bane ir dɛ ba vɔrɔwo, dɛ cheo le buse, dɛ ka hugo.
Tama, dɛ o haah ge balɔ, dɛ waa jemɛ kɛŋɔ waane ɛ o jaa.
Anee Pita bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He ne he jaa harɛ la haa yoga la, o suuga bwaa nɔ naa?" Asɛ haah la sɛh ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh, a bwaa."
Belaa Pita pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ he ne he jaa nyoa pɛ asɛ he daah Korowii Domadɛɛge dɛ́ na nɔɔ? Bonɔɔna baa kaa huge he jaa laanee tel doonyoa la. Baa che he gee le buse."
Bug la ta dɛ o ge cholo chɔ Pita sie bela, dɛ ge sewɛ. Bonɔɔna la aa bala dɛ o ge sewɔ, asɛ ba cheo le buse dɛ ka hugo o jaa jwɛh.
A gelɔ asɔre tena la bwa ne nomɛlbwa waa no a waa ɔmɛ taeh.
Dɛ Yeesu toroma la dɛ ɛ wekpega ne nyokpowaa nɛra la bini. Dɛ asɔre tena la dɛ cheme Korowii Dea la dahara bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Solomɔn Pato la ta.
Dɛ nɛra baa wola Yeesu waa yarada la dɛ kpɛɛ ba kɛrɛdɛ. Kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ bá ba puu ba dɛɛ so Solomɔn Pato ta bela.
Dɛ balaa nɛra ge den na dɛɛ ba dɛ baa ja ba nɛ. Dɛ ba bini baala ne haahna bwaa dɛɛ ba dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛ Yeesu.
Nɛra koh Yeesu toroma la toma baa dɛ ɛ la waa dɛ che weela tena ne ba mpare ne ba kalaŋre ba bil ŋwɛnɛ nyoa, ásɛ dɛ Pita ba dɛ kaa laa, o lileo dawɛ bane nɛɛ asɛ ba gbaŋre.
Asɛ nɛra le Jerusalam bwɛjegre la ta dɛ ba pirim, dɛ che weela tena ne nɛra kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ bwa ba, asɛ ba bwa dɔ bokpega.
Kɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la ne o nɛra baa ɛ Saduki tena la bwa aa na toma Yeesu toroma la aa dɛ tomɛ la, a ɛɛ ba bɔweela kohona,
asɛ ba ir kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ bɛl dɛ lawɛ Yeesu toroma la do dea, bela baa dɛ do nɛra bwa la.
Awola jwaana la, nyundua torome bɛl baa ya dea la gbera dɛ le Yeesu toroma la ne buse, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ,
"Hé la ka che Korowii Dea la bini dɛ ka bol Yeesu ŋwɛnɛfale nɔ waa bwa nɛra be."

Yeesu toroma la no nyundua torome la waa la, asɛ tɔ aa pera chɔmbibi ne la, ba ka jo Korowii Dea la bini dɛɛ bol Yeesu waa la. Awola chɔɔ ne la, Sɔfore Nomoa la ne o nɛra yerɛ Juda tena nomonome la bwa dɛ ba cheme, dɛ tomɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá la dea la baa lawɛ Yeesu toroma la do la bini dɛ ka lee ba ba.
Toroma la aa la dea la bini la, ba ta Yeesu toroma la ka nae, dɛ berɛ ba nomonome la be dɛ ba ŋɔ,
"Yaa la bela dɛ koŋkare baa kpɔa karɛ gbeni la ta lɔ a ta, dɛ nɛra baa dɛ nyiŋi doonyoone la ta la ge chegɛ bela. Kɛ yaa ya gbeni la la, ya ta nomɛlbwa nae dea la bini!"
Sɔfonomonome la ne nomoa waa chɔ nɛra baa dɛ nyiŋi Korowii Dea doonyoo la nyoa la aa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa. Ba ta wone jemɛ waa la mun.
Belaa baa bɛl ba dɛ ba ŋɔ. "Hé no bonɔ! Nɛra la haa do ba dea laanee lɔ Korowii Dea dɛɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Waa la!"

Asɛ nomoa waa chɔ nɛra baa dɛ nyiŋi Korowii Dea doonyoo nyoa la ne o nɛra la dɛ ka lawɛ Yeesu toroma la ba. Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ dɛ ba kpɔ kpegri lag ba aa, ba bwɛɛ tena la baah nɛɛ diu, ba ta bwea fog ba. Anomanta ba lag ba kaa jeiih ken.
Ba ba Yeesu toroma la ne dɛ ba gel ba che Juda tena nomonome la baah ta, asɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la bɔɔ ba ŋɔ,

"Yaa kah heyaa ŋɔ he bɛ too gel ya na heyaa hɛɛ bol baa nɔ waa la, ɛrɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ ɛ ja nɔɔ? Hé nyiŋi na kɛŋɔ haa bol o waa a perɛ Jerusalam bwa gɛ! Ɛrɛɛ he chaa o seo waa dɛɛ chog yaa ŋɔ yan gela ba kpoo nɔɔ?"
Belaa Pitawa ŋɔ, "Korowii chɛ kɛŋɔ ya ɔmɛ gwaa nɛwɛnyini.
Korowii la ya naanar aa dɛ tomɔ laanee ir Yeesu la haa kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo la.
Korowii iru seo ta dɛ kpɔɔ ka so nomombɔr o dig ta, dɛ ɛo nɛra bwa Sitɔɔ ne ba Lɛɛ, asɛ dɛ koh o waa dɛ kpɔ Israel tena baa charɛ ba liire le ba wechɔga ta la wechɔga kɛ ba.
Nae yaa na waa nɔ la waa yaa di a danseɛ la. Korowii Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa tɛ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ o ŋwɛnɛ ta la ge chegɛ ya nɛɛ dɛɛ di waa nɔ danseɛ."
Nomonome la aa no Yeesu toroma la waa nɔ la, ba bwaawee iro kohona, ba fe ɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ba kpoo ba.
Dɛ Farisii te bɛl lɔ bela baa yerɔ Gamaleɛl. Dɛ o dɛ bagle nɛra Mosis Mmara, nɛra bwa gee tɛo duure. O iro che ba baah dɛ ŋɔ bá le Yeesu toroma la ne buse tama.
Anee o ŋɔ nomonome la be ŋɔ, "Yabala Israel tena, hɛ́ɛ do nɛra nɔ dɛɛgɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
Baa la ba faa yerɔ Teɔdas faa bala dɛ ba kpɔ o te ɛ nɛnjen la, nɛra dɛ ɛ lafraanaarɛ fa ta o nɛɛ teŋaa? Baa kpoo la, o habɔɔ tena la bwa ta lɔe pegre, asɛ o waa waa kpoŋa dɛɛ gaage la bwa sɔɔh naa?
A habɔɔ la, Galilia te ba faa yerɔ Judas la fa ta leɛ a gɛ saŋ baa dɛ kure nɛra la, dɛ ge ba yo Abane nomonome dɛ dɔ nɛnlaa kohona naa? Ba ta o ge kpoe asɛ o nɛra la ge bwa pegre aa?
Anomanta n poo heya, he bɛ nɛra nɔ wobɛlbwa ɛ. Hé gel ba jeiih ken. Dɛ ba gbagba liire ne ba bokpega binii baa ɛ ba waa nɔ naa, ba waa nɔ ɛɛ sɔɔhnoo.
Kɛ dɛ Korowii be gee a le aa, ɛrɛɛ he ɛ won na kɛŋɔ hɛɛ wonoo sɔɔh ba waa nɔ nɔ? He ta kɛrɛdɛ nyiŋaa, Korowiirii hɛɛ yo laa la oo!" Asɛ nomonome la teŋɛ Gamaleɛl waa la ta.
Ba yerɛ Yeesu toroma la jo dea, dɛ lɔɔ ba chweremi ne, dɛ kwaa aah ba ŋɔ ba bɛ too kpɔ Yeesu sɔn bol waa kpa, dɛ kpɔ ba ta.
Baa le nomonome la be, dɛ ba sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ Korowii aa tɛɛ ba sɔn dɛ gel ba ge maga nɔ dɔŋ won koh Yeesu waa dɛ di sihiih ne weweele la.
Anomanta tɔpere te bɛlbwaa baa bol Amanesoma la Korowii Dea la bini ne nɛra deremi kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ásɛ o ba lɛ o nɛra la.

A habɔɔ la, asɔre tena aa ba dɛ warɛ la, nagra baa chole Juda tena baa ɛ hɔɔhra dɛɛ bol Grik wobol la, ne banɔ la baa dɛ bol Juda wobol la baah ta. Dɛ ba dɛ bɔne suuga dɛɛ tɛ asɔre tena la tɔpere bɛlbwa. Asɛ Juda tena baa dɛ bol Grik wobol la ŋɔ baa ba te luhaahna tɛ.
Belaa Yeesu toroma fi dɛ banɛ la yerɛ asɔre tena la bwa cheme, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "A ta magrɛ kɛŋɔ yá gel Korowii Waa bagla dɛɛ nyiŋi suuga waa ta.

Anomanta, yabala, hé nyiŋi dɛ le he bini nɛra banuanɛ nɛra bwa aa jema kɛŋɔ ba ɛ nɛndɛɛga asɛ ba we-ɛɛla ɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la soge ba nɛɛ kpegri nɛɛ dɛ gel ba ɛ wejerema la, ásɛ ya kpɔ suuga waa nɔ do ba nɔn ta,
ásɛ ya te won dɔ bɔr dɛ kpɔ Korowii soŋa ne o Waa bola gbo ɛ ya toma."

Nɛra la bwa sie lɛ waa la Yeesu toroma la aa bola la ta, dɛ le baa bɛl Korowii Domadɛɛge aa soge o nɛɛ kpegri nɛɛ wɛɛ yarada Korowii dɛɛ tomɔ kasinteŋ ne baa yerɔ Steeven la. Nɛra baa jaa la ge sɔnaa Felep, ne Prokɔrɔs, ne Nikenɔ, ne Taemɔn, ne Paamenas, ne Nikolas. Dɛ Anteɔk tee Nikolas nɔ, asɛ wɛɛ tomɛ Korowii Juda tena ŋwɛnɛ baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii la ta.
Nɛra la kpɔ a gɛ nɛra nɔ bagle Yeesu toroma la, asɛ ba kpɔ ba nɔɔra darawe ba nɛɛ dɛ soŋe Korowii tɛɛ ba.
Korowii waa la perɛ bela. Dɛ nɛra baa yarada waa la dɛ baa ja asɔre tena la nɛɛ Jerusalam la dɛ warɛ tenten. Hale Sɔfore la kɛrɛdɛ bwaa yaradaa dɛ baa teŋɛ Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ la ta.
Dɛ Korowii cha Steeven kohona, dɛ tɛo kpegri o won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa ne waa aa kpega nɛra baah ta.
Belaa Juda tena baa dɛ cheme cheremi dea bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Libetines la ta la ir dɛɛ tɔŋle Steeven. Dɛ Juda tena nɔ le Sairini ne Alɛksandrea, bane ge le Silisia harɛ ne Eesia harɛ ta.
Baa dɛ tɔŋlo la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la tɛ Steeven wejema kohona dɛ gel wobɛlbwa waa bola la, baa wechɔge bɛlbwa na a ta. O bol waa la bwa bɔ ba.
Asɛ ba sɔh kpɔ suuga tɛ nɛra bane dɛ do ba ŋɔ, "Hé ŋɔ he na baa nɔ kɛŋɔ waa dɛ bol Mosis ne Korowii nɛnhɛlwobol."
Kenii a gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛ dɛ won berɛ ba bwɛɛ tena ne Juda tena nomonome ne Tɔn Jerema la bwa liire dɛ gel ba baah di Steeven nɛ. Asɛ ba lawɔ la ba nomonome baa dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole sie.
Ba gelɔ nɛra bane ge ba teŋe nyosone dɛ bol waa baa wola nae bwa dawɛ Steeven nɛɛ ŋɔ, "Tɔpere bɛlbwaa baa nɔ bol waa dɛɛ yagɛ ya Korowii Dea nɔ ne Mosis Mmara la.
Ya noɔ waa ŋɔa ŋɔ Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la ɛɛ pagre Korowii Dea nɔɔ, dɛ begre ya mmarare ne ya waa Mosis aa bagle ya naanar la bwa."
Nomonome la ne nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa kpɔ sie pa Steeven nɛ. Dɛ o sie bɔr dɛ nyɛgle al-al kɛŋɔ nyundua torome sie bɔr ken.
Belaa Sɔfore Nomoa la bɔɔ Steeven ŋɔ, "Kpelaa ba ŋɔ nɔ naa?"
Anee Steeven chaŋe ŋɔ, "N mɛɛwa ne n dɔɔranar, hɛ́ɛ no waa nɔ maa dɛ ba bola nɔ! A gɛ saŋ la ya naa Abraham aa wola Haran kaalɛ mɔɔ la, Korowii waa ɛ jirima bwa dɔɔ la ba o be Mɛsopoteemea harɛ ta,
dɛ ba ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Gel he lolanar dɛ le he harɛ haa lɔ o ta nɔ ta dɛ ka so harɛ maa dɛ ba he bagla la ta.'
Asɛ Abraham ir le o harɛ ta dɛ ka so Haran. O mɛɛ aa sewa habɔɔ laanee Korowii gel o ba so harɛ nɔ haa soge o ta fini nɔ ta.

A gɛ saŋ la, Korowii ta harɛ la pera teŋe tɛ Abraham kɛŋɔ o ɛ o ge kon nɔ. O ta nagale beŋkpoŋ del kwaraa teŋe tɛo. Kɛ Korowii bagɔ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ kpɔɔ tɛo, ásɛ harɛ la ɛ o ne o naanar kon. A gɛ saŋ la Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham nyoa nɔ la, dɛ o ta bii dɔe mɔɔ.
Waa Korowii aa bol Abraham be laanee kɛŋɔ o naanar ɛɛ ka berɛ hɔɔhraa harɛ bɛl taa, asɛ bela tena kpɔ ba ɛ yoma dɛ fig ba kohona bene lafraanaarɛ.
Dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ bol a gɛ harɛ la tena waa dɛ pa ba bole, dɛ bɔ ba a kem, ásɛ a habɔɔ la o nɛra ba bonɔ dɛ baa tomɔ.

Asɛ Korowii bagle Abraham ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ teŋe o bii pena ásɛ a gɛ waa la ɛ nawee dɛ che tɛ o ne Abraham fɔo la baa fɔwa la wa. A waa Abraham aa lolɛ o bie Aesek o dɔ yawanyoa beŋkpoŋ la, ba teŋe o pen. Aesek ge aa baa lolɛ o bie Jekɔb la, o teŋe o pen. Asɛ Jekɔb ge teŋe o bii fi dɛ banɛ baa ɛ ya deene nomonome la bwa pena.
"Dɛ Jekɔb bii la aa ba nime Josef la waa nyin, dɛ kpɔ bɔweela yogu tɛ Ijipt tena, asɛ ba ka kpɔɔ ɛ ba yom. Dɛ Korowii teŋɛ Josef nɛ,

anomanta wobɛlbwa ta on ɛɛ o wahala waa naa la bwa ta. A balɔ kɛŋɔ Josef la Ijipt harɛ kooro be, Korowii tɛo jirima ne liire, asɛ o waa too kooro la tea kohona. Anomanta o ɛ Josef o harɛ la bwa ne o dem tena bwa nomoa.
"Belaa lɔr ba chole Ijipt ne Keenan harɛ bwa ta, asɛ baa na wahala kohona. Dɛ ya naanar ta kondikwaa dɔe dɛ́ di.
Belaa Jekɔb ba no kɛŋɔ kondikwaa lɔ Ijipt harɛ, dɛ tomɛ o bii la ŋɔ bá la bela ka yawɛ ane ba. Dɛ ba logla laŋa baa dɛ la bela bwaa la.
Baa bera ba la bela nɛɛtena la, Josef kpɔ o te bag ba, asɛ ba jemɛ kɛŋɔ ba nime Josef laanee on. Ijipt harɛ kooro la ge baa jemɛ ba wa.
Belaa Josef kal o mɛɛ Jekɔb ŋɔ ó ne o bii ne o naanar la bwa ba so o be Ijipt harɛ. Dɛ ba bwa lɔ nɛra fifraanuanɛ dɛ nɛra banue.
Asɛ Jekɔb ir kaa Ijipt harɛ dɛ ka so bela. Belaa o ne o bii la bwa ka serewe.
Baa serewa la, ba cheg ba la Sɛkem, dɛ ka hug ba lalbɔɔ la Abraham faa yawa Hamɔ dea tena be la ta.
"Korowii nyobaga waa bagɛ Abraham kɛ wɛɛ lee ba Ijipt harɛ taa dɛ tɛɛ ba harɛfale la aa tela la, dɛ ya naanar baa lɔ Ijipt harɛ la warɔ kohona.
Koofale waa wola Josef waa jemɛ baa di Ijipt kora.
Dɛ o dɛ neg ba dɛɛ ɛɛ ba nyubinikpeg, dɛɛ fig ba, dɛ gel ba kpɔ ba bechasɔɔhne kaa ta baa serewe.
"A gɛ saŋ nɔɔ ba lolɛ Mosis. Dɛ o wer bonɔɔ kɛrɛdɛ. O nya nyiŋi o nɛɛ korobie atoro mɔɔ dɛ kpɔɔ ka ta.
Baa tao la, a gɛ kooro la bihaahnee nao dɛ kpɔɔ dɛ nyiŋu kɛŋɔ o gbagba bie.
Mosis hweli Ijipt tena waa bwa dɛ dɔ ba wejema bwa. Dɛ o wobol dɛ jo deŋne, o berɛ won wejena ge ɛɛ ja.
"Waa baa dɔ bene fifraanaarɛ la, a ba o nyu bini kɛŋɔ ó nyiŋi dɛ na gɛ baa dɛ ɛ o bala Israel tena la.
Waa baa na Ijipt tena la bɛl wɛɛ fiigi o bwɛɛ te awola bɛl la, o lɛ o bwɛɛ te la nyoa dɛ kpo Ijipt te la bɔ kem.
Dɛ o dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o bwɛɛ tena la ɛɛ jemɔɔ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii dɛɛ nyin o kpɔɔ lɛɛ ba ta, kɛ ba ta gɛ jemɛ.
Tɔ aa pera la, o na Israel tena banɛ baa yo, dɛ la ŋɔ ó ka larawe ba yoi la. O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'Nɛmbeŋkpoŋii heya. Bɔkwaa dɔ heyaa hɛɛ yo ken ɔ?'
Asɛ ba bini onɔ la waa dɛ wegre o dɔŋ nyoa la tagɛ Mosis dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, 'Umee chege kora ta ŋɔ hé baa nyiŋi ya nɛɛ dɛɛ bol ya waa dɛɛ pa bole ɔ?
He dɛ nyin he kpo mɛ gɛ haa kpo Ijipt te la dɛ la kɛɛ?'
Mosis aa no a gɛ waa nɔ la, o ɔmɔ, dɛ chwa le Ijipt harɛ dɛ ka so Midian harɛ ta. O lolɛ bibaala banɛ bela.
"Bene fifraanaarɛ aa baa gale Mosis nyu ta bela la, o la pua bɛl waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta, Sinai bwejen la bɔr, dɛ ka na nyundua torome bela. Dɛ dawii ane aa dɛ lawɛ baahnee nyundua torome la che.
Dɛ dawii la dɛ lawɛ, kɛ dɛ aa fuh. Anomanta a ɛ Mosis anebɛlbwa, asɛ o tuuh tel ninlao la bɔr dɛ́ won na kɛrɛdɛ. Waa tuuhna dɛɛ tel bela la, o noɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii aa dɛ bol ŋɔ,
'Menee Korowii la he naanar Abraham ne Aesek ne Jekɔb aa dɛ tomɛ la.' Mosis ɔmɔ dɛɛ chel, o ta berɛ dɔ bambile dɛ́ nyiŋu.
Asɛ Korowii ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Foo he naŋgawa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n siee he che la.
N na fiiga Ijipt tena aa dɛ fiigi n nɛra Ijipt harɛ la, dɛ no ba wii baa dɛ wi la bwa ge. A balaa n ba ŋɔ ń ba lɛɛ ba ta la. Anomanta n dɛ ba he toma Ijipt harɛ.'

"Mosis la Israel tena faa vɛoh dɛ ŋɔ ó bagle naate waa chego kora ta ŋɔ ó baa nyiŋi ba nɛɛ dɛɛ bol ba waa la, onee Korowii tomɛ ŋɔ ó ba tɔ ba sie dɛ lɛɛ ba ta la. Nyundua torome la Mosis aa nao dawii nii ta la nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ tomɔ.
Mosis ɛ nyokpowaa Ijipt harɛ ta mɔɔ dɛ kpɔ o nɛra le bela, dɛ ɛ nyokpowaa Mposwɛm la ta ne bene fifraanaarɛ baa dia pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta la bwa ta.
Mosisii ŋɔ nɛra la be ŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ tomɛ o keame bɛlee ba be gɛ waa tomɔ la, dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ le ba dwee taa.

A gɛ Mosis nɔ ne ya naanar ne nyundua torome waa bol waa o be Sinai bwe ta laanee fa dɛ cheme pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo la ta. Belaa Korowii kpɔ o waa aa wola garɛ, aa wola tonɛ ge la, tɛo ŋɔ ó ba ŋɔ ya be.
"Kɛ ya naanar ŋɔ baa o waa no, dɛ vɛh o nɛɛ teŋa dɛɛ wi Ijipt harɛ wa.
Ba ŋɔ Aarɔn be ŋɔ ó kwaa voga tɛɛ ba ásɛ a tɔ ba sie. Dɛ ŋɔ ba ta wone jemɛ kon la aa ɛ Mosis la waa tɔ ba sie le Ijipt harɛ ta la.
Belaa ba ma vog bɛl kɛŋɔ nabii ken dɛ kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛo, dɛ koh kon la ba gbagba aa maa la waa di kwa, dɛ sa dɛɛ lɛ ba sie.

Asɛ Korowii berɛ habɔɔ kpo ba, dɛ gel baa ɛ ba tetoowaa dɛɛ tomɛ wee ne korobie ne weweela aa lɔ nyundua la. Gɛɛ ba chwerɛ Korowii Keamere Tɔn ta la ŋɔ, 'Israel tena, he faa lɔ pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta bene lafraanaarɛ la, menee he fa kpoo kondɛɛra dɛɛ tɛ la aa?
Vog Molɔk la dea ne wewee la haa mao dɛɛ tomɔ dɛɛ yerɔ Refan la laa he che dɛɛ gaage la aa? He gbagbaa fa ma a gɛ voga nɔ dɛɛ toma. Anomanta mɛɛ doŋi heyaa kaa Babilɔn harɛ ta dɛ kaa he ne bojaŋ.'
"Ya naanar aa lɔ pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo ta la, dɛ ba dɔ tɔne ane baa dɛ baŋra kɛŋɔ dea ken, asɛ a gɛ dea la ɛ Korowii dobɔr. Gɛ Korowii aa bagle Mosis laanee ba kwaaro.

A gɛ Korowii Dea nɔ baa kpɔ tɔne baŋro nɔ baa di ya naanar nɔn ta saŋ bɛl. Ba ge naanaree serewa dɛ kpɔ tɛɛ ba. Ba ne Josua aa dɛ valɛ la bwa, dɛ ba chegɛ a gɛ debaŋre la tɔne. Baa dɛ kaa la bwa dɛ Korowii dɛ doŋi nɛra baa lɔ ba sie bwɛɛre la ta la asɛ baa so a ta. Gɛɛ dea la do ba be ka tel saŋ la Devid aa baa di kora la.
Dɛ Korowii dɛ nyin Devid wa. Dɛ Devid dɛ nyin o ma dea ásɛ o ɛ Korowii o naa Jekɔb faa dɛ tomɛ la dea. Belaa o soŋe Korowii ŋɔ ó tɛo ŋwɛnɛ ásɛ o ma a gɛ dea la.
Korowii ta on a gɛ ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ. Devid bie Solomɔnee bera ba ma Korowii Dea la.
"Gɛ Korowii keame la aa bagla la, Korowii waa kana gwaa komɛlbwa la aa deene nɛwɛnyini aa maa la ta so. Korowii keame bagle gɛ Korowii aa ŋɔa ŋɔ,
'Nyunduaa n kara, asɛ harɛ gee n nakpajagrebɔr. Debesoo siwii hɛɛ ba wona ma ń jo o ta nɔ? Debesoo taa ń won jo dɛ chɔ onɔɔ?
N gbagba laa ta kwaa nɔ bwa kɛɛ?' "

Asɛ Steeven ɛɛ bol waa dɛ ŋɔ, "Deŋnekpeg tena, ɛrɛɛ he bambili do kpegri kɛŋɔ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ nɔɔ? Ɛrɛɛ haa wola Korowii Waa no ken? He ne he naanar bwa beŋkpoŋ, haa Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa nyin dɛ no saŋ te bɛlbwa.
Korowii keamere la bini ume nɛɛ he naanar aa wola chegɛ dɛ ɛo sagasaga nɔ? Ba ta nɛra Korowii aa toma ŋɔ bá ba bol o nɛŋkaih la bala waa la kpooraa? Waa bala la, he ge ta on yoge dɛ kpoo waa?
He nɔn taa nyundua toroma kpɔ Korowii mmarare la ba do, kɛ he ta a ta teŋɛ!"
Nomonome la aa no gɛ Steeven aa bola la, dɛ ba baah diu, baa pwee dɛɛ chwee bobɛlbwa.
Korowii Domadɛɛge aa soge Steeven nɛɛ kpegri nɛɛ nomanta, o nyiŋi nyundua dɛ na kɛŋɔ bɔr aa chaahna werwer ken Korowii be. Asɛ o na Yeesu chega nomombɔr Korowii dig ta bela,
asɛ o ŋɔ, "Hé na! N na nyundua aa pila asɛ Nɛn Bie la che nomombɔr Korowii dig ta bela!"
Belaa nomonome la nyɛg o nɛɛ bab! dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra tɔɔge ba deŋna dɛ bɛ o wobol la no kpa. Bug la ta dɛ ba bwa lɔɔ ba tɔ o nɛ,
dɛ tuugu le bwɛɛ la dahara. Nɛra baa no o wobol la foo ba laala bil bonɔɔ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Sɔɔl sie mɔɔ, dɛ la ka fogre Steeven bwea.
Baa dɛ fogro bwea la, dɛ o yerɛ Yeesu, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ Yeesu, n kpɔ n lileo dɛɛ do he nɔn ta dɛ́ sewɛ!"
Belaa o guŋi harɛ dɛ bol waa takpeg ne ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, bɛ gel a gɛ wechɔga nɔ gure ba nɛ." Waa ŋɔ gɛ tonɛ, o den sewɛ.
Baa kpo Steeven la, Sɔɔl sɛoh ŋɔ o chɛ kpoe. Awola tɔpere la ba fiigi asɔre tena baa lɔ Jerusalam la, asɛ ba chwa pegre Judia harɛ ne Samaria harɛ bwɛɛre la ta. Yeesu toroma la gboo wola chwae.
Nɛra baa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowiirii kaa huge Steeven dɛ wiu kɛrɛdɛ.
Sɔɔl ge ɛ wobɛlbwa waa won dɛ́ chɔg asɔre tena la waa bwa, dɛ jo bela deremi bwa ta dɛ tɛgre ba bini baala ne haahna bwa kaa do dea.
Bobɛlbwa asɔre tena la aa pegra dɛ la la, ba bol Amanesoma la dɛɛ gaage.
Felep iro la Samaria harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl ta, dɛ ka bol Kristo la Korowii aa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la waa bela tena be, dɛ ka bag ba ŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la.
Nɛnlaa la aa na nyokpowaa waa dɛ ɛ, dɛ no o wobol la, ba cheg deŋne no o be,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ o wono doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra la kɛrɛdɛ nɛɛ ta. Aa dɛ le la, dɛ a dɛ dooge lɔŋɔre. Felep chah nɛra ba bobɛla aa serewa ne boobie ge ja,
asɛ bwɛɛ la tena sie lɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
Dɛ baa bɛl lɔ bwɛɛ la ta dɛ ɛ o te bebee bɛl baa yerɔ Seemɔn. O bebeewaa la kpo Samaria tena bwa nyoa. Dɛ o dɛ maŋkura o te dɛɛ yerɛ o te nɛnjen bɛl.
Anomanta bela bechale ne ba nomonjena bwaa cheg deŋne dɛ yon dɛɛ no o be, dɛ ta kane so dɛɛ nyiŋi o we-ɛɛla. Ba nyoa kpo o waa dɛ ŋɔ, "Jamɔ Korowii kpegnɛn baa dɛ yerɔ Kpegri Tenten Dɔɔ laanee nɔ?"
Seemɔn soge bela bigri. O bela soga la saŋ bebeewaa waa ɛa la ta wekokori ɛɛ, anomanta ba ta kane so dɛ cheg deŋne no o be kɛrɛdɛ.
Baa bera ba no Amanesoma waa Felep aa dɛ bol dɛɛ bagle Korowii Kora ne Yeesu Kristo waa la, ba yaradao. Dɛ ba ne ba haahna bwa dɛ ba baa sɔ ba Korowii ne.

Seemɔn Bebee la gba berɔ ba yarada Korowii waa la, asɛ ba sɔɔ a ne. Baa sɔɔ nee la, o kpɔ o te pɛl Felep. Bobɛlbwa Felep aa dɛ la la, o ne onee dɛɛ la. Seemɔn aa na nyokpoa tomkpega Felep aa dɛ ɛ la, a ɛo anebɛlbwa.
Yeesu toroma baa lɔ Jerusalam aa noa kɛŋɔ Samaria tena yarada Korowii waa la la,
ba tomɛ Pita ne Jɔn ba be. Baa la bela la, ba kaa soŋe Korowii tɛɛ ba, asɛ Korowii tɛɛ ba o Domadɛɛge la.
Dɛ Korowii ta gelɛ o Domadɛɛge la so ba bɛlbwa nɛɛ mɔɔ. Dɛ nee gboo ba sɔ ba báa teŋɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛ.
Pita ne Jɔn kpɔ ba nɔɔra darawe ba nɛ, asɛ Korowii gel o Domadɛɛge la ba so ba nɛ.
Seemɔn aa naa kɛŋɔ darawa Pita ne Jɔn aa kpɔ nɔɔra darawe nɛra la nɛɛ laanee gela Korowii Domadɛɛge la ba so ba nɛɛ la, o kpɔ suuga ba ba be,
dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé lɛ dɛ tɛ n ge a gɛ kpegri nɔ bɛl ásɛ nomɛlbwa maa kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛɛ la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la ɛɛ so o nɛ."
Belaa Pita ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He ne he suuga bwa ɛɛ pɔɔh! Ɛrɛɛ he ɛ na kɛŋɔ hɛɛ wonoo yawɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa kɛ o nɛra nɔɔ?
He ta ya toma nɔ ta jae, he ta dibɔr ge dɔe a ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bambile ta chaahnɛ Korowii be.
Charɛ he liire dɛ le he wechɔga nɔ haa dɛ lii nɔ ta, dɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ dɛ aa magroo waa, ó kpɔ he wechɔga haa liira nɔ kɛɛ.
He bɔweela gɛne kohona, he wechɔga ge kan kohona to."
Anee Seemɔn ŋɔ Pita ne Jɔn be ŋɔ, "N poo heya, hé soŋe Korowii tɛ mɛ asɛ waa haa dɛ bol nɔ bɛlbwa bɛ men ɛ."
Pita ne Jɔn babagle waa Korowii aa ɛa bwa, dɛ bol Korowii Waa bwɛɛ la tena be. Baa tona dɛ berɛ dɛɛ kaa Jerusalam la, ba chegɛ Samaria harɛ bwɛɛre la kɛrɛdɛ ta dɛ bol Amanesoma la ba be.
Belaa nyundua torome bɛl ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ, "Ir kaa wekaŋle harɛ bɔr le, bela ŋwɛnɛ bɛl aa le Jerusalam kaa Gasa la." Pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gboo a gɛ bɔr nɔ.
Felep iro chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ la, dɛ ka na Itiopia harɛ haŋkooro Kandase nomoa waa dɛ cheg o suuga dɛɛ nyiŋi o kondɔɔh bwa la. Dɛ ba fɔgɛ a gɛ baa nɔ lur.
O la Jerusalam ka tomɛ Korowii dɛ berɛ dɛɛ kaa o bwɛ. Dɛ o soge kwaa ba yon vɔwɛ pɛl jagre dɛ so a bini aa tɛgra la bɛl ta dɛɛ kure Korowii keame Aesaya tɔn bobɛl.
Belaa Korowii Domadɛɛge ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ, "La jagre kon la jwɛh."
Asɛ Felep chwa la o be dɛ ka no kɛŋɔ waa dɛ kure Korowii keame Aesaya tɔn bobɛl. O bɔɔro ŋɔ, "He dɛ no waa haa dɛ kure nɔ mun aa?"
Anee nomoa la ŋɔ, "Dɛ nomɛl ta men a mun baglaa, mɛɛ wonoo no a mun aa?" Belaa o ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ ó teeh ba so o be jagre kon la ta.
Dɛ Korowii Tɔn waa nomoa la aa dɛ kure laanee la: "O helɔ kɛŋɔ baa lawɛ pee kaa kpobɔr o yon hel la. O tɔ nyoa kɛŋɔ baa dɛ fonɛ pebie pona o yon tɔ nyoa la. O ta nyoa pile bol wobɛlbwa sese.
Ba doo sihiih dɛ vɛh o waa bola dɛ tɛo a ŋwɛnɛ ta, dɛ kpoo. Waa dɔa sewɛ la, umee dɛ won bagle o naanar waa kpa ɔ?"
Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ, "Bag mɛ nɛn la nɛnsoo Korowii keame nɔ aa dɛ bol o waa nɔ. O gbagba waa wɛɛ bol, kɛɛ nomɛl waa wɛɛ bol ɔ?"
Asɛ Felep le a gɛ waa la baa la aa kura Korowii Tɔn ta la ta dɛ bagle Yeesu bwara waa aa ɛ Amanesoma la.
Baa kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ la ta dɛɛ kaa la, ba kaa le nee bɛl ta, anee nomoa la ŋɔ Felep be ŋɔ, "Nee la. Den sɔ mɛ Korowii ne. Kɛ waane lole ja?"
(Asɛ Felep ŋɔ, "Dɛ he yarada Yeesu Kristo waa bambile bwa ne naa, mɛɛ sɔe a nee." Anee nomoa la ŋɔ, "N yaradao. N yaradao kɛŋɔ Korowii Biee Yeesu Kristo.")
Belaa o gel o jagre kon la che, asɛ ba nɛra banɛ la bwa tu dɛ jo nee la ta, asɛ Felep sɔɔ Korowii ne.
Baa le nee la ta la, Korowii Domadɛɛge baa kpɔ Felep kaa bug la ta. Nomoa la ta on nae kpa, dɛ chig ŋwɛnɛ ta kaa silɛɛ ne.
Felep ne nyiŋa dɛ o lɔ Asotas. O le bela bol Amanesoma la baah bela bwɛɛre la bwa ta ka tel Sisaaria.
Dɛ Sɔɔl ta swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ aah asɔre tena la ŋɔ wɛɛ kpo baa. O la Sɔfore Nomoa be

dɛ ka soŋo ŋɔ ó tɛo o nɔn bini tɔn ásɛ o kpɔ gaage bwɛɛ la baa dɛ yerɔ Damaskɔs la cheremi deene ta, asɛ dɛ o na Yeesu ŋwɛnɛfale tena la bɛlbwa naa, baalee yoo, haahnee yoo, ó lag ba dɛ vɔg ba, dɛ kpɔ ba ba Jerusalam.
Sɔɔl aa dɛ kaa dɛ ka tel Damaskɔs la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nii le nyundua dɛ chaah o nɛ.
Belaa o chole harɛ dɛ no kɛŋɔ nomɛl aa dɛ yerɔ dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Oo, Sɔɔl! Ɛrɛɛ he che n nɛɛ gɛ nɔɔ?"
Asɛ Sɔɔl ŋɔ, "Henee umeo, n Dɔɔ?" Asɛ naate ŋɔ, "Menee Yeesu la haa dɛ yoo mɛ la.
Kɛ ir dɛ kaa Damaskɔs bwɛɛ bini. Belaa hɛɛ ba gɛ aa chɛ kɛ he ɛ jema."
Nɛra ba ne Sɔɔl aa dɛ kaa la no wobol ane, kɛ ba ta nɛn nae. Asɛ ba jagɛ che, ba ta jemɛ waa baa bol.
Sɔɔl iro che dɛ pili sie, kɛ dɛ waa na, asɛ ba lawɔ daa ba Damaskɔs.
A di tɔpera atoro, dɛ waa na. Dɛ waa kwaa di, waa nee ge nyɔ.
Dɛ asɔre te bɛl lɔ Damaskɔs baa yerɔ Ananias. O noɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu aa dɛ yerɔ chaahna ta ŋɔ, "Ananias!" Asɛ o sɛh ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, menee la."
Asɛ Yeesu ŋɔ, "Ir la fɔgbaah la baa dɛ yerɛ bela 'Fɔgtogre' la ta, dɛ ka jo Judas dem dɛ bɔɔ Taasos baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Sɔɔl la wa. O dɛ soŋe Korowii,
dɛ na chaahna bini kɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Ananias aa baa jo dea dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛɛ asɛ o berɛ dɛɛ na ja."
Belaa Ananias ŋɔ, "N Dɔɔ, nɛra baa bol baa nɔ waa n be warɔ. O wechɔgdamanta waa ɛ he nɛra baa lɔ Jerusalam la bwa waa ba bol n be.
O taraken bala waa ba Damaskɔs nɔ, Sɔfonomonomee tɛo kpegri ŋɔ ó ba ba larawe ya nɛra yaa dɛ tomɛ la bwa la."
Anee Yeesu ŋɔ o be ŋɔ "Kaa! Menee leo dɛɛ nyin n tomɔ ásɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ne ba koranar ne Israel tena bwa ba che o nɛɛ dɛ jem mɛ.
Mɛɛ geloo o jemɛ wahala bwa waa dɛ ba n waa koeh dɛ na."

Anomanta Ananias kaa jo dem Sɔɔl aa lɔ o ta la ta, dɛ kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "N dɔŋ Sɔɔl, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu gbagbaa tom mɛ he be. Onee kpɔ o te bagle gɛ saŋ haa dɛ ba bonɔ la. O tom mɛ ŋɔ ń ba ásɛ he berɛ won dɛɛ na ja, ásɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ge so he nɛ."
Bug la ta dɛ kwaane le Sɔɔl sie lee harɛ kɛŋɔ pɛŋe pɛga ken, asɛ o berɛ won dɛɛ na ja. Anee o ir, asɛ ba sɔɔ Korowii ne,
asɛ o di kwa, o bwara do kpegri. O soge asɔre tena baa lɔ Damaskɔs la be tɔpera anɛ,
asɛ o den la bela cheremi deene bini dɛ kaa bol Yeesu waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra dɛɛ ŋɔ Korowii Biee Yeesu.

Nɛra baa no o wobol la bwa nyoa kpoo, ba ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ laa fa dɛ ɛ nɛra baa lɔ Jerusalam dɛɛ tomɛ Yeesu la sagasaga dɛɛ nyin o kpoo ba la aa? Aah a gɛ asɔre tena nɔ lawa sɔn laa o yerɛ dɛ ba bonɔ dɛ́ fe ba lag ba ka tɛ Sɔfonomonome la aa?"
Sɔɔl aa dɛ bol Korowii Waa la, dɛ name kwaraa o wobol la bini ɛɛ do kpegri. O baglɔ le Korowii wobol la ta kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la kasinteŋ, anomanta Juda tena baa soge Damaskɔs la ta wone tɔŋlo kpa.
Aa bigra tama la, Juda tena la chemo dɛ vɔrɔwe ŋɔ bá fe kpo Sɔɔl,
asɛ o no ba waa baa vɔrɔwa la. (Dɛ ba ma danjwɛɛ bar ba bwɛɛ la, asɛ o dɔ doonyoone.) Dɛ ba dɛ daah bwɛɛ la doonyoone chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa dɛɛ nyin bɔr dɛ́ kpoo.
Belaa o habɔteŋra la doo wɛgrɛ bini jwaana dɛ che danjwɛɛ la tokoro bɛl ta kpɔɔ tu bwɛɛ la dahara, o kaa Jerusalam.
Sɔɔl aa la Jerusalam la, o laŋɔ ŋɔ ó fe ka ja asɔre tena baa lɔ bela la nɛ, kɛ dɛ ba bwa dɛ ɔmɔ, ba ta on yaradae kɛ asɔre tena la bɛlee on.
Belaa Banabas tɔ o sie dɛ kpɔɔ ba Yeesu toroma la be, dɛ bagle gɛ Sɔɔl aa dɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ ba na Yeesu asɛ o bol waa o be. Banabas bagle gɛ Sɔɔl aa wona bol waa Damaskɔs bambile ne Yeesu sɔn ta.
Ate dɛ Sɔɔl ne asɔre tena laanee dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa Jerusalam bela. O bol waa bambile ne Yeesu sɔn ta.
O ne Juda tena baa dɛ bol Grik wobol la bol waa dɛ tɔŋle waa kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ baa nyin bɔr dɛ́ kpoo.
Sɔɔl bala asɔre tena la aa baa na gɛ la, ba kpɔɔ kaa Sisaaria, dɛ ka doo ŋwɛnɛ bela o kaa Taasos.
A habɔɔ la, asɔre tena baa lɔ Judia ne Galilia ne Samaria harɛre la bwara sɔɔh ba, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la cha ba, nɛra baa ja ba nɛ, baa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii dɛɛ teŋɛ o ŋwɛnɛ ta nomanta.
Dɛ Pita dɛ valɛ bwɛɛre ta taeh. Awola bɛl o ba Korowii nɛra baa lɔ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Leda la be.
Belaa o ka na baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Aeneas. Dɛ o kuugo so harɛ bene anuatoro.
Pita ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Aeneas, Yeesu Kristo chaeh. Ir che dɛ gugri he kalaŋ bug nɔ ta." Bug la ta dɛ Aeneas iro che.
Nɛra baa lɔ Leda ne Saron bwa na baa la dɛ charɛ ba liire, dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
Dɛ haah bɛl lɔ Jopa dɛ ɛ asɔre te baa yerɔ Tabita. Grik tena ge dɛ yerɔ Dɔɔkas. Dɛ haah la dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga taeh dɛɛ cha nyaara.
A gɛ saŋ Pita aa lɔ Leda la, Tabita bwara weo o sewɛ, asɛ ba sɔɔ ne dɛ kpɔɔ bil abrɔsane bɛl doa.
Dɛ Jopa ne Leda aa jaŋɛ, anomanta asɔre tena baa lɔ Jopa la aa noa kɛŋɔ Pita lɔ Leda la, ba tomɛ baala banɛ o be dɛ ŋɔ bá ka ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ba dɛ soŋo kɛ ó gel wobɛlbwa dɛ ba ba be warane.
