Toroma la aa laŋa la, Pita kpɔ o te dɛ puu ba kaa. Waa laŋa la, ba kpɔɔ deeh abrɔsane la. Dɛ luhaahna baa lɔ bela la bwa baa chwa baro dɛɛ wi, dɛ kpɔ batakaani ne yale Tabita aa sɔah gɛ saŋ waa wola sewɛ mɔɔ la dɛɛ bagle Pita.
Pita doŋi ba bwa le buse dɛ guŋi harɛ, dɛ soŋe Korowii, dɛ berɛ sie lale la be dɛ ŋɔ, "Tabita, ir!" Haah la pili o sie. Waa na Pita la, o iro so.
Belaa Pita tel o be dɛ lawɔ ir che, dɛ ka yerɛ asɔre tena ne ba bini luhaahna la bwa dɛ kpɔ haah la waa iru la tɛɛ ba.
A gɛ waa nɔ perɛ Jopa bwa, asɛ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ che a ta dɛ yarada Yeesu waa la.
A habɔɔ la, Pita soge Jopa bela bigri. Dɛ gbansaba bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn la deaa o do.
Dɛ baa bɛl lɔ Sisaaria baa yerɔ Kɔnɛɛleɔs. Itali harɛ soojare bane nomoaa on.
O ne o dem tena bwa dɛ tomɛ Korowii. Dɛ o dɛ cha Juda tena baa ɛ nyaara la taeh, dɛɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa.
Awola bɛl o na waane kɛŋɔ deera ken wekee saŋ. O nao kɛŋɔ nyundua torome bɛl aa baa jo o be dɛ yerɔ ŋɔ, "Kɔnɛɛleɔs!"
Asɛ o ha sie nyiŋu ɔmee ne dɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ yɔ? A som aa, n Dɔɔ?" Asɛ nyundua torome la ŋɔ, "He soŋa haa dɛ soŋe Korowii, ne he chae haa dɛ cha nɛra la lɛ o sie, o dɛ ba he chae.
Tomɛ nɛra ba la Jopa dɛ ka yerɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn Pita la ba.
O ɛ hɔɔh dɛ do gbansaba bɛl waa soge mpo nyoa baa yerɔ Seemɔn la dem."
Nyundua torome la aa bol waa tonɛ la, o kaalɔ, asɛ Kɔnɛɛleɔs yerɛ o bonɔɔna banɛ ne sooja bɛl waa dɛ tomɛ Korowii kohona dɛɛ teŋɛ o Kɔnɛɛleɔs nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwa la,
dɛ bol waa la bwa chag ba, dɛ tom ba Jopa.
Tɔ aa pera baa la dɛ ka tel Jopa la, Pita deeh sal dea webaŋa ne dɛɛ ba Korowii soŋa. Dɛ wee chegɛ nyufala.
Dɛ lɔr lawɔ, asɛ wɛɛ nyin kwaa dɛ di, kɛ dɛ ba ta dɛ ɛ o kondikwa. Belaa o na waane kɛŋɔ deera ken.
O nao kɛŋɔ nyundua aa pera, asɛ ba lawɛ komɛl kɛŋɔ yajen o nyoo bɔre anaarɛ la bwa, kwaane do o ta a sagɛ jɛɛhjɛɛh dɛ le nyundua dɛɛ ba harɛ.
Dɛ naa anaarɛ tena ne ola aa dɛ tuugi harɛ ne anɔ la aa dɛ huuh ne jumbii bwa lɔ yal la ta.
Belaa Pita no kɛŋɔ nomɛl aa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Pita! Ir dɛ kpo chwe!"
Asɛ Pita ŋɔ, "Ei! N Dɔɔ, gɛ aa won magre. N ta koŋkiila dii bwa."
Anee naate berɛ ŋɔ o be nɛɛtena ŋɔ, "Kon Korowii aa laa o doŋa kpɔ o nɛɛ la, bɛ on kondoŋ yerɛ kpa."
A gɛ waa nɔ ɛo kera atoro mɔɔ kon la berɛ kaa nyundua.
Pita aa wola waa la mun jemɛ dɛ so sakaa la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nɛra Kɔnɛɛleɔs aa tom ba la balɔ. Ba bɔɔ Seemɔn dem dɛ ka che dem la doonyoa,
dɛ yerɛ nomɛl dɛ bɔɔro ŋɔ, "Seemɔn la baa dɛ yerɔ Pita la lɔ dem nɔ ta kɛɛ?"
Pita liire aa lɔ waa la ta o taa lii la, Korowii Domadɛɛge ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nɛra batoro bane dɛ nyin he bɔr,
anomanta bɛ ɔmɛ. La ba be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ menee tom ba."
Anee Pita ir la nɛra la be dɛ ka ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Men nɔ, a som aa?"
Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Soojare nomoa Kɔnɛɛleɔs laanee tomɛ yaa. O ɛ nɛndɛɛge waa dɛ tomɛ Korowii, asɛ Juda tena bwa ɛɛ duuru. Nyundua torome bɛlee ŋɔ o be ŋɔ ó yerɛ ba o dem dɛ́ no waa haa dɛ ba o be bola."
Belaa Pita ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá chɔ o be ásɛ tɔɔ per ba kaa. Tɔ aa pera la, Pita bala asɔre tena baa lɔ Jopa la bane ja o nɛɛ asɛ ba ne toroma la kaa.
Baa lea la, tɔɔ perɔ mɔɔ ba tel Sisaaria. Dɛ Kɔnɛɛleɔs yerɛ o lolanar ne o daamanar cheme dɛ so dɛɛ kpa Pita.
Waa tel Kɔnɛɛleɔs dem bela dɛɛ ba dem la bini joe la, Kɔnɛɛleɔs baa chemo dɛ guŋi harɛ.
Anee Pita lawɔ ir dɛ ŋɔ, "Ir harɛ, he nɛwɛnyini dɔŋee men."
Pita ne o bol waa ka jo dem bela. Belaa Pita na kɛŋɔ nɛra cheme bela pirim,
asɛ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya Juda tena aa nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bini jo. Kɛ Korowii berɔ ŋɔ n be ŋɔ n bɛ nomɛlbwa nɛndoŋ yerɛ.
A waa he yer mɛ n ba warane la. N dɛ bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ ɛrɛɛ he ŋɔ ń ba ɛɔ?"
Belaa Kɔnɛɛleɔs ŋɔ, "Tɔpera anaarɛɛ nɔ, maa lɔ n dem saŋ nɔ bɔr tenten dɛɛ soŋe Korowii wekee saŋ la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ baa bɛl waa do laalapoŋa kpelkpel chegɛ n sie
dɛ ŋɔ, 'Kɔnɛɛleɔs! Korowii no he soŋa haa dɛ soŋo dɛ na he chae haa dɛ cha nyaara la bwa.
Tomɛ nomɛl Jopa baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn Pita la be ó ka yerɔ ba. O ɛ hɔɔh dɛ do gbansaba bɛl waa soge mpo nyoa baa yerɔ Seemɔn la dem.'
A waa n tomɛ nɛra he be warane la. He ge ɛ waa kɛŋɔ haa bala nɔ. A waa ya bwa cheme Korowii sie bonɔ la. Ya dɛ nyin waa Korowii aa ŋɔa hé ba bol ya be la dɛ́ no."
Belaa Pita pa o wobol mun dɛ ŋɔ, "Taraken te n nao kɛŋɔ kpela, nɛwɛnyini bɛlbwa ta o dɔŋ gwaalɛ Korowii be.
Kɛ harɛ bɛlbwa ta la, nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii dɛ jemɔ la, Korowii sie dɛ lɛ o nɛ.
He jemɛ waa waa ŋɔa bá ka bol Israel tena be dɛ bagle Yeesu Amanesoma aa dɛ tɛ bosɔɔhna la. Yeesuu komɛlbwa Dɔɔ.
Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la toma la habɔɔ Yeesu waa che dɛ perɛ Judia harɛ bwa la. Galilia harɛɛ a pa mun.
He jemɛ gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ o Domadɛɛge ne o kpegri tɛ Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la wa. Dɛ Korowii teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ, asɛ o valɛ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ chah nɛra Bɔnsam aa lɔ ba bil la.
O waa waa ɛa Judia harɛ ta ne Jerusalam la bwaa ya na dɛɛ di a danseɛ. Ba kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta dɛ kpoo.
Asɛ o seo habɔɔ tɔpetooro wee la ta la, Korowii iru seo ta, dɛ gel o kpɔ o te ba chagle yaa.
Korowii ta gelɛ o kpɔ o te chagle nomɛlbwa ka ja ya nɛra waa le yaa ŋɔ yá di o danseɛ nɔ nɛ. Ya gɛ nɛra nɔ ne o pɛ nɔn di kwaa o seo ta ira la habɔɔ.
Onee le yaa dɛ ja yaa ŋɔ yá bol o waa bagle nɛra bwa, dɛ́ di danseɛ kɛŋɔ onee Korowii le ŋɔ ó ba di weera ne lala bwa wa.
Korowii keamere la bwa bol Yeesu waa ŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa yarada o waa la, o nomanta Korowii ɛɛ kpɔ naate wechɔgaa kɛo."
Pita taa dɛ bol waa la, dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge baa so nɛra baa dɛ no o wobol la bwa nɛ.
Dɛ Juda tena baa ɛ asɔre tena ba ne Pita aa le Jopa ba la, baa na gɛ la, ba nyoa kpoo kɛŋɔ Korowii aa gela o Domadɛɛge la ba so nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ gba nɛ,
dɛ gel baa bol wobofala dɛɛ jam Korowii la. Belaa Pita ŋɔ,
"Gɛ tenten Korowii aa tɛ yaa o Domadɛɛge laanee o tɛ nɛra nɔ ge la. Aah aa do gɛ nɔ, umee dɛ won vɔm ba Korowii nee sɔe yɔ?"
Belaa Pita ŋɔ bá sɔ ba nee Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta. Baa sɔ nɛra la nee tonɛ la, ba gelɔ Pita so ba be tɔpera anɛ.
Yeesu toroma la ne ba bala asɔre tena baa lɔ Judia harɛ ta la noɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa no waa la dɛ yarada.
Pita aa la Jerusalam la, ba bala Juda tena baa dɛ maŋkura penteŋ waa la pwaoh ŋɔ,
"Ɛrɛ waa he ka chog nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ baa wola ba pena teŋe dem dɛ saah di kwaa bela nɔɔ?"
Baa ŋɔ gɛ la, anee Pita le waa la mun ta dɛ bagle waa la bwa aa bala o di ba kondikwaa la.
O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Jopaa n do dɛɛ soŋe Korowii, dɛ na waane a do kɛŋɔ deera ken. N nao kɛŋɔ baa lawɛ komɛl kɛŋɔ yajen nyoo bɔre anaarɛ la bwa, kwaane do o ta, a sagɛ jɛɛhjɛɛh dɛ le nyundua dɛɛ ba harɛ.
Maa nyiŋi o ta la, n na ola, a bini anɔ la aa dɛ di ol ne anɔ la aa dɛ chwe kpɔga bwa, ne anɔ la aa dɛ tuugi harɛ ne anɔ la aa dɛ huuh bwa, ne jumbii bwa.
Asɛ n no kɛŋɔ nomɛl aa ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Pita, ir dɛ kpo, dɛ chwe.'
Belaa n ŋɔ, 'Aa magre, n Dɔɔ! N ta koŋkiila dii bwa. A ɛ doŋa tɛ mɛ kɛrɛdɛ.'
Asɛ naate berɛ kwaa ŋɔ n be nyundua bela ŋɔ, 'Kon Korowii aa laa o doŋa kpɔ o nɛɛ la, bɛ on kondoŋ lii kpa.'
A gɛ waa nɔ ɛo kera atoro, asɛ kon la berɛ kaa nyundua kwaraa.
"Bug la ta dɛ baala batoro bane baa le Sisaaria ba tom ba n be denɔ ba jo dem maa lɔ o ta la ta.
Belaa Korowii Domadɛɛge la ŋɔ n be ŋɔ n bɛ ɔmɛ, kɛ ń teŋɛ ba nɛɛ kaa. Yabala banumɛl nɔ baa le Jopa nɔ ge teŋɛ n nɛɛ la Sisaaria, asɛ ya bwa ka jo Kɔnɛɛleɔs dem.
Belaa o ge bagle gɛ o ge aa na nyundua torome o dem, asɛ o ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, 'Tomɛ nɛn Jopa, asɛ ó la baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Seemɔn Pita la be.
Wɛɛ bol waa he bee ásɛ he ne he dem tena bwa che a ta dɛ dɔ he nyu.'
Maa la o be la, maa pa mun dɛɛ bol waa la, dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la baa so o ne o dem tena nɛɛ kɛŋɔ waa baa so ya nɛɛ logla la.
Belaa n lii gɛ ya Dɔɔ faa ŋɔa ŋɔ, 'Nee nee Jɔn faa sɔ nɛra Korowii ne, kɛ he te, Korowii Domadɛɛge nee baa ba he sɔe la.'
Yaa baa yarada Yeesu la, kon Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ yaa laanee o tɛ nɛra nɔ la. Aah dɛ n gee umeo dɛ́ tɔŋle Korowii ɔ?"
Baa no gɛ la, ba nyoa sɔɔhnɔ, asɛ ba jam Korowii dɛ ŋɔ, "Amɔ te Korowiirii tɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ge ŋwɛnɛ ásɛ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta dɛ dɔ ba nyu!"

Steeven seo la habɔɔ fiiga baa fiigi asɔre tena asɛ ba pegre la gelɔ bane kaa bojaŋa tenten. Hale bane la Finiisia ne Saepros ne Anteɔkwa bwa. Baa dɛ valɛ a gɛ harɛre nɔ ta la, ba ta Yeesu waa la bolɛ nomɛlbwa be ka ja Juda tena nɛ.
Kɛ Saepros ne Sairini baala bane ba ge aa ɛ asɔre tena la te iro dɛ la Anteɔk dɛ ka bol ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Amanesoma la waa nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ be.
Dɛ Korowii dɛ cha ba o kpegri ne, asɛ nɛra no Yeesu waa la dɛ yaradaa dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛ Yeesu. Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ warɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
Asɔre tena baa lɔ Jerusalam la baa no a gɛ waa nɔ, dɛ tomɛ Banabas ŋɔ ó la Anteɔk asɔre tena la be dɛ́ ka na gɛ ba Korowii toma aa doa.
Waa la bela dɛ ka na gɛ Korowii aa nyin ba dɛɛ cha ba la, o sie lɛo. Anomanta o ja ba dɛ do ba gbemba ŋɔ báa teŋɛ Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ ta ba bambile bwa ne.
Dɛ Banabas ɛ nɛndɛɛge asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ge so o nɛɛ kpegri nɛ. Dɛ o dɛ yarada Yeesu taeh dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo. Anomanta nɛra charɛ ba liire pirim dɛ ba tomɛ Yeesu.
Banabas la Taasos dɛ ka gaage Sɔɔl bɔr.

Waa nao la, o kpɔɔ kaa Anteɔk. Baa lɔ bela la, ba benanyobir bwa dɛ ba ne bela asɔre tena dɛ cheme. Ba bagle nɛra pirim Yeesu waa bela. Anteɔk belaa ba tɔ sie yerɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu la Kristo tena.
A gɛ saŋ la, Korowii keamere bane le Jerusalam la Anteɔk.
Dɛ ba bini bɛl sɔne Agabus. Korowii Domadɛɛge la ir o nɛ, asɛ o ir che dɛ na chaahna dɛ ŋɔ lɔrchɔge bɛl dɛ ba ba harɛ la ta bala. (Kpela, a balɔ Klɔdeɔs kara dii saŋ).
Belaa asɔre tena la ŋɔ baa pu siee ta suuga gɛ ba bɛlbwa aa wona laanee dɛ ka tɛ ba bala asɔre tena baa lɔ Judia harɛ la mɔɔ lɔr la ba.
Ba ta a gɛ suuga la dɛ kpɔ tɛ Banabas ne Sɔɔl ba ka tɛ Judia harɛ asɔre tena la nomonome.
A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ Juda tena kooro bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Hɛrɔd la larawe asɔre tena bane dɛɛ fig ba.
O gelɔ ba teŋe Jɔn dɔɔ Jems nyu.
Waa ɛ gɛ dɛ na kɛŋɔ a lɛ Juda tena sie la, belaa o gel ba lawɛ Pita ge. Paanoo baa wola iisi a ta do la benanyoa dii taa a gɛ waa nɔ chig.

Kooro Hɛrɔd aa lawɛ Pita la, o doo dea dɛ gel soojare bananaarɛ bele banaarɛ ɛɛ daahno. Dɛ o fe dɛ lii kɛ dɛ ba di Galekaa benanyoa la tonaa, o fee bol Pita waa nɛnfuuh baah ta dɛ pa bole ásɛ nomɛlbwa na.
Gɛɛ a do ba do Pita dea. Kɛ dɛ o bala asɔre tena la pɛpɛo dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛo tenten.

Kooro Hɛrɔd fe lawɛ tɔpere bɛl dɛ́ fe bol Pita waa la dɛ pa bole. Jwaana la tɔ aa per ásɛ tɔpere la tel la, dɛ Pita chɔ soojare baa dɛ daahno la banɛ baah ta dɛɛ chɔ dom, asɛ jɔgrɔre anɛ do o nɔɔra. Dɛ soojare banɛ lɔ dea la doonyoa dɛɛ daah bela.
Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nyundua torome chegɛ dea la bini, asɛ bela chaah. O baa lɔ Pita dɛ chumu, dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Ir warane!" Bug la ta dɛ Pita nɔɔra jɔgrɔre la foo le.
Asɛ nyundua torome la ŋɔ, "Do he laala ne he naŋgawa." Pita aa ɛ gɛ nyundua torome la aa ŋɔa la, o berɔ kwaa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kpɔ he yal tɔ dɛ teŋɛ n nɛ."
Belaa Pita teŋɛ o nɛɛ le dea la bini. Waa teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛɛ le la bwa, dɛ o ta jemɛ kɛŋɔ wekpelaa o na la. Dɛ o dɛ lii kɛ deeraa wɛɛ dee.

Ba baa garɛ bologle soojare aa dɛ daah la, dɛ ba garɛ nɛɛte ge ja, dɛ ba tel doonyoa o gbera aa ɛ buni asɛ ba che o ta le buse dɛɛ jo bwɛɛ la bini la. Baa dɛ tel gbera la bɔr, dɛ o gbo yao, asɛ ba le dɛ kpɔ ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ta dɛɛ kaa. Bug la ta dɛ nyundua torome la nyogrɔ.
Belaa Pita ta na waa aa ɛo la, dɛ ŋɔ, "Namee n ta jemɛ kɛ N Naa Korowiirii gela o nyundua torome nɔ ba lɛɛ mɛ le Kooro Hɛrɔd nɔn ta, dɛ lee mɛ waa Juda tena bwa fe aa dɛ lii kɛ mɛɛ nao la ta."
Waa na gɛ la, o la haah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Mɛɛre la dem. A gɛ Mɛɛre nɔ biee Jɔn Maak. Dɛ nɛra cheme bela pirim dɛɛ soŋe Korowii.
Pita lɔ dem la gbera, asɛ tolo bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Roda ba dɛ fe ba yao.
Waa no taa la kɛŋɔ Pitaa la, silɛɛ kohona gelɔ o ta berɛ ya gbera la, dɛ berɛ chwa la ka ŋɔ asɔre tena la be ŋɔ Pita chegɛ buse.
Ate dɛ ba ŋɔ, "Choglaa hɛɛ we kɛɛ?" Baa dɛ tɔŋlo la bwa, dɛ o nyoa kpegri kɛrɛdɛ wɛɛ bagle kɛ kpelaa wɛɛ bol la. Anee ba ŋɔ, "Amɔ te o lalee."
Ate dɛ Pita dɛ lɔ gbera la tenten. Baa yaa dɛ nao la, ba nyoa kpoo.
Anee Pita kpɔ nɔn ɛg ba ŋɔ bá bwa tɔ nyoa, asɛ dɛ bagle gɛ Korowii aa leo o dea doe la ta bwa. O ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá ŋɔ Jems ne ba bala la kar la be, dɛ le kaa bobɛl.
Tɔ aa pera la, sibegra chole soojare baa dɛ daah bela la nɛɛ taeh, asɛ baa nyin Pita bɔr yalayala ken, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba ta wone jemɛ bela waa kpɔa.

Kooro Hɛrɔd aa baa no kɛŋɔ Pita nyogrɔ la, o gelɔ ba nyin o bɔr, kɛ ba ta on nae. Anomanta o gelɔ ba bɔɔ soojare la waa kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ ŋɔ bá kpoo ba. A habɔɔ la, Kooro Hɛrɔd le Judia harɛ dɛ ka so Sisaaria tama.

Dɛ o baah di bwɛɛre baa dɛ yera Taaya ne Sidon la tena nɛɛ taeh. Belaa gɛ bwɛɛre nɔ tena nyoa pɛo, asɛ ba ba dɛ ba na Kooro bonɔɔna nomoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Blastus la ŋɔ ó cha ba dɛ larawe Kooro ásɛ ba ne o pɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Kooro Hɛrɔd harɛ taa a gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛɛ yawɛ ba kondikwa.
Kooro Hɛrɔd tɛɛ ba tɔpere báa berɛ kpɔ ba o be ja. A gɛ tɔpere la aa tela la, o do o koolaala dɛ so o kookara ta dɛ bol waa bagle nɛra la.
Waa bol waa la, nɛra la koogaɔ, dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛwɛnyini laa bol waa nɔ. Vogee berɛ nɛn dɛ bol waa la."
Kooro Hɛrɔd aa wola gelɛ ba kpɛɛ Korowii, dɛ lɛ kpɛɛra la tɛ o te la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nyundua torome baa lɔɔ bil, asɛ kpaloglare diu o sewɛ.
Anɔ bwa aa dɛ ɛ la, dɛ nɛra dɛ yarada Korowii waa la, asɛ aa perɛ ge tenten.
Banabas ne Sɔɔl aa ɛ toma baa tom ba ŋɔ bá la Jerusalam ka ɛ tonɛ la, ba ne Jɔn Maak kaa Anteɔk.

Dɛ Korowii keamere ne nɛra baa dɛ chagle nɛra Korowii waa ge lɔ Anteɔk asɔre tena la bini. Banee Banabas ne Seemɔn baa dɛ yerɔ Nɛmbiŋi la, ne Lusias waa le Sairini la, ne Maneeyan la baa dɛɛro Kooro Hɛrɔd mɛɛ dem la, ne Sɔɔl.
Awola bɛl a gɛ nɛra nɔ aa vɔwɛ nyoa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la, Korowii Domadɛɛge baa ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé le Banabas ne Sɔɔl tɛ mɛ ásɛ ba ɛ toma maa lee ba ŋɔ bá ba ɛ la."
Anomanta ba vɔwɛ nyoa dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra darawe nɛra banɛ la nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ ba do Korowii nɔn ta, dɛ gel ba kaa.
Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa tom ba la, ba la Sɛluusia, dɛ ka che bela kpɔ gbera kaa Saepros harɛ ta. Dɛ ekwii a gɛ harɛ nɔ.
Baa tel Saepros bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Salamis ta la, ba bol Korowii Waa bagle nɛra bela Juda tena cheremi deene bini. Dɛ ba dɔ Jɔn Maak wɛɛ cha ba ba toma ta.

Ba gaage Saepros harɛ la bwa ta dɛ bol Korowii Waa bagle nɛra dɛ ka le o nyoa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Pafɔs la ta. Baa tel Pafɔs la, ba kaa na Juda te dobodobo te bɛl. Dɛ o sɔne Baajesɛs. Dɛ Grik tena ge dɛ yerɔ Ɛlemas. O koh o dobodobo la waa dɛɛ yerɛ o te Korowii keame.
Dɛ ekwi la nomoa baa dɛ yerɔ Sɛɛjos Pɔɔlos la bee o do. A gɛ nomoa nɔ jemɛ waa taeh, dɛɛ nyin Korowii Waa dɛ no. Anomanta o yerɛ Banabas ne Sɔɔl ba o be.
Dɛ dobodobo te la aa nyin kɛŋɔ nomoa la no Yeesu wa, dɛɛ tɔ Banabas ne Sɔɔl ŋwɛnɛ, dɛɛ tɔŋ ba.
Asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ir Sɔɔl Grik tena aa dɛ yerɔ Pɔɔl la nɛ, asɛ o pa sie baa la nɛɛ dɛ nyiŋu dɛ ŋɔ,
"Bɔnsam nɛn kohona, he hah wedɛɛga bwa kɛrɛdɛ! He lambaara kan ga. Bɛ he wechɔga la kpɔ tɔ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ.

Dɛɛ no bonɔ. Korowii ɛɛ bagle o kpegri he nɛɛ asɛ he nyoŋe, asɛ a bigri tama mɔɔ he berɛ won dɛɛ na bɔr." Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ o sie ɛo jumaa kɛŋɔ kɔɔla ken, o den nyoŋe, dɛɛ lagre bɔr dɛɛ nyin nɛn ó lawɔ da.
Nomoa la aa na a gɛ waa nɔ la, o yarada Yeesu waa dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu waa la baa dɛ chagle la kpo o nyoa.
Pɔɔl ne nɛra o ne baa dɛ valɛ la jo gbera ta le Pafɔs bela dɛ ba Pɛɛga waa lɔ Pamfiilia harɛ ta la. Jɔn Maak gel ba bela dɛ berɛ kaa Jerusalam.
Pɔɔl ne o nɛra la le Pɛɛga dɛ la Anteɔk waa lɔ Pisidia harɛ ta la. Ona Tɔpere la aa baa tel la, ba kaa jo bela Juda tena cheremi dea bini dɛ so.

Baa soge bela la, nɛra bane kure waane le Mosis Mmara Tɔn bini ne Korowii Keamere Tɔn bini, asɛ nomonome baa dɛ nyiŋi cheremi dea la bini waa ta la ŋɔ Pɔɔlwa be ŋɔ, "Yabala, dɛ he dɔ waane dɛ́ bol dɛ ja yaa aa, ŋwɛnɛ chɔ le."
Belaa Pɔɔl ir che dɛ kpɔ nɔn ɛg ba ŋɔ bá tɔ nyoa, dɛ ŋɔ, "N bala Israel tena ne he nɛra haa baa ja ya nɛɛ dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, hé no n be.

Korowii la ya Israel tena nɔ aa dɛ tomɛ la fa le ya naanar ŋɔ ba ɛ o nɛra nɛwɛnyini bwa bini. A gɛ saŋ baa lɔ Ijipt harɛ la, o gelɔ ba warɛ, asɛ ba sɔn ge le kohona. Belaa o ba kpɔ ba le Ijipt harɛ o kpegri ne,
dɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ ba bene fifraanaarɛ baa dia pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ la bwa ta.
Wobol bele anuanɛ bwa nɛraa o doŋi ba harɛre ta Keenan harɛ ta, dɛ gel a gɛ harɛre la ɛ ba kwaa bene lafraanaarɛ fifraanue.
"Anɔ bwa habɔɔ la Korowii tɛɛ ba nomonome baa nyiŋi ba nɛɛ dɛ ka tel Korowii keame Samoɛl bere saŋ.
A gɛ saŋ la ba soŋe Korowii ŋɔ ó tɛɛ ba kooro, asɛ o tɛɛ ba Kes bie Sɔɔl ŋɔ ó ɛ ba kooro. Dɛ Benjamen dea biee on. Bene fifraanaarɛɛ Sɔɔl di kora la mɔɔ,
Korowii leo kora la ta, dɛ kpɔ Devid so. Korowii bol Devid waa ŋɔ, 'Jese bie Devid waa too n tea, dɛkalkɛ onee n na kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ɛ n tetoowaa maa dɛ nyin kɛ o ɛ bwa.'
Gɛ Devid nɔ dea taa Korowii le Yeesu waa bagɛ Israel tena nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo o ba lɛɛ ba la.
Yeesu aa wola balɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ Jɔn dɛ bagle Israel tena bwa ŋɔ bá charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta, ásɛ o sɔ ba Korowii ne.
Jɔn toma aa dɛ tonɛ la, o bɔɔ nɛra bane ŋɔ, 'Nɛn besoo hɛɛ lii mɛ nɔ? Nɛn haa dɛ kpao la laa men. O ta lɔ habɔɔ. Maa o napaa tee kwaraa dɔ.'
"Yabala, Abraham naanar ne he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii bwa, ya bee waa aa dɛ ba nɛwɛnyini lɛɛ nɔ ba.

Jerusalam tena ne ba nomonome ta jemɛ kɛ Yeesuu nɛwɛnyini Lɛɛ la. Korowii waa o keamere aa chwera asɛ ba kure dɛɛ bag ba Ona Tɔpera bwa ta la, dɛ baa a mun no. A waa ba bol o waa dɛ pao bolchɔge dɛ kpoo gɛ Korowii keamere aa bagla ŋɔ baa ɛo la.
Dɛ ba ta wobɛlbwaa dɔe dɛ kpɔ dawɔ kɛŋɔ o chɛ kpoe, kɛ dɛ ge soŋe ba harɛ nomoa Paelet ŋɔ ó pao bolchɔge dɛ kpoo.
Baa ɛo gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla ŋɔ baa ɛo bwa tonɛ la, ba kpɔɔ le dagagre la doa dɛ ka hugo.
Asɛ Korowii berɛ iru seo ta.
O kpɔ o te bagle nɛra o ne baa le Galilia harɛ kaa Jerusalam la kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa. A gɛ nɛra nɔɔ dɛɛ diu danseɛ Juda tena bwa be.
"Amanesoma nee ya ba he be. Gɛ Korowii aa bagɛ ya naanar nyoa la,
gɛɛ o ɛ tɛ ya nɛra yaa ɛ ba naanar la. Anee kɛ o ir Yeesu seo ta. Ba chwerɛ o waa Korowii Kpɛɛra Tɔn yel nɛɛte la bini ŋɔ, 'N biee hen. Finii n lolɛ.'
Gɛ Korowii aa bagle o waa o Tɔn bini ŋɔ wɛɛ iru seo taa asɛ o bɛ bɔɔ bini chɔ pɔh laanee nɔ: 'Mɛɛ ɛɛ wedɛɛga maa bagɛ Devid nyoa kasinteŋ bwa ne laanee.'
A waa ba berɛ chwerɛ a gɛ tɔn la bobɛl ŋɔ, 'Haa gel he bidɛɛge chɔ bɔɔ bini pɔh' la.
"Gɛ saŋ Devid aa lole la, o ɛ Korowii tetoowaa kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛ sewɛ, asɛ ba hugo, o bwadabii pɔh.
Kɛ nɛn la Korowii aa iru seo ta la te ta pɔeh.
Yabala, ya dɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu waa waa ɛa la waa ya won dɛɛ bol he be ŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ kpɔ he wechɔgaa kɛ heyaa la.

Wubwa la, haa dɛ nyin gɛ haa ɛ ásɛ Korowii kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heyaa la, Mmara la Korowii aa kpɔa do Mosis nɔn ta la ta wone cha heya. Kɛ taraken te, nomɛlbwa waa yarada Yeesu la, Korowii dɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi.
Anomanta hɛ́ɛ do dɛɛgɔ asɛ waa Korowii keamere la aa bola la bɛ heyaa ɛ. Ba baglɔ ŋɔ,

'He nɛra haa nyiŋi nɛra dɛɛ vah dɛɛ mamɛ nɛra la, hé nyiŋi waa maa dɛ ɛ nɔ kɛrɛdɛ. Aa ba kpo he nyoa he serewe. Waa maa dɛ ɛ fini nɔ ɛ waane, dɛ nɛn bagle a bini tɛ heyaa kwara naa, haa wola yarada!' "
Pɔɔl aa bol waa tonɛ la, o ne Banabas iro dɛɛ le cheremi dea la bini. Belaa nɛra baa bol waa bag ba la ŋɔ Pɔ́ɔlwa berɛ ba Ona Tɔpere waa ba ja la ta dɛ́ ba bol waa la bag ba ja.

Nɛra la aa le cheremi bɔr bela la, Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ baa ja Juda tena nɛɛ dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la teŋɛ Pɔɔl ne Banabas nɛɛ pirim. Pɔɔlwa bol waa bag ba, dɛ ja ba ŋɔ báa teŋɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta ásɛ wɛɛ cha ba.
Ona Tɔpere la aa bala ja la, bwɛɛ la tena kɛrɛdɛ bwa la cheremi dea bela dɛ́ ka no Korowii Wa.
Juda tena la aa na nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la aa wara kohona la, a ɛɛ ba bɔweela taeh, asɛ baa tɔŋle Pɔɔl ne Banabas dɛɛ ɛɛ ba nɛnhɛla.

Baa dɛ ɛ Pɔɔl ne Banabas nɛnhɛla la, ate ta kwaraa baa bol waa bansua ne dɛɛ ŋɔ, "A ŋwɛnɛ taa ya tɔ sie bol Korowii Amanesoma waa la he be la. Kɛ he gbagba aa vɛah dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he te ta Korowii mkpa la chɛɛ nɔ te naa, yaa gel heyaa dɛ la nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la be,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛɛ ya Dɔɔ ŋɔ ya be ŋɔ, 'N le heyaa ŋɔ hé ɛ nii dɛɛ chaah nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa, ásɛ nɛra baa lɔ harɛ jaga bwa la che he nɛɛ dɛ no Korowii Waa aa dɛ ba ba lɛɛ la he be.' "

Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la aa no waa nɔ la, ba sie lɛo taeh. Anomanta ba jam Korowii kɛŋɔ waa gela ba no o waa la. Asɛ nɛra Korowii aa ŋɔa baa dɔ o mkpa laanee la yarada Yeesu waa la dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo.
O waa la perɛ bela bwɛɛre la bwa ta.
Anɔ bwa aa dɛ ɛ la, dɛ bela Juda tena la ir bela nomonjena ne haahna bane baa ɛ nɛnjena dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la bwaawee, asɛ ba baah di Pɔɔl ne Banabas nɛ, ba hah ba dɛ doŋ ba ba bela bwɛɛre la ta.
Pɔɔl ne Banabas pee ba napaala teera ta bela dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ ba kpɔ Korowii Waa ba ba be asɛ ba vɛah, dɛ kaa Ikooniam.
Anɔ bwa aa dɛ ɛ la, bɔhwaah ta asɔre tena baa lɔ bela la lawɛ. Dɛ ba sie lɛo kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ge so ba nɛɛ taeh.

Pɔɔl ne Banabas aa la Ikooniam la, ba kaa bol Korowii Waa bela Juda tena cheremi dea ta gɛ ba yon dɛɛ ɛ la. Korowii Domadɛɛge la cha ba asɛ baa bola kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ bela Juda tena kɛrɛdɛ ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa yarada Yeesu waa la dɛ kpɔ ba tɛ tɛo.
Kɛ bela Juda tena baa wola Yeesu waa yarada la te chɔg Pɔɔl ne Banabas sɔn, dɛ ir nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwaawee, asɛ ba baah di nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la nɛ.

Pɔɔl ne Banabas soge bela bigri. Baa lɔ bela la, dɛ ba dɛ bol Yeesu waa bansua ne, dɛɛ bagle gɛ waa dɛ sune nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba. O cha ba asɛ ba won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa ne wekpega, asɛ nɛra na dɛ jemɛ kɛ o waa baa dɛ bol la ɛ kpela.
Bwɛɛ la tena baah pegro, bane teŋɛ Juda tena la nɛ, bane ge teŋɛ Yeesu toroma la nɛ.
Juda tena la bane ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ne ba bela nomonome fe vɔrɔwɔ ŋɔ bá ɛ Yeesu toroma la hɔhɔrɔwa dɛ́ fog ba bwea ge.
Kɛ Yeesu toroma la no a gɛ waa nɔ dɛ chwa kaa bwɛɛre ane baa dɛ yera Lestra ne Dɛɛbe ne baah bela bwɛɛre la ta. Dɛ Laikoonia harɛ taa gɛ bwɛɛre la do.
Baa lɔ bela la, dɛ ba dɛ bol Yeesu Amanesoma la bela.
Dɛ baa bɛl lɔ Lestra dɛ so boobi le o bechale saŋ bwa, waa wola wone valɛ bwa.
Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol waa la bwa dɛ boobi la soge bela dɛ cheg deŋne dɛɛ no o be. Pɔɔl nao kɛ boobi la yarada waa waa dɛ bol la, dɛ na kɛ wɛɛ wonoo che o yarada la ta dɛ chaoh. Belaa o pa sie boobi la be,
dɛ kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Ir che!" Asɛ boobi la fugri ir che chiŋ, dɛɛ valɛ.
Nɛra aa na waa nɔ la, ba bol waa ba Laikoonia wobol la ne kpegri nɛɛ dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ya vogaa berɛ nɛra dɛ ba ya be la!"
Ba ŋɔ ba vogjen baa dɛ yerɔ Seus laanee Banabas, dɛ ŋɔ ba voga bini keame baa dɛ yerɔ Hɛɛmes laanee Pɔɔl, dɛ kpɔ a sɔna pa ba. Ba ŋɔ Pɔɔlee voga keame la, dɛkalkɛ dɛ on dɛɛ bol waa saŋ bɛlbwa.

Dɛ Seus vog dea chegɛ bwɛɛ la ŋwɛnɛ ta, dahara nyoa tenten. Seus vog te kpɔ nae ne kwaa ba ge aa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ nɛra woowo le bwɛɛ la ŋwɛnɛ ta, dahara nyoa tenten, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin kɛ o ne o bwɛɛ tena kpo tɛ Yeesu toroma la kɛ voga ken.
Banabas ne Pɔɔl aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, a ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa, asɛ ba kpɔ tebinichɔg pee ba gbagba batakaani, gɛ ba bwɛɛ tena yon dɛɛ ɛ la, dɛ lɔ jo nɛra la bini sibegra ne, dɛɛ bol waa takpeg ne dɛɛ ŋɔ,

"Bwɛɛla, ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ɛ ken nɔɔ? Nɛraa yan kɛ heyaa ken. Amanesoma nee ya ba he be, ásɛ he no dɛ gel konsale nɔ ne komɛlbwa toma, dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii o gbo aa ɛ Korowii dɛ do le saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ ta nyundua ne harɛ ne mpo ne kwaa aa lɔ a ta bwa la.
A saŋ la, dɛ Korowii gelɔ he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ɛɛ ɛ he tetoowa.
Kɛ dɛ o chegɛ wedɛɛga waa dɛ ɛ la ta dɛ gel he jemɛ kɛ o lole. Dɛ o dɛ tɛ heyaa bwaala ne, dɛ gel kondikwaa gee ɛ, asɛ he di dɛɛ vagɛ he bwara ɛɛ sɔɔh heya."
Dɛ nɛra la nae kpoora dɛ tɛ Yeesu toroma la swɛɛ ba siwi taeh. Wedamanta Yeesu toroma la aa bola la bwa habɔɔ la, dɛ ba siwi ta swɛɛ kwaa kpoora dɛ tɛɛ ba la ta. Gɛɛ ba ɛ aaa, mɔɔ dɛ ta ba gel.

A habɔɔ la Juda tena bane baa le Ikooniam ne Anteɔk waa lɔ Pisidia harɛ ta la ba bela dɛ ba bol waa dɛ berɛ Lestra tena la liire asɛ ba baah di Pɔɔl nɛ. Ba fogro bwea dɛ tuugu le bwɛɛ la ta. Dɛ ba dɛ lii kɛ o sewɔ.
Nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la ba Pɔɔl be dɛ ba baro cheme, asɛ o ir dɛ berɛ jo bwɛɛ la bini. Tɔ aa pera la, o ne Banabas la Dɛɛbe.

Baa lɔ Dɛɛbe la, ba bol Amanesoma la bela. Bela tena baa no Pɔɔlwa waa la dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛ yarada Yeesu waa dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo la warɔ. Ba le bela dɛ laa berɛ ba Lestra, dɛ la Ikooniam, dɛ ka che bela kaa Anteɔk waa lɔ Pisidia harɛ ta la.
Pɔɔlwa do gɛ bwɛɛre nɔ asɔre tena la gbemba ŋɔ báa teŋɛ Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ la ta kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ ba nyogre, dɛ ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa na wahala kohona mɔɔ dɛ dɔ Korowii Kora la bini jo.
Bwɛɛre nɔ bɛlbwa ta asɔre tena aa lole la, Pɔɔl ne Banabas le ba bini bane ba ɛ ba nomonome. Nyoa vɔwa ne Korowii soŋa nee ba yon kpɔ nomoa la do Korowii baa kpɔ ba yarada bwa do o nɛɛ la nɔn ta.
Ba gaage Pisidia harɛ kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ che bela ba Pamfiilia harɛ ta.
Ba bol Korowii waa Pɛɛga, dɛ che bela la Ataalia.
Belaa ba che kpɔ gbera dɛ laa berɛ ba Anteɔk. Anteɔkee ba fa kpɔ Pɔɔl ne Banabas do Korowii nɔn ta kɛŋɔ ó cha ba asɛ ba ɛ toma baa tona taraken nɔ la.
Baa ba Anteɔk la, ba yerɛ asɔre tena la bwa cheme dɛ bag ba gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ ba ɛ toma bwa, ne gɛ waa pili ŋwɛnɛ tɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ba ge jemɛ Yeesu waa dɛ yaradao la bwa.
Ba ne asɔre tena la sogo bigri.
Baala bane le Judia harɛ ba Anteɔk dɛ baa bagle nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ta he pena teŋe gɛ Mosis Mmara la aa bagla la aa, haa Korowii mkpa dɔe ba."
Pɔɔl ne Banabas ne gɛ nɛra la tɔŋle dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta ba tomɛ o ne Banabas ne Anteɔk asɔre tena la bane Jerusalam ŋɔ bá ka na Yeesu toroma la ne asɔre tena nomonome la a gɛ waa la wa.

Baa tom ba la, ba kaalɔ. Baa dɛ kaa la, ba kaa kpɔ harɛre ane baa dɛ yera Finiisia ne Samaria ta dɛɛ la, dɛɛ bol bela asɔre tena be gɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la aa bera dɛɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo. Ba ge aa no gɛ la, ba sie lɛo taeh.
Baa tel Jerusalam la, Yeesu toroma la ne bela asɔre tena ne ba nomonome lɛɛ ba kɛrɛdɛ. Pɔɔlwa bagle toma Korowii aa chegɛ ba nɛɛ dɛ ɛ bwa.
Dɛ asɔre tena la bane ɛ Farisii tena. Ba iro dɛ ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ baa yarada Yeesu taraken la ɛɛ teŋe ba pena dɛɛ di Mosis Mmara ge ta."
Belaa Yeesu toroma la ne asɔre tena nomonome la cheme dɛ nyiŋi waa la ta.

Ba bol waa dɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa la sie, asɛ Pita ir che dɛ ŋɔ, "Yabala, he jemɔ kɛ Korowiirii fa lee mɛ he bini ŋɔ ń bol o Amanesoma la bagle banɔ la baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, ásɛ ba ge no o waa dɛ yarada.
Korowiirii jemɛ nomɛlbwa nyu bini, dɛ tɛɛ ba o Domadɛɛge gɛ waa tɛ yaa la, dɛ bagle kɛ o nɛraa ba ge.
O ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ ba korɔ ya korɛ. Baa yarada Yeesu waa la waa Korowii laa ba wechɔga kpɔ ba nɛ.
Aah dɛ ɛrɛ waa hɛɛ nyin kɛ he daah Korowii dɛ́ na nɔɔ? Dɛ bontɔga ya ne ya naanar bwa faa wola wone che la laa hɛɛ nyin he kpɔ chog ba nɔ naa?
Aa magre! Yarada yaa yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu la waa o na ya sum dɛ cha yaa, dɛ lɛ yaa. Gɛ tentenee ba ge yaradao o lɛɛ ba."
Nɛra baa cheme bela la bɛlbwa ta berɛ tɔŋle kpa, dɛ tɔ nyoa dɛɛ no Pɔɔl ne Banabas be. Pɔɔl ne Banabas bagle nyokpowaa ne wekpega Korowii aa kpɔ ba ɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bini.
Baa bol waa tonɛ la, Jems ge bol waa ŋɔ, "Yabala, hé no n be!
Seemɔn Pita bagle gɛ Korowii aa tɔ sie ɛ dɛ bagle kɛ o dɛ nyin nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la taeh. O baglɔ ŋɔ Korowii le ba bini bane ŋɔ ba ɛ o nɛra.
Korowii keamere la bwaa fa bol a gɛ waa nɔ dɛ chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ,
'A habɔɔ la, mɛɛ berɔɔ ba nyiŋi Devid kora waa gua kɛŋɔ dea waa kua chole la ta. Mɛɛ berɔɔ ir ba kora la kɛŋɔ dea waa chola ba kwaa mao la, dɛ tɛ ba naa bɛl kpegri ásɛ o di kora ja,
ásɛ harɛ ta nɛra baa kaa baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa ba nyin n bɔr dɛ tom mɛ. Men lee ba ŋɔ ba ɛ n nɛra. N Naa Korowiirii ŋɔ gɛ.
A saŋ la bwaa o gel nɛra na gɛ waa nɔ.'
Gɛ n te aa naa laanee kɛ, ya bɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ kpɔ dɛɛ ha nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta la,
kɛ yá chwer ba tɔn ŋɔ ba bɛ voga kwaa dɛɛ di, dɛ laa ba te kpɔ jwamane waa ta, dɛ bɛ kon baa wola o baŋa teŋe o sewɛ la dɛɛ di, dɛ bɛ chal dɛɛ di,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Mosis Mmara nɔ yaa bagle a waa nɔ, bwɛɛre bɛlbwa taa nɛra baa dɛ bagla la do. Ona Tɔpere te bɛlbwa taa baa kure Mosis Mmara waa nɔ cheremi deene ta dɛ le saŋ la bwa ba le fini."

Belaa Yeesu toroma la ne asɔre tena la ne ba nomonome bwa ɛ ba liire kɛŋɔ baa le ba bini banee asɛ dɛ tomɛ ba ne Pɔɔl ne Banabas Anteɔk. Judas baa bera dɛɛ yerɔ Baasabas la ne Silasee ba le. Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛ asɔre tena la nomonome baa dɛ tɔ ba sie la bane.

Asɛ ba chwerɛ tɔn tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá kpɔ kaa. Waa baa chwera laanee nɔ: "Yabala haa lɔ Anteɔk ne Siiria harɛ ne Silisia harɛ haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, Yeesu toroma la ne ya asɔre tena ne ya nomonome yaa ɛ he bala Jerusalam la bwa dɛ na heya.
"Ya noɔ kɛ ya bini bane ba dɛ bagle heyaa waane, asɛ he liire ɛ heyaa sakaa ken. Ya laa tom ba.
Anomanta ya chemo ya nyoa pɛ, asɛ ya ŋɔ yaa tomɛ nɛraa ásɛ ba ne Banabas ne Pɔɔl ba wa aa too ya tea kohona la la he be.
Bambile bwa nee Pɔɔl ne Banabas ɛɛ ɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo toma nɔ. Dɛ baa dɔ sewee toma nɔ ɛɛ ta noo, ba waane laa.
Ya ŋɔ Júdas ne Silas ge ja ba nɛɛ dɛ ɛ dɛ bol tɔn nɔ bini waa tenten hé no.
Waa ya ne Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa naa laanee kɛ aa were kɛ ya gel hɛɛ ki komɛlbwa ka ja anɔ aa dɛ ba wona cha heyaa nɔ nɛ.

Anee kɛ he bɛ voga kwaa dɛɛ di, he bɛ chal dɛɛ di, he bɛ ol baa wola o baŋa teŋe o sewɛ dɛɛ di, hé laa he te kpɔ jwamane waa ta. Dɛ he wono dɛɛ ki anɔ bwa naa, he wobɛlbwa ɛɛ magroo tɛ heya. Kórowii cha heya."
Ba kpɔ tɔn la do Pɔɔl ne Banabaswa nɔn ta dɛ ta ba ŋwɛnɛ, asɛ ba kaa Anteɔk. Ba kaa yerɛ bela asɔre tena bwa cheme, dɛ kpɔ tɔn la tɛɛ ba.
Baa kure tɔn la la, ba sie lɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ tɔn la do ba gbemba.
Dɛ Korowii keameree Judas ne Silas. Ba bol waa taeh dɛ kpɔ do ba gbemba, dɛ ja ba.
Ba soge Anteɔk tama, asɛ ba bala la ŋɔ bá berɛ la nɛra baa tom ba la be, dɛ ŋɔ Kórowii la ba ne sɔnɔnɔɔ.
Pɔɔl ne Banabas te soge Anteɔk tama, asɛ ba ne ba bala bane ɛɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛɛ bagle ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa nɛra be.
A habɔɔ la, Pɔɔl ŋɔ Banabas be ŋɔ ó gel ba berɛ la bwɛɛre baa bagle nɛra Yeesu waa a ta la bwa ta dɛ ka na gɛ ba bala baa bag ba Yeesu waa la aa doa.
Dɛ Banabas dɛ nyin kɛ Jɔn Maak ja ba nɛɛ dɛ la.
Dɛ Pɔɔl ge be naa, a ta magrɛ kɛ Jɔn Maak la bɛl, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o fa teŋɛ ba nɛɛ toma la ta dɛ ka tel baah ta dɛ chwa gel ba Pamfiilia.
Pɔɔl ne Banabas begre wa, dɛ a nyoa kpegri, asɛ ba pegri. Banabas kpɔ Jɔn Maak ja o nɛɛ ba jo gbera ta kaa Saepros,
asɛ Pɔɔl ge kpɔ Silas. Baa dɛ ba kaala la, asɔre tena la kpɔ ba do Korowii nɔn ta ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛ.
Baa dɛ kaa la, ba kpɔ Siiria ne Silisia harɛ ta dɛɛ ja bela asɔre tena, dɛɛ do ba gbemba.
Pɔɔl baa le Dɛɛbe ne Lestra dɛ ba na asɔre te bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Timoti la bela. Dɛ o nya ɛ Juda te dɛɛ yarada Yeesu wa. Asɛ o mɛɛ te ɛ Grik te.
Dɛ asɔre tena baa lɔ Lestra ne Ikooniam la bwa dɛ yerɛ Timoti sɔndɛɛge taeh.
Pɔɔl sie lɛ Timoti nɛ, asɛ wɛɛ nyin kɛ o teŋɛ o nɛ, dɛ koh Juda tena baa lɔ bela la waa dɛ teŋe Timoti pen, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ ba jemɔ kɛ Grik tee o mɛɛ.
Baa valɛ bwɛɛre la ta dɛɛ kaa la, ba bol koŋkiila Yeesu toroma la ne Jerusalam asɔre tena nomonome la aa bagla kɛ nɛ́ra ɛɛ ki la waa bela asɔre tena be.
Gɛɛ ba ɛ dɛ won cha bela asɔre tena ba do kpegri Yeesu waa baa dɛ yarada la ta, asɛ nɛnfala ge baa ja ba nɛɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa.
Ba valɔ dɛ ka kpɔ harɛre baa dɛ yera Frejea ne Galaasia la ta, dɛkalkɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ta ban ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ bá bol Yeesu waa la Eesia harɛ.
Baa dɛ kaa dɛ ka tel Maesea harɛ jaga la, ba fe ŋɔ bá jo Bitiinia harɛ ta, kɛ Yeesu Domadɛɛge ta ban ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ,
asɛ ba berɛ kpɔ Maesea harɛ ta kaa Troas.
Awola jwaana ne la, Pɔɔl na chaahna. O nao kɛ Makidoonia harɛ te bɛl aa chega dɛɛ soŋo dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ba Makidoonia dɛ ba lɛ yaa."
Pɔɔl aa na chaahna la la, men maa dɛ chwerɛ tɔn nɔ ne o kpɔ ya te dɛ kaa Makidoonia harɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɔ kɛ Korowiirii dɛɛ nyin kɛ ya la ka bol Amanesoma la bela tena be.
Anomanta ya chegɛ Troas jo gbera ta dɛ pa sie kaa Samotres. Tɔ aa pera la, ya la Neapolis,
dɛ ka che bela kpɔ harɛ kaa Felepae. Dɛ Felepae nɔɔ ɛ Makidoonia be pera bwɛɛre la bwa bwɛjen. Dɛ koojen waa dɛ nyiŋi Room harɛ laanee dɔ bela. Ya bigri bela tama.
Ona Tɔpere la ta la, ya le dem dɛ la bwɛɛ la moo nyoa. Dɛ ya dɛ lii kɛ Juda tena ɛɛ dɛɛ cheme belaa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii. Dɛ haahna bane cheme bela, asɛ ya so harɛ dɛ bol waa ba be.

Dɛ nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ no waa yaa bola la bɛl sɔne Liidia. Dɛ yale aa kɔlaa wɛɛ yog, dɛ do Tiatra dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii. Waa dɛ no waa Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol la, Korowii pili o liire asɛ o noa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo.
Ya sɔ o ne o dem tena bwa Korowii ne, asɛ o soŋe yaa ŋɔ, "Dɛ he jemɔ ŋɔ n dɛ tomɛ Korowii kɛrɛdɛ naa, amɔ hé ba so n be." O soŋe yaa, asɛ ya kaa o dem.
Awola bɛl ya dɛ la Korowii soŋebɔr moo nyoa bela dɛ ka na bitolo bɛl. Dɛ nɛra bane yomii, asɛ kwaa gee ir o nɛɛ asɛ o won dɛɛ vogɛ. Dɛ o voga la gelɔ o tena ɛɛ dɔ suuga taeh.
A gɛ bitolo la do lɔŋɔre teŋɛ ya ne Pɔɔl nɛɛ dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Korowiijenii tomɛ nɛra nɔ he be la! Waa haa ɛ ásɛ Korowii lɛ heyaa laanee baa bol la!"
Tɔpera aŋwɛnɛ bwa dɛ gɛɛ wɛɛ ɛ, anomanta a baa pe Pɔɔl, asɛ o berɛ habɔɔ dɛ kpɔ bandia ŋɔ kwaa la aa dɛ ir yomhaah la nɛɛ la be ŋɔ, "Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta, hé le o nɛ!" Bug la ta dɛ kwaa la le o nɛ.
Kwaa la aa lea la, dɛ yomhaah la aa wone dɛɛ vogɛ kpa. O tena aa naa kɛŋɔ o bɛ won voga la tɔ ba suuga dɔe ŋwɛnɛ la, ba lawɛ Pɔɔl ne Silas dɛ tɛg ba kaa ba bela Room nomonome be bombaah ta.
Dɛ a gɛ nomonome nɔɔ dɛɛ bol nɛra waa dɛɛ pa bole. Yom la dɔɔranar la ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Juda tenaa nɛra nɔ. Ba hae baa dɛ ha ya bwɛɛ nɔ tena la aa were.
Wefala aa wola were kɛ ya Room tena teŋɛ a ta laanee baa bagle."
Dɛ nɛnlaa bane lɔ bela dɛɛ chɛgre Pɔɔl ne Silas, asɛ Room nomonome la wur Pɔɔl ne Silas laala dɛ gel ba lɔɔ ba chweremi ne.
Ba gelɔ ba lɔɔ ba kohona dɛ tɔ ba dea, dɛ ŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa tɔ ba dea nɛɛ la be ŋɔ ó nyiŋi ba nɛɛ ba bɛ ba chwa.
Room nomonome la aa bol gɛ la, nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa tɔ ba dea nɛɛ la kpɔ Pɔɔl ne Silas ka do loŋ ta, dɛ do daa ba nakpale ta.
Harambaŋa la, dɛ Pɔɔl ne Silas dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛ go yela dɛɛ kpɛɛ Korowii, asɛ nɛra baa do ba dea ja ba nɛɛ la ɛɛ no ba be.
Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ harɛ jigro kohona, asɛ deene la jigri le mun ta ka le nyundua. Kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ deene la gbeni bwa pilo, asɛ jɔgrɔre baa do nɛra la bwa cha le ba nɔɔra ta.
Nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa do ba dea la iro, dɛ na kɛ gbeni la aa pila. Waa na gɛ la, o te ŋɔ nɛra la bwa chwao, dɛ laa o kere kpɔ ŋɔ ó kpo o te.
Asɛ Pɔɔl do lɔŋɔ kpegri nɛɛ ŋɔ, "Bɛ he te kpo! Ya bwa lole!"
Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ bá tɛo kandea. Baa ba kandea ne la, o chwao jo Pɔɔl ne Silas be. Dɛ o dɛ ɔmɛ ɔma tenten, asɛ o bwara ɛɛ sa, asɛ o ba guŋi ba sie.
O lag ba le buse dɛ bɔɔ ba ŋɔ, "Nomonome, ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ ásɛ Korowii lɛɛ mɛ nɔ?"
Belaa ba ŋɔ, "Yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo. Dɛ he ɛ gɛ naa, wɛɛ lɛ he ne he dem tena bwaa."
Ba bol Yeesu waa la bagle o ne nɛra baa lɔ o dem la bwa.

Awola harambaŋa la ne la, nomoa la yagle chal la aa ɛ Pɔɔlwa bwara la. Dɛ lɔɔraa Room nomonome baa dɛ bol nɛra waa dɛ pa bole la gel ba lɔɔ ba asɛ chal ɛ ba bwara. O ne o dem tena bwaa ba sɔ Korowii nee awola,
asɛ o kpɔ ba ba o dem dɛ ba tɛɛ ba kondikwaa ba di. Awola la, o ne o dem tena bwa sie lɛo kɛŋɔ baa yarada Korowii dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo la.
Tɔ aa pera chɔɔ ne la, Room nomonome la tomɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá ba ŋɔ nomoa la be ŋɔ ó gel Pɔɔl ne Silas kaa.
Belaa o ŋɔ Pɔɔl be ŋɔ, "Room nomonome tomɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá ba le he ne Silas dea. Anomanta hé le, dɛ kaa. Kórowii ka do heya."

Anee Pɔɔl ŋɔ toroma la be ŋɔ, "Room tenaa ya bwa, kɛ ba lɔɔ yaa pɛɛpɛɛ bombaah ta dɛ tɔ yaa dea, dɛ ba ta ya waa bolɛ dɛ na wechɔga bɛlbwa ya nɛ. Aah taraken nɔ sɔeh ba berɛ dɛɛ nyin dɛ sɔh ta yaa nɔ naa? Aa magre! Hé gel Room nomonome la gbagba ba ba lawɛ yaa le!"
Toroma la kaa bol Pɔɔl waa waa bola la Room nomonome la be. Nomonome la aa noa kɛŋɔ Pɔɔl ne Silas ɛ Room tena la, ba ɔmɔ.
Anomanta ba baa do ba jaŋgbare, dɛ lag ba le bela baa tɔ ba dea la, dɛ soŋ ba ŋɔ bá le bwɛɛ la ta.
Pɔɔl ne Silas aa le bela la, ba la Liidia dem. Ba kaa na bwɛɛ la asɔre tena la bela, dɛ bol waa bag ba, dɛ do ba gbemba, dɛ kaa.
Baa dɛ kaa la, ba kaa kpɔ bwɛɛre ane baa dɛ yera Amfepɔles ne Apoloonia la ta dɛ ka le Tɛsalonika. Dɛ Tɛsalonika Juda tena dɔ cheremi dea bela.
Pɔɔl la cheremi dea bela gɛ o yon dɛɛ ɛ bwɛɛre bwa ta la. Waa lɔ bela la, o yawanyoa atoro bwa dɛ o ne Juda tena la dɛ bol waa dɛɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa Korowii waa baa chwera la ta.

Dɛ o dɛ bag ba Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ nɛwɛnyina la waa Korowii Tɔn bini, ásɛ ba jemɛ kɛ Korowii keamere fa baglɔ kɛŋɔ Kristo la ɛɛ na wahalaa, dɛ sewɛ, dɛ ir seo ta. Gɛ baa chwera la chɛ kɛ a ɛ. Waa bol gɛ tonɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yeesu nɔ n yon dɛɛ bol o waa nɔ, onee Kristo la."
Bane yarada Pɔɔl waa la, dɛ ba ja o ne Silas nɛ. Bela haahna baa ɛ nɛnjena la galga ne bela Grik tena baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii la galga ge baa ja ba nɛ.

Nɛra baa yarada Pɔɔlwa waa la dɛ baa ja asɔre tena la nɛɛ la aa dɛ warɛ la, dɛ aa somɛ Juda tena la be, asɛ ba ka nyin nɛŋkasale baa wola toma dɔe dɛ yon do dem baah dɛɛ gaage gbo la, dɛ ir ba bwaawee asɛ ba ne ba valɛ dɛɛ do gbɔga bwɛɛ la bwa. Ba la Jasen dem ŋɔ bá fe ka lawɛ Pɔɔl ne Silas ba tɛ bwɛɛla la.

Baa wola ban dɔe lawɛ la, ba tɛgre Jasen ne asɔre tena la bane ka tɛ bwɛɛ la nomonome, dɛ nyɛg dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra nɔ, ban chɔg nɛra liire bobɛlbwa dɛɛ valɛ dɛ gel bobɛlbwa ɛɛ ɛ yeŋyeŋ la. Taraken ba ba ya bwɛɛ nɔ ta,
asɛ Jasen ge lɛɛ ba do o dem. Waa ya Koojen Siisa aa wola nyin laanee baa ɛ. Ba ŋɔ Koojen bɛl ge berɔ do le ja ya Koojen nɔ nɛ. Dɛ́ o sɔne Yeesu."
Bwɛɛ la tena ne ba nomonome aa no waa nɔ la, a gelɔ ba liire ɛ sakaa.
Nomonome la gelɔ Jasen ne asɔre tena la kpɔ suuga cheg ajinamuu kɛŋɔ baa wobɛlbwaa ɛ kpa. Jasenwa waa baa ɛa laanee ba nyiŋi dɛ lɛɛ ba suuga dɛ ta ba.
Bɔr aa baa jo la, asɔre tena la kpɔ Pɔɔl ne Silas kaa Beria. Baa la bela la, ba kaa jo bela cheremi dea bini.

Dɛ bela Juda tena la waa do kɛrɛdɛ gwaa Tɛsalonika Juda tena, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba lɛ Yeesu waa la silɛɛ ne, dɛ won dɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii Tɔn bini tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ́ɛ na, dɛ́ jemɛ kɛ waa Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol la, kpelaa kɛɛ nyosonee yɔ.
Nɛra la kɛrɛdɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo. Grik haahna baa ɛ nɛnjena la kɛrɛdɛ ne ba baala bwa yarada Yeesu.
Juda tena baa lɔ Tɛsalonika aa noa kɛŋɔ Pɔɔl kaa bol Korowii Waa Beria ge la, ba ba bela dɛ ba do ba, asɛ ba bwaawee ir Pɔɔlwa nɛ.
Belaa asɔre tena la gel Pɔɔl kaa mpo nyoa bug ta, asɛ Silas ne Timoti te so Beria.
Nɛra la baa tɔ Pɔɔl sie dɛɛ la o ne la la o ne ka tel Atens, dɛ berɛ kaa Beria. Baa dɛ kaa la, Pɔɔl ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá ka ŋɔ Silas ne Timoti be ásɛ ba ba o be warane.
Pɔɔl aa soge Atens bela dɛɛ kpa Silas ne Timoti la, o nao kɛ voga su bwɛɛ la bwa. Waa na gɛ la, o tea bini chɔgɔ.

Anomanta dɛ o dɛ la bela cheremi dea o ne Juda tena ne Grik tena baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la kaa nyiŋi Korowii waa la bini. Dɛ tɔpere bɛlbwaa wɛɛ so bwɛɛ la fɔgbaah, asɛ dɛɛ bol waa nɛra baa dɛ ba bela la be, asɛ o ne baa nyiŋi Korowii waa la bini.

Dɛ nɛra bane hweli bela wejema baa dɛ yera Epikuria ne Stoik la, dɛ ge ɛ gɛ wejema la chachagla bela. Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ ge dɛ tɔŋlo dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ wobobala te nɔ gee bol nɔɔ?" Asɛ bane ge ŋɔ, "Jamɔ harɛ bɛl voga waa wɛɛ bol nɔ." Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol Yeesu ne seo ta ira waa ba lii gɛ la.
Anomanta ba kpɔ Pɔɔl kaa bela nomonome baa dɛ yer ba Areɔpagos tena la, dɛ ka ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bagle he wefala haa kpoŋa dɛɛ gaage la bini yá no.
Ya ta he waa nɔ te dɔŋa noɛ bwa, anomanta ya dɛ nyin kɛ he bagle yaa a mun."
Dɛ Atens tena ne ba hɔɔhra tomaa wefala bola ne wefala pɛɛra dɛ́ no.
Pɔɔl aa chegɛ nomonome la sie la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N nao kɛŋɔ he Atens tena dɛ tomɛ voga kɛrɛdɛ,

dɛkalkɛŋɔ maa dɛ gaage he bwɛɛ nɔ ta dɛ na bɔra haa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ kwaa he koŋkwaare la, n nao kɛŋɔ baa chwerɛ bobɛl ŋɔ, 'Ya dɛ tomɔ, kɛ yaa on jemɛ.' Kon haa wola on jemɛ dɛ gee tomɔ la, o waa mɛɛ bol he be la. O sɔne Korowii.
"Korowiirii ta harɛ ne kwaa aa lɔ o ta bwa. On dɔ nyundua ne harɛ bwa. O waane laa chɔɔbɔra nɛwɛnyini aa maa tɛo la wa.
Nɛwɛnyini kondikwaa waa laa o do le, waa nɛwɛnyini komɛlbwa nyin, dɛkalkɛŋɔ on dɛɛ tɛ yaa bokpega ne hweera ne komɛlbwa.
Nɛmbeŋkpoŋii o ta, asɛ a gɛ nɛn la lolɛ harɛ bɛlbwa nɛra, asɛ ba ya perɛ harɛ bwa. Waa ta nɛwɛnyini la, o do bɛlbwa tɔpera ne ya dobɔra.
On saahna ɛa gɛ, ásɛ nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ lagre dɛɛ nyin o bɔr kɛ nyoŋa ken, asɛ o bɔr nyina bini la, bá nao. Kɛ kasinteŋ, Korowii toole bojaŋ. O ne ya bɛlbwa baah naa jaŋɛ.
Nomɛl te kompɛɛ: 'Korowii alaworomɛɛ ya bwa do le, dɛɛ hwee, dɛɛ ɛ ya tomare.' He nɛra baa dɛ chwerɛ wobobeela la gba di gɛ waa nɔ danseɛ dɛ ŋɔ, 'O biirii ya gbabir.'
"Korowii biirii yan, anomanta ya bɛ on kpɔ magɛ suugaswɛm ne suugapoŋ ne bwea koŋkwaare nɛwɛnyini gbagba aa kpɔ ba liire maa la.
Saŋ la nɛwɛnyini faa wola Korowii ŋwɛnɛ jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ la, o laa sie kpɔ ba wechɔga ta. Kɛ taraken te, o ŋɔ hárɛ ta bobɛlbwa nɛra charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ o do tɔpere waa dɛ ba nɛwɛnyini bwa waa bola kasinteŋ ne la. O le nɛn wɛɛ ba waa la bola. O ir naate seo ta ásɛ nɛra jemɛ kɛŋɔ kpelaa o waa la."
Pɔɔl aa bol seo ta ira waa la, dɛ ba dɛ mamɔ, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ, "Ya dɛ nyin kɛ he bol he waa la yá no ja."
Belaa o le ba bini, dɛ kaa.
Nɛra la bane te yarada Yeesu waa la dɛ ba ja o nɛ. Nɛra baa yaradaa la bini bɛl sɔne Daneseɔs. Dɛ Areɔpagos nomonome la bɛlee on. Haah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Damaris ne nɛra bane yarada Yeesu waa la.
A habɔɔ la, Pɔɔl le Atens dɛ kaa Kɔrent.

Belaa o ka na Juda te bɛl, dɛ o sɔne Akwela. Dɛ Pɔntos tee on, asɛ o ka so Room, dɛ berɛ le bela ba Kɔrent, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Room Koojen Klɔdeɔs doŋi Juda tena bwa Room. Dɛ Akwela haah sɔne Presela. Pɔɔl la ba be dɛ ka na ba,
dɛ so ba be dɛ ɛ toma, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ gbansaba toma o faa dɛ ɛ wubwa laanee baa ɛ.
Dɛ o dɛ la ba cheremi dea Ona Tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ kaa bol wa, asɛ o ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ne Juda tena bwa yon dɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii waa bini. Dɛ o dɛ tɔŋ ba ásɛ ba fe teŋɛ o kon ta.

Silas ne Timoti aa le Makidoonia harɛ ba la, a taa Pɔɔl do kpegri name dɛ gel wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛɛ bol Yeesu waa la, dɛɛ di danseɛ dɛɛ bagle Juda tena kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la.

Dɛ nɛra la dɛ nyin Pɔɔl toma chɔga, dɛɛ ɛo nɛnhɛla. Anomanta o jwii o laala doŋa ta dɛ́ bagle kɛ o bag ba Korowii waa asɛ ba vɛah, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he nyograa, nɛn laa ɛ heya, he gbagbaa ɛ he nyu. Le fini dɛɛ kaa, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ mɛɛ ba Korowii waa bagla. Maa he bee ba kpa."
Waa le ba be la, o kaa chog baa bɛl waa dɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɛ Korowii baa yerɔ Titeɔs Jastos la. Dɛ o dem lɔ bela cheremi dea jwɛɛh tenten.
Dɛ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi cheremi dea la ta la sɔne Krispus. Dɛ o ne o dem tena bwa yarada Yeesu waa la. Kɔrent tena kɛrɛdɛ no Yeesu waa la dɛ yaradaa, asɛ ba sɔ ba Korowii ne.
Awola bɛl Pɔɔl na chaahna jwaana. O nao kɛŋɔ Korowii aa dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ, dɛɛ bol n waa la nɛra be. Bɛ nyoa tɔ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ n chegɛ he habɔɔ. N nɛra warɛ bwɛɛ nɔ ta. Anomanta mɛɛ che he mun taa, asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ won ɛɛ wobɛlbwa."
Anomanta Pɔɔl soge bwɛɛ la ta dɛ bagle nɛra Korowii waa benanyoa dɛ korobie anumɛl.
Gɛ saŋ baa tɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Galio nomonome asɛ o nyiŋi Akaaya harɛ dɛɛ tɛ Room Koojen laanee Juda tena pɛ nyoa dɛ lawɛ Pɔɔl la o be.
Baa la o ne la, ba kaa ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ jo ya kii nɛ. O dɛ bagle nɛra ŋɔ báa tomɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ta aa wola were."
Pɔɔl te ne ŋɔ o bol waa dɛ Galio ŋɔ Juda tena la be ŋɔ, "Juda tena, dɛ tonchɔga anee baa nɔ fe tomɛ nɔ naa, ŋwɛnɛ fe lole kɛ ń lawɛ bambile dɛ no he be.
Kɛ aa ɛ waa waa bola ne he bwɛɛ tena sɔna ne he bwɛɛ waa gbo waa nɔ te, hé gbagba ka nyiŋi a ta. Maa a gɛ waa nɔɔ bol."
Galio doŋ ba o kɔɔto bela.
Belaa ba lawɛ cheremi dea nomoa baa dɛ yerɔ Sɔɔstenes la dɛ lɔɔro Galio kɔɔto dea la sie tenten, kɛ Galio ta ban chaŋɛ kwara.

A habɔɔ la, Pɔɔl soge Kɔrent asɔre tena la be bigri, asɛ dɛ kal ba dɛ le bela kaa Keŋkrea. Dɛ o bagɛ nyoa bɛl, anomanta o fonɛ o nyu mɔɔ dɛ le Keŋkrea, asɛ o ne Akwela ne Presela kpɔ stiimae dɛɛ kaa Siiria harɛ.
Ba kpɔɔ ka tel Ɛfesos, asɛ Pɔɔl gel ba dɛ te kaa bela cheremi dea, asɛ o ne bela Juda tena kaa bol Korowii wa.
Nɛra la fe ŋɔ ó so ba be tama, kɛ o ta sɛɛh.
Kɛ waa dɛ ba ba be lee dɛ kaa la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ Korowii sɛoh te naa, mɛɛ berɔɔ ba he be," dɛ che Ɛfesos kpɔ stiimae kaa.
Waa tel Sisaaria la, o la Jerusalam dɛ ka chɔɔ bela asɔre tena, dɛ le bela kaa Anteɔk.
Waa soge bela tama la, o le bela dɛ valɛ Galaasia harɛ ne Frejea harɛ bwɛɛre ta dɛɛ ja nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ do bela la, dɛɛ do ba gbemba.
Dɛ Juda te bɛl ɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Alɛksandrea la bie, dɛ ba Ɛfesos, asɛ baa yerɔ Apolos. Dɛ o jemɛ wobol taeh, dɛ jemɛ Korowii Tɔn bini waa ge kɛrɛdɛ.
Ba fa bagle Apolos Yeesu bwara waa ne o ŋwɛnɛre bwa, asɛ o jema, dɛ gee bagla o bokpega bwa ne. Kɛ, dɛ Jɔn o faa dɛ sɔ nɛra Korowii nee la waa waa bagle nɛra Yeesu waa la gboo o no.
O lɔ bambile dɛ baa bol Korowii Waa cheremi dea. Presela ne Akwela no waa waa dɛ bol la, dɛ kpɔɔ la ba dem dɛ ka baglo Korowii Waa la kɛrɛdɛ.

Belaa Apolos ŋɔ wɛɛ la Akaaya harɛ taa. Anomanta Ɛfesos asɔre tena la doo gbemba dɛ chwerɛ Akaaya harɛ asɔre tena tɔn ŋɔ o ba ba be naa, bá nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ. Waa la bela la, o kaa cha nɛra Korowii aa sune ba nɛɛ dɛ gel ba yarada o waa la taeh.
O wono bagle Korowii Waa bini bombaah kpegri nɛ, Juda te bɛlbwa aa wola wone tɔŋlo, dɛ won bagle waa Korowii Tɔn bini kɛŋɔ Yeesuu Kristo la waa ɛ nɛwɛnyina bwa Lɛɛ la.
Apolos aa lɔ Kɔrent la, Pɔɔl kpɔ harɛ la bwe doa bɔr dɛ ka le Ɛfesos. Waa la bela la, o kaa pu nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la bane bela,
dɛ pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Haa kpɔ he te tɛ Yeesu la, Korowii tɛ heyaa o Domadɛɛge la aa?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Ɔɔhɔ, ya te ta Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa noɛ kwaraa bwa."
Anee Pɔɔl berɛ kwaa pɛɛ ba ŋɔ, "Aah dɛ bɔkwa waa he sɛh ŋɔ hɛɛ ɛo mɔɔ ba sɔ heyaa Korowii nee laɔ?" Asɛ ba ŋɔ, "Jɔn waa o faa dɛ chagle laanee ya sɛh."

Belaa o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta laanee Jɔn sɔ Korowii ne. Jɔn faa dɛ bagle nɛra waa la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ naate o taa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala la baa ba naa, bá yaradao dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo. Dɛ Yeesu waa wɛɛ bol la."
Baa no gɛ waa nɔ la, ba gelɔ ba sɔ ba Korowii nee dɛ́ bagle kɛ ba ɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛra.
Pɔɔl kpɔ o nɔɔra dawɛ ba nɛ, asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ba so ba nɛ, asɛ baa bol wobofala, dɛɛ bol Korowii Wa.
Dɛ baa tel baala fi dɛ banɛɛ.

Pɔɔl di korobie atoro bwa bela, dɛɛ bol Korowii Waa bela tena be bansua ne ba cheremi dea bini. Dɛ o lag ba dɛɛ so, o ne baa bol Korowii Kora la wa. O takapɔ kɛ wɛɛ berɛ ba liiree ásɛ ba fe teŋɛ o kon ta.

Dɛ ba bini bane deŋne kpegri baa waa la yarada kwara, dɛɛ bol Yeesu nɛɛ teŋa la waa aa wola were kwara nɛnlaa la bwa baah ta. Anomanta Pɔɔl gel ba, dɛ lawɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu waa la, asɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa o ne ba kaa cheme bobɛl baa dɛ yerɛ bela Teraanɔs Sukuu la ta.
Gɛ Sukuu la ta laŋa dɛ kaa hweli Korowii waa tɔpere bɛlbwa la, ba ɛ gɛ bene anɛ. Anomanta Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ do Eesia harɛ ta bela bwaa no Yeesu waa la.
Dɛ Korowii chegɛ Pɔɔl nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa aa do kpegri dɛ berɛ gwaa logla kwaa la.
Dɛ nɛra kpɔ dukure ne yakwane waa lega dɛɛ la weela tena be, asɛ ba weelare ɛɛ le ba nɛ, asɛ ba bini banɔ la kwaa aa dɛ ir ba nɛɛ la ge kwaa la ɛɛ le ba nɛ.

Dɛ Juda tena bane lɔ bela dɛ yon gaage dɛɛ doŋi kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛ. Ba ge fe dɛ nyin dɛ kpɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn dɛɛ doŋi a gɛ kwaa nɔ dɛ yon dɛɛ kɔgra ŋɔ, "Yeesu Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol o waa la sɔn ta, hé le kɛ yaa dɛ ŋɔ he be nɔ!"
Dɛ Juda tena Sɔfonomoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Skiiva la bibaala banuanɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ gɛ.
Awola bɛl baa ŋɔa ba kpɔ Yeesu sɔn doŋi kwaa nomɛl nɛɛ la, a gelɔ o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "N jemɛ Yeesu, dɛ jemɛ Pɔɔl ge. Asɛ he ge, heyaa bamewaɔ?"
Ate dɛ baa la kwaa aa dɛ ir o nɛɛ la gug ba dɛ lɔɔ ba, dɛ a ɔma. O pira ba dɛ kɛɛ ba laala dɛ wur ba, asɛ ba chwa le o dem bela.
Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ do Ɛfesos la bwa no gɛ waa nɔ, asɛ ɔmee lag ba kɛrɛdɛ. Gɛ waa nɔ aa chiga la, bela tena ta Yeesu waa la wesale liire kpa. Ba ɔmɔ kɛrɛdɛ.
Name dɛ bela asɔre tena la kɛrɛdɛ le bombaah dɛɛ bol wechɔga baa ɛa, dɛɛ sɛh ba chɔgre.

Asɛ ba bini bane baa ɛ dobodobo ka mɔɔ dɛ ɛ asɔre tena la le ba tɔne baa nyiŋi a bini dɛɛ ɛ dobodobo la ne, dɛ kpaa nii do a ta bombaah bela. Baa kari tɔne la suuga la, aa do kanee. Aa tel suugapoŋa kagboŋa fifraanuee.
Gɛ ŋwɛnɛkpeg nɔ taa a che Korowii waa la perɛ dɛ won do kpegri kohona.
Gɛ waa nɔ habɔɔ la, Pɔɔl ɛ o liire kɛŋɔ wɛɛ la Makidoonia harɛ ne Akaaya harɛ taa, dɛ́ ka kaa Jerusalam, dɛ ŋɔ dɛ o la a bwa ta naa, a chɛ kɛ o la Room gba.
O tomɛ o bonɔɔna banɛ baa dɛ yer ba Timoti ne Erastos la, asɛ ba tɔ o sie kaa Makidoonia harɛ. Kɛ o te soge Eesia harɛ ta tama.
A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ Ɛfesos tena baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ la lɛ gaeh nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ ŋwɛnɛfale la ta la nɛ.
Dɛ jwini te bɛl lɔ bela baa yerɔ Demetros. Dɛ o kpɔ suugapoŋa dɛɛ kwaa bela vog bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Aatemes la dea chaa, asɛ gɛ toma la ɛɛ tɛ o ne o bala tom-ɛɛra tɔnɔ tenten.
O yerɛ o tom-ɛɛra la bwa ne nɛra o ne baa dɛ ɛ tonsiwi beŋkpoŋ la bwa, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yabala, he jemɔ kɛ toma nɔ taa a che ya do wer la.

Kɛ taraken, he gbabir na waa Pɔɔl nɔ aa dɛ ɛ, dɛ no waa waa dɛ bol. Ɛfesos bonɔ gbo laa wɛɛ ɛ o waa nɔ. Eesia harɛ kɛrɛdɛ bwaa wɛɛ ɛa. O wono berɛ nɛndamanta bwa liire baa teŋɛ waa waa dɛ bagle la ta. O waa waa dɛ bol laanee kɛ voga nɛwɛnyini gbagba aa kpɔ nɔn dɛɛ ɛa la ta kasinteŋ dɔe.

Waa dɛ ɛ gɛ nɔ, n dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ ya toma nɔ sɔn bɛ ba chɔg. Ya toma nɔ gbo sɔn laa dɛɛ ba chɔga. Ya vogjen Aatemes dea nɔ nɛra aa dɛ maŋkurao nɔ, baa on komɛlbwa yera ba kpa, asɛ o sɔn sewɛ, asɛ dɛ kpo vog baa dɛ tomɔ Eesia harɛ ne bobɛlbwa la sɔn kwaraa! Baa on ɔmɛ kpa."
Nɛra la aa no gɛ waa nɔ la, ba bwaawee iro, asɛ baa dooge lɔŋɔre dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Ya Ɛfesos tena vog Aatemes nɔ dɔŋ toole!"

Ate dɛ gbɔga tɔ bwɛɛ la bwa, asɛ nɛnlaa la aa dɛ do gbɔga la lawɛ nɛra bane baa dɛ yer ba Gayos ne Aristakus la. Dɛ Makidoonia harɛ tenaa ban, asɛ ba ne Pɔɔl ɛɛ valɛ. Nɛra la tɛg ba la bela ba bwɛɛ tena aa chema dɛɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la.
Dɛ Pɔɔl fe dɛ nyin nɛra la be bela laŋa, kɛ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ.
Dɛ o daamanaree Eesia harɛ nomonome la bane. Ba tomɛ nɛra ŋɔ bá ka kaoh ŋɔ o bɛ lii kɛŋɔ wɛɛ tire nɛra la baah belaa.

Dɛ nɛnlaa la kɛrɛdɛ aa jemɛ wee la waa baa cheme bela. Dɛ ba bwa aa wesiwi beŋkpoŋ bol. Bane nyɛga tɔɔ ba bol waa chagɛ bonɔ, dɛ bane ge bol ba kwaa chagɛ le. Dɛ ba bwa dɛ bol waa sagasaga ken, asɛ gbɔga tɔ bela bwa.
Bela Juda tena fe gelɔ ba bini bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Alɛksanda la ir che, dɛ fe tɔh ba nyoa ŋɔ ba laa ba waa la ne. Anee o kpɔ nɔn ɛg ba ŋɔ bá tɔ nyoa, ásɛ o fe tɔh o bwɛɛ tena nyoa.
Nɛra la te ne o nae kɛ Juda tee on, dɛ ba pɛo dɛɛ bol kohona ŋɔ, "Ya vog Aatemes te dɔŋ toole!" Ba si gɛ naaa dɔŋhwere anɛ bwa.

Belaa ba krache nomoa waa chɔ ba nyoa la le dɛ gel ba tɔ nyoa. Baa tɔ nyoa la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yabala Ɛfesos tena, nomɛlbwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya bwɛɛ nɔɔ dɔ ya vogjen Aatemes vog dea dɛɛ nyiŋi o ta. Yanee dɔ Aatemes bwe la aa le Korowii doa ba le harɛ la ge.
Tɔŋla toole gɛ waa nɔ te ta. Aa do gɛ nɔ, a chɛ kɛ he tɔ nyoa dɛɛ nyiŋi. A ta chɛ kɛ he ɛ waane dɛ ba le waa nɛ.
Nɛra nɔ ta ya vog nɔ komɛlbwa ŋwɛɛ, ba ta on sisa wobol ge bolɛ. Aah dɛ bala haa ba ba ne bonɔ nɔ mun ɔ?
Dɛ nomɛl ɛ Demetros ne o bala waane aa, kɔɔto deene lole, nomonome baa dɛ bol waa a ta la ge lole. Bá ka samane dɔŋa bela.
Dɛ gɛ ge laa aa, dɛ waane ta lole naa, tɔɔ la wee bwɛɛ nɔ nomonome aa cheme la, bá kpɔ bil ba sie.
Yaa dɛ do gbɔga ken nɔ, ya ta kɛrɛdɛ nyiŋaa, baa koh a waa lawɛ yaa. Ba lawɛ yaa ge aa, yaa wobɛlbwaa dɔ bol dɛ bagle gbɔga nɔ mun."
Waa bol waa nɔ gɛ la, o gelɔ nɛra la pegre.
Gbɔga la nyoa aa sɔɔhna la, Pɔɔl yerɛ bela asɔre tena la cheme, dɛ do ba gbemba, dɛ kal ba, dɛ kaa Makidoonia harɛ.
O kpɔ baah bela bwɛɛre la ta dɛ bol waa bag ba taeh dɛ ja ba, dɛ le bela ba Grik tena harɛ ta.

O di korobie atoro bela mɔɔ dɛ kpɔ o te dɛ́ fe kpɔ stiimae kaa Siiria harɛ. Waa dɛ kpɔ o te dɛ́ kaa la taa o na kɛŋɔ bela Juda tena dɛ vɔrɔwe dɛ́ lawɔ. Belaa o berɛ laa berɛ kpɔ Makidoonia harɛ dɛ kaa.

Perɔs bie Sopata waa le Beria la teŋɛ Pɔɔl nɛɛ kaa. Aristakus ne Sɛkondos baa le Tɛsalonika la ge la bɛl. Gɛɛ Gayos waa le Dɛɛbe la, ne Tichikos ne Trɔfemos baa le Eesia harɛ la ge la bɛl. Timoti ge la bɛl.
Gɛ nɛra nɔ tɔ sie dɛ ka so kpa Pɔɔl ne men maa dɛ chwerɛ waa nɔ Troas.
Ya tɔpejena yaa dɛ di paanoo yaa wola iisi a ta do la garɔ mɔɔ ya che Felepae jo stiimae bini. Yaa le Felepae la, a tɔpera anuee ya ba puu ba Troas. Ya di yawanyoa Troas bela.

Memene wee jɔmɔra ne la, ya asɔre tena la chemo dɛ di kondikwaa ya Dɔɔ aa kpɔa ja yaa ŋɔ yá kpɔ dɛɛ lii o waa la, asɛ Pɔɔl bol Korowii Waa dɛɛ bagle yaa. Dɛ o fe dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ tɔɔ peraa ó kaa, anomanta o bol waa ka tel harambaŋa.
Dɛ abrɔsane bɛl doaa ya cheme, asɛ kandere do bela pirim.

Dɛ bonɔɔ bɛl soge tokoro ta baa yerɔ Yutekɔs. Pɔɔl aa bol waa bigri la, dom lawɛ Yutekɔs kɛrɛdɛ. Waa dɛ chɔ la, o le tokoro la ta abrɔsane la doa le harɛ. Dɛ gɛ dea laanee chɔŋa tooro abrɔsane la deene aa chɔŋra la ta. Baa gɔɔro, dɛ o sewɔ.
Anee Pɔɔl tu harɛ dɛ ka pi o nɛ, dɛ gbaaro pɛl o bambile, o berɛ wee. Asɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "He bɛ ɔmɛ, o siwi lole."
Asɛ Pɔɔl berɛ deeh abrɔsane la dɛ ka di kwa, asɛ o ne ba bol waa la sie ka tel kɛ tɔ aa pera mɔɔ o kaa.
Ate nɛra la sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ bie la aa ira la, dɛ kpɔɔ kaa dem.
Ya kaa kpɔ ya stiimae la kaa bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Asos la ta. Dɛ ya fe dɛ lii kɛ yaa ka kpɔ Pɔɔlee Asos bela, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ya ne o vɔrɔwɔ asɛ o ŋɔ wɛɛ kpɔ harɛɛ dɛɛ cheme yaa bela.
Waa baa pu yaa Asos la, ya kpɔɔ ya stiimae la ta, asɛ ya ne o ba Mitiliini.

Tɔ aa pera la, ya berɔ kpɔ stiimae la le bela dɛ ba chɔ ekwi bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Keɔs la jwɛh. Tɔ aa pera ja la, ya ba bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Samos la ta. Asɛ tɔ aa bera per ja la, ya ba bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Maeletus la ta.
Yaa dɛ ba la, ya ta Ɛfesos chegɛ, dɛkalkɛ dɛ Pɔɔl aa nyin kɛ o ba bigri Eesia harɛ ta. Dɛ o dɛ nyin kɛ o won tel Jerusalam warane dɛ ba tɔpejen baa dɛ yerɔ Pɛntekɔs la ta garɛ mɔɔ.
Pɔɔl chegɛ Maeletus kal Ɛfesos asɔre tena nomonome ŋɔ bá ba o be Maeletus.
Baa bala la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Le awola maa ba he be Eesia harɛ bonɔ la ba le fini, he na n da maa kpoŋa bwa.
Dɛ n kpɔ n te kɛ n Dɔɔ Yeesu bonɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ o toma nɔ sipwɛra ne. N koh he nyogra haa nyogre Korowii ŋwɛnɛ waa dɛ yon dɛɛ wi. Juda tena aa dɛ vɔrɔwe n vɔrɔwa la, a noo mɛ tenten.
N ta wobɛlbwa kpɔe sɔh heya. Wobɛlbwa aa le tɔnɔ tɛ heyaa la, n ta a ta tɔe. N bagle nɛra Korowii Waa cheremi bɔra, dɛ bagle o waa he deremi.
Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bwa bee n bol, dɛ ja ba ŋɔ bá charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta, dɛ ba Korowii be, dɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo.
"Taraken nɔ, Jerusalamee mɛɛ kaa la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpɔ bela laŋa do n bambile ta maa wola won vɛh. Dɛ waane ɛɛ puu mɛɛ bela yaa, maa jemɛ.
Waa maa jema bwaa kɛŋɔ bela bwa maa la la, gɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge che nɛra nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ wahala ne dea chɔe chɔ n sie dɛɛ kpaa mɛ.

N waane laa n gbagba hweera wa. Waa aa swɛɛ n siwi laanee kɛ gɛ maa ɛ dɛ́ tonɛ toma n Dɔɔ Yeesu aa tɛ mɛ ŋɔ ń ɛ la. N tomaa kɛ ń bol Amanesoma la nɛra be bá jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ dɛɛ nyin ba chae.
"Taraken nɔ, n jemɔ kɛ he nɛra maa valɛ he nɛɛ dɛ bol Korowii Kora nɔ waa he be nɔ, haa men na kpa bwa.
Mɛɛ di heyaa kasinteŋii fini. Dɛ he bɛlbwa baa nyogre Korowii ŋwɛnɛ aa, n laa ɛ waane,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ n ta waa Korowii aa dɛ nyin la wobɛlbwa kpɔe sɔh heya.

Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ, dɛɛ nyiŋi nɛra Korowii Domadɛɛge aa kpɔ ba do he nɔn ta ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la kɛrɛdɛ. Korowii Bie gbagba chalee o kpɔ yawɛ o nɛra asɛ ba ɛ o kwaa nɔ, anomanta hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛ.
N jemɔ kɛŋɔ maa dɛ kaa nɔ, nɛnchɔga ɛɛ jo he binii kɛŋɔ petegre toole naa, gbolore yon jo peera baah dɛɛ larawa la.
N jemɔ kɛŋɔ he gbagba bini bane ɛɛ dɛɛ bol waa aa wola weree, dɛ negre nɛra ásɛ ba gel Yeesu nɛɛ teŋa dɛɛ teŋɛ ba nɛ.
A waa n ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ ŋɔ he bɛ ba soh kɛ n faa lɔ he be bene atoro bwa dɛ yon dɛɛ ja heyaa Korowii waa ta tɔpebii te bɛlbwa, dɛ koh he waa dɛɛ wi la.

"N kpɔ heyaa do Korowii nɔn ta ásɛ o kpoŋe heya, ásɛ o nɛra nɛɛ suna waa la won do he bambile bini ásɛ he do kpegri, dɛ won di kapɛrɛsom la waa ɛa cheg nɛra waa laa ba doŋa bwa kpɔ ba nɛɛ asɛ ba ɛ o gbo nɛra la.
N sie ta nomɛlbwa suuga kɛɛ o yal ta begrɛ.
He gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ maa lɔ he be la, bɔwɔbee n kwee mɔɔ n ne nɛra baa teŋɛ n nɛɛ la ɛɛ dɔ ya komɛlbwa.

N chegɛ n we-ɛɛla ta dɛ bagle heyaa kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ ya swɛɛ siwi ɛ toma ken, ásɛ dɛ won dɛɛ cha nɛra baa wola kpege la. A chɛ kɛ yaa lii waa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu gbagba aa bola ŋɔ, 'Nɛn waa dɛ kɛ nɛra kwaa la, o bwara dɛ sɔɔhno dɛ gwaa nɛn baa dɛ kɛo kwaa' la."
Pɔɔl aa bol waa tonɛ la, o guŋi harɛ, asɛ o ne ba soŋe Korowii.
Baa ira la, ba lawɔ gbaa ba bambili, dɛ kpɔ wiile dɛ kalo.
Wee la aa gela ba loo ku kohona laanee kɛŋɔ waa ŋɔa baa on na kpa bwa la. Baa gwao tonɛ la, ba doo ŋwɛnɛ la stiimae la bɔr.
Yaa le ba be la, ya jo stiimae bini dɛ pa sie kaa Kɔs, asɛ tɔ aa pera la, ya la Roods, dɛ ka che bela kaa Patara.
Belaa ya na kɛŋɔ stiimae bɛl aa ba dɛ kaa Finiisia harɛ ta, asɛ ya jo o bini dɛ kaa,
dɛ ba le bobɛl dɛ na ekwi bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Saepros la, dɛ berɛ pa sie weekaŋle harɛ bɔr pera dɛ ka le Siiria harɛ ta, dɛ ka tu Taaya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ belaa stiimae la ɛɛ ba bone aa lɔ o bini la ne.
Ya nyin asɔre tena baa lɔ bela la bɔr, dɛ so ba be yawanyoa. Bela la Korowii Domadɛɛge la gelɔ ba ŋɔ Pɔɔl be ŋɔ o bɛ Jerusalam la.

Ya kaala aa tela la, ya le bela dɛ chig ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa. Ba ne ba haahna ne bii bwaa baa do yaa ŋwɛnɛ dɛ le bwɛɛ la ta, dɛ ka tel nee nyoa, asɛ ya guŋi harɛ nee nyoa bela dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛ kal dɔŋa.
Yaa kal dɔŋa tonɛ la, ya jo stiimae bini, asɛ ba kaa dem.
Ya le Taaya ba Tɔlemaes dɛ ba chɔɔ bela asɔre tena, dɛ so ba be tɔpebeŋkpoŋ.
Tɔ aa pera la, ya le bela dɛ ba Sisaaria, dɛ ba chog Felep. Dɛ o ɛ nɛra banuanɛ ba faa lee ba Jerusalam ŋɔ báa nyiŋi suuga waa ta la bɛl. Dɛ o dɛ gaage dɛɛ bol Korowii Wa.
Dɛ o dɔ bihaahna banaarɛ baa wola yalɛ bwa asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la cha ba ba yon dɛɛ bol Korowii Wa.
Ya bigri bela tama, asɛ Korowii keame bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Agabus la le Judia harɛ ba.

Waa ba ya be la, o baa kpɔ Pɔɔl kriso, dɛ vɔrɔwe o gbagba nɔɔra ne nakpale dɛ ŋɔ ya be ŋɔ, "Kenii Korowii Domadɛɛge ŋɔ: Juda tena ɛɛ vɔrɔwe kriso nɔ te kenii Jerusalam, dɛ kpɔɔ do nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ nɔn ta."
Yaa no gɛ waa nɔ la, ya ne asɔre tena baa lɔ bela la soŋe Pɔɔl ŋɔ o bɛ Jerusalam la.

Belaa o ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ wi ken dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he do mɛ bɔhwaah nɔɔ? Dɛ baa vɔg mɛɛ Jerusalamee yaa, n sɛh gɛ. Dɛ baa kpo mɛɛ ge kwaraa naa, n sɛh gɛ. Dɛ baa koh n Dɔɔ Yeesu waa dɛ ɛɛ mɛ anɔ bɛlbwa naa, n waane laa. N sɛh gɛ waa nɔ wubwa bambile bwa ne."
Ya bol harɛ bini waa nɔ bwa o be, o ta noɛ. Anomanta ya gelo dɛ ŋɔ, "Gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin a ɛ la, á ɛ gɛ."
A habɔɔ la, ya kpɔ ya bone dɛ kaa Jerusalam.
Sisaaria asɔre tena la bane ge teŋɛ ya nɛɛ la, dɛ tɔ ya sie la ya ne baa la ya fe aa dɛ ba o dea choga la dem. Dɛ o le Saepros, dɛ ɛ nɛnlogla baa lɛ Yeesu waa la bɛl, asɛ baa yerɔ Meesan.
Yaa ba Jerusalam la, asɔre tena la lɛ yaa silɛɛ ne.
Tɔ aa pera la, Pɔɔl kpɔ yaa la Jems be, dɛ asɔre tena nomonome la bwa lɔ bela.
Pɔɔl ne ba lea dɔŋa, asɛ o bagle waa bwa Korowii aa chao o won ɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la harɛre ta.

Baa no Pɔɔl waa la la, ba jam Korowii taeh. Belaa ba ge ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nomoa, taraken nɔ, yaa won jemɛ Juda tena baa yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɔ nyoa bagle. Ba warɔ kohona. Ba sie begre Mosis Mmara la ge ta taeh.

Gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa noɔ kɛŋɔ haa dɛ gaage la, he ka dɛ bagle Juda tena baa lɔ harɛre aa wola Juda tena harɛre ɛɛ ta la ŋɔ bá gel Mosis Mmara la ta teŋa. Hale ba ŋɔ he ŋɔ bá gel ba bii pena teŋa, dɛ ŋɔ ba bɛ Juda tena kii te bɛlbwa ta dɛɛ teŋɛ. Mosis Mmara ge ta ŋwɛnɛ gɛ tɛɛ.
Gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛɛ noo kɛŋɔ he balɔ. Anomanta ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ?
Yaa baglee gɛ aa chɛ kɛ he ɛ. Baala banaarɛ bane bagɛ Korowii nyoa bonɔ.

Kpɔ ba la Korowii Dea, asɛ hé ne ba ka pɛ ɛ we-ɛɛla haa dɛ ba ɛɛ ásɛ dɛ laa doŋa kpɔ he nɛɛ la. He laŋaa, hé bɔ ba kem aa chɛ kɛ ba bɔ waa la ta la tɛɛ ba, ásɛ ba won fonɛ ba nyuune. He ɛ ken aa, nɛra bwa ɛɛ jemɔɔ kɛŋɔ haŋaa ba haŋɛ he nyoa. Baa nao kɛŋɔ he gbabir dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la ta.
Asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ yarada Yeesu waa la ge la, ya chwer ba ŋɔ ba bɛ vog kwaa ne chal ne ol baa wola o baŋa teŋe o sewɛ la dɛɛ di, dɛ ŋɔ bá laa ba te dɛɛ kpɔ jwamane waa ta."

Baa ŋɔ gɛ la, Pɔɔl lɛ nɛra banaarɛ la, asɛ tɔ aa pera la, o ne ba ka ɛ we-ɛɛla la ásɛ ba doŋa le ba nɛ. Baa tona la, Pɔɔl kaa jo Korowii Dea bini dɛɛ bagle tɔpera aa di mɔɔ ba kpoo ba bɛlbwa koŋkwaare, ásɛ ba we-ɛɛla la tonɛ. Dɛ a lɔ tɔpera anuanɛ.
Tɔpera anuanɛ la aa ba dɛ tel a jaga la, Juda tena bane baa le Eesia harɛ pera la na Pɔɔl Korowii Dea, dɛ bol waa dɛ ir nɛra bwaawee, dɛ lawɔ,

dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Israel tena, hé ba cha yaa oo! Baa nɔɔ vala dɛɛ bol waa bobɛlbwa dɛɛ yagɛ ya Israel tena ne Mosis Mmara ne Korowii Dea nɔ la. Name te kwaraa doŋaa o kpɔ baa jo ya Korowii Dea nɔ bini. Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ, aa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba jo Korowii Dea la, banee o lawɛ baa jo o bini!"
Dɛ ba na o ne baa bɛl waa le Ɛfesos baa yerɔ Trɔfemos la Jerusalam bela. A waa ba ŋɔ gɛ la, dɛkalkɛ dɛ ba dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Pɔɔl jo o ne ba Korowii Dea la bini.
Ate dɛ bwɛɛ la tena bwa lɛ gaeh, dɛ chwa le bobɛlbwa dɛ lawɛ Pɔɔl dɛ tuugu le Korowii Dea la bini. Bug la ta dɛ ba tɔɔge Korowii Dea la gbeni bwa.
Nɛra la aa chegɛ Pɔɔl kpoe naa ta la, nɛra kaa ŋɔ Room soojanomonjen waa dɛ nyiŋi bela soojare nɛɛ la be ŋɔ Jerusalam tena bwa lɛ gaeh.
Ate nomoa la gel wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ kpɔ soojanomonome bane baa lɔ o lɔga ne soojare bane dɛ chwa la bela baa dɛ lɔɔ Pɔɔl la. Nɛra la aa na nomoa la wɛɛ ba soojare ne la, ba gel Pɔɔl lɔɔra.
Nomoa la baa lawɛ Pɔɔl dɛ gel ba do kwaa o nɔɔra, dɛ bɔɔ nɛra la ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo baa nɔ nɔ? Webesoo o ɛɔ?"
Ate dɛ ba dɛ nyɛg bobɛlbwa, bane ɛɛ bol anɔ, bane gee bol ane soosiwi. Baa dɛ do gbɔga gɛ la, o ta wone jemɛ waa la kasinteŋ, dɛ ŋɔ bá lawɛ Pɔɔl ka do soojare dejen bini.
Ba dɛ la dɛ ka tel dea la sanjol baa chegɛ o ta dɛɛ jo o bini la ta, asɛ nɛra la ɛɛ nyin ba kpo Pɔɔl. Anee soojare la lɛo ba be dɛ gɔɔro dawɛ ba vaama ta.
Dɛ nɛra teŋɔ dɛ kpɔ takpeg dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Hé kpoo! Hé kpoo!"
Soojare la aa dɛ ba Pɔɔl ne dea la bini joe la, o bol waa ba nomonjen la be dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, n dɛ nyin n bol waane he be tama." Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ, "He dɛ no Grik wobol aa?
Jamɔ Ijipt te la waa bala baah bɛl ta dɛ ba wetɔŋla ne dɛ yo Abane nomonome asɛ dɛ jo nɛŋkpoora kagboŋa banaarɛ baa kpoŋe dɔmkwaa la ne kpɔg bini laanee hen kɛɛ?"
Anee Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Juda tee men. Silisia harɛ bwɛjen baa dɛ yerɔ Taasos la biee men. N poori, tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ ń bol waa nɛra nɔ be."
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, nomoa la tɛo ŋwɛnɛ, asɛ o che dea la sanjol ta dɛ kpɔ nɔn ɛgɛ nɛra la ŋɔ bá tɔ nyoa. Ba tɔ nyoa surumm ken, asɛ Pɔɔl kpɔ Israel wobol dɛɛ bol waa ba be, dɛ ŋɔ:
"N mɛɛwa ne n dɔɔranarwa, hé do deŋna n be ásɛ n bol n kon hé no."
Baa noa kɛŋɔ ba gbagba wobolee wɛɛ bol ba be la, ba tɔ nyoa jeiih ken, asɛ Pɔɔl ɛɛ bol o wa, dɛ ŋɔ,

"Juda tee men. Silisia harɛ bwɛɛ baa dɛ yerɔ Taasos la taa ba lol mɛ. Kɛ Jerusalam bonɔɔ ba dɛɛ mɛ, asɛ Gamaleɛl chag mɛ kwa, dɛ bag mɛ ya naanar kii bwa, asɛ mɛɛ teŋɛ a ta. N sie begrɔ mɛɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ he bɛlbwa aa dɛ tomɔ fini nɔ.
Dɛ n fa chegɛ nɛra baa teŋɛ gɛ ŋwɛnɛfale nɔ ta nɔ nɛɛ dɛɛ nyin ba dɛ́ kpo, dɛ lawɛ ba baala ne haahna bwa do deene.

Sɔfore Nomoa ne ya Juda tena nomonome bwa ɛɛ wonoo di danseɛ kɛŋɔ kpelaa n ŋɔ. Banee fa chwerɛ tɔne tɛ mɛ ásɛ n kpɔ la yabala Juda tena baa lɔ Damaskɔs la be ásɛ ba tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ ń won lawɛ ŋwɛnɛfale la tena baa lɔ bela dɛ kpɔ ba ba Jerusalam ásɛ ba ka ɛɛ ba wahala la.
"Maa dɛ la dɛ ka tel Damaskɔs la, kerabeŋkpoŋ dɛ nii le nyundua dɛ chaah n nɛɛ kohona dɛ bar mɛ cheme. Dɛ wee chegɛ nyufala.
Belaa n chole harɛ. Maa chola la, n no taa bɛl o ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Oo, Sɔɔl! Ɛrɛɛ he che n nɛɛ gɛ nɔɔ?'
Bela n ŋɔ, 'Henee umeo, n Dɔɔ?' Asɛ o ŋɔ, 'Menee Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la. Menee hɛɛ yo la.'
Dɛ n ne nɛra banee dɛɛ kaa. Ba na nii la te, kɛ ba ta naate waa dɛ bol waa n be la wobol te noɛ.
Belaa n pɛɛro ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba ɛɛ yɔ?' Asɛ o ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Ir la Damaskɔs ásɛ Korowii ka bagle waa waa dɛ nyin kɛ he ɛ.'
Nii la aa chaah n sie kohona la, a gelɔ n nyoŋe. Anomanta nɛra n ne baa dɛ kaa laanee bera lag mɛ da dɛ ba n ne Damaskɔs.
"Damaskɔs bela la, dɛ baa bɛl lole baa yerɔ Ananias. Dɛ o ɛ nɛn waa dɛ tomɛ Korowii kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la ge ta kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ Juda tena baa lɔ bela la bwa ɛɛ tɛo duure kohona.
Ananias baa che n be dɛ ŋɔ, 'N dɔɔ Sɔɔl, Korowii gel he sie pili.' Bug la ta dɛ n denɔ berɛ dɛɛ na, dɛ nao.
Asɛ o ŋɔ, 'Korowii ya naanar faa dɛ tomɔ la, onee lee tɛ o te ŋɔ hé jemɛ waa waa dɛ nyin, dɛ won no o Bidɛɛge la gbagba wobol, dɛ nao ge.
O ɛ gɛ ásɛ he won di danseɛ tɛo nɛra bwa be waa haa naa bwa ta, ne waa haa noa bwa ta.
Anomanta bɛ berɛ so kpa. Gel ba sɔe Korowii ne, asɛ he yerɛ Yeesu sɔn dɛ soŋo ó kpɔ he wechɔga kɛɛ.'
"A habɔɔ la, n berɔ kaa Jerusalam. Belaa n kaa soŋe Korowii o dea bini dɛ na chaahna.
N na n Dɔɔ Yeesu, asɛ o ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Le Jerusalam warane. N waa nɔ haa dɛ di a danseɛ nɔ, Jerusalam tena aa a noe ba.'
Belaa n ŋɔ, 'N Dɔɔ, ba gbabir na gɛ n faa la cheremi deene bini dɛ kaa lɔɔ nɛra baa yarada he waa nɔ, dɛɛ do ba deene.
Gɛ saŋ baa kpo Steeven o faa dɛ di he waa nɔ danseɛ la, dɛ n lɔ bela dɛ sɛh ŋɔ o chɛ kpoe. Hale baala la aa dɛ kaa bá ka kpoo dɛ wur ba yale la, men lɛa kpoŋe.'
Anee o ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Kaa! Mɛɛ geloo he kaa bojaŋ, dɛ la nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ be.' "

Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol o waa la bwa dɛ nɛra la bwa cheg deŋne dɛɛ no o be. Kɛ waa ba dɛ bol nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ be laŋa waa la, ba baah diu baa nyɛg kohona dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Hé le o ne! Bɔkwaa he gel o che dɛɛ ɛɔ?"
Ba baah diu, asɛ baa nyɛg, dɛɛ viwe ba yale, dɛ ɛ teera dɛɛ ta nyundua.

Anomanta soojanomonjen la gelɔ ba kpɔ Pɔɔl jo dea. Dɛ o ta wone jemɛ wee la aa bala nɛra la ɛɛ nyɛg gɛ la. Anomanta o ŋɔ bá lɔɔ Pɔɔl bampɔrɔ ŋwɛɛra ne, dɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa ásɛ o fe sɛh chɔgre dɛ bol kasinteŋ.
Baa ŋɔa ba lɔɔro la, o pɛɛ ba bini nomoa la ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛnɛ lole kɛŋɔ he lɔɔ Room te dɛ ba ta o waa bolɛ dɛ na wechɔga waa ɛa aa?"
Pɔɔl aa ŋɔ gɛ la, sooja la kaa ŋɔ ba nomonjen la be ŋɔ, "Dɛɛ do baa nɔ dɛɛgɔ dɛ bɛ on wechɔga bɛlbwa ɛ. Room tee on."
Belaa nomoa la ba pɛɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Room tee hen aa?" Asɛ Pɔɔl sɛh ŋɔ Room tee on.
Anee nomoa la ŋɔ, "Bɛlee n gba, kɛ n bɔ kem taeh mɔɔ dɛ won ɛ Room te nɔ." Belaa Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Room tee lolɛ n te n ɛ Room te."
Bug la ta dɛ nɛra ba fe aa dɛ ba Pɔɔl lɔɔra la le habɔɔ. Nomoa la ge aa naa kɛ Room tee Pɔɔl asɛ o gel ba do kwaa o nɔɔra la, o ɔmɔ.

Dɛ nomoa la dɛ nyin o jemɛ waa Pɔɔl aa ɛa asɛ Juda tena la baah di o nɛɛ la. Anomanta tɔ aa pera la, o gelɔ ba le Pɔɔl dea, dɛ gel Sɔfonomonome ne Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa la bwa cheme. Baa chema la, o gelɔ Pɔɔl ba che ba sie.
Waa baa che nomonome la bwa sie la, o nyiŋ ba, dɛ ŋɔ, "Yabala, n bambile bwa nee n tomɛ Korowii le saŋ la bwa ba le fini. N liire ta men ɛɛ kɛ n ɛ wechɔga bwa."
Asɛ Ananias waa ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa la ŋɔ nɛ́ra baa chegɛ Pɔɔl jwɛɛh la kpaa o nyoa ta.

Belaa Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Korowii ɛɛ lɔe bɔ kem, nɛra sie ta gboo he ɛ nɛndɛɛge kɛŋɔ dekɔɔh baa lɔɔ fula. Haa chema nɔ, gɛ Mmara aa chagla laa hɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ bol n wa aa? Aah dɛ haa ŋɔa bá lɔɔ mɛ nɔ, dɛ Mmara tɛ ŋwɛnɛ gɛ naa?"
Anee nɛra baa chegɛ Pɔɔl jwɛɛh la ŋɔ, "Sɔfore Nomoaa hɛɛ chɛgre naa?"
Asɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Yabala, n ta jemɛ kɛ Sɔfore Nomoaa on. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ ŋwɛnɛ toole kɛ nomɛlbwa chɛgɛ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi o bwɛɛ tena nɛ."

Pɔɔl nyiŋi nɛra baa cheme bela la dɛ na kɛŋɔ bane ɛ Saduki tena, asɛ bane ge ɛ Farisii tena. Belaa o kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, "Yabala, Farisii tee men noo! Farisii tena biee men. N dɛ hwɛgɛ kɛ nɛra ɛɛ ir seo taa. Gɛ hwɛga nɔ maa dɔa nɔ waa ba ba n ne ŋɔ hé bol n waa dɛ pa bole la!"
Waa dena ŋɔ gɛ la, wetɔŋla chole Saduki tena la ne Farisii tena la baah. Ba nyoa ta berɛ pɛ kpa,
dɛkalkɛ dɛ Farisii tena la te ŋɔ nɛra bwa ɛɛ ba ir seo taa, dɛ ŋɔ lala ge lole, dɛ ŋɔ nyundua toroma ge lole. Kɛ dɛ Saduki tena la te aa gɛ waa nɔ bɛlbwa yarada.
Ba nyɛga la nyoa baa do kpegri, asɛ Farisii tena Tɔn Jerema la ir che dɛ ŋɔ, "Ya ta wechɔga bɛlbwa baa nɔ nɛɛ nae. Bɛl lole komɛl kɛɛ nyundua torome bɛlee bol waa o be!"

Ba wetɔŋla la nyoa baa do kpegri kohona, asɛ ɔmee berɛ lawɛ soojanomonjen la, asɛ wɛɛ lii kɛ baa tɛgre Pɔɔlee kpo. Anomanta o gelɔ o bechale jo nɛra la baah ta dɛ lɛ Pɔɔl ba nɔn ta dɛ kpɔɔ kaa soojare dejen baa doo o bini la ta.
Awola jwaana ne la, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu baa che Pɔɔl jwɛh dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bɛ ɔmɛ. Hɛɛ di danseɛ tɛ mɛ Room gɛ haa dia tɛ mɛ Jerusalam nɔ."
Tɔ aa pera la, Juda tena la bane chemo dɛ vɔrɔwe waane. Ba ŋwɛɛ ntam ŋɔ dɛ ba ta Pɔɔl kpoe yaa, ba bɛlbwa bɛ kwaa di, o bɛ nee nyɔ. Ba ŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa to ntam la la, Kórowii kpoo.
Ba nɛra ba nyoa aa pɛa ba vɔrɔwe gɛ waa nɔ la gwaa nɛra fifraanaarɛ.
Ba la Sɔfonomonome ne bwɛɛ nomonome be dɛ ka ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Ya ŋwɛɛ ntam ŋɔ dɛ ya ta Pɔɔl kpoe yaa, yaa kwaa di.

Anomanta hé ne Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa la tomɛ nɛn soojanomonjen la be ŋɔ ó le Pɔɔl tɛ heya, á do kɛŋɔ haa dɛ nyin he kwaa nyiŋi o waa bini kɛrɛdɛ la. Dɛ ba dɛ ba o ne naa, waa bonɔɔ tel ya te kpoo."
Jaah Pɔɔl nimambie bɛl bibaa no gɛ waa la. Anomanta o la soojare dejen baa kpɔ Pɔɔl ka do o bini la ta dɛ ka ŋɔ o be.
Belaa Pɔɔl yerɛ soojanomonome la bɛl dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "La bonɔɔ nɔ ne he nomonjen la be. O dɔ waane dɛ́ bol o be."
Sooja la la o ne ba nomoa la be dɛ ka ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Pɔɔl la baa doo dea laanee yer mɛ dɛ ŋɔ n be ŋɔ ń ba bonɔɔ nɔ ne he be. O dɔ waane dɛ́ bol he be."
Belaa nomoa la lawɛ bonɔɔ la nɔn dɛ le o ne bokɛre dɛ pɛɛro ŋɔ, "Bɔkwa waa he dɔ dɛɛ nyin he bol n be nɔ?"
Anee bonɔɔ la ŋɔ, "Juda tena vɔrɔwɔ ŋɔ baa ba soŋee asɛ hé kere kpɔ Pɔɔl tɛɛ ba bá la o ne ba nomonome baa dɛ bol waa la sie, á do kɛŋɔ baa dɛ nyin ba ka kwaa nyiŋi o waa bini kɛrɛdɛ la.

Kɛ bɛ Pɔɔl kpɔ tɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛ ba nɛra dɛ gwaa fifraanaarɛ sɔh ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ́ kpoo. Gɛ nɛra la ŋwɛɛ ntam ŋɔ ba ta Pɔɔl kpoe yaa, baa kwaa di, baa nee gee nyɔ. Ba ɛ wobɛlbwa tonɛ. He siwi taa baa nyiŋi."
Belaa nomoa la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Bɛ gel nomɛlbwa no kɛŋɔ he bol gɛ waa nɔ n be." O ta bonɔɔ la ŋwɛnɛ o kaa.

Soojanomonjen la yerɛ o soojanomonome la banɛ dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Hé nyin soojare lafraanɛ, dɛ nyin soojare baa soge jagre ta dɛɛ yo la ge fifraanuanɛ, ne soojare baa dɛ yo lampea ne la lafraanɛ ásɛ ba la Sisaaria fini jwaana dɔŋ anuanaarɛ saŋ.
Nyin konteehna tɛ Pɔɔl ásɛ o so bɛl ta, dɛ la o ne sɔnɔnɔɔ ka tɛ harɛ nomoa Fɛlekse."
Nomoa la chwerɛ tɔn tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá kpɔ ka tɛ harɛ nomoa la. Kenii o chwerɔ:
Men Klɔdeɔs Lisiasii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ n nomoa Fɛlekse. He le aa?
Juda tenaa lawɛ baa nɔ dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin o kpoe, asɛ n ka le ba nɛ, dɛ no kɛ o ɛ Room te, dɛ kpɔ soojare ka lɛo.
Maa lɛo dɛɛ nyin n jemɛ wee la waa baa dɛ nyin o kpoe la, n kpɔɔ la Juda tena nomonome baa dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la sie.
Belaa n na kɛŋɔ ba kii waa ba lawɔ. Waa baa kpɔa dawɔ la ta chɛ kɛŋɔ ba kpoo. A ta chɛ kɛ ba doo dea gba.

A habɔɔ la, n berɔ ba no kɛŋɔ ba vɔrɔwe o vɔrɔwa dɛɛ nyin o kpoe, asɛ n ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n ba o ne he be bug ta. N ŋɔ nɛ́ra o ne baa dɔa la ge ba he be dɛ ba bagle waa la aa lɔ o ne ba baah ta. N jagɛ bonɔ.
Gɛ nomoa la aa bagle soojare la la, gɛɛ ba ɛ. Ba kpɔ Pɔɔl le jwaana dɛ ka tel o ne bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Antepatres la.
Asɛ tɔ aa pera la, ba bini banɔ la baa kpɔ naa ta la berɔ ba Jerusalam, dɛ gel konteehna tena la, asɛ ba ne Pɔɔl kaa.
Baa kaa tel Sisaaria dɛ kpɔ tɔn la tɛ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi harɛ la ta la, ba kpɔ Pɔɔl ge do o nɔn ta.
O kure tɔn la, dɛ pɛɛ Pɔɔl harɛ la ta waa lea. Pɔɔl aa ŋɔa Silisiaa o le la,
nomoa la ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nɛra he ne baa dɔa la balaa, mɛɛ bol he waa laanee dɛ pa bole." Dɛ o lɔ Hɛrɔd koodem bɛl ta. O ŋɔ bá kpɔ Pɔɔl do bela, dɛ ŋɔ bá nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ.

Tɔpera anue aa baa gale la, Sɔfore Nomoa Ananias ne nomonome bane ne mmara jereme bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Tɛtolɔs la la Sisaaria. Ba la ba harɛ nomoa Fɛlekse be bela baa dɛ ba waa bola la, dɛ ka bagle waa Pɔɔl aa ɛa ba ne o dɔ la.
Ba yerɛ Pɔɔl ba, asɛ Tɛtolɔs den pa mun dɛɛ bɔ nkoro dɛ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, he laworomɛ taraken ya dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna la sie. He wono kpɔ ŋwɛnɛfale ta dɛɛ nyiŋi ya harɛ nɔ, asɛ o do som.
Ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta la, ya ne nɛra baa lɔ bojaŋ bobɛlbwa dɛ jaame kohona.
Maa nyin kɛ n kpɔ wobobala lawɛ so bigri. Kɛ n poori, lawɛ bambile dɛ no ya wetamaa nɔ.

"Nɛnchɔge bɛlbwa ta baa nɔ tele! O ne bɔpɛo aa somɛ! O toma bwaa kɛ ó valɛ bol waa dɛɛ ir Juda tena bwaawee asɛ baa lɛ gaeh harɛ bɛlbwa waa la o ta la ta. Nɛra bane baa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛfale bɛl waa wola were la ta asɛ baa yer ba Nasarɛt tena la, ba nomoaa on.
O fe dɛ nyin dɛ lawɛ nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ kwaraa ba jo ya Korowii Dea bini. Dɛ ya ge kii gɛ kɔkɔkɔkɔ. A waa ya lawɔ.
Dɛ he gbabir pɛɛro waa, o gbagba ɛɛ bagle wee la aa bala ya lawɔ laanee."
Ate dɛ Juda tena baa lɔ bela la bwa denɔ pɛ dɛ sɛh ŋɔ kasinteŋii waa ba nɛn la aa bola la bwa.
Belaa ba harɛ nomoa la kpɔ nɔn ɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ ó bol wa, asɛ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "N jemɔ kɛŋɔ haa lea di nomonome dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole harɛ nɔ ta bigro. Anomanta a som n be kɛ haa dɛ ba n waa nɔ ta nyiŋa nɔ.
Maa la Korowii soŋebɔr Jerusalam la, a ta tɔpera fi dɛ anɛ kwaraa gwaalɛ. He dɛ nyin hé pɛɛ no.
Maa la bela la, n ne nomɛlbwa ta wobɛlbwa tɔŋlɛ. N ta nɛra ge doe ŋɔ bá ɛ wobɛlbwa. Korowii Dea oo, cheremi dea oo, bwɛɛ bini noo, n ta nɛra doe a bɛlbwa bini ŋɔ bá ɛ wobɛlbwa.
Ba ta danseɛ bɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ chagle kɛ n ɛ waa nɔ bɛlbwa baa kpɔa dɛɛ dag mɛ nɔ.

Ba waa nɔ bini beŋkpoŋ waa ɛ kasinteŋ laanee kɛ baa ŋɔa ŋɔ ŋwɛnɛ la baa dɛ yerɔ ŋwɛnɛfale la, o taa mɛɛ teŋɛ, dɛ kpɔ o ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii ya naanar faa dɛ tomɔ la. N dɛ teŋɛ wobɛlbwa aa lɔ Mosis Mmara bini ne Korowii Keamere Tɔne bini la ta.
N dɛ hwɛgɛ kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga ne nɛnchɔga bwa ɛɛ berɔɔ ir seo ta. Nɛra nɔ gba dɔ gɛ hwɛga nɔ.
N jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ ba bol nɛwɛnyina bwa waa dɛ pa bole. Anomanta n dɛ ɛ n wobɛlbwa naa, n dɛ ɛa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ bolchoge di Korowii ne nɛwɛnyina bwa be.
"Maa le Jerusalam bigro, asɛ n la bela ŋɔ ń kpɔ suuga ane ka tɛ n bala Juda tena ba soga bini aa kpega tɛɛ ba, asɛ dɛ ɛ n saraha ane.
Baa na mɛ Korowii Dea la, dɛ gɛ saraha nɔɔ mɛɛ ɛ. Dɛ n dɔɔ laa n doŋa kpɔ n nɛɛ tonɛ dɛ fonɛ n nyu tonɛ. Dɛ nɛnlaa bɛlbwa ta n nɛɛ jae a ba ɛ kɛ ba lɛ gaeh.
Dɛ Juda tena bane baa le Eesia harɛ lɔ bela. Dɛ n ɛɛ ba waane aa, a chɛ kɛ ba gbagba fe aa lɔ bonɔ dɛ fe bagle.
Gɛ laa ge aa, hé gel nɛra nɔ baa lɔ bonɔ nɔ bagle, dɛ gɛ saŋ baa lag mɛ ka cheme Juda tena nomonome sie la, dɛ ba na n wechɔge bɛl aa?
Webeŋkpoŋ gbo waa n jemɛ. Onee kɛ awola baa chem mɛ la, n kpɔ takpeg ŋɔ, 'Maa dɛ yarada kɛ nɛra bwa ɛɛ ir seo taa la, a waa he lag mɛ cheme bonɔ nɔ.' "
Dɛ Fɛlekse jemɛ ŋwɛnɛfale la waa taeh. Anomanta o teŋe wobol la ta, dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Dɛ soojanomonjen Lisias balaa, mɛɛ nyiŋi he waa nɔ taa."

Waa teŋe waa la ta la, o ŋɔ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi Pɔɔl nɛɛ la be ŋɔ ó berɛ kaa Pɔɔl ne dea, dɛ ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ o bɛ on tɔ do dea, asɛ dɛ Pɔɔl daamanar ba o be naa, ó tɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ ba baa chao.
Aa baa di tɔpera anɛ la, Fɛlekse ne o haah Drusila ba Sisaaria. Dɛ Juda tee o haah la. Fɛlekse gelɔ ba ka yerɛ Pɔɔl, asɛ o baa baglo gɛ baa teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ yaradao.

Pɔɔl aa ba dɛ bol ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa gel o waa do kaih, dɛ ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa ɛɛ nyiŋi o te kɛrɛdɛ wechɔga ɛɛ ta, dɛ ŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la, Fɛlekse berɔ ɔmɛ dɛ ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Gel mɔɔ. Dɛɛ la. N baa dɔ bɔr ja aa, mɛɛ yerɛɛ."
Dɛ o dɛ lii kɛ Pɔɔl ɛɛ tɛo suugaa, anomanta tama dɛ o yerɔ ŋɔ ó ba asɛ baa bol wa.
Bene anɛ baa gale, asɛ Fɛlekse le kara ta, asɛ Pɔɔkeɔs Fɛstos ba di kara. Dɛ Fɛlekse dɛ nyin kɛ Juda tena sie lɛ o nɛ, anomanta o gelɔ Pɔɔl ta do dea.
Fɛstos ba Sisaaria dɛ ba di tɔpera atoro, dɛ le bela la Jerusalam.
Waa la bela la, Sɔfonomonome ne Juda tena nomonome kpɔ waa ba ne Pɔɔl aa dɔa bil o sie dɛ soŋo ŋɔ
ó cha ba dɛ ba Pɔɔl ne Jerusalam ba tɛɛ ba. Dɛ ba dɔɔ vɔrɔwe cheg kɛ dɛ ba dɛ ba Pɔɔl ne naa, nɛ́ra ba sɔh ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ kpoo.
Belaa Fɛstos ŋɔ Pɔɔl chɔ dea Sisaaria, dɛ ŋɔ aa bigri o gba la Sisaaria bela.
Kɛ bá gel ba nomonome puu la bela, asɛ dɛ Pɔɔl ɛ waane aa, bá bagla bela.
Fɛstos berɔ di tɔpera anuatoro kɛɛ tɔpera fi ba be Jerusalam mɔɔ dɛ ba Sisaaria. Tɔ aa pera la, o kaa so bela baa dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la dɛ ŋɔ bá ba Pɔɔl ne.
Pɔɔl aa bala la, Juda tena baa le Jerusalam la baa che o jwɛɛh dɛ bol waa aa wola were dawɛ o nɛ. Kɛ ane a bwa, ba ta wone dɔ wobɛlbwa dɛ chagle kɛ ba waa la ɛ kasinteŋ.

Pɔɔl wono bol waa dɛ bagle kɛ o ta wechɔga ɛɛ. O baglɔ kɛ o ta wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ jo Juda tena kii bɛlbwa nɛ, dɛ bagle kɛ o ta wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ jo ba Korowii Dea kii bɛlbwa nɛ, dɛ ŋɔ o ta Room Koojen la ge nɛɛ joɛ.
Dɛ Fɛstos dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ o kpɔ Juda tena la darame, anomanta o bɔɔ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Hɛɛ la Jerusalamee ásɛ ba ka bol he waa baa kpɔa dawɛ he nɛɛ nɔ n siwi ta dɛ pa bole n ge na naa?"
Belaa Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Akai! Room Koojen gbagba nɛra sie n che taraken nɔ. Bonɔɔ chɛ kɛ ba bol n waa nɔ dɛ pa bole. He gbabir jemɔ kɛ n ta Israel tena nɔ wechɔge bɛlbwa ɛɛ.

Dɛ n fe jo ya kii bɛl nɛɛ asɛ a ɛ kɛ a chɛ kɛ ba kpo mɛ naa, n fe aa won ŋɔ mɛɛ chwa sewee. Kɛ dɛ ba waa baa kpɔa dɛ dag mɛ nɔ ta kasinteŋ ɛɛ te naa, nomɛlbwa aa won kpɔ mɛ do ba nɔn ta. N dɛ nyin kɛ he la n ne Room Koojen Siisa sie ásɛ o ka bol n waa nɔ dɛ pa bole."
Belaa Fɛstos ne o nomonome le jina. Baa bala la, Fɛstos ŋɔ Pɔɔl be ŋɔ, "Dɛ he ŋɔ hɛɛ la Room Koojen bee ó ka bol waa nɔ dɛ pa bole te naa, hɛɛ la o bee."
Aa baa ɛ tɔperaanɛ la, kooro bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Agrepa ne haah bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Bɛnes ba Sisaaria dɛ ba chɔɔ Fɛstos.
Baa di Sisaaria tɔperaanɛ la, Fɛstos taa Pɔɔl waa la bagle Kooro Agrepa, dɛ ŋɔ, "Fɛlekse fa tɔ a gɛ baa nɔ dea, kɛ o ta lole.
N la Jerusalam, asɛ Juda tena Sɔfonomonome ne ba bwɛɛ nomonome kaa bol o wa, dɛ kpɔ waa dɛɛ dawɔ, dɛ ŋɔ ń bol o waa dɛ pao bolchɔge.

Baa ŋɔ gɛ la, n ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ ya Room tena te aa gɛ ɛ. Ya te bwɛ, dɛ nɛn ne o dɔŋ dɔɔ, dɛ ya ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ o ne nɛn waa kpɔ waa dawɔ la cheme o bol o kon, o ge bol, asɛ a bɔɔ waa, yaa on bolchɔge pa gɛ.
Anomanta Juda tena la aa lawɛ dɔŋa ba bonɔ la, n ta hɛlɛ kwaraa. Tɔ aa pera la, n baa so n kara ta bela maa soga dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la, dɛ gel ba ba Pɔɔl ne bela.
Dɛ n te dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o ken ɛ wechɔga ane kohona. Kɛ nɛra la waa baa kpɔa dɛɛ dawɔ la ta wechɔga bɛlbwa ɛɛ.
Dɛ ba Korowii toma waa ne baa bɛl waa sewa baa yerɔ Yeesu la waa baa bol. Ba ŋɔ Pɔɔl te ŋɔ gɛ Yeesu la waa sewa la ir seo ta.
Dɛ maa jemɛ gɛ maa ɛ dɛ bɔɔ gɛ waa nɔ bini jemɛ dɛ won bola kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta n bɔɔ Pɔɔl ŋɔ, 'Yá la Jerusalam bá ka bol he waa nɔ dɛ pa bole bela kɛɛ?'
Maa ŋɔ gɛ la, o soŋɔ ŋɔ wɛɛ chɔ dea ka tel kɛ Room Koojen Siisa gbagba aa bol o waa la dɛ pa bole. A waa n tɔɔ do dea la ásɛ n baa dɔ ŋwɛnɛ aa, n gel o la bela."
Belaa Kooro Agrepa ŋɔ Fɛstos be ŋɔ, "N gbagba dɛ nyin n na baa nɔ dɛ no o waa nɔ." Asɛ Fɛstos ŋɔ, "Tɔ kere peraa, hɛɛ noo."
Tɔ aa pera la, Kooro Agrepa ne Bɛnes do ba koolaala, asɛ ba waa dɔ nyɛl kohona, asɛ ba ne bela soojanomonome ne bela nomonjena ba jo lamu ta. Baa chema la, Fɛstos gelɔ ba ba Pɔɔl ne.

Belaa Fɛstos ŋɔ, "Kooro Agrepa, ne nɛra haa cheme bonɔ nɔ, n dɛ lii kɛ he bwa na baa nɔ. Juda tena baa lɔ Jerusalam ne banɔ la baa lɔ Sisaaria bonɔ bwa kpɔ bandia dɛɛ nyɛg ŋɔ o waa aa were, ŋɔ o do kpoe.
Kɛ n ta wone na waa waa ɛa a ɛ kɛŋɔ o do kpoe. Anomanta o gbagba aa baa ŋɔ yá tɛ ŋwɛnɛ asɛ Room Koojen Siisa gbagba ka bol o waa la dɛ pa bole la, n ɛ n liire kɛŋɔ mɛɛ geloo o la o be.

Kɛ waa maa bagle do tɔn bini kɛŋɔ ken ne kenii o ɛ waa n ŋɔ Room Koojen gbagba nyiŋi o waa bini la, an kpega tɛ mɛ nɔ. Amɔ a waa n ba o ne he bwa sie, ne Kooro Agrepa gbagba sie, ásɛ he nyiŋi o waa nɔ bini la. Bɛl lole he ken ɛɛ wonoo cha mɛ ń dɔ o waane dɛ chwerɛ Room Koojen,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ n la o ne o be dɛ n ta wechɔga waa ɛa baglaa, a ta magrɛ."
Anee Kooro Agrepa ŋɔ Pɔɔl be ŋɔ, "N tɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ, ir dɛ bol he kon." Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, Pɔɔl ir nɔn dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o dɛ ba o kon bola bá no, dɛ ŋɔ,
"Kooro Agrepa, n sie lɛo kohona kɛ maa dɛ ba n kon bola he siwi ta, dɛ bagle waa bwa Juda tena aa kpɔa dɛɛ dag mɛ nɔ.
N sie lɛo kohona, dɛkalkɛ he jemɛ ya Juda tena nawee waa bwa. Anomanta n poori, lawɛ bambile dɛ no n kon.
Juda tena bwa jemɛ gɛ maa doa n bechale saŋ bwa ba le fini. Gɛ saŋ maa lɔ n bwɛɛ ne Jerusalam la, waa n faa dɛ ɛ bwa, ba jemɛ a bwa.
Dɛ ba sɛoh ŋɔ bá bol kasinteŋ aa, ba fe ɛɛ wonoo di danseɛ kɛŋɔ ya Juda tena Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛ o ta teŋa aa kpega kohona baa yerɛ o nɛra Farisii tena la, o taa n gee teŋɛ.
Korowii bagɛ ya naanar nyoa bɛl. N dɛ hwɛgɛ gɛ nyobaga la ta. Gɛ hwɛga nɔ waa ba koh lag mɛ asɛ n che he sie hɛɛ ba n waa bola la.
