Ya Juda tena deene fi dɛ anɛ tena la bwaa dɛɛ yarada Korowii kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ɛ gɛ waa bagɛ yaa nyoa laanee, dɛ koh a waa dɛɛ tomɔ sibegra ne chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa. N Naa Kooro, webeŋkpoŋ nɔ ya bwa aa dɛ hwɛgɛ o ta nɔ, onee ba kpɔ dawɛ n nɛɛ ŋɔ n ɛ wechɔga la. Na nɔ!
Ya waa yaa dɛ hwɛgɛ a ta laanee kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ ir yaa seo taa. Bɔkwaa ɛa he nɛra haa lɔ bonɔ nɔ aa wola won yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii won nɛra seo ta ira ɔɔ?
"N gba fa hah Yeesu waa le Nasarɛt la waa la. N fa liiro kɛŋɔ ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa maa dɔa la, a chɛ kɛ n kpɔ o ta dɛ chɔg o waa la.

Maa lɔ Jerusalam la, dɛ gɛ toma nɔɔ mɛɛ ɛ. N soŋe Sɔfonomonome ba tɛ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ asɛ n larawe Korowii nɛra do deene pirim. Gɛ saŋ la, dɛ ba bol ba waa dɛ pa ba bolchɔge ŋɔ bá kpoo ba aa, gɛɛ n ge sɛh teŋɛ ba kpoora la ta.

Dɛ n dɛ la cheremi deene bini saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ kaa ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa taeh, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ba bol Korowii nɛnhɛlwaa ásɛ n lag ba. Ba waa aa dɛ di n baah kohona nomanta, dɛ n ti ba dɛɛ la bwɛɛre aa wola Juda tena bwɛɛre ɛɛ kwaraa ta, dɛ kaa ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa.
"Gɛ ŋwɛnɛ nɔ bɛlee n soŋe Sɔfonomonome be, asɛ ba tɛ mɛ kpegri ŋɔ ń la Damaskɔs.
N Naa Kooro, yaa lɔ ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ kaa la, gɛ saŋ wee aa chegɛ nyufala la, n ne nyiŋa dɛ nii le nyundua dɛ chaah bɔr gwaa wee, dɛ chaah bɔr bar n ne nɛra yaa dɛ valɛ la.

Belaa ya bwa chogli harɛ, asɛ n no kɛŋɔ nomɛl aa kpɔ ya bwɛɛ wobol dɛɛ bol waa n be, dɛ ŋɔ, 'Oo, Sɔɔl! Ɛrɛɛ he che n nɛɛ gɛ nɔɔ? He gbagbaa hɛɛ ɛ la. He ne nao baa doo ŋwɛn dɛɛ tegɔ o ta naa dɛɛ yagre o dɔɔ daa bwa beŋkpoŋ.'
Anee n ŋɔ, 'Henee umeo, n Dɔɔ?' Asɛ o ŋɔ, 'Menee Yeesu haa chegɛ n nɛɛ la.
Ir che! N dɛ nyin n lee ásɛ he ɛ n bonɔɔ dɛ valɛ dɛɛ bol waa haa naa fini nɔ, ne anɔ la haa naa kerekere la nɛra be. A waa n kpɔ n te chagle la.
Mɛɛ tomɛɛ Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bwa bee, dɛ kisi wechɔge ba be.

Hen dɛ ka pili ba sie ásɛ ba le biro ta dɛ ba bochaah ta bela nii aa lole, dɛ le Bɔnsam nɔn ta dɛ ba Korowii be, ásɛ o kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba, ásɛ ba ba ja nɛra baa yarada mɛ n sɔ ba doŋa bwa ta ba ɛ n bii la nɛ.'
"N Naa Kooro, maa na gɛ waa nɔ la, n ta vɛɛh. Gɛ bwa Yeesu aa le nyundua ba ŋɔ n be la, n ɛo.

N tɔ sie la Damaskɔs, dɛ la Jerusalam, dɛ gaage Judia harɛ la te bwa, dɛ la harɛre a nɛra aa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ge ta. Maa dɛ gaage la bwa, dɛ n dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ bá charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta, dɛ ba Korowii be, asɛ dɛ gel ba we-ɛɛla chagle kɛ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta.
Gɛ waa nɔ waa Juda tena lag mɛ gɛ saŋ maa lɔ Korowii Dea la, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin n kpoe.

Dɛ le gɛ saŋ nɔ bwa ba le fini nɔ, n dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii alaworomɛɛ n ta do le dɛ won che he sie dɛɛ di waa nɔ danseɛ nomonjena ne bechale bwa be nɔ. Waa Korowii keamere ne Mosis faa dɛ bol ŋɔ aa ɛo laanee n gee bol.

Anee kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la na wahala, dɛ tɔ sie ir seo ta lala bwa nɛ, dɛ́ won che o seo ta ira la ta bagle Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la kɛŋɔ ya toole seo nɔn ta ne biro ta kpa, dɛkalkɛ nii chaah ya nɛ."
Pɔɔl aa dɛ bol waa ken la, nomoa Fɛstos kɔro ŋɔ, "Pɔɔl, choglaa dɛɛ wee kɛɛ? He tɔn jema kohona laanee dɛɛ wee chogla la!"
Anee Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Nomoa, chogla laa mɛɛ we! Kasinteŋ torodoo mɛɛ bol la.
N Naa Kooro Agrepa te jemɛ waa maa dɛ bol nɔ bwa. A waa maa wola waa bola o sie ɔmɛ la. N jemɔ kɛŋɔ a bɛlbwa ta o habɔɔ leɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a bɛlbwa ta waa baa sɔah ɛ ɛɛ.
N Naa Kooro, he yarada waa Korowii aa gela o keamere la bol la aa? N jemɔ kɛŋɔ he yaradaa."
Belaa Kooro Agrepa ŋɔ, "He dɛ lii kɛ hɛɛ wonoo gel n berɛ asɔre te bug nɔ ta kɛɛ?"

Anee Pɔɔl ŋɔ, "Dɛ bug nɔ taa yoo, dɛ kerekeree yoo, n te waa maa dɛ soŋe laanee kɛŋɔ he ne nɛra nɔ baa dɛ no n waa nɔ fini nɔ do kɛŋɔ maa doa nɔ. Kɛ maa soŋe kɛ ba do kwaa he nɔɔra kɛ baa do mɛ nɔ te."
Belaa Kooro Agrepa ne Nomoa Fɛstos ne Bɛnes, ne nɛra baa lɔ bela la bwa ir,
asɛ baa le bela la, baa ŋɔ dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ wobɛlbwa ta baglɛ kɛ o chɛ kpoe, kɛɛ ba doo dea."
Kooro Agrepa ŋɔ Nomoa Fɛstos be ŋɔ, "Dɛ ken laa o soŋe ŋɔ hé la o ne Room Koojen Siisa be ó ka bol o waa dɛ pa bole nɔ naa, n fe ɛɛ ŋɔɔ hé kpɔɔ ta wɛɛ la."
Ba vɔrɔwɔ ŋɔ yá kpɔ nee ta kaa Itali harɛ bɛla Room Koojen aa soga la. Anomanta ba kpɔ Pɔɔl ne nɛra bane baa do ba ge dea ja o nɛɛ la tɛ Room Koojen soojanomoa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Juleɔs la.

Stiimae bɛl le Adramitiam ba, asɛ ya jo o ta dɛɛ kaa. Dɛ o dɛ kaa Eesia harɛ mpo nyoa bwɛɛre ta. Dɛ baa bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Aristakus ja ya nɛ. Makidoonia harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Tɛsalonika la taa o le.
Tɔ aa pera laanee ya jo Sidon. Juleɔs kpoŋe Pɔɔl kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ tɛo ŋwɛnɛ ó ka na o daamanar ásɛ ba tɛo kwaa aa chɛ kɛ o dɔ o ŋwɛnɛ la ta.
Ya chegɛ bela dɛɛ kaa, asɛ peu ka ta dɛɛ cheme yaa. Anomanta ya berɔ kaa Saepros waa ɛ ekwi la baŋ bobɛl peu la aa wola bela te ta la dɛ kaa.
Ya kpɔ mpo ta gɛ dɛɛ la dɛ ka fɛrɛ Silisia ne Pamfiilia jwɛh, dɛ ka chuge Maera waa lɔ Lisia harɛ ta la.
Belaa sooja nomoa la na Alɛksandrea tena stiimae bɛl waa dɛ kaa Itali harɛ, dɛ kpɔ yaa do o ta.

Ya kaalɔ tama tama ken tɔpera anɛ, mɔɔ dɛ ta ba tel Kenaedes, dɛkalkɛ dɛ peu aa yaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛ. Peu la aa wola ŋwɛnɛ tɛ la, ya pa sie Kret ne Salmon a bwa aa ɛ ekwie la baah ta dɛ fɛrɛ Kret baŋ bela peu la aa wola bela te ta la dɛɛ kaa.
Yaa fɛrɛ Kret harɛ baŋ pera bela kaa la, a no yaa kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ ya ba le legbɔɔ bɛl o ne Lasea aa wola jaŋɛ baa yerɛ bela Legbɔdɛɛge la.
Yaa bigri ŋwɛnɛ ta kohona la nomanta, ya ne Legbɔdɛɛge tela dɛ ya Juda tena tɔpejen yaa dɛ vɔwɛ nyoa o ta la garɔ. Gɛ tɔpere nɔ ge garaa, dɛ gɛ mpo la ta vala aa were. Anomanta Pɔɔl ja ba ŋɔ,
"Bwɛɛla, n nao kɛ le bonɔ dɛɛ la la, ya ŋwɛnɛ nɔ aa werii do tɛ yaa. Ya dɛ la naa, yaa ka na siswɛmee, asɛ ya ne ya stiimae nɔ ne ya bone nɔ ka nee ta."
Pɔɔl aa bol gɛ la, sooja nomoa la ta o be noɛ. O teŋɛ nɛn waa dɛ valɛ stiimae la ne la ne stiimae te la nyoa wobol ta.

Legbɔdɛɛge legbɔɔ bela aa were ne stiimae la chega peujena la saŋ. Ba ŋɔ stiimae legbɔdɛɛge lɔ Kret harɛ bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Finiks la ta, anomanta ba kɛrɛdɛ ŋɔ bá takapɔ so stiimae la bini tama tama dɛɛ la bela dɛ ka so bela, ásɛ peujena la saŋ kaa mɔɔ. Dɛ Finiks legbɔɔ la chɔɔ kɛ korobifale guri aa do gɛ la, asɛ o harɛ la nyoa bɛl sie chagɛ wee cholibɔr dig pera, asɛ bɛl ge chagɛ wee cholibɔr gal pera.

A ta bigre dɛ peujega bɛl tao le wekaŋle harɛ bɔr dɛɛ ba, asɛ ba lii kɛ baa wonoo kaa gɛ ba fe aa liira wubwa la. Ba laa ba stiimae la buni baa kpɔa do nee bini dɛ gel stiimae la ɛɛ che la kpɔ dɛ fɛrɛ Kret harɛ dɛɛ kaa.
A ta bigre bɛlbwa asɛ bela peuchɔge bɛl o yon le wee leebɔr gal pera dɛɛ ba la ir kpegri nɛ, dɛ le Kret harɛ dɛ ta dɛɛ ba mpo ta.
Peu la aa taa dɛ ba lɔ yaa la, ya lawɛ ya stiimae la nyoa kahonɛ. Dɛ stiimae la aa wone dɛɛ kaa sie kpa, dɛ den dɛɛ kaa bela peu la aa taa chagɛ la.

Ya baa tel ekwi bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Kaoda la wekaŋle harɛ bɔr, asɛ o tɔ yaa bɔr peu la be tama, kɛ dɛ o ta dɛ vuugi yaa te. Ya bwara nyɛgɔ mɔɔ ba ta won gɔɔ gberjega waa pɛl ya stiimae la dɛ do ya stiimae la bini, dɛ kwaa stiimae la vɔrɔwɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Ba chweeh stiimae la ŋwɛɛra aa lɔ o keŋkeŋni la, asɛ a hamɛ kiŋkiŋ. Dɛ kechɛ bɛl lɔ bela baa yerɔ Siritis, asɛ baa ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ peu la ɛɛ tag baa kaa bela asɛ ba ka bela. Anomanta ba ba stiimae la yajen la aa lɔ o doa la ne harɛ, asɛ peu la tag ba dɛɛ kaa.
Tɔ aa pera la, dɛ peu la ta dɛ ta kohona. Anomanta ba pa stiimae la bini bone ane vigri ásɛ o fɛgre.
Tɔ aa pera ja la, ba gbagba pa stiimae la laala ane ta.
Tɔpera aŋwɛnɛ bwa dɛ yaa wee na, yaa weweela ge na, asɛ peu la ge na dɛɛ ta kpegri nɛɛ gɛ. Ate dɛ yaa ya nyuune te waa lii kɛŋɔ yaa ɛ nɛraa kpa.

Baa lɔ gbera la bini bigri baa wola kondikwaa dii la, Pɔɔl iro che dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yabala, maa ŋɔa ya bɛ Kret le la, a chɛ kɛ he fe no n kon ta. Laala aa chɔga ne anɔ la haa paa ta nɔ, a fe ta gɛ balɛ.
Kɛ he bɛ ɔmɛ. He bɛlbwa aa sewa ba. Stiimae nɔ gboo dɛɛ ba chɔga.
Wee la aa gela n ŋɔ gɛ laanee kɛ, dɛ jwaana ne la, Korowii waa dɔɔ mɛ dɛ gel mɛɛ ɛ o toma la, o torome ba n be,
dɛ ba ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, 'Pɔɔl, bɛ ɔmɛ! Hɛɛ la Koojen Siisa bee. Nɛra la bwa he ne baa dɛ valɛ nɔ, Korowii noɔ tɛɛ. Wɛɛ lɛɛ baa.' "
Pɔɔl aa bol gɛ la, o ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Anomanta he bɛ ɔmɛ, dɛkalkɛ n dɛ yarada Korowii. N jemɔ kɛŋɔ gɛ waa bola la, gɛɛ aa ba ɛɛ.
Kɛ peu nɔ ɛɛ tagɛ yaa ka ta ekwi harɛ bɛl ta."
Tɔpere waa teŋa fi dɛ anaarɛ la harambaŋa ne la, dɛ peu la ta dɛ tagɛ yaa gɛ. Dɛ ya lɔ mpo la baa dɛ yerɔ Mɛdetɛreenia la ta. Dɛ stiimae la tom-ɛɛra la liire ɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ ya ken dɛ tel harɛ bɛl ta.
Anomanta ba magɛ nee la dɛ na kɛŋɔ o luŋri tel nagale fifraanaarɛ. Aa ɛ tama la, ba berɔ magɛ na ja, dɛ na kɛŋɔ o luŋri tel nagale fifraatoro.
Dɛ ba dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ ya stiimae la ɛɛ chuge bwea anee dɛ pegri, dɛ koh a waa gɔɔ o bune anaarɛ bwa do nee ta stiimae la mun ta. Dɛ ba dɛ soŋe Korowii ŋɔ bɔ́r chaah warane.
Ate dɛ stiimae tom-ɛɛra la fe dɛ nyin bɔr dɛ le o bini dɛ chwa. Ba pur o gberjega la do nee ta, dɛ teŋe nyosone ŋɔ ba fe dɛ la ka kpɔ stiimae la sie dɛ́ ka tɛr o bune ŋwɛɛra ane do nee ta.
Belaa Pɔɔl ŋɔ soojanomoa la ne soojare la be ŋɔ, "Dɛ stiimae tom-ɛɛra nɔ ta o bini sogaa, he bɛlbwa aa he nyuu dɔ."
Asɛ soojare la chaa ŋwɛɛra aa vɔwɛ gberjega la pɛl stiimae la, dɛ gel o kaa.
Tomun aa ba dɛ kpɔ la, Pɔɔl soŋ ba ŋɔ bá bwa di kwa, dɛ ŋɔ, "He tɔpera fi dɛ anaarɛɛ nɔ he tea bini aa chɔga he so dɛɛ kpa waa aa dɛ ba chiga, haa wola kwaa dii.
N poo heya, hé di kwaa tama, dɛ́ won yo lɛ he nyuune. Haa waa nɔ nyoa kae ba. Wobɛlbwa aa he bɛlbwa ɛɛ ba."
Waa ŋɔ gɛ la, o kpɔ paanoo dɛ jam Korowii ba bwa siwi ta, dɛ mɔn dɛ di.
Waa ɛ gɛ la, ba bambile ba harɛ, asɛ ba dɔ gbemba dɛ won di kwa.
Dɛ ya bwa lɔ nɛra lafraanɛ fifraanuanɛ dɛ nɛra banumɛl.
Yaa di kwaa vagre gɛ yaa dɛ nyin la, ba gɔɔ kwaa baa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ paanoo la ta nee ta, ásɛ stiimae la do fɛgre.
Tɔ aa pera la, stiimae tom-ɛɛra ta wone jemɛ harɛ la yiso baa tel o ta. Ba na legbɔjen bɛl, dɛ na o nyoa bwea ne hɛŋle, dɛ ɛ ba liire kɛŋɔ dɛ aa magroo waa, baa kpɔ stiimae laanee chagɛ legbɔɔ la ta.

Ba chaa stiimae la bune la do nee bini. Dɛ ba fa vɔwɛ stiimae la ŋwandaa ge dɛɛ pɛlo, kɛ ba pur o ge dɛ pagri stiimae la sie yatɔg waa sagɛ nyundua la, asɛ peu tagɛ stiimae la dɛɛ la bela o sie aa chaga la, dɛ tagɔ ka chuge.
Stiimae la kaa chuge hɛŋle ane ta asɛ o sie la karɛ che a ta dɛ kaa kahonɛ. Waa chegɛ bobeŋkpoŋ gɛ la, dɛ nehaŋma dɛ lɔ o habɔɔ la kohona. Nehaŋma la pagre o habɔɔ la bwa.
Soojare la fe vɔrɔwɔ ŋɔ baa kpoo nɛra baa do ba dea dɛɛ kaa ba ne laanee, dɛ ŋɔ a waa laa aa, baa wa nee le dɛ chwa kaa.
Dɛ ba nomoa la aa Pɔɔl kpoe nyin dɛ koh o waa ŋɔ bá gel ba. O gelɔ nɛra baa jemɛ nee la tɔ sie le nee dɛ wa kaa baŋ,
asɛ ba kar la dawɛ dapɛgre ne stiimae la pugrere ta dɛ wa le. Kenii ya bwa ɛ dɛ le.
Ya le nee la baŋ, dɛ le ya siswɛm la nyoa mɔɔ dɛ ta no kɛŋɔ gɛ ekwi harɛ la sɔne Mɔlta.
Bela tena nyiŋi yaa kɛrɛdɛ. Yaa dena jo bela dɛ bwaala dɛ nɛ asɛ waa do le kohona, asɛ ba mar nii tɛ yaa ya ŋwee.
Pɔɔl nyin daa ane ŋɔ ó kpɔ ba do nii la ta. Jaah harɛkon lɔ daa la ta. Waa doa nii ta bɔwɔb lawɛ harɛkon la la, o leɔ dɛ chogo, dɛ ka sagɛ o nɔn ta.
Bela tena la aa na harɛkon la Pɔɔl nɔn ta saga la, dɛ ba dɛ bol dɔŋa be ŋɔ, "Baa nɔ magaa kpo nɛn! Na waa le seo nyoa mpo ta asɛ o wechɔga taa ti o luge gɛ!"
Pɔɔl mer harɛkon la ta nii la ta. O choga la ta on wobɛlbwa ɛɛ.

Dɛ bela tena la te sogo dɛɛ nyiŋi kɛŋɔ Pɔɔl nɔn la ɛɛ ɔrɔɔ, dɛ ŋɔ gɛ laa ge aa, wɛɛ choloo bug ta dɛ sewɛ. Baa soga dɛɛ nyiŋu kɛŋɔ wɛɛ sewɔɔ waa wola sewɛ wobɛlbwa aa wola on ɛɛ la, ba berɔ ŋɔ vog bɛlee ken berɛ nɛn ba ba be la.
Dɛ nomoa waa dɛ nyiŋi bela harɛ la ta sɔne Publius. Dɛ on dɔ harɛre aa lɔ ba jwɛɛh bela la te bwa. O lɛ yaa dɛ nyiŋi yaa kɛrɛdɛ tɔpera atoro.
Dɛ Publius mɛɛ bwara wɔrɔbɔ asɛ o chɔ. Dɛ o dɛ feege ge. Pɔɔl jo o be dea dɛ kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ o nɛ, dɛ soŋe Korowii tɛo, asɛ o gbaŋre.
Gɛ waa nɔ aa ɛa la, bela tena ba bwara aa dɛ wee ba la ba Pɔɔl be, asɛ o soŋe Korowii tɛɛ ba ba gbaŋre.
Ba kɛ yaa kwaa pirim. Yaa dɛ ba stiimae ta joe dɛ kaa la, ba tɛ yaa laala aa chɛ kɛ ya dɔ mɔɔ dɛ le la bwa.
Ya di korobie atoro bela mɔɔ dɛ dɔ Alɛksandrea tena stiimae bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Vogkpara la bini jo. Peujen saŋ aa tela la, stiimae la tena baa so Mɔlta ásɛ peujena tonɛ mɔɔ ba le.
Yaa lea la, ya kaa chog bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Serakius la, dɛ di tɔpera atoro.
Ya le bela dɛ la bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Rɛgeɔm la. Tɔ aa pera la, dɛ peu bɛl tao le wekaŋle harɛ bɔr dɛɛ ba. Tɔpera anɛɛ ya di ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ tel bwɛɛ bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Puteoli la.
Dɛ asɔre tena bane lɔ bela dɛ ŋɔ yá di yawanyoa ba be mɔɔ dɛ kaa. Belaa ya le dɛ ba Room.
Room asɔre tena aa no ya waa la, ba baa cheme yaa Apius Yawa ta ne bela baa dɛ yerɛ Deene Atoro la bɔr. Pɔɔl aa na ba la, o bambile ba harɛ, asɛ o jam Korowii.
Waa ba Room la, ba tɛo o gbo dea, dɛ gel sooja beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ daahno.

Pɔɔl aa di tɔpera atoro Room la, o yerɛ bela Juda tena nomonome bwa cheme dɛ ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Yabala, n ta ya bwɛɛ tena wobɛlbwa ɛɛ, n ta ya naanar waa baa dɛ ɛ la bɛlbwa nɛɛ joɛ, asɛ ba lag mɛ Jerusalam dɛ kpɔ mɛ tɛ Room tena ba tɔ mɛ dea la.
Ba ge aa nyiŋi n waa bini la, dɛ ba fe dɛ nyin n tae, dɛkalkɛ dɛ wobɛlbwa ta chaglɛ kɛŋɔ bá kpo mɛ gɛ ya bwɛɛ tena aa chagla la.
Baa ŋɔa bá ta mɛ la, ya bwɛɛ tena ta sɛɛh kwaraa, asɛ n koh a waa ŋɔ amɔ te bá tel n ne Room Koojen Siisa sie ó ka nyiŋi a ta. Kasinteŋ, dɛ anɔ laa aa, n ne ya bwɛɛ tena ta wobɛlbwa dɔe.
A waa n ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n na heya, asɛ dɛ kpɔ bil he sie, dɛkalkɛ nɛn Juda tena bwa aa dɛ hwɛgɛ o nɛɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ba lɛ yaa la waa ba lag mɛ dɛ do kwaa n nɔɔra nɔ."
Anee Juda tena la ŋɔ, "Ya bwɛɛ Judia harɛ tena ta yaa tɔn bɛlbwa chwerɛ dɛ bagle he wobɛlbwa ya be. Yabala baa le ya bwɛɛ dɛɛ ba bonɔ nɔ ge bɛlbwa ta he wechɔge bɛlbwa bolɛ ya no.
Yaa no he nyoa wobolee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ he ŋwɛnɛfale nɔ haa kpɔ o ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii nɔ te, baa o waa nyin bobɛlbwa."

Ba tɛo tɔpere baa kpɔ ba no o nyoa wobol. Tɔpere la aa tela la, ba ba o be pirim o dea bela. Pɔɔl le chɔɔ dɛ bag ba Korowii Kora waa ka tel jwaana. O bol Yeesu wa, dɛ lii ba waa Mosis ne Korowii keamere faa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la bwa, dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin kɛ ba sɛh ŋɔ Yeesu waa ba faa chwerɛ la.
Nɛra la bane yarada o waa la, bane ge ta an yaradae.

Pɔɔl bol waa tonɛ asɛ baa ba pegra. Dɛ ba bwa liire ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ, baa tɔŋle dɔŋa. O berɔ bol webeŋkpoŋ ja, mɔɔ ba bwa pegre. O waa waa bola laanee kɛŋɔ, "Korowii Domadɛɛge chegɛ o keame Aesaya nɛɛ bol waa ya naanar be, dɛ kpelaa o ŋɔ. O bolɔ ŋɔ,
'Ka ŋɔ nɛra la be ŋɔ: Hɛɛ noo kohona, kɛ haa a mun noe ba. Hɛɛ nyiŋuu kohona, kɛ haa a jema ba.
Dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra nɔ bambile kpegri, ba kpɔ nɔɔra tɔɔge deŋna, dɛ tɔɔge ba sibie ge. Dɛ a waa laa aa, ba sie fe ɛɛ nao, asɛ ba deŋna no, asɛ ba jemɛ a mun, dɛ charɛ ba liire asɛ n lɛɛ ba.' "
Pɔɔl berɔ ŋɔ, "Anomanta, hé no. Korowii waa aa dɛ ba nɛwɛnyini lɛɛ la, o berɔ kpɔa tɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, dɛkalkɛ ban dɛɛ ba o be noe."
Pɔɔl aa bol waa tonɛ la, ba leɔ dɛɛ kaa dɛɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa kohona.
Pɔɔl hane dea dɛ so o bini bene anɛ. Dɛ nɛra dɛ ba o be. O ta ba bɛlbwa berɛ.
Dɛ o dɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Kora wa, dɛ kpɔ bansua dɛɛ bagle ya Dɔɔ Yeesu wa. Nomɛlbwa ta on ŋwɛnɛ tɔe.
Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowiirii lee mɛ dɛ gel n ɛ Yeesu torome, dɛ kpɔ o Amanesoma tɛ mɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bol nɛra be.
A gɛ Amanesoma nɔ waa o che o keamere waa lee ba nɛɛ dɛ bagɛ nɛwɛnyini nyoa a saŋ la la. A waa ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la.
Korowii Bie Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ ya Dɔɔ la, o waa Amanesoma la ɛɛ bagle. O nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ be pera la, Kooro Devid deaa o le,
asɛ o Korowii ɛɛ ge be pera la, Korowii chegɛ o seo ta ira la ta dɛ bagle kpegri ne kɛŋɔ o Korowii Biee on.
O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ sune n nɛ, dɛ cha mɛ, dɛ gel mɛɛ ɛ Yeesu toma dɛɛ bagle nɛwɛnyini te bwa o waa ásɛ ba yaradaa dɛɛ ɛa, ásɛ o dɔ sɔn.
He Room tena ge ja a gɛ nɛra nɔ Korowii aa lee ba ŋɔ bá ba ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛra nɔ nɛ.
He Room tena Korowii aa dɛ nyin heyaa dɛ le heyaa ŋɔ hé ba ɛ o nɛra la, he bwaa mɛɛ chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bwa na he sum dɛ cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
Mɛɛ tɔ sie che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ jam N Naa Korowii he waa kɛŋɔ haa yarada Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ kohona, asɛ nɛra bwa ɛɛ bol he waa nɔ.
Korowii maa dɛ tomɔ n bambile bwa ne, dɛɛ bol o Bie la Amanesoma waa la, o jemɔ kɛ saŋ bɛlbwaa n soŋo dɛɛ tɛ heya. Onee n danseɛ te.
N dɛ soŋo kɛŋɔ dɛ o sɛoh waa, ń fe won ba na heyaa taraken te.
N sie chegɛ chiŋ mɛɛ nyin kɛ n na heyaa dɛ cha heyaa waane Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa tɛ mɛ ne, ásɛ he do kpegri he teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la ta.
Ya bwaa dɛɛ ba dɔŋa chae. Gɛ maa yarada Yeesu Kristo la, aa do heyaa gbembaa, asɛ gɛ he ge aa yaradao la do n ge gbemba.

Yabalawa, n dɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ saŋ bɛlbwaa n fe ɛɛ nyin kɛ n ba he be, asɛ waa yon dɛɛ tɔ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ. N dɛ nyin n dɔ he bane dɛ tɛ Yeesu Kristo kɛŋɔ maa dɔ bane le nɛra ba ge aa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bini la.
A chɛ kɛ n bol Yeesu Amanesoma la nɛra bwa be, nɛra baa kaa sie ne banɔ la baa ka mun, nɛra ba sie aa pila ne banɔ la ba sie aa wola pile bwa be.
Anomanta n siwi swɛɛrɔ mɛɛ nyin kɛ n bol Yeesu Amanesoma la he Room tena ge be.
Sihiih aa men kpo Yeesu Amanesoma nɔ bola ta. A taa Korowii che dɛɛ bagle o kpegri, dɛɛ lɛ nɛra bwa baa yarada o waa la. Juda tenaa ó tɔ sie lɛ, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ge jao.

Yeesu Amanesoma laanee dɛɛ bagle gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini do ásɛ ya waa su o siwi. Le waa la mumpar ka tel a jaga bwa, o waa yaradae waa gboo a bwa. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ, "Naate o wa aa togra dɛ su Korowii siwi la, wɛɛ yaradao dɛ dɔ o nyu."
Korowii baah di nɛra ba wechɔga aa tɔ o kasinteŋ waa la ŋwɛnɛ asɛ a sɔɔh ba la nɛ. O baah dɛ di ba wechɔga la ta kɛrɛdɛ.
Korowii wobɛlbwa nɛwɛnyini aa wona jemɛ la, o gelɔ ba naa chasee ken. O gbagbaa pili a bini bag ba.

Dɛ le gɛ saŋ Korowii aa ta harɛ la, o bwara waa nɛwɛnyini aa wola wone dɛɛ na siwi ne, kɛŋɔ o kpegri aa wola jaga dɔe ne o dor bwa, o gelɔ nɛwɛnyini na a bwa. Nɛwɛnyini wono che Korowii kwaa waa taa ta dɛ na o kpegri ne gɛ waa doa. Anomanta nɛwɛnyini aa won ŋɔ baa jemɛ kɛ Korowii lole.
Nɛwɛnyini jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii lole, kɛ baa on duu gɛ aa chɛ kɛ baa duuru. Baa jam kpɔe dɛɛ tɛo. Nɛwɛnyini wechɔga gelɔ ba wili, ba ta liire dɔe kpa.
Ba dɛ yerɛ ba te wejerema, kɛ gɛna gee ban.
Korowii te aa sewɛ bwa. Kɛ ba vɛh o toma, dɛɛ tomɛ kwaa ba gbagba aa kwaara a do kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini, kɛɛ jumbii, kɛɛ konaatena, kɛɛ kontuuga la.
Anomanta Korowii ta ba waa tɛɛ ba, asɛ baa ɛ wedoŋa ba bambile aa lawa, dɛɛ chɔ baala ne haahna aa wola Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ.
Ba gel Korowii kasinteŋ la toma dɛɛ tomɛ kwaa aa wola kasinteŋ dɔe. Kwaa Korowii aa taa la, anee baa tomɛ, dɛ gel Korowii gbagba. On chɛ kɛ yaa duuru saŋ bɛlbwa. Aamen.
Ba ken ɛɛ nomanta, Korowii ta ba waa tɛɛ ba, asɛ baa ɛ ba pɛla waa aa ɛ sihiih kohona. Ba haahna kwaraa ne baala aa chɔ kpa, ba ne ba dɔŋa haahnaa dɛɛ chɔ baa ne haah.

Gɛɛ ba baala ge ne haahna aa wola chɔ kpa, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ pɛlɛ ba bandɔŋa nɛɛ kɛŋɔ haahna ken. Ba ne ba dɔŋa baalaa dɛɛ chɔ baa ne haah. Ba wechɔga baa dɛ ɛ la nomanta, ba dɛ dɔ a kembɔr aa chɔg ba nɛndaa.
Baa wola sɛɛh kɛŋɔ bá jemɛ Korowii waa nomanta, o ta ba waa tɛɛ ba, asɛ ba liire bwa ɛ anchɔga, asɛ baa ɛ waa aa wola chɛɛ kɛ baa ɛ.
Harɛ bini wechɔga nɔ bwaa baa ɛ: mur, sibegra, meesɔɔh, bɔweela, nɛŋkpoa, nagra, dɔŋa negra, dɔŋa haeh, ne nɛra ŋwala.
Baa dɔŋa wedɛɛga bol, ba hah Korowii, ba siwi aa nɛn tɔgɛ, ba jenu, ba mbarafo. Saŋ bɛlbwaa baa nyin ŋwɛnɛfala dɛ́ ɛ wechɔga. Ba siwi aa ba mɛɛnanar ne ba nyare su.
Ba nya nfɛrɛ, ba waa ta kasinteŋ dɔe, ba chal toole dɔŋa nɛ, ba tea aa nɛn nɛɛ domɛ.
Ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii ŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ ken la, ba chɛ kpoe, kɛ dɛ ge ta na dɛɛ ɛa, dɛ garɛ dɛɛ kpɛɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛa la.
He naate haa dɛ pwah he dɔŋ, he ta wobɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ bol dɛ́ lɛ he te kpa. Henee ume noo, haa dɛ pwah he dɔŋ dɛ berɛ dɛɛ ɛ o wechɔga waa dɛ ɛ la dɔŋa la, dɛ he gbagbaa hɛɛ pa bolchɔge la.
Nɛn ɛ wechɔga nɔ dɔŋa aa, Korowii dɛ pao bolchɔge. O te, a ŋwɛnɛ taa wɛɛ pa nɛwɛnyini bolchɔge.
Kɛ he te, waa haa dɛ pwah nɛra a waa la, anee he gee ɛ. He dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii aa he te waa bola ba dɛ pa bole kɛɛ?
Waa nɔ bwaa Korowii ta tea dɛɛ ɛ heya, dɛɛ tɛ heyaa sisɔna dɛɛ lawɛ bambile nɔ bwa ásɛ he charɛ he liire dɛ le he wechɔga ta. Kɛ haa o wedɛɛga nɔ bu, dɛɛ nyiŋa pɛɛ.
He deŋne kpegri. Haa gelɛ he tea bini ɛɛ chɔg he wechɔga wa. He gelɔ Korowii bwaawee ɛɛ do kan he nɛɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa. Awola waa ba pa bole kasinteŋ ne la, o baah nɛɛ di he nɛɛ taeh.
Gɛ nomɛlbwa we-ɛɛla aa doa la, anee wɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ bol o waa dɛ pa bole.

Nɛra baa dɛ nyin jirima Korowii be, dɛɛ nyin kɛ Korowii kpɛɛ ba, dɛɛ nyin mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe, dɛ koh a waa dɛ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga saŋ bɛlbwa la, Korowii ɛɛ tɛɛ baa mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
Nɛra baa dɛ ɛ ba tetoowa, baa wola Korowii waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ ta teŋɛ, dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la, Korowii bwaawee ɛɛ ir ba nɛɛ taeh.
Nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, ba bwara ɛɛ nyɛgoo taeh, aa noo baa taeh. Juda tenaa dɛ tɔ sie na bonyɛga a noo ba, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ge jao.
Asɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la, Korowii ɛɛ geloo ba dɔ jirima, dɛ kpɛɛ ba, dɛ tɛɛ ba bambisɔɔhna. Juda tenaa dɛ tɔ sie na anɔ bwa, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ge jao.
Korowii aa nomɛlbwa waa nyin gwaa bɛl.

Nɛra baa wola Mmara Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ Mosis la jemɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la, baa sewɔɔ. Kɛ Mosis Mmara la ta laa Korowii ɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ bol ba waa dɛ pa bole. Banɔ la baa jemɛ Mmara la la, Mmara la taa Korowii ɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ bol ba waa dɛ pa bole.
Maa dɛ bol nɔ, Mmara nɔ noe laa gela nɛn ɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi. Mmara la ta teŋaa gela nɛn ɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi.

Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, baa Mosis Mmara la jemɛ. Kɛ saŋ bɛlbwa ba gbagba aa kpɔ ba nyu bini nfɛrɛ dɛ ɛ gɛ Mmara la aa dɛ bagle la, dɛ ba nyu bini nfɛrɛ la ɛ mmara tɛɛ ba. Kɛ a fe lole kɛŋɔ baa Mosis Mmara la jemɛ te.

Ba we-ɛɛla chaglɔ kɛŋɔ waa Mosis Mmara la aa dɛ bagle la lɔ ba bambile bini. Ba liire gba dɛ di danseɛ gɛ waa nɔ ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a tel ane ta naa, ba gbagba liire yon ɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga, ane ge ta ba gbagba liire yon ɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wedɛɛga.
Waa nɔ bwaa dɛɛ ba ɛɛ awola Korowii aa dɛ ba nɛra wechɔga baa ɛa dɛɛ sɔh la ne bochaah lee asɛ Yeesu Kristo pa bole la ta. Gɛɛ me Amanesoma la ɛɛ bagle.
Asɛ he naate haa dɛ yerɛ he te Juda te, dɛ kpɔ he sie dawɛ Mosis Mmara la ta dɛ kpɔ Korowii dɛɛ ta nyoa la ge sɛh?
He jemɛ gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin kɛ hɛɛ ɛ, dɛ jemɛ Mmara la, dɛ jemɛ waa aa wera bwa.
Kɛ he dɛ yerɛ he te nɛn waa jemɛ waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra baa wola wobɛlbwa jemɔɔ? Kɛ he ŋɔ henee ɛ nii dɛɛ chaah nɛra baa lɔ biro ta laɔ?
Wejema bwa ne Korowii wobɛlbwa lɔ Mmara la bini, anomanta he kpɔ he te kɛ wejereme dɛɛ bagle gɛna ne bamuge wa.
Haa dɛ bagle he dɔŋa waa nɔ, ɛrɛɛ haa wola won bagle he te gbagba ɔ? Haa dɛ ŋɔ nɛra be ŋɔ ba bɛ dɛɛ ŋwɛ asɛ dɛ te dɛɛ ŋwɛ nɔ sɛh?
He tenten nɔ, he ŋɔ nɛra bɛ ba bala haahna ne ba bala jaranar dɛɛ nyin. He gbagba, haa gɛ ɛa? He ŋɔ he kii voga, heyaa gee bera dɛɛ ŋwɛ kwaa a deene bini.
Heyaa kpɔ Mmara la dɛɛ ta nyoa, heyaa gee wola a ta teŋɛ, asɛ nɛra koh he we-ɛɛla waa dɛɛ ɛ Korowii nɛnhɛla.
Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "He Juda tenaa gela nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la siwi sa Korowii la."
He dɛ teŋɛ Mmara la ta naa, dɛ he pena teŋa nɔ dɔ mun. Kɛ dɛ haa Mmara la ta teŋaa, ate he fe gel he pena teŋa bɔ.
Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ baa wola ba pena teŋe la, ba dɛ teŋɛ Mmara la ta naa, haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ lɛɛ baa kɛŋɔ nɛra baa teŋe ba pena aa?

He Juda tena te jemɛ Mmara nɔ dɛɛ teŋe he pena, kɛ he bane aa Mmara la ta teŋɛ. Asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ge, baa ba pena teŋe, kɛ ba bini bane dɛ teŋɛ Mmara la ta. Ba we-ɛɛla ɛɛ geloo Korowii pa heyaa bolchɔge.
Nɛn waa ɛ Juda te, wobɛlbwa aa wola toole dɛɛ bagle kɛ o ɛ Juda te dɛ ja o pen teŋa gbo ta la, Juda te tenten laa on. Penteŋa dɔ mun.

Waa aa dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ nɛn ɛ Juda te tenten la, bambile binii a do. Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee dɛɛ ba toma ɛɛ he bambile bini ásɛ he won ɛ Juda te tenten. Mmara bɛlbwa aa gɛ bambile nɔ tɛ. Nɛn Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa chao asɛ o bambile bini waa ɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o ɛ Korowii nɛn la, nɛwɛnyini laa dɛɛ ba o kpɛɛra, Korowiirii dɛɛ ba o kpɛɛra.
Dɛ kenii a do aa, dɛ ɛrɛ gwaalaa ya Juda tena gwaa he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ yɔ? Dɛ bɔkwa tɔnɔɔ lɔ ya penteŋa ta nɔ?
Ya Juda tena na som taeh dɛ gwaa nɛra baa kaa la ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta. Anɔ la aa tɔ sie laanee kɛŋɔ yanee Korowii tɔ sie kpɔ o waa bagle.
Amɔ dɛ ya bini bane ta Korowii yaradae yaa, wɛɛ koh a waa asɛ o waa aa yaradaa dɔa?

Akai! Dɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa ɛ nyosonteŋna kwara naa, Korowii te wa ɛɛ dɔ kasinteŋii saŋ bɛlbwa. Anee Korowii Tɔn la bol la. O bagle Korowii waa ŋɔ, "He wobol ɛɛ bagloo kɛŋɔ he dɔ kasinteŋ. Hɛɛ dɛɛ di bole he waa taa."
Nɛwɛnyini te ɛɛ ŋɔɔ, "Dɛ a chegɛ ya wechɔga ta asɛ nɛra na kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛ nɛndɛɛge aa, amɔ ya ta wedɛɛga ɛɛ kɛɛ? Dɛ Korowii tɛr ya deŋne aa, dɛ o waa tograa?" Nɛwɛnyini liiree nɔ!
Kɛ gɛ laa a do. Dɛ Korowii waa ta tograa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ te won bol nɛwɛnyini waa dɛ pa bole ɔ?
Nomɛl gee pɛɛroo ŋɔ, "Aah dɛ a chegɛ n nyosone ta asɛ nɛra na kɛŋɔ Korowii dɔ kasinteŋ, o dɔ sɔn aa, dɛ n nyosone la ɛ wechɔga ja aa?"
Amɔ yáa ɛ wechɔga ásɛ wedɛɛga le a ta kɛɛ? Nɛra bane chɔg n sɔn, ba haŋɛ n nyoa ŋɔ n dɛ ŋɔ a gɛ waa nɔ ɛɛ ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Korowii ɛɛ tɛr ba deŋnee, dɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta gee.
Taraken nɔ, ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa ya Juda tena gwaa he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ yɔ? Ya ta heyaa gwaalɛ. N fa baglɔ kɛŋɔ ya Juda tena ne he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, ya bwa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra.
Anee Korowii Tɔn la ŋɔ la. O baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ kwaraa toole.
Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ jemɛ wa, nomɛlbwa toole dɛɛ nyin Korowii bɔr dɛ́ tomɔ.
Ba bwa berɛ habɔɔ kpo Korowii, dɛ bwa berɛ nɛnsale. Ba bɛlbwa aa wedɛɛga ɛ. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ kwaraa toole.
Ba nyoa wobol doŋo, a sɔɔh. Nyosone gboo ba bwa. Gɛ domkpule domɛ nɛn dɛ o kpoo bug ta la, gɛɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ ge kpɔ ba nyoa wobol dɛɛ chɔg nɛra.
Wobochɔga gboo su ba nyoo.
Ba gbaŋre nɛŋkpoa waa ta.
Bobɛlbwa baa dɛ la la, waa gboo baa chɔg, dɛɛ ɛ nɛra hɔhɔrɔwa.
Waa aa gela nɛn bambile ɛɛ sɔɔhno la te, baa an jemɛ.
Baa Korowii ge ɔmɛ."
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ waa Mmara la aa dɛ bagle la, nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Mmara la ta laanee Mmara la ɛɛ bagle, asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ won dɔ wobɛlbwa dɛ bol Korowii sie, ásɛ o won bol nomɛlbwa waa dɛ pa bole.
Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, Mmara ta teŋa aa won gel nomɛlbwa we-ɛɛla su Korowii siwi bwa. Mmara la toma bwaa kɛŋɔ ó gel nɛwɛnyini jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya ɛ wechɔga.
Korowii gelɔ ya jemɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta aa chega ya wa ɛɛ su o siwi. Mmara ta teŋa ta laa a che. Mosis Mmara la ne Korowii keamere tɔne di danseɛ gɛ ŋwɛnɛ nɔ ta.
Yeesu Kristo yaradae taa a che nɛra wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada Yeesu waa la, o waa dɛ su Korowii siwi, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini bwa beŋkpoŋ Korowii be.
Nɛwɛnyini bwa ɛ wechɔga, ya bɛlbwa ta gɛ Korowii fe aa dɛ nyin o maŋkura yaa la chɛɛ.
Yeesu Kristo yawɛ yaa o chal ne. A waa ya wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi. O nɛn sum nae kohona waa o ɛ gɛ tɛ yaa pɛɛpɛɛ la.

Korowiirii le Yeesu Kristo ŋɔ ó ba fuge o chal ta dɛ soŋe ya wechɔga ásɛ o bandia le nɛra baa yarada Yeesu Kristo seo waa la nɛ. Korowiirii fa saahna ɛ gɛ dɛ bagle kɛ o waa togrɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a saŋ la, nɛra aa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, o laa sie kpɔ ba be. A fe chɛ kɛ o tɛr nɛwɛnyini deŋne, kɛ o lawɛ bambile.
Taraken waa gela Yeesu Kristo koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ sewɛ nɔ, o baglɔ kɛŋɔ o waa togrɔ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo la, Korowii gelɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su o siwi.
Aa do gɛ nɔ, ya dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ ya ta nyoa aa? Ya ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe. Ɛrɛ taa a che yaa wola won ta nyoa nɔɔ? Mmara ta teŋa ta laa a che. Yeesu Kristo yaradae laanee tɔ gɛ waa nɔ bwa ŋwɛnɛ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya sɛoh kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo yaradae taa a che Korowii gel nɛn ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su o siwi. Mmara ta teŋa aa gelɛ nɛn ɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi bwa.
Juda tena gbo laa Korowii che tɛ. Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la, ba bwa waa o do le.
Korowii beŋkpoŋ gboo lole. Yeesu Kristo yaradae taa aa ba chega o gel Juda tena ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi. O yaradae taa aa ba chega o gel nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ge ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi.
Aa do gɛ nɔ, dɛ ya dɛ yarada Yeesu aa, dɛ ya tɔ Mmara la ŋwɛnɛ kɛɛ? Akai! Yeesu yaradae nɔ te kwaraa dɛɛ ba gela ya won teŋɛ Mmara la ta.
He ta sie nyiŋi ya Juda tena nabaa Abraham na. Gɛ saŋ la, bɔkwaa o na yarada waa nɔ bini nɔ?
Dɛ o we-ɛɛla taa a che o waa su Korowii siwi aa, ate o fe dɔ waa dɛ́ kpɔ ta nyoa. Kɛ dɛ he nyiŋi Korowii Tɔn bini na naa, waa won ta nyoa Korowii sie.
Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ Abraham yarada taa a che Korowii lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi.
Nɛn ɛ toma ba bɔɔ kem aa, dɛ kemee ba bɔɔ. Dɛ kɛɛ laa ba kɛo.
Kɛ nɛn waa wola wobɛlbwa ɛɛ dɛ kpɔ o yarada do Korowii gbo nɛɛ kɛŋɔ o won wechɔg-ɛɛra nɛndɛɛga ɛɛ la, a chegɛ o yarada la ta asɛ Korowii lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su o siwi.
Gɛɛ ya Juda tena nabaa Devid faa bagle nomɛlbwa Korowii aa wola o we-ɛɛla nyiŋe asɛ dɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi la waa kɛŋɔ o na som la.
O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Naatena Korowii aa kpɔ ba wechɔga kɛ ba, waa wola a waa lii kpa la, ba na som.
Nyusom tee naate Korowii aa wola o wechɔga waa lii kpa bwa la."

A gɛ som nae nɔ Devid aa bol o waa nɔ, dɛ Juda tena aa dɛ teŋe pena nɔ, ba gboo dɛɛ ba som nae yaa, kɛ nɛra baa wola pena teŋe bwaa o ŋɔ? Too, baa bagla Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Abraham yarada taa a che asɛ o waa su Korowii siwi" nɔ,
a gɛ waa nɔ chigo mɔɔ Korowii gel Abraham teŋe o pen kɛɛ o teŋo mɔɔ nɔ? A chigo mɔɔ Abraham teŋe.

O pen teŋa la ɛ we-ɛɛle bɛl waa dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o yarada waa o won ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi, dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ waa wola teŋe mɔɔ la, dɛ o waa su Korowii siwi. Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ baa wola pen teŋe dɛɛ yarada Korowii asɛ o lɛɛ ba kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi la, ba mɛɛɛ Abraham.
Nɛra baa teŋe ba pena la, Abraham biirii ba ge. Ba pena waa laa ba ɛ o bii. Dɛ ba dɔ yarada Abraham aa dɔa mɔɔ ba teŋe o pen la aa, anee ba ɛ o bii.

Korowii nyoa la o faa bagɛ Abraham ne o naanar ŋɔ harɛ nɔ bwa ɛɛ ba ɛ ba konee la, Mmara ta teŋa waa laa o bagɔ gɛ nyoa la. Dɛ Abraham dɛ yarada Korowii, asɛ a che a ta o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi, a waa Korowii bagɔ nyoa.
Nyoa Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham ne o naanar la, dɛ nɛra baa teŋɛ Mmara ta laanee wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ tɛ aa, ate dɛ yarada nɛwɛnyini aa dɛ yarada Korowii nɔ ta mun dɔe. Dɛ Korowii nyobaga la ge fe ɛ pɛɛ.
Mmara laanee dɛɛ ba Korowii bandia ne nɛra nɛ. On lole nɛra gee too waa Korowii baah nɛɛ di nɛra nɛ. Dɛ mmara fe toole naa, nɛra fe aa on to.

Nyoa Korowii aa baga la, yarada taa a che. A chɛ kɛ a ɛ gɛ ásɛ kon Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa la, o ɛ kon waa kpɔa tɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. O ɛ kon Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ Abraham naanar bwa pɛɛpɛɛ waa wola nsana lee ba. Nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la ta la, ba gbo laa Korowii bagɛ gɛ nyoa la. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yarada Yeesu waa la kɛŋɔ Abraham aa yarada Korowii la, wɛɛ di nyobaga la tɔnɔɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya bwa mɛɛɛ Abraham.

Anee Korowii waa baa chwera ŋɔ, "N gelɔ he ɛ nɛnfuuh bwa mɛɛ" la bagle la. A gɛ waa nɔ ɛ kasinteŋ Korowii be. Onee Abraham faa yarada la. On won nɛra baa serewa kwaraa chuma, dɛ won dɛɛ bol waa aa wola chige bwa kɛŋɔ aa chiga ka la.
Dɛ Abraham dɛ yarada Korowii dɛɛ hwɛgɛ o nɛɛ ge. Dɛ waa nɛn aa wola Korowii yarada a ta la, dɛ o te dɛ yaradao. A taa a che o ɛ nɛnfuuh bwa mɛɛ gɛ Korowii aa ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "He naanar ɛɛ warɔɔ" la.
Dɛ Abraham di bene lafa tonɛ, dɛ waa kpege kpa. Kɛ Korowii aa ŋɔa o naanar ɛɛ warɔɔ la, o ne o hwɛɛhra bwa, ne o haah hambara ɛɛ bwa, o ta tɔŋlɛ.
O ta tɔŋlɛ tamaa bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ Korowii aa won ɛ waa waa bagɔ nyoa laanee. O ta Korowii yaradae gelɛ bwa. Dɛ name kwaraa o ta dɔ yarada kohona, dɛɛ jam Korowii.
Dɛ Abraham jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ wonoo ɛ gɛ waa bagɔ nyoa la.
A waa Korowii che Abraham yarada ta asɛ dɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi la.
A gɛ waa la baa chwera do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi" la, Abraham gbo laa ba chwerɛ tɛ.
Ya nɛra yaa dɛ yarada Korowii waa ir ya Dɔɔ Yeesu seo ta la, ya bwaa ba chwera tɛ. Ya bwaa Korowii ɛɛ ba lɛɛ kɛ nɛndɛɛga, ya waa su o siwi.
Ya wechɔga waa Korowii leo ŋɔ ó ba sewɛ, asɛ Korowii berɛ iru seo ta, ásɛ a che o nɛɛ Korowii lɛ yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi.
Taraken nɔ, ya yarada aa gela Korowii lɛ yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi nɔ, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ a che asɛ ya ne Korowii pɛ.

Yaa yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ ya te tɛo la, a taa a che o gel Korowii ɛɛ na ya sum dɛɛ cha yaa gɛ waa dɛ cha yaa nɔ. Anomanta ya sie lɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ bela Korowii aa lole o waa dɔ jirima kohona la, ya gee do belaa.
A gbo ta laa ya dɔ silɛɛ. Ya sie dɛ lɛ ya wahala yaa dɛ na nɔ ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ anee dɛɛ ba gela ya dɔ bambile.
Bambile dɔe nɔ taa aa ba chega asɛ dɛ Korowii daah yaa na naa, ya waa won dɔ kasinteŋ. Ya waa dɔ kasinteŋ Korowii be naa, an dɛɛ ba gela ya dɔ hwɛga.
Hwɛga yaa dɔa nɔ, aa pɛɛ ɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii tɛ yaa o Domadɛɛge la ásɛ ya jemɛ o nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa kohona.
Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, ya fa toole ane bɛlbwa bini Korowii ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge la be pera. Dɛ ya faa Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋɛ. Kɛ tɔpere Korowii aa doa la aa tela la, Yeesu lɛ ya wechɔg-ɛɛra seo dɛ sewɛ.
A kpegri kɛŋɔ nɛn lɛ nɛndɛɛge kwaraa seo dɛ sewɛ. Nɛn waa dɛ nyin nɛn la te, bɛl lole nomɛl ken ɛɛ wonoo lɔ bambile lɛ o seo dɛ sewɛ.
Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, hé na gɛ Korowii tea aa dɛ domɛ nɛwɛnyini nɛ. Gɛ saŋ ya taa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra la, a taa Yeesu Kristo lɛ ya seo dɛ sewɛ.
Yeesu Kristo seo taa a che asɛ Korowii gel ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi. Aah dɛ Korowii bwaawee baa ir nɛra nɛ aa, a te taa Yeesu Kristo aa wola won lɛ yaa aa?
Dɛ ya ne Korowii fa dɔmɔ, asɛ o che o Bie Yeesu seo la ta dɛ gel ya ne o pɛ aa, ya ne Korowii aa pɛa taraken nɔ, a te ta kwaraa laa wɛɛ ba o Bie Yeesu seo ta ira ne o le doe nɔ waa koeh dɛ lɛ yaa aa?
A gbo laa. Ya sie lɛ Korowii nɛɛ kohona ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nomanta. O nɛɛ a che ya ne Korowii pɛ.
Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ nɛɛ a che wechɔga ba harɛ nɔ ta, asɛ a che o wechɔga ta seo ba harɛ ta. A waa seo bu nɛwɛnyini bwa la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini bwa ɛ wechɔga.
Korowii aa wola Mosis Mmara la ne balɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ wechɔga lole. Kɛ bela mmara aa wola toole la, baa wechɔga nkontaah bu.

Kɛ le Adam bere saŋ la ba le Mosis bere saŋ la, dɛ seo chɔ le tɛ nomɛlbwa. Hale nɛra ba faa wola Korowii nyoa vɛɛh kɛ Adam la bwaa fa dɛ serewe. Adam chaaree naate ba faa ŋɔa o dɛ ba bala la. Onee Yeesu Kristo.

Kɛ Adam ne Yeesu waa ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ chae Korowii aa na ya sum dɛ cha yaa la, a ne Adam wechɔga ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ. A gwaala kohona. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ wechɔga taa a che seo ba nomɛlbwa nɛ. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ alaworomɛ gee nɛra bwa di. Onee Yeesu Kristo. O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ sune nomɛlbwa nɛ, dɛ cha yaa kohona a gwaa Adam wechɔga la.

A berɔ do kɛŋɔ chae Korowii aa cha yaa la ne waa aa le nɛmbeŋkpoŋ la wechɔga ta la ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ. Wechɔge beŋkpoŋ taa a che Korowii pa ya bwa bolchɔge. Asɛ wechɔga aa wara la, Korowii na ya bwa sum dɛ cha yaa dɛ lɛ yaa kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi.

Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ wechɔga taa seo che dɛɛ di kora nɛwɛnyina nɛ. Gɛɛ a che nɛmbeŋkpoŋ nɛɛ asɛ Korowii na nɛwɛnyina sum kohona kwaraa dɛ cha yaa ya won ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi pɛɛpɛɛ dɛ di kora mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la ta. Onee Yeesu Kristo.

Gɛ Adam wechɔge beŋkpoŋ aa lɛ chɔgre tɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa la, gɛɛ Yeesu Kristo wedɛɛge beŋkpoŋ waa ɛa gel Korowii lɛ yaa kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi, asɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa won dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
Dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ deŋnekpeg aa gela nɛra bwa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra la, gɛɛ a che nɛmbeŋkpoŋ pwɛre waa doa ta asɛ Korowii lɛ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi.
Mmara balɔ dɛ́ gel wechɔga warɛ. Kɛ, wechɔga aa dɛ dawɛ la, a taa Korowii na nɛwɛnyini sum dɛ cha yaa kohona.

Gɛ wechɔga aa chegɛ seo nɛɛ dɛɛ di kpegri la, gɛɛ Korowii suna waa dɛ sune nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ la ge che gɛ Korowii aa ɛ yaa nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi la ta dɛɛ di kpegri, asɛ ya won dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo gelɔ nɛra ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su Korowii siwi.
Taraken nɔ, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? A chɛ kɛ ya na dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga tɔpere bɛlbwa ásɛ Korowii ɛɛ na ya sum dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ kɛ yaa tɔpere bɛlbwa kɛɛ?
Akai! Gɛ nɛn sewaa, waa wola toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa la, gɛɛ ya ne wechɔga baah do. Aah dɛ ya ne wechɔga aa wola toole wobɛlbwa bini nɔ, ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa yaa ba wona dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga jaɔ?
He soɔh kɛŋɔ baa sɔ yaa Korowii nee yáa teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la, ya ne onee pɛa sewɛ kɛɛ?

Baa sɔ yaa Korowii nee la nomanta, a kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ ya ne Yeesuu ba pɛ huge. Ya ne waa pɛa sewɛ la nomanta, gɛ Korowii aa chegɛ o kpegri a dɔŋ aa wola toole la ta dɛ iru seo ta la, gɛɛ wɛɛ ba ya ge chae ya kwaa so sofale waa wera, dɛ charɛ dofale waa wera.
Dɛ ya ne o pɛo dɛ sewaa, ya ne wɛɛ pɛo ir seo ta.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya dobene la ne Yeesuu ba pɛ sagɛ o dagagre ta. Ya dobene la ne o wechɔga bwaa ba kpo asɛ o bɛ won di kpegri ya nɛɛ kpa, asɛ wechɔga bɛ won yawɛ yaa yoma kpa.
Nomɛlbwa waa sewa la, o fooro dɛ le wechɔga kpegri aa dɛ di la be pera.
Ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa sewɛ la nomanta, ya dɔ yarada kɛŋɔ yaa dɔ mkpa waa dɔa laanee.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo ir seo ta waa wola sewɛ kpa bwa, seo ta kpegri dɔe o nɛɛ kpa.
O seo waa sewa la, kerabeŋkpoŋii o sewɛ dɛ pɔ kpegri wechɔga aa dɔa la nɛ. Taraken soga waa soga nɔ, o lole dɛ tɛ Korowii.
Gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ he kpɔ he te kɛŋɔ he ne wechɔga toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa kɛ nɛn aa sewa la. He ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta, a chɛ kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii he do le tɛ.
A ta chɛ kɛŋɔ he gel wechɔga ɛɛ di kpegri he nɛ, asɛ hɛɛ ɛ he bwadabii waa wola lee do saŋ bɛlbwa nɔ tetoowa.

He bɛ he bwadabii bobɛlbwa kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga. A chɛ kɛŋɔ he kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ nɛra baa sewa dɛ ir, dɛ charɛ ba soga ne ba dor. Hé kpɔ he bwadabii bobɛlbwa tɛ Korowii, dɛ kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ waa aa togra.
Wechɔga aa kpegri dɔe ba he nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii suna waa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ la lɔgaa he do. He toole Mmara lɔga kpa.
Yaa lɔ Korowii suna waa sune ya nɛɛ lɔga yaa wola toole Mmara lɔga nɔ, a chɛ kɛ yaa ɛ wechɔga kɛɛ? Akai!

Kɛ he jemɔ kɛŋɔ dɛ he kpɔ he te do nomɛl nɔn ta ŋɔ on dɔ heya aa, dɛ on dɔ heyaa kenɛ? He kpɔ he te tɛ wechɔga aa, hɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔgaa asɛ dɛ sewɛ. He kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii dɛɛ no o be naa, wɛɛ lɛ heyaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga asɛ he waa su o siwi.
Korowii jam! Wechɔga faa yawɛ heyaa yom, asɛ taraken nɔ he no o waa baa chagle heyaa dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo he bambile bwa ne nɔ,
Korowii le heyaa wechɔga yawa a faa yawɛ heyaa yom la ta. Taraken nɔ, he berɛ yoma dɛ tɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ.

He waa mun noe jaŋne, a waa n kpɔ waa haa dɛ noa tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛɛ bagle heyaa waa la. Gɛ he faa teŋa dɛ kpɔ he te do wedoŋa ta wubwa dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ he berɛ kpɔ he te do wedɛɛga ta, ásɛ he waa do goroŋ.
Wubwa la, dɛ wechɔga yawɛ heyaa yoma. Dɛ he ne wedɛɛga toole wobɛlbwa bini.
Dɛ wechɔga gboo hɛɛ ɛ. Taraken nɔ, a waa dɛ ɛ heyaa sihiih. A gɛ waa nɔ, dɛ tɔnɔ besoo a dɔ tɛ heya ɔ? Waa aa lɔ gɛ wechɔga nɔ habɔɔ laanee seo.
Kɛ taraken nɔ, Korowii le heyaa wechɔga ta. On dɔ heya. He tɔnɔ haa dɔa laanee kɛŋɔ he soga bini aa togra Korowii be. A taa aa ba chega asɛ he dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe.
Wechɔga dɔ a kembɔr. A kembɔree seo. Asɛ kon Korowii ge aa dɛ tɛ laanee mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ o che dɛɛ tɛ a gɛ mkpa nɔ.
Yabalawa, he jemɛ mmara wa, anomanta he jemɔ kɛ harɛ ta gboo mmara dɔ kpegri nɛra nɛ.
Haah waa yala la, dɛ o jaa ta sewaa, hahmor mmara vɔrɔwo, o ɛ o jaa la gbo haah. O jaa sewɔ te naa, dɛ hahmor mmara ta on vɔrɔwɛ kpa.
Kɛ dɛ o jaa ta soge le, asɛ o ne banfale ge berɛ do le ja aa, baa yerɔ hanjwamanee. Dɛ o jaa sewɔ te naa, dɛ hahmor mmara ta on vɔrɔwe kpa. O yalɛ banfale aa, dɛ o ta jwamane bɔe.

Yabalawa, Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa la, a ɛo kɛŋɔ he ne onee pɛa sewɛ. Anomanta he toole Mmara lɔga. Mmara la aa kpegri di he nɛɛ kpa kɛŋɔ haah jaa sewaa, waa wola toole hahmor mmara lɔga kpa la. He berɔ ɛ Yeesu Kristo waa ir seo ta la nɛra, asɛ dɛ won ɛ Korowii toma, he waa dɔ tɔnɔ o be.
Saŋ la yaa lɔ wechɔga ya nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔ aa dɛ nyin la ta dɛɛ ɛ la, dɛ Mmara la dɛ ir ya bambile wechɔga ɛɛ ta, asɛ wobɛlbwa yaa dɛ ɛ la, aa kaa ya ne seo ta.

Taraken te ya fooro, Mmara la ta yaa dɔe kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya ne a gɛ Mmara nɔ o faa kpɔ yaa berɛ yoma la toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa. Ya ɛo kɛ yaa serewa. Yaa Mmara ŋwɛnɛ ta kpɔe dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii kpa. Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee dɛɛ bagle yaa ŋwɛnɛfale yaa tomɛ Korowii taraken.
Aa do gɛ nɔ, dɛ Mmara la aa were kɛɛ? O wer, kɛ on gela n jemɛ kɛŋɔ komɛl lole baa yerɔ wechɔga. Dɛ Mmara la fe ta ŋɔe ŋɔ nɛwɛnyini bɛ gel o sie begre o dɔŋ kon aa, n fe aa jemɛ kɛŋɔ sibegra aa were.
Liichɔga nao kɛŋɔ aa wonoo che mmara Korowii aa doa la ta dɛ gel n ɛ wechɔga. Liichɔga aa na gɛ la, a chegɛ mmara la ta dɛ gel n sie ɛɛ begre komɛlbwa ta. Dɛ mmara toole naa, wechɔga ta kpegri dɔe.
Mmara aa wola toole la, dɛ wobɛlbwa toole n baŋa n so. Kɛ mmara aa bala la, belaa liichɔga ge ir, asɛ n na kɛŋɔ n sewɔ.
Mmara o fe aa chɛ kɛ o ba mkpa ne la, seo nee o ba.
Liichɔga nao kɛŋɔ a dɔ bɔr name. Mmara taa a che dɛ neg mɛ, dɛ tag mɛ do seo ta.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Mmara la ɛ kondɛɛge, asɛ o bini wobɛlbwa ge togre dɛ do wer.

Aah dɛ kon waa wera nɔ, o taa a berɛ che mɛɛ ba seo dɔe yaa? O ta laa. Liichɔgaa chegɛ kon waa wera ta dɛ gel n dɔ seo, dɛ bagle o dor ásɛ n jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ. Mmara la taa a che asɛ ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ liichɔga doŋo, aa wola were kwaraa.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge bee Mmara la le dɛ do wer. Kɛ n te, nɛwɛnyinii men, anomanta wechɔga yag mɛ.
Waa maa dɛ ɛ kwaraa la nɔ, n ta wone jemɛ wee la aa gela mɛɛ ɛa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ maa waa n fe aa dɛ nyin ɛɛ la ɛ. Waa maa wola nyin laanee mɛɛ ɛ.
Maa wola waa maa dɛ ɛ nyin dɛ gee ɛa la nɔ, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ n sɛoh kɛŋɔ Mmara la wer.
Anomanta la nɔ, n gbagba laa dɛɛ ɛ a gɛ wechɔga nɔ. Liichɔga aa lɔ n bini la, an gela mɛɛ ɛa.
N jemɔ kɛŋɔ liidɛɛga bɛlbwa toole n bini. N nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔɔ n ŋɔ nɔ. Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, n dɛ nyin wedɛɛga ɛɛ, kɛ maa won an ɛ.
Wedɛɛga maa dɛ nyin ɛɛ la, a laa mɛɛ ɛ. Wechɔga maa wola a ɛɛ nyin la, anee mɛɛ ɛ.
Dɛ waa maa wola ɛɛ nyin la, dɛ anee mɛɛ ɛ aa, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ n gbagba laa dɛɛ ɛa kpa, dɛ liichɔga aa lɔ n bini laanee dɛɛ ɛa.
Waa maa naa laanee kɛŋɔ n dɛ nyin wedɛɛga ɛɛ yaa, dɛ komɛl ŋɔ n bɛ ɛ.
N bambile fe lawɛ Korowii mmara la ta teŋa,

kɛ n bwadabii ge berɔ do dor bɛl. O dɛ vuugi n bambile. N bwadabii aa Korowii mmara la aa lɔ n bambile bini la ta teŋa nyin. Liichɔgaa gela n bwadabii aa wola Korowii mmara la ta teŋa nyin nɔ. A gɛ liire nɔ yag mɛ yom.
Akwe! Bɔkwa waa na mɛ kenɔ? Umee dɛ lɛɛ mɛ bwadabii nɔ waa dɛ kaa n ne seo ta nɔ nɔn ta nɔ?
Korowii jam. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo alaworomɛ, Korowiirii dɛ lɛɛ mɛ. Anomanta n bambile bini te, Korowii mmara taa mɛɛ teŋɛ. Kɛ n nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ be pera te, wechɔga taa mɛɛ teŋɛ.
Taraken nɔ nɛra ba ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la te aa bolchɔge dii ba ba tɛr ba deŋne.
Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, Korowii Domadɛɛge lɔga maa lole dɛ dɔ mkpa nɔ taa Yeesu Kristo che dɛ lɛɛ mɛ le wechɔga ne seo lɔga n faa lole la ta.

Nɛwɛnyini mar aa do gɛ, waa wola kpege dɛɛ tɔ Mmara ŋwɛnɛ, asɛ Mmara lɛ nɛwɛnyini kahonɛ la, Korowii te wono lɛ nɛwɛnyini. O gelɔ o Bie tenten kpɔ nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ dɔŋ dɛ ba chɔg liichɔga kpegri o faa dɔa nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ la dɛ laa wechɔga kpɔ,
ásɛ ya waa do sweih kɛŋɔ Mmara la aa bagla ŋɔ yá do la. Yaa nɛwɛnyini mar liichɔga aa suu nɔ waa ta teŋɛ, Korowii Domadɛɛge waa taa yaa teŋɛ.
Nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ nɛwɛnyini mar liichɔga aa suu nɔ tetoowaa ta la, a taa ba ge liire do. Nɛra ba ge aa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa ta la, a taa ba liire do.
He kpɔ liire do nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ liichɔga waa ta naa, he ne sewee. Kɛ he kpɔ liire do Korowii Domadɛɛge tetoowaa ta naa, he dɔ mkpa dɛ dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna.
Nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o liire do bwadabii waa ta dɛ gwaa wobɛlbwa la, o som laa Korowii, waa Korowii mmara ta teŋɛ. Waa won teŋɛ Korowii mmara ta ge bwa.
Nɛra baa kpɔ ba liire do nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ dɛ gwaa wobɛlbwa la, ba waa aa won too Korowii tea bwa.

He te la, he ta he nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔ som kpɔe gwaa wobɛlbwa. Dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge lɔ he nɛ aa, gɛ waa dɛ bagle heyaa laanee hɛɛ ba dɛɛ ɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa wola Domadɛɛge Yeesu Kristo aa dɛ tɛ la dɔe la, dɛ Yeesu nɛn laa on.
Dɛ Yeesu Kristo Domadɛɛge la lɔ he nɛ aa, wechɔga nomanta he bwadabii ɛɛ sewɔɔ te. Kɛ Korowii aa lɛ heyaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga he waa su o siwi nomanta, he lileore ɛɛ dɔ mkpaa.
Korowii waa ir Yeesu seo ta la, dɛ o Domadɛɛge lɔ he nɛ aa, gɛ Korowii aa iru seo ta la, wɛɛ che o Domadɛɛge la taa dɛ tɛ he bwadabii aa dɛ ba pɔeh kerekere nɔ mkpa.
Anomanta yabalawa, waa dawɛ ya nɛ, ya di kem, kɛ ya nɛwɛnyini mar nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔ kem laa ya di á ɛ kɛŋɔ yaa teŋɛ o nɛ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ nɛn teŋɛ nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ pɛla waa ta naa, waa mkpa dɔe ba. Kɛ dɛ nɛn chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la nɛɛ dɛ vɛh o bwadabii pɛla wobɛlbwa naa, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa.
Nɛra baa kpɔ ba te tɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge wɛɛ bag ba ŋwɛnɛ la, Korowii biirii ban.

Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa kpɔa tɛ heyaa la, o ta gelɛ he ne Korowii baah do kɛŋɔ nɛn ne o yom asɛ hɛɛ ɔmɔ. O gelɔ he ɛ Korowii bii. O alaworomɛ ya won wii dɛ yerɛ Korowii "n Mɛɛ," kɛŋɔ bie aa dɛ yerɛ o mɛɛ gɛ la.
Korowii Domadɛɛge yon gel ya jemɛ ya bambile bini kɛŋɔ Korowii biirii yaa.
Yaa ɛ Korowii bii nomanta, dɛ ya sɛoh dɛ na wahala Yeesu Kristo aa naa la aa, ya gee di o kapɛrɛɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo aa dɛ di la, asɛ Korowii kpɛɛ yaa gɛ waa kpɛɛ Yeesu Kristo la.
Wahala nɔ yaa dɛ na taraken nɔ, he nyiŋi som yaa dɛ ba nae kerekere la aa, a ta wahala ɛɛ kwaraa.
Korowii kontaala bwa siwi swɛɛrɔ aa kpa tɔɔ la wee Korowii aa bagle nɛra baa ɛ o bii la.
A dɛ yo dɛ yo kaahonɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ta a te dɔe. Korowiirii taa o tetoora ta kɛŋɔ a bɛ kpegri dɔ. Kɛ a dɛ hwɛgɛ
kɛŋɔ tɔpebɛl Korowii ɛɛ geloo a foo dɛ le kpegri bɛ dɔe nɔ ta, aa wola pɔh kpa, dɛ ja Korowii bii nɛɛ dɛ ge na som kɛŋɔ baa foora la.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ba le fini, Korowii kontaala bwa bwara dɛ nyɛg, aa pɛmɛ kɛŋɔ lol tea lɔ haah o yon dɛɛ pɛmɛ la.

Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, Korowii kontaala gbo bwara laa dɛɛ nyɛg. Ya nɛra yaa dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge kɛŋɔ kwaa Korowii aa ba tɛ yaa la bini konlogle la, ya gba bwara dɛ nyɛg. Ya dɛ nyiŋi Korowii ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ba ɛ yaa o biirii, dɛ lɛ ya bwadabii wechɔga ne seo nɔn ta.
Korowii aa lɛ yaa la, dɛ gɛ hwɛga nɔɔ ya dɔ. Kon nɛn aa dɔa la, waa berɛ dɛɛ hwɛgɛ o waa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ dɔɔ kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ kon waa wola nɛn nɔn ta joɛ la, o waa baa hwɛgɛ.
Ya te la, kon waa wola ya nɔn ta joɛ mɔɔ la, o waa yaa hwɛgɛ. Yaa too.

Gɛ ya hwɛga yaa dɔa la aa lawɛ yaa ya wahala bwa bini la, gɛɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge gee cha yaa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya yarada aa kanɛ. Yaa jemɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ yaa soŋe Korowii kwara. Korowii Domadɛɛge soŋo dɛɛ tɛ yaa mmɔbɔrɔ ne nɛn aa wola won bagle kwara.
Korowii te jemɛ nɛn bambile bini waa bwa, dɛ jemɛ o Domadɛɛge la nyu bini, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin la, gɛɛ o Domadɛɛge la soŋo dɛɛ tɛ o nɛra.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ nyin Korowii la, wobɛlbwa aa puu ba la, o gelɔ a ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. O tetooraa o lee ba ba ɛ o bii.
Nɛra Korowii aa jemɛ ba waa cheg wubwa la, waa wola ban tae mɔɔ la, dɛ o tɔ sie lee ba ŋɔ bá ba do kɛŋɔ o Bie la ken, ásɛ ba bwa ɛ o Bie la nimanar, asɛ o ge ɛ ba Dɔɔ.
Anomanta nɛra Korowii aa tɔ sie lee ba gɛ la, o lee ba ŋɔ bá ɛ o toma. Waa lee ba ŋɔ bá ɛ o toma la, o lɛɛ ba kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi, asɛ o tɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ ba ba so o jwɛh dɛ dɔ jirima.
Ya ta sie nyiŋi anɔ bwa na naa, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Dɛ Korowii teŋɛ ya nɛ aa, umee dɛ won ɛ yaa waane ɔ?
Nɛn waa wola yaa o Bie kwaraa vɔmɛ, dɛ koh ya bwa waa kpɔɔ do nɛwɛnyini nɔn ta ba kpoo la, bɔkwaa bala waa wola tea ta dɛ tɛ yaa komɛlbwa dɛ ja o Bie la nɛɔ?
Umee dɛ won na Korowii bii waa lee ba nɔ bwara wechɔge bɛl dɛ bolɔ? Korowii kwara waa dɛ pa bole la, o ŋɔ ba waa wer dɛɛ su o siwi.
Aah dɛ umee dɛ won pa ba bolchɔge ɔ? Yeesu Kristo kɛɛ? Sewaa o te koh ya waa sewɛ, kɛ a gbo laa. O berɔ ir seo ta dɛ ka so nomombɔr Korowii dig ta, dɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ yaa.
Bɔkwaa dɛ won pere ya ne Yeesu Kristo baah waa wola yaa nyina ba kpaɔ? Noe aa dɛ no yaa kɛɛ wahala yaa dɛ na, kɛɛ chega nɛra aa chegɛ ya nɛ, kɛɛ lɔr, kɛɛ nyaa, kɛɛ dɛ ya chegɛ seo nyoao, kɛɛ sewɔ?
Gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa dɛ bagle la, "He nomanta ya chegɛ seo nyoa saŋ bɛlbwa. Saŋ bɛlbwaa baa ɛ yaa kɛŋɔ peera baa dɛ la ka kpoa la ken."
Anɔ bwa sekwaraa ta la, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ yaa yoo le. Yeesu Kristo waa nyin yaa la nɛɛ yaa ba chega dɛ le.

N jemɔ kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa toole dɛ tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ waa wola ya waa nyina ba. Seo kɛɛ mkpa aa won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ. Nyundua toroma kɛɛ Bɔnsam toroma aa bea yaa wola an na aa won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ. Waa aa dɛ ɛ fini nɔ kɛɛ anɔ la aa dɛ ba ɛɛ kerekere ge aa won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ. Kwaa aa dɔ kpegri bɛlbwa sese ge aa won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ.
Komɛlbwa toole dɛ do nyundua kɛɛ harɛ bobɛlbwa dɛ won tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ. Korowii kontaala bini komɛlbwa toole dɛ won pere yaa le Korowii nyina aa chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ wɛɛ nyin yaa la ta.
Kasinteŋii mɛɛ ba bola la. Maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛn la nomanta, maa nyosone teŋe. Korowii Domadɛɛge la gelɔ n jemɛ n bambile bini kɛŋɔ maa nyosone teŋe.
N tea bini chɔgɔ, n bambile ge aa n wee gel bwa.
N gbagba bwɛɛ tena baa ɛ n nɛraa gela n bambile bwa wee mɛ gɛ nɔ. Dɛ Korowii taah mɛ asɛ n ne Yeesu Kristo baah pere kwaraa ásɛ o lɛɛ ba aa, n dɛ nyin gɛ.
Israel tena maa dɛ bol ba waa nɔ, Korowii ɛ ya o bii dɛ bagle yaa o jirima. O ne ya fɔwɛ fɔo, asɛ o tɛ yaa o mmara, dɛ bagle yaa gɛ aa chɛ kɛ yaa tomɔ, dɛ bagɛ yaa nyoa bele aŋwɛnɛ bwa.

Ya nabaala la nɛra bwa aa jemɛ ba waa la naanaree yan. Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la, o nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ be pera la, ya dwee on. Korowiirii dɛɛ nyiŋi nɛwɛnyini bwa nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwa. Onee chɛ jam. Aamen.
N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ Korowii vɛh o nyobaga la ta teŋa, kɛ Israel tena bwa laa Korowii le kɛ o nɛra.
Abraham naanar bwa ge laa Korowii bii. Korowii aa ŋɔ Abraham be ŋɔ, "Aesek luge taa hɛɛ ba he naanar maa bagɛ nyoa dɔe" la,
a baglɔ kɛŋɔ Abraham dwee la te bwa waa lol ba gɛ nɛra bwa aa dɛ lolɛ la, Korowii nɛra laa ban. Abraham bie la Korowii aa bagɔ nyoa la, o dweee Korowii jemɛ kɛŋɔ Abraham naanaree ban,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham nyoa la, waa waa bola laanee kɛŋɔ, "Benanyoa saŋ nɔ mɛɛ berɔɔ ba. N ne bala dɛ Saara lolɛ bibaa."
Anɔ gbo laa. Rebɛɛka aa kpoŋe o kpara la tea la, ba bwa mɛɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Ya nabaa Aesekee ba mɛɛ.

Baa wola ban lolɛ mɔɔ, a ɛ kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga kɛɛ wedɛɛga la, dɛ Korowii dɔɔ ŋɔ ba nya be ŋɔ, "Bii nɔ, bechala la ɛɛ lɛ nomonome o dɔɔ bee asɛ o dɔɔ la berɛ dɛɛ tomɔ." A gɛ waa nɔ baglɔ kɛŋɔ lee Korowii aa le Jekɔb la, o tetooraa o leo. Jekɔb we-ɛɛla laa o nyiŋi dɛ leo.
Anee Korowii Tɔn la bagle ŋɔ, "N nyin Jekɔb dɛ hah Esɔ" la.
Amɔ yaa wonoo ŋɔ Korowii waa ta togrɛ kɛɛ? O waa togrɔ.
O ŋɔ Mosis be ŋɔ, "Naate n tea aa toora kɛŋɔ ń sune o nɛɛ la, mɛɛ sune o nɛɛ. Naate n tea aa toora kɛŋɔ ń tea domɛ o nɛɛ la, n tea ɛɛ domɛ o nɛɛ."
Waa nɛwɛnyini aa dɛ nyin ne anɔ la yaa dɛ ɛ la, Korowii te aa an nyiŋi. O te suna waa sune nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ la, anee wɛɛ nyiŋi.
Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini gɛ Korowii faa ŋɔ Ijipt kooro be la. Anee kɛŋɔ, "N gelɔ he ɛ kooro ásɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa che he nɛɛ dɛ na gɛ maa dɔ kpegri, asɛ dɛ yerɛ n sɔn harɛ ta bobɛlbwa."
Naate Korowii tea aa toora kɛŋɔ ó sune o nɛɛ la, o nɛɛ wɛɛ sune. Naate ge o tea aa toora kɛŋɔ ó gel o deŋne do kpegri la, onee o gel o deŋne ɛɛ do kpegri.
Nomɛl ɛɛ ŋɔɔ, "Dɛ kenii a do aa, Korowii ɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ nomɛl deŋne kpegri nomanta o ɛ wechɔga aa? Dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii dawɛ waa ŋɔ á ɛ gɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ a ɛ gɛ."
Dɛ henee ume kɛŋɔ Korowii bol waa he chaŋe bɛl ɔ? Vii gee wonoo bɔɔ mamaa wee la aa bala o mao gɛ waa mao waa?

Naate waa dɛ ma la, o ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ o kpɔ choh waa dɛ ma a ne la ma kwaa aa too o tea aa? A too o tea aa, wɛɛ kpɔ a gɛ choh laanee ma viine anɛ, dɛ kpɔ bɛl dɛɛ ɛ kwaa tɔpejena gbo, dɛ kpɔ bɛl ge dɛɛ ɛ kwaa tɔpere bɛlbwa.

Gɛɛ a do Korowii be. Nɛwɛnyini ɛ o viine waa maa. Bane chɛ chɔga. O ma bane ge ásɛ ba ba na som o be. Dɛ o fe dɛ nyin o bagle o bandia nɛra baa chɛ chɔga la nɛɛ dɛ́ gel nɛra na o kpegri, kɛ o lawɛ bambile,
ásɛ nɛra waa sune ba nɛɛ dɛ cheg ba kɛŋɔ bá ba na som la won jemɛ gɛ o som la aa doa dɛ dɔ jirima kohona.
Yanee o sune ya nɛɛ la. Yanee o le ŋɔ ya ɛ o nɛra la. Israel tena gbo bini laa o le nɛra ŋɔ ba ɛ o nɛra nɔ. O le bane nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ ge bini.
Kenii o ŋɔ o keame Hosia tɔn bini: "Nɛra ba faa wola n nɛra ɛɛ n faa wola ban nyin la, mɛɛ yer baa n nɛra ne n nɛnnyina."
Ba chwerɛ tɔn la bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "Nɛra Korowii faa ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, 'N nɛra laa heyaa' la, banee ba berɛ dɛɛ ba Korowiijen bii yera."
Aesaya bol Israel tena waa ŋɔ: "Dɛ Israel tena warɔ kɛŋɔ mpo nyoa hɛŋle kwaraa naa, ba bini tamaa kenii Korowii ɛɛ ba lɛɛ.
Wɛɛ bol nɛwɛnyini bwa waa wɔrɔbe nɛɛ dɛ pa bole."
Anee Aesaya fa bol la, "Dɛ Nemenɛ Korowii fe ta o nɛra dwee tama bane gelaa, ya fe ɛɛ tonɔɔ kwaraa kɛŋɔ Sodom ne Gomoora tena."
Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, ba siwi aa wola swɛɛrɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii lɛɛ ba kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi la, ba yarada nomanta, Korowii siwi su ba.
Kɛ Israel tena te aa swɛɛ siwi dɛ kpɔ ba sie do Mmara ta teŋa ta, dɛ ŋɔ an dɛ gel Korowii lɛɛ ba kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi la, o siwi ta ba te kwaraa sui.

Aah dɛ bɔkwaa gela a ba gɛ nɔ? Baa wola sie kpɔe dawɛ Korowii yaradae ta, dɛ kpɔ sie dawɛ ba we-ɛɛla ta kɛŋɔ an dɛ gel Korowii siwi su ba la, a waa. Anomanta ba lɔ naa Bwe nɛra aa lɔ naa o ta dɛɛ chole la ta.
O waa ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la. Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ kpɔ Bwee cheg Saayɔn, asɛ nɛra ɛɛ lɔ naa o ta dɛɛ chogli. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa yaradao la, sihiih aa o kpoe ba."
Yabala, Korowii fe lɛ Israel tena aa, a fe som n be noo! N soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛɛ ba ga.
Kasinteŋ, n wono bol ba waa kɛŋɔ ba Korowii toma swɛɛ ba siwi te, kɛ baa on tomɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta.
Baa gɛ Korowii aa ɛa dɛɛ lɛ nɛra kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba wa ɛɛ su o siwi jemɛ, anomanta ba gbagba ŋwɛnɛɛ baa kpɔ, dɛ vɛh Korowii ŋwɛnɛ waa chegɛ o ta dɛ gel nɛra wa ɛɛ su o siwi la ta teŋa.

Yeesu Kristo bala la teŋe Mosis Mmara ta teŋa ta kɛŋɔ a taa nɛn che Korowii lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi la. Taraken nomɛlbwa waa yarada Yeesu Kristo waa la, Korowii ɛɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛgee asɛ o waa su o siwi.
Kenii Mosis bol nɛra baa dɛ nyin ba che Mmara ta teŋa ta ásɛ ba waa su Korowii siwi la wa. O ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ teŋe waa aa lɔ Mmara la bwa ta la, wɛɛ dɔ mkpaa le Mmara la ta teŋa ta."

Kenii Korowii Tɔn bagle nɛra baa che yarada ta asɛ ba waa su o siwi ge wa: "Bɛ he nyu bini lii ŋɔ, 'Umee dɛ la nyundua, kɛɛ dɛ tu bɔluŋ bini dɛ́ ka nyinu ba nɔ?' " Yeesu Kristo ta do kɛ hé kpɔɔ tu harɛ, kɛɛ hé nyinu lala bini ba.
Waa Korowii Tɔn aa dɛ bol laanee kɛŋɔ, "Korowii waa la pu heyaa tonɛ. A lɔ he nyoo ne he bambili ta kwara." Yeesu Kristo yaradae waa yaa dɛ bol he be laanee Korowii waa nɔ.
Dɛ he nɛn kpɔ nyoa ŋɔ komɛlbwa Dɔɔree Yeesu, dɛ yarada he bambile bini kɛŋɔ Korowii iru seo ta naa, Korowii ɛɛ lɛɛ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo waa la yaradae bambile bwa ne taa a che Korowii ɛɛ lɛ nɛwɛnyini kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba wa ɛɛ su o siwi, asɛ a bola nyoa ne dɔŋa be taa a che Korowii lɛ yaa.
Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa yaradao la, sihiih aa o kpoe ba."
Israel tena ne nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, ba bwa kɛrɛdɛ Korowii be. Komɛlbwa Dɔɔree Korowii. Nomɛlbwa waa wia dɛɛ yerɔ la, o dɛ chao kohona.
Anee Korowii Tɔn bol la, "Nomɛlbwa waa wi yerɛ ya Dɔɔ la, wɛɛ lɛo."

Aah dɛ nɛn ta on yaradae dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo waa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won yerɛ o sɔn ó lɛo wɔ? Dɛ nɛn ta o waa noɛ yaa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won yaradao dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo wɔ? Dɛ nɛn ta o waa la bolɛ nɛn be naa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ noɔ?
Dɛ Korowii ta nɛn tomaa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ bol o waa laɔ? Anee kɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn aa ŋɔa la. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa kpoŋe amanesoma dɛɛ valɛ la, he no ba bala waa aa, he bambile dɛ sɔɔhne taeh!"
Amanesoma la balɔ, kɛ Israel tena bwa laa sɛh a ta teŋa. Korowii keame Aesaya gbagba fa bolɔ ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii, umee yarada waa yaa bol ba be laɔ?"
He nyiŋo na naa, Yeesu Kristo waa la noe taa a che nɛra ɛɛ yaradaa, asɛ a bola ge taa a che nɛra ɛɛ noa.
Mɛɛ bɔɔ heyaa webeŋkpoŋii: Kpelaa kɛŋɔ ba ta noɛ yaa? Ba noɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Ba waa baa dɛ bol la la harɛ ta bobɛlbwa nɛra aa lole, a tel harɛ jaga bwa."

N berɔ dɛɛ bɔɔ ja: Israel tena fa ta noɛ yaa? Mosis tɔ sie chwerɛ waa Korowii aa bola, dɛ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ geloo he dɔ bɔweela nɛra baa wola ban kure dɛɛ ja n nɛra nɛɛ la nɛ, dɛ gel harɛ o nɛra aa gɛna ɛ heyaa he bwaawee ir."
Korowii keame Aesaya te kwaraa chwerɛ Korowii wobol ane a gwaa gɛ. O chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛra ba faa wola n bɔr gaage la, ban na mɛ. Nɛra ba faa wola n waa bɔɔ la, banee n kpɔ n te chagle."
Kenii o bagle gɛ Korowii aa bol Israel tena ge wa: "Saŋ bɛlbwaa n pagri n nɔɔra kɛŋɔ ń lɛ n nɛra. Kɛ baa men yarada. Ba deŋne kpegri, baa waa ge no."
N dɛ bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ: Korowii vɛh o nɛra Israel tena kɛɛ? Akai! N gbabir nɔ, Israel tee men. N ɛ Abraham naa dɛ le Benjamen dea.
Korowii ta nɛra o faa lee ba cheg wubwa ba ɛ o nɛra la vɛɛh. Kɛ he jemɛ gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bol Korowii keame Elaeja waa ŋɔ o chɔg Israel tena tɛ Korowii laɔ?
O bolɔ ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii, ba kpoo he keamere dɛ hugri bela baa kpoo kwaa dɛɛ tɛɛ bwa. N gboo kaa, dɛ ba dɛ nyin n gba kpoe."
Ɛrɛɛ Korowii chaŋe Elaeja ɔ? O chaŋo ŋɔ, "N ta dɔ nɛra kagboŋa banuanɛ bane ba do le dɛ ɛ n nɛra baa wola vog Baal guŋe bwa."
Gɛɛ a do taraken. Nɛra tama bane ta lole Korowii aa na ba sum dɛ lee ba ba ɛ o nɛra.
Ba we-ɛɛla ta laa a che o lee ba. Ba sumii o na dɛ lee ba ba ɛ o nɛra. Dɛ ba we-ɛɛla taa a fe che o lee ba ba ɛ o nɛra aa, dɛ suna baa ŋɔa Korowii dɛ sune nɛwɛnyini nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba la ta mun dɔe.
Ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ŋɔe yɔ? Gɛ Israel tena aa dɛ nyin kɛ ba waa su Korowii siwi la, ba ta gɛ dɔe. Nɛra tama Korowii aa lee ba ba ɛ o nɛra la, ba waa su o siwi. Ba kar taŋ deŋne Korowii be.
Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii saa ba liire, dɛ tɛɛ ba sie aa wola kasinteŋ laanee na, ne deŋna aa wola kasinteŋ laanee no, dɛ kpoŋe ba le fini tɔpere nɔ" la.

Ya nabaa Devid bolɔ ŋɔ, "Korowii, gɛ saŋ baa dɛɛ di kwaa dɛɛ lɛ ba sie la, gel siswɛm pig ba. Gel waa ba sie aa dɛ lɛ a ta la ɛ kon baa lɔ naa o ta dɛɛ chogli, dɛ ɛ bel dɛɛ lag ba, asɛ ba wa ɛɛ gure ba nɛ.
Gel ba sie tɔɔge ba bɛ kasinteŋ la dɛɛ na, asɛ dɛɛ na wahala saŋ bɛlbwa."

Mɛɛ bɔɔ webeŋkpoŋii ja: Israel tena aa lɔ naa dɛ chole la, ba denɔ chole baa wola won ir kpa aa? Akai! Baa iruu, kɛ ba wechɔga la taa a che Korowii lɛɛ waa lɛ nɛwɛnyini la maa nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ ásɛ Israel tena na ba bwara wee ba.

Israel tena wechɔga baa ɛa la ba wedɛɛga ne ba tɛ nɛwɛnyini, asɛ ba chola baa chola dɛ paŋɛ kwaa Korowii be la ge ba wedɛɛga tenten ne dɛ ba tɛ nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ. Israel tena chola la kwaraa aa ba wedɛɛga ne ba tɛ nɛwɛnyini nɔ, dɛ ba bwa lɛ Korowii wa aa, ɛrɛɛ aa ba doe yɔ?
He nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, he bee mɛɛ bol waa nɔ: Korowii aa lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ɛ Yeesu torome he be nɔ, mɛɛ maŋkura n toma nɔɔ.
Bɛl lole n bwɛɛ tena na gɛ naa, aa we ba nɛɛ, asɛ a che a ta ba bane lɛ Yeesu waa nɔ.

Aa chegɛ Israel tena ne Korowii baah chɔga ta asɛ nɛwɛnyini kabora ne Korowii baah kwaa nɔ, dɛ Korowii berɔ lɛ Israel tena dɛ kpɔ ba ɛ o bii aa, bɔkwa nee aa ba balaɔ? Aa ba silɛɛ nee kohona, kɛŋɔ lala bwa aa ir seo ta.
Dɛ kon pera wer dɛ chɛ Korowii aa, dɛ o kar la bwa ge wer. Dɛ daa lune wer dɛ chɛ Korowii aa, dɛ o ne o kpala bwaa.

Moo laa pala dɛɛ kaa nyundua la aa? Israel tena do kɛ kobaah ɔleve da. Ba teŋe o kpala ane ta, dɛ kpɔ hen haa wola Israel te ɛɛ dɛ do kɛ kpɔg baah ɔleve daa kpale, dɛ ba vɔrɔwe marɛ kobaah kon la bɛl bug ta, asɛ hɛɛ nyɔ o nedɛɛga dɛ di, dɛ dɛg.
Anomanta bɛ kena dɛɛ kpagri daa kpala la baa kɛa ta la nɛ. He mbarafo mun ɔ? Daa kpale laa hen kɛɛ? Hen gela daa la lune do le kɛɛ an gela he do le nɔ?
He te ɛɛ ŋɔɔ he waa ba kɛ daa la kpala la ta asɛ dɛ vɔrɔwe marɛ.
He ŋɔ gɛ naa, kpelaa he ŋɔ. Baa wola Yeesu waa la yaradae waa ba teŋ ba ta. He ge aa yarada Yeesu waa la, a waa he ta che la. Anomanta bɛ mbarafo dɛɛ ɛ. Pwɛr he te dɛɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ.
Israel tena kwaraa baa ɛ daa la tenten pera la, Korowii kɛ ba ta. He tenee dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg, waa wola heyaa kɛ ta aa?

He nyiŋo na naa, dɛ he jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii tea som, kɛ o waa ge kpegri taeh. Nɛra ba deŋne aa kpega baa wola o ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋɛ la, o dɛ nyiŋ ba sinyɛga ne. Kɛ dɛ hɛɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ o ŋwɛnɛ taa te naa, wɛɛ ta tea tɛ he te. Kɛ dɛ he ta o ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋaa, wɛɛ kɛ he gee ta.
Dɛ Israel tena berɔ yarada Yeesu waa la te naa, Korowii ɛɛ berɔɔ lɛɛ ba do ba bug ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ aa kpege o be.

Korowii laa gela ba teŋe he nɛra haa do kɛ kpɔg baah ɔleve daa kpala dɛ ba vɔrɔwe marɛ kobaah ɔleve daa kpul ta nɔ naa, ba fe aa an gɛ ɛ wubwa. Aah dɛ Korowii won he nɛra haa do kɛ kpɔg baah ɔleve daa kpala kwara kɛɛ dɛ vɔrɔwe marɛ kobaah kwaa kwaraa ta a magre aa, Israel tena baa do kɛ kobaah ɔleve daa kpala waa kɛa ta la, ɛrɛ waa o berɔ kpɔ ba vɔrɔwe marɛ ba bug ta aa wola magre ɔ?

Yabalawa, wesɔɔhla anee mɛɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ, ásɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa laa he den jemɛ. Anee kɛŋɔ Israel tena nɔ bane deŋnekpeg baa dɛ ɛ nɔ, ken laa aa ba kae. Nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ Korowii ɛɛ nyin kɛ o lɛɛ ba la, ba tel gɛ del waa dɛ nyin la aa, Israel tena ɛɛ gel ba deŋnekpeg nɔɔ.

Anomanta, Korowii ɛɛ lɛ Israel tena bwaa dɛ ɛ o bii, kɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla la. O baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛwɛnyini Lɛɛ la ɛɛ le Saayɔnee ba, dɛ ba le Israel tena waa aa gela baa wola Korowii waa ta teŋɛ bwa la ta.
Fɔo n ne baa fɔwɛ laanee kɛŋɔ mɛɛ lee baa ba wechɔga ta."

Israel tena aa vɛh Yeesu Amanesoma la nomanta, ba berɛ Korowii dɔma, asɛ a le wedɛɛga tɛ heya. Kɛ baa ɛ nɛra Korowii aa chal ba la nomanta, o ta dɛ nyin ba taeh. Nyoa waa bagɛ ba naanar la, a waa o taa nyin ba la.
Korowii te dɔɔ ŋɔ o nɛnee nɛn, dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo wedɛɛgaa yaa, waa nsana le.
Gɛ he nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ faa wola Korowii waa ta teŋɛ asɛ o koh kɛ Israel tena vɛh o waa ta teŋa asɛ dɛ sune he nɛɛ la,
gɛ tentenee Israel tena aa vɛh Korowii waa ta teŋa la, wɛɛ koh suna waa sune he nɛɛ la waa dɛ sune ba ge nɛ.
Nɛwɛnyini bwa taŋ deŋne Korowii be, asɛ o koh a waa dɛ pa nɛra bwa bolchɔge. Ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa toole yá che o ta dɛ le a gɛ bolchɔge nɔ ta. A ɛ gɛ ásɛ Korowii na ya bwa sum.
Ei! Korowii liire ne o wejema kan te! Umee dɛ won jemɛ Korowii waa mun ɔ? Umee dɛ won jemɛ o waa bini bwa nɔ?
Anee Korowii Tɔn bagle la. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Umee jemɛ Korowii nyu bini nɔ? Umee dɛ won baglo waɔ?
Ume komɛlee Korowii kemɛ ka a ɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii di o kem dɛ ba bɔɔ wɔ?"
O ta nomɛlbwa kem dii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ on ta kon te bɛlbwa. O nɛɛ komɛlbwa che dɛ do le, o waa gee a do le. O chɛ jirima saŋ bɛlbwa wee. Aamen.

Anomanta yabalawa, n dɛ soŋe heya. Hé nyiŋi Korowii suna waa sune ya nɛɛ la dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo. Gɛ baa kpɔ kondɛɛga aa chɛ Korowii dɛɛ su o siwi dɛ kpo dɛ ɛ saraha tɛo dɛɛ tomɔ la, hé ge kpɔ he te kɛŋɔ gɛ saraha la, dɛ laa doŋa bɛlbwa kpɔ he nɛɛ dɛɛ tomɔ he bokpega ne. Gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ tomɛ Korowii.
He bɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire la da kpɔ. Hé gel Korowii tɛ heyaa liifala dɛ berɛ heyaa asɛ he won jemɛ waa waa dɛ nyin, dɛ jemɛ waa aa wera o be dɛɛ too o tea, ne waa aa togra.
N chegɛ suna Korowii aa sune n nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ o toma do n nɔn ta nɔ ta dɛɛ ja heyaa kɛ gɛ bɛlbwa haa doa la, gel ba nae gɛ. Bɛ́lbwa pwɛr o te dɛ won jemɛ waa Korowii aa tɛo yarada ŋɔ ó kpɔ ɛ.
Ya bwadabii ɛ kombeŋkpoŋ, dɛ dɔ nyu, ne nɔɔra, ne nakpale, ne amesoore bwa. A bwa ge ne a tomaree.
Gɛɛ ya gba do. Ya warɔ te, kɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa nɔ, ya bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, ya bɛlbwa ge lole tɛ ya dɔŋa.
Kpegri Korowii aa cha ya bwa ya dɔ kokogrɔ. A chɛ kɛ ya bɛlbwa kpɔ kpegri Korowii aa sune o nɛɛ dɛ tɛo la ɛ toma. Dɛ Korowii Waa bola kpegri o kpɔ tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ bola gɛ del he yarada aa doa.
Dɛ he dɔŋa toma kpegri Korowii tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛ gɛ. Dɛ waa bagla kpegri gee o tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ bagle.

Dɛ nɛra gbemba doe kpegri Korowii tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛ gɛ. Dɛ dɔŋa kwaa kɛɛ kpegri o tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛa bambile bwa ne. Dɛ waa sie tɔe kpegri o tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛa tea bwa ne. Dɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ kpegri o tɛɛ naa, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛa tepoŋ ne.
Hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa bambile bwa ne. Hé hah wechɔga te bɛlbwa, dɛ lawɛ wedɛɛga te bɛlbwa bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ.
Hé lawɛ dɔŋa kɛ nyabii, dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa duure gwaa gɛ haa dɛ lii he te gbagba.
Hé laa bɔhwaah kpɔ he waa bini, dɛ do gbemba dɛɛ tomɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo.
Haa dɔ hwɛga nomanta, hé gel he sie lɛ. Wobɛlbwa pu heya aa, hé lawɛ bambile. Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa.
Hɛ́ɛ tɛ he dɔŋa asɔre tena ba soga bini aa kpega tɛɛ ba he kwaa haa dɔa la ane. He bɛ hɔɔhra dɛɛ doŋi he deremi.
Hé soŋe wedɛɛga Korowii be dɛɛ tɛ nɛra baa chegɛ he nɛ. Hé soŋe andɛɛga dɛɛ tɛɛ ba, he bɛ wechɔga soŋe dɛɛ tɛɛ ba.
Nɛra lɔ silɛɛ bini naa, hé puu ba he ne ba lɛ sie. Ba dɛ wi ge aa, hé ne baa wi.
Hé ne he dɔŋa so sodɛɛga. He bɛ jenu dɛɛ ɛ, he bɛ he te pere dɛɛ le nyaara ne nɛŋgwɛgra bini. He bɛ he te wejerema kohona dɛɛ lii.
He bɛ wechɔga kpɔ dɛɛ bɔ wechɔga kem. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ waa aa wera nomɛlbwa be.
Dɛ aa magroo waa, hɛɛ wonoo waa, hé takapɔ asɛ wechɔga bɛlbwa bɛ he ne nomɛlbwa baah do.

Yabala, nɛra ɛ heyaa wechɔga aa, he bɛ ane ɛ dɛɛ bɔ kem. Hé kpɔ tɛ Korowii. O baah dɛ di ba nɛɛ taeh. On dɛ bɔ ba kem, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, 'Mɛɛ tɔ a pegee, mɛɛ bɔ ba a kemee.' "
He bɛ waa kem dɛɛ bɔ. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa ŋɔa hɛ́ɛ ɛ la. "He dɔm chɔ lɔr aa, tɛo kondikwaa ó di. O ta nee dɔe dɛ́ nyɔ aa, tɛo ane. He ɛ ken aa, sihiih dɛ ba o kpoe o baŋa gole."
He bɛ gel liichɔga lɛ he lem. Hé kpɔ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɔ wechɔga ŋwɛnɛ.
A chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa siwi su o harɛ nomonome dɛɛ teŋɛ ba mmara ge ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii ta ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ yaa, nomonome aa lee do. Korowiirii cheg ba.
Nomɛlbwa waa vɛh o harɛ nomonome mmara ta teŋa la, dɛ waa Korowii aa chegaa o vɛh. Wɛɛ di bolchɔgee.
Nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la, baa nomonome ɔmɛ. Wechɔg-ɛɛraa dɛɛ ɔm ba. Haa nyin kɛ hɛɛ ɔmɛ nomonome sie chega aa, amɔ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga. He dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga aa, baa kpɛɛree,

dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii bonɔɔnaa ban. He kɛrɛdɛ waa baa ɛ ba toma la. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ wechɔga te naa, dɛɛ ɔmɛ nomonome, dɛkalkɛŋɔ pɛɛpɛɛ laa ba dɔ kpegri baa kpoŋa la. Korowiirii tɛɛ ba kpegri ásɛ ba tɛr wechɔg-ɛɛra deŋne dɛɛ tɛo.

Anomanta hé gel he siwi ɛɛ su he nomonome. Korowii bala waa dɛ ba bala dɛ ba tɛr he deŋne la gbo waa laa a chɛ kɛ he siwi ɛɛ su ba. Dɛ he siwi aa ban su aa, dɛ he gbabir liire aa gel he bambile sɔɔhne.
A waa a do wer kɛŋɔ hɛɛ bɔ lampoo ge la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomonome baa do lampoo lɛɛ mmara nɔ la, Korowii tomaa baa ɛ gɛ la.
Anomanta komɛlbwa aa chɛ kɛ he tɛ nɛn la, tɛo. Dɛ he nyu lampoo yaa, bɔ. Dɛ he kondɔɔh bɛlbwa ge lampoo yaa, bɔ. Dɛ duuree a chɛ kɛ he tɛ nɛn aa, tɛo, dɛ jirimaa a chɛ kɛ he tɛ nɛn aa, tɛo.
He bɛ kem di wobɛlbwa ta a chɔ le kpa heyaa ka ja dɔŋa nyina ta. A gboo ɛ kem aa chɛ kɛ he di. Nomɛlbwa waa wona dɛɛ nyin o dɔŋ la, o tonɛ Korowii mmara la bwa.

Korowii mmara aa chagla kɛŋɔ, "Bɛ jwamane bɔ, bɛ nɛn kpo, bɛ ŋwɛ, bɛ gel he sie begre he dɔŋ kon la," a ne anɔ la aa kaa la bwa lɔ a gɛ mmara beŋkpoŋ nɔ waa dɛ bagle kɛ, "Nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he gbagba" nɔ ta.
Nɛn haa dɛ nyinu la, haa on wechɔgaa ɛ bwa. Naate waa dɛ nyin o dɔŋ la, dɛ o dɛ teŋɛ Korowii mmara la bwa ta.

Hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he jemɔ kɛŋɔ tɔpere la telo. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ a telo kɛŋɔ dɛ chɔe he chɔ a, he ir! Ya lɛɛ tɔpere la joɔ tonɛ taraken dɛ gwaa gɛ saŋ yaa kpɔ ya te tɛ Yeesu dɛ pa mun dɛɛ teŋɛ o nɛɛ la.
Tɔpere waa kaa bɔr chaah la aa kanɛ kpa. Tɔɔ perɔ tonɛ. Hé gel ya gel waa aa ɛ biro bini waa ɛɛ, dɛ kpɔ bochaah laala do dɛ won yo biro bini wa.
Hé gel ya lawɛ ya te kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ do kɛ nɛra bɔr aa chaah ba nɛ, dɛ warɛ dɛ valɛ dɛɛ do gbɔga ne sennyɔdɛɛ waa toole kpa, hahnyin ne banyin ne wedoŋa toole kpa, nagrenyin ne bɔweela toole kpa.
Hé kpɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ dɔmkwa dɛ laa sie kpɔ he nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ tetoowaa ta.
Dɛ Kristo te bɛl lole, o yarada aa wola kanɛ wɛɛ nyin o jo he bini naa, hé lɛo do he bini. He bɛ o we-ɛɛla aa korɛ he kwaa ta la dɛɛ tɔŋle.
Bɛl yarada gelɔ o won komɛlbwa dii, asɛ naate o yarada aa wola kanɛ la, o gee di papooni ne taŋna gbo, waa ol di.
Naate waa dɛ di komɛlbwa la, a ta chɛɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ lii naate waa wola ol di la nɛndoŋ. Naate waa wola ol di la, o bɛ naate waa dɛ di komɛlbwa wechɔg-ɛɛ dɛɛ lii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii lɛo dɛ ɛo o bie.

Henee umeo he won pwah nomɛl bonɔɔ nɔ? O dɔɔ gbagbaa dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛŋɔ o won bagle kɛ o bonɔɔ dɛ ɛ waa kɛɛ waa waa ɛ. Waa ɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ la nomanta, wɛɛ ɛ waa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wɛɛ wonoo chao o ɛ wa.
Nomɛl ɛɛ dɛɛ liiruu kɛŋɔ tɔpere bɛl ɛ onjen gwaa bɛl, asɛ bɛl gee lii kɛŋɔ tɔpere bwa kɛrɛdɛ. A chɛ kɛ bɛlbwa jemɛ anɔ la aa wera kɛŋɔ o ɛ ne anɔ la aa wola were o nyu bini.

Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ tɔpere bɛl ɛ onjen dɛ gwaa bɛl la, o dɛ tɛ Korowii duure, a waa wɛɛ ɛ gɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ di komɛlbwa la, o dɛ tɛ Korowii duure, a waa wɛɛ ɛ gɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o dɛ jam Korowii kondikwaa la wa. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ki kondikwaa ane soo dii la, o ge dɛ tɛ Korowii duure, a waa wɛɛ ɛ gɛ. O gba dɛ jam Korowii.
Ya bini bɛlbwa toole dɛ so le dɛ tɛ o gbo, bɛlbwa ge toole o seo ɛ o gbo wa.
Yaa lɔ mkpa ta nɔ, dɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa ya do le. Dɛ ya baa sewɛ ge aa, dɛ onee ya sewɛ tɛ. Anomanta, ya lɔ mkpa ta noo, sewaa ya sewoo, ya Dɔɔ Yeesuu dɔ yaa.
Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa dɛ ir la, o ɛ gɛ dɛ́ ɛ weera ne lala bwa dɔɔ.

Aah dɛ bɔkwaa gela he nɛra haa wola ol di ɛɛ pwah he bala baa dɛ di komɛlbwa nɔɔ? He banɔ la haa dɛ di komɛlbwa ge la, bɔkwaa gela hɛɛ lii he bala baa wola ol di nɛndoŋa nɔɔ? Ya bwa ɛɛ che Korowii siee, asɛ o bol ya waa dɛ pa bole.
Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, 'N ŋwɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra bwa ɛɛ guŋ mɛ harɛɛ, asɛ nomɛlbwa di kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii men.' "
Anomanta la nɔ, ya bɛlbwa ɛɛ bagle o toma waa ɛa Korowii siee.
Aa do gɛ nɔ, yá gel dɔŋa pwaeh la. Waa aa chɛ kɛ yaa ɛ laanee kɛŋɔ ya ɛ ya liire kɛŋɔ waa aa gel ya dɔŋa lɔ naa dɛ chole kɛɛ ba ɛ wechɔga la, yaa gel a ɛɛ.
Pɛɛ n ne n Dɔɔ Yeesu aa pɛa nɔ gelɔ n jemɛ kaih kɛŋɔ kondikwaa bɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ kondikondoŋa. Kɛ dɛ nomɛl lii o nyu bini kɛŋɔ kondikwaa ane ɛ kondikondoŋa aa, dɛ a ɛ doŋa dɛ tɛo.
Dɛ he koh he kondikwaa waa dɛ gel he dɔŋ ɛ wechɔga o tea bini chɔg aa, dɛ he dɛ nyinu waa? O waa Yeesu Kristo koh dɛ sewɛ, anomanta bɛ gel he kondikwaa haa dɛ di la chɔgo.
Bɛ gel nɛra dɔ ŋwɛnɛ dɛ yerɛ waa haa dɛ liira wedɛɛga la wedoŋa.

Kondikwaa yaa dɛ di ne anɔ la yaa dɛ ki la ta wejena bɛlbwa ɛɛ Korowii Kora waa bini. Waa aa ɛ wehiah laanee kɛŋɔ gɛ yaa ɛ ya waa su Korowii siwi, ne waa aa dɛ ba deŋnesɔɔhna ne ya ne ya dɔŋa baah ta, ne silɛɛ aa le Korowii Domadɛɛge be.
Nɛn a gɛ waa nɔ aa hiaoh Yeesu Kristo toma bini la, Korowii sie dɛ lɛ o nɛ, asɛ o wa ɛɛ su nɛwɛnyini ge siwi.
Anomanta la, a chɛ kɛ ya gel ya siwi swɛɛ waa aa dɛ ba deŋnesɔɔhna ne, ne waa aa dɛ ba gela ya dɔŋa che kiŋkiŋ ta.
Bɛ kondikwaa waa koh dɛ chɔg waa Korowii aa ɛa. Ya won kondikwaa bɛlbwa dii, kɛ aa were kɛŋɔ ya di kondikwaa aa dɛ ba nɛn ne wechɔga ta laŋa.
Waa aa togra kɛ hɛɛ ɛ laanee kɛŋɔ ol dii ne sen nyɔe, ne wobɛlbwa aa dɛ ba wona gel he dɔŋ lɔ naa chole la, a chɛ kɛ he laa he te kpɔ a ta.

Gɛ he liire aa dɛ ɛɛ kondikwaa dii be pera la, kpoŋe a bini gɛ ásɛ a do he ne Korowii gbo baah ta. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ a ŋwɛnɛ taa wɛɛ ɛa, aa wola o liire bini aahna-aahna ɛ la, o na som!

Kɛ dɛ o dɛ di komɛl dɛɛ ɛ aahna-aahna kɛŋɔ o ɛ kondoŋ kɛɛ o ta kondoŋ ɛɛ yaa, Korowii ɛɛ pao bolchɔgee kɛŋɔ waa dɛ diu, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o waa waa dɛ ɛ la, waa an ɛ yarada ne. Wobɛlbwa ge nɛn aa dɛ ɛ waa wola an ɛ yarada ne, o liire aa wola on kɛrɛdɛ do a ta la, a ɛ wechɔga.
Ya nɛra ya yarada aa kana la, a chɛ kɛ yaa lawɛ bambile banɔ la ba yarada aa wola kanɛ la nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba. A ta chɛɛ kɛ yaa ɛ ya gbo tetoowa.
A chɛ kɛ ya bɛlbwa ɛɛ ɛ waa aa wera dɛɛ tɛ ya dɔŋa ásɛ a cha ba asɛ ba won che kiŋkiŋ.
Yeesu Kristo aa lɔ harɛ ta la, dɛ o tetoowaa laa wɛɛ ɛ. Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Korowii, chɛga baa chɛgɛ la, anee ba kpɔ tɛ mɛ."
Wobɛlbwa ba faa chwera la, dɛ yanee ba chwera tɛ kɛŋɔ yá hweli waa le a ta. A gɛ waa nɔɔ dɛɛ ja yaa bambile dɔe ta, dɛɛ do yaa gbemba, ásɛ a che a ta ya dɔ hwɛga.
Korowii waa dɛ tɛ nɛn bambile dɛɛ do gbemba la, on dɛ tɛ heyaa nyopɛo teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la ta,
ásɛ he pɛ dɛ kpɔ nyopɛo kpɛɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii.
Anomanta la nɔ, hé lɛ nɛra dɛɛ ja he nɛɛ gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa lɛ heyaa la, ásɛ nɛra na dɛ tɛ Korowii jirima,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo wono ɛ toma Israel tena bini asɛ dɛ chagle kɛ Korowii waa dɔ kasinteŋ. Anee Korowii ɛ dɛ chugri o nyobaga waa bagɛ Israel tena naanar la,

ásɛ a che a ta nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la ge kpɛɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ waa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ kohona. Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bobɛl kɛŋɔ, "Anomanta mɛɛ yerɛ he sɔn nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ baahnee, dɛ go yela kpɛɛre."
dɛ berɛ chagle bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "He nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ, hé pu Israel tena hɛgre,"
dɛ berɛ chwerɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ, hé bwa jam N Naa Korowii, dɛ go yela kpɛɛro."
Asɛ Aesaya ge bol ja, dɛ ŋɔ, "Jese naa bɛl ɛɛ bao. On dɛ ir dɛ di kora nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ nɛ. O nɛɛ baa ba hwɛga dɔe."
Korowii waa gela ya dɔ hwɛga Yeesu nɛɛ la, ó tɛ heyaa silɛɛ ne bansɔɔhna he yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii la ta, asɛ Kórowii Domadɛɛge ge cha heyaa asɛ he won dɛɛ hwɛgɛ Yeesu nɛɛ kohona.
Yabalawa, n gbabir jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ he dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga taeh. He jemɛ waa kohona, dɛ won dɔŋa waa bagla ge.

He nyiŋo na naa, n tɔn nɔ maa chwerɔ nɔ, n di heyaa kasinteŋ waane ta dɛɛ lii heya. Korowii aa sune n nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ o toma nɔ do n nɔn ta ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bagle nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, a waa n won di heyaa kasinteŋ gɛ la. Maa dɛ bol Yeesu Amanesoma la dɛɛ bagle he nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la, n kpɔ n te ɛ kɛŋɔ Sɔfo waa lɛ nɛra kwaa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛɛ ba Korowii Dea bini la. N dɛ nyin he no a waa dɛ yaradaa ásɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge won laa he doŋa kpɔ he nɛɛ asɛ he ɛ Korowii nɛra. Belaa ń won kpɔ heyaa tɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ baa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛo la, asɛ he waa su o siwi o lɛ heya.
N ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa nomanta, n won n te maŋkurae toma maa ɛa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɔ ta.

Waa Yeesu Kristo aa chegɛ n nɛɛ dɛ ɛ he nɛra haa wola Israel tena ɛɛ bini la, maa lii kɛŋɔ mɛɛ won bol anfala ane ja a ta. A gbo waa n jemɛ. Anee kɛŋɔ taraken haa yarada Korowii waa nɔ. Waa Yeesu aa cha mɛ mɛɛ bol dɛɛ bagle heya, ne waa waa cha mɛ mɛɛ ɛ,
ne wekpega ne nyokpowaa Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri aa gela mɛɛ ɛ la bwa gelɔ he yarada Korowii waa nɔ. Taraken nɔ, le Jerusalam ka le Ilirikumwa le bwa, n bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma nɔ bela.
N ɛ n liire wubwa kɛŋɔ mɛɛ bol Yeesu Amanesoma nɔɔ. Kɛ harɛre baa bol o waa a ta la, a ta laa mɛɛ bola. A waa laa aa, dɛ nomɛl toma waa pa a mun cheg la taa n kpɔ dɛɛ choŋi la.
Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Nɛra nomɛlbwa aa wola o waa bolɛ ba be ka la, baa no o waa, dɛ jemɔ."
Anɔ waa maa wola bɔr dɔe dɛ ba he be kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa la.
Kɛ taraken nɔ maa tonɛ n toma bonɔ nɔ, asɛ n sie che chiŋ bene aŋwɛnɛ nɔ bwa kɛŋɔ ń ba na heyaa nɔ,
n dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n ba dɛ kaa Speen harɛ ta naa, ń na heya. N jemɔ kɛŋɔ n baa so he be tɔpera anɛ, dɛ le bela dɛɛ kaa Speen harɛ ta naa, hɛɛ cha mɛɛ.
Taraken nɔ, kwaane nee mɛɛ ba ń ba kaa Jerusalam dɛ ka tɛ Korowii nɛra baa lɔ bela la.
Ba bala baa lɔ Makidoonia harɛ ne Akaaya harɛ tata koŋkwaare ane ŋɔ ń kpɔ ka tɛ Jerusalam Korowii nɛra ba soga bini aa kpega tɛɛ ba la.

Ba sie lɛo kɛŋɔ baa ta kwaa la la. Kasinteŋ, baa won jam Jerusalam Korowii nɛra la ka tonɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ Korowii aa cha Israel tena asɛ nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ di ba tɔnɔ la, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ dɛ nɛra baa wola Israel tena ɛɛ la ge dɔ harɛ bonɔ kwaa aa, Israel tena ge di ba tɔnɔ.
Dɛ n kpɔ ba suuga bwa ka do ba nɔn ta tonaa, mɛɛ ba kaa Speen harɛ taa. Kɛ mɛɛ che he bee.
N jemɔ kɛŋɔ dɛ n ba he be naa, Yeesu Kristo ɛɛ cha mɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ n ge ba cha heyaa kohona.
Yabalawa, n kpɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo ne nyina Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa gela yaa nyin dɔŋa la dɛɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ he cha mɛ dɛ swɛɛ siwi soŋe Korowii tɛ mɛ.
Hé soŋe Korowii tɛ mɛ ásɛ o kpɔ nɔn tɔ n nɛɛ Judia harɛ tena baa wola Yeesu yarada la bini, ásɛ waa maa dɛ la ka ɛ Jerusalam Korowii nɛra bini la, bá sie lɛ a ta,
asɛ dɛ Korowii sɛoh waa, ń ba he be silɛɛ ne, dɛ ba onɛ tama.
Korowii waa dɛ tɛ yaa deŋnesɔɔhna la, ó cha he bwa. Aamen.
Yɔɔ. Ya nimambie nɔ sɔne Fiibi. Asɔre tena baa lɔ Keŋkrea la binii o do dɛɛ ɛ toma.
Hé lɛo ja he nɛɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ Korowii nɛra lɛ ba dɔŋ la ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nomanta. Komɛlbwa waa dɛɛ nyin dɛ le he be la, hé chao, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o gba cha Korowii nɛra taeh. N gbabir nɔ, o cha mɛ ka.
N dɛ na Presela ne Akwela n ne ba bwa aa dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo toma nɔ la.
Ba fa koh n waa dɛ kpɔ ba nyuune charɛ seo. N ne asɔre tena baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwaa dɛɛ jam ba.
N dɛ na asɔre tena baa cheme ba dem dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la bwa. N dɛ na n chamenate Epiniitus waa tɔ sie yarada Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ Eesia harɛ ta bwa la.
N dɛ na Mɛɛre waa dɛ ɛ toma he bini ga la.
Hé ŋɔ n bwɛɛ tena Andronikus ne Junias ba faa do n ne ba dea ka la be ŋɔ n dɛ na ba. Ba ɛ nɛra bane ba sɔn aa lea Yeesu toroma bini. Ba tɔ sie ɛ asɔre tena n nɛ.
N dɛ na Ampelatos waa ɛ n chamenate ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛɛ teŋa ta la.
N dɛ na Ɔrbanus ya ne o bwa aa dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo toma nɔ la, ne n chamena Stakes.
N dɛ na Apeles wekpega aa puu o ta che kiŋkiŋ Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ ta la. N dɛ na Aristobulus dem tena bwa.
N dɛ na n bwɛɛ te Herodion. N dɛ na Nasesos dem tena la baa ɛ asɔre tena la bwa.
N dɛ na n nimambii Trefiina ne Trefosa ba bwa aa dɛ ɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu toma nɔ la. Hé ŋɔ n nimambie Pɛɛses nomɛlbwa aa dɛ nyin o waa la be ŋɔ n dɛ nao. O ge koh ya Dɔɔ Yeesu toma nɔ ta ga.
N dɛ na Rufus o sɔn aa lea ya Dɔɔ Yeesu toma nɔ ta la, ne o nya waa nyiŋ mɛ kɛ n gbagba nya la.
N dɛ na Asiŋkritus, ne Flegɔn, ne Hɛɛmes ne Patroba, ne Hɛɛmas, ne yabala baa jaa la bwa.
N dɛ na Faelolɔgɔs, ne Julia, ne Nɛɛreɔs ne o nimambihaah, ne Ɔlempas, ne Korowii nɛra ba ne baa lɔ bela la bwa.
Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nyabii. Nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la bwa dɛ na heya.
Yabala, n dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ hɛɛ nyiŋi nɛra baa gela he baah nɛɛ pegri dɛɛ bagle waa a ne Yeesu Kristo waa baa bagle heyaa nɔ aa wola jo asɛ dɛɛ vuugi heyaa la. Hé jem ba dɛɛ ke he te ba nɛ.
A gɛ nɛra nɔ, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo laa baa tomɛ. Waa ba sie aa dɛ lɛ a ta la, anee baa ɛ. Nyotor ne nyosone nee baa negre nɛra baa wola wobɛlbwa jemɛ la.

Nɛra bwa dɛ bol he teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu waa la ta waa bobɛlbwa, anomanta n sie lɛ he nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Kɛ n dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he ɛ wejerema wedɛɛga ɛɛ bɔr, asɛ dɛ ɛ nɛra haa wola wobɛlbwa jemɛ wechɔga ɛɛ be pera.
Korowii waa dɛ tɛ yaa deŋnesɔɔhna la aa bigri chɔg Bɔnsam ne o toma asɛ he tigri o nɛ. Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya.
Timoti n ne waa dɛ ɛ toma la dɛ na heya. Lusias ne Jasen, ne Sosipata ba bwa aa ɛ n bwɛɛ tena la dɛ na heya.
Men Tɛɛseɔs Pɔɔl aa gela n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ tɛo la, n ge dɛ na heyaa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta.
N Pɔɔl dea te Gayos dɛ na heya. O deemii bonɔ asɔre tena ɛɛ cheme. Erastos waa dɛ cheg bwɛɛ nɔ suuga la, o ne ya dɔŋ Kwaatos bwa dɛ na heya.
Hé gel ya jam Korowii. Wɛɛ wonoo gel he che kiŋkiŋ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma maa dɛ bol he be la ta. Korowii pili a gɛ waa nɔ bini. Anee fa ɛ wesɔɔhla saŋ la bwa la,

kɛ taraken te, o chegɛ o keamere waa baa chwera la ta dɛ le a bwa ne baŋ. Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa la tɛ ŋwɛnɛ taraken ŋɔ nɛ́ra bol o waa la. O ɛ gɛ ásɛ ba bola dɛɛ bagle nɛra bwa ásɛ ba yaradaa dɛ teŋɛ a ta.
Hé gel ya che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ jam Korowii o gbo aa ɛ Korowii, dɛ gbo jemɛ wobɛlbwa la. O jirima aa tonɛ bwa! Aamen.
Menee Pɔɔl aa too Korowii tea asɛ o lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ba ɛ Yeesu torome la. N ne n dɔŋ Sɔɔstenes bwaa chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he asɔre tena haa lɔ Kɔrent dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la.
Korowiirii le heya, dɛ koh pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la waa dɛ laa doŋa bɛlbwa kpɔ he nɛɛ dɛ gel he ɛ o nɛra. Ya dɛ chwerɛ he ne nɛra baa lɔ bobɛlbwa dɛɛ tomɛ ya ne ba bwa Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la.
Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
N dɛ jam Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa kɛ waa koh pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la waa dɛ sune he nɛɛ dɛɛ cha heyaa nɔ.
He ne waa pɛa la nomanta, o ja heyaa kpegri ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta. O gelɔ he jemɛ wobol, dɛ tɛ heyaa wejema, asɛ a bagle kɛŋɔ
Yeesu Kristo waa la ya faa bol he be la jo he bambile bini kɛrɛdɛ.
Anomanta taraken haa kpɔ hwɛga dɛɛ kpa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bala nɔ, wobɛlbwa kpegri ta heyaa nyae le Korowii be.
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɔɔ dɛɛ ba gela he che kiŋkiŋ ka tel he serewe bena asɛ awola tɔpere waa ba la, wechɔga bɛlbwa bɛ he nɛɛ do.
Korowii ɛ kasinteŋ te. Onee le heyaa ŋɔ hé ne o Bie la do som. O Bie laanee ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la.
Yabala, n kpɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo dɛɛ soŋe heyaa kɛ hé bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ. He bɛ dɔŋa baahna pegri, hé gel he nyoa pɛ he we-ɛɛla ne he liire ta.
Yabala, nɛra bane le Kloi dem dɛ ba ŋɔ n be ŋɔ, webegra chole he bini bane baah ta, a waa n bol a gɛ waa nɔ la.
N noɔ kɛ bane ŋɔ ba teŋɛ n Pɔɔl nɛ, bane ge ŋɔ ba teŋɛ Apolos nɛ, asɛ bane ge ŋɔ Pita nɛɛ ba te teŋɛ, bane ge ŋɔ ba teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛ.
Hé na! Yeesu Kristo binii he bɔne la! N Pɔɔlee ba koh he waa kpaa pɛl dagagre ta la aa? Kɛɛ n sɔn nee ba sɔ heyaa Korowii nee ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ n nɛɛ la? Akai!
