N dɛ jam Korowii kɛ gɛ saŋ n faa lɔ he be la, n ta nomɛlbwa Korowii nee sɔe ka ja Krispus ne Gayos nɛ.
Anomanta nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won ŋɔ n sɔ heyaa Korowii nee ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ n nɛ.
Dɛ Steeven ne o dem tena ge laa n berɛ sɔ Korowii ne aa, maa lii kɛŋɔ n sɔ nomɛl nee kpa.

Yeesu Kristo fe ta men tomɛ ŋɔ ń baa sɔ nɛra Korowii ne. O ŋɔ ń ba bol Amanesoma la nɛra be, kɛ n bɛ n gbagba wejema ne nyotor kpɔ dɛɛ bol waa la, ásɛ Yeesu sewa waa sewɛ dagagre ta la bɛ pɛɛpɛɛ ɛ.
O dagagre la ta seo la yaa dɛ bol a waa la ɛ wesale tɛ nɛra baa dɛ nyogre. Kɛ ya banɔ la Korowii aa dɛ lɛ yaa la te, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii kpegri lɔ a ta.
Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ Korowii ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ geloo nɛra wejema ne tɔn jema ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ."
A ba gɛ naa, dɛ lee wejerema ne tɔn jerema wejema dɔɔ jaɔ? Nɛra baa dɔ wobol wejema ge, dɛ lee ba dɔɔ? Korowii gelɔ nɛwɛnyini wejema ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
Ba gbagba wejema gelɔ baa Korowii jemɛ. Korowii kpɔ o wejema ɛa gɛ, dɛ ŋɔ a ɛo silɛɛ kɛ wɛɛ lɛ nɛra baa yarada Amanesoma yaa bola dɛɛ bagle nɛra asɛ baa liira wesale la.
Juda tena dɛ nyin ya ɛ nyokpowaa bag ba, Grik tena gee nyin kɛ ya bag ba wejema mɔɔ ba yarada.
Ya te, Yeesu Kristo sewa dagagre ta la waa yaa bol. A ɛ waa Juda tena aa dɛ lɔ naa a ta dɛɛ vɛah, asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ge la, a ɛ wesale ba be.
Kɛ Juda tena ne Grik tena Korowii aa lee ba ŋɔ bá ba ɛ o nɛra la, Yeesu Kristo waa la ɛ Korowii kpegri ne o wejema ba te be.
Korowii wesale gwaa nɛwɛnyini wejema, o gwɛgra ge gwaa nɛwɛnyini kpegri.
Yabala, hé lii gɛ haa doa asɛ Korowii le heyaa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ o nɛɛ la. He galga ta wejerema ɛɛ nɛra be. He galga ge ta nɛnjena ɛɛ nɛra be. He bwa ge laa ɛ koobii.
Korowiirii saahna le waa nɛra aa dɛ liira wesale dɛ́ gel sihiih kpo wejerema, asɛ dɛ saah le gwɛgra ge dɛ́ gel sihiih kpo kpegnɛra,
dɛ kpɔ waa nɛra siwi aa wola an su ne anɔ la baa dɛ liira wepuu, ne anɔ la baa wola a waa jemɛ ŋɔ á ba chɔg anɔ la nɛra aa dɛ maŋkuraa la,
asɛ nɛn bɛ won gɔɔ o te Korowii sie.
Korowiirii gela he ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ, asɛ ya che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ Korowii wejema. O nɛɛ a che Korowii na yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga dɛ berɛ kpɔ yaa ɛ o kwa. Onee kpɔ seo dɛ yawɛ yaa le ya wenaale ta.
Anomanta gɛ Korowii Tɔn la aa ŋɔa la: "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o te maŋkurae la, wɛɛ maŋkura o te waa Korowii aa ɛa ta."
Yabala, a gɛ saŋ n faa ba he be dɛ ba di Korowii waa danseɛ he be la, nyotor ne nɛwɛnyini wejema laa n kpɔ bol waa bagle heya.
Maa lɔ he be la, dɛ maa nyin kɛ n kpɔ wejema ane ja n wobol ta, nemenɛ Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa dagagre la ta la wa.
N faa lɔ he be la, n ta kpegri dii he nɛ. Ɔmee ne bochela nee n ɛ toma he bini.
N webagla bini la, n ta wejema kpɔe bol waa bagle heyaa ásɛ he sie lɛ. Kɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee di n wobol la danseɛ dɛ gel a do kpegri.
Anomanta nɛn wejema ta laa a che hɛɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo dɛɛ teŋɛ o nɛ. Korowii kpegri la taa a che.
Ya dɛ bol wejema waa te dɛɛ bagle nɛra ba sie aa chaah Korowii waa ta kɛrɛdɛ. Wejema yaa dɛ bagle a waa nɔ ta harɛ nɔ ta nɛra ne ba nɛnjena wejema ɛɛ. Ba te ɛɛ ba ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
Korowii wejema waa yaa bagle. A fa sɔɔh, nɛwɛnyini faa wola a waa jemɛ. A ɛ waa Korowii aa ɛa cheg yaa mɔɔ dɛ ta harɛ nɔ, ásɛ a ba cha yaa ya dɔ jirima.
Harɛ nɔ ta nomonjena fa ta a gɛ wejema nɔ mun noɛ. Dɛ ba fe no a mun aa, ba fe ta gelɛ ba kpo ya Dɔɔ la waa dɔ jirima la dagagre ta.
A gɛ waa nɔ waa ba faa chwerɛ dɛ ŋɔ, "Waa nomɛlbwa aa wola a dɔŋa nae, nomɛlbwa aa wola a waa noɛ, nomɛlbwa ge aa wola an liire laanee Korowii ɛ cheg nɛra baa dɛ nyin o wa."
Kɛ Korowii chegɛ o Domadɛɛge la ta dɛɛ bagle yaa a waa ásɛ ya won no a mun. O Domadɛɛge la dɛ na wobɛlbwa bini kɛrɛdɛ, hale dɛ jemɛ Korowii wesɔɔhla gba.
Nomɛlbwa aa o dɔŋ nyu bini jemɛ, nemenɛ naate gbagba. Gɛɛ a do nɛwɛnyini aa wola waa aa lɔ Korowii be jemɛ. O Domadɛɛge gbosoroo jemɛ o nyu bini.
Ya te, liire yaa dɔa ta harɛ nɔ ta liire ɛɛ. Korowiirii kpɔa tɛ yaa. O kpɔ o Domadɛɛge tɛ yaa o do ya nɛ. Anee gela ya jemɛ kwaa waa tɛ yaa la.
Yaa dɛ bol waa nɔ, yaa nɛwɛnyini wejema ta chegɛ dɛɛ bola. Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee dɛɛ bagle yaa waa yaa bol. Anɔ la waa bol la, anee ya ge kpɔ dɛɛ bagle o wa.
Nomɛlbwa Korowii Domadɛɛge aa wola toole o nɛɛ la, o dɛ vɛh o Domadɛɛge la wa. A ɛ wesale tɛ naate, waa a mun no, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge gboo gela nɛn ɛɛ no Korowii waa mun.
Nɛn Korowii Domadɛɛge aa lɔ o nɛɛ la jemɛ wobɛlbwa ŋwɛnɛre. Kɛ nɛn waa wola toole o nɛɛ la aa won jemɛ naate waa lɔ o nɛɛ la ŋwɛnɛre.
Korowii Tɔn bini ba pɛɛrɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛn besoo dɛ won jemɛ Korowii liire o? Umee dɛ won baglo waɔ?" Kɛ ya te dɔ Yeesu Kristo liire.

Yabala, n fa ta wone bol waa bagle heyaa kɛrɛdɛ gɛ maa dɛ bagle nɛra Korowii Domadɛɛge aa chaah ba sie la. N bola tɛ heyaa kɛ nɛra ba taa dɛ teŋɛ ba nɛwɛnyini mar waa ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he do kɛŋɔ bechale ken Yeesu Kristo waa la ta.
Wobopwɛra nee n faa bagle heyaa waa kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ɔr bechala waa wola tele ne kondikwaa dii la. Hale taraken kwara he ta tele mɔɔ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ta dɛ teŋɛ nɛwɛnyini mar ta. Bɔweela ne nagra aa lɔ he baah ta nɔ, nɛwɛnyini mar nɛɛ laa hɛɛ teŋɛ nɔ naa? Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ dɛ he dɔ gɛ da nɔ naa, he ja nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire nɛɛ kɛɛ?
Dɛ he bane ŋɔ he dɛ teŋɛ n Pɔɔl nɛ, asɛ he bane ge ŋɔ ba dɛ teŋɛ Apolos nɛ aa, amɔ dɛ he ne nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ ba nɛwɛnyini mar ta la da beŋkpoŋ.
Bamewaa Apolos ne Pɔɔl hɛɛ maŋkura ba gɛ nɔɔ? Tom-ɛɛra gboo yaa. Korowii tomɛ yaa he be, asɛ he no Yeesu waa dɛ yaradaa dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo. Toma Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ ya bini bɛlbwa laanee yaa ɛ.
Ya fa do kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ du kwaa dɛ do he bini. Menee dua, asɛ Apolos ge ka ba dɛ ba do nee a ta. Korowiirii gela kwaa la le dɛ kpeg.
Anomanta nɛn waa dɛ du kwaa ne onɔ la waa dɛ do nee a ta la te bɛlbwa aa won waane ɛ. Korowii gbosoroo won waa ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ onee gela kwaa won lee, dɛɛ kpeg.
Nɛn waa dɛ du kwaa ne onɔ la waa dɛ do nee a ta la te bɛlbwa ta korɛ. Korowii dɛ bɔ bɛlbwa kem gɛ aa chɛa.
Korowiirii dɔ yaa, ya ne o pɛ dɛɛ ɛ toma. Asɛ he ge do kɛŋɔ o koo waa dɛ parɛ ne o dea waa dɛ do.
Korowiirii cha mɛ n won ɛ toma kɛŋɔ nɛn waa jemɛ dea mae kɛrɛdɛ la, dɛ pa dea la mun, asɛ nomɛl ge ba ma dɛɛ chɔŋɛ. Kɛ bɛ́lbwa nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ gɛ waa maa dɛɛ chɔŋɛ.
Yeesu Kristo gboo Korowii den kpɔ cheg kɛ dea mumpar. Dɛ Yeesu laa aa, nomɛlbwa toole yá che o nɛɛ o lɛ yaa.
A do kɛŋɔ bane aa kpɔ suugaswɛm, bane kpɔ suugapoŋ, bane kpɔ bwedɛɛga dɛ ma chɔŋɛ dea la mumpar la ta, asɛ bane ge kpɔ daa ne kpɔga ne jaage sɛɛh dɛ ma chɔŋɛ.
Dɛ Korowii tɔpere waa dɛ ba nɛra bwa waa bola dɛ pa bole la telaa, belaa baa ba nae gɛ bɛlbwa toma aa doa. Awola tɔpere la, niinii dɛɛ ba toma nomɛlbwa aa ɛa la wer bini bagla.
Dɛ nii la jo toma haa ɛa chɔŋɛ dea la mumpar la ta dɛ a ta fueh yaa, Korowii ɛɛ bɔe a kemee.
Kɛ dɛ nomɛl toma fuoh waa, Korowii ɛɛ lɛ naatee, kɛ wɛɛ paŋɛ komɛlbwaa. Wɛɛ ɛo kɛŋɔ kon baa keeru le nii ta ken.
Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ he chegɔ tɛ Korowii Dea asɛ o Domadɛɛge la so he bini kɛɛ?
Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa chɔg Korowii Dea la, Korowii ɛɛ chɔg naatee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o Dea la waa doa la ɛ dea doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole o ta. Heyaa o Dea la.
He bɛ he te dɛɛ negre. Dɛ he bini bɛl lole dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ o dɔ harɛ nɔ ta wejema aa, ó ɛ o te gɛne ásɛ dɛ dɔ Korowii wejema tenten.
Harɛ nɔ ta wejema ɛ wesale Korowii be. Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini dɛ ŋɔ, "Nɛra kpɔ wejema ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga, kɛ Korowii dɛ lag ba."
Ba chwerɛ o bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "Korowii jemɛ harɛ nɔ ta wejerema liire kɛŋɔ a ɛ wepuu."
Anomanta he bɛ bane kpɔ dɛɛ ta nyoa. Komɛlbwa chɔ le dɛ tɛ heya.
Pɔɔl ne Apolos ne Pita, nyundua ne harɛ, mkpa ne seo, kwaa aa lole fini ne kerekere oo, heyaa dɔ a bwa.
Yeesu Kristo gee dɔ heya, asɛ Korowii ge dɔ Yeesu Kristo.
A wer kɛ hɛɛ yerɛ yaa Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔna. Korowii bagle yaa o wesɔɔhla dɛ kpɔ do ya nɔn ta ŋɔ yáa bagle nɛra.
Waa aa chɛ nɛn baa kpɔ waa do o nɔn ta laanee kɛŋɔ o gel o waa dɔ kasinteŋ.
Dɛ he dɛ kpɛɛ mɛ kɛɛ he dɛ chɔg mɛ noo, n waane laa. Nɛwɛnyini laa dɛ won bol n waa dɛ pa mɛ bole. N gbabir aa won kpɛɛ n te dɛ chɔg n te.
N ta wechɔga bɛlbwa nae n waa bini te, kɛ a ta baglɛ kɛ mɛɛ di bolee. N Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristoo dɛɛ ba n waa bola dɛ pa bole.

Anomanta he bɛ nomɛlbwa kpɛɛ kɛɛ dɛ chɔgo ka tel kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo aa ba. Dɛ o balaa, wobɛlbwa aa sɔah la ɛɛ le bochaahnee, wedɛɛga oo, wechɔga oo, a bwa ɛɛ leo, asɛ wobɛlbwa aa sɔah dɛ do nɛwɛnyini bambile bini la chɔ baŋ, asɛ Korowii kpɛɛ nomɛlbwa gɛ aa chɛo.

Yabala, n kpɔ toma n ne Apolos aa ɛa la dɛ che a ta dɛ bagle waa nɔ, ásɛ he no a mun dɛ jemɛ waa aa wera kɛŋɔ he ɛ. Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ: He bɛ ɛ garɛ gɛ baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini la. He bɛ bane kpɔ gwaa bane dɛ́ɛ maŋkura he te.
Umee ŋɔ he be ŋɔ he gwaa bane ɔ? Wobɛlbwa haa jema la, Korowiirii tɛɛ. Bɛ nyoa dɛɛ ta a do kɛŋɔ Korowii laa kpɔ waa haa jema la kɛɛ.
He dɛ lii kɛŋɔ he dɔ komɛlbwa a magre he ne, he ɛ dɔɔhna. He berɔ garɛ yaa dɛɛ di kora. Dɛ he fe dɛ di kora kpela te naa, a fe bɔ. Ya ne he bwa fe ɛ koranar.
N te be, Korowii gelɔ ya banɔ nɔ yaa ɛ Yeesu toroma nɔ ka mun, dɛ do kɛŋɔ nɛra baa lag ba dɛɛ la ka kpoo ba, asɛ nɛra bwa ɛɛ nyiŋ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nyundua toroma ne nɛra bwa dɛ nyiŋi yaa.
Yeesu Kristo nomanta ya ɛ gɛna nɛra be, kɛ he dɛ yerɛ he te wejerema o waa ta. Ya ɛ nɛŋgwɛgra nɛra be, kɛ he ɛ he te o kpegnɛra. Ba dɛ duu heya, dɛ lawɛ ya te sie dɛɛ tegɛ harɛ.
Lɔr ne nyɔgre dɛ kpo yaa, yakwanee yaa tɔ, nɛra ɛɛ lɔɔ yaa, ya ta sobɔr dɔe dɛ kpoŋe ba le fini.
Ya bokpega taa yaa di. Nɛra hah yaa dɛɛ chɛgre yaa, kɛ ya te soŋe wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. Ba dɛ ɛ yaa hɔhɔrɔwa, kɛ ya te sɔɔh bwara dɛɛ tɛɛ ba.
Nɛra dɛ chɔg ya sɔn, kɛ ya te dɛ kwaa ba sɔn. Ya do kɛŋɔ puldoa haahra nɛra be, hale ba le fini.
N ta gɛ waa nɔ chwerɛ ba tɛ heyaa dɛ́ gel sihiih kpo heya, kɛ jae mɛɛ ja heya, haa ɛ n bidɛɛga maa dɛ nyin heyaa la nomanta.
Dɛ he dɔ nɛra ba warɛ pirim dɛ won cha heyaa Yeesu Kristo ŋwɛnɛ ta naa, n gboo ta he mɛɛ. Menee tɔ sie bol Amanesoma la he be. A taa n che ɛ he mɛɛ Yeesu Kristo waa ta.
Anomanta n dɛ soŋe heya, hé kpɔ n da.

A waa gela n tomɛ Timoti he be la. O ɛ n bie maa dɛ nyinu, wɛɛ no n deŋna waa Yeesu Kristo toma nɔ ta. Wɛɛ lii heyaa gɛ maa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo waa la ta. Gɛ maa dɛ bagle asɔrere ta bobɛlbwa laanee wɛɛ ba heyaa liira.
He bane dɛ bagle he te dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ maa ba dɛ ba na heyaa kpa.
Dɛ Korowii sɛoh waa, aa bigri mɛɛ ba he bee dɛ gbagba ba na kpegri nɛra baa dɛ bagle ba te la aa dɔa. Ba wobol gbo ta laa n ŋɔ.
Korowii Kora bini doe ta nyoa wobol pɛɛpɛɛ ɛɛ. O kpegri dɔe waa.
Ɛrɛ balaa hɛɛ nyin kɛ n ba he be nɔ? Hɛɛ charɛ he daa asɛ n nyin he waa dɛ ba bambisɔn ne kɛɛ ń kpɔ chweema ba dɛ́ ba tɛr he deŋne ɔ?
N dɛ no kɛ he bini bane dɛ bɔ jwamane aa wola were, hale nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ kwara aa wola gɛɛ ɛ. Ba ŋɔ he bini bɛl lawɛ o mɛɛ haah kwaraa dɛɛ chɔ.
A fe chɛ kɛŋɔ he gel he teene bini chɔg waa nɔ wa, asɛ hɛɛ maŋkura he te la. Aa were kɛŋɔ gɛ nɛn la ta ja he bini kpa!
N gbabir toole he be bela, kɛ n liire te lɔ he be. N dɔɔ pa naate waa ɛ gɛ waa nɔ bolchɔge kɛŋɔ n gbagba aa lɔ bela ken.
Dɛ he baa cheme ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn ta, o kpegri do he nɛ, n ge liire do he bini naa,
hé kpɔ naate bwadabii do Bɔnsam nɔn ta ó chɔgo, asɛ awola ya Dɔɔ aa ba la, ó ge ba lɛ o doma te.
Aa were kɛŋɔ hɛɛ maŋkura he te. Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ iisi tama wono gel men damanta ɛɛ ugaa?

Anomanta hé laa gɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ la kpɔ he bini asɛ o wechɔga aa do kɛŋɔ iisi la bɛ heyaa bu, ásɛ he do wer kɛŋɔ paanoo baa wola iisi a ta doe, dɛ di tɔpejen Galekaa la. He do gɛ kpela. Yeesu Kristo koh ya waa dɛ sewɛ kɛŋɔ baa kpo peera Galekaa tɔpere la.

Anomanta hé gel ya kpɔ ya te kɛŋɔ yaa dɛ ba Galekaa kondikwaa dii ken, anee kɛŋɔ yá laa meesɔɔh ne wechɔga bɛlbwa soosiwi kpɔ ya bini gɛ baa laa iisi kpɔ paanoo baa kpɔa dɛɛ di Galekaa ta la. Hé gel ya kpɔ kasinteŋ ne tepoŋ dɛ teŋɛ Korowii nɛ.
N tɔn n faa chwerɛ heyaa la, n baglɔ kɛ he ne nɛra jwamane aa lɔ ba sie ta la bɛ pɛ.

Banɔ la baa wola yabala asɔre tena ɛɛ dɛɛ bɔ jwamane, ba sie ɛɛ begre kwa, baa tomɛ voga la, ba te laa n ŋɔ hé laa he te kpɔ ba nɛɛ nɔ, dɛkalkɛ ba te lɔ bobɛlbwa. Haa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta nɔ, haa won laa he te kpɔ ba nɛ!

Nɛra la maa dɛ bol ba waa laanee nɛra baa ŋɔa ba ja yabala asɔre tena nɛ, kɛ dɛɛ bɔ jwamane, dɛ kpɔ suuga gwaa komɛlbwa, dɛɛ tomɛ voga, dɛɛ bol nɛra bwara wechɔga, dɛ nyɔ sen dɛɛ dɛɛ, dɛɛ ŋwɛ la. Ba ŋɔ ba ɛ asɔre tena dɛ berɛ dɛɛ ɛ waa aa do ken nɔ la, he ne gɛ nɛra nɔ te bɛlbwa bɛ pɛ a ba ɛ kɛ hɛɛ pɛ nɔnee di kwa.
Nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ la te, n ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ n bol ba waa dɛ pa bole. Korowiirii dɛ bol ba waa dɛ pa bole.
Nɛra baa ɛ asɔre tena la te, heyaa chɛ kɛŋɔ he bol ba waa dɛ pa bole. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ "Hé doŋi wechɔg-ɛɛ le he bini."
Umee ŋɔ he be ŋɔ dɛ he bini bɛl ne o dɔŋ asɔre te dɔ waane aa, ó gel Korowii nɛra, dɛ kpɔɔ la nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ be bá ka bola ɔ? Korowii nɛra laa dɛ bola aa?
Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ kerekere Korowii nɛraa dɛɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole kɛɛ? Dɛ heyaa dɛ ba bol ba waa te naa, ɛrɛɛ haa wola won bol wejegre aa do ken nɔɔ?
Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ yan dɛ ba bol nyundua toroma waa dɛ pa bole kɛɛ? Harɛ nɔ ta nɛra waa yaa wola won bol aa?
Dɛ he ne he dɔŋ dɔ waane aa, ɛrɛɛ he kpɔ dɛɛ do nɛra asɔre tena aa wola ban kpɔe dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa la nɔn ta ŋɔ bá bola ɔ?
A dɔ sihiih tɛ heya. Amɔ wejereme beŋkpoŋ kwaraa toole he bini dɛ won bol he baah wa,
asɛ hɛɛ samane dɔŋa dɛ gel nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ kaa bol he waa nɔ naa? A ta gɛ chɛɛ.
Haa dɛ samane dɔŋa nɔ gba kwara baglɔ kɛŋɔ he dɔɔ di bolchɔge. Dɛ he ne he dɔŋ dɔ waane aa, lawɛ bambile. Dɛ o ŋwɛɛ kwaraa naa, kpɔ kɛo. A wer gwaa kɛŋɔ haa samano.
Kɛ haa gɛ ɛ. Heyaa dɛɛ ɛ dɔŋa wechɔga, dɛɛ faah dɔŋa, hale he bala asɔre tena.
Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ wechɔg-ɛɛra aa Korowii Kora la taa ja kɛɛ? He bɛ he nyu negre. Nɛra baa dɛ ɛ sɛnwaa, ne vog toroma, ne nɛra baa dɛ bɔ jwamane, ne baala ba ne ba bandɔŋa aa dɛ chɔ haah ne baa,
ne ŋwɛɛra, ne nɛra ba sie aa dɛ begre ba dɔŋa kwa, ne sennyɔdɛɛra, ne nɛra baa dɛ bol dɔŋa wobochɔga, ne nɛra baa dɛ faah nɛra, nɛn waa dɛ ɛ a gɛ waa nɔ te bɛlbwa la aa Korowii Kora la taa ja.
He bini bane fa kpoŋe gɛ da nɔ. Kɛ taraken Korowii koh ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo ne Korowii Domadɛɛge la toma la waa dɛ sɔ he wechɔga bwa ta, dɛ gel he ɛ nɛndɛɛga he waa su o siwi.
Nomɛl te kompɛɛ, "N dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ n ɛ wobɛlbwa." Kpelaa, kɛ a bwa laa wera tɛ yaa. N fe jemɔ kɛ maa komɛlbwa ki, kɛ maa gel komɛlbwa gwaa n nɛ.

Bɛl gee ŋɔɔ, "Tea waa kondikwaa do le, asɛ kondikwaa ge che dɛ tɛ tea." Kpelaa, kɛ Korowii gelɔ a bwa dɔ jaga dɛ́ chɔg. O ta nɛn bwadabii ɛɛ tɛo ŋɔ ó kpɔ ɛ jwamanwa, kɛ o ɛo tɛo kɛŋɔ ó kpɔ tomɔ. Anomanta nɛn bwadabii ɛ Korowii kon, wɛɛ tɛo komɛlbwa.
Gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ o kpegri ir ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo seo ta la, gɛɛ wɛɛ ba o kpegri la kpɔe dɛ ir ya ge seo ta.
Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ he bwadabii ɛ Yeesu Kristo bwadabii pera kɛɛ? Dɛ gɛɛ a do te naa, amɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ n kpɔ n bwadabii waa ɛ Yeesu bwadabii pera la ka bɔ jwamane aa? Akai! He bɛ gel a ba gɛ.
Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa bɔ jwamane la, o ne haah la pɛo dɛ ɛ bwadabii beŋkpoŋ aa? Korowii Tɔnee bagla ŋɔ, "Nɛra banɛ la ɛ beŋkpoŋ."
Nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o te pɛl ya Dɔɔ la ge, o ne o bwa dɔ Doma beŋkpoŋ.
Anomanta hé laa he te dɛɛ kpɔ jwamane ta. Wechɔga bɛlbwa nɛn aa dɛ ɛ la, aa o bwara bini so. Kɛ nɛn waa dɛ bɔ jwamane la, o gbagba bwadabii wɛɛ do wechɔga ta.
Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ he bwadabii ɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la sobɔr kɛɛ? Korowii kpɔɔ tɛ heya, o so he nɛ. Anomanta he laa dɔ he te. Korowiirii dɔ heya,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ o kpɔ Yeesu Kristo chal yawɛ heya. Anomanta hé nyiŋi he bwadabii ta kɛrɛdɛ dɛ kpɔ tomɛ Korowii dɛ tɛo sɔn.
He fa chwerɛ tɔn dɛ ba bɔɔ mɛ ŋɔ, dɛ baa ŋɔ waa haahnee mo aa, a wer aa? Baa ŋɔ waa haahnee mo aa, a wer.
Kɛ jwamane aa wara la nomanta, a chɛ kɛŋɔ baa bɛlbwa dɔ o haah, asɛ haah bɛlbwa ge dɔ o jaa.
Baa bɛlbwa bɛ ŋɔ o ne o haah naa chɔ, gɛɛ haah ge bɛ ŋɔ waa sɛh o ne o jaa chɔ.
Haah ta o bwadabii kpegri dɔe chɔe bɔr, o jaaree dɔ. Gɛɛ baa ge aa wola o bwadabii kpegri dɔe, o haahnee dɔ.

Anomanta bɛlbwa bɛ o te kpɔ sɔh o dɔŋ chɔe be pera, atane kɛŋɔ he bwa sɛoh kɛŋɔ he dɛ nyin kɛ he kpɔ bambibeŋkpoŋ soŋe Korowii tɔpere bɛl tama mɔɔ. Gɛ te wer. Kɛ dɛ he ɛ gɛ tonaa, hé berɛ pɛ ja. Dɛ he ta pɛɛ yaa, haa wola won lawɛ he te la, Bɔnsam ɛɛ geloo he ɛ wechɔga.
Waa nɔ maa bagla nɔ ta denɛ dɛɛ do heyaa ŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ he mo haahna. Kɛ n dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ dɛ he mo haah naa, a ta wechɔga ɛɛ.

N te fe dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa fee bɛ haah mo, dɛ so gɛ maa soga nɔ. Kɛ nomɛlbwa laa Korowii ta ŋɔ ó gbo so dɛ bɛ haah mo. O dɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa o we-ɛɛla waa dɛ ɛ la kpegri, bɛl yon do kpegri anɔ ta, bɛl ge do kpegri anɔ ta.
Waa maa dɔa dɛ tɛ nɛra baa wola haahna dɔe, ne haahna baa wola jaranar dɔe, ne nɛra ba jaranar aa serewa laanee kɛ bá fee so gɛ n gbo aa soga nɔ.
Dɛ bɛlbwa nao kɛŋɔ waa won haŋre dɛ gbo so te naa, amɔ ó mo haah kɛɛ ó yalɛ. A bɔ kɛŋɔ haah kɛɛ baa pɛla aa dɔe aa we he nɛɛ kohona.
Anɔ la maa bera dɔ dɛɛ tɛ hahmoola ne jadɔɔhnaa nɔ. N gbagba laa dɛɛ bol. Ya Dɔɔree ŋɔa ŋɔ haah bɛ o jaa vɛh.
Kɛ dɛ o vɛh o jaa raa, o bɛ baa bɛlbwa yalɛ kpa, atane kɛŋɔ o berɛ la o jaa la be asɛ ba ka pɛ dɛ so ja. Baa ge bɛ o haah vɛh.
N gbagbaa dɛɛ bol anɔ te dɛɛ tɛ he kar la. Ya Dɔɔ laa bola. Dɛ he ɛ asɔre te dɛ mo haah waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ, a too o tea o ŋɔ wɛɛ soo waa, bɛ on vɛh.
Dɛ haah ge ɛ asɔre te dɛ yalɛ baa waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ, dɛ o tea toorɔ kɛŋɔ o ne wɛɛ soo waa, haah la bɛ on vɛh.

Baa waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ la, o mo haah waa ɛ asɔre te aa, pɛɛ o ne haah la aa pɛa la nomanta, Korowii kpɔ baa la dɛɛ ɛ o nɛn. Gɛɛ a do, haah ge ta asɔre te ɛɛ dɛ yalɛ baa waa ɛ asɔre te aa, pɛɛ o ne waa pɛa la nomanta, Korowii kpɔ haah la ge dɛɛ ɛ o nɛn. Dɛ gɛ laa aa, he bii fe ta Korowii bii ɛɛ, kɛ taraken ba ɛ o kwa.
Dɛ onɔ la waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ vɛh o dɔŋ waa ɛ asɔre tee yaa, tɛo ŋwɛnɛ wɛɛ la. A ba gɛ naa, a ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Korowii dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya so deŋnesɔɔhna ta.
Dɛ Korowii ɛɛ che haah haa ɛ asɔre te nɛɛ dɛ lɛ he jaa raa, he jemaa? Gɛɛ a do baa haa ɛ asɔre te la nɛɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii ken ɛɛ che he nɛɛ dɛ lɛ he haah naa, he jemaa?
Korowiirii tɛ bɛlbwa o we-ɛɛla wɛɛ ɛ. Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ bɛlbwa ɛ gɛ Korowii aa leo dɛ tɛo ŋɔ wɛ́ɛ ɛ la. Gɛɛ mɛɛ bol asɔre tena baa lɔ bobɛlbwa la be.
Dɛ ba kpɔ kere chɔgɛ nomɛl mɔɔ Korowii leo o ba ɛ asɔre te aa, o bɛ kpɔ sɔh. Korowii le nomɛl ge, dɛ ba ta kere kpɔe chɔgɔ waa, o bɛ gel ba kpɔ kere chɔgɔ.
Ba kpɔ kere chɔgɛ noo, a ta waane ɛɛ, ba ta kere kpɔe chɔgɛ noo, a ta waane ɛɛ. Kɛ Korowii Waa la ta teŋaa ɛ kasinteŋ.
Anomanta do gɛ haa doa mɔɔ Korowii lee he ba ɛ asɔre te la.
Dɛ he ɛ yom dɛ ba ɛ asɔre te aa, bɛ gel a we he nɛ. Kɛ dɛ ba tɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ ŋɔ hé le he yom ɛɛ la ta naa, bɛ vɛh.
Nomɛlbwa waa ɛ yom dɛ ɛ asɔre te la, o dɔ o te Korowii be. Gɛɛ a do, nomɛlbwa waa dɔ o te dɛ ba ɛ asɔre te la, o ɛ Yeesu Kristo yom.
Korowiirii kpɔ Yeesu Kristo chal la yawɛ heya, anomanta he bɛ lii kɛŋɔ nɛraa dɔ heya.
Yabala, gɛ he faa doa mɔɔ Korowii le heyaa he ba ɛ asɔre tena la, hé ta do gɛ, asɛ he ne Korowii do le.
Korowii ta men nɛra baa wola yalɛ la waa baglɛ, kɛ o dɛ cha mɛ asɛ mɛɛ ɛ o toma kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta mɛɛ bagle gɛ maa jemaa.
Waa lole dɛ dawɛ ya nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ, anomanta n te be te, a wer kɛ gɛ haa soga la, hé ta so gɛ.
Dɛ he dɔ haah naa, bɛ ŋɔ hɛɛ vɛoh. Dɛ he ta bɛl dɔe ge aa, bɛ ŋɔ hɛɛ nyin bɛlee.
He mo haah naa, a ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Dɛ haah ge yalaa, a ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Kɛ waa lɔ a ta he soga bini, a waa mɛɛ nyin n lɛ heyaa le a ta la.
Maa ŋɔ gɛ nɔ, yabala, yaa harɛ nɔ taa bigri bɛlbwa. Anomanta le fini dɛɛ kaa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ he banɔ la haa dɔ haahna la ɛ kɛŋɔ he ta haahna dɔe ken,
he banɔ la haa dɛ wi ɛ kɛŋɔ he waa aa sume ken, he banɔ la ge haa dɛ mamɛ ɛ kɛŋɔ he sie ta lɛɛ ken, he banɔ la ge aa dɛ yawɛ la ɛ kɛŋɔ kwaa haa yawa la ta he kwaa ɛɛ ken.
Asɛ he banɔ la ge haa dɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa harɛ nɔ ta la bɛ ɛ a gwaa kohona, dɛkalkɛŋɔ harɛ nɔ ne o waa dɔ jaga. Waa bigri bɛlbwa.
N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ harɛ nɔ ta waa bɛ heyaa ha kohona. Baa waa wola haah dɔe la, o siwi dɛ swɛɛ Korowii toma ta, wɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ Korowii sie lɛ o nɛ.
Kɛ baa waa dɔ haah la te sie dɛ begre harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta, ásɛ o haah sie ɛɛ lɛ o nɛ. Webele anɛɛ yon do o baŋa.
Haah waa wola yalɛ, kɛɛ tolo, o sie dɛ begre Korowii toma ta, o kpɔ o te ne o liire bwa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii toma. Asɛ haah waa yala la ge sie ɛɛ begre harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta ásɛ o jaa sie lɛ o nɛ.
N dɛ nyin kɛ n cha heya, a waa gela mɛɛ bol waa gɛ la. Maa nyin kɛŋɔ he ŋwɛnɛ tɔ. N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he ɛ anɔ la aa wera ásɛ he liire bwa won do Korowii toma ta.
Dɛ baa bɛlbwa dɔ o bihaah waa kpega ne yala, o ŋɔ waa gel o yalɛ, dɛ berɛ na kɛŋɔ a wer kɛŋɔ bie la yalaa, ó ɛ gɛ bwa waa dɛ nyin. Ó gel o yalɛ. A ta wechɔga ɛɛ.
Dɛ baa bɛlbwa nyiŋi gɛ waa nɔ kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ŋɔ waa o bihaahnee kpɔ tɛ baa bɛlbwa ó mo aa, dɛ nomɛl laa hɛo, dɛ o gbagba bambile binii a le, asɛ o ta on kpɔe tɛ baa laa, o ɛ wa.
Anomanta, dɛ nomɛl lawɛ o bihaah tɛ baa o mo aa, o ɛ kɛrɛdɛ. Kɛ naate waa wola o bihaah lawɛ tɛ baa ó mo la ɛa kɛrɛdɛ gwaa o dɔŋ waa lawɛ o bihaah tɛ yal la.

Dɛ haah yalɔ, o jaa ta do le naa, baa laanee dɔ haah la kpegri. Kɛ dɛ baa la sewaa, o ta haah la kpegri dɔe kpa. Haah la won kaala dɛ ka yalɛ baa waa dɛ nyinu ja. Kɛ o bɛ baa waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ yalɛ.
A ka n waa aa, dɛ o fe ta yalɛ kpa kwaraa fe wer tɛo gwaa kɛŋɔ waa yala. N gbagba liire te, kɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la soge n nɛ.
A ka kwaa baa kpoora dɛɛ tɛ voga wa. A waa jema te, ya bwa jemɛ a wa. Kɛ nɛwɛnyini wejema gelɔ wɛɛ nyin sɔn. Asɛ nɛnnyin ge ɛ chae.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o ɛ wejereme la, o ta wejema aa chɛ kɛ o jemɛ la dɔe mɔɔ.
Naate waa dɛ nyin Korowii la te, Korowii gba jemɔ.
Anomanta vog kwaa dii maa dɛ bol a waa nɔ, ya jemɔ kɛ voga ta komɛlbwa ɛɛ harɛ nɔ ta, Korowii beŋkpoŋii lole.
Kwaa nɛra aa kpɔa ɛ Korowii dɛɛ yera ba dɔɔranar la warɔ dɛ do nyundua ne harɛ.

Kɛ ya te be, Korowii lɔ beŋkpoŋ. Onee N Naa Korowii waa ta komɛlbwa, asɛ ya do le dɛɛ tomɔ la. Ya Dɔɔ ge lɔ beŋkpoŋ. Onee ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo. O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ta komɛlbwa, asɛ ya ge che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ mkpa.

Nomɛlbwa laa jemɛ gɛ. Bane duu gɛ voga nɔ bigri a man ba. Hale ba le fini, dɛ ba di kwaa baa kpoora tɛ voga nɔ naa, dɛ ba liire dɛ ɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ voga laanee dɔ kwaa la. Ba yarada aa wola kanɛ Yeesu waa la ta nomanta, dɛ ba dɛ lii kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga.
Ya kondikwaa yaa dɛ dia laa dɛ gel ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga Korowii be. Dɛ ya dɛ dia oo, ya dɛ kia oo, aa wobɛlbwa bagle.
Kɛ a ne a bwa hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ kɛ dɛ he ta an kie, he dɛ dia aa, he bɛ gel he we-ɛɛla negre nɛra ba yarada aa wola kanɛ Yeesu waa ta ba kia la.
Nɛn o yarada aa wola kanɛ Yeesu waa ta la, o na he nɛn haa jemɛ Yeesu waa la kɛrɛdɛ soge vog mun dɛɛ di kwa aa, aa geloo o ge di.
He gelɔ he dɔŋ waa wola kiŋkiŋ chegɛ, Yeesu Kristo aa koh o waa sewɛ, ɛɛ ba he wejema ne daŋra dɛ nyogre aa?
Dɛ he dɛ ɛ he bala ba yarada aa wola kanɛ Yeesu waa ta la wechɔga ken asɛ ba tea bini chɔg aa, Yeesu Kristoo hɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la.
Dɛ n nao kɛ kondikwaa maa dɛ di la ɛɛ geloo n dɔŋ ge di a kaa o ne wechɔga ta naa, amɔ te mɛɛ gel a dii asɛ n dɔŋ ge bɛ di dɛ ba kaa wechɔga ta.
N ta n te dɔe dɛɛ di n nyu aa? N ta Yeesu torome ɛɛ yaa? N ta ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nae yaa? He teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ nɔ le toma maa ɛa he bini ya Dɔɔ kpegri ta la.
Dɛ bane ta sɛɛh kɛŋɔ Yeesu toromee men aa, he te jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ n ɛ o torome, dɛkalkɛŋɔ pɛɛ he ne waa pɛa la dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ n ɛ o torome kpela.
Dɛ nɛra dɛ pwaah mɛ naa, kenii mɛɛ ŋɔ:
Nɛra dɛ cha yaa kondikwaa ta naa, dɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta laa aa?
Yeesu Kristo nimanar ne Pita ne Yeesu toroma la bwa mo haahna ba ne baa valɛ. Ya te ta gɛ ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ ya mo haahna baa ɛ asɔre tena ya ne baa valaa?
Kɛɛ n ne Banabas gboo chɛ kɛ ya koh mɔɔ dɛɛ di?
Dɛ he ɛ sooja dɛɛ kaa laa laa, toma la ta laa hɛɛ di aa? He parɛ koo aa, haa koo la kondikwaa di aa? Nategre besoo wola o nae elnee nyɔɔ?
Nɛwɛnyini waa gbo laa dɛɛ bagle gɛ. Mosis Mmara gba bagle gɛ.
Mosis chwerɔ ŋɔ, "He bɛ nae aa dɛ ɛ toma he koo ta la nyoa vɔwɛ dɛ ŋɔ a bɛ kwaa di." Korowii ŋɔ ken aa, kondɛɛra gboo o ŋɔ aa?
Nɛwɛnyini waa o koh ŋɔ gɛ, gɛ aa cha yaa la waa o chwera, ásɛ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ parɛ, ne nomɛlbwa waa dɛ komɛ kwaa la dɔ hwɛga kɛŋɔ wɛɛ dɔ kwaa la anee.
Dɛ ya bol Korowii Waa he be asɛ he dɔ Korowii mkpa aa, dɛ a ta magrɛ kɛ ya lɛ kondikwaa le he be dɛ won dɔ harɛ nɔ ta bokpega aa?
He dɛ tɛ bane gɛ. Dɛ gɛ nɛra la dɔ gɛ ŋwɛnɛ aa, amɔ dɛ ya te ta pɔeh yaa? Kɛ ya te aa gɛ kpegri la bagle he nɛ, dɛ dɔ bambile wobɛlbwa ta dɛ bɛ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la ŋwɛnɛ tɔ.
Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ toma Korowii Dea la, a taa ba dɔ kwaa dɛɛ di, asɛ banɔ la ge baa dɛ kpoo kwaa baa kpɔa baa tɛ Korowii o Dea bini la, a taa ba gee di kɛɛ?
Gɛ tentenee ya Dɔɔ ɛ tɛ nɛra baa dɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛ ŋɔ báa di a ta.
N dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ n ɛ a bwa, kɛ n ta nomɛlbwa be ŋɔe ŋɔ ó tɛ mɛ komɛlbwa bwa. Maa chwerɛ dɛɛ nyin kɛ he tɛ mɛ a gɛ kwaa nɔ. N sewɔ bɔ n be kɛŋɔ waa maa koh a waa maŋkura n te la le n nɔn ta.
Maa won koh Amanesoma nɔ bola waa dɛɛ bagle n te, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii dɛɛ do mɛ asɛ mɛɛ bol. Dɛ n ta bolaa, mɛɛ dɔ waa.
Dɛ n tetoora nee mɛɛ ɛa aa, a fe magrɔ kɛ n fe ɛɛ lɛ a kembɔr. Kɛ Korowiirii kpɔ o Amanesoma la do n nɔn ta ŋɔ ń bol nɛra be. Anomanta n gbagba tetoora laa mɛɛ ɛa.
Kembɔr besoo mɛɛ dɔɔ? N kembɔree kɛŋɔ n won bol Amanesoma la bagle nɛra pɛɛpɛɛ dɛ bɛ kpegri maa dɔa la bagle ba nɛ.
N fe dɛ di n nyu, nomɛlbwa laa dɔɔ mɛ, kɛ n ɛ n te nɛndɔɔle dɛɛ ɛ toma dɛɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ́ fee dɔ nɛra kɛrɛdɛ tɛ Korowii.

Maa dɛ ɛ toma Juda tena bini la, n ɛ n te kɛŋɔ Juda te ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii. N ta Mosis Mmara la ta jae te, kɛ dɛ n koo nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ a ta la nɛ aa, n dɛ ɛ n te kɛ ba bini bɛl, asɛ dɛ yon dɛɛ teŋɛ ba mmarare la ta gɛ ba yon dɛɛ ɛ la, ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii.

Gɛ tentenee dɛ n koo nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Mosis Mmara la ta teŋɛ nɛ aa, n yon ɛ n te kɛ ban, ásɛ dɛ dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii. Kɛ aa bagle kɛ n dɛ vɛh Korowii nyoa wobol. N dɛ teŋɛ gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa ŋɔa yá teŋɛ la ta.

Dɛ n kaa koo nɛra bini, dɛ ba yarada aa kanɛ Yeesu Kristo waa ta naa, n ge dɛ ɛ n te kɛŋɔ ba bini bɛl ásɛ dɛ won dɔɔ ba. Gɛ nomɛlbwa aa doa la, gɛɛ mɛɛ ɛ n te ásɛ dɛ che ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ta dɛ won dɔ bane ásɛ Korowii lɛɛ ba.
Amanesoma nɔ waa mɛɛ teŋɛ anɔ bwa ta la, ásɛ dɛ won na som maa dɛ bol a waa la ane.
Dɛ nɛra dɛ ba chwae dɛ́ lɛ komɛl aa, ba bwa dɛ chwa te, kɛ ba bini beŋkpoŋii dɛɛ dɔ kon la. Anomanta hé chwa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ́ dɔ kon la.

Nomɛlbwa waa jemɛ chwae dɛɛ tɛgre o te dɛ́ chwa lɛ komɛl la, o dɛ dɔ haŋra kwaa bwa ta dɛ́ ka chwa dɛ tɔ sie ásɛ ba kpɔ gbɛrɛ piu. Kpɔga nee ba sɔh gɛ gbɛrɛ la, waa bigri dɛ o chɔgɔ. Kɛ ya te chwae yaa dɛ chwa la, ya dɛ nyin gbɛrɛ waa wola chɔg bwa.
Anomanta n dɛ chwa n sie dawɛ komɛl ta. Maa chwa pɛɛ. N do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ yo, maa nɔɔra ta pɛɛpɛɛ.
N dɛ lawɛ n te, dɛɛ haŋre kɛrɛdɛ kɛ, n gbagba maa dɛ bol Amanesoma nɔ dɛɛ bagle nɛra nɔ, n bɛ ba koni dɛ horɛ.
Yabala, n dɛ nyin kɛ n lii heya, ya naanar bwa nɛɛ Korowii bam la faa tɔ. Moo la aa teŋa la, ba bwaa kpɔ o baah kaa.
A kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ ba faa sɔ ba bwa nee bam la ne moo la ta ásɛ ba ne Mosis pɛ.
Ba bwa dɔ kondikwaa le Korowii kpegri ta dɛ di.
A berɔ che Korowii kpegri ta ba dɔ nee dɛ nyɔ. Bwe taa ba dɔ nee la le. Kristoo bwe la, dɛ faa teŋɛ ba nɛɛ ba kaa.
Kɛ Korowii sie ta ba galga nɛɛ lɛɛ, asɛ ba serewe perɛ kpɔg la baah bobɛla.
A gɛ waa nɔ bwa ɛo dɛ́ gel ya jemɛ wa, asɛ wechɔga pɛla bɛ yaa dɔ gɛ a pɛla faa dɔɔ ba la.
Ya bɛ voga dɛɛ tomɛ gɛ ba bini bane faa dɛ ɛ la. Mosis chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛra la sogo dɛ kwaa ba voga, dɛ di kwa, dɛ nyɔ sen, dɛ ir sa sachɔga."
Ya bɛ jwamane bɔ gɛ nɛra la bane faa ɛa asɛ Korowii kpoo ba bini kagboŋa fifraanɛ dɛ batoro tɔpebeŋkpoŋ la.
Ya bɛ Korowii daah dɛɛ na gɛ bane faa daahno na asɛ o gel harɛ kpɔkpɔ ba ba serewe la.
Ya bɛ waa nagre gɛ bane faa nagre waa asɛ nyundua torome ba kpoo ba la.
Waa aa pu a gɛ nɛra la ɛo dɛ gel ba jemɛ wa. Mosis chwerɛ a wa, dɛ́ gel ya nɛra yaa lɔ harɛ nɔ aa ka tɔpere tamaa o chɔg nɔ ta nɔ jemɛ wa.
Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ o chegɛ kiŋkiŋ Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ ta la, wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ naa ba lɔ.

Nomɛlbwa dɛ na wekpega. Anomanta dɛ he dɛ na wekpega aa, he laa bɔ bere. Korowii waa dɔ yarada. Waa gel wekpega bɛlbwa gwaa he nɛɛ asɛ he horɛ. Wɛɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ haa kpɔ dɛ won lawɛ bambile ka tel kɛŋɔ haa le a nyoa.
Anomanta, n daamanar, hé laa he te kpɔ voga waa ta.
He ɛ wejerema, anomanta hé nyiŋi waa nɔ maa bola nɔ bini dɛ na.

Saŋ bɛlbwa yaa pɛ so dɛɛ di kwaa dɛɛ lii Yeesu Kristo seo la la, sen la yaa dɛ jam Korowii dɛɛ nyɔ la gelɔ ya ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ o chal la waa ta. Paanoo yaa mɔna dɛɛ di la gelɔ ya ne o pɛ o bwadabii waa ta.
Ya warɔ, kɛ paanoo beŋkpoŋ la yaa pɛa di la nomanta ya ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
Hé ta sie dɛ na Juda tena wa. Nɛra baa dɛ di kwaa baa kpoora dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la, ba ta gɛ we-ɛɛla la ta jae yaa?
N dɛ bagle kɛ kwaa baa kpoora dɛɛ tɛ voga la, a ne voga gbagba ɛ kwaane kɛɛ? Akai!
N dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛɛ kpoo kwaa la, ba kpoorɔ dɛɛ tɛ Bɔnsam toroma yaa wola an na la. Korowii laa ba ɛ dɛɛ tɛ. Maa nyin kɛŋɔ he ne Bɔnsam toroma pɛ komɛlbwa.
Haa won nyɔ sen la yaa dɛ nyɔ dɛɛ lii ya Dɔɔ waa la, dɛ berɛ ka nyɔ Bɔnsam toroma la kwa. He ne ya Dɔɔ aa won pɛ nɔn di kwa, asɛ he ne Bɔnsam toroma la ge berɛ pɛ nɔn di kwa. Aa gɛɛ magre!
Hei! He dɛ nyin he mugli ya Dɔɔ baah o mee raa? Ya kpegri gwaalo waa?
Nomɛl te kompɛɛ: "N dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ n ɛ wobɛlbwa," kɛ a bwa laa wera tɛ mɛ, a bwa ge laa dɛɛ cha mɛ.
Aa were kɛŋɔ nɛn gel o gbo waa hiaoh. A chɛ kɛ o gel o dɔŋ ge kɛrɛdɛ doe hiaoh.
Dɛ ba dɛ yog ola ol yogribɔr aa, yawɛ dɛ di. Bɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ ane ken aa were. Hé yawɛ di,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ "Korowiirii dɔ harɛ ne komɛlbwa aa lɔ o ta."
Dɛ nɛn waa wola asɔre te ɛɛ yerɛ ŋɔ hé ba di kwaa he sɛh aa, kondikwaa bɛlbwa waa tɛɛ la, bɛ dɛɛ lii ŋɔ a ken aa were kɛŋɔ he di. Lɛ dɛ di.
Kɛ dɛ nomɛl ŋɔ he be ŋɔ vogee ba kwaa, a kondikwaa yaa, naate waa bagle gɛ waa nɔ ŋɔ he bɛ di la nyu bini liire nomanta bɛ di, asɛ o bɛ ba lii kɛŋɔ he ɛ wechɔga.
A ta wechɔga ɛɛ tɛɛ. Naate la waa n ŋɔ he bɛ di la, asɛ o liire bɛ on aahna-aahna ɛ. Ɛrɛɛ mɛɛ ba nomɛl nyu bini liire waa koeh dɛ gel waa maa dɛ ɛɔ?
Dɛ n jam Korowii kondikwaa maa dɛ ba dii wa aa, nomɛlbwa bɛ men pwah kɛ maa di a gɛ kwaa la.
Anomanta wobɛlbwaa hɛɛ ɛ oo, kwaa hɛɛ di oo, komɛlbwa hɛɛ nyɔ oo, hé ɛ dɛ kpɔ jirima dɛɛ tɛ Korowii.
He bɛ gel nomɛlbwa daŋre he ne dɛ ba nyogre. Juda tee yoo, nɛnhɔɔh waa wola Juda te ɛɛ yoo, asɔre tee yoo, he bɛ ba bini bɛlbwa gɛ ɛ.
Gɛɛ mɛɛ ɛ, ásɛ n waa lɛ nomɛlbwa sie. N gbo waa laa hiah mɛ. Nomɛlbwa ge waa hiah mɛ, gɛ maa ɛ dɛ won dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii ó lɛɛ ba.
Anomanta hé kpɔ n da gɛ maa kpɔ Yeesu da la.
N dɛ kpɛɛ heyaa liira haa dɛ lii n waa bwa wobɛlbwa ta, dɛɛ teŋɛ waa Korowii aa bag mɛ asɛ n ge bagle heyaa la ta.
N dɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristoo baa bɛlbwa nomoa, asɛ baa ɛ haah nomoa, Korowii ge ɛ Yeesu Kristo nomoa.
Baa bɛlbwa waa dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛɛ dɛ che Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta dɛɛ bol Korowii Wa, kɛ dɛ kpɔ kon bɔle o nyu la, waa duure kpɔe dɛɛ tɛ Yeesu Kristo.
Dɛ haah ge dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛɛ dɛ che Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta dɛɛ bol waa o ta kon kpɔe bɔle o nyu aa, waa duure kpɔe dɛɛ tɛ baa. O do kɛŋɔ nɛn baa fonɛ o nyu ken.
Dɛ waa sɛh dɛ kpɔ kon bɔle o nyu ta naa, amɔ te bá fonɛ o nyu ta. A ta magrɛ kɛ ba fonɛ o nyu ta ge aa, amɔ te ó kpɔ kon dɛɛ bɔle o nyu ta.
Aa were kɛŋɔ baa ge kpɔ kon bɔle o nyu, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o do gɛ Korowii aa doa dɛɛ bagle Korowii jirima. Kɛ haah te dɛ bagle baa jirima.
Haah bini laa baa le, haahnee le baa bini.
Haah waa laa Korowii ta baa, kɛ baa waa Korowii ta haah.
A gɛ waa nɔ ne nyundua toroma nyiŋa baa dɛ nyiŋi heyaa nomanta, a chɛ kɛŋɔ haah kpɔ kon dɛɛ bɔle o nyu á bagle kɛŋɔ baa dɔ kpegri o nɛ.
Asɔre tena waa bini te, baa ne haah bwa sie dawɛ dɔŋa nɛ.
Baa binii haah le mumpar la, kɛ taraken te haahnee dɛɛ lolɛ baa, asɛ Korowii ge ta komɛlbwa.
Hé bwa nyiŋi gɛ waa nɔ kɛrɛdɛ. A wer kɛŋɔ haah nɛɛ soŋe Korowii dɛ o ta kon kpɔe bole o nyu ta naa?
Gɛ Korowii aa ta baa la, o nyu mogɔ kohona naa, aa were. A ɛ sihiih.
Kɛ dɛ haah nyu mogɔ dɛ kpeg aa, a dɛ tɛo jirima wɛɛ do wer, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii tɛɛ ba nyumpona ŋɔ á tɔ ba nyuune ta.
Dɛ nomɛl dɛ tɔŋle gɛ waa nɔ naa, ó jemɛ kɛŋɔ gɛɛ ya ne asɔre tena bwa ɛɛ ɛ.
Waane ge lole maa wola heyaa kpɛɛ dɛɛ ba he be bola. He chemaa, he dɛ chɔg dɔŋa, haa dɔŋa cha.
Waa aa tɔ sie laanee kɛŋɔ, n noɔ kɛŋɔ dɛ he chemo dɛɛ soŋe Korowii aa, haa nyopɛo dɔ. N dɛ lii kɛŋɔ kpelaa ba ŋɔ.
Aa ba gɛɛ. Dɛ a ta gɛ balaa, nɛra aa won jemɛ banɔ la baa ɛ nɛndɛɛga he bini.
Gɛ he yon cheme dɛɛ di kwaa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn ta dɛɛ lii o waa la, o waa laa hɛɛ lii gɛ la.
He bini bane dɛ di gɛ kondikwaare la warane, haa chegɛ dɛɛ kpa he bala. Bane yon dɔ di dɛ nyɔ kohona dɛ berɛ dɛɛ dɛɛ, dɛ bane ta komɛlbwa dɔe dɛ́ di.
Ɛrɛ waa yɔ? He ta deremi dɔe dɛ́ so bela di kwaa kɛɛ? He dɛ fɛgre Korowii nɛra, dɛ gel sihiih ɛɛ kpo he bala baa nyaa. Ɛrɛɛ ń ɛ heya ɔ? Ń kpɛɛ heya aa? Akai.
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu bag mɛ waa nɔ n ge bagle heyaa kɛŋɔ o fa ɛ waane jwaana baa leo tɛ la. O kpɔ paanoo,
asɛ dɛ soŋe Korowii do o ta, dɛ kuugi o bini dɛ ŋɔ, "N bo-olii nɔ, n koh he waa dɛ kpɔ tɛ nɛra bá kpo mɛ. Hɛ́ɛ di gɛ paanoo nɔ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ lii mɛ."
Baa dia tomɛ la, o laa numol ne sen ane kpɔ, dɛ ŋɔ, "Sen nɔɔ chega dɛ tɛ n chal. Aa ɛ fɔofalee dɛ chɔ Korowii ne nɛwɛnyini baah ta. Hɛ́ɛ nyɔ dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ lii mɛ."
Ya Dɔɔ wobol nɔ dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ saŋ bɛlbwa haa di paanoo nɔ dɛ kpɔ numol nɔ nyɔ sen nɔ la, ya Dɔɔ seo waa hɛɛ bagle gɛ la, ka tel saŋ waa berɛ ba ja.
Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa di gɛ paanoo nɔ, dɛ kpɔ numol nɔ nyɔ sen nɔ, waa wola an a ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ la, dɛ Yeesu bo-ol ne o chalee o kpɔ doŋa dɛɛ lege la.
Nomɛlbwa chɛ kɛŋɔ o nyiŋi o waa bini kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛ di a gɛ kwaa nɔ.
Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ di gɛ kwaa nɔ o ta liire kɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ bo-olii yaa, amɔ dɛ o dɛ mugli Korowii baah dɛɛ do o te wahala ta.
A waa he galga ɛɛ we weela dɛɛ gwɛgre, asɛ bane gee serewe la.
Dɛ ya fe ɛɛ nyiŋi ya waa bini kɛrɛdɛ yaa, Korowii fe aa yaa bolchɔgee pa dɛ tɛr ya deŋne.
Ya Dɔɔ raa dɛ nyiŋi ya waa bini taraken nɔ, o dɛ tɛr ya deŋne ásɛ ya gel wechɔga ɛɛ, asɛ ya bɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire waa dɛ ba ban bolchɔge pae la nɛɛ ja.
Anomanta, yabala, he pɛo dɛɛ di a gɛ kwaa nɔ naa, he bɛ a dii dɛɛ too. Hé so dɛɛ kpa dɔŋa dɛ bwa cheme mɔɔ dɛɛ di.
Dɛ lɔr dɛ kpo bɛl aa, ó di kwaa dem mɔɔ dɛ ba. He bɛ ya Dɔɔ kwaa la di gɛ aa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ he dia. Gɛ laa, Korowii baah nɛɛ di he nɛɛ. Anɔ la aa kaa la, n balaa, mɛɛ bagle heyaa.
Yabala, n dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he jemɛ kpegri Korowii Domadɛɛge aa dɛ cha yaa ya dɔ la bini kɛrɛdɛ.
He na kɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ he faa wola Korowii tomɛ la, dɛ he nyogrɔ dɛɛ tomɛ voga aa wola waa bol, kɛ dɛ a dɔ kpegri he nɛɛ hɛɛ toma.

Anomanta n dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he jemɛ gɛ waa nɔ kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ bol waa Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ne la, waa won taah Yeesu. Nomɛlbwa ge waa dɛ bol ŋɔ Yeesuu ya Dɔɔ la, dɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegrii gela wɛɛ ŋɔ gɛ la.
Kpegri Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa cha nɛra ba dɔ la kogrɔ, kɛ Doma beŋkpoŋ laanee tɛ a bwa.
Toma ya Dɔɔ aa bɔna tɛ yaa la kogrɔ, kɛ Dɔɔ beŋkpoŋ tomaa yaa ɛ.
Wejema Korowii aa bɔna tɛ yaa la kogrɔ, kɛ Korowii beŋkpoŋii chegɛ ya bwa nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa.
Korowii Domadɛɛgee tɛ nomɛlbwa kpegri ŋɔ ó kpɔ dɛɛ cha o bala.
O tɛ nɛra bane wejema, dɛ tɛ bane ge sipila. O Doma beŋkpoŋ laanee tɛ ba bwa a gɛ kpegri la, bá won bol waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra,
dɛ gel bane che o kpegri la ta dɛ dɔ yarada kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ dɛ tɛ bane ge kpegri weela chaeh ta.

O tɛ bane kpegri ba won nyokpowaa ɛɛ, asɛ bane ge won che o kpegri la ta dɛ won bol Korowii Wa. O gelɔ bane won jemɛ kon la soo waa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ ba che o ta dɛɛ ɛ wa, dɛ gel bane ge won bol wobofala, asɛ dɛ gel bane ge won wobofala mun bagla dɛɛ bagle nɛra.
A gɛ waa nɔ bwa, Korowii Domadɛɛge beŋkpoŋ laanee tɛ nomɛlbwa kpegri o kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ gɛ la. Gɛ aa too o teaa o tɛ nomɛlbwa.
Hé ta sie nyiŋi he bwadabii na, o ɛ kombir, kɛ o dɔ pegra, asɛ a bwa pɛ dɛ ɛ bwadabii beŋkpoŋ. Gɛɛ Yeesu Kristo do.
Juda tena o, Grik tena o, yoma o, nɛra baa dɔ ba te noo, Korowii kpɔ o Domadɛɛge la sɔ ya bwa ne, asɛ ya ɛ beŋkpoŋ. O tentenee o gel ya bwa dɔ dɛ nyɔ do ya bini.
Nɛwɛnyini bwadabii ta konsiwi beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ. O pegra warɔ.
Dɛ he nakpala ŋɔ o ta nɔn ɛɛ nomanta o ta bwara ta jae yaa, dɛ nyosonee. O ta nɔn ɛɛ te, kɛ o ge ja bwadabii ta.
Dɛ deŋne ge ŋɔ o ta siwi ɛɛ nomanta o ta bwadabii ta jae yaa, dɛ nyosonee. O ta siwi ɛɛ, kɛ o ja bwadabii ta.
Dɛ bwadabii fe dɔ siwi gbo, deŋne ta jae yaa, ɛrɛɛ o fe ɛɛ ba waa noe yɔ? Dɛ bwadabii fe ɛ deŋne gbo o ta mee dɔe yaa, ɛrɛɛ o fe ɛɛ ba sɔɔh noe yɔ?
Gɛ laa Korowii ta yaa. O do bwadabii pegra nɔ bwa, bɛlbwa ne o dobɔr. Onee saahna ɛa gɛ.
Dɛ bwadabii fe ɛ konsiwi beŋkpoŋ gbo, pegra bɛlbwa toole o ta naa, o fe ɛ bwadabii aa? Akai.
Ya bwadabii pegra la kogrɔ, kɛ bwadabii la te ɛ kombeŋkpoŋ.
Siwi aa won ŋɔ nɔn be ŋɔ, "He ta n nɛɛ jae yaa, n gbo ɛɛ wonoo ɛ toma." Gɛɛ nyu ge aa wola won ŋɔ nakpala be ŋɔ, "He ta n nɛɛ jae yaa, n gbo ɛɛ wonoo ɛ toma."
Bwadabii bobɛla yaa wola lii kɛŋɔ a kpegri la dɔ tɔnɔ.
Bwadabii bobɛla yaa wola lii kɛŋɔ a wer laanee yaa nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ. Anɔ la sihiih aa dɛ kpo yaa a waa yaa wola nyin kɛŋɔ nɛn na la, anee yaa tɔ a ta kɛrɛdɛ.
Anɔ la aa wera te, a ta hiaih kɛŋɔ ya nyiŋi a ta kpa. Gɛɛ Korowii ɛ ya bwadabii ásɛ yaa heeh a gɛ bɔra yaa wola lii kɛŋɔ a waa hiaoh la.
Korowii ɛa gɛ asɛ bwadabii la bini bɛ pegri, asɛ a bwa ɛɛ cha dɔŋa.
Dɛ bwadabii bobɛl dɔ weela aa, dɛ bwadabii bwaa weela lawɛ la. Dɛ ba kpɛɛ bwadabii bobɛl aa, a dɛ do bwadabii la bwa som.
He bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ Yeesu Kristo bwadabii ta. He bwa pɛo dɛ ɛ o bwadabi.

Korowii tɛ he bɛlbwa toma waa dɛɛ ɛ asɔre tena bini. Anɔ la aa tɔ sie, o ŋɔ bane ɛ Yeesu toroma; nɛɛ, dɛ ŋɔ báne che Korowii kpegri ta dɛɛ bol waa waa kpɔa bag ba; tooro, dɛ kpɔ bane ŋɔ báa bagle nɛra o wa, dɛ berɛ kpɔ bane ge ŋɔ báa ɛ nyokpowa, dɛ tɛ bane ge kpegri ŋɔ báa chah weela tena. Dɛ ŋɔ báne ɛɛ cha nɛra, báne ɛ nomonome dɛɛ tɔ nɛra sie, dɛ gel bane ge won wobofala bola.
He bwaa ɛ Yeesu toroma aa? He bwaa won Korowii kpegri la ta chega dɛ bol wa aa? He bwaa won Korowii waa la bagla aa? He bwaa won nyokpowaa ɛɛ yaa?
He bwaa won weela tena chaeh yaa? He bwaa won wobofala bola aa? He bwaa won wobofala mun bagla aa?
Hé gel he sie begre asɛ hɛɛ nyin kpegri Korowii Domadɛɛge be ásɛ dɛ won cha nɛra ŋwɛnɛre aa wera kohona la ta. Mɛɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ waa wera gwaa a bwa.
Dɛ n wono dɛɛ bol nɛra bwa ne nyundua toroma wobol, kɛ dɛ maa nɛn nyin aa, dɛ gbɔgaa mɛɛ do kɛŋɔ baa dɛ lɔ dawuro waa pera wɛɛ do gbɔga la.

Hale n wono che Korowii kpegri la ta dɛɛ bol o waa la kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ jemɛ o wesɔɔhla bwa, dɛ dɔ sipila kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ che o kpegri la ta dɛ dɔ yarada dɛ́ won ŋɔ bwejen be ó chugri le o bug ta dɛ kaa bofale asɛ o chugri, dɛ maa nɛn nyin aa, dɛ n ta nɛn ɛɛ.
Dɛ n wono kpɔ n komɛlbwa kɛ nyaara bá lɛ di, asɛ n berɛ koh Yeesu waa la waa dɛ sɛh ŋɔ mɛɛ geloo ba kpɔ nii fuuh mɛ, dɛ maa nɛn nyin aa, dɛ a ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
Dɛ nɛn dɛ nyin nɛn aa, o dɔ bambile dɛɛ tɛ o bala, dɛɛ ɛɛ ba kɛrɛdɛ. Waa bɔweela ɛ. Waa o te nɛnjen yerɛ. Waa o te bagle.
Waa waa sagasaga ɛ o bala be. Waa o gbo nyin, o dɛ nyin nomɛlbwa. O baah naa nɛra nɛɛ di warawara. Waa nɛn waa lɛɛ dɛɛ do o bini.
Kasinteŋii dɛɛ lɛ o sie. O sie aa wechɔga ta lɛ.
Dɛ nɛn dɛ nyin nɛn aa, wɛɛ pwɛr o tenee tɛo wobɛlbwa ta. O dɛ yaradao wobɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ ta, dɛ dɔ hwɛga ne bambile wobɛlbwa ta.
Nɛnnyin ta jaga dɔe. Korowii waa baa chegɛ o kpegri ta dɛɛ bol bwa ɛɛ tonɔɔ tɔpebɛl wee. Wobofala baa chegɛ Korowii kpegri ta dɛɛ bol bwa ɛɛ teŋoo tɔpebɛl wee. Wejema gee ba tonɔɔ.
Ya waa yaa jema la ta jema bɛl ɛɛ, waa yaa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge ta dɛɛ bol la gba ta bola bɛl ɛɛ.
Anɔ la aa wera ka tonɛ la saŋ telaa, tama yaa dɔa taraken nɔ bwa ɛɛ tonɔɔ.
Gɛ saŋ n faa ɛ bechala la, dɛ n dɛ bol bechawobol, dɛɛ ɛ bechawa, dɛɛ lii bechaliire. Kɛ maa baa kpeg dɛ ɛ nomoa la, n gel n bechawaa la bwa.

Gɛ tentenee ya waa do taraken. A do kɛŋɔ yaa dɛ nyiŋi digi waa wola na kɛrɛdɛ ta ken. Dɛ tɔpere bɛl telaa, yaa naa kɛrɛdɛɛ kɛŋɔ a chɔ ya sie. Anɔ la bwa yaa jema taraken nɔ, anjena ta lɔ mun ta. Kɛ tɔpere la telaa, mɛɛ jemɛ wobɛlbwa gɛ Korowii aa jem mɛ la.
Anomanta webele atoroo lole, yarada, hwɛga ne nɛnnyin. Kɛ nɛnnyinii gwaa a bwa.

Hé gel he sie begre nɛnnyin ta, asɛ dɛɛ nyin kpegri waa lɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la be dɛ́ kpɔ dɛɛ cha nɛra. Kɛ kpegri háa swɛɛ siwi dɛ nyin kohona laanee kɛŋɔ he won che Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛɛ bol o wa,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ naate waa dɛ bol wobofala la, nɛra laa o bol dɛɛ tɛ. Korowiirii o bol dɛɛ tɛ. O chegɛ Korowii kpegri ta dɛɛ bol waa aa sɔah. Nɛra aa a waa no.
Naate waa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la ta dɛɛ bol waa la te bolɔ dɛɛ bagle nɛra dɛɛ cha ba bá jemɛ Korowii Wa. O dɛ do ba gbemba dɛɛ larawe ba bwara.
Nɛn waa dɛ bol wobofala la, o bolɔ dɛɛ tɛ o gbagba. Naate waa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛɛ bol Korowii Waa la ge, asɔre tena la bwaa wɛɛ cha.

Dɛ he bwa won wobofala bola aa, n dɛ nyin gɛ. Kɛ dɛ he won Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta chega dɛ bol wa aa, gɛɛ dɛ do n som kohona. Naate waa dɛ bol Korowii Waa la gwaa nɛn waa dɛ bol wobofala, atane kɛ nomɛl won a mun bagla dɛɛ tɛ asɔre tena á cha ba.

Yabala, dɛ n ba he be dɛ baa bol wobofala dɛ haa a mun no aa, tɔnɔ besoo he dɔ le n be nɔ? Dɛ n ta Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri la ta chegɛ dɛ dɔ waa aa sɔah dɛ bagle heyaa, kɛɛ dɛ n ta wejema ane dɔe, kɛɛ maa Korowii nyoa wobol kɛɛ o ŋwɛnɛre bagla jemaa, tɔnɔ besoo hé dɔ le n be nɔ?
Hé ta sie na kwaa baa dɛ hɛlɛ a ne. Dɛ a sii aa chɔ kɛrɛdɛ naa, ɛrɛɛ nɛra ɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ no a bini nɔ?
Dɛ ba dɛ hoh laa bɛla ásɛ nɛra no dɛ ka yo, dɛ baa on hoh kɛrɛdɛ naa, umee dɛ won jemɛ dɛ kpɔ o te nɔ?
Gɛɛ a do, dɛ he wobol bini noe kpegri aa, ɛrɛɛ baa ba ɛɛ dɛ no a mun ɔ? A do kɛŋɔ he gbo aa soga dɛɛ do gbɔga.
Harɛ nɔ ta wobol warɔ, a bwa ge ɛ nɛra bane wobol dɛ dɔ mun.
Anomanta nɛn dɛ bol waa maa a mun no aa, dɛ n berɛ deŋnebire te naate be. Dɛ o ge aa n kon no aa, o ge berɛ deŋnebire te n be.
He siwi aa begra hɛɛ nyin kpegri Korowii Domadɛɛge be ó cha heyaa Korowii toma ta nɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyin anɔ la aa won cha asɔre tena kohona.
Naate waa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛɛ bol wobofala la, ó soŋe Korowii ásɛ o chao o won dɛɛ bagle a mun.
Dɛ n dɛ soŋe Korowii wobofale ne naa, dɛ n lilewee dɛɛ soŋo la, kɛ n liire te aa wobɛlbwa ɛ.
Amee jaɔ? Mɛɛ soŋe Korowii n lileo nee, asɛ dɛɛ soŋo n liire ge ne. Mɛɛ kpɔ n lilewee go yela, dɛ kpɔ n liire ge go ja.

Dɛ gɛ laa aa, he dɛ jam Korowii he lileo ne naa, ɛrɛɛ naate waa wola yarada dɛ ɛ nɛmpɛɛ la ɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ no a mun dɛ sɛh he nyoa ŋɔ "Aamen" dɛ teŋɛ waa haa jaamo a waa la ta nɔ? Waa won no waa haa dɛ bol la mun.
He te jam Korowii kɛrɛdɛ kwaraa gba aa, a ta tɔnɔ dɔe tɛo.
N dɛ jam Korowii kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ waa gela n ge won wobofala bola, hale dɛ won a bola gwaa heyaa nɔ.
Kɛ dɛ n lɔ asɔre ta, dɛ bol n bwɛɛ wobol tama asɛ nɛra won no aa, a bɔ kɛŋɔ maa kpɔ wobofala bol waa kohona nɛra ta a mun noɛ.
Yabala, hé gel bechaliire. A chɛ kɛŋɔ he dɔ nomonliire. Wechɔga ɛɛ te, hé ɛ he te bechasɔɔhne a bɔr. He bɛ gel he liire kpeg wechɔga ɛɛ ta.
Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ geloo nɛra nɔ no n waa wobofala ta. Hɔɔhraa mɛɛ ba gela ba bol bag ba, kɛ baa no. Korowiirii ŋɔa."

Anomanta Korowii gelɔ nɛra ɛɛ bol wobofala dɛɛ bagle o kpegri dɛɛ tɛ nɛra baa wola on yarada. Nɛra baa dɛ yaradao la waa laa. O waa bagla Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta la, banɔ la baa dɛ yaradao la waa.
Dɛ asɔre tena chemo, asɛ bɛlbwa ɛɛ bol wobofale, asɛ nɛra baa wola yarada dɛ ɛ nɛmpɛɛne ba ja he nɛ aa, baa ŋɔ he dɛ we chogla aa?

Kɛ dɛ he bwa chemo dɛ che Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri la ta dɛɛ bol o wa, asɛ nɛn waa wola yarada dɛ ɛ nɛmpɛɛ ba ja aa, wɛɛ noo dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ o dɛ ɛ wechɔga. Waa haa dɛ bol la bwa ɛɛ jo o nyu binii asɛ o nyoa kpo.
O tea bini waa bwa ɛɛ chɔ baŋee, asɛ o guŋi Korowii harɛ dɛ soŋo, asɛ dɛ ŋɔ nɛra be ŋɔ Korowii ja he nɛɛ kpela.

Yabala, amee jaɔ? Saŋ bɛlbwa haa cheme la, bɛl dɛ tɛ yel, bɛl dɔ sipila waa haa dɛ hwela, bɛl ge dɔ waane Korowii aa baglo, bɛl gee bol wobofala, bɛl gee bagle a mune. Hé gel waa haa dɛ ɛ la dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ nomɛlbwa.
Nɛra baa dɛ bol wobofala la, hé gel ba ɛ nɛra banɛ kɛɛ batoro gbo. A chɛ kɛ ba bol kaa tɛ dɔŋa, asɛ bɛl gee bagle a mun ásɛ nɛra no gɛ waa bola.
Dɛ nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won bagle wobofale la mun aa, amɔ te náate waa ira dɛ fee bol waa la tɔ nyoa dɛ so. Kɛ o ne Korowii ɛɛ bol waa o bambile bini.
Nɛra baa dɛ ba Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta chega dɛ bol o waa la, hé gel ba ɛ banɛ ne batoro gbo, asɛ ba kar la so dɛɛ no ba be, dɛɛ pese waa la kɛrɛdɛ.
Dɛ bɛl sogo Korowii Domadɛɛge baglo waane aa, a chɛ kɛ naate waa dɛ bol waa la tɛo bɔr ó bol.
Hé bwa ɛɛ bol Korowii waa beŋkpoŋa beŋkpoŋa ásɛ a dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ he bwa, dɛ do heyaa gbemba.
Nɛra Korowii Domadɛɛge aa tɛɛ ba kpegri bá bol o waa la, ba won ba te lawa,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii aa wesagasagare nyin. Deŋnesɔɔhnaa wɛɛ nyin. Gɛ baa dɛ ɛ asɔrere ta bobɛlbwa laanee.
He dɛ ɛ asɔre aa, hé gel haahna hel. A ta magrɛ kɛŋɔ baa bol waa bela. Gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla la, hé ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ báa no he baala la be.
Dɛ haahna la dɛ nyin waane bɔɔra aa, bá la dem mɔɔ dɛ ka bɔɔ ba jaranar. A ta magrɛ kɛŋɔ haah bol waa asɔre dea bela.
He bee Korowii waa la che dɛ ba naa? He gboo no waa la aa?
He banɔ la haa dɛ bol ŋɔ he won Korowii kpegri ta chega dɛ bol o waa la, kɛɛ he dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la la, hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ waa maa chwera ba tɛ heyaa la ɛ Korowii mmara.
Nomɛlbwa waa wola nyin kɛŋɔ o no la, hé gelo.
Yabala, hé gel he sie begre hɛɛ nyin kpegri Korowii be ásɛ dɛ won kpɔ bol o wa, dɛ bɛ banɔ la baa dɛ bol wobofala la ŋwɛnɛ tɔ.
Hɛ́ɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa ŋwɛnɛ aa magra ta dɛ bɛ wesagasagare dɛɛ ɛ.
Yabala, hé gel n lii heyaa Amanesoma la n faa bola bagle heyaa asɛ he no dɛ taa teŋɛ a ta,

asɛ a lɛ heyaa la wa. Dɛ yarada haa dɔa Amanesoma la ta la ɛ kpela, he ta an vɛɛh dɛ kpoŋe a bini kɛrɛdɛ gɛ maa bagle heyaa la te naa, amɔ te a lɛ heya. Dɛ gɛ laa te naa, amɔ dɛ he yarada la ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
Gɛ Korowii aa bag mɛ laanee n bagle heyaa la. O bagle waane aa ɛ wejena kɛŋɔ gɛ Yeesu aa koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ sewɛ gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagle o waa mɔɔ a ɛ la.
Ba hugo, asɛ a tɔpetooro wee la Korowii iru seo ta. Gɛɛ Korowii Tɔn bagle mɔɔ a ɛ.
Pitaa tɔ sie nao, mɔɔ o habɔteŋra fi dɛ banɛ la bwa nao,
mɔɔ o habɔɔ nɛra lafraanue la ge nao kerabeŋkpoŋ. Ba galga ta lole ba le fini, bane ge serewe.
A habɔɔ la Jems nao, asɛ Yeesu toroma bwa nao.
Menee ka mun nao. N do kɛŋɔ bechala o nya aa kpoŋe o tea o ta beɛ kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ ba lolɔ la.
Menee Yeesu toroma la bwa bechala n waa aa wola hiaih. N ta chɛɛ kwaraa kɛ ba yer mɛ o torome, dɛkalkɛ gɛ n faa hah asɔre tena dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa la aa were.

Kɛ Korowii sune n nɛ, dɛ cha mɛ. Chae waa cha mɛ laanee gela n do gɛ maa doa nɔ la. O suna waa sune n nɛɛ la ta pɛɛ ɛɛ. N iro, asɛ dɛɛ ɛ o toma la kohona hale dɛ gwaa n bala kwara. N gbagba kpegri ne laa mɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ. Korowiirii sune n nɛɛ dɛ cha mɛ, asɛ mɛɛ ɛa gɛ la.
Dɛ menee bol Amanesoma la bagle heya o, nɛra banee yoo, webeŋkpoŋii ya bwa ɛɛ bagle, anee he gee yarada.
Dɛ ya bagle Yeesu Kristo waa ŋɔ Korowiirii iru seo ta naa, ɛrɛɛ he bini bane berɛ dɛɛ ŋɔ Korowii aa nɛraa ir seo ta nɔɔ?
Dɛ Korowii aa nɛraa ir seo ta naa, amɔ te Yeesu gba ta seo ta ire.
Dɛ Korowii ta Yeesu Kristo ire seo ta te naa, amɔ te waa yaa dɛ bagle heyaa la, ne yarada haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la bwa ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
Dɛ gɛɛ te naa, amɔ te Korowii danseɛ yaa dɛ di la ta kasinteŋ ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya dɛ bagle heyaa ŋɔ Korowiirii ir Yeesu le seo ta. Dɛ nɛra aa seo taa ir te naa, amɔ ya teŋe nyosone.
Dɛ nɛra aa seo taa ir aa, amɔ te Korowii ta on ire seo ta.
Dɛ Korowii ta Yeesu Kristo ire seo ta naa, amɔ te he dɛ yaradao pɛɛpɛɛ, dɛ he wechɔga ta lɔ he nɛ.
A berɔ dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ nɛra ba faa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo mɔɔ dɛ serewe la, Korowii aa ban lɛ.
Dɛ ya soga yaa soga nɔ gbo taa ya dɔ hwɛga Yeesu Kristo be naa, amɔ te ya waa sum gwaa nɛra bwa wa.
Kɛ gɛ laa a do. Korowiirii ir Yeesu Kristo seo ta. Onee tɔ sie ir seo ta nɛra baa serewa la nɛɛ mɔɔ ba ge baa ir.
Nɛmbeŋkpoŋii ba seo ne. Nɛmbeŋkpoŋ gee ba seo ta ira ne.
Ya ne Adam bwa aa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la waa yaa serewe la. Gɛɛ a do ya banɔ la ge ne Yeesu Kristo aa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la ɛɛ ir seo taa dɛ dɔ mkpa.
Kɛ ya bwa ne ya tɔperaa ya ir. Yeesu Kristoo tɔ sie ir mɔɔ, ásɛ ya banɔ la ya ne waa ɛ beŋkpoŋ la ge ir gɛ saŋ waa ba ja la,
asɛ mɔɔ wobɛlbwa ba a jaga. A taa Yeesu Kristo dɔ kpegri dɛ pɔ konchɔga aa bea yaa wola an na bwa soosiwi nɛ, dɛ kpɔ kora la do o Mɛɛ Korowii nɔn ta ó di.
Yeesu Kristo chɛ kɛŋɔ o di kpegri komɛlbwa waa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta nɛɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ waa pɔ o dɔma bwa nɛ.
Dɛ o baa pɔ ba bwa nɛɛ tonaa, o dɔm muŋkaa waa pɔ o nɛɛ laanee seo.
Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii gelɔ o dɔ komɛlbwa kpegri." Dɛ ba ŋɔ, "O gelɔ o dɔ komɛlbwa kpegri" aa, a ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ o dɔ o Korowii waa dɔ kpegri la dɛ kpɔ tɛo o di la ge kpegri.
Dɛ Korowii baa ɛ gɛ tonaa, o Bie gee kpɔ o tenee do o Mɛɛ Korowii waa kpɔ komɛlbwa kpegri tɛo la lɔga, asɛ Korowii gbo ɛ kpegri bwa dɔɔ.
Nɛra bane chegɛ lala naa ta dɛ gel baa sɔ ba Korowii ne. Bɔkwa waa baa ɛ gɛ nɔɔ? Dɛ lala aa seo taa ir aa, bɔkwa waa gela ba gel ba ɛ gɛ dɛɛ tɛɛ baɔ?
Bɔkwa waa ya gee jo siswɛm waa ta saŋ bɛlbwa nɔɔ?
Yabala, kpelaa mɛɛ ŋɔ, dɛ maa siswɛm ta jo tɔpere bɛlbwa naa, amɔ te dɛ n laa yon dɛɛ kpɛɛ heyaa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ teŋa ta la.

Gɛ nɛra faa ɛɛ mɛ Ɛfesos la do kɛŋɔ n ne kpɔg bini olchɔga aa yoa ken. Dɛ harɛ nɔ ta waa gbo waa n ne ba yo aa, bɔkwa tɔnɔɔ n dɔ a ta nɔ? Dɛ nɛra aa seo taa iraa, ya fe ɛɛ ŋɔɔ hé gel ya ir dɛ di kwaa dɛ lɛ sie, dɛkalkɛŋɔ tɔpebɛl yaa sewɔɔ.
He bɛ gel nɛra ɛɛ negre heya. Danchɔge kpɔe dɛ chɔg dadɛɛge.
Anomanta hé ir dɛ gel he sie chɔ harɛ hɛɛ ɛ kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ bɛ wechɔga dɛɛ ɛ. He bini bane aa Korowii waa jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ. A ta sihiih ɛɛ tɛ heya aa?
He bini bɛl ɛɛ bɔɔroo ŋɔ, "Ɛrɛɛ lala ɛɛ ba wona ir seo ta nɔ? Ɛrɛɛ ba bwara ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?"
Gɛne! Komɛlbwa haa du la, o dɛ pɔh mɔɔ dɛ le.
Komɛlbwa haa du la, dɛ mea yoo, kon waa dɔ bii yoo, o papooni laa hɛɛ du. O bii hɛɛ du, asɛ o yon ɛ papooni dɛ le baŋ.
Korowiirii dɛɛ begra gɛ a bwa soosiwi aa doa gɛ waa dɛ nyin.
Bwadabii bwa ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ. A bwa ne a soosiwii. Nɛwɛnyini bwadabii korɛ ola kwaa ta. Asɛ pɛŋa ge kwaa korɛ jumbii kwaa ta.
Korowii doa kwaa lole, asɛ harɛ ta ge kwaa do le, kɛ a wer korɛ dɔŋa ta.
Wee wer korɛ korobie wer ta. Weweela ge wer korɔ. Hale weweela bini kwara, ane dɛ chaah gwaa ane.
Gɛɛ nɛra seo ta ira ɛɛ ba doe. Bwadabii yaa dɔa nɔ, dɛ ya baa serewe aa, o bwa ɛɛ chɔgoo, kɛ bwadabii yaa dɔ dɛ ir seo ta la, o te aa chɔg bwa.
Bwadabii yaa dɔa mɔɔ dɛ serewe la ɛɛ chɔgoo. O ɛ kompɛɛ baa hugo, kɛ Korowii ɛɛ leo seo taa asɛ o ɛ kondɛɛge. Kon baa hugo la aa kpegri bɛlbwa dɔ, kɛ Korowii ɛɛ iruu asɛ o do kpegri.
Bwadabii yaa dɔɔ harɛ nɔ ta laanee baa ba huga, kɛ onɔ la Korowii aa dɛ ba ira seo ta la te ɛɛ korɔɔ. Gɛ harɛ nɔ ta bwadabii aa lole la, gɛɛ Korowii doa kon ge do le.
Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Korowii ta nɛnlogle, dɛ yerɔ Adam, asɛ o dɔ mkpa dɛ do le." Kɛ muŋkaa Adam la te ɛ Korowii doa nɛn dɛɛ tɛ mkpa. Onee Yeesu Kristo.
Korowii doa bwadabii laa ya tɔ sie dɔ. Harɛ nɔ ta konee ya tɔ sie dɔ mɔɔ dɛ dɔ Korowii doa kon la.
Nɛnlogle la, ba mao tee ne o ɛ harɛ nɛn. Asɛ nɛɛte la ge le nyundua.
Gɛ onɔ la baa mao tee ne faa doa la, gɛɛ o nɛra ge do. Asɛ gɛ onɔ la waa le nyundua aa doa la, gɛɛ o ge nɛra do.
Gɛ yaa le onɔ la waa le harɛ nɔ ta la, gɛɛ yaa ba onɔ la waa le nyundua la ge lee.
Yabala, hé gel n ŋɔ he be, harɛ nɔ ta bwadabii aa won la Korowii be. Kon waa dɛ pɔh la ne onɔ la waa wola pɔh aa won pɛ.
Hɛ́ɛ no, mɛɛ bagle heyaa wesɔɔhle bɛlee. Ya bwa laa dɛɛ ba serewa. Hale dɛ ya serewɔ oo, ya ta serewoo, Korowii ɛɛ begre ya bwa bwadabii kerabeŋkpoŋii.

Aa ɛo wɔrɔbe nɛɛ kilo, gɛ saŋ Korowii bɛla aa ba si dɛ bagle waa bwa jaga la. Dɛ o sio waa, Korowii ɛɛ ir serewa laanee seo ta asɛ ba dɔ bwadabii waa wola pɔh, dɛ begre ya banɔ la yaa wola sewɛ dɛ ta so le la bwara,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ɛ kpela kɛŋɔ bwadabii waa wola pɔh la chɛ kɛŋɔ o chig onɔ la waa dɛ pɔh la naa ta. A chɛ kɛŋɔ bwadabii waa wola sewɛ la chig onɔ la waa dɛ sewɛ la naa ta.
Dɛ onɔ la waa wola sewɛ, waa wola pɔh la baa chig onɔ la waa dɛ sewɛ dɛɛ pɔh la naa ta naa, belaa waa baa chwera do Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛɛ ba kpela ɛɛ. Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "O kpɔ kpegri pɔ seo nɛ."
"Seo, lee he kpegri dɔɔ jaɔ? Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won dɛ do yaa weweele ta nɔ?"
Wechɔgaa gela seo ɛɛ do yaa weweele ta. Mmara yaa wola o ta teŋɛ la ge gelɔ seo dɔ kpegri ya nɛ.
Korowii chɛ jam kohona. O tɛ yaa kpegri dɛ le ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo be ásɛ ya pɔ seo nɛ.
Anomanta, yabala maa dɛ nyin he wa, hé lawɛ waa la bini kiŋkiŋ dɛ bɛ gel wobɛlbwa ha heyaa asɛ he berɛ habɔɔ. Hé lawɛ ya Dɔɔ toma bini bambile bwa ne, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he koeh aa pɛɛ ɛɛ ba.
A ka suuga yaa dɛ nyin ya ta tɛ Korowii nɛra la. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ n faa ŋɔ asɔre tena baa lɔ Galaasia harɛ ta be ŋɔ báa ɛ la.
Kwasiara bɛlbwa, hé bini bɛlbwa ɛɛ kpɔ suuga, gɛ bɛlbwa waa wona dɛ le anɔ la Korowii aa chao o dɔ la ta, dɛ kpɔ cheg. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ, asɛ n balaa, he bɛ suuga dɛɛ ta kpa.
Dɛ n balaa, mɛɛ chwerɛ tɔnee dɛ kpɔ tɛ nɛra haa dɛ yarada ba, dɛ tom ba bá kpɔ a ne kwaa haa tɛ Korowii nɛra la la Jerusalam.
Dɛ a chɛ kɛ n ne ba la naa, mɛɛ tɔ ba siee ya la.
N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n la Makidoonia harɛ ta. Dɛ n baa le bela aa, mɛɛ ba he bee,
dɛ ba so he be dɛ bigri tama. N ken ɛɛ so he bee alalawo saŋ, ásɛ alalawo saŋ kaa mɔɔ he ta mɛ ŋwɛnɛ n kaa bela bwa maa dɛ nyin.
Dɛ n ŋɔ mɛɛ ba na heyaa tarakenii yaa, maa won bigri he be. Kɛ dɛ Korowii sɛoh n ba won ba naa, mɛɛ bigri he bee.
Mɛɛ so Ɛfesos bonɔɔ ka tel kɛŋɔ tɔpejen Pɛntekɔs la aa tel,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ n dɔ bɔr bonɔ dɛ́ won ɛ Korowii toma kohona asɛ a le tɔnɔ dɛ tɛo. Nɛra baa dɛ nyin ba tɔ n toma ŋwɛnɛ la warɔ te.
Timoti ba he be naa, hé lɛo kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ o sie lɛ. Korowii toma maa dɛ ɛ la, anee o gee ɛ.
Anomanta he bɛ o sie lawɛ tegɛ harɛ. Hé doo ŋwɛnɛ ásɛ o kpɔ bambisɔɔhna dɛ berɛ ba n be. N dɛ nyiŋi o ne yabala la ŋwɛnɛ.
N soŋe ya dɔŋ Apolos ŋɔ o ja yabala la nɛɛ ba ba he be, kɛ a ta o som doe kɛ ó la bela taraken. Dɛ o baa dɔ bɔr aa, wɛɛ bao.
Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ asɛ dɛ ta lawɛ waa la bini kiŋkiŋ. Hé dɔ bambile asɛ dɛ gel lawa haa lawɛ waa la bini la do kpegri.
Hé kpɔ nɛnnyin dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛɛ tɛ nɛra.
Yabala, he jemɔ kɛŋɔ Stɛfanas ne o dem tenaa tɔ sie yarada Yeesu waa la Akaaya harɛ nɛra la bwa bini dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛ ɛ toma dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɛra.
Anomanta n dɛ soŋe heya, hɛ́ɛ no nomɛlbwa waa do ken ne nɛra baa ja ba nɛɛ dɛɛ koh toma nɔ ta la deŋna wa.
Stɛfanas ne Fɔtonaatos ne Akaikus balɔ, asɛ a do n som taeh, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he gbabir ta wone ba ásɛ n na heya, kɛ ba chig he naa ta dɛ ba,
dɛ ba do mɛ gbemba taeh, dɛ do he ge gbemba. Hɛ́ɛ duu nɛra baa do ken nɔ.
Asɔre tena baa lɔ Eesia harɛ la dɛ na heyaa taeh. Akwela ne Presela ne asɔre tena baa dɛ cheme ba dem la ge dɛ na heyaa Yeesu sɔn ta.
Yabala bwa baa lɔ bonɔ dɛ na heya. Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nyabii.
Men Pɔɔl gbagbaa bol waa nɔ ba chwerɛ, asɛ n gbabir ge chwerɛ anɔ aa kaa nɔ. N dɛ na heya.
Nomɛlbwa waa wola ya Dɔɔ nyin la, Korowii nyotaahna lɔ o nɛ. Ya Dɔɔ, ba!
Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya.
He nɛra he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, n dɛ na heyaa n bambile bwa ne. Aamen.

Men Pɔɔl aa too Korowii tea asɛ o lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome la, n ne ya dɔŋ Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Ya chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ asɔre tena baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii Kɔrent, ne Korowii nɛra bwa baa lɔ Akaaya harɛ ta.
Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
Hé gel ya jam ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii. Onee ya Mɛɛ waa dɛ sune ya nɛɛ kohona, dɛ ɛ Korowii waa wona dɛɛ larawe nɛn bwara.
On dɛɛ larawe ya bwara ya wenaale bwa ta, ásɛ ya ge won che bambisɔɔhna waa tɛ yaa la ta dɛɛ larawe yabala baa lɔ wenaale bɛlbwa soosiwi ta la bwara.
Gɛ yaa ja Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ na wahala kohona la, gɛ tentenee a che o nɛɛ ya dɔ bɔlarawa ge kohona.

Dɛ ya dɛ na wahala aa, he chae waa yaa naa ásɛ dɛ won larawe he bwara, asɛ Korowii won lɛ heya. Dɛ Korowii berɔ larawe ya bwara ge aa, dɛ he chae waa o ɛ gɛ, ásɛ ya won cha heya, he won lawɛ bambile gɛ saŋ haa ba na ya wahala yaa naa la dɔŋ la.
Anomanta, ya hwɛga yaa dɔa he nɛɛ la aa pɛɛ ɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ haa dɛ na ya wahala la dɔŋ nɔ, gɛɛ hɛɛ ba ya bɔlarawa Korowii aa ba tɛ yaa la ane dɔe.
Yabalawa, ya dɛ nyin he jemɛ wahala yaa naa Eesia harɛ la wa. Dɛ a kan dɛ gwaa ya nɛɛ kohona. Dɛ yaa lii kɛŋɔ yaa le a nyoa bokpega binii.
Ya te fe jemɔ kɛŋɔ yaa sewɔɔ, kɛ ya ta sewɛ. Korowiirii ɛa gɛ asɛ ya bɛ ya gbagba bokpega ta dɛɛ hwɛgɛ, asɛ dɛ kpɔ hwɛga do on waa dɛ ir nɛra seo ta la nɛ.
O lɛ yaa le siswɛm a fe aa chɛ kɛ ya sewɛ a ta la ta. O ta dɛ lɛ yaa. Ya kpɔ ya sie dawɛ o nɛɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ teŋɔɔ dɛɛ lɛ yaa.
Hé cha yaa dɛɛ soŋe Korowii, asɛ dɛ o baa no he wesoŋa dɛ cha yaa aa, nɛra won kpɔ jam tɛo pirim dɛ tɛ yaa kɛŋɔ waa no nɛndamanta wesoŋa baa soŋa tɛ yaa la.

Webeŋkpoŋii gela ya baŋa pa. Anee kɛŋɔ yaa wonoo ŋɔ bambile bwa ne kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa yaa ɛa harɛ bonɔ la, tepoŋ ne bambile bwa nee ya ɛa Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta, a laa kɛ waa yaa ɛa he be la. Korowiirii sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa ya ɛa. Harɛ bonɔ wejema ne laa ya ɛa.
Waa yaa chwerɛ heyaa asɛ he kure dɛ no a mun la, anee ya chwerɛ. Wobɛlbwa toole a bini he no a mun kahonɛ.
Taraken haa jemɛ ya waa tama nɔ, n dɛ lii kɛŋɔ hɛɛ jemɛ ya waa bwaa, ásɛ awola ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa ba la, he baŋa pa ya waa kɛŋɔ ya baŋa aa pa he waa la.
Maa jemɛ he waa ken la, a waa n faa ɛ kɛ mɛɛ ba cha heyaa kera anɛ bwaa la.
N fa ɛo kɛ n Makidoonia harɛ kaala ta la, ń kpɔ he be, asɛ n le bela dɛɛ ba ge aa, ń ba so he be tama, asɛ he ta mɛ ŋwɛnɛ n kaa Judia harɛ.

Maa lii ken la, dɛ n le nɛn o liire aa dɛ ɛo aahna-aahna kɛɛ? N dɛ magle magla aa, n gbo kɛrɛdɛɛ mɛɛ nyiŋi kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyina aa dɛ ɛ, asɛ a wer tɛ mɛ naa, n ŋɔ ɔɔh, asɛ bug ta n berɔ na kɛ aa were tɛ mɛ naa, n ŋɔ ɔɔhɔ kɛɛ?
N nyoa maa bagɛ heyaa la, aahna-aahna toole a ta. A ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ Korowii wa aa ɛ kasinteŋ nyosone aa wola toole a ta la.
Korowii Bie Yeesu Kristo la n ne Silvanos ne Timoti aa bagle o waa he be la dɔ kasinteŋ. O ta dɔe kɛŋɔ o ŋɔ ɔɔh, dɛ berɛ le habɔɔ dɛ ŋɔ ɔɔhɔ. O te bol wa aa, dɛ o bolɔ.
Nyoo bwa Korowii aa baga la, Yeesu nɛɛ ya che dɛ jemɛ kɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ. O waa ya won Aamen la sii, asɛ Korowii won dɔ sɔn.
Korowiirii gela ya ne he bwa won lawɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ teŋa la kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ le yaa tɛ o toma,
dɛ do yaa nso aa bagle kɛ onee dɔ yaa, dɛ tɛ yaa o Domadɛɛge la wɛɛ so ya nɛ, asɛ ya che a ta dɛ jemɛ waa bwa waa ɛa cheg yaa.
Korowii waa jemɛ n nyu bini bwa la, onee n danseɛ te waa nɔ ta. N faa wola Kɔrent balɛ la, maa nyin kɛ n ba chɛgre heyaa he wechɔga waa asɛ he bambile chɔg, a waa n ta balɛ.
Kpegri laa yaa bagle heyaa he Korowii yaradae ta. Yaa gɛ lii kwaraa. Ya jemɔ kɛ he chegɔ kiŋkiŋ he yarada ta. Ya dɛ nyin kɛ ya cha heyaa ásɛ he sie lɛ.
Anomanta, n ɛ n liire kɛŋɔ maa he bee ba asɛ dɛ ba gel he tea bini chɔg kpa.
N gelɔ he tea bini chɔg aa, umee dɛ lar mɛ bwara jaɔ? Nɛn toole, nemenɛ he tenten maa chɔg he tea bini la.
A waa n chwerɛ heyaa tɔn la la. Dɛ maa nyin kɛ he nɛra haa chɛ kɛ he gel n sie lɛ la, n ba he be asɛ he berɛ ba ɛɛ mɛ tebinichɔg wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n jemɛ he bwa waa kɛ n silɛɛ he silɛɛ.
Tɔn la n faa chwerɛ heyaa la, dɛ a dɛ we n nɛɛ taeh, asɛ n tea bini chɔg mɛɛ wi siniire dɛɛ chwerɔ. N fa ta on chwerɛ dɛ́ gel he tea bini chɔg, kɛ n chwerɔ ásɛ he na gɛ del maa dɛ nyin he bwa.
Nɛn o faa ba tebinichɔg ne la, n gbo tea bini laa o chɔg. He bwa tea binii o chɔg ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ta. Maa nyin kɛ n do naate siswɛm, a waa n bola ken la.
Gɛ he kɛrɛdɛ nyoa aa pɛa he tɛr naate deŋne nɔ, a magrɔ. He bɛ ane ɛ ja kpa.
A chɛ kɛ he kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo name, dɛɛ doo gbemba. Gɛ laa, o tea bini chɔgɔ kohona aa, wɛɛ horɔɔ.
Anomanta, n dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ he gel o jemɛ kɛŋɔ he dɛ nyinu kohona.
Maa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n ɛ heyaa dɛ na kɛŋɔ hɛɛ no n waa ta wobɛlbwa taa kɛɛ haa no la, a waa n chwerɛ heyaa tɔn la la.
Nomɛlbwa haa kpɔ o wechɔga kɛo la, n ge kpɔɔ kɛo. Nomɛl ɛɛ mɛ waane a chɛ kɛ n kpɔ kɛo waa, n koh he waa dɛ kpɔ kɛo Yeesu Kristo siwi ta,
asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ ŋwɛnɛ ba dɔ dɛ chɔg ya wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya jemɛ o ŋwɛnɛre waa kpɔa dɛɛ negre nɛn.
Maa baa tel Troas ŋɔ n bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la la, n nao kɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ pili ŋwɛnɛ tɛ mɛ kɛ n ɛ toma bela.
Kɛ maa wola ya dɔŋ Taetos ka pue bela la, n baah ta men sɔɔhnɛ. Anomanta n kal bela tena dɛ kaa Makidoonia harɛ.
Korowii jam kɛ waa chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ gel ya yo dɛɛ le nɔ. Korowii chegɛ ya nɛɛ dɛ gel nɛra ɛɛ no Yeesu Kristo waa la bobɛlbwa kɛŋɔ konsɔɔhsoma sɔɔh aa dɛ le nomɛlbwa ɛɛ no la.
Yeesu Kristo gelɔ ya ɛ konsɔɔhsoma Korowii be, ásɛ nɛra Korowii aa dɛ lɛɛ ba, ne banɔ la baa nyogre ŋwɛnɛ dɛɛ ba chɔga ta bwa ɛɛ no ya sɔɔh.
Banɔ la baa dɛ nyogre la ɛɛ no sɔɔh laanee dɛ serewe, asɛ banɔ la Korowii aa dɛ lɛɛ ba la ge no dɛ dɔ mkpa. Umee dɛ won ɛ gɛ toma nɔ nɔ?
Nɛra kɛrɛdɛ kpɔ Korowii waa la berɛ bona dii dɛ yog dɛɛ di. Ba laa yan. Korowiirii tɛ yaa waa nɔ ŋɔ yáa bola, asɛ yaa bola o siwi ta bambile bwa ne, pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.
Yaa dɛ ŋɔ ken nɔ, kpɛɛraa yaa kpɛɛ ya te ja kɛɛ? A hiaoh kɛŋɔ ya kpoŋe tɔne aa bagle ya nɛnsoo ne gɛ ya toma aa doa mɔɔ he lɛ yaa aa? Kɛɛ a hiaoh kɛ ya dɔ ane le he be asɛ nɛra won yarada yaa aa?
He gbagbaa ya tɔn waa dɛ bagle tondɛɛga yaa ɛa. Ya bambile taa Korowii chwerɛ, asɛ nomɛlbwa na heyaa dɛɛ pese heyaa kɛŋɔ nɛn aa dɛ kure tɔn la.
He we-ɛɛla dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he ɛ Yeesu Kristo tɔn waa chegɛ ya nɛɛ dɛ chwerɛ. Iŋki ne laa o chwerɔ, Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa la Domadɛɛgee o kpɔ chwerɔ. Bwe ta laa o chwerɔ, bambile taa o chwerɔ.
Ya won gɛ bola, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya chegɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛɛ yarada Korowii a gɛ waa nɔ ta.
A ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ ya dɛ lii kɛŋɔ ya won waane ɛɛ ya gbagba kpegri ta. Korowii bee ya dɔ kpegri dɛɛ ɛ anɔ la bwa yaa dɛ ɛ.
Korowii gelɔ ya won dɛɛ ɛ o fɔofale la toma. A gɛ fɔofale nɔ ta mmara baa chwera waa ɛɛ, Korowii Domadɛɛge waa. Mmara baa chwera la dɛ ba seo ne, kɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la te dɛ ba mkpa ne.

Bwe taa Korowii faa chwerɛ Mosis Mmara la dawɛ. Bela Korowii aa kpɔ Mmara la tɛ Mosis la, Korowii jirima ba bela, bela bwa chaah, dɛ chaah Mosis nɛɛ o sie bɔr ɛɛ nyɛgle. Mosis aa la Israel tena be la, dɛ nyɛgla o sie bɔr aa dɛ nyɛgle la nyoa sɔɔhnɔ tonɛ. Kɛ Israel tena aa nao la, ba ŋɔ o sie bɔr dɛ nyɛgle kohona to, ba ta wone nyiŋu. Mosis Mmara kwara waa dɛ la nɛn ne seo ta la wono ba jirima nɔ dɔŋ ne naa,
dɛ ɛrɛɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la wa ɛɛ ba doe yɔ? Aa gɛɛ gwaa laa?
Waa aa gela nɛra ɛɛ di bolchɔge Korowii sie la dɔ jirima ken aa, dɛ anɔ la aa gela nɛra ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba wa ɛɛ su o siwi la, ɛrɛɛ a jirima ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?
Waa a faa dɔ jirima kohona la, taraken a ta jirima dɔe kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ anfala jirima tɔɔge a nɛ.
Waa aa ɛa tɔpera anɛ dɛ tonɛ la, dɛ a dɔ jirima aa, dɛ anɔ la aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la, a jirima ta gwaalaa?
Ya dɔ hwɛga gɛ waa nɔ ta, anomanta yaa ɔmɛ.
Ya ta do kɛ Mosis o faa wola nyin kɛ Israel tena na kɛŋɔ o sie bɔr nyɛgla nyoa dɛ sɔɔh, dɛ koh a waa kpɔ yachaahne tɔ sie la.
Israel tena faa waa la mun no. Taraken gba, gɛɛ ba ta do. Baa dɛ kure fɔobene la waa la, a ta do kɛ baa kpɔ yachaahne tɔ ba sie. Ba ta Yeesu Kristo waa lɛɛ yaa, yachaahne la aa ba sie lee ba.
Hale fini gba, saŋ bɛlbwa ba dɛ kure Mosis Mmara Tɔn aa, a ta do kɛ yachaahne aa tɔ ba liire, dɛ gel baa a mun no.
Kɛ, saŋ bɛlbwa nɛwɛnyini aa charɛ o liire dɛ berɛ ba Yeesu be la, yachaahne la ɛɛ leo.
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesuu Domadɛɛge la. Bobɛlbwa ge o Domadɛɛge la aa lole la, nomɛlbwa dɔ o te, o toole Mmara lɔga.
Anomanta, komɛlbwa ta ya te sie tɔe. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu jirima chaah ya nɛ, dɛɛ begre yaa asɛ yaa do gɛ waa doa, jirima yaa dɔa la ɛɛ ja. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa ɛ Domadɛɛge la bee a bwa le.
Korowiirii sune ya nɛɛ dɛ tɛ yaa toma nɔ, anomanta ya bwara aa yaa hwah.
Ya gel waa baa ɛa dɛɛ sɔh ne sihihwaa bɛlbwa. Yaa nɛra negre, yaa Korowii waa yaa dɛ bagle la sie berɛ. Kasinteŋ torodoo yaa di Korowii sie. A taa ya che dɛ gel nɛra ɛɛ jemɛ ya da.
Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma nɔ yaa dɛ bol nɔ, dɛ a sɔɔh kwaraa naa, dɛ nɛra baa dɛ nyogre la bee a sɔh.

Bɔnsam baa dɛ maŋkurao harɛ nɔ ta kɛŋɔ Korowii la, o chɔg nɛra baa wola Yeesu yarada la liire. Waa nyin kɛŋɔ Amanesoma nii aa le Yeesu Kristo o wa aa dɔ jirima kohona be la chaah ba. Yeesu do gɛ Korowii aa doa.
Ya gbagba waa laa yaa bagle nɛra nɔ. Yeesu Kristo waa yaa bagle kɛŋɔ onee komɛlbwa Dɔɔ, dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o nomanta, he bonɔɔnaa yan.
Korowii waa pere bochaah le biro ta, dɛ gel bɔr chaah la, onee gela o nii chaah ya bambile ne ya sie, asɛ ya won jemɛ gɛ o jirima yaa naa Yeesu be la aa doa.

Waa nɔ bwa yaa jema nɔ do kɛŋɔ baa kpɔ kondɛɛga do viine bini la. Yanee viine la. Yaa kpege, kɛ Korowii kpɔ o toma tɛ yaa asɛ yaa ɛ. O ɛ gɛ dɛ́ won bagle kɛŋɔ kpegri aa gwaa kpegri bwa la le o be. Ya be laa a le.
Nɛra dɛ ha yaa kohona, kɛ baa ya nɛɛ pɔ. Waa dɛ hiah yaa ya nyiŋi gɛ yaa ɛ kahonɛ, kɛ ya bwara aa yɔr, yaa gel.
Nɛra chegɛ ya nɛ, kɛ Korowii te ta ya habɔɔ leɛ. Ba go yaa bil te, kɛ ba ta wone kpo yaa.
Wenaale nɔ yaa dɛ na nɔ dɛ bagle kɛ ya sɛoh kɛ yaa sewɛ Yeesu seo la dɔŋee, ásɛ nɛra na dɛ jemɛ kɛ ya dɔ o mkpa la.
Yaa soge le nɔ, Yeesu nomanta saŋ bɛlbwaa ya so seo nyoa, ásɛ nɛra na o mkpa ya bwadabii waa won sewa nɔ aa dɔa.
Anomanta a kaa ɛ kɛ ya te dɛ sewɛ, asɛ he te ɛɛ dɔ mkpa dɛ le ya seo la ta.
Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Maa yaradaa waa n bol." Gɛɛ ya gee yarada. Yaa yaradaa waa yaa bol.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii waa ir ya Dɔɔ Yeesu seo ta la, onee dɛɛ ba ya banɔ la ya ne Yeesu aa pɛa la seo ta ira, dɛ kpɔ ya ne heyaa kaa o be.
He waa Korowii ɛ anɔ bwa. Waraa nɛra Korowii aa na ba sum den na dɛɛ warɛ. Baa kpɔ jam kohonaa tɛ Korowii ásɛ o dɔ jirima.
Ken nɔ nomanta, bɔhwaah aa yaa lawɛ. Tɔ aa dɛ per nɔ bwaa ya bwadabii gwɛgre dɛɛ la. Kɛ ya bini te la, kpegrii ya yarada do dɛɛ la.
Wahala tama nɔ yaa dɛ na tɔpera anɛ bɛl nɔ ɛɛ geloo ya dɔ jirima aa wola jaga dɔe, asɛ a gwaa wahala nɔ kwaraa ken.
Kwaa baa dɛ naa siwi ne la ta laa ya te sie dawɛ. Anɔ la baa wola an na la taa ya sie dawɛ. Kwaa baa dɛ naa la te, tɔpera anɛ bɛlee aa di. Asɛ anɔ la baa wola an na ge la, a ta jaga dɔe bwa.
Ya harɛ nɔ ta bwadabii nɔ do kɛ pata ya do o ta. Ya jemɔ kɛ dɛ o chɔgaa, Korowii ɛɛ tɛ yaa defale o gbagba aa doa waa wola chɔg bwa nyunduaa.
Ya bwadabii nɔ te pe yaa. Ya sie chegɛ chiŋ yaa hime, dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ Korowii kpɔ ya Korowii doa bwadabii la do yaa,
asɛ ya bɛ bwadabii nya.

Ya taa lɔ ya bwadabii aa do kɛ patare ta nɔ, ya bwara dɛ nyɛg, yaa hime. Ya bwadabii nɔ kpɔe dɛ le ya nɛɛ waa laa dena swɛɛ ya siwi. Ya Korowii doa bwadabii la doe waa swɛɛ ya siwi kohona, ásɛ o chig bwadabii waa won sewa nɔ naa ta ya dɔ mkpa.
Korowiirii cheg gɛ waa nɔ tɛ yaa, dɛ kpɔ o Domadɛɛge tɛ yaa a bagle kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ba tɛ yaa o mkpa laanee.
Anomanta ya bwara aa yaa hwah bwa. Ya jemɔ kɛ ya lɔ ya bwadabii nɔ bini naa, ya toole ya Dɔɔ be,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ waa yaa dɛ na la ne laa ya so. Waa yaa dɛ yarada a waa la nee ya so.
Ya bwara aa yaa hwah tamaa bɛlbwa. Dɛ ya gel ya bwadabii nɔ waa do kɛ dea nɔ dɛ ka do ya Dɔɔ be naa, gɛɛ yaa nyin.
Anomanta, ya bwadabii nɔ binii ya do oo, ya Dɔɔ bee ya do oo, ya dɛ nyin ya waa bwa won su o siwi,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya bwa ɛɛ ba che Yeesu Kristo sie o bol ya waa dɛ pa bole, ásɛ bɛlbwa dɔ waa o faa lɔ mkpa ta dɛɛ ɛ la kembɔr. Dɛ bɛlbwa we-ɛɛla wer oo, aa were oo, wɛɛ dɔ a kembɔree.
Yaa jemɛ gɛ Korowii aa do ɔma la waa ya bol waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra ásɛ ba jemɛ kasinteŋ la la. Korowii jemɛ ya bambile bini bwa. N dɛ lii kɛŋɔ he ge jemɛ ya nɛnsoore he bambile bini.

Anɔ dɛ bagle kɛ kpɛɛraa ya kpɛɛ ya te dɛɛ bagle heyaa ja kɛɛ? Akai! Ya dɛ nyin ya bagle heyaa waa ásɛ he che a ta dɛ won dɛɛ maŋkura yaa nɛra baa dɛ chɔg yaa la be. Waa nɛwɛnyina aa dɛ naa laanee baa maŋkura. Baa nɛn bambile bini waa nyiŋi.
Dɛ ya nyu toole naa, Korowii waa a ba gɛ. Ya sie chɔ harɛ ge aa, he wesomee a ba gɛ.
Yeesu Kristo nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa laanee dɛɛ do yaa ya we-ɛɛla bwa ta. Gɛ yaa naa laanee kɛŋɔ dɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ lɛ nɛra bwa seo sewaa, a kaa chaa kɛ nɛra la bwa sewɔ.
O sewɔ tɛ nɛra bwa. Anomanta nɛra baa soge le la ta chɛ kɛ ba so ba gbagba soga kpa. Bá so tɛ naate waa sewa tɛɛ ba asɛ Korowii iru seo ta la.
Anomanta, fini habɔɔ, yaa nɛra nyiŋi gɛ nɛwɛnyina aa dɛ nyiŋ ba la. Ya fa dɛ nyiŋi Yeesu Kristo gba gɛ, kɛ yaa on gɛ nyiŋi kpa.
Nomɛlbwa o ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, o berɛ nɛnfale. O gel o webena o faa dɛ ɛ la, dɛ charɛ dafale.
Korowiirii ɛ a bwa. Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ o che dɛ kwaa ya ne o baah ya ne o pɛ, dɛ tɛ yaa toma nɔ ŋɔ yá nyin nɛra dɛɛ tɛo ásɛ ba ne o baah kwaa bá won pɛ.
Korowii chegɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ kwaa o ne nɛwɛnyina baah dɛ lag ba dɛɛ pɛl o te, waa wola ba wechɔga nyiŋe. Yanee o kpɔ o waa tɛ ŋɔ yá bagle gɛ waa kwaa o ne ba baah dɛ lag ba ásɛ o ne ba pɛ.

Taraken nɔ, Yeesu Kristoo tomɛ yaa ŋɔ yá bol waa dɛɛ tɛo la. A kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii chegɛ ya nɛɛ dɛɛ bol waa nɛra be la. Ya chegɛ Yeesu Kristo naa ta dɛɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ hé gel he ne Korowii baah kwaa he pɛ.
Dɛ wechɔga bɛlbwa toole Yeesu Kristo nɛ, kɛ ya kɛrɛdɛ nomanta, Korowii gelɔ o lɛ ya wechɔga che, asɛ dɛ ya ne o pɛo waa, ya waa won su Korowii siwi o lɛ yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛgaa yan.
Ya ne Korowii bwa aa pɛa dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ nɔ, ya dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ Korowii aa na he sum dɛ cha heyaa nɔ, he bɛ gel a ɛ pɛɛ.
Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, "Tɔpere aa tela kɛŋɔ n na he sum la, n no he be. N ta he chae vɛɛh awola la, n lɛ heya." Hé no! Tɔpere telo kɛŋɔ he no Korowii be ó na he sum. Finii he lɛɛ tɔpere.
Yaa nyin kɛ nomɛlbwa dɔ ya toma wechɔge bɛlbwa dɛ bol, anomanta waa aa gel nɛra lɔ naa la, yaa an kpɔe dɛɛ ɛɛ ba.
Ya dɛ ɛ ya wobɛlbwa gɛ aa chɛ kɛ nɛra Korowii aa tom ba ɛɛ ɛ. Wekpega dɛ pu yaa, ya lawɛ bambile dɛɛ so a ne. Ya dɛ na bambiwɔrɔbe wa, a won yaa hiaih kohona. Ya dɛ na sibegrewaa ge kɛrɛdɛ.
Ba dɛ lɔɔ yaa, dɛɛ do yaa deene, dɛ lɛ gaeh ya nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ yaa sagasaga. Ya dɛ ɛ tomkpega dɛɛ koh. Tɔpebɛl yaa dom dɔe dɛɛ chɔ. Tɔpebɛl yaa kondikwaa dɔe dɛɛ di.

Ya chegɛ ya goroŋ yaa doa la ta, ne Yeesu Kristo ŋwɛnɛ la waa yaa jema, ne bambile yaa dɔa, ne ya tesom ta dɛ bagle kɛ Korowii bonɔɔnaa yan. Ya chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la yaa dɔa, ne gɛ yaa nyin nɛra tea bwa ne,
ne kasinteŋ bola ta, ne Korowii kpegri waa kpɔa cha yaa ta dɛɛ bagle kɛ Korowii bonɔɔnaa yan. Waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi laanee ya dɔmkwa. A nee yaa yo dig ne gal ne, a nee yaa tɔ ya te gbemgbe.
Bane dɛ pena yaa, bane ɛɛ yoo yaa. Bane dɛ chɛgre yaa, bane ɛɛ kpɛɛ yaa. Ba dɛ yerɛ yaa nyosonteŋna, kɛ kasinteŋ gee yaa bol.
Baa yaa komɛlbwa yerɛ, kɛ nɛra bwa ge jemɛ yaa. A fe chɛ kɛ ya sewɛ, kɛ yan soge le la. Ba ɛ yaa hɔhɔrɔwa, kɛ ba ta yaa kpoe.
Ba dɛ ɛ yaa tebinichɔg wa, kɛ saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ ya lɔ silɛɛ ta. Ya ɛ nyaara, kɛ ya won nɛra chae kohona. Ya ta komɛlbwa dɔe, kɛ yan gee komɛlbwa.
Yabala Kɔrent tena, bambile bwa nee ya bol waa he be. Ya dɛ nyin he waa taeh.
Ya laa wola heyaa nyin, heyaa wola yaa nyin. Ya waa toole he bambile ta.
N dɛ bol waa nɔ dɛɛ bagle heyaa kɛŋɔ n ne n bii ken. Ya dɛ nyin heya, anomanta hé ge ta tea dɛɛ nyin yaa!
He bɛ gel he ne nɛra baa wola Korowii waa lɛɛ la pɛ dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛ darame bɛlbwa toole wedɛɛga ne wechɔga baah. Ɛrɛɛ bochaah ne biro ɛɛ ba wona pɛ a magre ɔ?
Yeesu Kristo ne Bɔnsam ɛɛ wonoo pɛ a magre aa? Nɛra baa yarada Yeesu Kristo ne banɔ la baa wola on yaradae aa won pɛ a magre!

Voga ɛɛ wonoo che Korowii Dea a magre aa? Ya bwadabii nɔɔ Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa la dea. Anee Korowii gbabir bol la. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ ba so n nɛra bee dɛ do ba baah. Baa yer mɛ ba Korowiirii, asɛ n ge yer ba n nɛra.
Anomanta n bolɔ ŋɔ, 'Hé le ba bini! Hé pere he te le ba nɛɛ kwara! Hé laa he te kpɔ waa te bɛlbwa aa ɛ doŋa waa ta, ásɛ n lɛ heya,
dɛ ɛ he Mɛɛ, asɛ he ɛ n bii.' Men Nemenɛ Korowiirii bola."

N dandɛɛga, yanee Korowii bagɛ a gɛ nyoa nɔ bwa. Anomanta hé gel ya do kaih. Yá laa ya bwadabii ne ya bambile kpɔ wechɔga bɛlbwa ta. Hé gel ya swɛɛ siwi dɛ́ do goroŋ, ɔma yaa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii nomanta.
Hé kpɔ he bambile tɛ yaa dɛɛ no ya wa. Ya ta he bɛlbwa wechɔga ɛɛ. Ya ta bɛlbwa chɔgɛ, ya ta bɛlbwa negrɛ di ge bwa.
Waa maa bola nɔ, pwaeh laa mɛɛ pwah heya. Anee n faa bol la, ya dɛ nyin heyaa taeh. Seo taa yoo, bokpega taa yoo, ya ne heyaa.
He waa dɔ kasinteŋ n be. He gelɔ n baŋa ɛɛ pa taeh. Ya wenaale yaa dɛ na bwa habɔɔ la, n bwara ta hwaeh. N sie ta dɛ lɛ taeh.
Yaa ba Makidoonia harɛ ta habɔɔ kwaraa la, ya bwara ta yaa sɔɔhnɛ. Bobɛlbwa yaa kpɔ la, ya ne wahalaa. Dɛ yoi laa nɛra ɛɛ yo yaa kwara naa, dɛ ya ne bambiwɔrɔbaa.
Kɛ Korowii aa dɛ larawe tebinichɔg te bwara la nomanta, Taetos bala la gelɔ ya dɔ bɔlarawa.

O bala la gbo laa larawe ya bwara. O baa bagle gɛ waa baa na heyaa o gbabir bambile sɔɔhno he wa. O bolɔ ŋɔ n waa dɛ ɛ heya, dɛ ŋɔ waa n faa bola la gelɔ he tea bini chɔg. O bagle gɛ haa chegɛ n habɔɔ dɛ yo dɛɛ tɛ mɛ. Anomanta name kwaraa n sie lɛ kohona.
N faa chwerɛ heyaa tɔn he tea bini chɔg la, a we n nɛ. Kɛ aa berɛ dɛɛ we n nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he tea bini ta chɔgɛ la sie.

Kɛ taraken te n sie lɛo. He tea bini aa chɔga waa laa n sie lɛ. He tebinichɔg la aa gela he charɛ da la, a waa n sie lɛ. Gɛɛ Korowii ɛɛ nyin kɛ nɛwɛnyini tea bini ɛɛ chɔg. Anomanta, ya ta heyaa wechɔge bɛlbwa ɛɛ.

Nɛwɛnyini tea bini chɔgɔ gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin kɛ wɛɛ ɛ aa, a gelɔ wɛɛ charɛ o liire. A gɛ waa nɔɔ dɛɛ ba Korowii mkpa ne. Anomanta a ta chɛ kɛ ya gel ya tea bini chɔg a ta. Kɛ harɛ bonɔ tebinichɔg te, seo nee aa ba.

Tebinichɔg Korowii aa dɛ nyin he dɔ laanee he dɔ la. Hé na waa aa lea tɛ heya. Hé na gɛ haa dɛ takapɔ, asɛ he siwi swɛɛ hɛɛ nyin he bagle kɛ he ta wechɔga ɛɛ. Hé na gɛ he bwaawee aa ir wechɔga ta, hé na gɛ haa dɛ ɔmɛ. A gelɔ he pɛla lawɛ yaa, asɛ he siwi swɛɛ waa aa togra ta. A gelɔ he siwi swɛɛ nɛra baa wola wedɛɛga ɛɛ nɛɛ he tɛr ba deŋne. He wono bagle kɛ he ta wechɔga bɛlbwa ɛɛ waa la ta.
Maa chwerɛ heyaa tɔn la la, a ta ɛɛ kɛ naate waa ɛ o dɔŋ wechɔga, kɛɛ naate o dɔŋ aa ɛo wechɔga waa n chwerɔ. Korowii gba nao kɛ n chwerɔ ásɛ he won jemɛ gɛ haa dɛ nyin yaa.
Anee larawe ya bwara. A gbo laa. Yaa na gɛ haa cha Taetos o dɔ silɛɛ la, a gelɔ ya sie lɛ.
N fa bol he waa Taetos be, dɛ kpɛɛ heya. He ta gelɛ sihiih kpo mɛ. Waa yaa bol he be la bwa ɛ kasinteŋ. Gɛɛ waa yaa bol Taetos be dɛ kpɛɛ heyaa la bwa ɛ kasinteŋ.
O lii gɛ he bwa faa dɛ no o waa ne gɛ he faa dɛ tɛo duure dɛɛ ɛ yalayala la aa, dɛ o nyina waa dɛ nyin heyaa la, dɛ jae a na dɛɛ ja.
N sie lɛo kohona kɛŋɔ maa dɔ heyaa dɛ won kpɔ hwɛga do he nɛɛ wobɛlbwa ta nɔ.
Yabalawa, ya dɛ nyin he jemɛ gɛ Korowii aa sune Makidoonia asɔre tena nɛɛ dɛ cha ba ba dɔ bonya kohona.
Ba na wahala kɛrɛdɛ. A lole kɛ nyaaraa ban kohona, kɛ ba sie aa lɛ Yeesu lɛɛ waa lɛɛ ba la ta kohona nomanta, ba wono ta suuga kohona ásɛ ba kpɔ cha nɛra.
Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ ba ta tea tɛ yaa kwaa gɛ ba bokpega aa tela, hale ba tɛo gwaa ba bokpega del kwara. Ba gbagba tetooraa ba ɛ gɛ, nɛn laa do ba.
Ba gbagbaa soŋe yaa sibegra ne ŋɔ yá gel ba ja nɛra baa dɛ cha Korowii nɛra la nɛ.
Ba ɛ waa dɛ gwaa gɛ ya te fe aa dɛ lii. Ba tɔ sie kpɔ ba te do N Naa Korowii nɔn ta, mɔɔ dɛ kpɔ ba te do ya ge nɔn ta gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin.
Anomanta ya ŋɔ Taetos be ŋɔ tondɛɛga nɔ soo waa pa a mun la, ó den ba choŋi a ta, asɛ dɛ cha heyaa he ɛ wedɛɛga haa dɛ ɛ kwaa kɛɛ bɔr la ka tonɛ.
He dɛ ɛ waa Yeesu waa bwa ta, yarada ta, waa bola ta, wejema ta, ne nyina haa dɛ nyin nɛra chae ta, ne nyina haa dɛ nyin yaa la ta. Anomanta ya dɛ nyin kɛ hɛɛ ɛ waa kwaa kɛɛ ge ta.
N ta bolɛ dɛɛ bil a ɛ lao kɛŋɔ hɛ́ɛ kɛ. N dɛ nyin n jemɛ kɛŋɔ he nɛnnyin la ɛ nɛnnyin kasinteŋ. A waa n bagle gɛ bane siwi aa swɛɛ kwaa kɛɛ ta la.
Kɛ he na gɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa kenɛ? He nao kɛŋɔ o fa dɔ kwaa nɔ bwa, dɛ koh he waa dɛ berɛ nya, asɛ a che o nyae ta he berɛ dɔɔhna.
Gɛ n te aa naa kɛŋɔ hé den tonɛ waa haa pa a mun bena ken la. Heyaa tɔ sie dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he dɛ nyin nɛra chae.
Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛ tonɛ warane. Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛ tonɔ gɛ haa vɔrɔwa la. Hé tɛ anɔ la haa dɔa.
Dɛ he bambile lawɔ kɛ hɛɛ tɛ suugaa yaa, gɛ bwa haa dɔa dɛ́ tɛ la, aa su Korowii siwii. Waa ŋɔ hé tɛ gwaa gɛ haa dɔa.

Koeh laa n laa dɛɛ kpɔ bane nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ baa dawɛ he nɛ. Haa dɔa kohona taraken nɔ, a wer kɛŋɔ he cha banɔ la aa kpega tɛɛ ba. He ɛ gɛ naa, a baa do kpegri tɛ heyaa asɛ ba ge dɔ aa, baa cha heyaa. Dɛ he bwa kɛrɛdɛ.
Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la: "Naate waa pa kondikwaa kohona la, kondikwaa ta o nɛɛ gwaalɛ. Naate waa wola kondikwaa pae kohona la, o ta kondikwaa nyae."
Ya dɛ jam Korowii kohona kɛŋɔ waa gela Taetos siwi swɛɛ wɛɛ cha heyaa kɛŋɔ ya siwi aa swɛɛ he nɛɛ la.
Waa yaa ŋɔa Táetos ɛ la, o sɛoh ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo. Dɛ o siwi swɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ o cha heya, anomanta o tetooraa o ba he be la.
Ya dɔŋ la asɔre tena bwa aa dɛ kpɛɛro Amanesoma la bola ta la, o ne Taetosee yaa tomɛ he be la.
A gbo laa, asɔre tena la bwaa leo ŋɔ ó ja ya nɛɛ ya kpɔ koŋkɛɛla nɔ kaa Jerusalam gɛ aa ɛ asɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu dɔ sɔn. Ya dɛ ɛ toma nɔ dɛ́ kpɔ dɛɛ bagle kɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyin Korowii nɛra chae.
Ya dɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ waane ba dɔ bol dɛ le gɛ yaa dɛ nyiŋi koŋkɛɛla damanta nɔ ta.
Waa aa swɛɛ ya siwi kɛŋɔ yaa ɛ laanee waa aa togra. Waa aa togra Korowii be gbo laa yaa ba ɛɛ. Yaa ɛ waa aa tograa nɛwɛnyini ge be.

A waa ya tomɛ ya dɔŋ ŋɔ ó ne ba ba la. Ya daahno na kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa, dɛ na kɛŋɔ saŋ bɛlbwa la, o siwi swɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ o cha toma nɔ. Taraken te kwaraa la, o siwi begrɔ kɛŋɔ ó cha heyaa kohona, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o dɛ yarada heyaa kohona.
Taetos te la, n ne onee dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ dɛɛ cha heya. Yabala baa ja o nɛɛ la ge la, asɔre tenaa lee ba. Ba nɛɛ Yeesu Kristo che dɔ sɔn.
Anomanta hé gel ba na gɛ haa dɛ nyin nɛn ásɛ asɔre tena bwa no, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ yaa koh he waa dɛɛ maŋkura ya te la, pɛɛ laa.
A ta hiaih kwaraa kɛŋɔ n chwerɛ heyaa chae asɔre tena aa dɛ cha Korowii nɛra baa lɔ Judia harɛ la wa.

N jemɔ kɛŋɔ he te dɛ nyin ba chae. Anomanta n kpɔ heyaa maŋkura n te Makidoonia tena be taeh. N ŋɔ ba be ŋɔ, "Bena ken bwaa yabala baa lɔ Akaaya harɛ la swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ nyin nɛra chae." He siwi aa swɛɛra hɛɛ nyin nɛra chae la, a gelɔ ba kɛrɛdɛ gee nyin nɛra chae.
N dɛ tomɛ yabala nɔ he be. N dɛ nyin kɛ he kpɔ he te dɛ ta suuga gɛ maa ŋɔa he dɛ ɛ la, ásɛ nɛra maa kpɔ heyaa dɛɛ maŋkura n te ba be la jemɛ kɛŋɔ pɛɛ laa mɛɛ maŋkura n te.
Dɛ Makidoonia harɛ tena teŋɛ n nɛɛ ba dɛ ba na kɛŋɔ he ta he te kpɔe mɔɔ naa, dɛ sihiih ta he te kpoe yaa, sihiih ɛɛ kpo ya tenee, dɛ le gɛ yaa dɛ maŋkura heyaa la nomanta.

A waa n na kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n soŋe yabala nɔ ásɛ ba tɔ sie n nɛɛ dɛ ba he be, dɛ ba lɛ koŋkɛɛla la haa ŋɔa hɛɛ tɛo la bwa cheg, asɛ ya ne bala la, dɛ a bwa chemo, ásɛ a bagle kɛ nyinaa hɛɛ nyin dɛ tɛ, lao laa.
Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ he du tama aa, tamaa hɛɛ ba koma, he du kohona ge aa, kohonaa hɛɛ ba koma.

Anomanta, bɛ́lbwa tɛ gɛ aa magra o bambile ta. Bɛlbwa nao kɛŋɔ o tɛo aa we o nɛɛ yaa, ó gel tɛɛ. Bɛl dɛ lii kɛ doe ba doo ŋɔ o tɛ aa, ó gel, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ tɛ kwaa bambile bwa ne la, Korowii sie dɛ lɛ o nɛ.
Korowiirii dɛ won tɛ heyaa kwaa a gwaa gɛ haa dɛ nyin, asɛ he dɔ kohona saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ won kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga kohona.
Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la: "Waa nɔn nyore, o dɛ tɛ nyaara tɛɛ tenten. O wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta jaga dɔe."
Korowiirii dɛɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyini kondwee baa du, dɛɛ tɛ kondikwa. On dɛ tɛ heyaa kondwee haa dɛ nyin bwa, dɛ gel a le dɛ nɔnɛ kohona, dɛ gel he wedɛɛga ɛɛ ge won dɛɛ ja.
Wɛɛ geloo he dɔ saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ́ won ta tea dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɛra saŋ bɛlbwa, ásɛ nɛra warɛ pirim dɛ jam Korowii he koŋkɛɛla la yaa kpɔa tɛɛ ba la wa.
Dɛ ya kpɔ he koŋkɛɛla nɔ dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɛra aa hiah ba aa, dɛ chae gbo laa hɛɛ cha ba. Dɛ a chegɛ a ta nɛra kpɔ silɛɛ gee jam Korowii kohona.

He we-ɛɛla nɔ ɛɛ geloo nɛra na he yarada haa dɔa, dɛ jam Korowii a wa. Baa jam Korowiirii kɛŋɔ haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la haa ŋɔa he yaradaa la ta. Nɛra ɛɛ jam Korowiirii kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa wola heyaa doe, asɛ he gbagba ta tea dɛ tɛ ba ne nomɛlbwa kwaa haa dɔa nɔ.
He waa ɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ a gɛ nɛra laanee, asɛ ba dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, ba soŋe dɛɛ tɛ heya, he bonya Korowii aa gela he dɔ la nomanta.
Ya dɛ jam Korowii kohona. Yaa won jemɛ bagle o koŋkɛɛle damanta waa kɛ yaa la wa.
Men Pɔɔl, n dɛ soŋe heya. Ba ŋɔ n lɔ he be naa, n pwɛre, kɛ n le he be te naa, n waa kpegri. N dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ hé nyiŋi gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa pwɛra o tea do som la,
asɛ dɛ no n be. Mɛɛ bagle kpegri nɛra baa dɛ lii kɛŋɔ harɛ bonɔ waa ŋwɛnɛre taa ya teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ ya waa la nɛɛ. Maa nyin kɛ n bagle a gɛ kpegri la he nɛ.
A ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ harɛ bonɔɔ ya so. Kɛ harɛ bonɔ laa laa yaa yo.
Dɔmkwaa yaa dɛ yo a ne la, nɛwɛnyina kwaa laa. A ɛ Korowii dɔmkwaa o kpegri aa lɔ a ta, asɛ ya kpɔ dɛ pagre dekpega.

Nɛwɛnyina wejema baa dɛ maŋkuraa dɛɛ tɔŋle waa la, a ne webagla baa dɛ maŋkuraa kohona dɛɛ tɔŋle waa ásɛ nɛra jemɛ Korowii kahonɛ la do kɛ dekpega yaa dɛ ba wona pagre la. Ya berɔ dɔ kpegri dɛ́ won berɛ nomɛlbwa liire, asɛ ba no Yeesu Kristo be.
N kpɔ n te dɛ so dɛɛ kpa, ásɛ he te dɔɔ ba no n be ka tonaa, n tɛr nɛra baa vɛah la deŋne.
Haa waa kari kɛɛ? Nomɛlbwa dɛ lii kɛ o ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛn aa, ó jemɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ waa ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛn la, gɛɛ ya ge ɛ Yeesu nɛra.
Dɛ n dɛ maŋkura kpegri ya Dɔɔ aa tɛ yaa ŋɔ yá kpɔ dɛɛ cha heyaa la aa, sihiih aa men kpo. O tɛ mɛ kpegri ń won cha heya. O ta men kpegri tɛɛ ń kpɔ chɔg heya.
Maa nyin kɛ a ɛ kɛŋɔ aahraa n kpɔ tɔne dɛɛ aah heya.
