Bane ɛɛ ŋɔɔ, "Pɔɔl tɔne nyoa kpegri to. Kɛ he na o gbagba aa, waa kpege. O wobol gba ta wale dɔe."
A gɛ tena nɔ, a chɛ kɛ ba jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya toole he be naa, waa yaa chwera dɛɛ ha heyaa ta korɛ, asɛ waa yaa lɔ he be dɛɛ ɛ ge korɛ.
Yanee bamewa ya kpɔ ya te magɛ nɛra baa dɛ lii ba te nɛnjena ɔ? Yaa ya nyu kpɔe dɛɛ lɔ ba. Ba yon nyiŋi ba bala we-ɛɛla dɛ kpɔ magɛ ba kwaa dɛ ŋɔ ba kwaa togrɔ. Ba gɛnɔ te!

Waa aa wola toole anɔ la Korowii aa gela yaa ɛ ta la, ya te aa anee kpɔ maŋkura ya te. Anɔ la bwa waa maga tɛ yaa la, a gbo taa yaa ba ya te maŋkurae. Toma yaa dɛ ɛ he be la gba ja anɔ la waa tɛ yaa la ta.
He be bala ja ya toma ta. Yaa ba he be la, dɛ ya ta ɛɛ ka garɛ. Yaa kpɔ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la ba he be la, dɛ ya ta ɛɛ ka garɛ ya toma jaga.

Yaa nyin kɛ ya garɛ bela Korowii aa maga tɛ yaa. Toma yaa ɛa la, anee ya kpɔ dɛɛ maŋkura ya te. Toma nɛra bane aa ɛa la, yaa an kpɔe dɛɛ maŋkura ya te. Ya dɔ hwɛga kɛ he yarada ɛɛ kaa siee, asɛ toma yaa dɛ ɛ he bini la ɛɛ ja dɛ kaa sie.
A taa yaa ba wona bol Amanesoma la harɛre aa lɔ sie la ta, asɛ dɛ bɛ waa nɛra bane aa ɛa kpɔ maŋkura ya te.
Anee ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini la: "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o te maŋkurae la, wɛɛ maŋkura o te waa Korowii aa ɛa ta."
Naate waa dɛ kpɛɛ o te la, o laa nɛndɛɛge. Naate Korowii aa dɛ kpɛɛro la, onee nɛndɛɛge.
N dɛ nyin he lawɛ bambile dɛ no n gɛne waa nɔ tama. Soŋaa mɛɛ soŋe heya.
He waa dɛ we n bwara kɛŋɔ he wa aa dɛ we Korowii nɛɛ la. He do kɛ haah waa wola baa jemɛ bwa, asɛ n kpɔɔ tɛ baa bɛl yal ken. Yeesu Kristo gbagbaa a gɛ baa nɔ, o gboo chɛ kɛ o ɛ he jaa.
Kɛ n dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ Bɔnsam bɛ bɔr ba dɔ che dɛ berɛ he liire asɛ he bɛ Yeesu Kristo dɛɛ nyin tepoŋ ne kpa, kɛŋɔ waa berɛ harɛkon dɛ kpɔ nyosone negre Hawa la.

Kɛ he dɛ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ no nɛra baa ba he be dɛ baa bagle Yeesu waa a korɛ waa ya faa bagle heyaa la ta nɔ? Kɛ ba dɛ bagle kwaa aa dɛ ir nɛra nɛɛ waa a korɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa soge he nɛɛ la ta, kɛɛ ba dɛ bagle heyaa amanesoma a korɛ anɔ la ya faa bagle heyaa la ta naa, he dɛ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ no ba be nɔ?
Maa lii kɛ nɛra baa dɛ maŋkura ba te kɛ ba gwaa Yeesu Kristo toroma la gwaa mɛ ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta.
Bɛl lole n nyoa ken ta chaahnɛ wobol ta, kɛ wejema te, n dɔɔ. Wobɛlbwa yaa jema ge la, ya gelɔ a bini chaah he jemɛ a bwa ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta.
N faa bagle heyaa Korowii Amanesoma la la, n ta heyaa komɛlbwa sese lɛɛ. Maa pwɛr n te gɛ ásɛ nɛra siwi ɛɛ su heyaa la, dɛ wechɔgaa n ɛ aa?
Maa dɛ ɛ toma he be la, dɛ bobɛl asɔre tenaa dɛɛ bɔ mɛ kem. He nyiŋo na naa, dɛ a kaa ɛ kɛ maa ŋwɛɛ ba dɛ́ kpɔ dɛɛ cha heya.

Gɛ saŋ maa lɔ he be la, suuga waa hiah mɛ naa, maa n te kpɔe dɛɛ dawɛ he nɛ. Yabala baa le Makidoonia harɛ ba laanee baa tɛ mɛ kwaa maa dɛ nyin bwa. Gɛ n faa wola n te kpɔe dawɛ he nɛɛ wubwa la, gɛɛ maa wola n tenee kpɔ dawɛ he nɛɛ saŋ bɛlbwa bwa.
N chegɛ Yeesu Kristo kasinteŋ la waa gela n dɔ la ta dɛɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, nomɛlbwa toole Akaaya harɛ bobɛlbwa dɛ́ tɔ mɛ ŋwɛnɛ maa wola won maŋkura n te a gɛ waa nɔ ta.
Maa dɛ ŋɔ ken nɔ, a ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ maa heyaa nyin. Korowii gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ n dɛ nyin heya.
Waa maa dɛ ɛ nɔ, maa a ɛɛ gela ba. Mɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ gɛɛ, ásɛ nɛra baa dɛ maŋkura ba te ŋɔ tombeŋkpoŋii ya ne baa ɛ la bɛ won dɔ ŋwɛnɛ dɛɛ maŋkura ba te.
A gɛ nɛra la, Yeesu Kristo toroma gbagba laa ban. Negraa baa negre nɛra dɛ ɛ ba te kɛ Yeesu Kristo toromaa ban la.
A ta nyokpowaa ɛɛ, dɛkalkɛ Bɔnsam gbabir won o te begra dɛ do kɛ Korowii nyundua torome tenten ken.
Anomanta dɛ Bɔnsam bonɔɔna ge begre ba te kɛŋɔ banee dɛɛ chagle ŋwɛnɛ yaa kpɔ o ta dɛ́ ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi aa, dɛ a ta nyokpowaa ɛɛ. Korowii ɛɛ bɔ ba kemee gɛ ba toma aa doa.
N dɛ ŋɔ he be ja: Nomɛlbwa bɛ lii kɛŋɔ gɛnee men. N gɛnɔ gba kwara naa, hɛ́ɛ no n be ásɛ n ge won maŋkura n te tama.
N jemɔ kɛ waa maa dɛ bol taraken nɔ, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu laa ŋɔa ń bola. Maŋkurae nɔ maa dɛ maŋkura n te nɔ, gɛne waa mɛɛ ɛ la.
Bane aa koh harɛ bonɔ kwara waa dɛɛ maŋkura ba te nomanta, n gee maŋkura n tenee.
Haa jemɛ waa kohona nomanta, he dɛ lawɛ bambile, dɛ kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ no gɛna be.
Nɛra kpɔ heyaa berɛ yoma, dɛ negre heyaa dɛɛ di, dɛɛ faah heya, dɛɛ nyiŋi he nyu baahna, dɛɛ kpaa he lwɛrɛme, kɛ he waane laa.

A dɛ ɛɛ mɛ sihiih kɛ n bol waa nɔ. N ta jemɛ kɛ ya berɔ do pwɛre tɛ heyaa to. Ya ta an kɛrɛdɛ ɛɛ. Dɛ nomɛl dɔ wobɛl dɛ won koh a waa maŋkura o te naa, n gba ɛɛ wonoo maŋkura n te a gɛ waa la ta. Gɛnewaa mɛɛ bol nɔ te.
Dɛ Hibru tenaa ban aa, bɛlee n ge. Israel tena gee ban aa, bɛlee n gba. Abraham naanaree ban aa, bɛlee n ge.

Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔnaa ban kɛɛ? N dɛ bol chogla wobol te, kɛ dɛ ba ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔna aa, n ɛ o bonɔɔ gwaa ba! N ɛ toma gwaa ba. Ba do mɛ dea gwaa ba, dɛ cha mɛ chweremi gwaa ba. Waa maa naa a yon ka jɛɛ n sewɛ warɔ.
Kera anue bwaa Juda tena cha mɛ ba chweremi fifraatoro dɛ anuanaarɛ la.
Kera atoroo Room tena lɔɔ mɛ chweremi ne, dɛ fog mɛ bwea kera beŋkpoŋ. Kera atoroo stiimae morɛ n ne. N lɔ nee sie bɔr bir dɛ chaah, dɛ kwaa bir a gɛ stiimae mora nɔ bɛl ta.

N gaagebala nɔ ta la, neerare suugo dɛ tɔ mɛ do, n do siswɛm ta ka, asɛ ŋwɛɛra baa dɛ kpo nɛra dɛɛ kpɔ ba laala ge fe ɛɛ nyin n kpoe. N bala Juda tena ne nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bwa ge chegɛ n nɛɛ dɛ fe ɛɛ nyin n kpoe. Bwɛɛre ta ne kpɔg baah ne mpo ta bwaa n na sibegrewa. N na sibegrewaa nɛra baa wola asɔre tena kpelakpela ɛɛ be.
N ɛ toma dɛ koh kɛrɛdɛ. A kɛrɛdɛ ta, dɛ maa dom chɔ. Lɔr ne nyɔgre ge kpo mɛ kɛrɛdɛ. N vala kɛrɛdɛ ta, dɛ telogaa mɛɛ chɔ, dɛ busee mɛɛ chɔ, dɛɛ chɔ waa.
Anɔ te bwa chɔ keŋkeŋ. Maa won bagle a bwa. Waa aa lɔ n bini dɛɛ swɛɛ n siwi laanee kɛŋɔ asɔre tena baa lɔ bobɛl bwa la waa dɛ ha mɛ tɔperee bwa.
Dɛ asɔre tena la bɛlbwa sɔɔhnaa, dɛ n gbabir bwara yɔrɔ. Dɛ Bɔnsam negre bɛlbwa kaa wechɔga ta naa, dɛ a ɛɛ mɛ bandia.
Dɛ mɛɛ maŋkura n tenee yaa, waa aa dɛ chagle kɛ n ɛ nɛŋgwɛgre la taa mɛɛ ba n te maŋkurae.
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Mɛɛ Korowii jemɔ kɛ nyosone laa mɛɛ teŋe. O chɛ jam tɔperee bwa.
Maa lɔ Damaskɔs la, bwɛɛ la nomoa waa lɔ Kooro Aretas lɔga le nɛra ŋɔ báa daah doonyoone aa lɔ danjwɛɛ waa bar bwɛɛ la bwa cheme ta la ásɛ dɛ lag mɛ.
Aa ba gɛ la, n daamanar bane do mɛ wɛgrɛjen bini dɛ do ŋwɛn o ta kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ta kɔlɔŋ ken, dɛ che danjwɛɛ la tokoro bɛl ta dɛ kpɔ mɛ tu dahara, asɛ n le o nɔn ta.
A chɛ kɛ n maŋkura n te. N jemɔ kɛ aa wobɛlbwa kwaa te. Mɛɛ bagle chaahna Korowii aa gela n na, ne waa waa pila bag me.
N jemɛ asɔre te baa bɛl. Dɛ ɛ bene fi dɛ anaarɛɛ nɔ Korowii aa keeru kaa o be nyundujagla. Dɛ o nɛndaa gbabirii kaa nyundua oo, dɛ o lileo gboo kaa bela oo, maa jemɛ. Korowii gboo jema.
N jemɔ kɛ ba lawɔ kaa nyundua, kɛ anee n bol la, o nɛndaa gbabirii kaa bela oo, dɛ o lileo gboo kaa bela oo, Korowii gboo jema.
Korowii la o ne o be, o ka no waane nɛwɛnyini aa wola won bola. Korowii ta ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ kɛ nɛwɛnyini bola.
Dɛ n ŋɔ n maŋkura n te naa, gɛ nɛn nɔɔ mɛɛ ba kpɔe maŋkura n te. Maa n gbagba we-ɛɛlaa kpɔ maŋkura n te, nemenɛ n nɛŋgwɛgre ɛɛ gbo ta.

Dɛ n ŋɔ ń kpɔ n gbagba we-ɛɛla maŋkura n te kwaraa naa, gɛnewaa laa te, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ɛ kasinteŋ. Menee gɛ nɛn la, kɛ maa nyin n kpɔ gɛ waa la maŋkura n te. Dɛ n waa maa dɛ ɛ nɛra ɛɛ na, ne anɔ la baa dɛ no ta laa aa, maa nyin kɛ nɛra kpɛɛ mɛ wobɛlbwa ta.
Korowii aa nyin kɛ n kpɔ wejena maa naa chaahna ta la dɛɛ maŋkura n te. Anomanta o gelɔ Bɔnsam kpɔ waane do n nɛɛ aa ha mɛ, dɛɛ tɔg mɛ kɛŋɔ sɔɔh, n bɛ won dɛɛ ɛ mbarafo.
Kera atoro bwaa n soŋe Korowii kɛŋɔ o laa a gɛ waa nɔ kpɔ n nɛ,

asɛ o ŋɔ, "Chae maa sune he nɛɛ dɛ chae nɔ gbo magre he ne. Bela nɛn aa gwɛgra la, belaa baa na n kpegri kohona." Anomanta a do n som kohona kɛ maa dɛ maŋkura n te n gwɛgra ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a taa mɛɛ na Yeesu Kristo kpegri n nɛ.

N sie dɛ lɛ n gwɛgra maa gwɛgra, ne chɛga baa dɛ chɛg mɛ, ne kpegri bɔr yon do tɛ mɛ, ne chega nɛra aa chegɛ n nɛ, ne gɛ maa koh Yeesu Kristo waa aa noo mɛ bwa ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ maa gwɛgre la, a taa mɛɛ do kpegri.

N bol waa kɛ gɛne, kɛ heyaa gela n ɛ gɛ. Heyaa chɛ kɛ he fe ɛɛ tɛ me sɔn. A lole kɛ n waa aa bobɛlbwa tel te, kɛ nɛra baa dɛ maŋkura ba te gwaa Yeesu Kristo toroma la, ba bɛlbwa ta men gwaalɛ wobɛlbwa ta.
N faa lɔ he be la, n lawɛ bambile kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ ɛ waa aa chagla kɛŋɔ Yeesu toroma la bɛlee men. Wekpega ne nyokpowaa bwaa n ɛ.
Bɔkwaa n ɛ tɛ asɔre tena baa kaa la maa wola ɛɛ tɛ heyaɔ? Anɔ la maa wola heyaa ɛɛ laanee kɛŋɔ, n ta heyaa hae suuga waa ta. Hé kpɔ n wechɔga kɛ me!
N tooro tenaa nɔ maa kpɔ n te dɛɛ ba he be bala dɛ́ ba chɔɔ heya. Maa heyaa komɛlbwa bɔɔra ba. He waa hiah mɛ, he suuga laa hiah mɛ. Bechale ne ba mɛɛ, umee dɛɛ nyiŋi o dɔŋ ɔ?
N sie ɛɛ lɛo kɛŋɔ n chɔg n komɛlbwa he nɛ. N chɔg n bokpega he nɛɛ kwara dɛ won cha heya aa, a som n be. Maa dɛ nyin heyaa kohona waa he te laa n waa kpɔ he bambile ta kɛɛ?
He nao kɛŋɔ n ta n te kpɔe dawɛ he nɛɛ kenɛ? Kɛ nomɛl gee ŋɔɔ n sie pilo to mɛɛ negre heya.
Nɛra n faa toma he be la, n chegɛ ba bini bane nɛɛ dɛ negre heyaa di aa?
Men soŋe Taetos dɛ tomɛ o ne ya dɔŋ asɔre te la he be. Hɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ Taetos baa negre heyaa di aa? Dabeŋkpoŋ laa n ne o kpoŋaa? Ya bwa we-ɛɛla ta beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ yaa?

Yaa dɛ ŋɔ ken nɔ, he dɛ lii kɛŋɔ ya sɔnee yaa kwaa he be kɛɛ? Akai! Korowii siee yaa bola, pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta. Yabala, wobɛlbwa yaa bol la, he wer waa yaa bola, ásɛ he won che kiŋkiŋ.

N dɛ ɔmɛ kɛ n balaa, gɛ maa dɛ nyin kɛ he do la, maa heyaa gɛɛ na, gɛ he ge aa dɛ nyin kɛ n do la, haa men gɛɛ na. N dɛ ɔmɛ kɛ mɛɛ ba na nagra, ne bɔweela, ne bandisale, ne n gbo dɔ, ne dɔŋa chɛgra, dɔŋa ŋwala, mbarafo, ne wesagasagare ɛɛ he baahnee.

Maa nyin kɛ n ba ba he be asɛ N Naa Korowii koh he wechɔga waa dɛ gel n fɛgre. N balɔ dɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra ta warɔ he bini ba tea bini ta chɔgɛ ba charɛ ba liire ba wedoŋa ne ba jwamane ne ba pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla baa dɛɛ ɛ ta naa, n tea bini ɛɛ chɔgoo.
N tooro tenaa nɔ maa dɛ ba ń ba chɔɔ heya. N balaa, wobɛlbwa nɛra banɛ kɛɛ nɛra batoro aa di danseɛ a ta la, anee mɛɛ ba noe kɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ, gɛ Korowii Tɔn aa bagla la.
N dɛ nyin n ŋɔ he banɔ la he faa ɛ wechɔga la ne banɔ la baa kaa la be ŋɔ, n balɔ dɛ he ta gelaa, maa he gela ba, mɛɛ tɛr he deŋnee. N faa ba he be nɛɛtena la, n bolɔ, n kwaarɔ dɛɛ bol.
He fa dɛ nyin he na waane dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristoo soge n nɛɛ dɛɛ bol waa la. Too, hɛɛ nao. Kpegri ta on nyae. Wɛɛ bagle o kpegri he nɛɛ.

Ba faa kpaaro pɛl dagagre ta o sewɛ la, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ o gwɛgrɔ, kɛ Korowii kpegri nomanta o iro. Ya ne o bwa fa pɛo gwɛgre. Kɛ taraken, ya chegɛ Korowii kpegri ta dɛ dɔ mkpa, asɛ ya won do he be o kpegri la ta.

Hé nyiŋi he te dɛ na kɛŋɔ he yaradao kɛrɛdɛ kɛɛ he ta on yaradae yɔ? Hé pese he te dɛ na. He jemɛ kɛŋɔ he ne Yeesu Kristo pɛo kɛɛ? He nao kɛŋɔ he ne o ta pɛɛ te naa, ate dɛ he horɛ o waa yaradae ta.
N dɛ lii kɛŋɔ he nyiŋi yaa na naa, hɛɛ jemɔɔ kɛŋɔ yaa o waa yaradae ta horɛ.
Kɛ, ya dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛŋɔ he bɛ wechɔga dɛɛ ɛ. Nɛra nao kɛŋɔ ya ta horaa, a wer, kɛ a laa hiah. Waa aa hiah kɛŋɔ he ɛ waa aa wera. Dɛ a gelɔ a do kɛŋɔ ya te horaa, a ta waane ɛɛ.
Yaa won ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛ jo kasinteŋ la nɛ, chae a chɛ kɛ yaa chao.
Ya gwɛgrɔ hé do kpegri aa, dɛ ya sie lɛo. Ya dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛŋɔ he waa togre ka tonɛ.

A waa n chwerɛ heyaa tɔn nɔ dɛ n ta he be balɛ mɔɔ la. N dɛ ɛ gɛ asɛ dɛ bɛ sinyɛga ba kpɔ dɛɛ bol waa he be kpegri ya Dɔɔ la aa tɛ mɛ la ne. Korowii ŋɔ ń kpɔ a gɛ kpegri nɔ cha heya, o ta ŋɔe ŋɔ ń kpɔ chɔg heya.

Too, yabala, n nyoa jagɛ bonɔ. Hé so kɛrɛdɛ. Hé swɛɛ siwi kɛ hɛɛ geloo he wobɛlbwa togre ka tonɛ. Hé no n waa maa bola dɛ kpɔ ja heyaa la. Hé gel he nyoa pɛ, he bɛ dɛɛ yo. Korowii waa dɛ nyin nɛwɛnyini kohona dɛɛ tɛ bosɔɔhna la, ó cha heya.
Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nyabii.
Korowii nɛra baa lɔ bonɔ bwa dɛ na heya.
Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo na he sum dɛɛ cha heya, Kórowii bagle o nyina he nɛ, asɛ Kórowii Domadɛɛge la ne he bwa pɛ.
Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Yeesu torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Nɛwɛnyini laa lee mɛ dɛ tɛ mɛ toma nɔ. Yeesu Kristo ne o Mɛɛ Korowii waa iru seo ta laanee lee mɛ.
N ne yabala baa lɔ n be bonɔ nɔ bwaa chwera dɛɛ tɛ asɔre tena haa lɔ Galaasia harɛ ta bwa.
Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
Ya Dɔɔ ɛ N Naa Korowii tetoowa kɛŋɔ waa koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ sewɛ dɛ lɛ yaa le taraken nɛra baa dɔ liichɔga bini nɔ.
Korowii chɛ jirima saŋ te bɛlbwa. Aamen.
He waa ɛɛ mɛ anebɛlbwa. Korowiirii le heya. Yeesu Kristo aa sune he nɛɛ dɛ lɛ heyaa la waa Korowii le heya. Kɛ he denɔ dɛɛ vɛh Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la dɛɛ teŋɛ wefale ta.
Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma bɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ kasinteŋ dɛ ja anɔ la yaa dɛ bagle heyaa la ta. Nɛra bane dɛ wili heya, dɛɛ nyin dɛ berɛ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la, a waa n ŋɔ gɛ la.
Dɛ ya bini bɛl kɛɛ Korowii nyundua torome le nyundua dɛ ba bol Yeesu Kristo bwara wobɛlbwa a berɛ korɛ anɔ la yaa dɛ bagle heyaa la ta naa, Kórowii fuuh!
Gɛ ya faa bola la, gɛɛ mɛɛ bol he be ja la. Dɛ nomɛlbwa bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma bɛlbwa a korɛ anɔ la he faa noa dɛ yarada la ta naa, Kórowii fuuh!
Maa ŋɔ ken nɔ, dɛ nɛwɛnyini bee mɛɛ nyin sɔn kɛɛ Korowii be nɔ? Maa sɔn nyin nɛwɛnyini be, Korowii bee mɛɛ nyin sɔn. Dɛ nɛwɛnyini bee mɛɛ nyin sɔn te naa, n fe ta Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ ɛɛ.
Yabalawa, hé gel n ŋɔ he be ŋɔ Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma nɔ maa dɛ bol he be nɔ, nɛwɛnyini be laa a le.
Nɛwɛnyini laa tɛ mɛ gɛ wejema nɔ. Nɛwɛnyini laa bag mɛ. Yeesu Kristo gbagbaa pili a bini bag mɛ dɛ gel n jemɛ a wa.
Gɛ saŋ n faa dɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ Juda tena aa dɛ tomɔ la, he noɔ gɛ n faa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta dɛ che Korowii nɛra baa dɛ tomɔ nɛ, dɛɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa tenten, dɛɛ nyin dɛ chɔg ba toma bwa.
Dɛ n dɛ teŋɛ ya Juda tena Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛ la ta gwaa n nyudɔŋa baa ɛ Juda tena kɛrɛdɛ, dɛɛ teŋɛ ya Juda tena nawee waa ge ta gwaa nomɛlbwa.
Kɛ Korowii te lee mɛ kwaraa mɔɔ ba lol mɛ, asɛ dɛ sune n nɛɛ dɛ cha mɛ dɛ kpɔ mɛ do toma nɔ ta.
A ɛo silɛɛ kɛŋɔ o gel n jemɛ o Bie la dɛ́ won bagle o Amanesoma nɛnhɔɔhra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la be. Waa lee mɛ gɛ la, n ta taarɛ bagle nomɛlbwa ŋɔ ó bag mɛ gɛ maa ɛ mɔɔ dɛ jo o toma la ta.
N ta Jerusalam laŋɛ dɛ́ ka na nɛra baa tɔ sie ɛ Yeesu toroma n nɛɛ la mɔɔ. Pae n den pa sie kaa Arebia harɛ. Maa le bela la, n baa kaa Damaskɔs.
A habɔɔ bene atoroo mɔɔ n la Pita be Jerusalam dɛ́ ka chɔɔro dɛ jemɔ. Maa la Pita chɔɔra la, n kaa so o be tɔpera fi dɛ anue.
N ta Yeesu toroma la bɛlbwa nae bela ka ja Pita nɛ. Jems waa ɛ ya Dɔɔ la nime la gee n berɛ na ja Pita nɛ.
Kasinteŋii mɛɛ chwerɛ la. Korowii gba jemɔ kɛ nyosone laa.
A habɔɔ la, n la Siiria harɛ ne Silisia harɛ bwɛɛre ane ta.
A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ Judia harɛ asɔre tena la ta men nae siwi ne mɔɔ.
Dɛ n waa nɛra aa dɛ bol la gboo baa no. N waa baa dɛ bol laanee kɛŋɔ, nɛn o faa dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa laanee bera lɛ Yeesu Amanesoma ba faa yaradaa o koh a waa hah ba dɛɛ nyin ba kpoe la dɛɛ bol la.
Ba chegɛ a ta dɛ jam Korowii a wa.
A habɔɔ bene fi dɛ anaarɛ la, n berɔ la Jerusalam ja. N kpɔ Taetos ja n nɛ, asɛ ya ne Banabas la.

Korowiirii gela n jemɛ dɛ la ba be. N tɔ sie la asɔre tena nomonome be n ne ba gbo so, n bagle Yeesu Amanesoma maa dɛ bol nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ be la bwa ásɛ ba jemɛ n wa, ásɛ n toma maa ɛa ne anɔ la n taa dɛ ba ɛɛ la bɛ pɛɛ ɛ.
Dɛ Grik tee Taetos anomanta o ta pen teŋe. Kɛ nomɛlbwa ta on hɛɛ ŋɔ bá teŋe o pen.

Dɛ nɛra la bane tea bini laa gɛ baa gel Taetos la. Dɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ dɛ ɛ ba te kɛŋɔ asɔre tenaa ban ken dɛ sɔh jo ya bini, dɛ baa nyiŋi dɛ́ jemɛ ya asɔre tena dɔe yaa dɔ ya te Mosis Mmara aa wola yaa vɔrɔwe la bini. Dɛ ba dɛ nyin ba hɛ yaa yá berɛ dɛɛ ɛ waa yaa vɛah la.
Yaa wola nyin kɛ ba won berɛ Amanesoma la sie ásɛ kasinteŋ la do le tɛ heyaa la, ya ta ban sie tɛɛ kwaraa.

Nɛra la bini banɔ la baa dɛ lii ba nɛnjena la ta wone dɔ wobɛlbwa bol dɛ ja Amanesoma maa dɛ bol la ta. N te kwaraa waane laa ba nɛnjena ɛɛ wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛnjena o, nɛnjegre o, a laa Korowii te ɛɛ nyiŋi.
Ba gbabir nao kɛŋɔ Korowiirii kpɔ o waa la tɛ mɛ ŋɔ ń bol nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la be, gɛ waa kpɔ o waa tɛ Pita ŋɔ ó bol Juda tena be la.
Dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ Korowii aa bagle o kpegri Yeesu torome Pita nɛɛ wɛɛ tomɛ Juda tena bini la, gɛɛ o bagle o kpegri men maa ɛ Yeesu torome nɔ nɛɛ mɛɛ tomɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ bini.

Jems ne Pita ne Jɔn nomɛlbwa aa dɛ yer ba asɔre tena nomonome la gbabir sɛoh kɛŋɔ Korowiirii kpɔ gɛ toma nɔ do n nɔn ta dɛ cha mɛ a ta. Anomanta ba do nɔɔra n nɔn ta dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ nɛmbeŋkpoŋii ya bwa Korowii toma nɔ bini. Ya nyoa pɛo, asɛ ba sɛh kɛŋɔ n ne Banabas ɛɛ bol Yeesu waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ, asɛ ba gee bagle Juda tena.
Waa baa bola ja bwaa kɛŋɔ yáa lii nyaara waa dɛɛ cha ba. Dɛ gɛ waa nɔ ɛ waa n ge aa swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛa wubwa.
Pita aa ba Anteɔk la, n diu kasinteŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ ɛ waa aa wola a ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ.

Jems fa tomɛ nɛra bane Anteɔk. Gɛ nɛra nɔ aa wola Anteɔk balɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ Pita ne asɔre tena la bini bane baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la pɛo dɛɛ di kwa. Kɛ Jems toroma la aa baa jo Anteɔk la, Pita chwa a gɛ nɛra la be kwaa dii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ ɔmɛ kɛŋɔ hɔɔhra la bɛ ba ŋɔ waa Juda tena nawee waa dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ ba ne nɛra baa wola pena teŋne aa kwaa di la ta teŋɛ.
Pita koh nɛra sie bɔr ɔma waa dɛ nyogre ŋwɛnɛ. Yabala Juda tena baa ɛ asɔre tena la kar la ge koh nɛra sie bɔr ɔma waa dɛ ɛ gɛ Pita aa ɛa la. Banabas gba nyogre ŋwɛnɛ, dɛ teŋɛ ba nɛ.

Maa naa kɛŋɔ ba nyogre Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la ŋwɛnɛ la, n di Pita kasinteŋ yabala la bwa siwi ta ŋɔ, "Ŋwɛnɛ besoo taa a che he ɛ Juda te haa wola Juda tena nawee waa la ta teŋɛ dɛ ŋɔ he hamɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ŋɔ báa teŋɛ a ta nɔ?
Ya te nɔ, Juda tenaa ya nyare ne ya mɛɛnanar, ba lolɛ yaa, asɛ ya ge ɛ Juda tena. Nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ asɛ Juda tena ɛɛ yer ba 'wechɔg-ɛɛra' la laa yaa.

Kɛ, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Mosis Mmara ta teŋa laa gela nɛn ɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi, nemenɛ kɛŋɔ haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo waa la dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo. Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ ya ge kpɔ ya yarada do, asɛ Korowii koh o waa dɛ lɛ yaa kɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi. Mmara ta teŋa laa dɛɛ ba yaa nɛndɛɛga ɛɛ Korowii be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Mmara ta teŋa aa won gel nomɛlbwa waa su Korowii siwi.

"Yaa dɛ nyin ya che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su Korowii siwi la, an gela ya vɛh Mmara ta teŋa dɛ berɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra la. Dɛ a do gɛ naa, dɛ Yeesu Kristoo dɛɛ cha dɛ gel wechɔga ɛɛ won dɛɛ kaa sie naa? Akai!
Mosis Mmara n gbagba faa ŋɔa o ta teŋa ta tɔnɔ dɔe la, dɛ n berɔ berɛ habɔɔ dɛ baa teŋɛ o ta naa, n ta wechɔga ɛɛ yaa?
A gɛ Mmara laanee pili n sie dɛ gel n jemɛ waa dɛ chwa o ta teŋa. Mosis Mmara la te be pera te naa, n do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa sewa. N ne Mmara la toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa, ásɛ n won do le tɛ Korowii.

Baa kpaa Yeesu Kristo pɛl o dagagre ta la, a kaa ɛ kɛ n ne onee sewa. Anomanta n soga nɔ maa soga nɔ, n gbagba laa dɛɛ hwee nɔ. Korowii Bie Yeesu Kristoo soge n nɛɛ dɛɛ hwee la. N hweera nɔ maa dɛ hwee nɔ, yarada maa yaradao la, anee gela n do le la. Korowii Bie nɔ nyin mɛ kohona dɛ kpɔ o hweera charɛ n nyu.
Maa sɛh gel Korowii nɛra nɛɛ suna la ɛ pɛɛ. Dɛ Mosis Mmara ta teŋa taa a che nɛn ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi aa, amɔ te dɛ pɛɛpɛɛ Yeesu Kristo sewɛ."
Ee, Galaasia tena, he gɛnoo! Ya ta heyaa baglɛ gɛ aa ɛa Yeesu Kristo sewɛ dagagre ta bwa naa? Aah bɔkwaa bera negre heyaa jaɔ?
Hé gel n bɔɔ heyaa webeŋkpoŋ. Mosis Mmara ta teŋa taa a che he dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa, kɛɛ haa no Yeesu Kristo waa la dɛ yaradaa taa a che nɔ?
He gɛnɔ ga! Korowii Domadɛɛgee gela he won pa mun Yeesu nɛɛ teŋa ta. Ɛrɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he kpɔ he gbagba kpegri ɛ ka tonɛ nɔɔ?
Amɔ waa he sie aa naa ne anɔ la haa noa la bwa ɛ pɛɛ aa? Dɛ a ɛ pɛɛ te naa, dɛ aa were kwaraa!
Korowii Domadɛɛge nɔ waa tɛ heya, dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa he bini nɔ, dɛ Mosis Mmara ta teŋa waa o ɛ a bwa kɛɛ haa dɛ no o waa dɛ yaradaa la waa yɔ?
Hé nyiŋi Abraham na. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "O yarada Korowii, asɛ Korowii che o yarada la ta dɛ lɛo kɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi."
A chɛ kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ yarada Korowii la, banee Abraham naanar.

Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ yarada taa aa ba chega asɛ Korowii lɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la kɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su o siwi. Korowii bol Amanesoma la waa Abraham be dɛ ŋɔ, "He nɛɛ aa ba chega Korowii swee nɛwɛnyini bwa andɛɛga."
Yaradaa Abraham yarada Korowii asɛ o swee andɛɛga tɛo. Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa yarada Korowii la, Korowii ɛɛ sweero andɛɛgaa.
Nɛra baa kpɔ sie dawɛ Mosis Mmara gbo ta kɛŋɔ a taa ba che Kórowii lɛɛ ba la, bá bwɛɛlɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a lɔ Korowii Tɔn bini kɛŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa to Mosis Mmara la bɛlbwa saŋ bɛlbwa wee la, ó bwɛɛlɛ."

Taraken nɔ, ya nao kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa won che Mosis Mmara la ta dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa won teŋɛ a bwa ta. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "Naate o waa aa togra dɛ su Korowii siwi la, wɛɛ yaradao dɛ dɔ o nyu."
Nɛn waa dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara ta la, yarada laa dɛɛ ba o lɛɛ. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa wona dɛɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la bwa ta la, on dɛɛ ba o nyu dɔe."
Yeesu Kristo lɛ nyotaahna aa lɔ Mosis Mmara la ta bɛ won teŋa la dawɛ o nɛɛ dɛ lɛ yaa le a ta. Korowii Tɔn baglɔ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa baa sagɔ daa ta la, Korowii nyotaahna lɔ o nɛ."

Korowii fa bagɛ Abraham nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo wedɛɛgee. Gɛ aa ɛ asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ dɔ a gɛ wedɛɛge nɔ la waa o lɛ nyotaahna la dawɛ o nɛɛ dɛ lɛ yaa le a ta la, ásɛ a che yarada ta Korowii tɛ yaa o Domadɛɛge la waa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tɛ yaa la.
Yabalawa, hé gel n kpɔ harɛ bonɔ waane magɛ waa nɔ maa dɛ bol nɔ. Dɛ nɛra banɛ fɔwɛ fɔo o do kpegri aa, nɛmpɛɛ aa won puru ba habɔɔ, nomɛlbwa ge aa berɛ won berɔ ba habɔɔ.
Korowii Tɔn la baglɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii bagɛ Abraham ne o naa nyoa. Korowii Tɔn la ta ŋɔe ŋɔ Korowii bagɛ Abraham ne o naanar nyoa. Dɛ́ Abraham ne o naa. O baglɔ kɛŋɔ Abraham naa beŋkpoŋ, onee kɛ Kristo.

Waa maa dɛ nyin n bagle laanee kɛŋɔ Korowii ne Abraham fɔwɛ fɔo bɛl, asɛ Korowii bagɛ Abraham nyoa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ di fɔo la taa. Mosis Mmara nɔ ge la, fɔo nɔ habɔɔ bene lafraanaarɛ dɛ fifraatoroo a ge ba. Dɛ ɛrɛɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ won ɛ dɛɛ chɔg gɛ fɔo nɔ dɛ teŋe Korowii nyobaga la ta nɔ?

Dɛ Mosis Mmara la ta teŋa taa aa ba chega Korowii ɛ yaa o wedɛɛge la te naa, ate dɛ o nyoa waa bagɛ Abraham la ɛ pɛɛ. Kɛ gɛ laa a do. Nyoa Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham la waa o sune o nɛɛ dɛ chao, dɛ ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo wedɛɛgee la.

Aah dɛ bɔkwa waa Korowii tɛ yaa Mosis Mmara laɔ? Wechɔga jema waa o kpɔa ja yaa. Korowii ɛo kɛŋɔ Ḿmara la do le dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ Abraham naa la aa bala. Abraham naa nɔɔ Korowii bagɛ nyoa la la. Nyundua toromaa Korowii gel ba ba Mosis Mmara la ne ba tɛ yaa. Nɛn nɛɛ nyundua toroma la ba chig dɛ kpɔ Mmara la tɛo, asɛ o ge kpɔ tɛ ya naanar.
Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa la ge la, o gbo waaa, nɛmbeŋkpoŋ waa ta keame hiaih.

Amɔ dɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ ne nyoo Korowii aa bagɛ yaa la aa jo kɛɛ? A dɛ jo. Dɛ nɛwɛnyini fe dɔ mmara bɛl waa dɛ ba wona togre nɛra ásɛ ba dɔ ba nyu aa, ate nomɛlbwa waa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ mmara la ta la, o waa fe ɛɛ su Korowii siwii kɛŋɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge.

Korowii Tɔn la baglɔ kɛŋɔ wechɔga vɔrɔwe nɛwɛnyini bwa, ásɛ Korowii nyobaga waa bagɛ yaa la ɛ nɛra baa yarada Yeesu Kristo la gbo kwa. Anomanta nɛra baa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo laanee Korowii ɛɛ ba o nyobaga kwaa la kpɔe tɛ.
Yeesu Kristo yaradae waa nɔ aa wola balɛ mɔɔ la, dɛ Mosis Mmara la vɔrɔwe yaa kɛŋɔ nɛra baa do ba dea ken. Yeesu Kristo yaradae waa nɔɔ bala mɔɔ ya ta dɔ ya te.
Dɛ Mosis Mmara nɔɔ dɛɛ nyiŋi yaa mɔɔ Yeesu Kristo ba. Waa bala la, o yaradae taa aa ba chega asɛ ya waa su Korowii siwi, asɛ o lɛ yaa kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga.
Yeesu Kristo yarada waa nɔ aa tel ya be nɔ, Mosis Mmara la laa dɔ yaa kpa.
Haa yarada Yeesu Kristo la nomanta, he bwa ɛ Korowii bii.
He banɔ la ba faa sɔ heyaa Korowii nee ásɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo ɛ beŋkpoŋ la, Yeesu Kristo daa he kpɔ gɛ la.
Anomanta pegra bɛlbwa toole he baah kpa. Juda tena oo, nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ yoo, yoma oo, deheɛre oo, haahna oo, baala oo, he bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ Yeesu Kristo be pera.
Dɛ he ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛra te naa, ate Abraham naanaree heya. Kon Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham nyoa la, he gee dɔɔ.
N waa maa dɛ nyin n bol laanee kɛŋɔ nɛnjen biee dɛɛ so o mɛɛ bug ta dɛɛ di o kwaa bwa te, kɛ o taa ɛ bechala la te, o ne ba dem nɛndɔɔla gba waa beŋkpoŋ. Kɛ on gee dɔ o mɛɛ kwaa bwa.
O ta ɛ bechala aa, o lɔ nɛra lɔga. Ban dɛɛ nyiŋi o komɛlbwa ta, dɛ ka tel tɔpere o mɛɛ aa doa la mɔɔ ba kpɔ komɛlbwa do o nɔn ta.
Gɛɛ a fa do ya gba nɛ. Dɛ ya do kɛ bechale ken, asɛ koŋkwaa aa dɛ di kpegri harɛ bonɔ la ɛɛ di kpegri ya nɛ.
Korowii tɔpere la aa sua la, o tomɛ o gbagba Bie, asɛ nɛnhaah lolɔ harɛ nɔ ta, asɛ o ɛ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara ta la bɛl.
Gɛ Korowii aa ɛ dɛ won lɛ ya nɛra Mosis Mmara la faa vɔrɔwe yaa la waa o ɛ gɛ, ásɛ dɛ won kpɔ yaa ɛ o bii.
Korowii aa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ o bagle kɛŋɔ o biirii yaa la nomanta, o tɛ yaa o Bie la Domadɛɛge la o so ya nɛ, asɛ ya won dɛɛ yerɔ "n Mɛɛ" kɛŋɔ bie aa dɛ yerɛ o mɛɛ gɛ la.
Taraken nɔ, nɛndɔɔla laa heyaa kpa, Korowii biirii heya. Haa ɛ Korowii bii la nomanta, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa kwaa waa dɛ tɛ o bii bwa laanee.
Wubwa la, dɛ haa Korowii jemɛ, anomanta dɛ koŋkwaa aa wola Korowii gbagba ɛɛ la ɔma vɔrɔwe heya.

Taraken nɔ haa jemɛ Korowii nɔ, gɛ laa ge aa, taraken nɔ Korowii aa jemɛ heyaa nɔ, ɛrɛɛ a ɛ asɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin he berɛ habɔɔ dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ kwaa aa wola kpegri bɛlbwa dɔe, ne waa aa dɔ wesoma nɔɔ? Ɛrɛɛ he berɛ dɛɛ nyin he kpɔ he te tɛa ásɛ a vɔrɔwe heyaa ja nɔɔ?
Kɛ he ta dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara ta dɛɛ maŋkura tɔpejena ne korobie ane ne bene ane kenɛ?
He waa dɛ we n nɛ. Amɔ toma maa ɛa he be la bwa ɛ pɛɛ aa?
N poo heya, yabala, n fa dɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara ta dɛ gel, dɛ berɛ do gɛ haa doa nɔ. Anomanta hé ta che kiŋkiŋ dɛ gel a ta teŋa dɛ do gɛ maa doa nɔ. N faa lɔ he be la, he ta men wechɔge bɛlbwa ɛɛ.
Kɛ he dɛ lii wee waa gela n ba he be logla la dɛ ba bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la laɔ? Dɛ n bwara dɛ wee mɛ.
Dɛ n weela la gelɔ n kpoŋa do kpegri, kɛ he ta men haih-haih ɛɛ dɛ vɛɛh mɛ. Gɛ he fe aa lɛ nyundua torome Korowii aa tomɔ la, gɛɛ he lɛɛ mɛ. Gɛ he fe aa lɛ Yeesu Kristo gbagba la, gɛɛ he lɛɛ mɛ.
He sie faa lɛ n nɛɛ kohona la, taraken te bɔkwa waa bera ba nɔ? Mɛɛ wonoo ŋɔ gɛ saŋ la he fe wonaa, he fe foromi he sibie kwaraa tɛ mɛ.
Aah n kasinteŋ maa dɛ di heyaa nɔɔ gela n berɛ ɛ he dɔm taraken nɔ kɛɛ?

Nɛra maa bol ba waa ŋɔ ba dɛ wili heyaa la, ba swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ kɛŋɔ baa dɛ nyin he waa la, kɛ waa aa lɔ ba nyu bini la aa were. Ba waa baa dɛ nyin ɛɛ laanee kɛŋɔ bá pere n ne he baah ásɛ dɛ fe berɛ he sie kaa ba be.
Nɛn waa nyina wer te, kɛ waa aa che a ta asɛ nɛn ɛɛ nyin o dɔŋ waa la, a taa kasinteŋ do. A gɛ waa nɔ ɛ kasinteŋ saŋ bɛlbwa. N lɔ he be noo, a ɛ kasinteŋ, n toole he be noo, a ɛ kasinteŋ.
N bii maa lolɛ heyaa Yeesu Kristo waa ta, he ta he da charɛ dɛ do kɛ Yeesu Kristo aa, he gelɔ n tea berɛ dɛɛ wee mɛ kɛ lol tea aa dɛ we haah la.
N fe dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n fe aa lɔ he be taraken, dɛ fe berɛ n nyoa. He waa ɛɛ mɛ anebɛlbwa
He banɔ la haa dɛ nyin kɛ hɛɛ teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la ta la, he ta noɛ gɛ Mosis Mmara la aa dɛ bagle aa?
Korowii Tɔn ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ bibaala banɛɛ Abraham dɔ aa? Dɛ bibaala banɛ nɔ bɛl nya ɛ yom, asɛ nɛɛte la te nya ta yom ɛɛ.
Gɛ baa ne haah naa dɛ lolɛ bie laanee Abraham ne o yomhaah la lolɛ o bilogle la. Kɛ o binɛɛte la o nya aa wola yom ɛɛ la te, Korowiirii bagɔ nyoa dɛ tɛo bie la.

Yaa kpɔ haahna banɛ nɔɔ magɛ Korowii ne nɛwɛnyini nyopɛo dɔe fɔo bele anɛ la. Ba bɛlbwa chegɔ tɛ fɔo la beŋkpoŋ. Heega waa ɛ Abraham yomhaah la chegɔ tɛ fɔo la nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii aa fɔwa Sinai Bwe ta bela Korowii aa kpɔ o Mmara la tɛ Mosis la. A gɛ fɔo la tenaa ɛ yoma la.
Heegaa chega tɛ Sinai Bwe waa lɔ Arebia harɛ ta la. O tenten, on chega tɛ fini Jerusalam bwɛjen nɔ o nɛra bwa aa ɛ yoma nɔ.
Haah waa wola yom ɛɛ la ge chegɔ tɛ Jerusalam la waa lɔ nyundua la. Onee ya nya nɔ,

dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn la bini ŋɔ, "Hambara, gel he sie lɛ! Haah haa wola loltea weweele nae ka, gel he sie lɛ hɛɛ moo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ haah la o jaa raa chwao la ɛɛ ba dɔ biirii gwaa onɔ la o jaa raa wola on chwae la."
Gɛ Korowii aa bagɛ Abraham nyoa dɛ gel o lolɛ Aesek la, gɛɛ o bagɛ nyoa ya ge ɛ o bii.
A gɛ saŋ la, dɛ Abraham bie la waa lolɔ gɛ baa ne haah naa dɛ lolɛ la, dɛ o chegɛ onɔ la Korowii aa chegɛ o Domadɛɛge nɛɛ dɛ tɛ Abraham la nɛɛ taeh. Gɛ waa nɔ ta lole fini nɔ.
Kɛ a bwa habɔɔ la, ɛrɛɛ Korowii Tɔn la bagle ɔ? O baglɔ ŋɔ, "Doŋi yomhaah la ne o bie la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ yomhaah la bie la ne haah la waa wola yom ɛɛ la bie la aa won pɛ di ba mɛɛ kapɛrɛ a magre."
Anomanta, yabala, ya ta yomhaah bii ɛɛ. Haah waa wola yom ɛɛ la biirii yaa.
Ya di ya nyu. Yeesu Kristo foo yaa, anomanta ya ta nɛndɔɔla ɛɛ kpa. Waa foo heyaa nɔ, hé che kiŋkiŋ. He bɛ gel ba kpɔ waa dɛɛ ha heyaa kpa.
Hé gel n ŋɔ he be, dɛ he teŋɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ ta dɛ gel ba teŋe he pena aa, dɛ waa Yeesu Kristo aa ɛa tɛ heyaa la ta tɔnɔ dɔe tɛ heyaa kwaraa. Men Pɔɔl, men ŋɔa.
Hé gel n kwaa ŋɔ he be he no kɛrɛdɛ, nomɛlbwa waa gela ba teŋe o pen ásɛ o waa su Korowii siwi la, a chɛ kɛ o teŋɛ Mosis Mmara la bwa ta.
He banɔ la haa dɛ nyin he che Mosis Mmara ta teŋa ta ásɛ dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛga he waa su Korowii siwi la, he pere he te le Yeesu Kristo be. He ta nɛra Korowii aa sune ba nɛɛ la nɛɛ jae.
Ya te ken nɔ, ya chegɛ yarada yaa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la ta dɛɛ hwɛgɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge ɛɛ geloo ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su Korowii siwi.
Yeesu Kristo ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋa nɔ ta te, ba teŋe nɛn pen oo, ba ta o pen teŋoo, a laa ɛ wehiah. Waa aa hiah laanee kɛŋɔ nɛn aa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo asɛ gɛ yarada nɔ won gel wɛɛ nyin o dɔŋa.
He fa dɛ teŋɛ ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge la ta kɛrɛdɛ. Bɔkwaa bala haa wola berɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la ta kpaɔ? Bɔkwaa tɔ heyaa ŋwɛnɛ ɔ?
Korowii waa le heyaa he ba o be la, o be laa gɛ liire nɔ le.
Ba ŋɔ, "Iisi tama ken won paanoo damanta hoeh," anomanta hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi liire aa do ken nɔ dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ.
N te ta dɛ yarada heya. Ya Dɔɔ la ya bwa aa dɛ tomɛ la nomanta n dɛ yarada heyaa kɛŋɔ haa liifalee dɔ. Naate waa dɛ wili heyaa nɔ, gɛ bwa waa doa, Korowii ɛɛ bɔɔ kemee.
Yabalawa, dɛ n fe ta dɛ bol ŋɔ penteŋa hiaoh waa, nɛra fe chegɛ n nɛɛ ken aa? Dɛ n fe kpɔ penteŋa waa dɛ ja Yeesu Kristo dagagre ta sewa la waa ta dɛɛ bol aa, nɛra fe dɛ vɛh n wobol nɔ naa?
A ka n te wa aa, nɛra baa dɛ wili heyaa ŋɔ hé teŋe he pena la, ba dɛ nyin aa, bá fɔgɛ ba lure ge.

Yabalawa, Korowiirii le heyaa tɛ o te, dɛ lɛ heyaa asɛ Mmara la bɛ heyaa vɔrɔwe kpa. Kɛ haa dɔ he te nɔ, he bɛ gel a do he som kohona, asɛ hɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la bwa he bwadabii aa dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ɛ. Hé kpɔ dɔŋa nyina dɛɛ tomɛ dɔŋa.
Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, webeŋkpoŋ bɛl lole dɛ he dɛ ɛ aa, dɛ he tonɛ Mosis Mmara la bwa. Onee kɛŋɔ, "Nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he gbagba."
Dɛ haa dɔŋa nyin, dɛɛ yo aa, amɔ te hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ. A waa laa aa, he dɛ ba dɔŋa baah chɔga kwaraa.
Waa maa dɛ nyin n bol laanee kɛŋɔ hé kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la, ásɛ wɛɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ. Dɛ o dɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ aa, haa wechɔga he nɛwɛnyini mar aa dɛ nyin la ɛɛ ba,

dɛkalkɛŋɔ waa he nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu la aa dɛ nyin la, Korowii Domadɛɛge la aa an nyin. Nɛwɛnyini mar wenyina ne Korowii Domadɛɛge wenyina aa jo. Anomanta waa haa dɛ nyin ɛɛ la, haa wona ba dɛ ɛ.
Dɛ he kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la wɛɛ bagle heyaa ŋwɛnɛ te naa, Mosis Mmara la aa won di kpegri he nɛ.
Nomɛlbwa jemɛ nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ tetoowa. Anee kɛŋɔ jwamane ne wedoŋa ne pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla te bwa soosiwi,
ne voga toma ne sɔm wa. A bini anee kɛŋɔ nɛra ne ba dɔŋa aa dɛ di dɔm dɛɛ yo, ne sɔnnyin kohona, ne bandisale ne sibegra, ne nɛra ne ba bala baah pegra, ne nyopɛo bɛ dɔe,

ne bɔweela, ne dɛɛra, dɛ dɛɛ dɛɛ do gbɔga kohona, ne wesale aa do ken nɔ. N fa ŋɔ he be wubwa ŋɔ hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ ŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ gɛ waa nɔ la, baa Korowii Kora la ta jae ba. N berɔ kwaa dɛɛ lii heyaa ja.
Korowii Domadɛɛge la te, kwaa waa dɛ tɛ laanee dɔŋa nyina, ne silɛɛ, ne nyopɛo, ne bambile dɔe, ne tesom, ne wedɛɛga ɛɛ, ne kasinteŋ dɔe,
ne pwɛre doe, dɛ gel nɛn won o te lawa. Harɛ bɛlbwa toole dɛ ki a gɛ waa nɔ.
Nɛra baa ɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛra la, ba kpaa ba nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ wenyina ne ba liichɔga bwa pɛl Yeesu dagagre la ta dɛ kpoa.
Taraken nɔ, ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge laanee tɛ yaa mkpa, anomanta a chɛ kɛ ya kpɔ ya te tɛo dɛ gel wɛɛ bagle yaa ŋwɛnɛ ya soga bini.
A ta chɛ kɛ yaa ɛ jenu. A ta chɛ kɛ yaa ir dɔŋa bwaawee. A ta chɛ kɛ ya dɔ bɔweela dɔŋa nɛ.

Yabala, dɛ he lawɛ he bini bɛl wechɔga bɛlbwa ta naa, he banɔ la haa dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la kɛrɛdɛ la, hé togro. Kɛ he bɛ o nɛɛ nyɛg te, hé togro sipwɛra ne. He gbagba ge la, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ heyaa ba negre do wechɔga ta.
Waa pu he dɔŋ dɛ ɛ bone tɛo waa, hé chao. He dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, dɛ Yeesu Kristo mmara la taa hɛɛ teŋɛ la.
Dɛ nɛn ta nɛnjen ɛɛ dɛɛ lii o te nɛnjen aa, dɛ o dɛ negre o te.
Hé bɛlbwa nyiŋi o we-ɛɛla na. Dɛ a wer aa, ó gel o sie lɛ. Kɛ he bɛ he te kpɔ dɛɛ magɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ nyin sɔn,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa ne o bonee wɛɛ ba chega.
Nomɛlbwa baa dɛ baglo Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ la, kondɛɛge bɛlbwa haa dɔ la, tɛ naate waa dɛ bagle la.
He bɛ he te dɛɛ negre. Haa jemɛ kɛ baa Korowii negre kɛɛ? Kwaa nɛn aa dua la, anee wɛɛ komɛ.

Dɛ nɛn teŋɛ o nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu pɛla kwaa nɛɛ dɛ du wechɔga aa, sewee wɛɛ ba koma. Dɛ nɛn teŋɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la tetoowaa ta dɛ du wedɛɛga aa, wɛɛ komɛ mkpa waa wola jaga dɔe bwa laanee Domadɛɛge la be.
He bɛ gel ya bwara ɛɛ hwah yaa wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta. Dɛ ya swɛɛ siwi a ta naa, Korowii tɔpere la telaa, yaa komaa.
Anomanta saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ ŋwɛnɛ lole naa, yáa cha nomɛlbwa, a laa kɛŋɔ nɛra ya ne baa dɛ di lola Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ teŋa nɔ ta nɔ.
N gbagbaa chwerɛ bonɔ la. Hé na gɛ maa chwera a do bare gɛ!
Nɛra baa dɛ do heyaa ŋɔ hé teŋni he pena la, nɛra sie ta waa baa ɛ gɛ. Ba dɛ ɛ gɛ ásɛ Juda tena na dɛ bɛ ba yaradae baa yarada Yeesu dagagre ta sewa waa koh dɛ hah ba.
Nɛra baa sɛah ba teŋni ba pena la, ba gba aa Mosis Mmara la bwa ta teŋɛ. Ba dɛ nyin ba teŋni he pena ásɛ dɛ won kpɔ a waa dɛɛ ta nyoa.
N te aa n te maŋkura wobɛlbwa ta. Yeesu dagagre ta sewa la waa taa n te ɛɛ jaagi. O seo la gelɔ harɛ ta bonɔ waa berɛ wepɛɛ n be, a ta kpegri dɔe n nɛɛ kpa.
Penteŋa ne o bɛ teŋa te ta hiaih kwaraa. Waa aa hiah laanee kɛ Korowii aa charɛ ya liire ya ɛ nɛnfala.
Nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ waa maa dɛ bagle nɔ ta ba soga bini la, Kórowii na ba sum dɛ tɛɛ ba bambisɔɔhna. Banee o nɛra Israel tena la.
Nomɛlbwa bɛ men yɔna do kpa. Yeesu Kristo toma maa dɛ ɛ la, a ŋwɛra pɛla lɔ n nɛ.
Yabala, yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya. Aamen.
Men Yeesu Kristo torome Pɔɔlee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowii tetooraa o tɛ mɛ toma nɔ. N chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ he nɛra haa lɔ Ɛfesos dɛ ɛ Korowii nɛra dɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ kasinteŋ ne la.
Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
Hé gel ya jam ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o cha yaa wedɛɛga la bwa aa le o Domadɛɛge be la ta, asɛ yaa na som o be nyundua, pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.
Korowii felo dɛ le yaa tɛ o te saŋ la o faa wola harɛ gba tae la, dɛ ŋɔ o dɛ ba gela ya ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ yá won do kaih dɛ bɛ doŋa bɛlbwa dɔ o be.
O nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa waa o fel jemɛ ya waa cheg kɛŋɔ wɛɛ koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ kpɔ yaa ɛ o bii. O tetooraa o chega gɛ.
O Binyini la waa o sune ya nɛɛ dɛ ta tea dɛ cha yaa gɛ ásɛ nɛra won kpɛɛro ya sum waa dɛ na kohona la wa.
O Binyini laanee lɛ ya seo sewɛ. O chalee yawɛ yaa tɛ Korowii, asɛ o kpɔ ya wechɔga dɛɛ kɛ yaa. Anee dɛɛ bagle suna waa sune ya nɛɛ kohona dɛɛ cha yaa la.
O ta dɛ cha yaa kɛrɛdɛ ya won dɔ wejema ne liire.
Gɛ bwa Korowii aa ɛ Yeesu Kristo waa cheg o tetoora ta a fa sɔh yaa la, o berɔ pili a bwa bini tɛ yaa ya won jemɛ gɛ aa su o siwi o chega gɛ saŋ la,
asɛ a ɛ gɛ saŋ la waa liira la. O chega kɛŋɔ wɛɛ geloo nyundua ne harɛ ta komɛlbwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, asɛ Yeesu Kristo ɛ ba Dɔɔ.
Ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa ba ɛ beŋkpoŋ la waa o le yaa tɛ o te. Korowii o yon dɛɛ cheg gɛ wobɛlbwa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ asɛ a yon ɛ gɛ waa dɛ nyin la, on fela le yaa tɛ o te
ásɛ nɛra won nyiŋi ya banɔ la yaa fela dɔ hwɛga Yeesu Kristo waa ta la, dɛ kpɛɛro, dɛ tɛo jirima.

Baa bagle heyaa kasinteŋ dɛ le Amanesoma la aa dɛ lɛ heyaa la ta la, he gba sɛoh dɛ ja beŋkpoŋri ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa ɛa la ta. Haa yarada Korowii dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo la, o kpɔ o Domadɛɛge tɛ heyaa gɛ waa bagɛ heyaa nyoa la. O Domadɛɛge la lɔ ya nɛɛ dɛ ɛ nso kɛŋɔ ya ɛ Korowii nɛra.
O Domadɛɛge la taa a che ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ yaa dɔ kwaa Korowii aa bagɛ o nɛra nyoa laanee. Anee bagla kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ lɛ o nɛra bwaa ta dɛ lɛ sɔn ne jirima tɛ o te.
A waa gela maa no he yarada haa dɛ yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo dɛɛ nyin Korowii nɛra la bwa la,
n ta dɛ jam Korowii he waa saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ heya.
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii la waa dɔ jirima kɛrɛdɛ ga la, ó ja heyaa wejema, dɛ chaah he sie ásɛ he won dɛɛ jemɛ o waa saŋ bɛlbwa,
dɛ pili he sie dɛ gel he won jemɛ hwɛga Korowii aa le heyaa he dɔ a do kan kohona la kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ wedɛɛga waa bagɛ o nɛra nyoa ŋɔ baa dɔɔ la kan taeh,
dɛ berɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ kpegri Korowii aa dɔa dɛɛ cha ya banɔ la yaa yaradao la kan, a ta dɔŋ dɔe. Hé lii gɛ o faa cha Yeesu Kristo o kpegri ne la, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ kpegri la tentenee ó kpɔ dɛɛ cha yaa.
O iru seo ta dɛ kpɔɔ kaa o be ka so nomombɔr o be nyundua bela,
o dɔ kpegri kɛrɛdɛ ga dɛ gwaa kpegri konchɔga aa bea yaa wola an na bwa soosiwi aa dɔa, dɛ dɔ sɔn gwaa komɛlbwa kɛɛ nomɛlbwa waa lole taraken ne nɛra baa dɛ ba bala tɔpere aa dɛ ba bala la ta.
Korowii kpɔ komɛlbwa ne nomɛlbwa bil Yeesu Kristo sie o tire ba nɛ, dɛ berɛ gel o ɛ asɔre tena bwa nyu,
asɛ ba ge ɛ o bwadabi. Onee kana ga dɛ won su harɛ nɔ bwa, kɛ asɔre tena laanee gela o di mu ka tonɛ.
He fa do kɛŋɔ he sewɔ Korowii be. He wechɔgaa gela he begre gɛ.
He fa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire dɛɛ teŋɛ wechɔga ta, dɛɛ teŋɛ konchɔga bwa yaa wola an na la dɔɔ la nɛ. O tentenee dɛɛ ɛ toma deŋnekpeg tena bambili bini.
Gɛɛ ya bwa faa ɛ, dɛɛ ɛ waa ya nɛwɛnyini mar wechɔga aa suu nɔ aa dɛ nyin, asɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ ya bwadabii pɛla ne ya liichɔga ta. Ya ne nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire bwa nɛɛ Korowii baah faa di.
Kɛ Korowii nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa kohona, ne suna o yon dɛɛ sune ya nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ la nomanta,
o ir yaa seo la ya wechɔga nomanta yaa sewa la ta, dɛ berɛ koh pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la waa dɛ tɛ yaa mkpafale. Korowii suna waa sune he nɛɛ la taa a che o lɛ heya.
Korowiirii ir ya ne Yeesu Kristo bwa seo ta, asɛ pɛɛ ya ne waa pɛa la nomanta, o berɛ tɛ ya bwa soŋnibɔra o be nyundua.

O ɛ gɛ dɛ́ kpɔ bagle nɛra baa wola toole dɛ taa ba bala asɛ ba na gɛ waa gara sune ya nɛɛ kohona dɛ cha yaa kɛrɛdɛ, gɛ waa chegɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ ta tea ɛ yaa waa nɔ bwa la. O nɛn nɛɛ suna kan kɛrɛdɛ. A ta dɔŋ dɔe.
Korowii aa lɛ heyaa ta la, o nɛn nɛɛ suna ne he yarada waa o ɛ gɛ. He gbagba be laa a le, pɛɛpɛɛ o lɛ heyaa ta dɛ tɛ heyaa mkpa.
Ya wedɛɛga ta laa a che o lɛ yaa, nomɛlbwa bɛ kpɔ dɛɛ maŋkura o te.
Korowiirii ta ya bwa. Waa ta yaa la, wedɛɛga ɛɛ waa o ta yaa ásɛ ya che Yeesu Kristo kpegri ta dɛɛ ɛa. O tɔ sie cheg yaa kɛ ya baa ɛ wedɛɛga.
Anomanta hɛ́ɛ lii gɛ he faa doa la. He ta Juda tena ɛɛ, asɛ Juda tena baa dɛ maŋkura penteŋ waa koh kɛ haa he pena teŋe dɛɛ nyiŋi he nyu baah. A ɛ nɛwɛnyini bwadabii we-ɛɛla.

He faa Kristo Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la waa jemɛ. He fa ta Juda tena Korowii aa lee ba dɛ gel ba ɛ o nɛra la nɛɛ jae. He faa nyoo Korowii aa baga dɛ kwaa o ne o nɛra fɔo dɔe la waa jemɛ. He fa ta hwɛga bɛlbwa dɔe. He faa Korowii jemɛ ó won cha heya.
Kɛ taraken he banɔ la he ne Korowii baah faa jaŋa la, Korowii koh Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa asɛ he ne o won pɛ la waa dɛ kpɔ heyaa ba o be.

On gela nyopɛo ba, dɛ gel ya banɔ la ya faa hah dɔŋa la ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Haeh ya Juda tena ne he banɔ la haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ nɔ faa hah dɔŋa la do kɛ danjwɛɛ dɛ teŋe yaa baah ta. Onee pagre a gɛ danjwɛɛ la.

O gbagba bwadabii o kpɔ ɛ gɛ dɛ sewɛ dɛ laa Mosis Mmara la laa kpɔ ya nɛ, asɛ banɔ la baa dɛ teŋɛ a ta la bɛ ba te pere le banɔ la baa wola a ta teŋɛ la nɛ. Onee wona kpɔ ya bwa pɛ dɛ begre yaa ya ɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya bwa ne onee pɛa. Gɛɛ o ɛ dɛ gel ya dɔ nyopɛo.
Waa la bwa a faa vɔrɔwe yaa ya hah dɔŋa la, o chɔg a bwa ta dagagre la ta dɛ gel ya bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ berɛ lawɛ ya ne Korowii pɛ.
O baa bagle he nɛra haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ he ne Korowii baah faa jaŋa la ne Juda tena ba ne Korowii baah aa wola jaŋɛ la bwa amanesoma kɛŋɔ nyopɛo balɔ.
Onee gela ya bwa dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la, dɛ che o nɛɛ dɛ won dɛɛ tel o Mɛɛ be.
Anomanta he ta hɔɔhra ɛɛ kpa. He ɛ bwɛɛlembii dɛ ja o nɛra la nɛ, dɛ ɛ o gbagba lola,

dɛ ja Yeesu toroma ne o keamere la nɛ. Jae haa ja ba nɛɛ do kɛŋɔ baa dɛ ma dea la. O gelɔ he do kɛŋɔ dea danjwɛ. O toroma ne o keamere laanee dea la sollogle, asɛ o gbagba gee bwedɛɛge la baa kpɔa pa dea la mun la.
Onee lawɛ banɔ la bwa ba ne waa pɛa la kpoŋe, asɛ dea la ɛɛ kpeg dɛ ɛ Korowii Dea, o nomanta.
Pɛɛ he ne waa pɛa la nomanta, he gba ja dea la Korowii aa dɛ ma o ɛ o dobɔr la ta. O Domadɛɛge la aa soge he nɛɛ la nomanta, he ɛ o dobɔr.
Gɛɛ a do men Pɔɔl baa koh kɛ n dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ bol o waa la dɛɛ bagle he banɔ la haa wola Juda tena ɛɛ dɛ do mɛ dea la, n dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ heya.
He ken no gɛ Korowii aa sune n nɛɛ dɛ cha mɛ kɛrɛdɛ n won dɛɛ cha heyaa la.
O gbagbaa pili o wesɔɔhla waa bini bag mɛ. N fa chwerɛ gɛ waa nɔ tama dɛ tɛ heya.
Dɛ he kure gɛ n faa chwera la aa, hɛɛ wonoo jemɛ kɛŋɔ n jemɛ Yeesu Kristo wesɔɔhla la bini.
Korowii fa ta o wesɔɔhla bini pile bagle saŋ la tena. Kɛ taraken o Domadɛɛge bagla o nɛra baa ɛ o toromedɛɛga ne o keamedɛɛga la be,

dɛ gel ba jemɛ kɛŋɔ pɛɛ banɔ la baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ne Yeesu aa pɛa la ne Amanesoma la baa noa la nomanta, ba ja Juda tena nɛɛ dɛ ɛ Korowii kwa, dɛ bwa ja Yeesu Kristo bwadabii ta, dɛ bwa pɛ dɛɛ di Korowii nyobaga la ge tɔnɔ.
Amanesoma toma nɔɔ Korowii kpɔ tɛ mɛ. Sunaa o sune n nɛɛ kohona dɛ cha mɛ o kpegri ne, n won dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ.
N ɛ bechala o nɛra bwa bini n fe aa wola chɛɛ, kɛ menee o le ŋɔ ń bol o Amanesoma la bagle nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ ásɛ ba ge jemɛ wedɛɛga aa wola jaga dɔe dɛ le Yeesu Kristo waa bini.
Korowii aa ta komɛlbwa ba le fini, o kpɔ waa nɔ ne gɛ a ŋwɛnɛre aa doa sɔh nɛwɛnyini. Kɛ taraken o pili a bini bag mɛ ń bol bagle nɛra bwa ba jemɛ.
O ɛ gɛ ásɛ nyundua toroma ne kwaa aa dɔ kpegri bwa dɛ do Korowii be nyundua bwa pese asɔre tena waa dɛ jemɛ gɛ bwa Korowii wejema aa kana ne gɛ waa dɛ ɛ o toma.
Gɛ waa chega wubwa la, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa bala la, a wono ɛ gɛ.
Yaa dɛ yarada Yeesu ya ne o pɛ nɔ, yaa wonoo ba Korowii be yaa wola ɔmɛ.
Anomanta waa maa dɛ soŋe heyaa laanee kɛ he bɛ gel he bwara hwah wahala maa koh he waa dɛɛ na nɔ ta. Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ he dɛ dɔ sɔn n wahala nɔ ta.
Anomanta n dɛ guŋi N Naa Korowii harɛ.
Onee komɛlbwa waa lɔ nyundua ne harɛ bwa Mɛɛ. O bee ba mɛɛnanar lɛ ba sɔn ne ba kpegri dɛɛ di.
N dɛ soŋo kɛ, chae waa dɛ cha yaa kohona a dɔ jirima nɔ nomanta, ó gel o Domadɛɛge tɛ heyaa kpegri ásɛ he won lawɛ o waa bini kiŋkiŋ he bambile bwa ne,
dɛ won dɔ yarada kɛrɛdɛ, ásɛ he won lawɛ Yeesu Kristo he ne o pɛ. N dɛ soŋo he bambile won do o nɛɛ dɛ lawɔ kɛrɛdɛ,
ásɛ he ne Korowii nɛra la bwa won jemɛ gɛ Yeesu Kristo nyina aa kana dɛ do luŋri, aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
O nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa la gwaa ya liire. Kɛ n dɛ soŋe Korowii he won jema, dɛ won dɔ o gbagba da kɛrɛdɛ ga dɛ ka tonɛ.
Hɛ́ɛ tɛ Korowii sɔn! Onee chegɛ o kpegri waa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ toma ya bini la ta dɛ won ɛ waa aa gwaa gɛ ya fe aa liira dɛɛ soŋo la.
Hé gel o dɔ jirima Yeesu Kristo ne asɔre tena waa bini saŋ bɛlbwa! Aamen.
Men Pɔɔl maa koh ya Dɔɔ waa la waa ba do mɛ dea la, n dɛ soŋe he bwa, hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ nɛra Korowii aa lee ba tɛ o te ɛɛ teŋɛ la.
Hɛ́ɛ sɔɔh bwara dɛɛ pwɛr he te, dɛ koh dɔŋa nyina waa dɛ dɔ bambile dɔŋa nɛ,
dɛ swɛɛ siwi hé ne he bala baah do wer saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ bɛ nyopɛo la Korowii Domadɛɛge aa tɛ heyaa la chɔg.
Yeesu bwadabii lɔ beŋkpoŋ, o Domadɛɛge ge lɔ beŋkpoŋ, asɛ hwɛga Korowii aa le yaa ya bwa dɔ la ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
Ya bwa Dɔɔ lɔ beŋkpoŋ. Waa ya bwa aa dɛ yarada, ne Korowii nee baa sɔ ya bwa la ge ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
Ya bwa Mɛɛɛ Korowii, o lɔ beŋkpoŋ. Onee dɔ ya bwa dɛɛ ɛ toma ya bwa bini, dɛ do ya bwa nɛ.
Kɛ ya bɛlbwa dɔ chae Yeesu Kristo aa chao. Gɛ waa dɛ nyin laanee o bɔna tɛ ya bwa gɛ del aa chɛ kɛ bɛlbwa dɔ.
Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "O kaa nyundua. Nɛra waa lag ba la teŋɛ o nɛɛ dɛ kaa, asɛ o kɛ nɛra kwa."
Baa ŋɔa ŋɔ o kaa nyundua la, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ o tɔ sie tu ba harɛ.
Nɛn waa tua la, o tentenee kaa nyundua dɛ ka do nyundujagla ásɛ dɛ won do bobɛlbwa.

Onee kɛ nɛra kwaa la. Kwaa waa kɛ nɛra laanee nɔ: O cha bane ba won che o kpegri ta dɛ ɛ o toroma, dɛ cha bane ba won che o kpegri ta dɛ bol o wa, dɛ cha bane ge baa bol o Amanesoma la. O cha bane ge baa nyiŋi o nɛra nɛɛ dɛɛ bag ba o ŋwɛnɛ ta teŋa.
Gɛɛ o ɛ dɛ cha nɛra ba won ɛ o toma dɛ cha dɔŋa Yéesu Kristo bwadabii la won do kpegri,

asɛ ya bwa won dɔ nyopɛo yarada yaa yarada Korowii Bie ne jema yaa jemɔ la ta kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ka tonɛ, dɛ won kpeg kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nomonome o nɛɛ teŋa ta, gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa doa la. Onee ya kpɔ dɛɛ magɛ ya te dɛ jemɛ gɛ yaa kpeg.

A taa aa ba chega nɛra aa wola won negre yaa kɛŋɔ bechale. Dɛ ya ta kpege kɛrɛdɛ o nɛɛ teŋa ta naa, bane ɛɛ ba bagle yaa waa aa koraa, ya den sɛh warane dɛɛ tɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ peu won gɔɔ kon ir nyundua dɛ yon kpɔ ka ta bobɛlbwa la. Nɛra bane won ba liire kpɔe dɛ teŋe nyosone a do kɛŋɔ kpelaa ken, dɛ won negre nɛra.
Korowii dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ ya lawɛ kasinteŋ la bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ bola dɔŋa be nɛnnyin ne, ásɛ ya won kpeg kɛrɛdɛ dɛ do gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa doa. Onee ya nyu.

Yan gee o bwadabi. Onee choŋri bwadabii la bwa, aa lawɛ dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ dɛɛ cha dɔŋa ásɛ dɛ won kpeg tel o maga bwa la. Dɔŋa nyinaa gela Yeesu Kristo bwadabii won kpeg gɛ dɛ do kpegri la.
N siswɛm waa n che n Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn ta dɛɛ bol he be la. He bɛ banɔ la baa wola Korowii tomɛ la nɛɛ teŋɛ kpa. Wepuu baa lii dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta la.
Ba sibie tɔɔgɔ. Ba nya liire, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba ɛ deŋnekpeg tena. A waa gela baa wola Korowii mkpa dɔe la.
Wobɛlbwa aa ban sihiih ɛ. Anomanta ba saahnɔ dɛɛ teŋɛ ba pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla ta, dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa ba siwi swɛɛ a ta.
Kɛ he te, gɛ laa ba bagle Yeesu Kristo waa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ a ta.
He no o wa, ba bagle heyaa kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la, asɛ he jemɛ gɛ baa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu nɛ.
Taraken hé gel he dabene la ne waa he faa dɛ teŋɛ a ta la. He pɛlchɔgaa negre he bwa dɛɛ chɔg he da la. Hé gel webena la bwa,
dɛ gel Korowii kwaa he bambile ne he liire bwa á berɛ anfala.
O tɛ heyaa dafale bɛl soosiwi waa kwaara, o do kɛ o tenten la ásɛ he won ɛ nɛndɛɛga tenten, he waa bwa do kɛrɛdɛ o be. Anomanta hé kpɔ dafale la.
Hé laa nyosone bɛlbwa laa kpɔ he waa ta, dɛɛ bol kasinteŋ dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bwa pɛ bwadabii beŋkpoŋ ta dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
Dɛ he baah diu waa, he bɛ gel a ɛ bandichɔga he ɛ wechɔga. Hé gel o sɔɔh warane. Aa were kɛŋɔ he baah di wee ka jo dɛ o ta sɔɔhnɛ.
He bɛ gel Bɔnsam dɔ bɔr dɛ negre heya.
He fa dɛ ŋwɛ kɛɛ? Hé gel gɛ ɛɛ dɛ kpɔ he nɔɔra haa kpɔa dɛɛ ŋwɛ la dɛɛ ɛ tondɛɛga dɛ dɔ dɛɛ di, dɛ won dɔ ane dɛɛ tɛ nyaara ba gee di.
He bɛ gel wedoŋa bɛlbwa ɛɛ le he nyoo, kɛ hé gel he wobol ɛ waa aa wera dɛɛ do nɛra gbemba waa aa kpoŋ ba ta, dɛ won cha banɔ la baa dɛ noa la.
He bɛ gel Korowii Domadɛɛge la tea bini chɔg. Korowiirii kpɔɔ do heyaa nso dɛ́ won jemɛ he banɔ la waa dɛ ba lɛɛ o lɛɛ tɔpere la.
Hé gel nyɛgre doe, ne bandia, ne gaeh, ne wesagasagare, ne bahmugliwa, ne meesɔhwaa bwa,
dɛɛ ɛ dɔŋa wedɛɛga, dɛ dɔ dɔŋa chal. Dɛ he dɔŋ ɛɛ wechɔga aa, kpɔ kɛo kɛŋɔ Korowii aa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heyaa la.
He ɛ Korowii bii waa dɛ nyin heya, anomanta hé chaaro dɛ kpɔ o da.
A wer kɛŋɔ he so dɔŋa nyina ne kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo aa nyin yaa dɛ sewɛ lɛ yaa a ɛ sarahadɛɛge dɛ tɛ Korowii la.
Kɛ jwamane ne wedoŋa ne sibegra dɔŋa kwaa ta te, he bɛ a waa dɛɛ bol a ba ɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ɛa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ aa were tɛ Korowii nɛra.
Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ he wobol bini, dɛ bɛ wobochɔga ne gɛnewobol ne wobosale dɛɛ bol. A ta chɛ kɛ hɛɛ bola. Hé gel he wobol ɛ Korowii kpɛɛra wa.
Hé jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ bɔ jwamane, dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa, ba sie ɛɛ begre kwaa ta la aa bɔr dɔe ba Yeesu Kristo ne Korowii Kora la bini. Sie begra kwaa ta do kɛŋɔ vog toma ken.
He bɛ gel nomɛlbwa kpɔ wepuu dɛ won negre heya. A gɛ waa nɔ bwa waa Korowii baah di deŋnekpeg tena nɛɛ wɛɛ ba ba deŋne tɛra.
Anomanta he ne gɛ nɛra la bɛ wobɛlbwa ta pɛ.
He waa bwa fa ɛ biro bini wa, kɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nomanta he ɛ bochaah ta nɛra. Anomanta hé gel he soga bini wobɛlbwa do kɛŋɔ bochaah ta nɛra.
Bochaah ta we-ɛɛlaa wedɛɛga, wekaih, ne kasinteŋ wa.
Anomanta hé jemɛ waa haa ɛ aa lɛ Korowii sie,
asɛ dɛ gel biro bini waa ɛɛ. A ta tɔnɔ dɔe. Hé le a ne baŋ ásɛ nɛra jemɛ gɛ aa doa.
Waa ba yon sɔh dɛɛ ɛ la aa were. A waa bagla gba dɔ sihiih.
Ba le komɛlbwa ne bochaah ta naa, o kon soosiwi won nae kɛrɛdɛ.
Kon la bwa bɔr aa chaah o ta la, o gbagba dɛ bagle o te. A waa ba yon ŋɔ, "He banɔ la haa sewa chɔ la, hé ir ásɛ Kristo chaah he nɛɛ" la.
Anomanta hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he soga bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛ ɛ wejerema dɛ bɛ gɛn.
Wechɔga lole kɛrɛdɛ taraken. Anomanta hé takapɔ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga taraken nɔ haa dɔ bɔr dɛ ɛa nɔ.
Hé gel he nfɛrɛ nyae la dɛ jemɛ waa Korowii aa dɛ nyin la kɛrɛdɛ.
He bɛ sen nyɔ kohona dɛɛ dɛɛ. Gɛ dɛ chɔg nɛn. Kɛ hé gel Korowii Domadɛɛge la so he nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ,
asɛ dɛ gel o wobol ne o yela do he bambile bini he bola dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛɛ go yela aa dɛ bagle o waa la ne anɔ la aa dɛ kpɛɛro. Hé kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ kpɛɛ he Dɔɔ he bambile bwa ne,
dɛɛ yerɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn dɛɛ jam N Naa Korowii waa bwa ta.
Hé bwa ɛɛ no dɔŋa be ɔma haa dɛ ɔmɛ Yeesu Kristo la nomanta.
Haahna, hɛ́ɛ no he jaranar waa kɛŋɔ he Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa hɛɛ no la,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ baalee ɛ o haah nyu te kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo aa ɛ asɔre tena bwa nyu te la. Banee ɛ o bwadabi wɛɛ lɛɛ ba.
Anomanta a chɛ kɛ haahna ɛɛ no ba jaranar waa wobɛlbwa ta kɛŋɔ asɔre tena aa dɛ no Yeesu Kristo waa la.
Baala, hɛ́ɛ nyin he haahna kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa dɛ nyin asɔre tena dɛ koh ba waa sewɛ la.
O sewɔ tɛɛ ba dɛ́ gel ba won ɛ o nɛra asɛ ba doŋa bwa won le ba nɛ, o waa baa noa ne Korowii nee baa sɔ ba nomanta.
O ɛ gɛ dɛ́ won kpɔ asɔre tena berɛ o handɛɛge, doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole o nɛ, waa wola kirihiah bɛlbwa dii, o bobɛlbwa aa wola jweremɛ, dɛ do wer ka tonɛ.
Gɛɛ chɛ kɛ baala gee nyin ba haahna kɛŋɔ gɛ baa dɛ nyin ba gbabir bwadabii la. Baa bɛlbwa waa dɔ haah dɛɛ nyinu gɛ la, o gbabirii wɛɛ nyin la.
Umee dɛ hah o gbabir ɔ? Nomɛlbwa dɛ nyiŋi o te kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ nyiŋi o nyu gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa dɛ nyiŋi asɔre tena la.
Ya bwa ɛ o bwadabii la pera.
Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Gɛ nomanta baa lɛɛ gel o nya ne o mɛɛ, asɛ o ne o haah ka pɛ, ba nɛra banɛ la ɛ nɛmbeŋkpoŋ."
A gɛ waa nɔ bini luŋri. N te be te, Yeesu Kristo ne asɔre tena waa ba bagle gɛ la.
Anomanta hé bɛlbwa takapɔ dɛ nyin o haah kɛŋɔ o gbagba, háah ge kpɔ duure dɛɛ tɛ o jaa.
Bechale, hɛ́ɛ no he nyare ne he mɛɛnanar wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ anee wera tɛ heyaa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ teŋa ta.
Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "Duu he nya ne he mɛɛ," dɛ berɛ chwerɛ nyobaga bɛl waa ja o ta, o ɛ Korowii mmara waa tɔ sie bagɛ nyoa ja o ta.
Kenii o ŋɔ, "Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, Korowii ɛɛ nyiŋi heyaa, dɛ tɛ heyaa mkpajaŋ harɛ nɔ ta."
Mɛɛnanar, he bɛ he bii sibegra dɛɛ do asɛ ba baah nɛɛ di. Hé kpoŋ ba kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ bag ba ŋwɛnɛre ne waa la bwa aa wera ya Dɔɔ be.
He banɔ la baa do heyaa bonɔɔna kɛɛ toli la, hɛ́ɛ no he dɔɔranar baa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta wa, dɛɛ duu ba, dɛ ta tea dɛɛ tom ba kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristoo hɛɛ tomɛ.
He bɛ sɔn waa koh dɛ kpɔ bokpega dɛɛ ɛ toma nɛra sie ta, kɛ hɛ́ɛ ɛ toma kɛrɛdɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔndɛɛga ne toldɛɛga ɛɛ ɛ, dɛɛ ɛ toma he bambile bwa ne á su Korowii siwi.
Hé kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ toma. Nɛn laa hɛɛ tomɛ. He Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristoo hɛɛ tomɛ.
Onee dɛɛ ba nomɛlbwa kem bɔe o tondɛɛga bwa waa ɛa ta. Dɛ bonɔɔ kɛɛ toloo ba doe noo, dɛ he nyuu hɛɛ di oo, he bwa dɛ ba tondɛɛga haa ɛa kembɔr dɔe Yeesu Kristo be.
Dɔɔranar, hɛ́ɛ ɛ he bonɔɔna ne toli kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ gel ba fiiga. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ he ne ba bwa Dɔɔ lɔ beŋkpoŋ nyundua. Waa bane nyine dɛɛ gwaa bane.
Anɔ la aa kaa laanee kɛŋɔ hé gel he ne ya Dɔɔ pɛ ásɛ he won dɔ kpegri waa dɔa kohona la.
Bɔnsam dɔ baradeɛre kɛrɛdɛ ga. Anomanta hé kpɔ Korowii laa laala bwa do dɛ won yoo,

dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛn laa ya ne wɛɛ yo. Ya ne Bɔnsam toroma aa bea yaa wola an na a dɔ kpegri harɛ nɔ ta nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ dɛ do biro ta la nɛ, ne konchɔga bwa soosiwi aa wara kohona laanee dɛɛ yo la.
Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ he kpɔ Korowii laa laala bwa dɛ do kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ konchɔga la baa ŋɔ a yo heya aa, he won che kiŋkiŋ dɛ yo ka tonɛ dɛ ta won che.
Kenii hɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won che. Hé kpɔ kasinteŋ ɛ kriso, dɛ kpɔ waa aa togra ɛ laa batakaare,
dɛ kpɔ Amanesoma la aa dɛ bagle nyopɛo dɔe la do he nakpale,
asɛ dɛ kpɔ yarada tɔ he te gbemgbe dɛ́ won lɛ hɛma la Bɔnsam aa kpɔa su nii ta dɛɛ ta heyaa la bwa dɛɛ ta,
dɛ berɛ kpɔ lɛɛ Korowii aa lɛ heyaa la ɛ buni gbɛrɛ dɛ kpɔ pi, dɛ kpɔ o waa la aa ɛ o Domadɛɛge tokobii la kpoŋe.
Hɛ́ɛ soŋo harɛ bini soŋa nɔ bwa. Hé che Korowii Domadɛɛge la kpegri ta dɛ soŋo saŋ bɛlbwa. He bɛ dom dɛɛ chɔ. Hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ tɛ o nɛra la bwa.
Hɛ́ɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ n ge, asɛ dɛ n dɛ ba waa bola aa, ń dɔ waa dɛɛ bol, dɛ dɔ bambile dɛ won pili o wesɔɔhla la dɛ le Amanesoma la bini.
Maa ɛ Yeesu nachige dɛɛ bol Amanesoma nɔ ba koh a waa do mɛ dea nɔ. Hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii asɛ n ta dɔ bambile dɛɛ bagla gɛ aa chɛ kɛ mɛɛ bagla.
Tichikos waa ɛ ya dɔŋ yaa nyinu kohona wɛɛ ɛ ya Dɔɔ toma kasinteŋ ne la, onee dɛ ba bagle n toma waa bwa ne gɛ maa doa.
A waa gela n tomɔ he be ásɛ o ba bol ya waa bagle heya, dɛ do heyaa gbemba la.
Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo tɛ he ne yabala la bwa deŋnesɔɔhna ne nɛnnyin ne yarada,
dɛ cha he banɔ la bwa haa dɛ nyin ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bambile bwa ne aa wola jaga dɔe la.
Men Pɔɔl ne Timoti yaa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔna la, yanee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ Korowii nɛra he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pea he do Felepae la, ne he nomonome ne nɛra baa chɔ tomare nyoa la bwa.
Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
Saŋ bɛlbwa maa lii he waa la, n dɛ jam N Naa Korowii he wa,
dɛ yon kpɔ silɛɛ dɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ he bwa,
pɛɛ ya ne he bwa aa pɛa dɛɛ cha dɔŋa Amanesoma toma la ta le mumpar ba le fini la nomanta.
N dɔ hwɛga kɛŋɔ gɛ Korowii aa pa mun dɛɛ ɛ o tondɛɛga he bambile bini la, wɛɛ ja a taa ka tel awola Yeesu Kristo aa ba la.

A ŋwɛnɛ taa n dɔ he hwɛga gɛ la, dɛkalkɛ he bwa waa lɔ n bambile ta. Baa do mɛ dea la, ne yoi maa yoa lɛ Amanesoma la cheg dɛ bol kasinteŋ aa lɔ a ta dɛɛ bagle nɛra la, n ne he bwa nɛɛ Korowii sune dɛ cha yaa a ta.
Korowii jemɔ kɛŋɔ he pɛla lag mɛ taeh, nɛnnyin Yeesu Kristo aa kpɔa do n bambile ta la nomanta.
N dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛŋɔ o gel he dɔ nɛnnyin kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ ja, dɛ berɛ dɔ wejema ne nfɛrɛ dɛ ja a ta,
ásɛ dɛ won jemɛ waa aa wera kohona. Anee dɛ gel he won do kaih, nomɛlbwa aa wola he wechɔga dɔe ba dɛ bol ka tel awola Yeesu Kristo aa ba la.
N dɛ soŋo kɛ he che Yeesu Kristo kpegri la ta dɛ won dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga kɛrɛdɛ, ásɛ nɛra ɛɛ tɛ Korowii sɔn ne jirima.
Yabala, n dɛ nyin kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ wedɛɛga le waa aa chig n nɛɛ la ta, dɛ gel Amanesoma la won kaa sie.
Bonɔ koojen soojare baa dɛ daah o dem, ne nɛra baa lɔ bonɔ bwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ waa ba do mɛ dea.
Asɛ n dea chɔe la berɛ gel yabala galga gee yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu kohona, dɛ dɔ bambile dɛɛ bagle Korowii Waa la kɛrɛdɛ, baa wola ɔmɛ.
Kasinteŋ, bɔweela ne dɔŋa meera waa nɛra bane ɛɛ bol Amanesoma la, asɛ bane gee bola bambile bwa ne.
Ba te la, nɛnnyin waa baa ɛa, dɛkalkɛ ba jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii kpɔ toma nɔ tɛ mɛ ŋɔ ń yo lɛ Amanesoma la cheg.
Banɔ la ge, ba gbagba sɔn nyina waa baa bol Yeesu Kristo wa, ba tepoŋ ne laa. Ba dɛ lii kɛŋɔ ba ɛ gɛ naa, baa wonoo gel n tea bini chɔg dɛ ja n dea chɔe nɔ ta.
Kɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. Dɛ liichɔga nee baa bola o, dɛ tepoŋ nee baa bola o, Yeesu Kristo waa baa bol la, n baah sɔɔh mɛ. Aa sɔɔh mɛɛ dɛɛ la,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ n jemɔ kɛ Korowii ɛɛ lɛɛ mɛɛ le waa aa chig n nɛɛ nɔ ta, he Korowii soŋa ne Yeesu Kristo Domadɛɛge la alaworomɛ.

Waa maa dɛ nyin n siwi swɛɛ a ta laanee kɛŋɔ n bɛ n toma ba ɛ kahonɛ sihiih ba kpo mɛ, asɛ n won dɔ bambile kɛrɛdɛ taraken kɛŋɔ n faa dɔ bambile la, asɛ Yeesu Kristo won dɔ jirima n we-ɛɛla bini. Dɛ ba gelɔ n so le noo, ba kpo mɛ noo, Yéesu Kristo dɔ jirima a bwa bini.
N soga nɔ maa soga nɔ, Yeesu Kristo waa n so. Dɛ n sewɔ ge aa, anee dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ mɛ kwara.
Kɛ dɛ n ta soge le naa, mɛɛ ba wonoo ɛ toma a won dɔ tɔnɔ kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta, maa jemɛ onɔ la bwa waa wera n be ń kpɔ.
N chiŋchaŋo. N dɛ nyin kɛ n sewɛ dɛ ka so Yeesu Kristo be. A bɔ kohona kɛ maa soge bonɔ.
Kɛ he nomanta, a hiaoh kohona kɛ n do bonɔ dɛ́ won cha heya.
Anomanta, n jemɔ kɛŋɔ mɛɛ so he bee dɛ won cha he bwa he kpeg Yeesu Kristo waa la ta, dɛ dɔ silɛɛ he yarada ta,
asɛ dɛ n baa so he be ja aa, he won dɔ bɔr kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ jaagi n wa, dɛɛ kpɛɛ Yeesu Kristo.

Waa aa hiaah laanee kɛŋɔ hé gel he we-ɛɛla bwa do wer gɛ aa chɛ kɛ nɛra baa no Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la waa aa doa, asɛ dɛ n baa ba he be noo, n ta ba wone ba noo, ń no he waa kɛŋɔ he bwa liire ɛ beŋkpoŋ, he che kiŋkiŋ, he nyoa pɛ, he che tɛ Amanesoma la haa yaradaa la, a won la sie,
dɛ berɛ dɔ bambile haa wola he dɔma ɔmɛ tamaa bɛlbwa bwa. He bambile dɔe la taa bá che jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii gbagba ɛɛ lɛ heyaa dɛ chɔg ba.
Korowii gelɔ he won yarada Yeesu Kristo, dɛ berɛ won koh o waa na hɔhɔrɔwa. Wejenaa o ɛ tɛ heyaa he won koh o waa na hɔhɔrɔwa la.
He gba dɛ yo gɛ tenten he faa na mɛ mɛɛ yo la. Gɛ yoi laanee hɛɛ no kɛ n ta dɛ yo la.
Haa dɔ gbemba pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la ta, o nyina gee larawe heyaa bwara, he dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge ge wɛɛ cha heya, dɛ dɔ nɛnnyin he chal do dɔŋa nɛɛ nɔ,
amɔ hé ɛ waane dɛɛ ja ásɛ n sie lɛ kohona ka tonɛ. N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he bwa dɔ nyopɛo, asɛ he liire ne he dɔŋa nyina ne wobɛlbwa haa lii la bwa won ɛ beŋkpoŋ.
He bɛlbwa bɛ o gbo sɔn nyina kɛɛ jenu waa koh dɛɛ ɛ wa, kɛ hé pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛ kpɔ ba gwaa he gbagba.
He bɛ gel he gbo waa hiah heya. Hé gel he dɔŋa ge waa hiah heya.
Gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa doa la, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ he do.
O do gɛ Korowii aa doa, kɛ o ta gelɛ gɛ su o siwi kɛ o ne Korowii ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
O kpɔ o Korowii dor la bil, dɛ kpɔ o te kɛ somanji, dɛ do gɛ nɛwɛnyini aa doa.
Waa baa ɛ nɛwɛnyini la, o pwɛr o te dɛɛ no o Mɛɛ Korowii nyoa wobol, dɛ gel ba kpoo. Dagagre ta kwaraa ba kpoo.
A waa Korowii tɛo nomonome kɛrɛdɛ ga, dɛ berɛ tɛo sɔn gwaa sɔna tena bwa.
O sɔnjen la nomanta, nomɛlbwa ɛɛ guŋi o siee dɛ kpɔ duure dɛɛ tɛo. Banɔ la baa lɔ nyundua, ne banɔ la baa lɔ harɛ ta, ne banɔ la baa serewa bwa, ba bwa ɛɛ kpɔ duuree dɛɛ tɛo,
asɛ nomɛlbwa sɛh kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristoo nɛra bwa Dɔɔ, asɛ o Mɛɛ Korowii dɔ jirima.

Anomanta n dandɛɛga, gɛ haa dɛ no n waa dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta gɛ saŋ n faa lɔ he be la, a hiaoh kohona kɛŋɔ maa wola toole he be nɔ, hé ta kpoŋe gɛ. Korowii aa lɛ heyaa nɔ, hé kpɔ duure ne ɔmee dɛɛ teŋɛ toma haa dɛ tomɛ Korowii la ta,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii soge he bɛlbwa nɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ toma, dɛ gel he won sɛh dɛ won dɛɛ tomɔ kɛrɛdɛ gɛ aa su o siwi.
Wobɛlbwa haa dɛ ɛ la, he bɛ waa dɛɛ nagre, dɛ bɛ waa dɛɛ tɔŋle,

dɛkalkɛŋɔ a wer kɛŋɔ he ɛ Korowii bii nomɛlbwa aa wola he wechɔga dɔe dɛ bol, he tea to, he do kaih. Fini nɛra baa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra kɛrɛdɛ baa wola ŋwɛnɛ la ta kpɔ baahnee he do. Gɛ weweela aa dɛ chaah jwaana biro ta la, gɛɛ chɛ kɛ he do ba baah dɛɛ chaah.
Hé gel Korowii wa aa dɔ mkpa la do he bambile bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛɛ la, ń won hɛgre he waa Yeesu Kristo bala tɔpere la ta kɛŋɔ n ta koɛh ta pɛɛ.
Dɛ yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii dɛɛ tomɔ la do kɛŋɔ saraha, asɛ a chɛ kɛ n chal fuge a ta naa, n dɛ nyin gɛ. A ba gɛ naa, n sie ɛɛ lɛo, asɛ he puu mɛ lɛ sie.
Gɛ tentenee a chɛ kɛŋɔ he ge sie lɛ, asɛ n pu heyaa lɛ sie.
Dɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɛoh waa, mɛɛ tomɛ Timoti he bee taraken ó ba na heya, dɛ ba bol he waa n be ásɛ n baah sɔɔh mɛ.
N ne o gboo dɔ liire beŋkpoŋ he wa. Anomanta, n jemɔ kɛ onee he waa do o bambile bini wɛɛ nyin he ne andɛɛga.
Dɛ o laa aa, bɛlbwa sese dɛ dawɛ o gbagba wa, waa Yeesu Kristo waa dawɛ.
He gba jemɛ gɛ o waa aa dɔ kasinteŋ dɛ do wer. N ne o pɛo wɛɛ cha mɛ Amanesoma toma la ta kɛŋɔ bechala ne o mɛɛ.
Anomanta, dɛ n baa na gɛ baa dɛ ba n chega aa, mɛɛ tomɔ he bee.
N dɔ hwɛga ya Dɔɔ nɛɛ kɛŋɔ aa bigri bɛlbwa asɛ n gbabir dɔ bɔr dɛ ba he be.
N liiro kɛŋɔ a hiaoh kɛ n tomɛ ya dɔŋ Epafrodaetɔs he be. N ne onee dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ, dɛ yo dɛɛ tɛ Korowii. Onee he faa tomɛ n be o ba cha mɛ la. N gee berɔɔ tomɔ he be,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ, he pɛla lawɔ wɛɛ lii he bwa waa taeh. A dɛ hao kohona kɛŋɔ haa no o weela wa.
O fa we weela dɛ chɔ fɔgɛ taeh, dɛ fe ɛɛ ba sewa. Kɛ Korowiirii na o sum dɛ sune n ne o bwa nɛ. Dɛ o fe sewaa, n tea bini fe chɔgɔ dɛ ja n wahala ta.
Ate waa n siwi swɛɛ mɛɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n tomɔ he be ásɛ he nao he sie lɛ, asɛ he waa bɛ men dɛɛ ha kohona.
Hé kpɔ silɛɛ dɛ lɛo, teŋa he ne o bwa aa dɛ teŋɛ ya Dɔɔ nɛɛ la nomanta. Hɛ́ɛ duu nɛra baa do kɛŋɔ on.
Yeesu Kristo toma waa o koh dɛ kpɔ o nyu charɛ seo. A ka jɛɛ ken o fee sewɛ. Waa haa wola won cha mɛ a ta, dɛ koh a waa tomɔ n be la taa o fe ɛɛ ba sewa.
Yabala, waa aa kaa laanee kɛŋɔ, hé gel he sie lɛ he ne ya Dɔɔ pɛɛ la ta. Wesiwi beŋkpoŋii n berɛ chwerɛ dɛɛ tɛ heyaa la, kɛ aa men ha. A dɛ ba gela he won che kiŋkiŋ.
Hɛ́ɛ do nɛnchɔga baa ɛ ba te manyare la dɛɛgɔ. Nɛra baa dɛ maŋkura penteŋ dɛ ŋɔ nómɛlbwa mɔn o bɔtɔn mɔɔ dɛ tomɛ Korowii la waa mɛɛ bol la.
Ya banɔ la yaa dɛ tomɛ Korowii o Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛɛ tɛ Yeesu Kristo sɔn, yaa wola bɔtɔn mɔna waa maŋkura la, yanee jemɛ penteŋ tenten la.
Dɛ bɔtɔn wa ɛɛ wonoo lɛ yaa aa, menee fe dɔ hwɛga kɛrɛdɛ. Dɛ nomɛlbwa ŋɔ a chegɛ o waa waa ɛa ta o dɔ hwɛga aa, menee dɔ hwɛga dɛ gwaa naate.

Israel tee men. Baa lol mɛ n dɔ yawanyoa la taa ba teŋe n pen. Benjamen deaa n le. Israel te kaiih men, dɛkalkɛ n mɛɛ ne n nya bwa ɛ Hibru tena. Dɛ ba dɛ bol Mmara ta teŋa wa aa, nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Mmara ta kohona baa yer ba Farisii tena la bɛlee men.
Dɛ ba dɛ nyin nɛn o siwi faa swɛɛ a ta naa, menee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n fa chegɛ Yeesu habɔteŋra la nɛɛ taeh. Dɛ ba berɔ dɛɛ nyin nɛndɛɛge Mmara la be pera ge aa, n waa bwa togrɔ.
Kɛ waa la bwa n faa lɔ a ta a ɛ tɔnɔ tɛ mɛ la, Yeesu Kristo nomanta, n dɛ liira wepuu.

Kasinteŋ, komɛlbwa ne wobɛlbwaa n vɛh dɛɛ yera wepuu dɛ́ won jemɛ n Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo. O jemaa hiaah gwaa komɛlbwa. N koh o waa dɛ gel wobɛlbwa ta, dɛɛ liira puldoa haahra, dɛɛ nyin n won dɔ Yeesu Kristo kɛrɛdɛ,

ásɛ ya bwa won pɛ, asɛ n ɛ nɛndɛɛge, n waa su Korowii siwi. N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ ń che Mmara ta teŋa ta dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge n waa su o siwi. Kɛ n dɛ nyin n che yarada maa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la ta dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge n waa su o siwi. Nɛndɛɛge ɛɛ le Korowii be wɛɛ tɛ nɛra la bwa baa yarada Yeesu.
N waa bwaa kɛ ń won jemɛ Yeesu Kristo, dɛ won jemɛ kpegri la soo waa ira seo ta dɛ dɔ, dɛ na wahala waa naa la dɔŋa, dɛ kpɔ n te kɛ n sewɔ gɛ waa sewa la,
gɛ aa ɛ n won ir seo ta gɛ waa ira la.
N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ n denɔ won do kaih dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge dɛ ka tonɛ. Akai! N ta swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ nyin n won do gɛ bwa Yeesu Kristo aa lee mɛ ŋɔ ń do la.
Yabala, maa lii kɛŋɔ n tonɛ wobɛlbwa. Webeŋkpoŋii hiah mɛ. N gel waa aa lɔ habɔɔ, dɛ takapɔ dɛɛ la sie dɛ́ won ka dɔ anɔ la aa lɔ sie la,
dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛ́ won tel a jaga dɛ won dɔ kembɔr. Korowiirii yer mɛ ŋɔ ń ba dɛ ba do o be, Yeesu Kristo nomanta. A waa n swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ nyin n won dɔ kembɔr la la.
A wer kɛŋɔ ya banɔ la bwa yaa kpega Korowii waa la ta la dɔ gɛ liire. Dɛ he bane ge liire korɔ waa nɔ ane ta naa, Korowii ɛɛ geloo a bini chaah tɛ heya.
Kɛ gɛ bwa yaa wona dɛ jemɛ la, yá kpoŋe a bini dɛɛ la.
Yabala, hé kpɔ n da, dɛɛ nyiŋi nɛra ge baa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ yaa dɛ teŋɛ la,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra warɔ baa wola gɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta teŋɛ. N fa bagle ba waa he be kera aŋwɛnɛ bwa, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ bagle heyaa taraken sinii ne ŋɔ ba ɛ Yeesu Kristo seo waa sewa dagagre la ta la waa dɔm.
Ŋwɛnɛ gɛ nɛra nɔ aa kpɔ o ta la dɛ kaa ba ne seo ta. Ba kpɔ tea ne bwadabii waa gwaa Korowii. Waa aa ɛ sihihwaa la, a nee baa ta nyoa. Ba liire bwa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta.
Kɛ harɛ nɔ ta ta ya bwɛɛ ɛɛ. Ya bwɛɛ lɔ nyundua. Yaa lɔ bonɔ nɔ, ya siwii swɛɛrɔ yaa kpa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ la ó le bela ba.
Dɛ o balaa, wɛɛ begre ya bwadabisale aa won pɔeh nɔɔ a do wer kɛŋɔ o gbagba bwadabii aa do wer kohona gɛ la. O kpegri taa wɛɛ ba gɛ ɛɛ. O dɔ kpegri kɛŋɔ o won gel komɛlbwa no o be.
Yabala haa ɛ n nɛnnyina, he pɛla lag mɛ. He bee n silɛɛ do, he waa baa ba men tɔɔ dawa. Anomanta n dandɛɛga, hé che kiŋkiŋ pɛɛ ya ne ya Dɔɔ aa pɛa la ta.
N dɛ soŋe Yoodia ne Sentiki kɛŋɔ ba kwaa ba baah dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ pɛɛ ya ne ya Dɔɔ aa pɛa la ta.
N dɔŋdɛɛge, n dɛ soŋe, cha haahna la dɛ kwaa ba baah, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba cha mɛ Amanesoma nɔ bola ta ga. Klɛment ne n bala tom-ɛɛra la ge jao. Ba sɔna lɔ Korowii Mkpa Tɔn bini.
Hé che pɛɛ he ne ya Dɔɔ aa pɛa la ta dɛ gel he sie lɛ. Kasinteŋ, hé gel he sie lɛ.
Hé gel nomɛlbwa jemɛ he waa kɛ he pwɛre. Ya Dɔɔ bala la pu yaa tonɛ.
He bɛ gel wobɛlbwa ha heya, kɛ hé kpɔ wobɛlbwa dɛɛ do Korowii nɔn ta dɛɛ soŋo waa aa hiah heya, dɛɛ jaamo kɛ waa dɛ no he wesoŋa.
Belaa ó ge tɛ heyaa o bambisɔn waa gwaa bambisɔn te bwa nɛwɛnyini be á cha heya, dɛ gel he bambile ne liire chɔ bobeŋkpoŋ pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.

Too, yabala, anɔ la aa kaa laanee nɔ: Hé gel he liire do wedɛɛga ta. Wobɛlbwa aa ɛ kasinteŋ, ne anɔ la aa dɔ jirima, ne anɔ la aa togra, ne anɔ la aa do kaih, ne waa aa wera, ne anɔ la aa dɔ pɛla, wobɛlbwa aa ɛ wedɛɛga dɛ chɛ kpɛɛra la, hé gel he liire do a ta.
Wobɛlbwa haa hwela dɛ dɔ le n be, kɛɛ dɛ no dɛ na mɛɛ ɛ la, hé gee ɛ gɛ ásɛ Korowii waa dɛ tɛ nɛra bambisɔn la ja he nɛ.
N sie lɛo kohona pɛɛ ya ne ya Dɔɔ aa pɛa nɔ ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he berɔ kwaa dɛɛ do n liire dɛ cha mɛ taraken. He fa cha mɛ ka. A ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ haa berɛ dɛɛ lii n waa kpa. Kɛ bɔree he faa wola dɔe dɛ nyiŋ mɛ.
N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ n nyao. Akai. N wono hweli wobɛlbwa maa lɔ a ta n soga bini a man mɛ, n sie lɛ a ta.

Dɛ n nyao waa, n jemɛ gɛ maa so. N berɔ dɔ ge aa, n jemɛ a ge gba soga. N hweli wobɛlbwa a man mɛ. Kondikwaa lole n di dɛ vagoo, kondikwaa toole n chɔ lɔr oo, n dɔɔ kohona kɛɛ nyae n nya oo, n won a bɛlbwa kpoŋa.
N won Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ cha mɛ la kpegri ta chega dɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa.
Kɛ haa kpɔ n waa berɛ he bwa wa, dɛ cha mɛ n wahala ta la, he ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.

He gba jemɔ kɛŋɔ gɛ saŋ maa ba he be Makidoonia harɛ logle la dɛ bol Amanesoma la dɛɛ tɛ heyaa asɛ dɛ kpɔ bela dɛɛ kaa la, asɔre tena baa lɔ bwɛɛre la ta la bɛlbwa ta men chae. He Felepae tena gboo koh toma maa ɛa he bini la waa dɛ cha mɛ suuga ne.
Hale n faa lɔ Tɛsalonika la, he fa wono ha mɛ kwaa aa hiah mɛ. Kerabeŋkpoŋ kwara laa.
Kasinteŋ, a ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ komɛlee mɛɛ nyin he be, kɛ he tɔnɔ haa dɔ dɛ le chae haa cha mɛ la binii mɛɛ nyiŋi.
N dɔ komɛlbwa maa dɛ nyin la bwa ka garɛ. N dɔ he haala haa ha mɛ la le Epafrodaetɔs be. He haala la ɛ sarahadɛɛge dɛ tɛ Korowii dɛɛ su o siwi.
N Naa Korowii ɛɛ cha heyaa komɛlbwa haa nyaa la taa dɛ le o kondɔɔh tenten la ta pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.
Hɛ́ɛ tɛ N Naa Korowii jirima saŋ bɛlbwa. Aamen.
Too, he banɔ la bwa he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa he ɛ Korowii nɛra la, n dɛ na heya. He bala baa lɔ n be bonɔ la dɛ na heya.
Korowii nɛra la bwa dɛ na heya. Banɔ la baa lɔ Room koodem laanee dena dɛɛ na heyaa kohona.
Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya.
Men Yeesu Kristo torome Pɔɔl ne ya dɔŋ Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowii tetooraa o tɛ mɛ toma nɔ.
Ya chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ yabala haa lɔ Kolose dɛ ɛ Korowii nɛra, asɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ, hɛɛ teŋɛ o nɛɛ kasinteŋ ne la. Ń Naa Korowii cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
Ya dɛ jam ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii he waa ya wesoŋa bini saŋ bɛlbwa,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya noɔ kɛŋɔ he dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo kɛrɛdɛ dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo, dɛɛ nyin Korowii nɛra bwa ge.
Amanesoma aa ɛ kasinteŋ la aa ba he be logla la, he no hwɛga aa dɛ tɛ la wa. He yarada ne nɛnnyin la le kwaa haa dɛ hwɛgɛ a ta la ta. Korowii ge kwaa a bwa cheg heyaa Korowii doa kɛrɛdɛ ken.
Amanesoma la perɔ, nɛra ɛɛ noa bobɛlbwa, aa ba hɛɛra ne. Gɛ tentenee aa ba hɛɛra ne he be dɛ le awola haa noa Korowii pili he sie he jemɛ suna waa sune he nɛɛ dɛ cha heyaa la.
Epafras bee he no Amanesoma la. Ya ne o bwaa pɛa dɛɛ ɛ toma nɔ. O ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ o wa aa dɔ kasinteŋ yaa nyinu kɛrɛdɛ. Ya naa taa o che dɛɛ cha heya.
O bol ya be gɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge aa cha heyaa asɛ hɛɛ nyin dɔŋa.
Anomanta ya le awola yaa no he waa dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ heyaa kɛŋɔ ó Domadɛɛge bagle heyaa o wobɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ pili he sie hé won jemɛ wobɛlbwa aa ɛ Korowii tetoora la,
dɛ won do gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ya Dɔɔ torome do, he wobɛlbwa won su o siwi, he won dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga bwa soosiwi, dɛ won jemɛ Korowii kohona,
dɛ won dɔ kpegri kɛrɛdɛ dɛ le o gbagba kpegri waa do kan dɛ dɔ jirima kɛrɛdɛ la ta. N dɛ soŋe Korowii o cha heyaa gɛ hé won lawɛ bambile wobɛlbwa ta,
dɛ won kpɔ silɛɛ dɛɛ jaamo waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ la. Onee gela ya chɛ kɛ ya ne o nɛra bwa won dɔ kondɛɛga waa dɔa tɛ o bii baa ja o Kora waa ɛ Bochaah Kora la ta.
O lɛ yaa le biro ta dɛ kpɔ yaa ka ja o Bie waa dɛ nyinu la Kora ta.
O Bie laanee lɛ yaa le Bɔnsam nɔn ta dɛ kpɔ ya wechɔga ge kɛ yaa la.
Yaa won Korowii na. Kɛ gɛ Korowii aa doa la, gɛɛ o Bie ge do. O Bie la lole mɔɔ o ta komɛlbwa.

O Bie la nɛɛ o che dɛ ta komɛlbwa waa lɔ harɛ ta ne komɛlbwa waa lɔ nyundua, anɔ la yaa dɛ naa ne anɔ la yaa wola an na kɛŋɔ nyundua toroma ne konchɔga aa dɛ di kpegri bwa soosiwi. O Bie la nɛɛ o che dɛ taa, asɛ a do le tɛo.
Gɛ saŋ a bɛlbwa faa wola toole la, dɛ o te lole. Onee lawɛ komɛlbwa kpoŋe, a ta do le ba le fini nɔ la.
Onee asɔre tena bwa nyu, ba gee o bwadabi. Onee tɔ sie komɛlbwa nɛ, dɛ tɔ sie ir seo ta nomɛlbwa nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ on chɛ kɛ o ɛ nomoa komɛlbwa nɛ.
Korowii tetooraa o Bie Yeesu ɛ o gbagba.
O ɛ gɛ dɛ́ che o Bie la nɛɛ dɛ kwaa o ne kwaa aa lɔ nyundua ne harɛ bwa baah. O gelɔ o Bie sewɛ dagagre la ta o chal kwaa wobɛlbwa.
He faa Korowii jemɛ dɛ ɛ o dɔma, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he fa dɛ lii liichɔga, dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga.

Kɛ name Yeesu Kristo aa baa ɛ nɛn dɛ sewɛ la, Korowii chegɛ o seo la ta dɛ kwaa he ne o baah, dɛ gel he won do kaih doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole he nɛ, nomɛlbwa aa wola he waa dɔe ba dɛ bol awola haa ba che Korowii sie la.

Dɛ he ta kpoŋe waa haa dɛ yaradaa la bini, he ta habɔɔ leɛ, dɛ dɔ hwɛga le Amanesoma la baa bola bagle heyaa he no la ta kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa won chɔg he liire he bɛ dɛɛ hwɛgɛ kpa aa, amɔ hɛɛ wonoo che o sie. Ba dɛ bol Amanesoma nɔ bobɛlbwa. N gbabir dɛ bola, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii lee me.

Taraken a do n som kɛ maa lɛ he wahala dɛɛ na. Wahala lole ń che Yeesu Kristo naa ta dɛ na tɛ asɔre tena baa ɛ o bwadabii la. Anomanta a do n som kɛ maa dɛ ba wona na wahala aa kaa la ane ásɛ a won tonɛ.
N ɛ toma dɛɛ tɛ o asɔre tena. Korowiirii koh he chae waa dɛ tɛ mɛ a gɛ toma nɔ, dɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bagle o waa la bwa nɛ́ra bwa no.
Korowii waa la fa sɔɔh saŋ la bwa, nɛra ta a mun jemɛ. Kɛ taraken te, o pili a bwa bini dɛ tɛ o nɛra,

bá na dɛ jemɛ gɛ waa dɛ nyin kɛ o ɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la baah. O waa waa pili o bini la ɛ wedɛɛga aa ɛ wejena dɛɛ kpo nyoa. Anee kɛ Yeesu Kristo Doma soge he nɛ, he dɔ hwɛga o be kɛ tɔpebɛl hɛɛ dɔ jirima o bee.
Ya waa yaa dɛ bagle bwaa Yeesu Kristo la. Ya dɛ ja nomɛlbwa, dɛɛ bagle nɛra bwa wejema bwa ne ásɛ dɛ ba won kpɔ bɛlbwa ba Korowii be kɛ ba kpeg Yeesu Kristo waa ta, pɛɛ ba ne waa pɛa la nomanta.
A waa gela n swɛɛ siwi dɛ takapɔ dɛɛ ɛ toma la. Yeesu Kristoo tɛ mɛ kpegri ga n won dɛɛ ɛ gɛ toma la.
N dɛ nyin he jemɛ gɛ n siwi aa swɛɛra mɛɛ koh n te he ne Laodisia tena ne nɛra baa wola men jemɛ la wa,

dɛ́ do he bwa gbemba he won nyin dɔŋa dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ won jemɛ Korowii wesɔɔhla waa pili a bini tɛ heyaa la kɛrɛdɛ, he bɛ aahna-aahna tamaa bɛlbwa ɛ, dɛ dɔ tɔnɔ le o waa la bini kɛrɛdɛ. O waa laanee Yeesu Kristo.
Korowii wejema aa wola jaga dɔe la bwa lɔ Yeesu Kristo be. O nɛɛ ya che dɛ dɔ gɛ wejema nɔ.
N dɛ bagle heyaa asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ won kpɔ nyotor negre heya.
N toole he be, kɛ n liire te lɔ he be. Anomanta a do n som kɛ he bwa aa pɛa, asɛ dɛ lawɛ yaradae haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ la.
Haa dɔa kpɔ he te tɛ Yeesu Kristo kɛ he Dɔɔ nɔ, hé ne o pɛ wobɛlbwa ta.
A taa aa ba chega he won che kiŋkiŋ dɛ kpeg o waa la ta, dɛ won yarada o waa bwa kɛrɛdɛ gɛ baa bagle heyaa la, dɛɛ jam Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa.

Webagla ane lole bane ɛɛ bagle dɛɛ yera wejema. Hé nyiŋa kɛrɛdɛ. A ɛ nyosone kɛɛ wepuu, ba kpɔ dɛɛ negre nɛra. Nɛwɛnyini nawee waa, ne koŋkwaa aa dɛ di kpegri harɛ nɔ ta wejema waa baa bagle la. Yeesu Kristo be laa a le.
Yeesu Kristo ɛ Korowii gbagba. O ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ ba berɛ nɛwɛnyini.
He ne waa pɛa la, he dɔ komɛlbwa. Onee dɔ sɔn waa gwaa kwaa yaa wola an na bwa soosiwi sɔn.
He ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, o teŋe he dobene la ta. O ge penteŋaa la. He te teŋa nɔ ta gɛ nɛwɛnyini aa dɛ teŋe la ɛɛ.
Korowii nee ba faa sɔ heyaa la, anee bagla kɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo bwaa ba pɛ huge. Asɛ a berɛ che yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii ne kpegri waa kpɔa ir Yeesu seo ta la ta he ne o bwa pɛ ir dɛ dɔ mkpa.
He wechɔga ne he dobene Korowii faa wola teŋe ta la gelɔ he fa do kɛŋɔ he serewɔ. Kɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, Korowii kpɔ he bwa wechɔga kɛ heya, dɛ tɛ he bwa mkpafale.
Teŋa haa ŋɔa ŋɔ hɛɛ teŋɛ o Mmara taa dɛ berɛ horɛ a bar heyaa la, a bwa taa o le heya. Waa a waa pɛɛ kpa. Korowii kpaa a bwa pɛl Yeesu dagagre la ta a tonɛ.
Yeesu seo waa sewa la, o chɔg kwaa aa dɔ kpegri bwa kpegri, dɛ lɛ a kpegri dɔɔh. O ɛ gɛ dɛ gel sihiih kpoa nɛra bwa siwi ta, bá jemɛ kɛŋɔ o gelɔ koŋkpega la bwa kpegri ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
Anomanta dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ pwah heyaa kwaa ane haa dɛ di, ne kwaa haa dɛ nyɔ, ne he tɔpejena dii benanyoa ne korobie ne yawanyoa yawanyoa ta naa, he bɛ on dawɛ.
A gɛ waa nɔ fa tɔ sie chig dɛɛ bagle waa aa dɛ ba ɛɛ kerekere la kɛŋɔ nɛn lileo aa tɔ o sie, waa wola o gbagba ɛɛ la. Yeesu Kristo waa la aa bala la, anee waa la tenten.

Dɛ nomɛlbwa dɛ pwah heyaa ŋɔ haa gɛ waa teŋe nyosone ŋɔ pwɛraa wɛɛ pwɛr o te dɛɛ tomɛ nyundua toroma la ta teŋaa, he bɛ on dawɛ. Gɛ nɛn nɔ dɛ maŋkura o te kɛŋɔ o dɛ na waa deera ta, dɛɛ yerɛ o te nɛnjen, kɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. Nɛwɛnyini liire taa wɛɛ teŋɛ,

dɛ vɛh o te kpɔe dɛ do Yeesu Kristo lɔga. Onee ya nyu, asɛ ya ɛ o bwadabii dɛɛ dɔ bokpega o be, bɛlbwa lawɛ o dɔŋ kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ ya ne o ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ che pɛɛ yaa pɛa la ta dɛ gel yaa kpeg gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin.
He ne Yeesu Kristo pɛo dɛ sewɛ, anomanta he ne koŋkwaa aa dɛ di kpegri harɛ nɔ ta toole wobɛlbwa bini kpa. Aah bɔkwa waa he ta kpɔ he te dɛɛ do harɛ nɔ ta kii ta dɛ gel a vɔrɔwe heyaa ŋɔ,
"He bɛ onɔ lawɛ, dɛ bɛ onɔ dagɛ, dɛ bɛ onɔ lege" nɔɔ?
Gɛ kwaa nɔ ɛ kwaa dɛ he ɛa aa, dɛ a waa tonɔ. Nɛwɛnyini kii ne ba nawee waa a te.

Kpela, nɛra ɛɛ dɛɛ duu nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ gɛ waa nɔ ta la kɛ ba ɛ wejerema, dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ ba Korowii toma aa swɛɛ ba siwi kohona waa baa pwɛr ba te dɛɛ ha ba bwadabii la. Kɛ a bwa ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ. Aa won gel nomɛlbwa lawɛ o te dɛ gel wechɔga ɛɛ.
Dɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo bwaa pɛa ir seo ta te naa, amɔ te hé swɛɛ siwi dɛ gel he bambile che kwaa aa lɔ nyundua la ta. Belaa Yeesu do dɛ so nomombɔr Korowii dig ta la.
Hé gel he liire bwa do kwaa aa lɔ nyundua la ta, dɛ gel kwaa aa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ he do kɛŋɔ nɛra baa serewa a bɔr, he toole a ta kpa. He mkpa lɔ Yeesu Kristo be, o ge do Korowii be.
Awola Yeesu Kristo he mkpa aa lɔ o be aa ba harɛ ta la, he ne o bwa ɛɛ pɛo dɛ ba gɛ saŋ, dɛ ba dɔ jirima o bala la ta.
Anomanta hé gel he harɛ nɔ ta dor bwa ta kwaraa. He bɛ he bwadabii kpɔ do jwamane, ne wedoŋa, ne kayɛglɛ, ne pɛlchɔga, nɛ kwaa ta sibegra ta. Kwaa ta sibegra do kɛŋɔ voga toma ken.
A gɛ waa nɔ, Korowii bwaawee dɛ ir a ta taeh. Wɛɛ kpɔ wahalaa ta nɛra baa dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛɛ ɛ gɛ la nɛ.
He ne ba bwaa fa lɔ a ta dɛɛ ɛ.
Kɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ he gel a bwa sekwaraa taraken te. Hé laa bandia kpɔ he waa ta, he baah bɛ dɛɛ di sagasaga, hé gel meesɔhwa, he bɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ chɛgre, he bɛ gel wobochɔga ɛɛ le he nyoo.
He bɛ nyosone teŋe dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he laa he dabene la ne o we-ɛɛla la bwa kpɔ he nɛ,
dɛ charɛ dafale. Korowiirii gela he do gɛ la. Onee dɛɛ kwaa he dafale la saŋ bɛlbwa ásɛ he do kɛrɛdɛ gɛ waa doa la, dɛ́ won jemɔ kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ.

Anomanta nɛra Korowii aa gela ba do gɛ dofale nɔ la, ba ta dɔe kɛ ba pegri dɔŋa bini kpa kɛŋɔ onɔ ɛ Juda te kɛɛ onɔ nɔ ta Juda te ɛɛ nɔ. Nɛra bini pegra toole kpa, kɛŋɔ onɔ teŋe o pen, kɛɛ onɔ nɔ ta o pen teŋe nɔ. Hɔɔh kɛɛ daamun te kɛɛ yom kɛɛ nɛn waa dɔ o te toole kpa, ba bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Yeesu Kristo gbo waa hiah o nɛra.

Heyaa Korowii bidɛɛga waa le heyaa tɛ o te, dɛ laa he doŋa bwa kpɔ he nɛ, dɛɛ nyin heyaa kɛrɛdɛ. Anomanta hé kpoŋe dadɛɛge dɛɛ sune dɔŋa nɛ, dɛ ta tea dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛɛ pwɛr he te, dɛɛ tɛ nɛra sie, dɛ dɔ bambile tɛɛ ba.
Dɛ he bini bɛlbwa ne o dɔŋ dɔ waa aa, ó lawɛ bambile dɛ kpɔ kɛo. Gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heyaa la, gɛɛ chɛ kɛ he ge kpɔ dɔŋa kwaa dɛɛ kɛ ba.
Anɔ nɔ habɔɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyin nɛn. Nɛnnyinii dɛ won gel he dɔ nyopɛo dɛ ɛ anɔ bwa kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ.
Hé gel nyopɛo waa aa le Yeesu Kristo be la do he bambile bini wobɛlbwa ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii yerɛ heyaa ŋɔ hé bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ dɛ dɔ nyopɛo. Hé gel he sie ɛɛ su waa waa ɛa tɛ heya, hɛɛ jaamo.
Hé gel Yeesu Kristo waa la do he bambile bini kɛrɛdɛ hɛɛ bagle dɔŋa, dɛɛ bag ba wejema bwa ne, dɛ go wesoŋa yela ne kpɛɛra yela dɛɛ jam Korowii he bambile bwa.
Wobɛlbwa haa dɛ ɛ ne anɔ la bwa haa dɛ bol la, hɛ́ɛ ɛa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn ta, dɛ che o nɛɛ dɛɛ jam o Mɛɛ Korowii.
Haahna, hɛ́ɛ no he jaranar wa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛɛ a chɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra ba ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu aa pɛa ɛɛ ɛ.
He baala ge, hɛ́ɛ nyin he haahna kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ ban dɛɛ panya.
Bechale, hɛ́ɛ no he nyare ne he mɛɛnanar waa saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛɛ dɛɛ lɛ Korowii sie.
Mɛɛnanar, he bɛ hɛ bii dɛɛ do bandia ne, asɛ ba bambile bɛ chɔg.

Bonɔɔna ne toli ge, hɛ́ɛ no nɛra haa dɛ tom ba harɛ nɔ ta la waa saŋ bɛlbwa. He bɛ ba sie bɔr na mɔɔ dɛɛ tom ba dɛɛ nyin baa kpɛɛ heya. Hé ta tea dɛɛ tom ba ɔma haa dɛ ɔmɛ he Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nomanta.
Wobɛlbwa haa dɛɛ ɛ la, hɛ́ɛ ɛa bambile bwa ne kɛŋɔ he Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristoo he ɛ dɛɛ tɛ. Nɛn laa he ɛ dɛɛ tɛ.
He Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristoo he ɛ dɛɛ tɛ. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ o bee hɛɛ ba kembɔr waa kpɔa cheg o nɛra la dɔe.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, wɛɛ dɔ o wechɔga kembɔree. Korowii aa bane siwii nyiŋi gwaa bane.
He banɔ la haa dɔ bonɔɔna ne toli la, hɛ́ɛ ɛɛ ba waa aa togra dɛ do wer, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he gba lɔ nomɛl lɔga, o do Korowii doa.
Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ gel he sie ge do a ta. Hé gel he siwi su waa waa ɛa tɛ heyaa hɛɛ jaamo.
Hé soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ ya gba, ásɛ o tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ ya won bol o Waa dɛ bagle o wesɔɔhla aa ɛ Yeesu Kristo waa la. A waa ba koh do mɛ dea nɔ.
Hɛ́ɛ soŋo n won dɛɛ bola kɛrɛdɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ n bol a bwa á bini chaah la.
Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ jemɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ɛ nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ la, asɛ dɛ he dɔ ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa naa, hé che o ta dɛ won dɔɔ ba tɛ Korowii.
Hé gel he wobol do som dɛɛ lɛ sie saŋ bɛlbwa, dɛ ba pɛɛ heyaa wobɛlbwa naa, hé won jemɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ he bol.
Yɔɔ, ya dɔŋ Tichikos yaa dɛ nyinu o waa dɔ kasinteŋ, wɛɛ cha yaa, ya ne o bwa ɛɛ ɛ ya Dɔɔ toma nɔ la, wɛɛ ba bagle n waa bwa he bee.
A waa mɛɛ tomɔ he be ó ba bol ya waa bwa ásɛ he baah sɔɔh heyaa la.
O ne ya dɔŋ Onisemɔs o wa aa dɔ kasinteŋ yaa nyinu la bwaa mɛɛ tomɛ, ásɛ ba ba bol waa aa dɛ chig bonɔ bwa he be. Onisemɔs te ɛ he bwɛɛ te.
Aristakus baa do n ne on dea la ne Banabas nime Maak dɛ na heya. A gɛ Maak nɔ waa n faa bol he be la. O ba he be naa, hé lɛo silɛɛ ne.
Jeses baa bera dɛɛ yerɔ Jastos la ge dɛ na heya. Juda tena baa yarada Yeesu la bini, nɛra batoro nɔ gboo dɛɛ cha mɛ, n ne baa ɛ Korowii Kora la toma. Ba dɛ cha mɛ taeh.

Epafras waa ɛ he bwɛɛ te la dɛ na heya. O dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo toma, dɛ soŋe Korowii kɛrɛdɛ ga dɛɛ tɛ heyaa saŋ bɛlbwa ásɛ o gel he won che kiŋkiŋ dɛ jemɛ o waa kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ, asɛ Yeesu Kristo waa bɛ heyaa aahna-aahna ɛ, he won ɛ Korowii tetoowaa bwa.
N gbabir na gɛ Epafras aa dɛ tomɛ he ne banɔ la baa lɔ Laodisia ne Heɛrapɔles la kohona.
Tɛɛga te Luk ya bwa aa dɛ nyinu la ne Demas ge dɛ na heya.
Hé ŋɔ yabala baa lɔ Laodisia la ne Nimfa ne asɔre tena baa dɛ cheme Nimfa dem la be ŋɔ n dɛ na ba.
Dɛ he baa kure tɔn nɔ tonaa, hé gel ba ka kuro bagle asɔre tena baa lɔ Laodisia la. Tɔn maa tɛ ba ge la, hé lɛ dɛ ka kure.
Hé ŋɔ Akipus be ŋɔ ó do sie dɛ ɛ toma ya Dɔɔ Yeesu aa kpɔa tɛo la bwa kɛrɛdɛ ken.
N gbagbaa chwerɛ bonɔ la, n dɛ na heya. Hɛ́ɛ lii n waa kɛ n ta chɔ dea, dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ mɛ. Kórowii cha heya.
Men Pɔɔl ne Silas ne Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he nɛra haa ɛ asɔre tena dɛ do Tɛsalonika dɛɛ tomɛ N Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la. Kórowii cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
Ya dɛ jam Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa dɛ yon dɛɛ yerɛ he sɔna ya Korowii soŋa bini.

Gɛɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa ge yaa bol N Naa Korowii waa bera ɛ ya Mɛɛ la be he yarada haa yaradao dɛ won kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ o toma, ne he nyina haa dɛ nyinu dɛ gel he sie begre o toma ta, ne hwɛga haa dɔa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo be dɛ won dɛɛ lawɛ bambile wobɛlbwa ta la.
Yabala, ya jemɔ kɛ Korowii dɛ nyin heya, dɛ le heyaa ŋɔ hé ba ɛ o bii,

dɛkalkɛŋɔ Amanesoma la yaa bagle heyaa la, wobol gbo ta laa a che dɛ ba he be. Awola haa no waa la la, Korowii kpegri la ne o Domadɛɛge la gelɔ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ a ɛ kpela. He jemɛ gɛ yaa koh he waa dɛ kpoŋe ya te gɛ saŋ ya ne haa soga la.
