Hé nyiŋi yaa dɛ kpɔ ya ne ya Dɔɔ da la. Haa no Korowii Waa la dɛ yaradaa la, he na wahala ga, kɛ he wono lɛ Korowii Waa la silɛɛ aa le Korowii Domadɛɛge la be ne.
Gɛ haa ɛa laanee chɔa dɛ tɛ Makidoonia harɛ ne Akaaya harɛ asɔre tena bwa, baa nyiŋi dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii.
He bee ya Dɔɔ la waa che dɛ perɛ baah bela bwa. Bela tena gbo laa noa, kɛ yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii la tel bobɛlbwa. Anomanta a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ ya bol he waa nɛra be kpa.
Ba gbabir dɛ bol he wa, gɛ haa kpoŋe yaa dɛ no ya be dɛ charɛ he liire le voga aa wola mkpa dɔe la ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa lole dɛ dɔ mkpa la.
Dɛ he sogo kpa o Bie Yeesu waa dɛ ba nyundua lee dɛ ba la. Onee o chum seo ta la. Onee lɛ yaa le Korowii bandia waa dɛ ba bala la ta.
Yabala, he gbabir jemɔ kɛ chɔɔra yaa chɔɔ heyaa la ta pɛɛ ɛɛ.
He jemɔ kɛ ba tɔ sie ɛ yaa hɔhɔrɔwa Felepae dɛ chɛgre yaa taeh mɔɔ ya ba he be Amanesoma la ne la. Kɛ Korowii tɛ yaa bansua ya won bol o waa la.
Jae yaa dɛ ja nɛra la, kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ taa, negra laa yaa negre nɛra, wedoŋa ge laa ya lii.

Anɔ la Korowii aa dɛ nyin laanee yaa bol. Yanee o dɔ hwɛga tɛ kɛŋɔ ya bol o Amanesoma la. Anomanta yaa anɔ la nɛwɛnyini sie aa dɛ lɛ a ta bol, kɛ anɔ la Korowii waa jemɛ bambile bɛlbwa waa la aa dɛ nyin la, anee yaa bol.
Gɛ haa jema la, he kpɛɛra waa laa ya koh ba he be. Ya ta balɛ dɛ́ ba bol waa dɛ negre heyaa dɛ lɛ kwaane ge. Korowii gboo jema.
Ya ta sɔn nyine dɛ le he ne nomɛlbwa be.
Ya ɛ Yeesu Kristo toroma, dɛ fe dɔ ŋwɛnɛ kɛ ya lɛ komɛl le he be. Kɛ ya tɛ heyaa sisɔna kɛŋɔ haah naa ta tea dɛɛ dɛɛ o bechasɔɔhna la.
Ya nyin he waa ya bambile bwa ne. Korowii Amanesoma la gbo ne laa ya ba he be. Yaa nyin he waa gɛ la, a ɛ yaa silɛɛ kɛŋɔ ya kpɔ ya te ja wobol la ta dɛ tɛ heya.
Yabala, haa ya toma ne ya koeh la waa lii kɛɛ? Ya ɛ toma chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa asɛ ya bɛ he bɛlbwa koeh do gɛ saŋ yaa lɔ he be dɛ bol Korowii Amanesoma la dɛɛ bagle heyaa la.
He asɔre tena nɔ ne Korowii bwa ɛ ya danseɛ tena, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he nao kɛ ya we-ɛɛla wer dɛ lɛ Korowii sie, doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole a ta.
He nao gɛ yaa do he bini bɛlbwa gbemba gɛ baa yon dɛɛ ɛ o bii la.
Ya do heyaa gbemba dɛ larawe he bwara dɛ do heyaa ŋɔ hé so sodɛɛga ásɛ he waa lɛ Korowii sie. Onee le heyaa he ba ɛ o bii, dɛ kpɔ o Kora la ne o nyanyini la pera tɛ heya.
Ya dɛ jam Korowii tɔpere bɛlbwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ yaa bol Korowii Waa la he be la, he noa kɛŋɔ Korowii Wa. He ta an noɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn wa. Gɛɛ a do kpela. A gɛ waa nɔɔ dɛɛ ɛ toma he asɔre tena nɔ bini la.
Yabala, he ne Korowii nɛra baa lɔ Judia harɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wahala baa naa Juda tena be la, he ge na a dɔŋa he bwɛɛ tena be.
Juda tena nɔɔ kpo ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo ne Korowii keamere la, dɛ hah yaa, dɛ doŋi yaa la. Gɛ nɛnchɔga nɔ aa Korowii siwi su. Ba ɛ nɛra bwa dɔm,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba dɛ tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ ya bɛ Korowii Waa la bol chagle nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la asɛ Korowii bɛ ban lɛ. Anomanta ba wechɔga dɛ warɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa, ásɛ Korowii bwaawee ir ba nɛ.
Ya te la, yabala, baa doŋi yaa le he be tɔpere tamaa nɔ la, ya ta he waa soɛh. Kɛ nae yaa wola heyaa na. Yaa le he be la, dɛ he be bala swɛɛ ya siwi, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ sikii lawɛ yaa taeh.
Yaa dɛ nyin he be bala la, ya takapɔ gɛ yaa ɛ dɛ́ na heyaa ja. N Pɔɔl yon takapɔ kɛ n fe ɛɛ ba he bee. Kɛ Bɔnsam aa yaa ŋwɛnɛ tɛ.
Ya sie begra aa begra nɔ, he bee ya hwɛga ne silɛɛ do. He waa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu ɛɛ ba yaa tɔɔ dawa, ya hɛgre awola waa ba ya ba che o sie la.
He nɛɛ aa ba chega ya dɔ sɔn ne silɛɛ.
Ya haŋrɔ kahonɛ, yaa wola he waa no la, ya liiro kɛŋɔ aa do werii kɛ ya tomɛ Timoti he be asɛ a ka ya nɛra banɛ gbo Atens.
Timoti ɛ ya dɔŋ dɛ ɛ Korowii torome dɛɛ bol Yeesu Kristo Amanesoma la. Ya tomɔ ó ba do heyaa gbemba dɛ ja heyaa he yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii la bɔr,
he bini bɛlbwa bɛ wahala nɔ waa koh dɛ chwa. He bwa jemɔ kɛ gɛɛ chɛ kɛ ya na.
Ya ne haa lole la, ya bol wahala nɔ waa dɛ ba bala nɔ waa he be he jemɛ wubwa. Asɛ gɛ yaa ŋɔa laanee bala la.
A waa gela n haŋre kahonɛ dɛ tomɛ Timoti ásɛ dɛ jemɛ he yarada bini kɛŋɔ Bɔnsam ken baa negre heyaa dɛ gel ya toma yaa baa ɛ la ken ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.

Kɛ taraken Timoti aa le he be ba la, o ba amanesoma ne kɛŋɔ he dɛ yarada Korowii dɛɛ nyin nɛra ge. O ŋɔ ya be ŋɔ he dɛ lii ya waa kɛrɛdɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa, dɛɛ nyin kɛ he na yaa gɛ yaa dɛ nyin heyaa dɛ na la.
Yabala, ya wahala ne ya wenaale yaa dɛ na nɔ, ya gel a bwa. He yarada gelɔ ya baah sɔɔh yaa he wa.
Dɛ he lawɛ Korowii waa la kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ naa, dɛ ya dɔ bokpega.
Bɔkwa jaamee yaa ba wona kpɔ tɛ Korowii he waɔ? Silɛɛ yaa dɔa le Korowii be nɔ kan. He waa gela ya sie lɛ la.
Ya dɛ soŋe Korowii chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa ásɛ dɛ na he sie bɔr ja, dɛ bol waa aa dɛ ba wona cha heyaa he yarada bini ásɛ he do kpegri ja.
N Naa Korowii gbabir waa bera ɛ ya Mɛɛ la ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu ɛɛ chagle yaa ŋwɛnɛɛ ya ba he be.
Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu ja heyaa dɔŋa nyina kɛrɛdɛ ásɛ hɛɛ nyin nomɛlbwa gɛ yaa dɛ nyin heyaa la.
Wɛɛ geloo he do kpegri dɛ bɛ wechɔga dɔ, dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛga N Naa Korowii waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ la be awola o ne o toromedɛɛga la bwa aa ba la.
Anɔ la aa jaa la, yabala, waa la haa hwela ya be gɛ aa chɛ kɛ he so asɛ Korowii sie lɛ he nɛɛ la, gɛɛ hɛɛ ɛ la. Ya chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu naa ta dɛɛ ja heyaa ŋɔ a chɛ kɛ he ɛ dɛ gwaa gɛ.
He jemɛ waa yaa chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ bol bagle heyaa la.
Korowii dɛ nyin kɛ he ɛ nɛndɛɛga dɛ laa he te kpɔ jwamane ta.
Báa bɛlbwa nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ kɛ wɛɛ mo haahnee ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge ta.
He bɛ siyala ne sibegra ŋwɛnɛ ta kpɔ kɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la.
Nomɛlbwa bɛ o dɔŋ nɛɛ jo a gɛ waa nɔ ta, dɛkalkɛ Korowii ɛɛ tɛr nɛra baa dɛ ɛ gɛ la deŋnee, gɛ yaa ja heyaa logla la ŋɔ hé nyiŋi a ta kɛrɛdɛ la.
Korowii aa le yaa ŋɔ ya ɛ o bii la, o ta ŋɔe ŋɔ yá ba ɛ wedoŋa. O ŋɔ yá ba ɛ wedɛɛga.
Nomɛlbwa waa wola a gɛ waa nɔ ta teŋɛ la, dɛ nɛwɛnyini waa laa o vɛh, dɛ Korowii waa tɛ heyaa o Domadɛɛge la waa o vɛh.
Too. Ane gee la. A ta hiaih kɛ ya berɛ bagle heyaa dɔŋa nyina waa kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii bagle heyaa ŋɔ hé nyin dɔŋa.
Kasinteŋ, he dɛ nyin he bala baa lɔ Makidoonia harɛ la bwa. Yabala, ya dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛ he bɛ waa nɔ gel, kɛ hé ɛ gwaa gɛ.
Hé takapɔ dɛ ɛ he te nɛŋgwɛgra dɛ bɛ nɛra waa ta dɛɛ jo. Hé kpɔ he bokpega ɛ toma, dɛ bɛ he te kpɔ dɛɛ dawɛ nɛra nɛ, gɛ yaa ŋɔ he be wubwa la.
He dɛ ɛ ken aa, hɛɛ dɔ jirima nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ la bee, haa he tenee kpɔ dawɛ nɛra nɛ.
Yabala, ya dɛ nyin kɛ ya bol yabala baa serewa la wa, asɛ he tea bini bɛ chɔg kohona kɛŋɔ nɛra baa kaa, baa wola hwɛga dɔe kɛŋɔ yaa ir seo taa la.
Ya yaradao kɛ Yeesu sewɔ dɛ ir. Gɛ tentenee yaa yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ ba banɔ la baa yarada Yeesu mɔɔ dɛ serewe la kpɔe dɛ ja Yeesu nɛɛ ba ne o ba gɛ saŋ waa ba la.
Ya Dɔɔ la waa waa bolaa nɔ. Ya banɔ la yaa so le dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ ya Dɔɔ la aa ba la, yaa yabala baa serewa la siee tɔ kaa ya Dɔɔ be,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ la gbabir ɛɛ le nyundua dɛ tu ba, dɛ ba yerɛ o nɛra takpeg ne, asɛ o nyundua toroma nomoa ge yerɛ, Korowii bɛla si tɔ o sie, asɛ banɔ la baa yarada Yeesu Kristo mɔɔ dɛ serewe la ir,
asɛ Korowii kpɔ ba ne ya banɔ la ge ya taa soge le gɛ saŋ la bwa kaa nyundua baama ta dɛ́ ka cheme ya Dɔɔ bela, asɛ ya ne o so saŋ bɛlbwa.
Anomanta hé kpɔ waa nɔ dɛɛ larawe dɔŋa bwara.
Yabala, a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ n chwerɛ dɛ bagle heyaa tɔpere la waa nɔ aa dɛ ba chiga,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bwa jemɔ kpela kɛŋɔ tɔpere ya Dɔɔ la aa ba la ɛɛ pigruu kɛŋɔ ŋwɛɛ aa dɛ pigri nɛn jwaana la.

Gɛ saŋ nɛra aa ba ŋɔ, "Bobɛlbwa sɔɔhnɔ, ya dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna name te" la, belaa dɛ harɛchɔg la ɛɛ ba ba pigra. Wɛɛ pigruu kɛŋɔ haah naa kpoŋe tea asɛ lol tea lɔɔ la ken. Gɛ saŋ la, baa bɔree dɔ dɛ chwa ka sɔh.
Kɛ yabala, he te toole biro ta, he sie chaah waa nɔ ta. Anomanta Yeesu bala la aa heyaa pigri kɛŋɔ ŋwɛɛ.
He bwa sekwara ɛ nɛra he sie aa chaah Korowii waa ta. Biro bini nɛra laa yan, bochaah ta nɛraa yan.
Anomanta ya bɛ bɔhwaah ɛ kɛŋɔ bane aa dɛ ɛ la, kɛ hé gel ya sie chɔ harɛ yaa nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ.
Bɔhwaahra ne nɛra baa dɛ dɛɛ te bwa ɛ biro bini nɛra.

Ya te yaa ɛ bochaah ta nɛra nɔ, hé gel ya sie chɔ harɛ, asɛ dɛ kpɔ yarada ne nɛnnyin ɛ ya laa batakaare kɛŋɔ baa do laa batakaare dɛɛ yo laa la, dɛ berɛ kpɔ hwɛga yaa dɔa ya Dɔɔ Yeesu be kɛŋɔ wɛɛ lɛ yaa la ɛ buni gbɛrɛ dɛ kpɔ pi.
Korowii ta yaa tae ŋɔ yá ba di bolchɔge o sie. O ta yaa ŋɔ yá che Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ dɔ ya nyu.
Onee sewa tɛ yaa, asɛ awola o balaa, dɛ ya soge mkpa ta noo, sewaa ya sewɛ oo, yá ne Korowii won pɛ.
Anomanta hɛ́ɛ do dɔŋa gbemba dɛɛ cha dɔŋa, gɛ haa dɛ ɛ nɔ.
Yabala, ya dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ hɛ́ɛ duu nɛra baa ɛ he nomonome dɛɛ ɛ Korowii toma nɔ dɛɛ ja heyaa la.
Ba toma la nomanta hɛ́ɛ duu ba kɛrɛdɛ taeh, dɛɛ nyin ba wa. Hé gel he bwa nyoa pɛ.
Yabala, ya dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛ hɛ́ɛ ja banɔ la baa ɛ bɔhwaahra la, dɛɛ do ɔmeera la gbemba, dɛ lawɛ banɔ la baa wola chegɛ kiŋkiŋ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta la kpoŋe, dɛ dɔ bambile tɛ nomɛlbwa.
Hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ gel bɛlbwa kpɔ wechɔga dɛɛ bɔ wechɔga kem, kɛ hé ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ he dɔŋa ne nomɛlbwa.
Hé gel he sie ɛɛ lɛ tɔpere bɛlbwa, wobɛlbwa ta,
dɛɛ soŋe Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa.
Hɛ́ɛ jam Korowii wobɛlbwa ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛɛ Korowii che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛɛ bagle o tetoowaa he be.
He bɛ gel Korowii Domadɛɛge waa soge he nɛɛ la nyoa sɔɔh.
He bɛ he bala baa dɛ na chaahna la nyoa dɛɛ vɛh.
Kɛ hé nyiŋi ba webagla asɛ dɛ lawɛ anɔ la aa wera la bini.
Hé laa he te kpɔ wechɔga bɛlbwa ta.
Korowii waa dɛ tɛ yaa bosɔɔhna la, ó gbabir laa doŋa bwa kpɔ he nɛ, dɛ ɛ heyaa nɛndɛɛga ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta ka tel kɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa ba.
Korowii waa le heyaa he ba ɛ o bii la, o ɛ kasinteŋ te. Onee dɛɛ ba heyaa nɛndɛɛga ɛɛ.
Yabala, hé soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ yaa.
Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ nyabii.
N kpɔ ya Dɔɔ dɛɛ do heyaa kɛ hé kure tɔn nɔ bagle yabala la bwa sekwaraa.
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ na nɛra sum la, wɛɛ cha heyaa.
Men Pɔɔl ne Silvanos ne Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ Yeesu asɔre tena baa lɔ Tɛsalonika dɛ ɛ N Naa Korowii waa bera ɛ ya Mɛɛ la ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo nɛra la.
Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
Yabala, ya koh he waa dɛ yon dɛɛ jam Korowii. He chɛ gɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii la dɛ kaa sie saŋ bɛlbwa. Nyina haa dɛ nyin dɔŋa la ge gba dɛ do kan ja.

Ya gbagba dɛ bol he waa dɛɛ bagle asɔre tena baa cheme bobɛlbwa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la, dɛɛ kpɛɛ heya. Ya dɛ ŋɔ ba be gɛ nɛra aa dɛ ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa, aa no heyaa saŋ bɛlbwa, asɛ he dɔ bambile haa wola habɔɔ le dɛ ta teŋɛ dɛɛ yarada Yeesu la.
He we-ɛɛla baglɔ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii bole waa pa heyaa la togrɔ. Haa koh o Kora waa dɛɛ na hɔhɔrɔwa nɔ, anee dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he chɛ o Kora la ta jae.
Kɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa la te, Korowii ɛɛ bɔ ba a kemee. O we-ɛɛla togrɔ. Ó ɛɛ ba gɛ hɔhɔrɔwa la,
dɛ gel he bwara sɔɔh heya. Ya ne he bwaa dɛɛ ba bosɔɔhna la dɔe gɛ saŋ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa forɛ le nyundua o ne o nyundua toroma baa dɛ di kpegri ne nii nɛɛ ba la.
O balaa, wɛɛ bol nɛra baa wola Korowii jemɛ, baa wola Amanesoma aa dɛ bagle ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa noɛ la waa, dɛ bɔ ba a kem,
dɛ per ba le o be. Baa o kpegri aa gela o dɔ jirima laanee na kpa, asɛ o kpɔ hɔhɔrɔwa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa ta ba nɛ.
Awola waa ba o tɔpejen la ta asɛ o nɛra tɛo duure la, nɛra baa yaradao la bwa ɛɛ nao dɛ kpɛɛro. He gba jao, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya faa bagle heyaa o waa la, he noɔ dɛ teŋɛ a ta.

Yeesu bala la waa ya yon dɛɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ heya, ásɛ o cha heyaa he soga bini won magre dɛ chɛ lee waa le heyaa dɛ tɛ o te la, dɛ tɛ heyaa kpegri he won ɛ wedɛɛga la bwa aa lɔ he bambile bini ne wobɛlbwa haa ŋɔ hé ɛ, yarada haa yaradao la nomanta.

Ya dɛ soŋe Korowii gɛ ásɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu sɔn won dɔ jirima dɛ le he we-ɛɛla ta, asɛ he ge gba won dɔ jirima dɛ le o be. N Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo suna waa dɛ sune ya nɛɛ dɛɛ cha yaa la nomanta, a bwa won ɛ gɛ.
Yabala, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bala waa ne gɛ ya bwa aa dɛ ba o be chema la, n dɛ soŋe heya,

hɛ́ɛ lii a waa kɛrɛdɛ. Maa nyin nomɛlbwa bol wetamaa ane asɛ he den ɔmɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ ya Dɔɔ balɔ kaa. Dɛ ba ŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge bag ba gɛ baa bol, kɛɛ dɛ he na tɔn bɛl o negre heyaa kɛŋɔ yanee chwerɔ waa, he bɛ no dɛ gel a ɛ heyaa waane.

He bɛ gel nomɛlbwa negre heyaa ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta. Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ waane ɛɛ ɛo mɔɔ asɛ tɔpere la ba. Gɛ saŋ nɛra aa ir dɛ warɛ pirim dɛ vɛh Korowii la ɛɛ bao, mɔɔ nɛn waa ɛ Kristo dɔm tenten Korowii bandia aa lɔ o nɛɛ kɛŋɔ ó chɔgo la le.
Wɛɛ ɛ o tenee dɛ gwaa komɛlbwa nɛra aa dɛ toma dɛɛ yera ba dɔɔranar, hale wɛɛ kpɔ Korowii Dea berɛ sobɔr dɛ ŋɔ onee Korowii.
Haa lii kɛŋɔ n faa lɔ he be la dɛ n dɛ bagle heyaa gɛ waa nɔ naa?
Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ komɛlee tɔɔ ŋwɛnɛ o le kahonɛ la, nemenɛ o saŋ tel.
Wechɔga dɔɔ ba taraken, kɛ aa won dɔ bɔr kohona, nemenɛ kon la waa tɔa ŋwɛnɛ la le mɔɔ.
Dɛ kon waa tɔa ŋwɛnɛ la baa le aa, belaa Wechɔga Te la ɛɛ ba bochaah lee nɛra jemɔ. Kɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bala jirima ne o nyoa peu gbo kwara ɛɛ won kpoo bug ta.
Gɛ saŋ waa ba mɔɔ Yeesu ba kpoo la, Bɔnsam ɛɛ do o nɛɛ dɛɛ chao kɛrɛdɛ o won dɔ kpegri kohona, dɛ won dɛɛ ɛ nyokpowaa ne wejena, dɛɛ negre nɛra kɛŋɔ Korowiirii tɛo kpegri ken,
dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga bwa soosiwi aa lole, dɛ won dɛɛ negre nɛra baa nyogra dɛɛ ba chɔga la. Korowii ɛɛ chɔg baa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba vɛh kasinteŋ waa aa dɛ ba wona lɛɛ ba la, ba ta o waa nyine.
Anomanta o gelɔ nyosone o nyoa aa kpega ɛɛ ba ba be dɛ ba tɔɔge ba sie, asɛ baa yarada waa aa ɛ nyosone,
ásɛ o won pa nomɛlbwa waa wola sɛɛh dɛ teŋɛ o kasinteŋ waa la ta kɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga o sie lɛ a ta la bolchɔge.

Anomanta a chɛ kɛŋɔ ya jam Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa he wa, yabala. O dɛ nyin heyaa kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ le harɛ mumpar la bwa le heyaa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ lɛ heyaa. O Domadɛɛge aa gela he doŋa bwa le he nɛɛ la, ne gɛ haa no o kasinteŋ waa dɛ yaradaa la, a waa o lɛ heyaa la.
Yanee fa bol Amanesoma la bagle heyaa he no la, asɛ Korowii che a ta le heyaa ásɛ he ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo won pɛ dɔ jirima.
Anomanta, yabala, hé lawɛ kiŋkiŋ dɛ teŋɛ waa la bwa yaa kpɔ nyoa dɛ bagle heya, ne anɔ la yaa chwera tɔn ta dɛ tɛ heyaa la ta. Hé gel a bwa do he nyu bini kɛrɛdɛ.
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo gbagba ne N Naa Korowii waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ dɛɛ nyin yaa kɛrɛdɛ dɛ sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa, dɛ tɛ yaa hwɛga aa wera ne gbemba aa wola tonɛ bwa la,
bá tɛ heyaa gbemba dɛ gel he che kiŋkiŋ, asɛ dɛ won ɛ wedɛɛga te bɛlbwa, dɛ won dɛɛ bola ge.
Anɔ la aa kaa la, yabala, hé soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ ya gba, ásɛ ya Dɔɔ waa la won perɛ kɛrɛdɛ dɛ won dɔ jirima, asɛ nɛra no kɛŋɔ gɛ he ge faa noa la.
Hé soŋo o lɛ yaa dɛɛ le meesɔɔh tena ne nɛnchɔga be, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa laa dɛ no waa yaa dɛ bol la dɛ yaradaa.
Kɛ Korowii waa dɔ kasinteŋ la, wɛɛ geloo hɛɛ kpeg waa la ta teŋa ta dɛ lɛ heyaa le Bɔnsam nɔn ta o bɛ heyaa dɔ.
Yaa dɛ yarada ya Dɔɔ la waa ya won dɛɛ yarada he ge kɛŋɔ he dɛ teŋɛ gɛ ya faa bagle heyaa la ta la, dɛ berɛ dɛɛ yarada heyaa kɛ hɛɛ kpoŋe gɛ ya faa bol he be laanee dɛɛ la.
Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya ásɛ he won jemɛ nyina Korowii aa nyin heya, ne bambile Yeesu Kristo aa lawa o hɔhɔrɔwa la bini la.
Yabala, ya chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta dɛɛ ŋɔ he be ŋɔ, he bini bɛlbwa dɛ ɛ bɔhwaah o ta sɛɛh dɛɛ ɛ toma gɛ yaa bagla la aa, hé gelo, he ne o bɛ pɛ.
Ya faa lɔ he be la, dɛ ya ta bɔhwaahra ɛɛ. Anomanta hé jemɛ gɛ haa ɛ dɛ teŋɛ ya nɛ.
Ya ta nomɛlbwa kondikwaa dii pɛɛpɛɛ. Ya ɛ toma chɔɔ ne jwaana, dɛɛ koh kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ heyaa ha ya kondikwaa wa.
Yaa ɛ gɛ nɔ, a ta ɛɛ kɛŋɔ ya ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛ ya lɛ gɛ kwaa nɔ le he be. Ya dɔ ŋwɛnɛ, kɛ ya ɛ gɛ dɛ́ kpɔ bagle heyaa ásɛ hɛɛ teŋɛ a ta.
Waa yaa kpɔa tɛ heyaa gɛ saŋ ya faa lɔ he be bela laanee kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔa waa tomaa ɛ la ta chɛ kɛŋɔ o di kwa.
Ya dɛ no he waa kɛŋɔ he bane ta sɛɛh dɛɛ ɛ toma, dɛ valɛ pɛɛpɛɛ dɛ kpɔ nyoa dɛɛ do nɛra waa ta.
Ya chegɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn ta dɛɛ ŋɔ gɛ nɛra nɔ be ŋɔ bá do sie dɛɛ ɛ ba gbagba toma dɛɛ di ba koeh ta.
Yabala, hé ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ la, dɛ bɛ ŋɔ he koɔh.
Dɛ nomɛlbwa ta sɛɛh kɛ wɛɛ teŋɛ gɛ yaa ŋɔa tɔn nɔ bini nɔ taa yaa, hé nyiŋu kɛrɛdɛ. He ne o bɛ pɛ dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa, ásɛ sihiih kpoo.
N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ hé kpɔɔ berɛ he dɔm te, kɛ hé jao kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ haa dɛ ja he nimanar.
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la gbagba waa dɔ bambisɔn kɛrɛdɛ la, ó tɛ heyaa bambisɔn saŋ bɛlbwa, wobɛlbwa ta, dɛ ja he bwa nɛ.
N Pɔɔl gbagbaa chwerɛ bonɔ nɔ. N dɛ na heya. Kenii n yon dɛɛ ɛ n tɔn bɛlbwa bini ásɛ he won jemɛ kɛŋɔ n tɔnee.
Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha he bwa sekwaraa.
Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome laanee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowii waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ ne Yeesu Kristo yaa dɛ hwɛgɛ o nɛɛ laanee do mɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bol o waa nɔ.
N bie Timotii n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ. Menee bol Korowii Waa he no, dɛ berɛ n bie a ta la. Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo chae dɛ na he sum, dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna.

Waa maa ba dɛ kaa Makidoonia harɛ ta dɛ ŋɔ he be la, a taa n ta do. N ŋɔ hé so Ɛfesos dɛ kah nɛra baa teŋe nyosone dɛɛ tɛ nɛra ŋɔ Korowii Waa baa chagle la ŋɔ bá gel gɛ waa la, dɛ bɛ Korowii waa la sie berɛ.

Ŋɔ ba bɛ gel nyosone la ne gɛ baa dɛ bagle ba naanar lee bɔra baa wola a nyoa na bwa la lɛ ba liire. Wetɔŋla gbo nee gɛ waa nɔ ɛɛ ba. Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛre laa baa bagle la, dɛkalkɛ yarada gbo taa a che baa jemɛ Korowii toma ŋwɛnɛre.
Wee maa koh a waa doe waa nɔ ta laanee kɛŋɔ bá won dɔ nɛnnyin. Nɛn waa dɔ nɛnnyin nɔ soo la ta wechɔga bɛlbwa dɔe, o tea too, o dɔ yarada kasinteŋ.
Nɛra bane gel gɛ waa nɔ dɛ ka teŋɛ wesale aa wola mun dɔe bola ta.
Ba dɛ nyin kɛ ba ɛ ba te kɛ nɛra baa dɛ chagle nɛra Mmara la, kɛ waa ba siwi yon swɛɛ a ta baa bol la, ba gba aa a mun jemɛ.
Ya bwa jemɔ kɛ dɛ nɛn wono ɛ gɛ Mmara la aa dɛ bagle la aa, Mmara la wer tɛo.

A chɛ kɛŋɔ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛga waa laa ba koh dɛɛ do mmara, kɛ nɛra baa wola mmara ta teŋɛ la, ne deŋnekpeg tena, ne nɛra baa vɛh Korowii la, ne wechɔg-ɛɛra, ne nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ, baa wola on duu la, ne nɛra baa dɛ kpoo ba mɛɛnanar ne ba nyare, dɛ nɛra baa dɛ kpo nɛra bwa,

ne jwamane tena, ne baala ba ne ba bandɔŋa aa dɛ chɔ haah ne baa, ne nɛra baa lawɛ nɛra dɛɛ yog ba kɛ yoma, ne nyosonteŋna, ne nɛra ba yon jemɛ kɛ nyosonee baa teŋe dɛ garɛ dɛɛ ŋwɛɛ Korowii la, ne nɛra baa dɛ ɛ we-ɛɛla te bɛlbwa a ne webagla aa togra la aa wola kaa la, ba waa ba koh dɛɛ do mmara.
Gɛ waa aa togra la bwa lɔ Amanesoma Korowii aa kpɔa do n nɔn ta ŋɔ ń chagle nɛra la ta. Anee dɛɛ bagle Korowii waa dɔ jirima ne silɛɛ la wa.
N dɛ jam ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa tɛ mɛ o kpegri la kɛ waa yarada mɛ dɛ kpɔ o toma nɔ do n nɔn ta nɔ.
A lole kɛ n fa dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo la nɛnhɛla, dɛɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa, n siwi sao mɛɛ yoo. Kɛ Korowii na n sum, dɛkalkɛ maa wola Korowii yarada dɔe n bini la, dɛ maa jemɛ gɛ maa dɛ ɛ.
O sune n nɛɛ kohona dɛ cha mɛ taeh n dɔ yarada ne nɛnnyin yaa dɔa le pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la ta.
Waa nɔ ɛ kasinteŋ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ he lɛa kɛŋɔ wechɔg-ɛɛra waa Yeesu Kristo koh ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ́ ba lɛɛ ba. N wechɔgaa kana gwaa nomɛlbwa kwa.

Kɛ Korowii sune n nɛ, asɛ Yeesu dɔ bambile tɛ mɛ n wechɔga damanta nɔ bwa ta, ásɛ nɛra baa ba no Korowii waa dɛ yaradao la jemɛ gɛ Yeesu aa dɔ bambile kohona, dɛ won yaradao dɛ dɔ o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la.
Yá kpɔ duure tɛ Koojen la o Kora dii aa wola jaga dɔe, waa wola sewɛ bwa, baa wola won on na, o gbo aa ɛ Korowii la, dɛɛ guŋu harɛ fini ne tɔpere bɛlbwa. Aamen.

N bie Timoti, n dɔ waane dɛ́ bol he be, ásɛ he lawɛ a bini he Korowii toma ta. Gɛ ba faa chegɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛ bol o toma waa tɛɛ kpegri hɛ́ɛ ɛ nɔ waa la, gɛ waa la tenten taa mɛɛ doe la. Anomanta gel gɛ waa la doe gbemba ásɛ he won yo kɛrɛdɛ,
asɛ dɛ kpoŋe Korowii yarada bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛɛ ɛ waa haa jema kɛ a togrɔ. Gɛɛ bane aa wola ɛɛ, asɛ ba ta wone yarada Korowii ka tonɛ dɛ horɛ la.
Banɔ la baa hora la bini banee Haemeneas ne Alɛksanda. N kpɔ ba do Bɔnsam nɔn ta ásɛ ba jemɛ kɛŋɔ baa Korowii nɛnhɛla ɛ.
Anɔ la aa tɔ sie mɛɛ ja asɔre tena kɛŋɔ báa teŋɛ a ta laanee kɛ hɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa. Hɛ́ɛ soŋo dɛɛ jaamo wobɛlbwa ta.
Hé soŋo dɛɛ tɛ koranar ne nɛra baa dɛ di nomonome bwa ásɛ ya bwa so bosɔɔhna ta jeih ken, dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii gɛ aa chɛa, dɛɛ ɛ waa aa wera o be.
Gɛɛ wera, dɛɛ lɛ ya Lɛɛ Korowii sie.
O te dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa dɔ o nyu, asɛ dɛ ba jemɛ kasinteŋ waa la.
Anee kɛ Korowii beŋkpoŋii lole, dɛ dɔ nachige beŋkpoŋ do o ne nɛwɛnyini baah ta, o ge ɛ nɛn. Onee Yeesu Kristo
waa kpɔ o te tɛ kɛŋɔ ba kpɔɔ charɛ nɛra bwa nyu la. Gɛ saŋ aa chɛ kɛŋɔ waa nɔ magre la taa a den chig la. O ɛ gɛ a chɔ danseɛ saŋ bɛlbwa.

Anɔ waa Korowii lee mɛ ŋɔ ń lɔ a dawuro bagle nɛra, dɛ berɛ ɛ Yeesu torome ge la. Kasinteŋii mɛɛ bol la, maa nyosone teŋe. Onee gela mɛɛ bagle nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la ásɛ ba yarada Yeesu dɛ jemɛ kasinteŋ la.
N dɛ nyin kɛ bobɛlbwa baala baa ɛ asɔre tena la laa ba te kpɔ bandisale ne wetɔŋla ta, asɛ dɛ won ɛ nɛndɛɛga dɛ ir nɔɔra soŋe Korowii.

Gɛ tentenee mɛɛ nyin kɛ dɛ haahna dɛ ba laala doe yaa, ba bɛ jwamanlaala ne laala a waa aa do bola dɛɛ do. Bá kpɔ laala aa magre ba ne, dɛ bɛ ba te kpɔ do nyuune ɛɛ aa dɛ ba kem ne, ne suugaswɛm koŋkwaare doe, ne yale a yog aa kpega liga ta.
Kɛ báa ɛ wedɛɛga kɛ haahna baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii. Ba wedɛɛga ɛɛ laanee dɛ gel ba do wer toli.
A wer kɛŋɔ haahna ɛɛ pwɛr ba te, dɛ cheg deŋne dɛɛ no Korowii Waa baa dɛ bag ba la.
N ta ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ kɛŋɔ haahna di nomonome baala nɛɛ dɛɛ bagle wa. A chɛ kɛŋɔ ba tɔ ba nyoa dɛɛ no,
dɛkalkɛ Adamee Korowii tɔ sie ta mɔɔ dɛ ta o haah Hawa.
Adam ge kwaraa laa Bɔnsam negre la. Hawaa o negre dɛ gel o ɛ wechɔga la.
Kɛ dɛ haahna kpoŋe Korowii yarada bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛɛ nyin nɛn, dɛ laa ba te dɛɛ kpɔ wedoŋa ta, baa wesale ɛ aa, Korowii ɛɛ geloo ba dɔ ba nyu ba lola ta.
A ɛ kasinteŋ kɛŋɔ dɛ nɛn ŋɔ wɛɛ tɔ asɔre tena siee yaa, dɛ tondɛɛga tentenee naate ɛɛ nyin la.

A gɛ nɛn la, a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ nɛra dɔ o wechɔge bol. A chɛ kɛ o haah ɛ beŋkpoŋ. A chɛ kɛ o won o te lawa, dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ, o we-ɛɛla ɛɛ lɛ nɛra sie. A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn waa won hɔɔhra kpoŋa, dɛ won Korowii Waa bagla.
A ta chɛ kɛŋɔ o ɛ sennyɔdɛɛ, o bɛ nagrenyini ɛ. Kɛ ó ɛ nɛn waa pwɛra, waa wola o bwara ne waa nyin. A ta chɛ kɛ o siwi begre suuga.
A chɛ kɛ o won o haah ne bii nyiŋa, asɛ o bii ɛɛ no o deŋna waa dɛɛ tɛo duure.
Dɛ nɛn aa won o haah ne bii nyiŋi aa, ɛrɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛ won nyiŋi asɔre tena nɛɔ?
A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn waa kpɔ o te tɛ Korowii dɛ yaradao bigri, gɛ aa ɛ nɛra waa tɔ ba sie la nomanta, o nyu bini bɛ on som ba do o maŋkura o te kohona, asɛ o ba jo Korowii nɛɛ gɛ Bɔnsam aa ɛa la.
A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn nɛra baa wola asɔre tena ɛɛ kwara aa dɛ yerɛ o sɔndɛɛge, asɛ o bɛ sihiih waane ba ɛ dɛ le Bɔnsam bel ta.
Nɛra baa chɔ tomare nyoa asɔre la ta la ge, gɛ. A wer kɛŋɔ baa ɛ waa aa dɔ duure, dɛɛ di kasinteŋ. Ba ta chɛɛ kɛ ba ɛ sennyɔdɛɛra, ba ta chɛɛ kɛ ba kpɔ suuga sibegra dɛɛ bɔ nɛra apoo.
A chɛ kɛ ba kpoŋe Korowii wesɔɔhla waa waa gela ya jemɛ la bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛɛ ɛ waa baa naa kɛ a togrɔ.
A wer kɛŋɔ he nyiŋi ba waa bini dɛ na dɛ ba waa wer mɔɔ he tɛɛ ba ŋwɛnɛ ba ɛ gɛ toma la.
Ba haahna chɛ kɛ baa ɛ waa aa dɔ duure, dɛ bɛ nɛra dɛɛ ŋwalɛ. A chɛ kɛ ba won ba te lawa, dɛ kpɔ kasinteŋ dɛɛ ɛ wobɛlbwa.
A chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa waa chɔ asɔre tomare nyoa la haah ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛ won o haah ne bii nyiŋa kɛrɛdɛ.
Banɔ la baa dɛ ɛ ba toma kɛrɛdɛ la dɛ dɔ sɔn, dɛɛ do kpegri yarada baa dɔa dɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la ta.
N dɛ nyin kɛ n wonaa, ń ba nae. Kɛ n tɔ sie chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛɛ,

asɛ dɛ n baa bigri aa, tɔ́n nɔ bagle gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ya banɔ la Korowii aa kpɔ yaa ɛ o dem tena nɔ so dɛɛ ɛ ya wa. Yanee Korowii waa wola sewɛ bwa la toroma waa kpɔ o kasinteŋ waa la tɛ ŋɔ yá lawɛ a bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ kɛ pila yon lawɛ dea kpoŋe la.

Ŋwɛnɛ yaa kpɔ o ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii nɔ, tɔŋla toole kɛ wesɔɔhla aa lɔ o ta asɛ Korowii gel ya jemɛ la ɛ wejena kohona. Waa yaa lawɛ a bini kpoŋe laanee: Korowii baa berɛ o te nɛwɛnyini. O Domadɛɛge la gelɔ nɛra bwa jemɛ kɛ o waa togrɔ. Nyundua toroma nao. Nɛra bol o waa bagle harɛ nɔ ta nɛra baa lɔ bobɛlbwa. Ba no o waa harɛ nɔ ta dɛ yaradao, asɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua o ka dɔ jirima.
Korowii Domadɛɛge la pili waa nɔ bini chasee ken bagle heyaa ŋɔ, kerekere la nɛra bane ɛɛ vɛh Yeesu waa nɔɔ dɛ kaa yarada koŋkwaa aa dɛ neg ba, asɛ dɛɛ no a be.
Nɛra baa kpɔ nyosone dɛɛ negre nɛra laanee kpɔ gɛ negra webagla la ɛɛ bagle nɛra. Ba liire chɔgɔ. Nɛra negra ne wechɔga man ba kɛŋɔ nɛn baa kpɔ buniwɔb chɔgro a mano waa wola konwɔb ɔmɛ kpa la.

Gɛ nɛra nɔɔ vala dɛɛ chagle nɛra ŋɔ aa were kɛ baa mo haah kɛɛ haah yalɛ la, dɛ berɛ ŋɔ kondikwaa ane aa were kɛŋɔ nɛra di la. Kɛ Korowiirii ta gɛ kondikwaa nɔ ŋɔ bánɔ la baa jemɛ kasinteŋ waa la dɛɛ yaradao la kpɔ jam tɛo dɛ dia.
Korowii kontaala te bwa wer. Dɛ ya kpɔ jam tɛo mɔɔ dɛ lɛa te naa, ate dɛ komɛlbwa ta vɛɛh doe,
dɛkalkɛ gɛ haa jam Korowii la ne Korowii gbagba wobol la won gela a do wer Korowii be ásɛ nɛn di.
Dɛ he kpɔ gɛ waa nɔ bagle he bala aa, anee dɛɛ ba chagla kɛŋɔ he ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome tenten haa teŋɛ Korowii waa haa yaradaa ne kasinteŋ la ta, dɛ kpɔ kpeg dɛ do kpegri.
Laa he te kpɔ wobosale aa wola Korowii waa ɛɛ nɛra ɛɛ nyin a bola la ta, dɛ swɛɛ siwi hweli gɛ haa dɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa la ta.

Dɛ he swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ tɛgre he pɔla bini naa, a dɔ tɔnɔ tama. Kɛ dɛ he swɛɛ siwi kɛ hɛɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa la taa yaa, anee dɔ tɔnɔ wobɛlbwa ta, dɛkalkɛ Korowii nɛɛ teŋa dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ nɛra fini ne seo habɔɔ bwa.
Gɛ waa nɔ ɛ kpela tɔŋla aa wola toole a ta kwaraa. Anomanta no dɛ lawɛ a bini kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ.
Koeh yaa dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ o toma nɔ bwa, Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa o gbo ɛ Korowii la nɛɛ ya sie dawɛ. Onee dɛɛ lɛ nɛn te bɛlbwa. Nomɛlbwa waa yaradao dɛ kpɔ o te tɛo la, o dɛ lɛo.
Dɛɛ chag ba gɛ waa nɔ bwa dɛɛ ja ba báa teŋɛ a ta.

Bɛ gel nɛra koh kɛ he ɛ bechala nomanta dɛɛ ɛɛ sisawa, kɛ gel nɛra baa yarada Yeesu la na gɛ haa dɛ bol wa, gɛ he da aa doa, gɛ haa dɛ nyin nɛn, gɛ haa yarada Yeesu dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo, ne gɛ haa laa he te kpɔ wedoŋa ta, asɛ dɛ hweli waa le a ta.
Do sie kure Korowii Tɔn dɛɛ bag ba cheremi bɔra, dɛɛ bol Korowii Waa la dɛɛ chag ba a bini ka tel gɛ saŋ maa ba.
Kpegri Korowii aa chae he dɔ dɛ le awola baa kpɔ nɔɔra darawe he nɛɛ dɛ che Korowii Domadɛɛge kpegri ta dɛ bol a waa la, bɛ gel a ɛ pɛɛ.
Swɛɛ siwi dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ gɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ ɛa ásɛ nɛra bwa na gɛ he toma aa dɛ kaa kɛrɛdɛ.
Dɛɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ he soga bini ne he webagla bini. Kpoŋe a bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛɛ ɛ gɛ haa dɛ bagle nɛra la. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, hɛɛ lɛ he gbagba ne nɛra baa dɛ no he be la bwaa.
Dɛ baa waa gwaale nomoa ɛ waane aa wola weraa, bɛ o nɛɛ nyɛg, kɛ bol waa baglo kɛŋɔ he gbagba mɛɛ, asɛ dɛɛ ɛ bibaala haa ɛ nomoa ka tɛɛ ba la ge kɛŋɔ he gbagba nimanar,
dɛ kpɔ haahna baa gwaale nomonome la ɛ he nyare. Asɛ bihaahna haa gwaa ba la ge, hɛ́ɛ ɛɛ ba kɛ he nimambii, wedoŋa bɛlbwa bɛ he ne ba baah ta do.
Haahna ba jaranar aa serewa baa wola nomɛlbwa dɔe ó nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la, dɛɛ duu ba dɛɛ cha ba.

Kɛ dɛ luhaah bɛl lole dɛ dɔ bii kɛɛ naanar aa, a chɛ kɛ ba jemɛ gɛ ba ne waa so, ba nyiŋu, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a wer kɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa ta la ɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ nyiŋi ba lolanar gɛ ba ge faa koh ba nɛɛ la. Gɛɛ dɛɛ su Korowii siwi.
Luhaah waa nyaa o ta nɛn dɔe ó nyiŋi o nɛɛ la te, Korowii nɛɛ o sie dawɛ wɛɛ soŋo chɔɔ ne jwaana bwa ó chao.
Kɛ luhaah bodia wa aa dɛ lɛ o sie la, o soge le te, kɛ o do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa sewa.
Ja ba gɛ waa nɔ ta asɛ nɛra bɛ ba bwara wechɔge dɔ bol.
Dɛ nomɛl lole, waa o nya ne o mɛɛ kɛɛ o dem tena nyiŋi aa, naate Korowii toma ɛ pɛɛ. Naate waa wola Korowii yarada gba bɔɔ.
Bɛ luhaah waa wola bene fifraanumɛl dɔe mɔɔ la kure ja luhaahna maa bol ba waa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ cha ba dɛɛ nyiŋ ba la nɛ. Luhaah waa dɔ bene fifraanumɛl, waa wola baa bɛlbwa jemɛ ka ja o jaa nɛ,

nɛra bwa jemɛ o wedɛɛga waa ɛa wa, kɛŋɔ waa wona dɛɛ o bii ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge ta ba ɛ bechadɛɛga, dɛ won dɛɛ kpoŋe hɔɔhra kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ pwɛr o te ɛ toma tɛ asɔre tena, dɛ won cha nɛra wa aa puu ba, asɛ dɛ won kpɔ o te bwa tɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ gbo la waa mɛɛ bol he be ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la.
Bɛ luhaahna ba taa ɛ toli kure ja luhaahna maa bol ba waa nɔ nɛ, dɛkalkɛ ba pɛla ɛɛ ba lawɛ yalee, ba gel Yeesu Kristo toma la dɛ ka yalɛ,
asɛ a ɛ wechɔga tɛɛ ba kɛŋɔ ba faa bola ŋɔ Yeesu Kristo toma gboo baa ba ɛɛ, dɛ berɛ vɛh la.

Luhaahna nɔ dɔŋa, baa wedɛɛga bɛlbwa dɔe dɛɛ ɛ ka ja kɛŋɔ baa dɛ gaage dɛɛ valɛ deremi ta pɛɛpɛɛ. A gbo laa. Baa kpɔ nyoa dɛɛ do nɛra waa ta, dɛɛ ŋwalɛ nɛra, asɛ dɛɛ bol waa aa wola chɛɛ kɛŋɔ ba bol bwa.
Anomanta dɛ luhaahna ba taa ɛ toli la yalɔ dɛ logle bii, dɛ won ba deremi ta nyiŋa, gɛ aa ɛ asɛ ya dɔma bɛ wedoŋa bɛlbwa dɔ bol yagɛ yaa aa, gɛɛ n fe ɛɛ nyin.
Taraken gba, luhaahna bane dɔɔ le Yeesu Kristo habɔɔ dɛ ka teŋɛ Bɔnsam nɛɛ tonɛ.

Haah bɛlbwa waa ɛ asɔre te asɛ luhaahna do o dem la, ó takapɔ kɛ wɛɛ nyiŋi luhaahna laanee asɛ dɛ bɛ koeh la bwa kpɔ dawɛ asɔre nɛ, gɛ aa ɛ asɛ asɔre ge won nyiŋi luhaahna la baa wola nɛra dɔe bá nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la.
Asɔre nomonome la baa dɛ tɔ asɔre tena sie kɛrɛdɛ la chɛ kembɔr bele anɛ. Banee kɛŋɔ banɔ la ba sie aa dɛ begre Korowii Waa la bola ne a chagla ta la,
dɛkalkɛ a lɔ Korowii Tɔn la bini kɛ, "He bɛ nae aa dɛ ɛ toma he koo ta la nyoa vɔwɛ dɛ ŋɔ a bɛ kwaa di." Dɛ berɛ chwerɛ do o bini ja ŋɔ, "Tom-ɛɛ bɛlbwa kembɔr chɛo."
Dɛ nomɛl ba he be dɛ ba kpɔ waa dɛ dawɛ asɔre nomoa bɛl aa, bɛ no nemenɛ nɛn nɛɛte ne tooro te baa di danseɛ kɛ waa la ɛ kasinteŋ mɔɔ he no dɛ kpɔ ɛ wa.
Dɛ bɛl ɛ wechɔga aa, yerɔ cheme asɔre tena la bwa sie dɛ kaoh. He ɛ gɛ naa, nɛra baa lɔ bela dɛ na la ɛɛ ɔmɔɔ dɛ laa ba te dɛɛ kpɔ wechɔga ta.
N chegɛ Korowii ne Yeesu Kristo ne nyundua toroma la bwa sie dɛ kpɔ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛɛ, asɛ he we-ɛɛla bwa ta la, he bɛ gel nɛra bane waa su he siwi dɛ gwaa bane, kɛ dɛɛ ɛ ba bwa kɛrɛdɛ.
Bɛ totoo kpɔ nɔɔra dawɛ nomɛlbwa nɛɛ dɛ leo ŋɔ ó ɛ Korowii toma, asɛ dɛ naate ta ba wone kpoŋe tom la bini dɛ ka ɛ wechɔga aa, a ba maali. Nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ gel wedoŋa bɛlbwa maali.
He tea la ne gɛ he bwara yon dɛɛ wee warawara la nomanta, bɛ nee gbo dɛɛ nyɔ kpa. He ɛo waa, hɛ́ɛ nyɔ sen ge tama.
Nɛra bane lole, ba te ne wechɔga ɛɛ dɛ nɛra bwa nao, a yon che a ta ba la ba ne kɔɔto ka pa ba bolchɔge. Kɛ nɛra bane ge ɛ wechɔga aa, waa la peu dɛ kaa kwaraa mɔɔ nɛra jemɛ.
Gɛ tentenee wedɛɛga ɛɛ ge aa wola won sɔh. Dɛ nɛn ɛ wedɛɛga sɔh gba aa, aa le baŋee.
Nɛra baa ɛ nɛndɔɔla la chɛ kɛŋɔ baa ɔmɛ ba dɔɔranar dɛɛ duu ba, asɛ nɛra bɛ ŋwɛnɛ dɔ bol wechɔga yagɛ Korowii ne waa nɔ yaa dɛ chagle nɔ.

Nɛndɔɔla ba ne ba dɔɔranar bwa aa ɛ asɔre tena la bɛ koh kɛ ba ne ba bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ nomanta ba siwi ɛɛ sa ba. Ba tenee chɛ kɛ ba tomɛ ba dɔɔranar kɛrɛdɛ kwara, dɛkalkɛ ba dɔɔranar la ge ɛ asɔre tena baa dɛ nyin ba la bini bane. Bol gɛ waa nɔ bag ba dɛ chag ba a bini.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ chagle Korowii Wa, asɛ a korɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo kasinteŋ waa la ta, ne gɛ yaa dɛ chagle nɛra ŋwɛnɛ baa kpɔa dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii la ta la,
naate dɛ maŋkura o te pɛɛpɛɛ. Waa wobɛlbwa jemɛ. Wetɔŋla dɛ weo chogla, asɛ wetama bɛlbwa dɛ o dɛ vuuga. Gɛ waa nɔɔ dɛɛ ba bɔweela ne nagra ne dɔŋa chɛgra ne liichɔga ne la.
Gɛ te la ne nɛra baa wola wedɛɛga lii, baa wola ya kasinteŋ waa la jemɛ la, ba dɛ sagɛ wetɔŋla aa wola mun dɔe ta, dɛ yon dɛɛ lii kɛ Korowii toma ɛ ŋwɛnɛ bɛl baa kpɔ o ta dɛɛ nyin suuga.
Nɛn haa dɛ tomɛ Korowii, he siwi ɛɛ su komɛlbwa Korowii aa tɛɛ la, he ɛ kondɔɔh tenten.
Baa lolɛ yaa la, ya ta komɛlbwa ne harɛ nɔ ta balɛ. Gɛɛ a do ya seo tɔpere ge yaa wola won kpɔ komɛlbwa le bonɔ kaa.
Anomanta, dɛ ya dɔ kwaa yaa di, dɛ dɔ yale dɛɛ tɔ aa, hé gel a magre ya ne.
Nɛra ba siwi aa swɛɛ suuga ta la dɛ chole. Suuga sibegra dɛ neg ba dɛɛ do pɛlchɔga ta, dɛ gel baa na wa, dɛɛ pɛlɛ konsale ne waa aa dɛ ba waa ne nɛ, dɛ yon gel ba chɔg kwaraa.
Suuga nyin kohona taa wechɔga bwa soosiwi ɛɛ le. Bane teŋɛ suuga nɛɛ kohona dɛ nyogre Korowii ŋwɛnɛ, dɛ gel suna dii berɛ ka ba name.

Hei, Timoti! Haa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii nɛɛ nɔ, a chɛ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ ke he te gɛ waa la te bwa ta, dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi, dɛɛ tomɔ, dɛ kpɔ he te tɛo dɛɛ yaradao, dɛɛ nyin nɛn, dɛ won bambile lawa wobɛlbwa ta, dɛ do pwɛre.

Yarada haa dɛ yarada Korowii nɔ, yodɛɛgee hɛɛ yo gɛ la. Anomanta yo kɛrɛdɛ dɛ́ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la. A gɛ mkpa nɔɔ Korowii lee ŋɔ he ba dɔ gɛ saŋ haa chegɛ kiŋkiŋ dɛ bol gɛ haa yarada Yeesu Kristo bagle nɛnlaa la la.
Korowii waa tɛ komɛlbwa mkpa la, ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la waa wona dɛ che Pɔnteɔs Paelet sie dɛ bol kasinteŋ la sɔn taa n che dɛɛ jae
kɛ hé lawɛ waa nɔ bini kɛrɛdɛ dɛ gel a togre asɛ nɛra bɛ a wobɛlbwa dɔ bol dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa berɛ ba ja.
Dɛ o tɔpere baa telaa, Korowii ɛɛ geloo o berɛ ba. Korowiirii chɛ kpɛɛra. O gboo ɛ komɛlbwa nyu. Koranar bwa Kooro on, asɛ dɔɔranar bwa ge Dɔɔree on.

O gboo dɔ mkpa waa wola sewɛ bwa, dɛ so bela aa chaahna kohona nomɛlbwa aa wola won tel o jwɛh. Nomɛlbwa ta on nae ka, asɛ nomɛlbwa ge aa won nao bwa. Onee chɛ duure ne kpegri dɔe bwa saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la. Aamen.

Bol waa nɔ nɛra baa ɛ dɔɔhna harɛ nɔ ta la be ŋɔ ba bɛ gel ba nyu bini do ba som kohona, dɛ bɛ hwɛga kpɔ do a gɛ kondɔɔh aa won tona dɛ won hee la ta. Kɛ bá kpɔ ba hwɛga do Korowii waa ta tea dɛɛ tɛ yaa komɛlbwa ásɛ ya won kpɔ dɛɛ lɛ ya sie la nɛ.
Ŋɔ ba be báa ɛ wedɛɛga ásɛ wedɛɛga berɛ ba kondɔɔh, ba won ba tea tae dɛɛ kɛ nɛra bwa.
Dɛ ba dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, an dɛɛ ba kerekere kondɔɔh aa wola chɔg bwa nyina cheg ba nyundua. A taa baa ba wona dɔ mkpa tenten la.

Hei, Timoti! Lawɛ waa la bwa Korowii aa kpɔa do he nɔn ta la bini kɛrɛdɛ. Laa he te kpɔ wesale nɛra aa dɛ bol a ne Korowii Waa aa wola kaa, ne gɛnewaa bane aa wola jemɛ dɛɛ yera wejema dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ tɔŋle kasinteŋ waa la ta,
dɛkalkɛ gɛ waa nɔ taa bane teŋɛ dɛ nyogre Korowii kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la. Ń Naa Korowii cha he bwa.
Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. A too Korowii tea o lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ka bol mkpa waa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ yá che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɔ la wa.
N bidɛɛge Timoti, n dɛ nae. Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo chae, dɛ na he sum, dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna.
N dɛ jam Korowii maa dɛ tomɔ tepoŋ ne gɛ tenten n naawa faa dɛ tomɔ la he wa. N Korowii soŋa ta bwaa mɛɛ jaamo he waa chɔɔ ne jwaana.
N lii wii awola haa wia la aa, gɛɛ n sie che chiŋ mɛɛ nyin n ba nae ásɛ n sie lɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
N dɛ lii gɛ haa kpɔ kasinteŋ dɛɛ yarada Korowii gɛ he naa Lowis ne he nya Yunis faa dɛ yaradao la. N jemɔ kɛ gɛ ba faa yarada Korowii dɛ kpɔ ba te tɛo la, ba luge taa he den teŋɛ la.
A waa gela mɛɛ liiri kɛŋɔ hé ir nyu ne dɛ kpɔ Korowii kpegri awola maa kpɔ nɔn dawɛ he nɛɛ dɛ swee tɛɛ o kpɔ tɛɛ la ɛ toma,
dɛkalkɛ Korowii Doma waa kpɔa tɛ yaa la ta gelɛ ya ɛ ɔmeera. O gelɔ ya dɔ kpegri, dɛ dɔ dɔŋa nyina, dɛ won ya te lawa.

Bɛ gel a ɛɛ sihiih kɛ haa dɛ bol ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo waa dɛɛ bagle nɛra. Bɛ gel n ge waa dɔe sihiih kɛ baa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ do mɛ dea la. Kɛ hé ge che Korowii kpegri waa kpɔa tɛɛ la ta dɛɛ na waa Amanesoma la wa.

Onee lɛ yaa, dɛ le yaa ŋɔ yá ba ɛ o nɛra. Ya tondɛɛga ɛɛ waa laa o le yaa, kɛ o liire waa dɔa tɛ yaa, ne gɛ waa na ya sum dɛ cha yaa waa o le yaa. Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ o che dɛ na ya sum, dɛ cha yaa dɛ le yaa mɔɔ dɛ ta komɛlbwa.

Kɛ tarakenii ya ta che ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo bala waa ba harɛ bonɔ la ta dɛ jemɛ gɛ waa nɔ. O gelɔ seo ta kpegri dɔe kpa, dɛ berɛ che Amanesoma la ta bagle yaa gɛ yaa dɛ ba o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa dɔe.
Amanesoma nɔ waa Korowii lee mɛ ŋɔ ń ba bol, dɛ gel n ɛ o torome ge dɛɛ bagle nɛra o wa.

A waa mɛɛ na waa maa dɛ na nɔ la. Sihiih ge aa men kpo, dɛkalkɛ n jemɛ naate maa yaradao dɛ kpɔ n te tɛo, asɛ dɛ jemɛ kɛnaŋɔ wɛɛ wonoo kpoŋe n ne toma waa kpɔa do n nɔn ta la sɔnɔnɔɔ ken dɛ ka tel o bala tɔpere.
Lawɛ kasinteŋ waa maa chagle la bini kiŋkiŋ, dɛ teŋɛ a ta, dɛ so Korowii yarada ne nɛnnyin yaa dɔa le pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa ta la ta.
Kpɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa lɔ ya nɛɛ la kpegri lawɛ wedɛɛga Korowii aa kpɔa tɛɛ la bini kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ.
He jemɔ kɛ nɛra baa lɔ Eesia harɛ ta bwa chwa mɛ, hale Fejelas ne Hɛmojenes gba jao.
N Naa Korowiirii dɛ na Oniseforɔs ne o dem tena sum, dɛkalkɛ dɛ on dɛɛ cha mɛ. Dɛ sihiih aa on kpo kɛ baa do mɛ dea la.
Waa dena tel Room laanee o gaage n bɔr aaa dɛ ka tel kɛ waa na mɛ.
Ya Dɔɔ laanee dɛ na o sum o bala tɔpere la ta. Henee jemɛ koeh damanta waa koh n nɛɛ Ɛfesos.
N bie Timoti, che kiŋkiŋ kpegri ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo aa chae he dɔ le pɛɛ he ne waa pɛa la ta.
Waa la nɛra aa chema warɛ asɛ n bol he be la, bola bagle nɛra ba wa aa dɔ kasinteŋ dɛ jemɛ kɛ ba gee wonoo kpɔ bol bagle nɛra bane ge la.
Dɛ wekpega pui toma nɔ ta naa, gel he bwara nyɛg kɛ Yeesu Kristo sooja gbagba.
Sooja bɛlbwa dɛ nyin kɛ o toma su o nomoa siwi. Anomanta waa o te kpɔe dɛɛ koo nɛmpɛɛne waa ta.
Chwachwaa waa dɛ chwa dɛ́ lɛ komɛl la ge, dɛ o ta chwae mmara la ta teŋaa, waa won chwa dɔ komɛlbwa.
Paa waa dɛ swɛɛ siwi o koo toma ta laanee chɛ kɛ o di koo la kondikonlogla.
Gel waa maa bola nɔ do he liire bini. Korowii ɛɛ geloo he jemɛ a bwa mun kɛrɛdɛ.
Lii Yeesu Kristo waa kɛŋɔ o iro seo ta. Kooro Devid Naa on. Gɛ waa nɔɔ mɛɛ bol Amanesoma maa dɛ bagle nɛra la ta,
dɛ koh a waa dɛɛ na wa, hale nɛra koh a waa dɛ do mɛ kwaa dɛ do mɛ dea kɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ. Kɛ Korowii waa te, nɛn aa won doa kwa.
Anomanta n koh nɛra Korowii aa lee ba la waa dɛ lawɛ bambile wobɛlbwa ta, ásɛ Yeesu Kristo lɛ ba ge, dɛ berɛ tɛɛ ba jirima aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
Gɛ ba yon ŋɔ ɛ kasinteŋ. Ba ŋɔ, "Dɛ ya ne onee sewaa, ya ne wɛɛ berɔɔ ir dɛ dɔ mkpa.
Dɛ ya lawɛ bambile wobɛlbwa ta naa, ya ne wɛɛ di koraa. Dɛ ya ŋɔ ya ne o laa aa, o gee ŋɔɔ o ne ya laa.
Dɛ ya ta kasinteŋ tena ɛɛ yaa, o te ta ɛ kasinteŋ te, waa won begre o te."
Dɛɛ lii nɛra gɛ waa nɔ, dɛ kah ba sibegra ne Korowii sie ŋɔ ba bɛ waa dɛɛ tɔŋle. Wetɔŋla ta tɔnɔ bɛlbwa dɔe. Nɛra liiree aa chɔg.
Takapɔ kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii ásɛ he waa su o siwi kɛ nɛn waa dɛ ɛ o Korowii toma kɛrɛdɛ sihiih aa wola hen kpo, dɛ lawɛ kasinteŋ waa la bini kpoŋe kɛrɛdɛ.
Laa he te kpɔ nɛra baa dɛ bol wobosale a ne Korowii waa aa wola kaa la nɛ, dɛkalkɛ gɛ waa nɔ gelɔ nɛra ɛɛ le Korowii habɔɔ dɛ kaa ɛ anɔ la aa wola chɛɛ.
Ba webagla dɛ yɛɛ dɛɛ chɔg nɛra, gɛ ŋwɛrchɔge yon yɛ dɛ chɔg nɛn bwadabii la. Haemeneas ne Faeletɔs ja gɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ gɛ waa nɔ nɛ.
Banee nyogre kasinteŋ waa la ŋwɛnɛ, dɛ kaa bagle nɛra ŋɔ seo ta ira tɔpere la garɔ, dɛɛ chɔg nɛra baa yarada Amanesoma la bane liire waa baa yaradaa la ta.

Kɛ a ɛ wobɛlbwa Korowii Dea waa pa o mun la chegɔ kiŋkiŋ ken. Ba chwerɛ o ta ŋɔ, "Korowii jemɛ nɛra baa ɛ o kwa," dɛ berɛ chwerɛ ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔa o ja Yeesu Kristo nɛra nɛɛ la chɛ kɛŋɔ o laa o te kpɔ wechɔga ta."

Dem waa kana la, konsiwi beŋkpoŋ gbo laa lɔ o ta. Suugaswɛm ne suugapoŋ kwaa lɔ o ta. Ane lole, daa nee ba sɛah, dɛ kpɔ choh ma ane ge. Ane lole, wejena ta gboo baa le a ne, asɛ ane ge ba kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ wesale bɛlbwa.

Anomanta dɛ nomɛlbwa laa o te kpɔ wedoŋa ne wechɔga bwa ta naa, naate la do kɛŋɔ kwaa baa dɛ le a ne wejena gbo ta la. O do kaih dɛ do le tɛ o Dɔɔ, dɛ dɔ tɔnɔ tɛo, dɛ che le kɛ ó kpɔɔ ɛ tondɛɛga te bwa.

Laa he te kpɔ wedoŋa bonɔɔna aa dɛ pɛlɛ a ta la ta, ásɛ he ne nɛra baa dɛ soŋe Korowii tepoŋ ne la siwi swɛɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ aa dɛ su Korowii siwi, Korowii yaradae, nɛnnyin, ne waa aa dɛ ba deŋnesɔɔhna ne la ta.
Bɛ he te kpɔ dɛɛ jo gɛnewaa ne wesale tɔŋla ta. He gbabir jemɔ kɛ nagra nee aa ba.
Nɛn waa ɛ ya Dɔɔ bonɔɔ ta chɛ kɛŋɔ o ne nɛn nagre. A chɛ kɛ o pwɛr o te tɛ nomɛlbwa, dɛ won nɛra kwaa bagla kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ nɛn jo o nɛ aa, o won lawɛ bambile,
dɛɛ bagle nɛra o ne ba liire aa wola beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ la waa taa ne. Bɛl lole naa, Korowii ɛɛ na gɛ nɛra la sumii, dɛ gel ba charɛ ba liire, ásɛ ba won jemɛ kasinteŋ waa la,
asɛ ba sie ba harɛ ba chwa le Bɔnsam bel waa lag ba dɛ gel baa ɛ o waa waa dɛ nyin la ta, asɛ dɛ dɔ ba te.
Jemɛ kɛŋɔ tɔpera aa ba ka mun ba la, aa do kpegrii tɛ nɛra,

dɛkalkɛ nɛra ɛɛ dɛɛ nyin ba gbagbaa gwaa komɛlbwa, dɛɛ nyin suuga sibegra ne, dɛɛ ɛ mbarafo, dɛɛ ɛ jenu, dɛ bol waa dɛɛ yagɛ nɛra, dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg tena baa wola ba eehnanar waa no, dɛ ɛ boniayɛ tena, dɛ ɛ ba te nɛndoŋa.
Ba chal aa dɔŋa nɛɛ doe ba, baa wechɔgaa kpɔ dɛɛ kɛ dɔŋa. Baa dɛɛ haŋɛ dɔŋa nyooree, baa haŋraa dɔ ba pɛla kwaa ta, baa dɛɛ ɛ gaeeh, baa hah wedɛɛgaa.
Baa ɛ bwɛpagre nɛraa, ba sie ɛɛ do wɔrɔbee, dɛɛ maŋkura ba te. Baa kpɔ silɛɛ kwaa gwaa Korowii.
Baa dɛɛ ɛ ba we-ɛɛlaa kɛ nɛra baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii ken, kɛ dɛɛ vɛh kpegri waa lɔ Korowii toma ta la te. Laa he te kpɔ gɛ nɛra nɔ bini.
Gɛ nɛra nɔ bini banee yon kpɔ ŋwɛnɛre ane ta dɛ sɔh jo deremi ta, asɛ dɛɛ dɔ haahna ba wechɔga aa gwaa ba nɛɛ ba sie ɛɛ yal ba ba pɛlchɔga ta la, ba yon dɛɛ teŋɛ ba nɛ.
A gɛ haahna la dɛ hweli waa tɔperee te bɛlbwa, kɛ kasinteŋ waa aa lɔ waa la bini la te, baa won an jemɛ bwa.
Gɛ Janes ne Jambɛs aa vuugi Mosis la, gɛɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ gee vuugi kasinteŋ waa la. Ba liire aa were. Baa vɛh kasinteŋ waa la yaradae nomanta, Korowii vɛɛh ba.
Ba we-ɛɛla aa won tel sie bobɛlbwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ a saŋ la tena aa na Janes ne Jambɛs gɛna la, gɛɛ nɛra ɛɛ na ba ge gɛna gɛ.
He Timoti te, he jemɛ waa maa dɛ bagle la bwa, dɛ jemɛ n da, ne kon la waa maa dɛ koh, ne gɛ maa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo, ne gɛ maa won bambile lawa, ne gɛ maa dɛ nyin nɛn, ne gbemba maa dɔa.
Fiiga baa fig mɛ ne n wenaale maa naa Anteɔk, Ikooniam ne Lestra, n lawɛ bambile a bwa ta la, he jemɛ a bwa. Kɛ ya Dɔɔ la cha mɛ dɛ lɛɛ mɛ a gɛ waa la bwa ta.
Kasinteŋ, nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin kɛ o ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ o soga bini o waa su Korowii siwi la, baa ɛo hɔhɔrɔwaa.
Nɛnchɔga ne nɛra baa negre nɛra dɛɛ do wechɔga ta la gee kao sagɛ wechɔga ɛɛ ta dɛɛ la, dɛɛ negre nɛra, asɛ nɛra ɛɛ negre ba ge.
Kɛ he te, dɛɛ teŋɛ kasinteŋ webagla haa hwela dɛ jemɛ kɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ la ta. Bɛ gel bwa. He jemɛ nɛra baa bagle gɛ waa la, dɛɛ yarada ba ge.
He bechale saŋ bwaa he le jemɛ Korowii Tɔn bini waa aa dɛ ba wona gel he dɔ wejema, dɛ che yarada haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la ta Korowii lɛɛ.

Korowii Tɔn bini waa bwa, Korowiirii kpɔa do nɛra liire ta ba chwera, asɛ a wer kɛ ba kpɔa dɛɛ bagle nɛra wa, dɛ kpɔa dɛɛ ja nɛra ba wechɔga ta, dɛ kpɔa dɛɛ togre nɛra, dɛ kpɔa dɛɛ chagle nɛra waa aa dɛ su Korowii siwi.
Anee dɛ won cha Korowii nɛn o won ɛ wedɛɛga bwa ka tonɛ.
N chegɛ N Naa Korowii ne Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ ba ba bol weera ne lala waa dɛ pa bole la sie, dɛ koh kora waa dɛ ba ba di la waa dɛɛ ŋɔ he be sibegra ne ŋɔ,
hé bol Amanesoma la bagle nɛra. A som oo, aa somoo, kpɔ he te kɛ saŋ te bɛlbwa hɛɛ bolaa. Egle sie ta ba nɛ, dɛ gel ba jemɛ wechɔga baa dɛ ɛ, asɛ dɛɛ ja ba. Lawɛ bambile dɛɛ chag ba.
Tɔpere bɛl ɛɛ bao asɛ nɛra aa kasinteŋ waa la baglaa no, dɛkalkɛ baa an nyin. Baa dɛɛ nyin waa aa dɛ do ba somee dɛ́ no, dɛ ka nyin nɛra pirim bá baa chag ba waa ba pɛla aa lɔ a ta la,
dɛ laa ba deŋne kpɔ kasinteŋ waa la ta, dɛ kaa no nyosonwa.
Kɛ he te, dɛɛ lawɛ he te wobɛlbwa ta. Wekpega pui naa, lawɛ bambile. Dɛɛ lɔ Amanesoma la dawuro, asɛ dɛɛ ɛ he toma bwa kɛ Korowii bonɔɔ.
N te, n seo tɔpere telo, n do kɛ sen baa dɔa dɛɛ ta dɛ ɛ saraha tɛ Korowii.
N yo yodɛɛge la dɛ tonɛ, dɛ chwa chwae la ge tonɛ. Amanesoma maa dɛ yaradaa la ta ge, n ta habɔɔ leɛ.

Kon waa ka mɛ taraken laanee kompoŋ Korowii ɛɛ ba nɛndɛɛga baa yoa le ba waa su o siwi la vɔwa. N Dɔɔ waa kpɔ kasinteŋ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole laanee dɛɛ ba n tɛɛ awola waa ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la. N gbo laa dɛɛ ba gɛ kembɔr la dɔe. Nɛra baa dɛ pɛlɛ o nɛɛ dɛɛ nyiŋu ŋwɛnɛ la bwa ɛɛ dɔɔ.
Takapɔ ba n be warane,
dɛkalkɛ Demas koh harɛ nɔ ta silɛɛ waa dɛ chwa mɛ. O chwao kaa Tɛsalonika. Krɛsens kaa Galaasia harɛ ta, asɛ Taetos ge kaa Dalmatia harɛ ta.
Luk gboo lɔ n be bonɔ. He dɛ ba naa, kpɔ Maak ja he nɛɛ he ne o ba, dɛkalkɛ o ɛ nɛn bɛl waa won n chae n toma nɔ ta ga.
N tomɛ Tichikos Ɛfesos.
Dɛ he dɛ ba naa, kpɔ Kaapus be Troas dɛ lɛ n batakaare dɛɛ baa mɛ. Lɛ n tɔne la ge ja dɛɛ baa mɛ. Anɔ la baa kpɔ ol tɔn ɛa la waa dena hiah mɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
Logre bɛl baa dɛ yerɔ Alɛksanda la ɛɛ mɛ wechɔga taeh. Korowii ɛɛ bɔɔ o waa waa ɛa la kemee.
Hé ge nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ, dɛɛ ke he te o nɛ, dɛkalkɛ o ta yaa sie tɛɛ ya webagla ta kwaraa.
Baa yer mɛ cheme ŋɔ ń ba tɔh n nyoa logla la, n ta nomɛlbwa dɔe ó ba che n habɔɔ. Nɛra bwa chwa mɛ. Korowii bɛ gel a ɛ wechɔga gure ba nɛ.
Kɛ ya Dɔɔ la chegɛ n habɔɔ dɛ tɛ mɛ kpegri n won bol Amanesoma la bwa, asɛ nɛra baa wola Juda tena ɛɛ la bwa no. Korowii lɛɛ mɛ le siswɛm ta kɛŋɔ nɛn baa lɛo le nyujente nyoa ta ken.
Ya Dɔɔ la ɛɛ lee mɛ wobɛlbwa taa, dɛ kpɔ mɛ sɔnɔnɔɔ ken kaa o nyundua koobwɛɛ la ta. Onee chɛ kɛ ya tɛo jirima tɔpere bɛlbwa aa wola jaga dɔe. Aamen.
N dɛ na Presela ne Akwela ne nɛra baa lɔ Oniseforɔs dem bwa.
Erastos ta lɔ Kɔrent. Trɔfemos bwara dɛ weo nomanta, n gelo Maeletus.
Takapɔ dɛ ba mɔɔ alalawo saŋ tel. Yubilɔs ne Pudens ne Laenos ne Klɔdea ne he bala asɔre tena baa kaa la bwa dɛ nae.
Yá Dɔɔ ja he nɛ. Ń Naa Korowii cha he bwa sekwaraa.

Men Pɔɔl maa ɛ Korowii bonɔɔ dɛ berɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ. Korowiirii lee mɛ dɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ cha nɛra waa lee ba tɛ o te la, ásɛ ba yarada kaa sie ba won jemɛ o kasinteŋ la, dɛ che a ta tomɛ Korowii.
Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la hwɛgaa n dɔ. Korowii waa wola nyosone teŋe laanee bagɛ gɛ mkpa nɔ nyoa bil mɔɔ dɛ ta komɛlbwa.
Tɔpere o tea aa toora la, o gelɔ mɛɛ bol a waa nɛra jemɛ. Ya Lɛɛ Korowiirii kpɔa do n nɔn ta dɛ ŋɔ mɛ́ɛ bagle nɛra.
N bie Taetos, henee n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ. Waa ya bwa aa dɛ yarada la taa a che he ɛ n bie tenten. Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo chae dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna.
N gele Kret ásɛ he tonɛ waa aa hiah kɛ he ɛ la bwa, dɛ cheg nomonome asɔrere aa lɔ bwɛɛre la bɛlbwa ta gɛ maa bagle la.
He dɛ nyin he le asɔre nomoa aa, kpɔ onɔ la nomɛlbwa aa wola o wechɔge bɛlbwa dɔe dɛɛ bol, o dɔ hahbeŋkpoŋa, o bii gee yarada Yeesu, nɛra aa wola ba waa bol ŋɔ ba chɔgɔ dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg tena,

dɛkalkɛŋɔ, a chɛ kɛ nɛn waa dɛ tɔ asɔre tena sie la ɛ nɛndɛɛge nomɛlbwa aa wola o wechɔgee dɔ bol bwa, waa ɛ Korowii bonɔɔ nomanta. A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn waa wola o te bagle, dɛ lɛ nɛn kon dɛɛ ja o kon ta, o baah naa wola di warawara, waa wola sennyɔdɛɛ ɛɛ, waa wola nagra nyin, o siwi aa wola suuga ta begre kohona.
A chɛ kɛ o ɛ nɛn waa dɛ nyin hɔɔhra lɛɛ, dɛɛ nyin wedɛɛga, dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ kɛrɛdɛ, o waa do kaih, wedoŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole o nɛ, wɛɛ lawɛ o te kɛrɛdɛ.

A chɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa la ta gɛ ba faa baglo la, dɛ won dɛɛ bagle Korowii waa a ŋwɛnɛ ta nɛra be, asɛ dɛ won dɛɛ ja ba, dɛ bol waa dɛɛ bagle banɔ la baa dɛ tɔŋle kasinteŋ waa la ásɛ ba ge jemɛ.
Deŋnekpeg tena lole taraken taeh, dɛ kpɔ wepuu dɛɛ negre nɛra. Juda tena baa lɔ he bini dɛɛ maŋkura penteŋ laanee dena dɛɛ ɛ gɛ kohona.
A chɛ kɛ he kah ba ba tɔ nyoa. Ba dɛ chɔg dembir nɛra liire ba yon vɛh kasinteŋ waa la ta teŋa. Ba koh suuga waa dɛɛ chagle waa aa wola chɛɛ.
Kret tena la bɛl baa dɛ liiru kɛŋɔ o jemɛ wobol kɛrɛdɛ fa bolɔ ŋɔ, "Ya Kret tena bwa ɛ nyosonteŋna, ya we-ɛɛla do kɛŋɔ kpɔg bini ola ken. Ya ɛ bɔhwaahra dɛɛ di kwaa kohona."
Kpelaa o bol, anomanta di ba kasinteŋkpeg ba jemɛ, asɛ dɛ gel gɛ da la, dɛ baa teŋɛ Korowii waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ la ta.
Ŋɔ ba bɛ deŋne cheg dɛɛ no Juda tena waa aa ɛ nyosone la, ne waa nɛra baa vɛh kasinteŋ waa la aa ŋɔa báa ɛ la.
He tea too waa, komɛlbwa wer tɛɛ, haa an kondoŋa lii. Kɛ nɛra wechɔga aa lɔ ba nɛɛ baa wola yarada la, komɛlbwa ɛ kondoŋ tɛɛ ba. Ba liire ne ba bambile bwa doŋo.
Ba ŋɔ ba jemɛ Korowii, kɛ ba we-ɛɛla dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ baa Korowii jemɛ. Ba we-ɛɛla doŋo Korowii be kohona, ba deŋne ge kpegri. Baa won ɛ wedɛɛge bɛlbwa bwa.
He te, a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ bagle Korowii waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ a ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛrɛdɛ.
Ŋɔ banjeni be báa lawɛ ba te, dɛɛ ɛ waa aa dɔ duure, dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ, dɛɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ kɛrɛdɛ, dɛɛ nyin nɛn, dɛ dɔ bambile ge.
Ŋɔ hanjeni ge be báa ɔmɛ Korowii dɛ gel ba we-ɛɛla do kaih, dɛ bɛ nɛra dɛɛ ŋwalɛ, dɛ bɛ gel sen lɛ ba liire. Báa bagle waa aa wera.
Dɛ ba dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, anee dɛ bagle han-yala báa nyin ba jaranar ne ba bii,
dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ kɛrɛdɛ, wedoŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole ba nɛ, dɛ won ba dem tomare ɛɛ, dɛɛ ɛ nɛra wedɛɛga, dɛɛ no ba jaranar wa, asɛ nomɛlbwa bɛ Korowii waa la wechɔge dɔ bol.
Ŋɔ bonɔɔna ge be ŋɔ bá dɔ nfɛrɛ wobɛlbwa ta.
Henee chɛ kɛ he gel he we-ɛɛla do wer wobɛlbwa ta ásɛ ba nyiŋi dɛɛ hweli. Dɛɛ bagle waa kasinteŋ ne, dɛɛ swɛɛ siwi a ta.
Gel a togre kɛrɛdɛ, nɛra bɛ a wobɛlbwa dɔ dɛ bol, asɛ he dɔma bɛ ya wechɔge bɛlbwa dɔ dɛ bol, asɛ sihiih kpo ba.
Gel nɛra baa lɔ bane nɔn ta kɛŋɔ bonɔɔna kɛɛ toli la no kɛŋɔ báa no ba dɔɔranar wa. Bá gel ba wa ɛɛ lɛ ba sie wobɛlbwa ta, dɛ bɛ waa begre dɛɛ do ba nyoa,
dɛ bɛ ba kwaa dɛɛ ŋwɛ. Kɛ bá gel ba we-ɛɛla dɔ yarada ba dɔɔranar be. Gɛɛ dɛɛ ba gela ya Lɛɛ Korowii waa nɔ yaa dɛ bagle nɔ che ba nɛɛ dɛ dɔ sɔn wobɛlbwa ta.
Suna Korowii aa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ leɔ taraken ásɛ nɛra bwa jemɛ, ó lɛɛ ba.
Anomanta gɛ dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ a wer kɛ ya laa sie kpɔ wechɔga bɛlbwa ne harɛ nɔ ta pɛlchɔga la bwa ta, dɛ dɔ nfɛrɛ, dɛɛ ɛ waa aa togra, dɛɛ ɔmɛ Korowii ya bere nɔ ta,
dɛɛ kpa gɛ saŋ Yeesu Kristo aa ba o jirima ne ya nao la. Onee Korowiijen ne ya Lɛɛ la. O bala taa ya dɔ hwɛga ne silɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
O koh ya waa dɛ sewɛ dɛ́ won lɛ yaa le wechɔga bɛlbwa ta, dɛ laa ya doŋa bwa kpɔ ya nɛ, dɛ kpɔ yaa ɛ o gbo nɛra yaa swɛɛ siwi wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta.
Bag ba gɛ waa nɔ bwa, dɛ kpɔ he kpegri do ba gbemba, dɛ ja ba, dɛ bɛ gel ba bɛlbwa nyiŋi he nyubaah.
Lii ba ŋɔ báa pwɛr ba te dɛɛ tɛ nomonome baa dɛ di kpegri te bɛlbwa, dɛɛ no ba deŋna wa, dɛ kpɔ ba te kɛ baa dɛɛ ɛ waa aa wera bwaa.
Ŋɔ ba be ba bɛ nɛra bwara wechɔge dɛɛ bol, ba bɛ dɛɛ nagre, báa pwɛr ba te, dɛɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa duure.
Maa dɛ ŋɔ naa, ya gbabir fa gɛnɔ. Ya fa ɛ deŋnekpeg tena. Ba fa negre yaa, pɛlchɔga ne bodia kpɔ yaa berɛ yoma. Meesɔɔh ne bɔweela bwa nee ya faa so. Nɛra fa hah yaa, ya ge hah dɔŋa.
Kɛ ya Lɛɛ Korowii aa le chae waa cha yaa la ne o nyina waa dɛ nyin nɛn ne asɛ ya jemɛ a waa la,
o lɛ yaa ta. Ya wedɛɛga waa laa o lɛ yaa ta. Sunaa o sune ya nɛɛ dɛ lɛ yaa ta, dɛ sɔ yaa nee ya won do kɛ baa bera kwaa lolɛ yaa. O Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa tɛ yaa o kwaa yaa la nɛɛ ya che dɛ dɔ mkpafale.
O Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa tɛ yaa la, ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo waa o koh tɛ yaa kohona.
Korowii aa sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa dɛ gel ya ɛ nɛndɛɛga ya waa su o siwi la, ya dɔ hwɛga kɛ o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la ɛɛ ɛ ya konee.
Waa nɔ bwa ɛ kpela. Anomanta dɛɛ berɛ a bagla ɔma ásɛ nɛra baa no Korowii waa dɛ yarada la swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga. Gɛɛ wera dɛ dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ nomɛlbwa.
Kɛ laa he te kpɔ gɛne wetɔŋla ne gɛ he naanar aa teŋɛ dɔŋa nɛɛ waa bini bagla ta, ne nagrenyin, ne Mmara ŋwɛnɛre waa tɔŋla ta. A ta tɔnɔ bɛlbwa dɔe. A ɛ wepuu.
Nɛn waa dɛ ba nɛra baah pegra ne la, bol waa baglo ó gel. Dɛ o ta teŋɔ dɛɛ ɛ aa, bol waa baglo ja. Dɛ o ta he nɛɛtena waa la noɛ yaa, he ne o bɛ wobɛlbwa ta pɛ.
Jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa do gɛ la vɛh kasinteŋ waa la. O gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ o dɛ ɛ wechɔga gba, kɛ dɛ ge taa ɛ.
Dɛ n tomɛ Aatemes kɛɛ Tichikos he be naa, takapɔ dɛ ba n be Nikopolis warane. N ɛ n liire kɛ ń ka so bela alalawo saŋ.
Takapɔ dɛ cha Sɛnos waa ɛ mmara jereme la ne Apolos bá won la ba ŋwɛnɛ la. Bɛ gel komɛlbwa baa kpɔ la ŋwɛnɛ la waa hiah ba.
Gel yabala bwa hweli wedɛɛga ɛɛ, dɛɛ cha nɛra aa hiah ba, dɛ bɛ nɛra baa wola tɔnɔ dɔe ɛ.
Nɛra n ne baa lɔ bonɔ la bwa dɛ nae. N dɛ na nɛra baa dɛ nyin yaa ya ne baa yarada Yeesu la. Kórowii cha he bwa.
Men Pɔɔl baa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ do mɛ dea la, ne ya dɔŋ Timotii chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ ya dandɛɛge Faelemɔn waa bera ɛ ya dɔŋ tom-ɛɛ ge la,
ne ya nimambie Apia, ne ya dɔŋ Akipus ya ne waa chega dɛ yo dɛɛ tɛ Korowii o toma nɔ ta la, ne asɔre tena baa dɛ cheme he dem la bwa.
Ń Naa Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
N Korowii soŋa bini te bɛlbwa, n dɛ yerɛ he Faelemɔn sɔn dɛ kpɔ jam dɛɛ tɛ Korowii,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ n no he nyina haa dɛ nyin Korowii nɛra bwa ne gɛ haa dɛ yarada ya Dɔɔ Yeesu la wa.

Waa maa dɛ soŋe Korowii laanee kɛŋɔ nyopɛo la he ne o nɛra aa dɔa hɛɛ yaradao la chae kɛrɛdɛ, ásɛ he won jemɛ wedɛɛga te bɛlbwa Korowii aa dɛ nyin o cha yaa ya won dɔ, pɛɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la nomanta.
N dam, he nyina haa dɛ nyin Korowii nɛra la dɛ do mɛ gbemba dɛ gel n sie ɛɛ lɛ taeh, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he dɛ nyiŋ ba dɛɛ do ba gbemba.
He nɛnnyin nomanta, n dɛ nyin kɛ n soŋe waane. N fe dɔ ŋwɛnɛ Yeesu Kristo be pera kɛŋɔ ń di kpegri he nɛɛ dɛ ŋɔ hé ɛ gɛ aa wera kɛŋɔ he ɛ, kɛ maa gɛɛ ɛ.
Nyina haa dɛ nyin nɛra la taa n che dɛɛ soŋe, nyiŋi gɛ men Pɔɔl aa ɛ banjena, ne dea baa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ do mɛ nɔ ta dɛ no n waa nɔ.
He nɛndɔɔle Onisemɔs waa ɛ n bie Yeesu Kristo be pera la naa taa n che dɛɛ soŋe waa nɔ. Gɛ saŋ baa do mɛ dea la taa n bol Yeesu waa baglo o kpɔ o te tɛo.
Wubwa la dɛ o ta tɔnɔ dɔe tɛɛ, kɛ taraken te o dɔ tɔnɔ tɛ ya bwa.
N gelɔ wɛɛ ba he be kɛŋɔ n gbagba bie maa dɛ nyinu n bambile bwa ne la.
N fe dɛ nyin kɛ o do n be bonɔ dɛ́ che he naa ta dɛɛ cha mɛ n dea doe nɔ baa koh Amanesoma la waa dɛ do mɛ nɔ ta.
Kɛ maa nyin n ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛ le he habɔɔ dɛ n ta he be ŋɔe, asɛ a ba ɛ kɛŋɔ n dɛ di kpegri he nɛ. N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ wedɛɛge haa ɛ la le he gbabir bambile bini.
Bɛl lole naa, Korowiirii ŋɔa o ken le he nɔn ta tama mɔɔ dɛ berɛ ba hé ne o so ka tonɛ.

O ta he nɛndɔɔle gbo ɛɛ kpa. O ɛ he nimedɛɛge ya Dɔɔ Yeesu be pera. Gɛ n kwara aa dɛ nyin o waa nɔ, n jemɔ kɛ he te ɛɛ nyin o waa gwaa gɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ɛ he nɛndɔɔle ne he nime tenten ya Dɔɔ Yeesu be pera.
Dɛ he jemɔ kɛŋɔ n ne he bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ aa, lɛo kɛŋɔ haa dɛ ba n lɛɛ ken.
Dɛ o fa ɛɛ wechɔga ane, kɛɛ dɛ he kem bɛlee o dio, kpɔ pɛɛ mɛ.
N Pɔɔl gbagbaa chwerɛ gɛ waa nɔ bonɔ kɛŋɔ mɛɛ bɔe kemee la. Kɛ jemɛ kɛ he gba di n kem Korowii mkpa la haa chegɛ n nɛɛ dɛ dɔ la ta.
Anomanta n dam, gel n ge dɔ tɔnɔ dɛ le nyopɛo n ne haa chegɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ dɔ la ta ásɛ n baah sɔɔh mɛ.
N jemɔ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ no n waa nɔɔ dɛ ɛ gwaa gɛ kwara. A waa n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ la.
Anɔ la ge aa jaa laanee kɛŋɔ nyin dea dɛɛ cheg mɛ. N dɔ hwɛga kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ no he wesoŋa haa dɛ soŋo dɛɛ tɛ mɛ laanee asɛ dɛ berɛ kpɔ mɛ ba tɛ heyaa ja.
Epafras baa koh Yeesu Kristo waa dɛ do n ne on dea la dɛ nae.
Gɛɛ Maak ne Aristakus ne Demas ne Luk baa ɛ n bala tom-ɛɛra la gee nae.
Yá Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo cha heya. Aamen.
A saŋ la dɛ Korowii chegɛ o keamere nɛɛ dɛɛ bol waa ya naanar be. Kera aŋwɛnɛ bwaa o bol waa ba be. Dɛ ŋwɛnɛre waa chegɛ a ta dɛɛ bol waa ba be fuuh.
Fini tɔpera nɔ aa ka mun nɔ te, o Bie nɛɛ o che dɛɛ bol waa ya be. Korowii Bie nɔɔ o kpɔ cheg kɛŋɔ o toole naa, onee lole dɛ dɔ komɛlbwa. O nɛɛ Korowii che dɛ ta komɛlbwa.

He na o jirima waa dɔa, dɛ he na jirima Korowii aa dɔa. Gɛ Korowii aa doa o ge den do kati. O wobol dɔ kpegri. A kpegrii lawɛ komɛlbwa kpoŋe. Korowii Bie la aa laa ya wechɔga kpɔ ya nɛɛ tonɛ la, o kaa so nomombɔr nyundua Korowiijen dig ta,
dɛ gwaa nyundua toroma bwa, gɛ sɔn Korowii aa tɛo la aa gwaa ba sɔn la.
Korowii ta o nyundua toroma la bɛlbwa be ŋɔe ŋɔ, "N Biee hen. Fini n berɛ he Mɛɛ" bwa. O ta ba bɛlbwa waa bolɛ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ ɛ o Mɛɛ, asɛ o ɛ n Bie" bwa.
Korowii aa dɛ ba o Bie waa lɔ o be logla la harɛ ta toma la, o bolɔ ŋɔ, "A chɛ kɛ nyundua toroma bwa ɛɛ tomɔ,"
dɛ bol nyundua toroma la ge waa ŋɔ, "O gelɔ o nyundua toroma do kɛŋɔ peu ne ninlao."
O bol o Bie la waa ja, dɛ ŋɔ, "Korowii, he kora ɛɛ cheo dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa. Kasinteŋii hɛɛ ba kpoŋa dɛɛ di kora he nɛra nɛ.
He dɛ nyin waa aa togra dɛ ki waa aa wola togrɛ. A waa Korowii haa dɛ tomɔ la lee ŋɔ hé ɛ kooro, dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna ne sɔnjen dɛ gwaa he bala bwa la."
Korowii berɔ ŋɔ, "Nomoa, wobɛlbwa mumpar la, hen ta harɛ. Kwaa aa lɔ nyundua ge nɔ, he nɔn tomaa a bwa.
A bwa ɛɛ chɔgoo, aa wola lee do kpa, kɛ he te ɛɛ do lee dɛɛ la. A bwa ɛɛ ba ɛ kombenaa kɛŋɔ yal yon hɛh la.
Hɛɛ kpɔa bil kɛŋɔ yal hɛoh waa, ba yon kpɛrɛwo bil la. Aa begroo, aa wola won do wer kɛ konfala saŋ bɛlbwa wee kpa. Kɛ he te ɛɛ do gɛ haa doa saŋ bɛlbwa, asɛ he bene ge aa jagaa dɔ bwa."
Korowii nyundua torome besoo bee o ŋɔ, "So nomombɔr n dig ta asɛ n ba he dɔma ne harɛ he tigri ba nɛɛ," bwa nɔ?
Korowii bonɔɔna laa o nyundua toroma la te naa? Nɛra Korowii aa ba lɛ la waa o yon dɛ tomɛ o nyundua toroma la ásɛ baa cha o nɛra la.
Gɛɛ a do te naa, a chɛ kɛ ya do sie dɛ nyiŋi waa yaa noa la kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ dɛ bɛ ba koni dɛ nyogre ŋwɛnɛ.
Waa Korowii faa kpɔa tɛ o nyundua toroma ba bol la ɛo kɛ mmarakpeg bɛl. Nomɛlbwa waa wola a ta teŋɛ la, ba tɛr o deŋne gɛ aa chɛa.

A do gɛ naa, ya lɛɛ waa nɔ aa gwaa nyundua toroma waa la kohona nɔ, dɛ ya vɛah aa, ɛrɛɛ yaa ba ɛɛ dɛ leɔ? Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu gbagba fa tɔ sie bol ya lɛɛ waa nɔ, asɛ nɛra baa noa ge di danseɛ ya be kɛ a ɛ kasinteŋ.
Korowii gbagba chegɛ nyokpowaa ne wekpega ɛɛ ta, ne o Domadɛɛge waa kpɔa bɔne nɛra gɛ waa dɛ nyin la ta dɛ di a danseɛ.
Nɛra baa dɛ ba le doe yaa dɛ bol ba waa nɔ, o ta ban kpɔe do nyundua toroma lɔga.
Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini bobɛl ŋɔ, "Korowii, nɛn gee bɔkwa asɛ hɛɛ lii o waɔ? Nɛwɛnyini gee bɔkwa hɛɛ dawɛ o waɔ?
Tamaa kenii he gel nyundua toroma gwaalo. He gelɔ o dɔ jirima, asɛ komɛlbwa ɛɛ tɛo duure,
dɛ kpɔ komɛlbwa do o lɔga." Waa kpɔ komɛlbwa do nɛwɛnyini lɔga nɔ, a baglɔ kɛŋɔ komɛlbwa toole waa wola o kpegri dɔe. Kɛ ya ta nae kɛŋɔ kwaa bwa aa lɔ nɛwɛnyini lɔga mɔɔ.

Kɛ ya dɛ na Yeesu te kɛŋɔ Korowii aa ba o ne harɛ asɛ nyundua toroma gwaalo tama, asɛ waa na wahala dɛ sewɛ la, o tɛo jirima dɛ gel komɛlbwa ɛɛ tɛo duure. Korowii alaworomɛɛ o sewɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyini bwa la.

Korowiirii ta komɛlbwa, asɛ a che o kpegri ta komɛlbwa ge do le. Waa gela Yeesu na wahala la, magraa a magre kɛrɛdɛ. Waa dɛ nyin o lɛ nɛndamanta dɛ gel ba ɛ o bii, dɛ do o be dɛ dɔ jirima la waa o gel Yeesu waa ɛ ba Sitɔɔ la gbagba kpɔ a gɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta dɛ na wahala dɛ́ won ɛ ba Sitɔdɛɛge kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ dɛ lɛɛ ba la.
Yeesuu laa nɛwɛnyini doŋa dɛɛ kpɔ ba nɛɛ dɛ gel ba ɛ Korowii nɛra. O ne nɛra waa laa doŋa dɛɛ kpɔ ba nɛɛ la bwa Mɛɛ beŋkpoŋ. A waa aa wola on sihiih ɛ kɛŋɔ o yer ba o nimanar la.
O ŋɔ Korowii be ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ bol he waa haa ɛa n nimanar bee. Mɛɛ kpɛɛree ba chema binii."
O toolo berɛ ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ kpɔ n tenee tɛ Korowii dɛ yaradao," dɛ berɛ ŋɔ, "N ne bechale Korowii aa tɛ mɛ laanee la."

Nɛra Yeesu aa dɛ yer ba bechale la, baa ɛ nɛwɛnyina dɛ dɔ bwadabii ne chal nomanta la, o gbabir baa berɛ nɛwɛnyini dɛ do kɛ ban, dɛ dɔ bwadabii ne chal. O ɛ gɛ, ásɛ dɛ won che o seo waa dɛ ba sewa ta dɛ chɔg naate seo aa tɛo kpegri nɛra nɛɛ la. Onee Bɔnsam.
Yeesu ɛ ken ásɛ dɛ won lɛ nɛra baa koh seo ɔma waa dɛ ɛ yoma ba soga bini bwa la.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ kasinteŋ, nyundua toroma laa o cha nɔ, Abraham naanaree o cha.

Dɛ a chɛ kɛ o do gɛ Abraham naanar la aa doa ŋwɛnɛ bɛlbwa ta. Gɛɛ o ɛ dɛ́ won tomɛ Korowii kɛŋɔ ba Sɔfore Nomoa kasinteŋ ne dɛɛ na ba sum, dɛ won dɛɛ soŋe ba wechɔga, dɛ won dɛɛ kwaa ba ne Korowii baah.
Bɔnsam daahno na dɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa ó fe ɛ wechɔga, kɛ o ta on wone. Anomanta wɛɛ wonoo cha nɛra Bɔnsam aa dɛ daah ba dɛ na la.
Anomanta n bala Korowii nɛra waa le ya ne he bwa tɛ o te, hé ta sie nyiŋi Yeesu na. Korowiirii tomɔ ŋɔ ó ba ɛ ya waa yaa dɛ yarada nɔ Sɔfore Nomoa.
O waa dɔ kasinteŋ Korowii waa kpɔɔ ŋɔ ó ɛ o toma la be kɛŋɔ Mosis faa dɛ nyiŋi Korowii nɛra nɛɛ o waa dɔ kasinteŋ wobɛlbwa ta la.
Nɛn do dem aa, nɛra dɛ kpɛɛro dɛ gwaa dem la. Gɛɛ Yeesu ge do. A chɛ kɛ ba kpɛɛro gwaa Mosis,
dɛkalkɛ dem bɛlbwa waa ɛ dem la, dɛ nɛnee doo. Korowii gee ta komɛlbwa.
Mosis aa ɛ Korowii bonɔɔ dɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii nɛra waa bwa ta la, dɛ o waa dɔ kasinteŋ taeh, kɛŋɔ bonɔɔ kasinteŋ te wa aa dɔ kasinteŋ o dɔɔ be la. Dɛ o dɛ bol waa Korowii aa ba bol kerekere la nɛra be.

Kɛ Yeesu Kristo te kasinteŋ waa dɔa la, Korowii Bie on, asɛ o ɛ Korowii nɛra bwa nomoa. Ya yarada yaa dɔa Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ, ne hwɛga yaa dɔa ya sie lɛ a ta la, ya lawɛ a bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ naa, Yeesu Kristo nɛraa yan.
Anomanta Korowii Domadɛɛge bolɔ ŋɔ, "Dɛ he no Korowii waa fini naa,
he bɛ deŋnekpeg ɛ kɛŋɔ he naanar faa ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛ vɛh o waa noe dɛ jo o nɛɛ la.
He naanar bene fifraanaarɛ baa dia kpɔg baah la, ba daah mɛ na dɛ na waa maa ɛa bwa.
Anomanta n baah di gɛ nɛra la nɛ, asɛ n ŋɔ ba bambile ta n waa lawɛ bwa. Ba vɛh n waa ta teŋa.
N baah naa dia la, n ŋwɛɛrɔ ŋɔ, 'Baa ona maa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ba onɛ gɛ maa dɛ onɛ la dɔe ba bwa.' "
Anomanta yabala, hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ he bini bɛlbwa bɛ liichɔga ba dɔ kɛŋɔ waa Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ gbo ɛ Korowii laanee yarada, dɛ ba vɛh o waa ta teŋa.
Anomanta hɛ́ɛ ja dɔŋa tɔperee bwa mɔɔ tɔpere la o Domadɛɛge aa bol o waa dɛ ŋɔ "fini" la garɛ, asɛ wechɔga bɛ heyaa ba negre, he deŋne ba do kpegri.
Gɛ ya yarada aa doa le mumpar la, dɛ ya wono che gɛ kiŋkiŋ ka tel wobɛlbwa jaga aa, dɛ ya ne Yeesu Kristo pɛo wobɛlbwa ta.
Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ: "Dɛ he no Korowii waa fini naa, he bɛ deŋnekpeg ɛ kɛŋɔ he naanar faa ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛ vɛh o waa noe dɛ jo o nɛɛ la."
Dɛ lepetenaa no Korowii waa dɛ ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛ vɛh o waa noe dɛ jo o nɛɛ nɔɔ? Nɛra Mosis aa tɔ ba sie dɛ le Ijipt harɛ la bwaa ɛ deŋnekpeg la.
Lepetena nɛɛ Korowii baah di bene fifraanaarɛ nɔɔ? Nɛra baa ɛ wechɔga dɛ serewe kpɔg baah la, ba nɛɛ o baah di.
Korowii aa ŋwɛɛra ŋɔ baa ona waa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ba onɛ la dɔe ba la, dɛ lepetena bee o ŋɔ gɛ nɔɔ? Nɛra baa ɛ deŋnekpeg la bee o ŋɔ gɛ.
He ta nae kɛŋɔ ba yarada bɛ dɔe waa Korowii aa wola ban ŋwɛnɛ tɛɛ ba dɔ ona waa dɔa tɛɛ ba la aa?
Korowii nyoa waa bagɛ nɛra ona waa ŋɔa bá ba onɛ la ta lole. Anomanta hé gel ya nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ he bɛlbwa bɛ a gɛ nyobaga la ba paŋɛ.
Gɛ yaa dɛ no Korowii Amanesoma nɔ nɔ, gɛɛ ba ge noa. Kɛ ba te aa noa la, a ta tɔnɔ leɛ tɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba ta an yaradae.

Ya te nɔ, ya dɛ yarada Korowii waa la, anomanta Korowii ɛɛ geloo ya onɛ ona waa dɛ onɛ la bɛl. Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ: "N baah naa dia la, n ŋwɛɛrɔ ŋɔ baa ona maa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ba onɛ gɛ maa dɛ onɛ la dɔe ba bwa." A ta baglɛ kɛŋɔ ona toole kpa. Gɛ saŋ Korowii aa ta harɛ la, dɛ o ɛ o wobɛlbwa tonɛ dɛ te onɛ.
Korowii Tɔn bobɛl bol tɔpenuanɛ wee la waa ŋɔ, "Korowii aa tonɛ o toma bwa la, o onɔ tɔpenuanɛ wee la ta,"
asɛ bela yaa dɛ bol o waa nɔ baglɔ kɛŋɔ: "Baa ona maa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá ba onɛ gɛ maa dɛ onɛ la dɔe ba bwa."
A baglɔ kɛŋɔ nɛra bane ta lole dɛɛ ba a gɛ ona la dɔe. Aa chegɛ a saŋ la tena baa no Korowii Amanesoma nɔ deŋnekpeg ta asɛ ba paŋɛ Korowii ona la,
Korowii berɔ kwaa do tɔpefale, dɛ pa o sɔn "fini." A habɔɔ aa bigra la, Korowii chegɛ Devid nɛɛ dɛ bol gɛ tɔpere nɔ wa. Anee n faa bol la: "Dɛ he no Korowii waa fini naa, he bɛ deŋnekpeg ɛ."
Josua aa ba a saŋ la tena ne ba harɛ ta la, dɛ ba fe dɔ ona Korowii aa bol o waa la aa, Korowii fe ta berɛ bol tɔpefale waa kpa.
He nyiŋo na naa, ona Korowii aa kwaara cheg o nɛra la ta lole bá ba onɛ, kɛŋɔ Korowii aa ona tɔpenuanɛ wee la ta la.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ onɛ ona Korowii aa dɛ onɛ la, dɛ o onɛ o toma bwa ta kɛŋɔ Korowii aa onɛ o toma ta tɔpenuanɛ wee la ta la.
Anomanta hé gel ya swɛɛ siwi dɛ dɔ gɛ ona la. A ta chɛ kɛ bɛlbwa ɛ a saŋ la tena deŋnekpeg la dɔŋ dɛ ba paŋɛ gɛ ona nɔ.

Korowii waa waa bola do kɛ kon o siwi aa lole, dɛɛ ɛ toma. A nyɛgre ge gwaa naŋgɔse bɛlbwa, hale dɛ fe won pere hweera le lileo ta, dɛ won jo sema bini, hale dɛ fe won pere hoga ne fɔɔla baah. A wono dɛɛ jemɛ nɛwɛnyini liire ne o wesɔɔhla bwa.
Korowii kontaale bɛlbwa toole dɛ won kpɔ o te sɔɔh. Wobɛlbwa chɔ baŋ o be wɛɛ nao. Onee yaa ba ya waa yaa ɛa harɛ bonɔ bwa taara dɛ bagle.
Ya dɔ Sɔfore Nomonjen waa wona la Korowii sie tenten. Onee Korowii Bie Yeesu la. Anomanta hé gel ya lawɛ o waa la yaa dɛ yarada la bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ.
Ya Sɔfore Nomonjen yaa dɔa la ta nɛn waa wola ya nɛɛ sune ya gwɛgra nɔ ta ɛɛ. Daahna bɛlbwa soosiwi toole Bɔnsam aa wola on daahnɛ kɛŋɔ waa dɛ daah yaa nɔ. Kɛ o chegɔ kiŋkiŋ, o ta wechɔga ɛɛ.
Anomanta, hé gel ya lɔ bambile dɛ tel Korowii waa dɛ sune nɛra nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba la sie. Wɛɛ na ya sumii dɛɛ cha yaa gɛ saŋ aa hiah yaa.

Sɔfore Nomoa bɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ toma Korowii Dea la, o dɔŋa nɛwɛnyini binii ba yon leo, dɛ kpɔɔ ŋɔ ó ɛ Korowii toma dɛɛ tɛɛ ba, dɛ kpɔ jam kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii, dɛ kpo kondɛɛra dɛ fuah dɛɛ tɛo ba wechɔga wa.
A gɛ Sɔfore Nomoa nɔ ɛɛ wonoo dɛɛ sune nɛra baa wola waa jemɛ dɛɛ koni la nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o gba kwaraa ta kpegri dɔe dɛ́ won dɛɛ vɛh wechɔga ɛɛ.
Gɛ o yon kpo kwaa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛ nɛra ba wechɔga waa la, gɛɛ wɛɛ ba ɛɛ dɛɛ tɛ o tenten, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o gba ge dɛ ɛ wechɔga.
Sɔfore Nomoa ɛɛ nɔ ɛ wejena. Nomɛlbwa toole dɛ gbagba won le o te dɛ ɛ a gɛ toma nɔ, nemenɛ Korowii aa leo kɛŋɔ waa le Aarɔn o ɛ bɛl la.
Gɛɛ a do Yeesu Kristo ge aa wola o te gbagba leɛ Sɔfore Nomoa toma aa ɛ wejena nɔ ta. Korowiirii ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "N Biee hen, fini n berɛ he Mɛɛ."
Korowii bol bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "Hɛɛ ɛ Sɔfoo saŋ bɛlbwa, kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk faa ɛ Sɔfo la."
Yeesu aa lɔ harɛ ta la, dɛ wii ne siniire nee wɛɛ soŋe komɛlbwa dɛɛ le Korowii be. Dɛ Korowii dɔ kpegri dɛ́ leo seo ta. Waa pwɛra dɛɛ no Korowii deŋna waa la nomanta, dɛ Korowii dɛ no o wesoŋa.
Yeesu ɛ Korowii Bie, kɛ o na wahala, dɛ che a ta dɛ won pwɛr o te dɛ no o Mɛɛ deŋna wa.
Waa wona teŋɛ o Mɛɛ ŋwɛnɛ ta kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ la, o berɛ nɛra baa dɛ teŋɛ o Yeesu ŋwɛnɛ ta bwa Lɛɛ, bá che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ lɛɛ aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
Korowii bol o waa dɛ ɛo Sɔfore Nomoa kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk faa ɛ Sɔfo la.
Waa yaa dɔa dɛ́ bol he be dɛ le gɛ waa nɔ ta la warɔ, kɛ a bini bagla kpegri, dɛkalkɛŋɔ haa waa mun no.

Haa lea hweli waa nɔ bigro, a chɛ kɛ saŋ nɔ he fe aa jema dɛɛ bagle nɛra a wa. Kɛ he ta do kɛ nɛra baa pa mun dɛɛ hweli Korowii wa, asɛ a chɛ kɛ ba le mun ta dɛ bag ba a wa. A fe aa chɛ kɛ he won dɛɛ di kondikwaa tenten la, elee he taa ɔr.
Nomɛlbwa o taa dɛ ɔr Korowii waa ta la, bechalaa on. Waa waa jemɛ, waa wedɛɛga aa dɛ su Korowii siwi jemɛ.
Nomonomee dɛɛ di kondikwaa tenten. Banee ɛ waa ben, dɛ jemɛ wedɛɛga ne wechɔga.

Yaa jemɛ Yeesu Kristo welogla la nomanta la, siee a chɛ kɛ yaa kaa, dɛɛ la nomonome bini. Yaa berɛ pa mun bol gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ya charɛ liire le ya wechɔga aa dɛ kaa ya nɛɛ seo ta la ta, ne gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ya yarada Korowii dɛ kpɔ ya te tɛo waa kpa.
Yaa berɛ bol Korowii nee sɔe wa, ne nɔɔra kpɔe dɛ dawɛ nɛra nɛ, ne gɛ lala bwa aa ba ir seo ta, ne gɛ Korowii aa ba bol nɛra waa dɛ pa bole dɛ bɔ ba ba wechɔga kem aa wola jagaa dɔ waa kpa.
Dɛ Korowii sɛoh waa, yaa gel anɔ bwa waa baglaa, dɛ kaa sie.

Nɛra baa yarada Korowii waa ka la, ɛrɛɛ bá ɛ dɛ charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta dɛ berɛ yaradao jaɔ? Korowii chaah ba sie o waa nɔ ta ka, asɛ ba na Korowii doa koŋkɛɛle la som la bɛl, asɛ dɛ tɛɛ ba o Domadɛɛge la ka.
Ba no Korowii waa la dɛ jemɛ wera aa wera, dɛ dɔ kpegri baa dɛ ba dɔe tɔpere waa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala la ta ane.

Anɔ bwa habɔɔ la, ba gel Korowii waa ba faa dɛ yarada la! A kpegri kɛ ba charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta dɛ berɛ ba yaradao, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ baa kwaara kpaa Korowii Bie la dɛɛ pɛl o dagagre ta, dɛ gel sihiih kpoo nɛra baah ta. Ba ɛo dawɛ ba nyu ta.
Harɛ bɛlbwa bwaala aa dɛ nɛ o ta wɛɛ ɛ kondikwaa dɛɛ tɛ nɛra baa dɛ parɔ la, Korowii ɛɛ geloo o ɛ harɛdɛɛge.
Kɛ dɛ harɛ bɛlbwa le kpɔga ne sɔɔhne aa, o ta tɔnɔ dɔe. O chegɛ Korowii taahna nyoa. Baa fuuh.
N dandɛɛga, yaa dɛ bol anɔ bwa nɔ, he te la, he wa aa yaa gwaŋɛ. Ya jemɔ kɛ he we-ɛɛla ɛɛ do werii a bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii lɛ heya.
Korowii ta nɛn waa wola waa ɛ a ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ, a ba ɛ kɛŋɔ wɛɛ soh he tondɛɛga haa dɛ ɛ, ne gɛ haa dɛ nyinu dɛ koh a waa cha o nɛra dɛ taa cha ba la waa.
Ya dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he bɛlbwa swɛɛ siwi gɛ dɛ ka tonɛ ásɛ dɛ won dɔ kon haa dɛ hwɛgɛ o ta la.
Yaa nyin kɛ he bwara hwah heya. Ya dɛ nyin he kpɔ nɛra baa lawɛ bambile dɛɛ yarada Korowii asɛ o tɛɛ ba kwaa waa bag ba nyoa la da.
Korowii bagɛ Abraham nyoa. Waa bagɔ nyoa la, komɛlbwa aa wola toole dɛ gwaalo la, o gbagbaa o ŋwɛɛ, dɛ ŋɔ,
"N ŋwɛɛrɔ kɛŋɔ mɛɛ kwaa he wobɛlbwaa tɛɛ, dɛ tɛɛ naanar kohona."
Abraham ge wono lawɛ bambile aaa, dɛ ba dɔ kon Korowii aa bagɔ nyoa la.
Dɛ nɛn dɛ ba ŋwɛɛra aa, kon waa gwaaloo o yon ŋwɛɛ, asɛ ba jemɛ kɛ kasinteŋii wɛɛ bol, dɛ tɔŋla bɛlbwa teŋo.
Dɛ Korowii dɛ nyin o bagle nɛra baa dɛ ba kon waa bag ba nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ ɛo tɛɛ ba la kɛŋɔ waa o liire chara ba bwa, a waa o ŋwɛɛ la.

Korowii bagɛ nyoa dɛ ŋwɛɛ o tenten ja. Webele anɛ nɔ gelɔ nyobaga la do kpegri, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii aa won teŋe nyosone. Anee dɛ do ya nɛra yaa ba Korowii be ŋɔ ó lɛ yaa la gbemba, asɛ ya won do kpegri ya hwɛga yaa dɛ hwɛgɛ o nɛɛ la ta.
A gɛ hwɛga nɔɔ dɛ gel ya bambile won che bobeŋkpoŋ, asɛ ya che kɛrɛdɛ. Hwɛga nɔ nomanta, a kaa ɛ kɛŋɔ ya won Korowii bodɛɛge bela pateesahjen faa tɔa nɛmpɛɛne aa wola bela jo la joe.
Yeesu aa ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk la, o koh ya waa dɛ tɔ sie ya nɛɛ jo bela mɔɔ ya ge ba.
A gɛ Mɛlkesɛdɛk nɔ, dɛ Salem kooroo on, asɛ o ɛ Nemenɛ Korowii Sɔfo. A saŋ la Abraham aa le laa waa kaa yo dɛ pɔ koranar banaarɛ bane nɛɛ dɛɛ ba la, Mɛlkesɛdɛk chemo dɛ swee andɛɛga tɛo.
Belaa Abraham bɔne kwaa waa dɔa laa la ta bwa bini bɔre fi dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ tɛo. Mɛlkesɛdɛk sɔn la munii "Waa aa Togra Kooro." Salem ge munii "bambisɔɔhna." Anomanta dɛ "Bambisɔɔhna Kooroo" on.
Mɛlkesɛdɛk ta nya ne mɛɛ dɔe ya jemɛ. O ta lolanar dɔe. O ta lola tɔpere ne sewa tɔpere gba dɔe ya jemɛ. O ɛ Sɔfo saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la aa wola jaga dɔe kɛŋɔ Korowii Bie la ken.
He na gɛ waa ɛ nɛnjen kenɛ? Ya nabaa Abraham o sɔn aa lea kohona la, o gbabir bɔne kwaa waa dɔa o laa ta bwa bini fi dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ tɛo.
Lewi naanar baa ɛ Sɔfore la, Mosis Mmara la ŋɔ ba bwɛɛ tena la bɛlbwa ɛɛ bɔne o kwaa bini bɔre fi dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ dɛɛ tɛɛ ba. Kɛ Abraham naanaree ba bwa ge gba.
Lewi dea laa Mɛlkesɛdɛk le. Kɛ Abraham ge bɔne o kwaa bini bɔre fi, dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ tɛo, asɛ Mɛlkesɛdɛk swee andɛɛga tɛ o kwaara Korowii aa bagɔ nyoa la.
Ya bwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ nomoaa sweera dɛɛ tɛ bechala.
Lewi luge ta Sɔfore baa dɛ lɛ kwaa fi bɛlbwa bɔrbeŋkpoŋa la, ba dɛ sewɛ. Mɛlkesɛdɛk te aa lɛa la, Korowii Tɔn baglɔ kɛŋɔ o lole saŋ bɛlbwa.
Lewi luge ta Sɔforee dɛɛ lɛ kwaa fi bɛlbwa bɔrbeŋkpoŋa. Kɛ yaa wonoo ŋɔ o nabaa Abraham aa bɔne o kwaa bini bɔre fi dɛ kpɔ bɔrbeŋkpoŋ tɛ Mɛlkesɛdɛk la, Lewi gba tɛo.
Dɛ ba ta Lewi lolɛ mɔɔ, kɛ yaa wonoo ŋɔ o ta ɛ o nabaa Abraham dwee dɛ taa ba bala a gɛ saŋ Mɛlkesɛdɛk aa cheme Abraham la.

Gɛ saŋ Korowii aa tɛ o nɛra Mmara la la, gɛ saŋee Lewi dea tena pa mun dɛɛ di sɔfore. Dɛ nɛra fe ɛɛ wonoo che saraha Lewi dea Sɔfore la faa ɛa dɛɛ tɛɛ ba la ta dɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛga ka tonaa, a fe ta hiaih kɛŋɔ Sɔfo waa do kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk berɛ ba dɛ gel onɔ la waa le Lewi dea dɛ do kɛŋɔ Aarɔn.
Dea o tena aa dɛ di sɔfore la, o beraa, a chɛ kɛ mmara la ge berɛ.
A gɛ waa nɔ yaa dɛ bagle nɔ, ya Dɔɔ Yeesu waa yaa bol la. O ge dea waa le o ta la korɛ Sɔfore dea ta. O dea waa le o ta la te bɛlbwa ta Sɔfo toma ɛɛ bwa.
Nomɛlbwa jemɔ kɛŋɔ Juda deaa o le. Mosis ge fa ta bolɛ ŋɔ Juda dea tena dɛ di sɔfore bwa.
Tarakenii waa la bini ta chaah, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Sɔfo bɛl balɔ dɛ do kɛ Mɛlkesɛdɛk ken kati.
Nɛwɛnyini sɔfore dii mmara ta laa a che o ɛ Sɔfo. O mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la kpegri taa a che o ɛ Sɔfo.
Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, Korowii Tɔn di danseɛ o waa ŋɔ, "Hɛɛ ɛ Sɔfoo dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ Mɛlkesɛdɛk."
Mmarabene la aa wola kpegri ne tɔnɔ bɛlbwa dɔe la waa Korowii lao kpɔ.
A gɛ Mosis Mmara nɔ fa ta wone gel nɛwɛnyina ɛ nɛndɛɛga ka tonɛ. Kɛ taraken te, ya dɔ wefala dɛɛ hwɛgɛ a ta a gwaa ambena la, dɛ che a ta dɛ won tuuh dɛɛ tel Korowii.
Waa aa bera ja laanee kɛŋɔ Korowii ŋwɛɛra waa ŋwɛɛra la. Ba faa dɛ cheg Lewi dea Sɔfore la la, Korowii fa ta ken ŋwɛɛrɛ bwa.
Yeesu te la, ŋwɛɛraa Korowii ŋwɛɛ dɛ chego Sɔfo. Ba bagle a waa Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii ŋwɛɛrɔ, waa nyoa bera ba: 'Hɛɛ ɛ Sɔfo saŋ bɛlbwaa dɛɛ la.' "
A gelɔ Yeesu ɛ ajinamuu te ásɛ nɛwɛnyina nyiŋi dɛ na fɔofale Korowii aa fɔwa dɛ tɛ yaa la wera waa wera dɛ gwaa ombene la.
Anɔ la aa jaa laanee kɛŋɔ dɛ Lewi dea Sɔfore la dɛ serewe. Anomanta a gelɔ nɛra baa di sɔfore la warɛ.
Kɛ Yeesu te, o lole saŋ bɛlbwa. O sɔfore toma la aa berɛ dɛɛ kaa nɛnfale bɛlbwa be bwa.
Nomɛlbwa waa chegɛ Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ tuuh dɛɛ tel Korowii la, Yeesu ɛɛ lɛo waa wola nyogre kpa bwa. O lole saŋ bɛlbwa dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyina.
Magraa a den magre kɛŋɔ yaa dɔ Sɔfore Nomoa waa do kɛ Yeesu dɛɛ cha yaa. Doŋa bɛlbwa toole o nɛ, o tea too, o ne wechɔg-ɛɛra ta pɛɛ. Korowii tɛo nomonome o gwaa komɛlbwa waa lɔ nyundua.

O ta doe kɛŋɔ Lewi dea Sɔfonomonome la baa dɛ ɛ wechɔga saraha tɔpere bɛlbwa la. Ba te chɛ kɛ ba tɔ sie ɛ ba gbagba wechɔga saraha mɔɔ dɛ ɛ nɛra la ge wechɔga saraha. Saraha beŋkpoŋ gboo Yeesu ɛ, bɛl ta jae kpa. O kpɔ o te gbagba ɛ saraha.

Baa nyiŋi Mosis Mmara ta dɛɛ kpɔ Sɔfonomonome la, nɛra baa wola wone dɛɛ vɛh wechɔga kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini bwa aa doa laanee baa kpɔ. Kɛ Mosis Mmara la habɔɔ la, waa Korowii aa bola dɛ ŋwɛɛ o gbagba la, an gela o Bie ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa. O te vɛh wechɔga dɛ do kaih saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la.
Waa yaa dɛ bol laanee kɛŋɔ ya dɔ Sɔfore Nomoa o do gɛ tenten. O soge nomombɔr Korowiijen kookara la jwɛɛh nyundua.
Korowii dobɔr tenten waa do goroŋ la, belaa wɛɛ di sɔfore. Korowii gbagbaa do bela dea la, nɛwɛnyini laa doo.
Sɔfore Nomoa bɛlbwa tomaa kɛŋɔ wɛɛ fuh kwaa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii, dɛɛ ɛ saraha ge. Anomanta a hiaoh kɛŋɔ ya Sɔfore Nomoa nɔ ge dɔ kwaa waa kpɔ dɛɛ tɛ Korowii.
Dɛ o fe lɔ harɛ bonɔ naa, o fe aa Sɔfo ɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Sɔfore lɔ harɛ ta dɛɛ ɛ saraha gɛ Mosis Mmara aa bagla la.

Ba sɔfore toma baa dɛ ɛ la, chaaraa baa chaa gɛ baa dɛ ɛa Korowii doa la. A tenten laa. A waa Mosis faa dɛ ba Korowii tɛnte dea baa dɛ tomɔ o bini la ɛɛ la, Korowii ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Nyiŋi dɛ ɛ komɛlbwa kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ maa bagle bwe la doa la."

Taraken nɔ, ba tɛ Yeesu sɔfore toma o gwaa harɛ bonɔ Sɔfore. Fɔofale la waa chegɛ nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii baah ta dɛ fɔwɛ la ge gwaa ombene la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nyoo Korowii aa baga fɔofale la ta la gwaa ambena la.
Dɛ fɔobene la fe wer, waane aa wola toole o ta naa, onfale fe ta hiaih kpa.
Kɛ Korowii nao kɛŋɔ o nɛra chɔg fɔobene la, a waa o ŋɔ, "Saŋ bɛl ɛɛ bao, asɛ n ne Israel tena ne Juda tena fɔwɛ fɔofale bɛl.
O ne fɔo la n ne ba naanar aa fɔwa a gɛ saŋ maa lag ba le Ijipt harɛ la aa beŋkpoŋ ɛɛ ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba naanar fa ta fɔo la ta teŋɛ. Anomanta n ge laa sie kpɔ ba nɛ.
Fɔo n ne Israel tena aa dɛ ba fɔwa kerekeree la: Mɛɛ kpɔ me mmaraa do ba nyu bini, dɛ chwero do ba bambile bini, asɛ dɛ ɛ ba Korowii, asɛ ba ge ɛ n nɛra.
Aa berɛ hiah kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa bagle o dɔŋ kɛɛ o nime ŋɔ, 'A wer kɛŋɔ he jemɛ Korowii' kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba bechale ne nomonome bwa ɛɛ jem mɛɛ.
Mɛɛ sune ba nɛɛ dɛ kpɔ ba waa aa wola togrɛ kɛ ba, maa ba wechɔga waa lii kpa."
Korowii aa dɛ bol fɔofale waa nɔ, onlogle la berɛ ombene. Waa berɛ ombene nɔ, o kpegri tonɔ, wɛɛ nyogre.
Logle fɔo Korowii ne o nɛra faa fɔwa la gba fa dɔ mmara baa chegɛ o ta dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, dɛ dɔ bela baa dɛ tomɛ Korowii harɛ nɔ ta,

asɛ o do tɛnte dea bini. (Pateesah teŋe dea la doonyoa, asɛ bɛl ge bɔne dea la bini anɛ.) Dea la bologle la sɔne Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ. A gɛ Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ la bɔr belaa daa baa kpɔ kandea dɛɛ chɔŋɛ o ta, ne teebur ne paanoo baa kpɔa dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la che.
Asɛ bela baa dɛ yerɛ Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ Tenten la ge do pateesah nɛɛte la habɔɔ.

Korowii Bogoroŋ Tenten la bɔr bela la, dɛ suugaswɛm kon baa dɛ fuh daawiile a sɔɔh aa soma o bini la lɔ bela. Dɛ daka baa kpɔ suugaswɛm ɛ o bwara bwa, asɛ o che tɛ ba ne Korowii fɔo la lɔ bela. Dɛ suugaswɛm vii la baa kpɔ kondikwaa aa le nyundua baa yera maana do o bini la, ne Aarɔn daŋgbala waa mogɛ papooni la, ne bwepɛmpɛŋre anɛ la ba faa chwerɛ o ne ba fɔobene la mmara fi la do a ta la lɔ daka la bini.

Ba kwaa nyundua toroma baa dɛ yer ba Kerobim la banɛ chɔŋɛ daka la doa baa bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii jirima lɔ bela, asɛ ba sie gba dɔŋa, dɛ pagri kena tɔ bela baa laa Korowii bandia dɛɛ kpɔ o nɛra nɛɛ la. Yaa won dɔ bɔr taraken dɛ bagle kwaa nɔ waa bwa ka tonɛ.
Ken nɔɔ dea la bini kwaa cheche, asɛ Sɔfore la ɛɛ jo o bologle la bini tɔperee bwa dɛ kaa ɛ ba toma.

Dea la bonɛɛte la te la, Sɔfore Nomoa gboo dɛɛ jo o bini. O gba kwaraa la, kerabeŋkpoŋ gboo wɛɛ jo bela bena bɛlbwa. O ta chal kpoŋaa, waa bela jo. A nee o kaa soŋe o wechɔga ne nɛra la wechɔga baa ɛa baa wola jemɛ kɛŋɔ ba ɛ wechɔga la.
Korowii Domadɛɛge dɛ bagle yaa waa dɛ le gɛ waa nɔ ta kɛŋɔ, dɛ tɛnte dea la ta lole naa, Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ Tenten la ŋwɛnɛ ta pile mɔɔ.
A gɛ waa nɔ chegɔ dɛ tɛ fini nɔ. A baglɔ kɛŋɔ saraha ɛɛ ne konaatena fuih dɛɛ tɛ Korowii aa won gel nɛn baa fuh kwaa la dɛɛ tɛo la tea to.

A gɛ waa nɔ bwa ɛ kondiile ne konnyɔɔla ne bwara sarama waa aa ɛ nawee wa. Bwadabii waa a bwa, aa wone gel nɛn tea ɛɛ to. Korowiirii kpɔa tɛ o nɛra ásɛ baa teŋɛ a ta dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ o ŋwɛnɛfale la aa bala.

Yeesu Kristo balɔ dɛ ba ɛ Sɔfore Nomoa, dɛɛ ɛ wefala aa bala dɛ do wer ya jemɛ a waa taraken nɔ la toma. Tɛnte dea waa dɛ ɛ toma o bini la dɔ jirima dɛ do wer gwaa onɔ la. Nɛwɛnyini laa doo, harɛ bonɔ kon laa.

Yeesu Kristo jo Korowii Bogoroŋ Tenten la. Waa jo bela la, boohna ne nabie chal laa o kpɔ jo bela. O gbagba chalee o kpɔ jo bela, dɛ lɛ yaa ta aa wola jagaa dɔ bwa. Kerabeŋkpoŋii o jo bela. A ta hiaih kɛŋɔ o jo bela kpa.
Nɛn waa kah doŋa la, dɛ ba won boohna ne nabie chal ne naloni tɔɔ kpɔe dɛ jwal o nɛɛ asɛ dɛ laa doŋa kpɔ o nɛ aa,

ɛrɛɛ a ɛ Yeesu Kristo chal aa wola won laa ya doŋa kpɔ ya nɛɛ kohona nɔ? Korowii Domadɛɛge waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa aa wola jaga dɔe la, on cha Yeesu Kristo o won kpɔ o te kɛŋɔ konaate waa wola kirihiah bɛlbwa dii dɛ ɛ saraha dɛ tɛ Korowii. Yeesu chal ɛɛ laa ya wechɔga aa dɛ kaa ya ne seo ta la bwa kpɔ ya nɛɛ asɛ ya tea to, asɛ a waa bɛ yaa hiah kpa, asɛ ya won tomɛ Korowii kasinteŋ la.

Yeesu chegɔ nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii baah ta taraken dɛ fɔwɛ fɔo dɛ tɛ nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii, ásɛ nɛra Korowii aa lee ba ŋɔ ba ɛ o nɛra la won dɔ kwaa waa bag ba nyoa la saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la. Baa wonoo dɔa saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wechɔga ba faa dɛ ɛ fɔobene la ta la, Yeesu Kristo aa baa sewɛ la, o bɔ a kem. O sewɔ asɛ ba wechɔga la bɛ won dɔ kpegri ba nɛɛ kpa.
Dɛ nɛn chwerɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ ba di o kapɛrɛ, dɛ o ta sewaa, nɛn aa won di.
Kɛ dɛ o sewɔ te naa, baa wonoo bɔne o kwaa name. Dɛ naate waa chwerɛ tɔn la ta lole te naa, ŋwɛnɛ toole kɛŋɔ nɛn bɔne o laala.
A waa gela fɔobene la kwara ta la, chal ɛɛ fuge mɔɔ baa ɛ o we-ɛɛla la.

Mosis tɔ sie bagle waa bwa Korowii aa ŋɔa ó nɛra la ɛ dɛ le Korowii Mmara Tɔn bini, mɔɔ dɛ kpɔ nabie ne boohna chale koo nee ta, dɛ kpɔ pee pona aa swɛɛra ne dawii ane soosiwi ɛ chal ne nee la merɛ Korowii Mmara Tɔn la ne nɛra la bwa nɛ.
Waa kpɔa dɛɛ merɛ ba nɛɛ la, o ŋɔ, "Chal nɔɔ n kpɔ dɛɛ merɛ fɔo Korowii aa ŋɔa hɛ́ɛ teŋɛ a ta la ta á ɛ danseɛ kɛŋɔ he sɛoh kɛ hɛɛ teŋɛ o Mmara la taa."
Gɛ tentenee o yon ɛ chal la dɛ merɛ tɛnte dea la ne numoli ne koŋkwaare baa dɛ ɛ a ne toma Korowii Dea bela la bwa ta.
Mmara la ta la, chal nee baa fee doŋa waa ne kwaa kɛrɛdɛ ta. Dɛ chal ta fugaa, Korowii aa wechɔga kpɔe dɛɛ kɛ.
A gɛ kwaa la bwa, dɛ Korowii doa kwaa la chaaree a bwa. Dɛ gɛɛ chɛ kɛ ba fee doŋa a ta. Kɛ Korowii doa kwaa la te gbagba la, kwaa baa kpɔa dɛɛ ɛ saraha dɛɛ fee a doŋa la gwaa anɔ.

Bela Yeesu Kristo aa joa la, Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ Tenten nɛwɛnyini aa mao o ɛ Korowii doa kon chaa gbo la bini laa o jo. Korowii doa gbagbaa o la, dɛ ka che Korowii sie ásɛ dɛ won cha yaa taraken.
A ta hiaih kɛ o teŋɛ dɛɛ jo Korowii Bogoroŋ la dɛ kpɔ o te ɛ saraha bena bɛlbwa gɛ Juda tena Sɔfore Nomoa aa dɛ jo ba kon ta chal aa wola o gbagba bwara chal ɛɛ ne la.

Dɛ bena bɛlbwaa wɛɛ jo bela dɛ kpɔ o te ɛ saraha aa, bena bɛlbwaa o fe ɛɛ ba wahala nae dɛ kpoŋe le harɛ mumpar ba le fini. Kɛ kerabeŋkpoŋ gboo o ba harɛ nɔ ta tɔpere tama waa kaa nɔ ta, dɛ ba kpɔ o te ɛ saraha dɛɛ doŋi wechɔga, waa wola gɛɛ ɛ kpa.
Kerabeŋkpoŋii nɛwɛnyini bɛlbwa ɛɛ ba sewa, asɛ a habɔɔ la, Korowii bol o waa dɛ pa bole.
Gɛɛ ba kpɔ Yeesu Kristo ge ɛ saraha kerabeŋkpoŋ, ásɛ o che nɛndamanta wechɔga. Wɛɛ berɔɔ ba nɛɛtena ja. Wechɔga waa laa wɛɛ ba bala name te. Nɛra baa dɛ kpao siswɛm ne laanee wɛɛ ba ba lɛ.

Tɔe Mosis Mmara la tɔ wedɛɛga a faa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala la sie dɛ che tɛa. A fa ta wedɛɛga la tenten ɛɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn lileo aa wola o gbagba ɛɛ la. Anomanta saraha la Mmara la aa gela baa ɛ bena bɛlbwa la aa won gel nɛra baa dɛ ba a ne la ɛ nɛndɛɛga ka tonɛ.
Dɛ saraha la fe wono gel ba berɛ nɛndɛɛga dɛ ka tonaa, ba fe ta a ɛɛ gelaa? Dɛ a fe wono dɛɛ fee ba wechɔga ba nɛ aa, ba liire fe aa ban ha a waa we ba nɛɛ kpa.
Saraha laanee dɛɛ lii ba bena bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ wechɔg-ɛɛraa ban,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ nae ne boohna chale aa won fee wechɔga nɛra nɛɛ bwa.
A waa Yeesu aa dɛ ba harɛ ta bala la, o ŋɔ Korowii be ŋɔ, "Konaatena ne koŋkwaare baa kpɔa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛɛ la, he sie aa a ta lɛ. Kɛ he ɛ bwadabii bɛl tɛ mɛ.
He siwi aa konaatena baa dɛ fuah ambire dɛɛ tɛɛ, ne saraha baa ɛa dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ soŋe nɛra wechɔga la su.
Belaa n ŋɔ, 'Korowii, menee la. N balɔ dɛ́ ba ɛ he tetoowaa gɛ baa chwerɛ n waa Mmara tɔn la bini la.' "

O baglɔ kɛŋɔ konaatena ne koŋkwaare baa kpɔa ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛ Korowii la ta o sie lɛɛ. O siwi ta konaatena baa fuah dɛ ɛ saraha dɛɛ tɛo ne saraha baa ɛa dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ soŋe wechɔga la sui, kɛ dɛ Mosis Mmara ge fe bagle a bwa.
Belaa o ŋɔ, "Korowii, menee la, n balɔ dɛ́ ba ɛ he tetoowa." A baglɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii teŋe sarahabena la bwa ta dɛ kpɔ Yeesu Kristo saraha la chig a naa ta.
Yeesu Kristo aa ɛ Korowii tetoowaa dɛ kpɔ o bwadabii ɛ saraha kerabeŋkpoŋ a den tonɛ la nomanta, o laa ya bwa wechɔga kpɔ ya nɛ, dɛ gel ya ɛ Korowii nɛra.
Juda tena Sɔfore te la, tɔpere bwaa ba che ba sɔfore toma ta dɛ teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ saraha siwibeŋkpoŋ. Kɛ a gɛ saraha nɔ aa won laa nɛn wechɔga kpɔ o nɛɛ bwa.
Kerabeŋkpoŋ gboo Yeesu Kristo te ɛ nɛwɛnyini wechɔga saraha, a den magre, aa wola hiaih kɛŋɔ o ɛ bɛl kpa, dɛ ka so nomombɔr Korowii dig ta.
Belaa o do dɛɛ kpa ka tel kɛŋɔ Korowii aa ba o dɔma ne harɛ asɛ o tigri ba nɛ.
Saraha beŋkpoŋ waa ɛa dɛ fee wechɔga nɛra nɛɛ la gboo gela ba do kaih saŋ bɛlbwa dɛɛ la.
