Korowii Domadɛɛge gba di danseɛ bagle yaa. O tɔ sie ŋɔ,
"N Naa Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, 'Fɔo n ne baa fɔwɛ tɔpera aa lɔ sie la ta laanee nɔ: Mɛɛ kpɔ me mmaraa do ba bambile bini, dɛ chwero do ba nyuune bini.' "
O berɔ ŋɔ, "Maa ba wechɔga waa lii kpa bwa."
Anomanta, dɛ Korowii dɔɔ kpɔ ya wechɔga kɛ yaa aa, a ta berɛ hiah kɛŋɔ ba ɛ saraha dɛ kpɔ soŋe ya wechɔga kpa.
Yabalawa, Yeesu seo la nomanta yaa wonoo jo Korowii Bɔr Waa Do Goroŋ Tenten la, yaa wola ɔmɛ.
Yeesu pili ŋwɛnɛfale mkpa aa lɔ o ta tɛ yaa, asɛ ya won jo Korowii Bogoroŋ la ta. O bwadabii ɛo kɛŋɔ pateesahjen o faa tɔ Korowii Bogoroŋ Tenten la ŋwɛnɛ la. Waa sewa la, ŋwɛnɛ pilo tɛ yaa.
Ya dɔ Sɔfojen wɛɛ nyiŋi Korowii bii.
Anomanta la, Korowii aa sɔ ya wechɔga ta waa wola gelɛ ya liire ɛɛ ɛ yaa kɛŋɔ ya ɛ wechɔga kpa, dɛ kpɔ o nedɛɛga sɔ ya bwadabii nɔ, hé gel ya kpɔ tepoŋ ne yarada ba o be, ya bɛ tɔŋle tama bɛlbwa,
dɛ lawɛ hwɛga yaa dɔa la bini kpoŋe kiŋkiŋ, dɛ bɛ dɛɛ ɔmɛ tama bɛlbwa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ naate waa bagɛ yaa nyoa la waa dɔ kasinteŋ.
Hé gel ya lii gɛ yaa ɛ dɛ́ won dɛɛ do dɔŋa gbemba dɔŋa nyina ne wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta,
asɛ dɛ bɛ chema yaa dɛ cheme saŋ bɛlbwa la gel, kɛŋɔ bane aa gela la. Waa bwa jaga tɔpere la dɛ tel, anomanta hɛ́ɛ do dɔŋa gbemba.
Korowii aa pili ya sie ya jemɛ o kasinteŋ nɔ nɔ, dɛ ya ta saahnɔ do wechɔga ta dɛɛ ɛ aa, saraha bɛlbwa toole bobɛlbwa dɛ́ fee ya wechɔga ya nɛɛ kpa.
Ɔmee taa yaa ba soga dɛɛ kpa Korowii tɔpere waa dɛ ba nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole, dɛ do banɔ la baa chegɛ o nɛɛ wechɔga nii aa dɛ lawɛ kohona ta la.
Nɛn to Mosis Mmara, asɛ nɛra banɛ ne batoro di danseɛ tiao o waa waa ɛa la ta naa, baa o nɛɛ sune, kpoe baa kpoo.

Aah dɛ ɛrɛɛ a chɛ kɛ ba ɛ nɛn waa nyiŋi Korowii Bie la dɛɛ vaɔh? Dɛ nɛn nyiŋi fɔo la Korowii aa chegɛ o Bie seo ta dɛ fɔwɛ la dɛ fee o wechɔga o nɛɛ la pɛɛ aa, kembɔr besoo chɛ kɛ ba tɛo wɔ? A gɛ nɛn la ɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa chao la nɛnhɛla. Korowii ŋɔ ó bɔɔ kem aa, o wenaale aa kanee do aa?
Naate waa ŋɔa ŋɔ, "Menee dɔ wechɔga kem bɔe, menee dɛ bɔ nɛra ba wechɔga kem" la, ya jemɛ o nɛnsoo. Ba chwerɛ bobɛl ge ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii ɛɛ bol o nɛra waa dɛ pa bole."
Wobɛlbwa toole dɛ do ɔma kɛŋɔ haa ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ dɛ jo Korowii waa lole saŋ bɛlbwa la nɔn ta.
Hé lii gɛ he faa doa gɛ saŋ Korowii waa la aa chaah he sie la. He na wahala ga, kɛ he ta habɔɔ leɛ.
Ba chɛgre heyaa dɛ ɛ heyaa hɔhɔrɔwa nɛra baah ane ta. Dɛ he dɛ cha nɛra baa dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa ane ta.
He na nɛra baa do ba dea la sum, dɛ cha ba ba wahala nae ta. Ba lɛ he kwaa haa dɔa bwa, kɛ he sie ta kie. He sie lɛo, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he jemɔ kɛ he dɔ komɛl waa wola jaga dɔe dɛ gwaa anɔ la haa paŋa la.
Anomanta, he bɛ he yaradae haa dɛ yarada Korowii Bie la gel. A dɔ kembɔa kohona.
A hiaoh kɛŋɔ he lawɛ bambile dɛ́ won ɛ gɛ Korowii aa dɛ nyin, asɛ dɛ won dɔ kwaa waa bagɛ heyaa nyoa la.
Anee Korowii Tɔn bagle la: "A ka tamaa ken asɛ naate waa dɛ ba bala la ba. Waa bigra ba.
Nɛn o waa aa togra dɛ su n siwi la te la, wɛɛ yarada mɛɛ dɛ dɔ mkpa. Kɛ dɛ o le habɔɔ te naa, n sie aa o nɛɛ lɛɛ ba."
Ya ta nɛra baa dɛ le habɔɔ dɛɛ nyogre la ɛɛ. Nɛra baa dɛ yarada dɛɛ dɔ mkpa laanee yan.
Bɔkwaa yarada ɔ? Yaradaa kɛŋɔ yaa jema kaih kɛŋɔ yaa wonoo dɔ kwaa yaa dɛ tamane a wa, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ kwaa yaa wola an na siwi ne la bwa lole kpela.
Yarada taa a che Korowii pena a saŋ la tena.
Yarada taa a che ya no a mun kɛŋɔ nyoa wobol nee Korowii ta nyundua ne harɛ. Anomanta nyundua ne harɛ yaa dɛ na nɔ, kwaa baa wola an na nee ba taa.

Yaradaa Abɛl dɔ, asɛ o kwaa waa kpɔa ɛ saraha tɛ Korowii won su siwi dɛ gwaa o dɔɔ Keen kwa, asɛ Korowii lɛa dɛ penao kɛŋɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa aa su o siwi. O fe sewɔ, kɛ o yaradae waa yarada Korowii nomanta, waa waa ɛa la chɔɔ ba le fini ba taa bola.

Yarada Enɔk yarada Korowii, asɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa o be nyundua, dɛ o ta sewɛ. Ba nyin o bɔr kahonɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ Korowii kpɔɔ kaa nyundua. Ba chwerɛ o waa kɛŋɔ Korowii aa wola on kpɔe kaa o be mɔɔ la, dɛ Korowii sie lɛ o nɛ.
Nɛn ta yarada dɔe yaa, o waa aa won lɛ Korowii sie. Nomɛlbwa waa ba Korowii be la, a chɛ kɛ o dɔ yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii lole, dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o jemɛ Korowii la, Korowii dɛ chao.

Yarada taa a che Korowii aa bol waa a taa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba bala Nowa be la, o no, dɛ o ta an nae mɔɔ. O noɔ dɛ kwaa gberjen o ne o haah ne bii jo o bini, ba ta serewe. Nowa te aa yaradaa, asɛ nɛwɛnyina baa kaa la aa wola yaradae la, a gelɔ nɛwɛnyini bwa di bolchɔge, asɛ dɛ gel o ɛ nɛra aa chegɛ ba yarada ta asɛ ba waa su Korowii siwi la bɛl.
Yarada taa a che Korowii aa le Abraham ŋɔ ó kaa harɛ waa bagɔ nyoa la ta la, o le dɛ kaa. Waa dɛ kaa la, dɛ waa bela waa dɛ kaa jemɛ.
Yarada nee o ka so harɛfale Korowii aa bagɔ nyoa la ta kɛŋɔ hɔɔh ken. Tɛnte deene binii o so kɛŋɔ o bie Aesek ne o ge bie Jekɔb Korowii aa bagɛ ba ge a gɛ nyoa nɔ tenten la.
Dɛ Abraham dɔ bwɛɛ bɛl hwɛga. A gɛ bwɛɛ la, Korowii gbagbaa vɔrɔwo, o che kiŋkiŋ. Waa pagre bwa.
Abraham yaradae waa dɛ yarada Korowii la taa a che o won lolɛ dɛ o hwɛɛhrɔ asɛ o haah Saara ge ɛ hambara. Dɛ o jemɔ kɛŋɔ nyoa Korowii aa bagɔ la, wɛɛ ɛo.
Abraham aa hwɛɛhra waa wola kpege kpa la, o wono lolɛ, asɛ o naanar ge ya, dɛ warɛ kɛŋɔ weweela kɛɛ mpo nyoa hɛŋle ken.

Korowii yaradae taa a gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa do dɛ ba serewe, dɛ ba ta waa Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa la nae siwi ne. Kɛ ba yarada nomanta, ba naa bojaŋ ba sie lɛ kɛŋɔ haa na hɔɔhra bojaŋ baa ba he sie lɛ la. Ba sɛoh kɛŋɔ ba ɛ hɔɔhra harɛ nɔ ta.
Nɛra dɛ bol ken aa, dɛ ba dɛ nyin ba chagle kɛŋɔ ba dɛ nyin ba gbagba harɛ dɛ́ so.
Dɛ harɛ baa le o ta ba la waa ba fee lii raa, ba fe ɛɛ wonoo berɛ kaa o ta.
Kɛ gɛ laa a do. Harɛdɛɛge waa wera gwaa bela baa lea la waa baa lii. Harɛ waa lɔ nyundua waa baa lii. Anomanta a ta Korowii sihiih ɛɛ kɛŋɔ baa dɛ yerɔ ba Korowii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o kwaa bwɛɛ bɛl cheg ba.

Yaradaa Abraham yarada Korowii waa o won lawɛ o bie Aesek ŋɔ o dɛ kpɔɔ ɛ saraha dɛ tɛ Korowii a gɛ saŋ Korowii aa daahno na la. Abrahamee Korowii bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ, "Aesek nɛɛ aa ba chega asɛ n tɛɛ he naanar la maa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ mɛɛ tɛɛ la." Kɛ Korowii aa ŋɔa ó kpɔ o bibeŋkpoŋ Aesek la ɛ saraha tɛo la, o ta vɛɛh.
Dɛ Abraham jemɔ kɛŋɔ hale dɛ Aesek sewɔ kwaraa naa, Korowii dɔ kpegri kɛŋɔ ó won iru seo ta. Yaa wonoo ŋɔ sewaa Aesek sewɛ dɛ berɛ ba Abraham nɔn ta ja.
Yaradaa Aesek yarada Korowii waa o won swee Jekɔb ne Esɔ andɛɛga ba kerekere soga bini.
Jekɔb aa dɛ ba sewa la, o swee andɛɛga tɛ Josef bii banɛ la bwa. Dɛ o kpoŋe daŋgbala dɛ pi o ta dɛɛ jam Korowii. Jekɔb aa dɛ yarada Korowii waa o won ɛ anɔ bwa.
Josef aa dɛ ba sewa la, o ŋɔ Israel tena be ŋɔ baa le Ijipt harɛ taa, dɛ bagle gɛ baa kaa o hoga ne ka huge bwa. Waa dɛ yarada Korowii la waa o won ɛ gɛ.
Mosis nya ne o mɛɛ aa lolɔ la, ba kpɔɔ sɔh korobie atoro, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba nao kɛŋɔ o wer bonɔɔ. Ba ta Ijipt kooro mmara waa doa la ɔme. Baa dɛ yarada Korowii waa ba won ɛ gɛ.
Mosis aa kpega la, o ta sɛɛh ba yerɔ Ijipt kooro bihaah bie. Waa dɛ yarada Korowii waa o won ɛ gɛ.
O ta sɛɛh ɛ Ijipt tena bodia waa baa lɔ a ta la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ɛ wechɔga, harɛ bonɔ gbo gee aa jagɛ. O sie lɛ Korowii nɛra la pui dɛ́ na wahala dɛ gwaa Ijipt tena bodia la.
O nyiŋi sihiih waa koh Kristo waa dɛ́ di la kɛŋɔ a wer o be dɛ gwaa kondɔɔhkwaa a faa lɔ Ijipt harɛ la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ o dɛ nyiŋi tɔpere la Korowii aa ba bɔ nɛra bwa kem la ŋwɛnɛ.
Waa dɛ yarada Korowii la waa waa wola Ijipt kooro bandia ɔmɛ dɛ le bela, a do kɛŋɔ waa dɛ na Korowii baa wola on na la ken, o ta habɔɔ berɛ.

Mosis aa dɛ yarada Korowii waa o pa Galekaa kondikwaa dii waa la mun, dɛ gel Israel tena ɛ chal lɔ ba gbeni, ásɛ Korowii nyundua torome waa dɛ kpoo Ijipt tena bibalogla la na dɛ bɛ ba te bibalogla kpoo.
Korowiirii Israel tena yarada waa Mposwɛm la aa teŋe anɛ, o nenabɔɔ sie hol kɛŋɔ harɛpɛɛ la, ba won jo dɛ le la. Ijipt tena aa ŋɔa ba ge le la, mpo la kaa ba ne.
Korowiirii Israel tena yarada waa ba bɔ nsara bar Jeriko tɔpera anuanɛ, asɛ danjwɛɛ waa bar bwɛɛ la bwa cheme kuugi la.
Korowiirii hanjwamane Rahab yarada waa o lɛ Israel tena sɔh o be kɛrɛdɛ, ba na o bwɛɛ waa dɛ ka taa, Israel tena aa wola on kpoe ja nɛra baa wola Korowii waa noɛ la nɛ.
Too, ń bagle ane ja aa? Maa bɔree dɔ bagle Gedeɔn, ne Barak, ne Samsen, ne Jɛfta, ne Devid, ne Samoɛl, ne Korowii keamere la bwa wa.

A gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa yarada Korowii kohona, dɛ che ba yarada ta yo koranar dɛ pɔ ba nɛ, dɛ gel nɛra ɛɛ ɛ waa aa togra Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta, asɛ Korowii ɛ waa waa bagɛ nyoa la ane ba bere saŋ. Ba wono tɔ nyujentena nyoo, a ta wone lag ba.

Ba wono che nijena baah ta dɛ sɔɔh a nyoa, a ta wone fuuh ba, dɛ won lɛ ba te nɛra baa kpoŋe tokobie dɛɛ nyin ba kpoora nɔn ta. Ba wono dɔ bokpega gɛ saŋ baa gwɛgra, dɛ won yo laa kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ won pɔ harɛre ane tena nɛɛ laa ta ba chwaage.

Korowii yaradae nomanta ba wono chum haahna bane nɛra baa serewa. Nɛra bane ɛ ba bini bane ge hɔhɔrɔwa kɛŋɔ bá fe vɛh Korowii nɛɛ teŋa, kɛ ba ta ba nyu dɔe waa koɛh dɛ vɛh, gɛ aa ɛ ásɛ ba won ba ir seo ta dɛ dɔ bodɛɛge do.
Ba ɛ bane ge bahmugliwaa dɛ lɔɔ ba chweremi ne, dɛ do kwaa bane ge nɔɔra, dɛ do ba dea.

Ba fogre bane bwea dɛ kpoo ba, dɛ kpɔ sradaa teŋni bane bini anɛnɛ, dɛ kpoo bane ge tokobie ne. Dɛ booh tɔne ne pee tɔnee ba bane kpɔ berɛ laala dɛɛ do. Dɛ ba nyao kɛrɛdɛ, asɛ nɛra che ba nɛ, asɛ bane gee ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa aa wola were.

Dɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire ta chɛɛ kɛ ba ne a gɛ Korowii nɛra baa ɛ nɛnjena nɔ pɛ so. Ba ta soŋnibɔr dɔe, dɛ do pua waa ɛ hɛŋle gbo harɛ ne bwea dor dɛɛ gaage, dɛɛ so bwe bɔɔne ne bɔpɛɛne bini.
Nɛra dɛ pena a gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa yaradae baa yarada Korowii wa, kɛ ba bɛlbwa ta kon Korowii aa bagɛ Israel tena nyoa la dɔe.
Korowii lii waa aa wera cheg ya fini nɔ tena, dɛ ŋɔ a gɛ nɛra la gbo aa won do kaih ka tonɛ, nemenɛ kɛŋɔ ya ne ba bwa aa pɛa dɛ do kaih.

Ya te aa dɔ a gɛ nɛra nɔ bwa waa baa yarada Korowii dɛ ɛ aa bagle yaa waa nɔ, a chɛ kɛ ya ge lawɛ bambile dɛ chwa ya chwae waa chɔ ya sie nɔ siswɛm ne. A chɛ kɛ ya laa komɛlbwa waa gel ya lɔ naa ya chwae ta la kpɔ, dɛ gel wechɔga aa dɛ tɔ yaa ŋwɛnɛ bwa.

Yáa nyiŋi Yeesu waa ɛ ya Korowii yaradae bwa nyu te, dɛ ɛ a mumpar ne a jaga la. On koh bosɔɔhna waa ba dɔ waa asɛ ba ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa dagagre ta la. O ta sihiih waa koɛh dɛ vɛh. Taraken o soge nomombɔr Korowii dig ta.
Hé nyiŋi gɛ nɛnchɔga faa haoh dɛɛ chɛgro asɛ o lawɛ bambile la, asɛ bɔhwaah bɛ heyaa lawɛ, he le habɔɔ.
He ne wechɔga aa dɛ yo nɔ, he ta yoi chal le he nɛɛ mɔɔ.
He soh gɛ Korowii aa kpɔ heyaa ɛ o bii dɛ ja heyaa la aa? Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ, "N bie, Korowii dɛ tɛr he deŋne aa, bɛ an wesale lii. Dɛ o dɛ togre naa, bɛ gel a hwah he bwara,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛn Korowii aa dɛ nyin la, o deŋnee wɛɛ tɛr, dɛɛ togre nɛn waa lɛo kɛ o bie."
Hé lawɛ bambile wahala haa dɛ na ta, dɛ nyiŋa kɛŋɔ he Mɛɛɛ dɛɛ tɛr he deŋne. He deŋne tɛra la chaglɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii kpɔ heyaa ɛ o bii, dɛkalkɛŋɔ bie bɛlbwa toole o mɛɛ aa wola o deŋnee tɛr bwa.
Dɛ o ta he deŋne tɛrɛ kɛŋɔ waa dɛ tɛr o bii bwa deŋne la aa, amɔ dɛ o bii gbagba laa heya, dɛ kataborerii heya.
Ya mɛɛnanar baa lolɛ yaa la kwara, ba tɛr ya deŋne aa, ya dɛ no ba be. Aah dɛ ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua dɛ dɔ ya lileore la te sɛh, a ta chɛ kɛ ya no o be dɛ dɔ mkpa aa?

Ya mɛɛnanar baa lolɛ yaa la, tɔpera anɛ bɛlee ba tɛr ya deŋne gɛ ba ge aa naa kɛ a ŋwɛnɛ taa la. Kɛ Korowii te aa dɛ tɛr ya deŋne la, ya gbagba kɛrɛdɛ waa wɛɛ ɛ gɛ ásɛ ya do goroŋ kɛŋɔ gɛ waa doa la.
Ba dɛ tɛr nɛn deŋne aa, bug la ta la, o tea bini dɛ chɔg, o sie aa lɛ. Kɛ dɛ o hweli waa name o deŋne tɛra la ta naa, o waa dɛ togre, asɛ o bwara ɛɛ sɔɔhno.
Anomanta he bɛ nɔɔra kpɔ sawɛ nyoa. Hé hamɛ mun.

Hé gel he we-ɛɛla togre ásɛ he bala baa gwɛgra Korowii nɛɛ teŋa ta dɛ do kɛ nɛn waa dɛ dugri la bɛ he ŋwɛnɛre aa wola togrɛ la ta kpɔ dɛ ba lɔ na. A chɛ kɛ he togre he ŋwɛnɛre ásɛ ba kpɔ a ta dɛ dɔ bokpega.
Hé swɛɛ siwi kɛŋɔ he ne nɛra bwa baah nɛɛ do werii, dɛ swɛɛ siwi kɛŋɔ hɛɛ do goroŋee, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ nomɛlbwa ta goroŋ doe yaa, waa Korowii nae ba.

Korowii dɔ chae waa dɛ nyin o cha yaa kohona. Anomanta hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ a bɛ bɛlbwa ba paŋɛ. A waa laa aa, wechɔga ane ɛɛ ba jo he binii dɛ chɔg nɛndamanta kɛŋɔ koŋkpela yon jo kondikwaa ta dɛ chɔga la.
He bini bɛlbwa bɛ jwamane ba bɔ, dɛ vɛh Korowii ɔma kɛŋɔ Esɔ aa koh kerabeŋkpoŋ kondikwaa dii waa dɛ yog o nomonome tɛ o nime la.

He nao kɛŋɔ waa bera baa nyin kɛŋɔ o mɛɛ swee tɛo gɛ baa sweera dɛɛ tɛ binomoa la, o ta gɛ dɔe kpa. O siwi swɛɛrɔ wɛɛ nyin o dɔ gɛ a fe aa chɛa kɛ o dɔ, hale dɛɛ wi gba. Kɛ waa o gbagba aa ɛa la, o ta wone bera a do gɛ a faa doa kpa.

Haa ba Korowii be nɔ, kon haa lege be laa he ba, kɛŋɔ Israel tena faa ba bwejen Sinai ta la. A gɛ bwejen nɔ fa dɛ lawɛ nii jigijigi ken. Ba faa ba o mun la, bɔr bwa biro kpirikpirikpiri ken, asɛ peu ɛɛ ta vuguvuguvugu ken.
Dɛ bɛla bɛl dɛ si, asɛ nomɛl taa ɛɛ le. Nɛra la aa no taa la la, ba soŋɔ ŋɔ anɔ la baa noa la magre gɛ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ waa naate aa dɛ bol la kpegri tɛɛ ba. O bolɔ ŋɔ, "Dɛ kondɛɛre kwaraa lege bwejen la aa, a chɛ kɛ ba fogro bwea kpo."
Waa aa chig bela la, dɛ a ɔma kohona to, asɛ Mosis ŋɔ, "Ɔmee lag mɛ, n bwara dɛ sa!"

He te aa ba Korowii be nɔ, bwejen Saayɔn waa lɔ Korowii o gbo ɛ Korowii dɛ do le saŋ bɛlbwa la gbagba bwɛɛ Jerusalam waa lɔ nyundua la, o taa he ba. Bela nyundua toroma kagboŋlafa aa chema silɛɛ ne laanee he ba.

O binomonome o kapɛrɛ aa ku ba nɔn asɛ ba sɔna do tɔn la aa lɔ o be la ta la gba cheme bela. Ba ne Korowii waa dɛ ba nɛra bwa waa bola dɛ pa bole la, ne lala ba wa aa togra dɛ su o siwi, asɛ o gel ba ɛ nɛndɛɛga ka tonɛ la bwa bee he ba.
Yeesu bee he ba. On chegɛ nɛwɛnyini ne Korowii baah ta dɛ fɔwɛ fɔofale la la. Bela waa kpɔ o chal jwal laanee he ba. O chal soŋe wedɛɛga dɛɛ tɛ yaa. A ta do kɛŋɔ Abɛl chal aa ba taahna ne la.

Anomanta hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ dɛ bɛ deŋne taŋ Korowii waa waa dɛ bol la ta. A saŋ la tena faa vɛh nɛn ba ne waa lɔ harɛ bonɔ waa waa bola dɛ kpɔ ja ba la, dɛ ba ta wone lɛ ba te naa, ya nɛra yaa vɛh naate waa lɔ nyundua waa waa kpɔa dɛɛ ja yaa la, ɛrɛɛ yá ɛ dɛ won lɛ ya te nɔ?
Waa bol waa gɛ saŋ la, harɛ jigro. Kɛ taraken te, o bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ, "Mɛɛ ba jigri harɛɛ kerabeŋkpoŋ ja. Harɛ gbo laa mɛɛ ba jigra. Mɛɛ jigri nyundua gee ja."
A gɛ waa waa bola dɛ ŋɔ "kerabeŋkpoŋ ja" nɔ dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ o baa jigri nyundua ne harɛ naa, Korowii kontaala aa lɔ a ta dɛ won jigri la ɛɛ chɔgoo, ásɛ anɔ la aa wola won jigri la do le dɛɛ la.
Anomanta a chɛ kɛ yaa jam Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ waa gela ya do o Kora waa wola yiigi ta nɔ. A chɛ kɛ yaa tomɔ gɛ aa too o tea, dɛɛ tɛo duure dɛɛ ɔmɔ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya Korowii nɔ do kɛ nii aa wona dɛɛ chɔg kwaa kohona.
He nya biirii dɔŋa Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ ta, anomanta hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa saŋ bɛlbwa.
He bɛ soh kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ hɛɛ lɛ hɔɔhra dɛɛ nyiŋ ba kɛrɛdɛ. Bane ɛ gɛ dɛ nyiŋi nyundua toroma, dɛ baa jemɛ.
Hɛ́ɛ lii nɛra baa do ba dea waa kɛŋɔ he ne banee ba do dea ken. Hɛ́ɛ lii nɛra baa dɛ ɛɛ ba hɔhɔrɔwa ge waa kɛŋɔ he ge aa dɛ na weweele la bɛl ken.

A chɛ kɛ nomɛlbwa kpɔ duure dɛɛ tɛ hahmor, dɛ bɛ nɛmpɛɛne lawɛ dɛɛ chɔ dɛ ka ja ba haahna kɛɛ ba jaranar nɛ. Korowii ɛɛ tɛr nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wedoŋa baa ne haah chɔe be pera dɛɛ nyin ba dɔŋa haahna kɛɛ ba dɔŋa jaranar la deŋnee.
He bɛ gel suuga waa swɛɛ he siwi kohona. Hé gel anɔ la haa dɔa la magre he ne, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii bolɔ ŋɔ, "Maa heyaa ta bwa, maa sie laa kpɔ he nɛɛ bwa."
Anomanta yaa wonoo lɔ bambile ŋɔ, "N Naa Korowii dɛ cha mɛ, anomanta maa ɔmɛ. Ɛrɛɛ nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ ba wona ɛɛ mɛ nɔ?"
Hé nyiŋi he nomonome ba faa bol Korowii waa dɛɛ bagle heyaa la. Hé nyiŋi gɛ ba faa teŋɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ ta dɛ ba serewe, dɛɛ yarada Korowii gɛ ba faa dɛ yaradao la.
Yeesu Kristo aa begre. Gɛ waa doa a saŋ la la, gɛɛ o ta do fini, gɛɛ wɛɛ ba doe saŋ bɛlbwa.

He bɛ gel wefala chɔg he liire asɛ he le Korowii ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge la ta. He dɛ nyin he do kpegri Korowii nɛɛ teŋa ta naa, hé kpɔ sie dawɛ chae Korowii aa sune nɛra nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba la ta. He bɛ sie kpɔ dawɛ kondikwaare ane kii ne ane dii ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a ta wone cha nɛra baa kpɔ sie dawɛ a ta la.
Juda tena Sɔfore baa dɛ ɛ toma Korowii Dea bini la ta ŋwɛnɛ dɔe kɛŋɔ ba di ya saraha kwaa yaa dɛ di la ane.
Juda tena Sɔfore Nomoa dɛ ba chal ne saraha ɛɛ Korowii Bogoroŋ Tenten la aa, o dɛ jo a ne bela dɛ́ kpɔ soŋe o nɛra wechɔga. Kondɛɛra la baa ɛ a chal la te la, daharaa baa fuah.
Gɛ tentenee Yeesu ge na wahala dɛ sewɛ Jerusalam dahara, asɛ dɛ kpɔ o chal dɛ laa doŋa kpɔ nɛwɛnyina nɛɛ ásɛ ba ɛ Korowii nɛra.
Anomanta, hé gel ya la o be dahara bela, dɛ ka puu di o sihiih waa dia la,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ, ya ta bwɛɛ dɔe dɛ́ so o ta saŋ bɛlbwa harɛ bonɔ. Bwɛɛ o taa lɔ sie dɛɛ ba la, o taa ya sie dawɛ.
Anomanta a chɛ kɛ ya che Yeesu nɛɛ dɛ ɛ ya saraha dɛɛ tɛ Korowii saŋ bɛlbwa. Saraha yaa dɛ ba ɛɛ laanee kɛŋɔ yáa dɛɛ kpɛɛroo dɛɛ yerɛ o sɔn.
He bɛ dɔŋa wedɛɛga ɛɛ ne dɔŋa chae waa soh, dɛkalkɛŋɔ a gɛ waa nɔ ɛ saraha a waa aa dɛ lɛ Korowii sie.

Hɛ́ɛ no nɛra baa dɛ tɔ he sie la nyoa wa, dɛɛ ɛ waa baa ŋɔa hɛ́ɛ ɛ la, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ban dɛɛ nyiŋi heya. Ba dɔ nkontaah dɛ́ bu Korowii sie dɛ bagle gɛ bwa baa nyiŋi heya. Hɛ́ɛ no ba nyoa wa, ásɛ ba won ɛ toma silɛɛ ne. Dɛ haa ba nyoa waa no aa, baa ɛa tebinichɔg nee, aa wola tɔnɔ bɛlbwa lee ba dɛ tɛ heya.
Hé soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ yaa. Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya tea bini too, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyin kɛ yaa ɛ waa aa togra saŋ bɛlbwa.
N dɛ soŋe heyaa kohona ásɛ he soŋe Korowii ásɛ o ba n ne he be warane.

N dɛ soŋe Korowii waa ir ya Dɔɔ Yeesu seo ta la. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu ɛ Petegrejen dɛɛ nyiŋi o peera ta. Seo o gbagba aa sɛah dɛ sewɛ la, a taa a che asɛ Korowii fɔwɛ fɔo waa wola pura dɔe bwa la. Kórowii waa dɛ tɛ bambisɔɔhna la tɛ heyaa dadɛɛge aa chɛ kɛ he dɔ dɛ́ won dɛɛ ɛ o tetoora bwa. Ó che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ ɛ waa waa dɛ nyin bwa ya bini. Yeesu Kristo chɛ jam saŋ te bɛlbwa! Aamen.
Yabalawa, n dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ he lawɛ bambile dɛ no waa nɔ maa chwera dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ do heyaa gbemba nɔ. He nyiŋo na naa, tɔn nɔ maa chwerɛ heyaa nɔ aa jaŋɛ bɛlbwa.
N dɛ nyin he jemɛ kɛnaŋɔ ba le ya dɔŋ Timoti dea. O balɔ warane asɛ mɛɛ ba he be naa, n ne wɛɛ bao.
Ya dɛ na he nomonome la bwa, ne Korowii nɛra la bwa. Yabala Itali harɛ tena la ge dɛ na heya.
Kórowii cha he bwa sekwaraa.
Men Jems maa ɛ Korowii ne ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ laanee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he Israel deene fi dɛ anɛ tena haa lɔ bobɛlbwa la. N dɛ na heya.
Yabala, dɛ wobɛlbwa pu heyaa dɛ ɛ wekpega aa, hé gel he sie lɛ.
A chɛ kɛŋɔ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ dɛ wobɛlbwa pu heyaa he ta habɔɔ berɛ kpo Yeesu aa, anee dɛɛ ba gela he dɔ bambile dɛ won che kiŋkiŋ wobɛlbwa ta.
Hé dɔ bambile wobɛlbwa ta dɛ ka tonɛ, ásɛ dɛ won che a ta dɛ jemɛ wa, dɛ dɔ dadɛɛge, asɛ wobɛlbwa bɛ heyaa nya harɛ nɔ ta.
Dɛ wobɛlbwa pu heyaa hɛɛ nyin a wejema aa, hé soŋe Korowii asɛ o tɛ heya. O tea chɔ pɛɛ, waa nɛn kon tɛ o waa berɛ dɛɛ we o nɛ. Wɛɛ tɛ heyaa.

Kɛ hé kpɔ yarada dɛɛ soŋo, dɛ bɛ dɛɛ tɔŋle. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɔŋle kɛ o ken naa o konnyinii dɔ la, o ta yarada dɔe. O liire won bera warawara kɛŋɔ peu yon ta dɛɛ begre mpo nee dɛɛ kaa bobɛlbwa la.
Nɛn o liire aa ɛ anɛ la dɛ chole, o wobɛlbwa aa magre. Dɛ naate dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, o bɛ dɛɛ lii kɛŋɔ wɛɛ no o bee.
Dɛ he nyao dɛ ɛ Yeesu habɔteŋre aa, gel he sie lɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ɛ nɛnjen Korowii be.
Dɛ he ɛ dɔɔh ge aa, gel he sie lɛ kɛŋɔ he ne nyaa la bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ɛ nɛŋgwɛgre Korowii be. Haa bigri sewɛ kɛŋɔ kpɔga yon fe dɛ chure warane dɛ berɛ sewɛ la.
Gɛ wee yon le, dɛ lɔ, asɛ kpɔga sewɛ dɛ chure a fedɛɛga la ta, asɛ a wer tonɛ la, gɛ tentenee dɔɔh gee ba sewa o kwaa nyina ta, asɛ o kondɔɔh la bwa ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.

He bini bɛlbwa waa takapɔ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ na wahala la, o na som. Dɛ wenaale la kpoŋe la sie dɛ ba horɛ, kɛ he ta teŋɛ Korowii nɛɛ he bambile bwa ne naa, wɛɛ tɛɛ mkpa waa ŋɔa ŋɔ wɛɛ kpɔɔ tɛ nɛra baa dɛ nyinu la laanee, a ɛ kompoŋ haa yoa dɛ le ba vɔwɛ.
Dɛ waane pu nomɛl o ɛ wechɔga aa, o bɛ ŋɔ Korowiirii gela o ɛ wechɔga. Wobɛlbwa toole dɛ won gel Korowii ɛ wechɔga. Waa waane gee kpɔ ta ya nɛɛ ya ɛ wechɔga.
Dɛ waane pu nomɛl o ɛ wechɔga aa, o gbabir pɛla waa dɔa laanee gela o ɛ wechɔga.
Pɛla waa wola were la dɛ lolɛ wechɔga, asɛ wechɔga ge baa waraa, a yon lolɛ seo.
Yabala, he bɛ gel ba negre heya.

Komɛlbwa waa wera la le Korowii be. Komɛlbwa waa ɛ kondɛɛge la, Korowiirii kpɔa kɛ yaa. Onee ya Mɛɛ waa ta kwaa bwa aa lɔ nyundua dɛɛ chaah harɛ. Gɛ kwaa nɔ dɛ chaah, ane ta ge aa chaah, kɛ Korowii te aa begre bwa.
O gbagba tetooraa ya dɔ o waa aa ɛ kasinteŋ la dɛɛ no, dɛ che a ta ɛ o bii, ásɛ dɛ su o siwi kwaa waa taa la bwa bini.
Yabala, hɛ́ɛ lii waa nɔ aa teŋa nɔ. Hé gel he sie begre waa noe ta, dɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ mɔɔ dɛɛ bol wa, asɛ dɛ bɛ gel he baah nɛɛ di warawara.
Nɛwɛnyini bandia aa wobɛlbwa kwaa Korowii ŋwɛnɛdɛɛge teŋa ta.
Anomanta hé le wedoŋa ne wechɔga aa lɔ he bini dɛ gwaa he nɛɛ la ta, dɛ pwɛr he te, dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii waa la waa kpɔa do he bambili bini a won lɛ heyaa la.
He bɛ waa la no dɛ gel a ɛɛ. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, he dɛ negre he te. Hé ɛ gɛ waa la aa bagla la.
Nomɛlbwa waa no waa nɔ, waa wola gɛ waa la aa bagla la ɛ la, o do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ nyiŋi digi ta dɛɛ na o gbagba la.
Waa nyiŋi o te digi la ta dɛ na gɛ waa doa la, tamaa ken, dɛ o berɔ soh gɛ waa doa.
Korowii mmara wer, o gelɔ yaa dɔ ya te, waa yaa vɔrɔwe. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ no dɛɛ pese o bini, waa wola soh dɛɛ ɛ gɛ waa bagla la, Korowii ɛɛ nyiŋi naate nɛɛ o we-ɛɛla bwa taa.
Dɛ nomɛl dɛ lii kɛ o ɛ Korowii torome, dɛ o ta nyotɔgbom dɔe yaa, o dɛ negre o nyu. Naate Korowii toma la ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ.
Waa Korowii waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ aa dɛ nyin a do wer dɛ magre o toma bini laanee kɛŋɔ, yá cha bilalbii ne luhaahna ba wahala bini, asɛ dɛ laa ya te kpɔ harɛ nɔ wechɔga ta.
Yabala, haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ jirima Dɔɔ nɔ, a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ he duu nɛra bane dɛ gwaa bane.
Dɛ he ne he bala chemo dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii, nɛra banɛ ba jo he bini, bɛl do suugaswɛm kwaa dɛ tɔ yadɛɛge, bɛl ge tɔ yadoŋ,
asɛ he tɛ onɔ la waa do suugaswɛm kwaa dɛ tɔ yadɛɛge la sobɔrdɛɛge, dɛ ŋɔ onɔ la waa tɔ yadoŋ la be ŋɔ, ó te che bela kɛɛ ó ba so harɛ he sie naa,
amɔ dɛ he dɛ duu bane dɛ gwaa bane. Nɛra sie bɔree hɛɛ nyiŋi dɛɛ duu bane dɛɛ nyiŋi bane nyubaahna. Haa kɛrɛdɛ ɛ.
Yabala, hé no! Korowii we-ɛɛlaa kɛŋɔ o le harɛ nɔ ta nyaara baa yaradao kɛrɛdɛ asɛ ba yarada la ɛɛ ba kondɔɔh, asɛ ba dɔ bɔr dɛ ja o Kora waa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ geloo nɛra baa dɛ nyinu ja o ta la.
Kɛ he te lawɛ nyaara sie tegɛ harɛ. Dɔɔhna laa dɛɛ fiigi heya, dɛ lawɛ heyaa kaa che kɔɔto la aa?
Gɛ nɛra nɔ laa dɛɛ bol wechɔga dɛɛ yagɛ Yeesu sɔndɛɛge nɔ baa kpɔa dawɛ heyaa la aa? Kɛ banee hɛɛ duu la!
Dɛ he dɛ teŋɛ Korowii Kora mmara baa chwera ŋɔ, "Nyin he dɔŋ kɛ he te gbagba la" ta naa, dɛ he dɛ ɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
Kɛ dɛ he dɛ duu nɛra bane dɛ gwaa bane aa, dɛ he dɛ ɛ wechɔga. Mmara baglɔ kɛŋɔ he di bolchɔge.
Nomɛlbwa waa teŋɛ Mmara la bwa ta kɛ dɛ to o bini beŋkpoŋ la, dɛ o to o bwa, dɛ di bolchɔge.
Korowiirii bagla ŋɔ, "Bɛ jwamane bɔ." O tentenee bera bagle kɛ "Bɛ nɛn kpo." Dɛ he ta jwamane bɔe dɛ kpo nɛn naa, dɛ he ɛ nɛn haa to Mmara.
Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ ba ya waa bola o Kora mmara waa kpɔa lɛ yaa asɛ ya dɔ ya te la ne. Anomanta hé nyiŋi he nyoo wobol ne he we-ɛɛla ta kɛrɛdɛ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii aa naate waa wola o dɔŋ sum na la sumii na awola waa dɛɛ bol ya waa la. Naate waa dɛ na o dɔŋ sum la aa o waa bola ɔmɛ.
Yabala, dɛ nomɛl ŋɔ o dɛ yarada Korowii, dɛ o ta o yarada kpɔe dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga aa, tɔnɔ besoo o yarada la dɔɔ? A gɛ yarada nɔ ɛɛ wonoo lɛo waa?
He nao kɛŋɔ he dɔŋ baa kɛɛ haah dɛ chɔ waa, dɛɛ nyin yal dɛ́ tɔ, dɛɛ nyin kondikwaa ge dɛ́ di,
asɛ he ŋɔ o be ŋɔ, "Kórowii tɛɛ bokpega dɛ tɛɛ bosɔɔhna," dɛ vɔmɔ kwaa aa tɛo bokpega la te naa, dɛ tɔnɔ besoo lɔ waa haa bola tɛo la ta nɔ?
Gɛɛ a do yarada ta kɛŋɔ dɛ nɛn ta wedɛɛga ɛɛ dɛɛ ja o yarada ta naa, dɛ o yarada la ɛ wepuu.

Bɛl lole nomɛl ɛɛ ŋɔɔ yaradae gboo wɛɛ yarada Korowii, asɛ bɛl ge ŋɔ wedɛɛgaa o gee ɛ. Kɛ gɛ ge aa won magre. Ɛrɛɛ hɛɛ ba wona bag mɛ he yarada dɛ he ta wedɛɛga ɛɛ dɛɛ ja a ta nɔ? N te, mɛɛ che n wedɛɛga ɛɛ taa asɛ he jemɛ kɛ n dɛ yarada Korowii.
He dɛ yarada kɛŋɔ Korowii beŋkpoŋii lole naa? A wer ga! Kɛ he ne Bɔnsam toromaa soge dabeŋkpoŋ ta. Ba gba dɛ yarada Korowii ɔmee ne bochela ne.
Gɛne! He dɛ nyin n bagle kɛŋɔ yarada wedɛɛga ɛɛ aa wola a ta jae la ɛ pɛɛpɛɛ aa?
Ya naa Abraham fe aa dɛ ba o bie Aesek kpoe dɛ tɛ Korowii la, a ta laa a che Korowii ŋɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi la aa?
He ta nae kɛŋɔ o yarada ne o wedɛɛga ɛɛ bwa aa pɛ aa? O wedɛɛga ɛɛ taa a che o yarada ɛ yarada kasinteŋ.
Belaa Korowii Tɔn waa la ɛ kpela kɛŋɔ baa ŋɔa ŋɔ, "Abraham yarada Korowii, asɛ o yarada nomanta Korowii ŋɔ o ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi" la. Dɛ ba dɛ yerɔ Korowii dam.
Kɛ he nao kenɛ, nɛn wedɛɛga ɛɛ ne o yarada bwa taa a che wɛɛ ɛ nɛndɛɛge o wa ɛɛ su Korowii siwi, o yarada gbo ta laa.

Gɛ tentenee a do hanjwamane baa dɛ yerɔ Rahab la gba nɛ. Israel tena toroma bane aa bala dɛ fe ba sɔh hweli o bwɛɛ harɛ waane dɛ́ ka taa ba bwɛɛ tena be la, o lɛɛ ba sɔh dɛ bag ba ŋwɛnɛfale ba chwa kaa. Gɛ wedɛɛga nɔ taa a che Korowii ŋɔ o ge ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su o siwi.
Anomanta gɛ nɛn ta hweera dɔe yaa dɛ o sewɔ la, gɛɛ yarada wedɛɛga ɛɛ aa wola a ta jae la ɛ yaradapuu.
Yabala, he bwa laa chɛ kɛ he gel he sie begre Korowii waa bagla ta, dɛkalkɛ gɛ haa jema la, ya nɛra yaa dɛ bagle Korowii waa la waa binii wɛɛ ba nyiŋa kɛrɛdɛ gwaa nɛra baa kaa la.
Ya bwa dɛ koni saŋ bɛlbwa. Dɛ nɛn aa wobɛlbwa waa dɛ bol la ta koni aa, dɛ o ɛ nɛŋkaih tenten. Nɛn waa won o wobol nyiŋa la, o won o te lawa wobɛlbwa ta.
Ya kpɔ bune dɛɛ do jagre nyoo ásɛ aa no ya wa, asɛ ya won a bera dɛɛ kaa bela bwa yaa dɛ nyin.
Yá ta sie na gɛ stiimae aa kana asɛ peukpeg yon ta dɛ kpɔɔ dɛɛ kaa, kɛ dajegaa bɛlee lɔ o ta ba kpɔ dɛɛ menɛ o sie asɛ wɛɛ kaa bela bwa baa dɛ nyin.
Gɛɛ nyondoŋe do jegaa nɛn bini, kɛ dɛ won wejena ɛɛ. Hé na gɛ kɔr aa doa asɛ nihɔl won o fuih.
Nyondoŋe do kɛŋɔ nihɔl ken, dɛ won wechɔga ɛɛ taeh ya bini, dɛ won yaa chɔga ya soga bini bwa. Bɔnsam niinii dɛɛ choŋu.
Kpɔg bini ola ne olchɔga ne jumbii ne kwaa aa dɛ huuh ne mpo bini pɛŋa bwa, nɛn won a dɛɛra á do pwɛre.
Kɛ nyondoŋe te, nomɛlbwa toole dɛ won o nyiŋa. O ɛ konchɔge haa wola won togro. O dɛ kpo kɛŋɔ tɛgchɔga ken.
O nee yaa jam Korowii waa ɛ ya Naa ne ya Mɛɛ la, dɛ berɛ kpɔ o tenten dɛɛ taah ya dɔŋa Korowii aa ta ba kɛŋɔ o tenten la.
Nyoa beŋkpoŋ la taa wobodɛɛga ne taahna bwa ɛɛ le. Yabala, a ta chɛ kɛŋɔ aa ba gɛ!
Nenabɔɔ ɛɛ wonoo palɛ, o nee ane do som asɛ ane ge do nyɛgre aa?
Yabala, pur da ɛɛ wonoo nɔnɛ sombie aa, kɛɛ bambi ɛɛ wonoo nɔnɛ pur nɔna aa? Gɛ tentenee nenabɔɔ o nee aa do nyɛgre la aa wola won berɛ do som bug ta tenten.
He bini umee ɛ wejereme dɛɛ no waa mun ɔ? Gel o pwɛr o te dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga ásɛ o da bagle kɛ o ɛ wejereme.
Dɛ he dɛ nyin kɛ he gbo dɔ, dɛ dɔ bɔweela ne sibegra he bambile bini naa, amɔ he bɛ sɔn dɛɛ nyin dɛɛ ŋɔ he dɔ wejema. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, dɛ he ta kasinteŋ dɔe.
Gɛ wejema nɔ ta Korowii doa wejema ɛɛ, a ɛ harɛ ta kwa. Korowii Domadɛɛge toole a ta. Bɔnsam liiree.
Anomanta bela bɔweela ne n gbo dɔ aa lole la, belaa wesagasagare ne wedoŋa bwa do.

Nɛn waa dɔ Korowii doa wejema la, kenii o da do: O waa do kaih, o waa dɔ deŋnesɔɔhna, o pwɛre, o dɛ no o dɔŋ wa, o dɛ na o dɔŋ sum, o ɛ nɛndɛɛge, o we-ɛɛla bwa wer, waa nɛra bane duure dɛɛ gwaa bane, o tea too.
Nɛra baa dɛ nyin deŋnesɔɔhna la, nyopɛo nee baa ɛ ba wa, aa le wedɛɛga.
Bɔkwaa dɛɛ ba nagra ne he baah ta nɔ? Kwaa haa dɛ pɛlɛ a nɛɛ laa dɛɛ ba a ne naa? Anee dɛɛ yo heya.
Kwaa haa dɛ nyin haa wola dɔ la waa hɛɛ kpoo dɔŋa la. He dɛ nyin kwaa sibegra ne, kɛ haa dɔ, a waa gela hɛɛ nagre dɛɛ yo la. Haa wola Korowii soŋe la waa haa wola he konnyina dɔ la.
He dɛ soŋo, kɛ haa dɔ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ liire haa chegɛ a ta dɛɛ soŋo la aa were. He gbogbo konnyina ne kwaa haa dɛ pɛlɛ a nɛɛ waa hɛɛ soŋo.

He nɛnchɔga nɔ haa vɛh Korowii kɛŋɔ hanchɔge waa dɛ nyin baala nɔ! Haa jemɛ kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ nyin harɛ nɔ ta kwaa la vɛh Korowii dɛ ɛ o dɔm kɛɛ? Nomɛlbwa waa daŋre harɛ nɔ ta kwaa nyina ne la vɛh Korowii.
Kɛ he dɛ lii kɛŋɔ pɛɛpɛɛ Korowii Tɔn la ŋɔ lileo Korowii aa kpɔa do ya bini la dɛ mee la?
Kɛ chae Korowii aa na ya sum dɛɛ cha yaa la, on kpega, gɛ Korowii Tɔn la aa bagla ŋɔ, "Korowii dɛ ba nɛra baa dɛ ɛ sɔnnyin la ne harɛ, dɛɛ cha nɛra baa dɛ pwɛr ba te."
Anomanta hé kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii asɛ dɛ no o be. Hé yo Bɔnsam. Wɛɛ chwao le he be.
Hé suuh tel Korowii, asɛ o suuh ba he be. Wechɔg-ɛɛra, hé charɛ he liire dɛ le he wechɔga ta. He banɔ la he liire aa ɛ anɛnɛ la, hé laa doŋa kpɔ he nɛ.
Hé gel he tea bini chɔg, he wi. Hé gel he mama berɛ wii asɛ he silɛɛ ge berɛ sum.
Hé pwɛr he te tɛ Korowii. Wɛɛ gɔɔ heyaa.

Yabala, he bɛ he bala dɛɛ ŋwalɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa ŋwalɛ o dɔŋ kɛɛ dɛ pwaoh la, dɛ Mmara laanee o ŋɔ aa were dɛɛ pwah la. Dɛ he bol waa dɛɛ yagɛ Mmara la aa, amɔ te dɛ haa waa Mmara la aa bagla la ɛ. Dɛ he dɛ gɔɔ he te dɛɛ pwah Mmara la.
Korowii gbosoroo dɛ won do mmara dɛ won bol nɛn wechɔga wa, o gbosoroo dɛ won lɛ nɛra dɛ won chɔg bane ge. He gee umeo dɛ́ won bol he dɔŋ bwara wechɔge ɔ?
Hé berɛ dɛɛ no. He banɔ la haa dɛ lii he nyuune bini dɛɛ ŋɔ, "Fini kɛɛ tɔpere nɔ tɔpesoo yaa la bwɛɛ nɔ bwɛsoo taa dɛ ka di benanyoa dɛɛ di bona dɛ nyin kwa,"
kɛ dɛ he ge aa jemɛ gɛ tɔɔ aa dɛ ba he pera la! Gɛ kɔɔle yon ta, kɛ aa bigri dɛ yon kaa la, gɛɛ he mkpa do.
Anomanta a fe chɛ kɛŋɔ he ŋɔ, "Dɛ Korowii sɛoh dɛ tɛ yaa ŋwɛnɛ te naa, tɔɔ perɔ yaa ka ɛ kenii kɛɛ anɔɔ."
Kɛ taraken he dɛ ɛ mbarafo kɛ he gbo ɛɛ wonoo ɛ gɛ haa dɛ nyin. A gɛ waa la bwa ɛ wechɔga.
Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa jemɛ waa aa wera kɛŋɔ o ɛ, dɛ vɛh ɛɛ la, dɛ o ɛ wechɔga.
Kondɔɔhna ge, hé no n be! Waa aa dɛ ba heyaa pui la nomanta, hé dooge lɔŋɔre dɛɛ wi.
He kondɔɔh chɔgɔ, kwaa di he bwara laala bwa.

He suugaswɛm ne suugapoŋa bwa ge deero. Awola Korowii aa dɛ ba he waa bola la, he suugare aa deera la ɛɛ ɛ danseɛ kɛŋɔ he ɛ wechɔga, dɛ we heyaa kɛŋɔ nii ken. Bɔkwaa hɛɛ cheg suuga waa bwa jaga tɔpere nɔ ta dɛ́ ɛɔ?
Hɛ́ɛ no! Nɛra haa kpɔ ba, ba ɛ he kooni tomare he ta ban kem bɔe dɛ faah ba la dɛ wi he tɛl. A gɛ nɛra la wii chole Korowii waa ɛ komɛlbwa Dɔɔ la deŋna ta.
He dɔ sobɔrdɛɛge harɛ nɔ ta dɛ so, dɛɛ di he bwara. Gɛ haa dɛ di he bwara la, he do kɛŋɔ kondɛɛre baa ku kpɔga dɛɛ tɛo ó di dɛ je bá kpoo la.
He pa nɛndɛɛga ba wa aa do kaih la bolchɔge dɛ kpoo ba, ba ta wone ɛ wobɛlbwa dɛ́ lɛ ba te.
Kɛ yabala, hé lawɛ bambile dɛ ka tel gɛ saŋ ya Dɔɔ la aa ba. Hé na gɛ paa yon so kpa bwaala logla á nɛ ó du o kwa, dɛ lawɛ bambile asɛ yoo ge yo mɔɔ o koo kwaa la yon ɛ la.
Gɛ tentenee chɛ kɛŋɔ he ge lawɛ bambile dɛ che kiŋkiŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he Dɔɔ la bala telo.
Yabala, he bɛ dɔŋa waa dɛɛ nagre asɛ dɛ ba di bolchɔge Korowii sie. Ya bole pae dɛ tel.
Yabala, hé nyiŋi Korowii keamere la baa chegɛ o sɔn ta dɛ bol waa bagle nɛra la na, dɛ na gɛ baa na wa, kɛ dɛ won lawɛ bambile ba wahala ta la. Hé ge ɛ gɛ.

Ya dɛ yerɛ nɛra baa wona lawɛ bambile dɛ che kiŋkiŋ la silɛɛ tena. He fa no Job wa, gɛ waa wona lawɛ bambile dɛ che kiŋkiŋ o wahala bini ka tonɛ, asɛ a habɔɔ Korowii chao. Nɛra waa dɛ domɛ Korowii tea wɛɛ sune ba nɛ.

Yabala, anɔ la aa jaa dɛ ɛ siswɛm waa laanee kɛ he bɛ Korowii kɛɛ harɛ kɛɛ komɛlbwa dɛɛ ŋwɛɛ. Ba dɛ bɔɔ heyaa waa dɛ a ɛ kpela aa, hé sɛh ŋɔ, "Ɔɔh," dɛ nyosone gee yaa, hé ŋɔ, "Ɔɔhɔ." He bɛ ŋwɛɛ ja, asɛ a bɛ wechɔga ɛ dɛ tɛ heya.
Dɛ sibegrewaane pu bɛlbwa naa, wɛ́ɛ soŋe Korowii. Dɛ silɛɛ waane ge pui naa, go yela dɛ kpɛɛ Korowii.
Dɛ he bini bɛlbwa ge bwara dɛ weo waa, ó tomɛ nɛn o ka yerɛ asɔre la bini nomonome ásɛ ba ba ba kpɔ noo lege o tile Yeesu sɔn ta, dɛ soŋe Korowii tɛo.
Dɛ ba kpɔ yarada dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, weela te la ɛɛ dɔ bokpegaa. Ya Dɔɔ la ɛɛ geloo o bwara do kpegri. Dɛ wechɔga anee o ɛ kwaraa naa, Korowii ɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛo.

Anomanta a wer kɛŋɔ he bol he wechɔga dɛɛ bagle he bala he ne baa teŋɛ Yeesu nɛɛ la, ásɛ ba ge won dɛ soŋe Korowii dɛɛ tɛ heya, ásɛ o tɛ heyaa bokpega, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛndɛɛge dɛ soŋe Korowii aa, o dɛ no dɛ ɛ dɛɛ tɛo.
Korowii keame Elaeja fa ɛ nɛn kɛŋɔ yan. O soŋe Korowii taeh dɛ ŋɔ ó gel bwaala nɛɛ, asɛ bwaala ta nɛɛ, hwel che bene atoro korobie anumɛl.
Asɛ o berɛ soŋe Korowii ja dɛ ŋɔ ó gel bwaala nɛ, asɛ nyundua pili, bwaala nɛ taeh, harɛ ta kwaa bwa le.
Yabala, dɛ he bini bɛl nyogrɔ le kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la ta, asɛ he bini bɛl ge won berɛ chao dɛ baglo asɛ o berɛ ba teŋɛ kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ la ta ja aa, dɛ naate waa chao la ɛ waa taeh.
Hé jemɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa wona cha wechɔg-ɛɛ asɛ o gel wechɔga ɛɛ dɛ berɛ baa ɛ wedɛɛga ja la, dɛ naate lɛ wechɔg-ɛɛ la nyu, dɛ gel o wechɔga damanta bwa waa ɛa la, Korowii kpɔ kɛo.
Men Pita maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he Korowii nɛra haa pegra dɛ ka ɛ hɔɔhra Pɔntos ne Galaasia ne Kapadoosia ne Eesia ne Bitiinia harɛre ta la.

Korowii waa ɛ ya Mɛɛ chegɛ jema waa jemɛ heyaa wubwa la ta dɛ le heyaa kɛŋɔ o nɛra dɛ tɛ o te. O Domadɛɛge laanee gela he do goroŋ, dɛ gel hɛɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo waa ta, asɛ o chal yagle he doŋa he nɛ. Kórowii cha heyaa dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna kohona.
Hé gel ya kpɔ jam tɛ Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo Mɛɛ Korowii. Waa dɛ sune ya nɛɛ kohona nomanta, o chegɛ ira waa ir Yeesu Kristo seo ta la ta dɛ gel ya ɛ nɛnfala. Anɔ gelɔ ya dɔ hwɛga aa awola jaga dɔe bwa.
Ya dɛ hwɛgɛ kondɔɔh waa kwaara cheg yaa la ta kɛŋɔ aa ɛ ya kwaa. O kwaa a bwa cheg heyaa Korowii doa, belaa aa wola pɔh, aa wola chɔg, aa wola tu bwa.
He chegaa a che. He yarada nomanta Korowii kpɔ o kpegri tɔ he nɛ, wobɛlbwa aa wola won ɛ heyaa ka tel kɛŋɔ waa ba lɛ heya. O ɛ lɛɛ waa ba lɛ heyaa la wobɛlbwa tonɛ, dɛ́ lɛ heyaa waa bwa jaga saŋ.
Anomanta he dɔ silɛɛ kohona, kɛ he tea bini ɛɛ chɔgoo tama te, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Bɔnsam ɛɛ daah heyaa daahna bwa soosiwii na.

A bwa dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ he yarada la ɛ yarada kasinteŋ. Suugaswɛm kwaraa nɔ, nii nee baa jemɛ a kasinteŋ, kɛ a dɛ chɔg. He yarada la gwaa suugaswɛm, anomanta a chɛ kɛ ba daah heyaa na ásɛ he won che kiŋkiŋ. Belaa baa ba heyaa kpɛɛra, asɛ he dɔ jirima, dɛ dɔ sɔn awola Yeesu Kristo aa ba ya nao la.
He ta on nae ka, kɛ he dɛ nyinu. Taraken gba, haa on na, kɛ he dɛ yaradao. Anomanta he sie dɛ lɛ kohona nɛn aa wola won bagle a wa.
He yarada dɔ mun. A gelɔ Korowii ɛɛ lɛ heya, wɛɛ lɛ heyaa ka tonɛ.
He lɛɛ nɔ, Korowii keamere fa dɛ bagle gɛ Korowii aa dɛ ba he nɛɛ suna dɛ lɛ heyaa la wa, asɛ dɛ swɛɛ siwi dɛ pese Korowii waa waa bola la dɛ́ jemɛ a bini kɛrɛdɛ.
Dɛ Kristo Doma soge ba nɛɛ dɛɛ bagle wahala Kristo aa dɛ ba nae, dɛ bagle jirima aa dɛ ba bala wahala la habɔɔ. Ba takapɔ kɛŋɔ bá fee won jemɛ tɔpere aa dɛ ba chiga, ne gɛ aa dɛ ba ɛɛ.

Korowii gelɔ a gɛ keamere la jemɛ kɛŋɔ ba koeh baa dɛ koh la, ba laa dɛ di a tɔnɔ, heyaa ba koh dɛɛ tɛ. Waa haa noa taraken dɛ le Amanesoma baa bola he be la ta la, ban fa bola. Korowii Domadɛɛge waa tomɔ ya be laanee cha ba ba bola he be la. Korowii nyundua toroma kwaraa dɛ nyin a gɛ waa nɔ dɛ́ jemɛ.
Anomanta hé ir nyu ne dɛ gel he sie chɔ harɛ. Hé kpɔ he hwɛga bwa do chae Yeesu Kristo aa cha heyaa awola waa ba nɛra bwa nao la ta.
Haa ɛ Korowii bii dɛɛ no o deŋna waa nomanta, he bɛ he pɛlchɔga waa he faa lɔ biro ta dɛɛ teŋɛ a ta la dɛɛ ɛ.
Gɛ Korowii waa le heyaa tɛ o te aa do goroŋ la, hé ge do goroŋ gɛ he we-ɛɛla bwa ta,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Hé do goroŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ n do goroŋ."
Korowii waa wola nɛn sie bɔr nyiŋe dɛ bol waa dɛɛ pa bole la, onee he wi dɛɛ yerɔ he Mɛɛ la. Anomanta hé kpɔ he te kɛ hɔɔhra he soga bini harɛ bonɔ, dɛɛ tɛo duure, dɛɛ ɔmɔ.
He jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii aa lɛ heyaa le he naanar wesale he faa lɔ a ta la ta la, harɛ bonɔ kwaa aa dɛ chɔg kɛŋɔ suugapoŋ kɛɛ suugaswɛm ne laa o yawɛ heya.
Yeesu waa do kɛ saraha pebie doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole o nɛ, waa wola kirihiah bobɛlbwa dii la, o gbagba chal nee Korowii yawɛ heya.
Korowii aa leo ŋɔ ó ɛ a gɛ toma nɔ, dɛ ba ta nyundua ne harɛ tae mɔɔ. Kɛ he waa o koh dɛ gel o ba harɛ nɛra nao, tɔpera aa ka mun nɔ ta la.
O nɛɛ a che he yarada Korowii. Korowii gee iru seo ta dɛ tɛo jirima. Anomanta he yarada ne he hwɛga haa dɛ hwɛgɛ la, Korowii nɛɛ a bwa do.
Taraken nɔ haa sɛh kasinteŋ la ta teŋa, asɛ a che a ta he doŋa le he nɛɛ hɛɛ nyin dɔŋa kɛrɛdɛ nɔ, hé den dɛɛ nyin dɔŋa kohona bambile bwa ne,
dɛkalkɛ ba berɔ kwaa lolɛ heyaa nɛnfala. Nɛn waa dɛ sewɛ la dwee laa heyaa kpa, Korowii waa wola sewɛ bwa la dweee heya. Korowii Waa aa dɛ tɛ mkpa dɛ do le saŋ bɛlbwa la taa a che ba kwaa lolɛ heya.
Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛwɛnyini bwa do kɛ kpɔga, ba jirima ge do kɛ kpɔga fee. Kpɔga dɛ sewɛ, a fee gee lee.
Kɛ Korowii Waa te lole saŋ bɛlbwa." A gɛ waa nɔɔ Amanesoma baa bola bagle heyaa la.
Anomanta hé le wechɔga bɛlbwa kɛŋɔ dɔŋa negra bɛlbwa, ne nɛra sie nyiŋa dɛɛ ɛ wa, ne bɔweela ne nɛra waa bola bɛlbwa sese ta.
Hé gel he siwi swɛɛ Korowii Waa la noe ta kɛŋɔ bechasɔɔhne siwi yon swɛɛ elnee ta la, a che a ta he won kpeg he lɛɛ waa la ta.
He dagɛ ya Dɔɔ la na taraken dɛ na kɛ o wer.
O te ɛ Bwe waa dɔ mkpa. Nɛwɛnyini liiru konsala dɛ vɛoh, kɛ onee Korowii te nyiŋi kɛ o ɛ Bwedɛɛge o wa aa hiah dɛɛ nyinu. Haa ba o be nɔ,
he ge do kɛ bwea aa dɔ mkpa. Hé gel o kpɔ heyaa ma Korowii Dea ásɛ he ɛ Korowii Sɔfore haa do goroŋ, asɛ dɛ che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛɛ tomɛ Korowii bambile bwa ne a ɛ saraha dɛɛ su o siwi.
Ba chwerɛ Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Na, n pɛne Bwedɛɛge o wa aa hiah, dɛ kpɔ pa n dea mun Saayɔn o lawɔ kpoŋe. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ yaradao la, waa sihiih di bwa."

He nɛra haa dɛ yaradao ge be la, wɛɛ ɛ Bwedɛɛge o wa aa hiaah tɛ heya. Asɛ nɛra baa wola on yaradae ge la, wɛɛ ɛ gɛ baa chwera Korowii Tɔn bini laanee ba be, kɛŋɔ: "Bwe la mamaala aa vɛah la, onee bera lawɛ dea kpoŋe la,"
dɛ ɛ gɛ baa bera chwerɛ o waa ŋɔ, "Bwe waa dɛ ba gela nɛra lɔ naa dɛ chogli laanee la." Ba vɛh Korowii waa la ta teŋa, an gela baa lɔ na. Korowiirii chega gɛ.
Kɛ he te la, Korowiirii le heya. O Kora Sɔforee heyaa. He do goroŋ. He ɛ o nɛra waa le heyaa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ bol o nyokpowaa waa ɛa. On le he ne biro ta dɛ ba he ne o bochaah waa wera kohona la ta.
He fa ta Korowii nɛra ɛɛ, kɛ taraken te, o nɛraa heya. O fa ta he sum nae, kɛ taraken te, o na he sum.

N dandɛɛga, n dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ haa ɛ hɔɔhra bonɔ, bonɔ aa wola he bwɛɛ ɛɛ nɔ, hé laa he te kpɔ he bwadabii pɛlchɔga ta. Anee dɛɛ vuugi heyaa haa wola won ɛ waa Korowii aa kpɔa do he bambile bini la.

Haa lɔ nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ baah nɔ, hé gel he wobɛlbwa togre, asɛ dɛ ba dɛ bol he waa ŋɔ he ɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra aa, a habɔɔ la, bá na he we-ɛɛla kɛŋɔ a wer, dɛ kpɔ jam tɛ Korowii awola waa ba ya ne o na dɔŋa la.
Hé koh ya Dɔɔ la waa dɛ pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ nomonome baa cheg ba harɛ bonɔ bwa, he harɛ bwa nyu waa chɔ wobɛlbwa nyoa,
ne o ge nɛra waa lee ba ŋɔ báa tɛr wechɔg-ɛɛra deŋne dɛɛ kpɛɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ waa a ŋwɛnɛ ta la.
Korowii dɛ nyin kɛ hɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛ́ won dɛɛ tɔ gɛna ŋwɛnɛ ba bɛ won bol gɛnewaa dɛɛ chɔg heya.
Hé so kɛŋɔ nɛra haa dɔ he te haa wola yoma ɛɛ. Kɛ he bɛ dɔe haa dɔ he te la kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga. Hé gel nɛra na kɛŋɔ Korowii bonɔɔna ne tolii heyaa he soga bini.
Hɛ́ɛ tɛ nomɛlbwa duure, dɛɛ nyin he bala baa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo la. Hɛ́ɛ ɔmɛ Korowii, dɛ kpɔ duure dɛɛ tɛ he harɛ bwa nyu.
He banɔ la baa dɛ do heyaa bonɔɔna kɛɛ toli la, hé pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ he dɔɔranar dɛɛ duu ba. He dɔɔranar ba tea aa soma ba do pwɛre gbo laa n ŋɔ. Hɛ́ɛ duu banɔ la ba nyu bini aa kpega gba.
Maa dɛ ŋɔ nɔ, naate baa dɛ fiigu aa wola a ŋwɛnɛ ta ɛɛ, asɛ o koh Korowii waa dɛ won lawɛ bambile la, a wer dɛɛ lɛ Korowii sie.
Haa ɛ wechɔga, asɛ dɛ lawɛ bambile ba lɔɔre a waa la, bɔkwa sɔnee lɔ he bambile lawa la ta nɔ? He ɛ wedɛɛga, ba garɛ koh a waa dɛɛ ɛɛ hɔhɔrɔwa he lawɛ bambile aa, a ɛ sɔn dɛɛ tɛɛ Korowii be.
A gɛ waa nɔɔ Korowii le heyaa ŋɔ hɛɛ na, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo koh he waa dɛ na wahala, asɛ a chɔ tɛ heyaa kɛŋɔ hɛɛ lawɛ bambile he wahala ta. Ba chwerɔ ŋɔ,
"O ta wechɔga ɛɛ bwa. Nyosonwaa ta o nyoa leɛ bwa."
Ba faa dɛ chɛgro chɛgtɔrɔ la bwa la, o ta nyoa pile chɛgɛ nomɛlbwa. Ba faa dɛ ɛo hɔhɔrɔwa la bwa la, o ta nomɛlbwa aahrɛ. O kpɔ a bwa tɛ Korowii waa dɛ bol nɛra bwa waa dɛɛ pa bole kasinteŋ ne la.
O gbagba lɛ ya wechɔga dawɛ o nɛ, dɛ na wahala dagagre ta, asɛ ya bɛ so tɛ wechɔga, dɛ so tɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ. Pirae baa pirao la taa a che he dɔ bokpega.
He fa do kɛ peera aa kpaŋa, kɛ taraken te, he ba he Dɔɔ waa dɛ nyiŋi he nyu la be.
He haahna ge, hé pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ he jaranar. Dɛ he dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, he banɔ la he jaranar aa wola Korowii waa yaradae la, he we-ɛɛla ɛɛ geloo ba yarada. Haa nyoa kwaraa pili bol wa,
dɛkalkɛ baa na gɛ he we-ɛɛla aa wera doŋa bɛlbwa aa wola toole a ta, ne gɛ haa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii.
Gɛ haa dɛ ɛ he nyumpona, ne suugaswɛm koŋkwaare kɛŋɔ baŋa kwaa ne deŋna kwaa doe, ne laala haa dɛ do laa dɛ gel he do wer toli.
Hé gel nɛra na he wer waa aa lɔ bambile bini siwi aa wola an na la ta. Hé do pwɛre, dɛɛ ɛ waa bɔeh. Anee wer aa wola tu bwa, dɛ do wer kohona Korowii be.
A saŋ la haahna ba faa dɛ tomɛ Korowii kasinteŋ ne dɛɛ yaradao la, dɛ ba pwɛr ba te dɛɛ tɛ ba jaranar. Anee ba ge wer.
Dɛ gɛɛ Abraham haah Saara ge do. O pwɛr o te tɛ o jaa dɛ faa yerɔ o dɔɔ. He waa togrɔ, haa ɔmɛ ge aa, ate Saara biirii heya.

Baala ge, gɛɛ a chɛ kɛ he dɔ liire he ne he haahna soga bini, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ baa kpege kɛŋɔ heya. Hɛ́ɛ duu ba, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he ne ba bwaa dɛɛ ba Korowii mkpa waa cha heyaa hɛɛ ba dɔe la dɔe. Hɛ́ɛ ɛ ken ásɛ wobɛlbwa bɛ he Korowii soŋa ŋwɛnɛ tɔ.
Waa maa dɛ nyin n bol laanee kɛŋɔ hé gel he nyoa pɛ, hé dɔ dɔŋa chal, hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa kɛŋɔ nyabii, dɛɛ sune dɔŋa nɛ, dɛ pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa.
He bɛ wechɔga kpɔ dɛɛ bɔ wechɔga kem. He bɛ wobochɔga kpɔ dɛɛ bɔ wobochɔga kem. Nɛn ɛɛ wechɔga aa, soŋe andɛɛga tɛo. Korowii aa le heyaa la, dɛ́ hɛ́ɛ ɛ gɛ ásɛ o tɛ heyaa hɛɛra.
Ba chwerɔ do Korowii Tɔn bini ŋɔ, "Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin mkpajaŋ, dɛɛ nyin kɛ o bwara sɔɔhno la, wɛ́ɛ nyiŋi o nyoa kɛrɛdɛ. O bɛ wobochɔga dɛɛ bol, o bɛ nyosone dɛɛ teŋe.
Wɛ́ɛ ke o te wechɔga ta, dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga. Ó swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ ɛ waa aa dɛ ba nyopɛo ne.
A do gɛ, dɛkalkɛ nɛra ba we-ɛɛla aa wera dɛ su Korowii siwi la, Korowii dɛ nyiŋ ba, dɛɛ no ba wesoŋa. Kɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wechɔga te, o ne baa jo."
He siwi swɛɛ wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta naa, umee dɛɛ ba he hae yɔ?
He dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga a che a ta hɛɛ na waa kwara naa, dɛ he ta som nae yaa? A ba gɛ naa, bɛ nɛra baa dɛ hae la ɔmɛ. Bɛ gel a hae.
Hɛ́ɛ duu Yeesu Kristo dɛɛ ɔmɔ he bambile bini kɛŋɔ he Dɔɔree on. Hé kpɔ he te saŋ bɛlbwa, asɛ nomɛlbwa bɔɔ heyaa he hwɛga haa dɔa nɔ wa aa, he won baglo a bini.

He dɛ bagla aa, hé kpɔ sisɔna ne taa dɛɛ bagla. A chɛ kɛ he tea to he jemɛ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa aa he wobɛlbwa dɔ dɛ bol. He dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, nɛra baa koh he teŋa haa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ ne he wedɛɛga haa dɛ ɛ waa dɛ bol wobochɔga dɛɛ yagɛ heyaa la, sihiih ɛɛ kpo baa.
He dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ na wa aa, an wera kɛ haa dɛ ɛ wechɔga dɛɛ na wa. Dɛ Korowii tetooraa kɛ he koh he wedɛɛga ɛɛ waa dɛɛ na wa aa, a wer.

Yeesu Kristo gbagba sewɔ tɛ heyaa dɛ bɔ wechɔga kem. Kerabeŋkpoŋii o sewɛ, waa wola berɛ sewɛ kpa. O ta wechɔga ɛɛ bwa, kɛ o sewɔ tɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra. Gɛ waa ɛ ya ne Korowii pɛ waa o ɛ gɛ. Baa kpoo la, o bwadabii sewa, kɛ o lileo te dɔ mkpafale.
O lileo la lala baa vɔg ba Lala Bwɛɛ la be, dɛ ka bol Korowii Waa ba be.

A saŋ la tena baa ɛ deŋnekpeg dɛ vɛh Korowii Waa noe gɛ saŋ Nowa faa dɛ kwaa o gberjen la la, ba lalaa o bol Korowii Waa bagle la. Korowii fa lawɛ bambile ba nɛɛ bigri, dɛ ka tel kɛŋɔ Nowa aa kwaa o gberjen la tonɛ. Nɛra tama baa lɔ o bini laanee Korowii lɛ nee la ta. Dɛ ba lɔ nɛra banuatoro.

A gɛ nee nɔ chegɔ tɛ Korowii nee baa dɛ sɔ yaa aa lɛ yaa la. Korowii nee sɔe ta bwara doŋa yagla ɛɛ. Korowii nee sɔe munii kɛ ya soŋe Korowii ó tɛ yaa tepoŋ. A chegɛ Yeesu Kristo seo ta ira ta asɛ nee sɔe la won dɛɛ lɛ yaa.
O kaa Korowii be nyundua, dɛ ka so nomombɔr o dig ta, dɛɛ di kora nyundua toroma ne konchɔga aa bea yaa wola an na bwa soosiwi nɛ.
Yeesu Kristo aa baa ɛ nɛwɛnyini la, o na bonyɛga. Anomanta a chɛ kɛ he kpɔ he te dɛ jemɛ kɛ gɛɛ he ge bwara ɛɛ ba nyɛga. Nomɛlbwa waa wona lawɛ bambile dɛ na bonyɛga ka la, waa wechɔga ɛ.
Le fini dɛɛ kaa, hé kpɔ Korowii tetoora dɛɛ tɔ sie he soga bini harɛ bonɔ. He bɛ kwaa nɛwɛnyina aa dɛ pɛlɛ a ta la nɛɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ kpa.

Waa nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ aa dɛ ɛa asɛ he faa ɛa la, he ta a nyoa nae yaa? Dɛ he sie dɛ lɛ jwamane ne pɛlchɔga we-ɛɛla ta. Dɛ he dɛ sɔ sen, dɛɛ ɛ sagasaga, dɛ lawɛ dɔŋa dɛɛ nyɔ sennyɔbala. Dɛ he dɛ tomɛ voga dɛɛ jo Korowii kii nɛ.
Nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ la, a dɛ ɛɛ ba anebɛlbwa kɛŋɔ he ne baa wola pɛɛ dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa ne wesagasagare baa dɛ ɛ la. A waa baa chɛgre heyaa la.
Anɔ bwa baa dɛ ɛ nɔ, baa ba tɔh ba nyoa Korowii siee. O kpɔ o te dɛɛ ba weera ne lala bwa waa bola dɛ pa bole.

Nɛra baa serewa la, ba bol Amanesoma nɔ bagle ba ge, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii ɛɛ bol ba ge waa dɛ pa bole gɛ waa dɛ ba weera ɛɛ la. Waa ba faa dɛ ɛ gɛ saŋ baa wola sewɛ mɔɔ la, anee wɛɛ ba nyiŋa dɛ pa ba bole. Korowii dɛ nyin kɛ ba dɔ mkpa gɛ waa dɔ mkpa la, a waa o gel Yeesu bol Amanesoma la chag ba la.
Wobɛlbwa jaga tɔpere la telo. Anomanta hé nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ gel he sie chɔ harɛ, asɛ dɛ won dɛɛ soŋe Korowii kɛrɛdɛ.
Waa aa ɛ wehiah kohonaa kɛ hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa bambile bwa ne, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɔŋa nyina dɛ tɔ wechɔga kɛrɛdɛ ta.
He dɔŋ baa choge naa, lɛo, bɛ waa dɛɛ nagre.
Kpegri bɛlbwa nomɛlbwa aa dɔa la, Korowiirii kpɔa chao ŋɔ ó kpɔ dɛɛ ɛ o Korowii toma. Anomanta bɛ́lbwa nyiŋi o toma ta kɛrɛdɛ, dɛ kpɔ dɛɛ cha o bala.

Nomɛlbwa Korowii aa chao o won dɛɛ bol o Waa la, wɛ́ɛ bola dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii Waaa wɛɛ bol la. Nomɛlbwa Korowii aa chao o won dɛɛ tomɛ o dɔŋ la, wɛ́ɛ tomɔ bokpega Korowii aa tɛo bwa ne, ásɛ wobɛlbwa ta la, Korowii che Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ dɛ dɔ sɔn. On chɛ kpegri ne jirima aa wola jaga dɔe bwa. Aamen.
N dandɛɛga, he bɛ gel nii haa dɛ na taraken nɔ kpo he nyoa. Daahnaa Korowii kpɔa dɛɛ daah he yarada. He bɛ gel a ɛ heyaa wehɔɔhra.
Hé gel he sie lɛ kɛŋɔ haa dɛ na Yeesu Kristo wenaale dɔŋa nɔ, ásɛ awola haa ba na o jirima waa dɔa la, he sie lɛ, he bwara sɔɔh heyaa kohona.
Dɛ ba koh he teŋa haa teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la waa dɛɛ chɛgre heya aa, he na som. A ba gɛ naa, a dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge o wa aa dɔ jirima la soge he nɛ.
Dɛ he bini bɛl dɛ na wahala aa, a bɛ ɛ kɛŋɔ nɛnee o kpo, kɛɛ ŋwɛɛ o ŋwɛ, kɛɛ nɛnchɔgee on, kɛɛ nyoaa o kpɔ do nɛra waa ta.
Dɛ a chegɛ he Kristo te ɛɛ ta asɛ hɛɛ na wahala aa, bɛ gel a ɛɛ sihiih. Jam Korowii kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo sɔn aa dawɛ he nɛ.
Tɔpere telo kɛŋɔ Korowii bol nɛwɛnyina waa dɛ pa bole. Korowii nɛra nɛɛ wɛɛ ba mun pae. Waa dɛ ba ya kwaraa kpɔe pa mun nɔ, dɛ ɛrɛɛ nɛra baa wola Amanesoma la yaradae waa ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?
Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Nɛra baa ɛ nɛndɛɛga ba waa su Korowii siwi kwaraa la, dɛ a kpegri kɛŋɔ ba dɔ ba nyu aa, dɛ wechɔg-ɛɛra baa wola Korowii ɔmɛ la, ɛrɛɛ ba waa ɛɛ ba doe yɔ?"
Anomanta he nɛra aa ɛ Korowii tetoora kɛ he na wahala la, hɛ́ɛ ɛ wedɛɛga, dɛ kpɔ he te do Korowii waa ta heyaa la nɔn ta. O waa dɔ kasinteŋ.

N dɛ nyin n bol waane he asɔre nomonome baa dɛ tɔ he sie la be. Asɔre nomoa la bɛlee n ge. N gbagba kpɔ siwi na wahala la soo Yeesu Kristo aa naa. Awola waa dɛ ba gela nɛra na o jirima la, n gee dɔ o jirima la bɛlee. N dɛ soŋe heyaa kɛŋɔ

hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi Korowii nɛra baa ɛ o peera waa kpɔ ba tɛ heyaa ŋɔ hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi ba nɛɛ la kɛrɛdɛ. He bɛ gel ba do heyaa mɔɔ hɛɛ nyiŋ ba kɛrɛdɛ, hé gel a ɛ he gbagba tetoowa. He bɛ suuga sibegra waa koh dɛɛ ɛ gɛ toma nɔ, hé nyiŋi nyina haa dɛ nyin kɛ toma la kaa kɛrɛdɛ la dɛɛ ɛa.
He bɛ kpegri dɛɛ di nɛra baa kpɔ ba do he nɔn ta la nɛ. Hé gel he we-ɛɛla do wer ásɛ ba nyiŋa dɛɛ chaara.
He dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, Petegra Bwa Dɔɔ la balaa, wɛɛ tɛ heyaa jirima kon o wer aa wola tu bwa, o ɛ kompoŋ haa yoa dɛ le ba vɔwɛ heya.

He bonɔɔna ge la, hɛ́ɛ tɛ he nomonome duure. Hé bwa pwɛr he te dɛɛ tɛ dɔŋa, dɛɛ cha dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Tɔn bolɔ ŋɔ, "Korowii ne mbarafo tena aa jo, kɛ o dɛ sune nɛra baa dɛ pwɛr ba te nɛɛ dɛɛ cha ba."
Anomanta, hé pwɛr he te dɛɛ no Korowii waa dɔ kpegri bwa la wa, ásɛ o gɔɔ heyaa ir tɔpere waa wera o be ta.
Wobɛlbwa aa dɛ ha heyaa la, hé kpɔa bil Korowii sie, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he waa lɔ o bambile ta.
Hé gel he sie chɔ harɛ, hɛɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he dɔm Bɔnsam lole. Gɛ nyujente yon dɛɛ kɔgre, dɛ gaage dɛɛ nyin ola dɛ́ lawɛ la, gɛɛ o ge gaage dɛɛ nyin nɛra dɛ́ lawɛ.
Anomanta hé che kiŋkiŋ he yarada ta. He bɛ Bɔnsam ŋwɛnɛ tɛ. Hé jemɛ kɛ he bala baa dɛ yarada Yeesu bobɛlbwa la dɛ na a gɛ waa nɔ haa dɛ na nɔ dɔŋa.

Kɛ he baa na waa tama aa, Korowii waa dɛ na nɛra sum dɛɛ cha ba kohona la, o gbagba ɛɛ kwaa he wobɛlbwaa, dɛ gel he che kiŋkiŋ, dɛ do kpegri, dɛ lawɛ heyaa he bɛ chole. Onee le heyaa hé won che pɛɛ he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la ta dɛ dɔ o jirima aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la.
On chɛ kpegri aa wola jaga dɔe bwa. Aamen.

Silasee cha mɛ n chwerɛ heyaa tɔmbora nɔ la. N jemɔ kɛ o waa dɔ kasinteŋ ya teŋa yaa dɛ teŋɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ nɔ ta. N dɛ nyin he jemɛ gɛ aa chɛ kɛ hɛɛ ɛ, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ gɛ n faa bagle heyaa chae Korowii aa sune ya nɛɛ dɛ cha yaa la, a ɛ kasinteŋ. Hé den lawɛ a bini kiŋkiŋ.
Asɔre tena baa lɔ Babilɔn, Korowii aa lee ba gɛ waa le heyaa la, ba dɛ na heya. N bie Maak ge dɛ na heya.
Hɛ́ɛ lea dɔŋa nɛnnyin ne. He nɛra he ne Yeesu Kristo aa pɛa la, Kórowii tɛ he bwa bosɔɔhna.

Men Seemɔn Pita maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ dɛ ɛ o torome la, men chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he nɛra haa dɛ yarada Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ ya Korowii ne ya Lɛɛ la. O waa aa togra nomanta, o tɛ heyaa ya yarada waa wera nɔ dɔŋ.
Kórowii che he jema haa jemɔ dɛ jemɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu la ta dɛ cha heyaa kohona dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna.
Yeesu dɔ Korowii kpegri la dɔŋ. Anee o kpɔ cha yaa, asɛ ya dɔ komɛlbwa yaa hiah dɛ won do le dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga. Yaa jemɛ Korowii waa le yaa ásɛ ya won dɔ o jirima ne o dadɛɛge la waa o ɛ gɛ.
Waa ɛ gɛ nɔ, o cha yaa ŋwɛnɛdɛɛga kohona ta, aa wola dɔŋ dɔe. O bagɛ yaa nyoa a wa. Hɛ́ɛ che a taa dɛ le pɛlchɔga aa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta dɛɛ chɔg nɛra la nyoa, asɛ dɛ do gɛ Korowii aa doa la.
A gɛ waa nɔ wesoo nomanta la, hé takapɔ dɛɛ ɛ wedɛɛga dɛɛ ja he Yeesu waa yaradae ta, dɛ kpɔ wejema dɛ ja he wedɛɛga ɛɛ ta,
dɛ won dɛɛ lawɛ he te dɛɛ ja he wejema ta. Hɛ́ɛ lawɛ bambile dɛɛ ja he te lawa ta, dɛ kpɔ Korowii ɔma dɛɛ ja he bambile lawa ta.
Hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa dɛɛ ja he Korowii ɔma ta, dɛɛ nyin nɛn dɛɛ ja he dɔŋa nyina ta.
Da waa wera tɛ heyaa la. He wono dɔ a gɛ da nɔ kɛrɛdɛ naa, aa geloo jema haa jemɛ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo la dɔ tɔnɔ dɛ su siwi.
Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa wola a gɛ da nɔ dɔe la, o liire do toŋgboŋ ken. Waa waa nyiŋe dɛɛ la sie. A gɛ te la soɔh kɛŋɔ Korowii laa o wechɔga o fa dɛ ɛ la fee o nɛ.

Anomanta yabalawa, Korowii aa le heyaa tɛ o te nɔ, hé takapɔ kɛŋɔ hɛɛ geloo he we-ɛɛla bagle kɛŋɔ Korowii nɛra waa lee ba la banee heya. He dɛ ɛ gɛ naa, haa naa lɔ Yeesu Kristo waa nɔ yaradae ta bwa.
He dɛ ɛ ken nɔ naa, Korowii ɛɛ tɛ heyaa ŋwɛnɛ kohonaa, asɛ he ja ya Dɔɔ waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo Kora waa wola jaga dɔe la ta.
Kasinteŋ waa la haa noa la, he dɔɔ jema kɛrɛdɛ dɛ che a ta kiŋkiŋ. Kɛ mɛɛ dɛɛ lii heyaa a waa saŋ bɛlbwaa.
N dɛ lii kɛŋɔ maa wola sewɛ mɔɔ nɔ, a chɛ kɛ mɛɛ lii heyaa hé do wɔrɔbe waa nɔ ta.
N jemɔ kɛŋɔ aa bigri n wur n harɛ nɔ ta bwadabii nɔ ta. Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo gelɔ n jemɛ gɛ waa nɔ.
Mɛɛ takapɔɔ dɛ ɛ gɛ bwa maa won ɛ, asɛ dɛ n ba toole kwaraa naa, he won dɛɛ lii waa nɔ saŋ bɛlbwa.
Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu Kristo kpegri waa dɔa ne o bala waa la yaa bol he be la, a ta waa yaa kpɔ liire dɛ teŋe nyosone ɛɛ. Ya gbagba kpɔ sie na gɛ o wa aa dɔ nyɛl kohona.
O Mɛɛ Korowii gbagba aa tɛo duure ne jirima la, dɛ ya lɔ bela. Taa bɛl le o Mɛɛ Korowii waa dɔ jirima kohona la be kɛŋɔ, "N gbagba Bie maa dɛ nyinu o wa ɛɛ su n siwii nɔ."
Taa la aa le Korowii doa ba la, ya noɔ. Dɛ ya ne Yeesu lɔ bwe la Korowii aa gela o do goroŋ la ta.

Anɔ gelɔ ya jemɛ kpelakpela kɛŋɔ waa Korowii keamere la aa bola la ɛ kasinteŋ. A chɛ ke he cheg deŋne dɛɛ noa. Ba waa baa bola la do kɛ kandea waa dɛ chaah biro ta ka tel kɛŋɔ tɔ aa pera. Korowii Keamere Tɔne la ɛɛ chaah heyaa bɔree, asɛ Korowii gel he liire chaah gɛ chɔmbibi wewee aa dɛ chaah bɔr la.
Hé jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ kɛŋɔ waa ba faa chwera Korowii Keamere Tɔne bini la, a bɛlbwa toole dɛ ɛ nɛwɛnyini nyu bini liire.
Akai! Baa chwera la, ba gbagba liire ne laa ba chwera. Korowii Domadɛɛgee ir Korowii nɛra nɛ, asɛ baa bol waa Korowii aa kpɔa do ba nyoa.

A saŋ la, nɛra bane teŋe nyosone ŋɔ Korowii keameree ban Israel tena bini. Gɛɛ nɛra ɛɛ ba bala dɛ ba teŋe nyosone ŋɔ ban dɛɛ chagle nɛra waa he bini. Baa dɛɛ chagle waa aa wola kasinteŋ ɛɛ, dɛ gel nɛra nyogre. Gɛ ba wechagle aa doa la, haa won jemɛ kɛŋɔ a ta kasinteŋ ɛɛ. Baa vɛh ba Dɔɔ waa bɔ ba wechɔga kem la waa, dɛ gel Korowii chɔg ba, ba sewɛ seopigri.
Nɛndamanta ɛɛ teŋɛ ba wedoŋa baa dɛ ɛ la taa, asɛ a che a ta nɛra bol kasinteŋ ŋwɛnɛ wobochɔga kɛ waa were.

Ba sibegra baa dɔa kohona nomanta, baa dɛɛ teŋe nyosonee ŋɔ waa baa chagle heya, dɛ negre heyaa dɛɛ di. Naate waa pa ba bolchɔge dɛɛ ba ba deŋne tɛra la kpɔ o te dɛɛ kpaa ba saŋ bɛlbwa. Waa dom chɔ. Wɛɛ ɛɛ ba posaposa kenii.
Nyundua toroma ba faa ɛ wechɔga la, Korowii ta ban gelɛ. O kpɔ ba ta deŋne tɛra bɔr waa ɛ bɔluŋluŋ dɛ bir kpirikpiri la dɛ́ ka tel awola waa ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la.
O ta a saŋ la tena gelɛ. O gelɔ nee su tɔ nɛra baa wola on ɔmɛ la nɛ. Nɛra waa gel ba bwaa Nowa o faa dɛ chagle nɛra ŋɔ bá gel ba waa togre Korowii be la, ne nɛra banuanɛ.
Sodom ne Gomoora tena faa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la, Korowii ŋɔ waa gel ba dwee ka, dɛ fuh ba ne ba bwɛɛre bwa dɛɛboo. Ba fuih chɔ le dɛɛ chagle waa aa ba chig nɛra baa wola Korowii ɔmɛ nɛ.
Dɛ Lɔt te ɛ nɛn waa dɛ ɔmɛ Korowii bela, asɛ wedoŋa bwɛɛre la tena aa wola Korowii ɔmɛ dɛɛ ɛ la ɛɛ hao. O te, Korowii lɛo.
Lɔt aa ɛ nɛndɛɛge o waa su Korowii siwi dɛ do ba baah la, dɛ ba wedoŋa waa dɛ na ne anɔ la waa dɛ no tɔpebii bwa la gelɔ o bambile ɛɛ weo.
He nyiŋo na naa, dɛ Korowii te jemɛ gɛ waa dɛ lɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɔmɔ dɛɛ le Bɔnsam daahna ta, dɛ jemɛ gɛ waa dɛ tɛr wechɔg-ɛɛra deŋne dɛ ka tel awola waa ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la.

Nɛra ba sie aa begre ba bwadabii nɔ wechɔga aa suu nɔ pɛlchɔga ta, baa wola waa bu la, ba deŋnee Korowii ɛɛ ba tɛra kohona. A gɛ nɛra baa teŋe nyosone ŋɔ ba dɛ chagle waa nɔ, waa ba bambile aa lawaa baa ɛ. Ba bambile kpegri! Baa nyundua toroma bu. Wobochɔga kwaraa ba bol dɛɛ yag ba!
Nyundua toroma kpegri dɛ dɔ jirima gwaa a gɛ nyosonteŋna nɔ, kɛ baa ban chɔgɛ dɛɛ tɛ Korowii sisa wobol ne.
Nɛra nɔ te do kɛ kpɔg bini ola Korowii aa taa ŋɔ báa kpoa la ken. Baa liire kpɔe dɛɛ ɛ wa. Waa mun noe kpegri ba be naa, sisa wobolee ba bol dɛɛ yaga. Baa serewoo kɛŋɔ ola ken.

Wahala baa gela nɛra ɛɛ na la, ba gee na a dɔŋaa. Waa ba sie aa dɛ lɛ a taa kɛŋɔ ba bodia waa baa dɛ ɛa bochaah la. He ne baa pɛa dɛɛ di kwaa nɔ, ba do kɛ doŋa dɛɛ chɔg he wer. Ba sɔɔh dɛɛ ɛ bodia waa he habɔɔ taeh.
Ba na haah bɛlbwa naa, ba dɛ nyinu. Ba nyina baa dɛ nyin wechɔga ɛɛ ta dɔŋ dɔe. Ba negre nɛra baa wola chegɛ kiŋkiŋ Korowii waa ta dɛɛ kaa wechɔga ta. Ba sie dɛ begre kwaa taeh. Korowii taah ba!
Ba gel ŋwɛnɛtogre la, dɛ nyogre. Ba kpɔ Beɔ bie Balam o faa ɛ Korowii keame la ŋwɛnɛ la. O sie aa begre suuga kohona nomanta, o kpɔ ŋwɛnɛchɔge ta dɛ nyin suuga.
Korowii fa gelɔ keego bol waa o be dɛ kaoh o wechɔga la ta. Keego ge fe aa waa bol. Anomanta Korowii keame nɔ gel o chogla waa la.
He dɛ hwɛgɛ ba nɛ aa, he hwɛga ta pɛɛ. Ba do kɛ nenabɔɔ nee aa wola toole o ta, dɛ do kɛ baama peu aa ir a ne aa kaa ken. Biro kpirikpirii Korowii kwaa cheg ba.

Ba nyoa wobol kan taeh, kɛ nyosonee a bwa. Ba kpɔ bwadabii pɛlchɔga waa ne wedoŋa nɛra sie aa dɛ lɛ a ta dɛ negre nɛra dɛɛ kaa wechɔga ta. Nɛra baa pa mun dɛɛ le wechɔg-ɛɛra bini baa wola chegɛ kiŋkiŋ mɔɔ laanee ba negre dɛɛ kaa wechɔga ta.
Ba yon ŋɔ baa geloo nɛra dɔ ba te, dɛ ba gbabir ɛ yoma. Ba wechɔga ɛɛ ba yoma, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa aa wona lɛ nɛn liire la, a kpɔɔ berɛ yom.

Nɛra jemɛ ya Dɔɔ waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo waa la, dɛ won che a ta le waa aa dɛ la nɛn ne wechɔga ta harɛ bonɔ naa, a wer. Kɛ dɛ ba berɔ ba gel a gɛ wechɔga la dɔ bɔr vɔg ba ja aa, a te dɛ ba waa berɔ gbɔr dɛ gwaa mumpar la.
Dɛ ba fe ta Korowii ŋwɛnɛtogre la waa noɛ ka aa, a fe bɔ ba nɛɛ dɛ gwaa kɛŋɔ baa jemɛ Korowii ŋwɛnɛ la dɛ vɛh waa o gbagba aa ŋɔa báa ɛ la ɛɛ.
Ba waa nɔ gelɔ sɛgla baa sɛgla Korowii Tɔn bini la ɛ kasinteŋ. Ba sɛglɔ ŋɔ: "Nyoate ugaa, gɛɛ o berɛ dia," dɛ sɛgle ŋɔ, "He sɔ prakoo ne aa, wɛɛ berɔɔ ka gbili o kpechɛgre ta."
N dandɛɛga, tɔn nɔɔ n tɔn nɛɛte maa chwerɛ heya. N tɔne anɛ nɔ bwa bini la, n dɛ lii heyaa ásɛ he do wɔrɔbe waa nɔ ta, dɛ dɔ tepoŋ.
N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ he lii waa Korowii keamere la faa bola a saŋ la la, ne waa Yeesu toroma la faa ŋɔa ya Dɔɔ waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ la ŋɔ hé ɛ la.
Anɔ la aa tɔ siee kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ tɔpera aa ka mun nɔ ta nɔ, nɛra ɛɛ dɛɛ mamɛ heyaa. Ba sie ɛɛ dɛɛ lɛ ba pɛlchɔga taa.
Baa dɛɛ bɔɔ heyaa ŋɔ, "Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ Yeesu ɛɛ berɔɔ ba ja la, lee o dɔɔ?" Dɛ ŋɔ, "Ya mɛɛnanar bwa serewɔ, dɛ o ta balɛ mɔɔ. Gɛ harɛ nɔ aa doa o mumpar la, gɛɛ o ta do."
Ba saahnɔ laa ba liire kpɔ gɛ Korowii faa kpɔ nyoa bol waa a saŋ la asɛ nyundua ne harɛ pa mun la ta. Nee nee Korowii ta harɛ, nee taa harɛ le.
Nee Korowii gel o su bɔle harɛ bwa a saŋ la dɛ chɔgo.
Gɛɛ Korowii ŋɔ nyundua kwaa bwa ne harɛ kwaa bwa aa lole taraken nɔ, á do le gɛ, ásɛ nii ɛrɛ ba fuah awola waa dɛ ba nɛra baa wola on tomɛ waa bola dɛ pa bole, dɛ chɔg ba la.
N dandɛɛga, he jemɛ kɛŋɔ tɔpebeŋkpoŋ ne bene kagboŋ bwa beŋkpoŋ Korowii be. Beŋkpoŋii a bwa o te be.

Bane dɛ lii kɛŋɔ Korowii bigri o nyobaga waa baga ŋɔ ya Dɔɔ Yeesu ɛɛ bao la chugra ta kohona to. Bambilee o dɔ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ waa nyin kɛ nomɛlbwa chɔg ta. O dɛ nyin kɛ nɛra bwa charɛ ba liire dɛ le ba wechɔga ta mɔɔ o ba.

Ya Dɔɔ Yeesu bala tɔpere la, wɛɛ pigruu kɛŋɔ ŋwɛɛ bala a dɛ pigri la ken. Awola la, nyundua ɛɛ jigru kikikikikiki, dɛ nyogre nɛra siwi ta. Kwaa aa lɔ nyundua bwa ɛɛ fuuh dɛ mwɛɛ, asɛ harɛ ne kwaa aa lɔ o ta bwa fuh.
Kwaa nɔ bwa aa dɛ ba fuih ken nɔ, dɛ ɛrɛɛ chɛ kɛ he doɔ? A chɛ kɛ he do goroŋ he soga bini, dɛ kpɔ he te tɛ Korowii,
dɛɛ kpa Korowii tɔpere la nyundua aa fuh kwaraa asɛ harɛ ge komɛlbwa fuh dɛ mwɛɛ kwaraa la. Hé swɛɛ siwi ásɛ Korowii tɔpere la ba warane.
Ya dɛ nyiŋi nyoa Korowii aa baga la ŋwɛnɛ. Anee kɛŋɔ wɛɛ ta nyundua onfale ne harɛfalee. Belaa wedɛɛga ɛɛ ba doe.
Anomanta, n dandɛɛga, haa dɛ kpa awola tɔpere la la, hé swɛɛ siwi kɛŋɔ hɛɛ do goroŋee dɛ bɛ wechɔga bɛlbwa dɔ Korowii sie, asɛ he ne o baah do wer.
Hé nyiŋi Korowii bambile waa lawa nɔ kɛŋɔ ŋwɛnɛɛ o tɛ heyaa kɛŋɔ he charɛ he liire ásɛ o lɛ heya. Anee ya dɔŋ Pɔɔl yaa dɛ nyin o waa la fa kpɔ o wejema Korowii aa tɛo la dɛ chwerɛ heyaa la.

Pɔɔl dɛ bol a gɛ waa nɔ o tɔne bwa bini. Ane ta Pɔɔl tɔne waane mun noe kpegri taeh. Anomanta nɛra baa wola wobɛlbwa jemɛ baa wola chegɛ kiŋkiŋ la, ba dɛ berɛ waa la sie. Gɛɛ a gɛ nɛra nɔ ɛɛ bagle Korowii Tɔn bini waa la ane ge. Kɛ ba gbagba nyu taa ba ɛ dɛɛ dawɛ.
Anomanta n dandɛɛga, haa dɔɔ na ken nɔ, hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi kɛrɛdɛ asɛ dɛ bɛ ba gel nɛra baa wola Korowii ɔmɛ ba negre heyaa he lɔ naa he yarada ta dɛ bɛ kiŋkiŋ ba che kpa.
Hé swɛɛ siwi asɛ ya Dɔɔ waa ɛ ya Lɛɛ Yeesu Kristo suna waa sune he nɛɛ dɛɛ cha heyaa la ɛɛ ja kohona. Hé swɛɛ siwi dɛɛ dɔ wejema o waa ta kohona. Hé gel ya tɛo jirima taraken ne saŋ bɛlbwa. Aamen.
Waa yaa dɛ ba a waa he be bola nɔ ɛ nɛn waa ɛ Korowii Nyoa Wobol dɛ dɔ mkpa dɛ do le le mumpar la bwa wa. Ya no o waa dɛ nao. Ya nyiŋu dɛ kpɔ ya nɔɔra lego.
O fa lɔ Korowii be dɛ berɛ ba ɛ nɛn, asɛ ya nao. Anomanta ya dɛ bol o waa he be kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo waa ɛ saŋ bɛlbwa mkpa dɛ faa do o Mɛɛ be la, o ba ya be ya jemɔ.
Anɔ la yaa naa dɛ no laanee yaa bol he ge be ásɛ he no dɛ ba ja ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua ne o bie Yeesu Kristo beŋkpoŋri ɛɛ la ta.
Ya dɛ nyin kɛ ya bwa bwara sɔɔh yaa kɛrɛdɛ. A waa ya chwerɛ tɔn nɔ baa tɛ heyaa la.
Waa yaa noa le Yeesu be dɛɛ bol he be laanee kɛŋɔ Korowii do kɛŋɔ kon waa chaahna ken. Wechɔga bɛlbwa toole o nɛ.
Anomanta dɛ ya ŋɔ ya ne o ɛ beŋkpoŋ, kɛ dɛ berɛ dɛɛ ɛ biro bini wa aa, ya teŋe nyosone. Ya we-ɛɛla dɛ bagle kɛ ya waa ta kasinteŋ dɔe.
Korowii waa aa chaahna la, dɛ ya dɛ ɛ ya waa bwa a chaah kɛ on aa, dɛ ya ne yabala pɛo dɛ ɛ beŋkpoŋ. Dɛ Korowii Bie Yeesu chal la laa ya wechɔga bɛlbwa dɛɛ kpɔ ya nɛ.
Dɛ ya ŋɔ wechɔga toole ya nɛ aa, ya dɛ negre ya nyuune. Dɛ yaa kasinteŋ bol.
Dɛ ya bol ya wechɔga bagle Korowii aa, o ɛ nɛndɛɛge dɛ ɛ kasinteŋ te dɛɛ teŋɛ o nyobaga ta. Wɛɛ kpɔɔ kɛ yaa dɛ laa doŋa bwa kpɔ ya nɛ.
Dɛ ya ŋɔ ya ta wechɔga ɛɛ te naa, dɛ ya yerɛ Korowii nyosonteŋni. O waa la ge toole ya bini.

N bidɛɛga, n chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, asɛ he bɛ wechɔga dɛɛ ɛ. Kɛ dɛ nomɛlbwa garɔ ɛ wechɔga aa, ya dɔ nomɛl o do ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la be dɛ́ soŋe ya wechɔga dɛɛ tɛ yaa. Onee Yeesu Kristo la. O ɛ nɛŋkaih.
Onee koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ sewɛ tɛ yaa dɛ kwaa ya ne Korowii baah. Ya gbo wechɔga waa laa o sewɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bwa jao.
Ya teŋɛ o waa ta naa, anee dɛɛ ba yaa bagla kɛ ya jemɔ.
Dɛ nomɛlbwa ŋɔ o jemɛ Korowii, dɛ waa o waa ta teŋaa, gɛ nɛn la ɛ nyosonteŋni, dɛ kasinteŋ toole o be.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ teŋɛ Korowii waa ta la, onee dɛɛ nyin Korowii waa kɛrɛdɛ. Anɔ taa yaa ba chega dɛ jemɛ kɛ ya ne Korowii pɛo.
Nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔa o ne Korowii pɛo la, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o kpɔ Yeesu Kristo da la.
Yabala, waa nɔ maa dɛ chwerɛ heyaa nɔ ta wefala ɛɛ. Webena la yaa bagle heyaa le mumpar la, anee ta.
Kɛ ŋwɛnɛ bɛl ge ta la, a ɛ wefala, dɛkalkɛŋɔ biro dɛ kaa. Bochaah tenten balɔ asɛ bɔr ɛɛ chaah kɛrɛdɛ. Yeesu we-ɛɛla ne he gbagba we-ɛɛla bagle a gɛ waa nɔ mun.
Nomɛlbwa waa ŋɔa o lɔ bochaah ta kɛ dɛ hah o dɔŋ la ta lɔ biro tenten ta.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin o dɔŋ la do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa lɔ bochaah ta. Bochaah la nomanta, komɛlbwa toole dɛ gel o lɔ nakpala dɛ chole.
Nomɛlbwa waa hah o dɔŋ la do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa lɔ biro ta. O dɛ valɛ, kɛ waa jemɛ bela waa dɛ kaa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ biro la gelɔ o nyoŋe.
N bidɛɛga, n chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii koh Yeesu waa dɛ kpɔ he wechɔga kɛ heya.
Nomonome, n chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ heyaa jemɛ naate waa lole le mumpar bwa la. Bonɔɔna, n chwerɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ he ge, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he pɔ Bɔnsam nɛ.

N bidɛɛga, n chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he jemɛ ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la. Nomonome, n chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he jemɛ naate waa lole le mumpar bwa la. Bonɔɔna, n chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ heya, dɛkalkɛŋɔ he bwaraa kpega, Korowii waa la do he bambile bini. Heyaa wona pɔ Bɔnsam nɛ.
He bɛ gel he sie lɛ waa aa dɛ lɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire sie la ne harɛ nɔ ta kwaa ta. Dɛ he sie dɛ lɛ a gɛ kwaa la ta naa, dɛ haa he Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la waa nyin.
Bwadabii pɛlchɔga kwa, ne anɔ la aa ɛ siwi pɛla kwa, ne waa yaa nyina dɛ́ kpɔa dɛɛ maŋkura ya te la ɛ harɛ nɔ ta wa. A ta ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la be leɛ.
Harɛ nɔ ne o pɛla kwaa bwa sekwaraa dɔ jaga. Naate waa dɛ ɛ anɔ la Korowii aa dɛ nyin la gbosoo dɛɛ ba le doe saŋ bɛlbwa.
N bidɛɛga, wobɛlbwa jaga saŋ telo. He noɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo dɔm tenten la ɛɛ bao. Hale taraken o dɔma dɔɔ warɛ dɛ ba. Anomanta ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa jaga saŋ telo.
Dɛ bane fa ja ya nɛ, kɛ dɛ ba ta denɛ ɛ ya bini bane, dɛkalkɛ ba chwao. Dɛ ba fe ja ya nɛ aa, ya ne ba fe ta pɛo. Kɛ ba chwao, asɛ a den bagle kɛŋɔ ba bini bɛlbwa ta ya nɛɛ jae.
He te dɔ Domadɛɛge la he nɛɛ dɛ le Korowii Bidɛɛge be, dɛ jemɛ o kasinteŋ waa la bwa.
Kasinteŋ bɛ jema waa laa n chwerɛ tɔn nɔ baa tɛ heya. He jemɛ kasinteŋ la, dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ nyosone ne kasinteŋ aa valɛ bwa.

Amɔ umee ɛ nyosonteŋni ɔ? Nyosonteŋnii naate waa ŋɔa Yeesu laa Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la. A gɛ nɛn la, onee Yeesu Kristo dɔm tenten. Onee vɛh ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua ne o Bie bwa.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ tɔŋle kɛŋɔ Yeesu laa Korowii Bie Kristo la, waa won yerɛ Korowii o Mɛɛ. Gɛɛ a do, nomɛlbwa waa sɛah ŋɔ Yeesuu Korowii Bie la, o Mɛɛɛ Korowii.
Hé kpoŋe anɔ la haa noa dɛ le mumpar la bini. Dɛ he ɛ gɛ naa, saŋ bɛlbwa he ne Yeesu ne o Mɛɛ bwa ɛɛ wonoo pɛ ba kpoŋe heya.
Dɛ ya ne Yeesu ne o Mɛɛ wono pɛ aa, a taa yaa ba chega dɛ dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe Yeesu aa bagɛ yaa nyoa la.
Nɛra baa dɛ ba dɛ́ fee baa negre heyaa la waa n chwerɛ gɛ waa nɔ dɛɛ tɛ heyaa la, ba bɛ won dɛ negre heya.

Yeesu Kristo aa dɔa tɛ heyaa Korowii Domadɛɛge o do he bini nɔ, haa nomɛlbwa nyin o bagle heyaa waa kpa. O Doma la dɛ bagle heyaa wobɛlbwa. O ɛ kasinteŋ te, waa nyosone teŋe. Hé no anɔ la waa dɛ bagle heyaa la, asɛ dɛ kpɔ he te pɛ Yeesu Kristo nɛ.
N bidɛɛga, hé gel he ne Yeesu Kristo pɛ, asɛ o baa forɛ le awola aa, ya bɛ ɔmɛ, asɛ sihiih bɛ yaa kpo o sie awola waa ba la.
He nao kɛŋɔ Korowii ɛ nɛndɛɛge, anomanta nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga aa su Korowii siwi la ɛ Korowii bie.

Hé na nyina ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua aa dɛ nyin yaa, dɛɛ yerɛ yaa o bii. Ya ɛ o bii kpela. A waa gela nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire aa wola yaa jemɛ la. Gɛ baa wola Korowii jemɛ la, gɛɛ baa wola ya ge jemɛ.
Yabala, taraken ya ɛ Korowii bii. Yaa jemɛ kɛrɛdɛ gɛ yaa dɛ ba doe. Kɛ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ awola Yeesu Kristo aa forɛ le nɛra nao la, gɛ waa doa la, gɛɛ ya gee ba doe, dɛkalkɛŋɔ yaa nao dɛ na gɛ waa doa.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɔ gɛ hwɛga Yeesu Kristo nɛɛ la chɛ kɛ o lawɛ o te, dɛ laa o te dɛɛ kpɔ wechɔga ŋwɛnɛre ta dɛ́ won do kaih gɛ tenten Yeesu Kristo aa do kaih la.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la di bolchɔge Korowii mmara ta, dɛkalkɛŋɔ wechɔgaa dɛɛ tia mmara.
He jemɔ kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo ba harɛ nɔ ta ásɛ dɛ ba laa wechɔga kpɔ dɛ tɔ a ŋwɛnɛ. O te, dɛ wechɔga toole o nɛ.
Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o te pɛl Yeesu Kristo la aa berɛ teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga kpa. Nomɛlbwa o taa teŋa dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la, naate ta on pesee dɛ jemɔ.
N bidɛɛga, he bɛ gel nomɛlbwa negre heya. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga aa su Korowii siwi la ɛ nɛndɛɛge gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa ɛ nɛndɛɛge la.
Nomɛlbwa waa teŋa dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga la ɛ Bɔnsam nɛn, dɛkalkɛŋɔ harɛ mumpar la bwaa Bɔnsam le dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga. A waa Korowii Bie la koh ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ́ ba chɔg Bɔnsam toma bwa.
Nomɛlbwa waa ɛ Korowii bie la aa teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga kpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ɛ Korowii dwee. Anomanta waa won teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga kpa, dɛkalkɛ o mɛɛɛ Korowii.
Anɔ taa yaa ba chega dɛ jemɛ banɔ la baa ɛ Korowii bii ne banɔ la baa ɛ Bɔnsam kwa. Nomɛlbwa waa wola wedɛɛga aa su Korowii siwi ɛ, kɛɛ waa wola o dɔŋ nyin la, o ta o bie ɛɛ.
Waa haa noa le mumpar laanee kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ ya nyin dɔŋa.
Ya bɛ ɛ kɛŋɔ Keen, waa ɛ o te Bɔnsam bie dɛ kpo o nime Abɛl la. Bɔkwaa gela o kpoo wɔ? O we-ɛɛla waa ɛa la aa wola were asɛ o nime kwaa do wer la, anee gela o kpoo.
Yabala, dɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire hah heya aa, he bɛ gel a ɛ heyaa nyokpoa.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya le seo nɔn ta dɛ ba dɔ mkpa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyin dɔŋa. Nomɛlbwa waa wola o dɔŋ nyin la ta lɔ seo nɔn ta.
Nomɛlbwa waa hah o dɔŋ la do kɛŋɔ nɛn waa dɛ kpoo nɛra ken. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa ge waa dɛ kpoo nɛra la ta Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la dɔe.
Gɛ Yeesu Kristo aa koh ya waa dɛ kpɔ o te tɛ dɛ sewɛ la, a taa ya che dɛ jemɛ gɛ nyina aa doa. A chɛ kɛŋɔ ya ge koh yabala waa dɛ ge kpɔ ya te tɛ kɛŋɔ yaa sewɔɔ tɛɛ ba.
Dɛ nomɛl dɔ harɛ nɔ ta kwaa bwa, dɛ na o dɔŋ waa nyaa, dɛ laa sie kpɔ o nɛ aa, amɔ dɛ o dɛ nyin Korowii aa?
N bidɛɛga, he bɛ gel ya kpɔ wobol ne nyotor berɛ dɔŋa nyina. Kɛ hé gel ya we-ɛɛla bagle kɛŋɔ ya nɛnnyin ɛ kasinteŋ nyina.
Anɔ taa yaa ba wona jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya chegɔ tɛ kasinteŋ la. Anɔ taa yaa ba bambisɔɔhna dɔe Korowii sie.
Dɛ ya liire pa yaa bolchɔge aa, Korowii gwaa ya liire dɛ jemɛ komɛlbwa.
Anomanta, yabala, dɛ ya liire aa yaa bolchɔge pa te naa, amɔ ya dɔ bambile dɛ́ che Korowii sie, yaa wola ɔmɛ.
Komɛlbwa yaa soŋo la, o dɛ tɛ yaa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ya dɛ no o waa dɛɛ ɛ anɔ la aa dɛ su o siwi.
Waa Korowii aa dɛ ŋɔ ya be laanee kɛŋɔ yá yarada o Bie Yeesu Kristo la, dɛ nyin dɔŋa gɛ waa ŋɔ ya be la.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ no Korowii waa la, o kpɔ o te dɛɛ pɛl Korowii, asɛ o ge lawɔ dɛɛ pɛl o nɛ. Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa kpɔa tɛ yaa la gelɔ ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya bwa ɛ beŋkpoŋ.

Yabala, he bɛ nɛra baa ŋɔa ba dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la dɛ che o ta dɛɛ bagle waa la dɛɛ yarada warawara. Hé pese ba dɛ na kɛŋɔ kpegri baa dɔa la le Korowii Domadɛɛge la be kɛɛ? Dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛra baa dɛ negre nɛra kɛŋɔ ba ɛ Korowii keamere ba harɛ nɔ ta bobɛlbwa pirim.

Ŋwɛnɛ nɔ taa hɛɛ ba chega dɛ jemɛ nɛra baa dɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge la. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ bagle Yeesu waa ɛ Kristo Korowii aa tomɔ ó ba lɛ yaa la waa kɛŋɔ o baa ɛ nɛwɛnyini la, o dɔ Domadɛɛge waa le Korowii be la.
Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ tɔŋle Yeesu nɛwɛnyini ɛɛ la ta Domadɛɛge la dɔe le Korowii be. Kpegri naate aa dɔa la le Yeesu dɔm tenten la be. He noɔ kɛ wɛɛ bao. Taraken, on bala la.
N bidɛɛga, Korowii nɛraa heya. He pɔ keamere baa ɛ nyosonteŋna la nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Domadɛɛge waa lɔ he bini la kpegri gwaa kon waa lɔ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire la kpegri.

Keamere baa ɛ nyosonteŋna la te, nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire la bini banee ban. Harɛ nɔ ta waa baa bol. A waa ba won dɛɛ bol wa, asɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire la sie ɛɛ lɛ ba nɛɛ dɛɛ no ba be la.

Ya te ɛ Korowii bii. Nomɛlbwa waa jemɛ Korowii la dɛ no ya wa. Nomɛlbwa waa wola Korowii jemɛ la aa ya waa no. Anɔ taa yaa ba chega dɛ jemɛ banɔ la baa dɔ kasinteŋ Doma waa ɛ Korowii kon ne banɔ la baa dɔ nyosone kon la.
Yabala, hé gel ya nyin dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ nɛnnyin le Korowii be. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin nɛn la, o ɛ Korowii bie dɛ jemɔ.
Nomɛlbwa waa wola nɛn nyin la aa Korowii jemɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii nyina bwa Dɔɔ.
Kenii o bagle o nyina waa dɛ nyin yaa: O gelɔ o bibeŋkpoŋ la ba harɛ nɔ ta, ásɛ ya che o nɛɛ dɛ dɔ mkpa.

Anɔɔ dɛɛ bagle gɛ nyina tenten aa doa. Ya te nyina yaa dɛ nyin Korowii la aa bobɛlbwa tel, kɛ o ge garɔ dɛɛ nyin yaa. Hé na gɛ Korowii aa gela o Bibeŋkpoŋ la koh ya wechɔga waa dɛ ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ sewɛ dɛ kwaa ya ne Korowii baah.
Yabala, dɛ kenii Korowii ɛɛ nyin yaa te naa, amɔ a chɛ kɛŋɔ ya nyin dɔŋa.
Nomɛlbwa ta Korowii nae ka. Kɛ dɛ ya dɛ nyin dɔŋa aa, anee Korowii ɛɛ ba yaa lawɛ pɛl o nɛ, asɛ o nyina la do ya be kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ.
Korowii Domadɛɛge la waa kpɔa tɛ yaa la gelɔ ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ kpela, ya kpɔ ya te pɛlo asɛ o ge lawɛ yaa pɛl o nɛ.
Ya na o Bie la dɛ di danseɛ kɛŋɔ Korowiirii gela o ba harɛ nɔ ta dɛ́ ba ɛ nɛwɛnyini Lɛɛ.
Nomɛlbwa waa yarada Yeesu kɛŋɔ Korowii Biee on la, dɛ naate kpɔ o te pɛl Korowii asɛ o ge lawɔ pɛl o te.
Anomanta ya gbabir jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ nyin yaa, dɛ kpɔ siwi dawɛ o nyina la nɛ. Korowiirii nyina bwa Dɔɔ. Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin nɛn la, o kpɔ o te dɛɛ pɛl Korowii, asɛ o lawɔ dɛɛ pɛl o nɛ.

Waa lawɛ yaa pɛl o nɛɛ la, a taa a che nyina la do ya nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ ka tonɛ, asɛ ya dɔ hwɛga awola Yeesu aa ba dɛ ba bol nɛndɛɛga ne wechɔg-ɛɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole la. Yaa Yeesu bala waa ɔmɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ gɛ o da aa doa la, gɛ tentenee ya ge do nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire bini.
Nɛn dɛ nyin o dɔŋ aa, waa gɛ Korowii aa dɛ tɛr nɛra deŋne ɔmɛ. Nyina waa ɛ nyina tenten la dɛ doŋi ɔmee. Deŋne tɛra waa nɛn ɛɛ ɔmɛ Korowii. Anomanta naate waa dɛ ɔmɛ la ta nyina tenten dɔe o be.
Ya dɛ nyin dɔŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowiirii tɔ sie nyin yaa.
Dɛ nomɛl hah o dɔŋ dɛ ŋɔ o dɛ nyin Korowii aa, dɛ o teŋe nyosone. Dɛ nomɛl aa o dɔŋ o ne waa pɛa wɛɛ nao la nyin aa, ɛrɛɛ ó ɛ dɛ won nyin Korowii waa wola on na nɔ?
Waa Yeesu Kristo aa kpɔa tɛ yaa laanee nɔ: Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ nyin Korowii la, a chɛ kɛŋɔ o nyin o dɔŋ ge.
Nomɛlbwa waa yaradaa kɛŋɔ Yeesu ɛ Kristo la Korowii aa bagɛ nyoa ŋɔ wɛɛ tomɔɔ la, naate ɛ Korowii bie, dɛkalkɛŋɔ dɛ he dɛ nyin nomɛl waa aa, dɛ he dɛ nyin o bie ge wa.
Dɛ ya dɛ nyin Korowii dɛɛ teŋɛ o waa ta naa, a taa ya jemɛ kɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyin o bii.
Dɛ ya dɛ teŋɛ waa Korowii aa kpɔa tɛ yaa ta naa, anee dɛ bagle kɛŋɔ ya dɛ nyinu. O waa la ta teŋa ge aa kpege kohona tɛ yaa,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ Korowii bie la won harɛ nɔ ta liire ne o komɛlbwa nɛɛ pɔe. Ya chegɛ yarada yaa dɛ yarada Yeesu la ta dɛ pɔ a nɛ.
Umee dɛ won pɔ harɛ nɔ ta liire ne o komɛlbwa nɛɔ? Nomɛlbwa toole atane kɛŋɔ naate waa dɛ yarada kɛ Yeesu ɛ Korowii Bie la gbosoroo.

Yeesu Kristo aa bala dɛ ba ɛ o toma la, nee ne chal taa o che dɛ ba. Korowii nee sɔe la gbo ta laa o toma la che. Kɛ o chal waa fuga ta la ne Korowii nee sɔe la bwa taa a che. Asɛ Korowii Domadɛɛge gee di danseɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o ɛ kasinteŋ te.
Kon bele atoroo di danseɛ dɛɛ tɛ Yeesu.
Korowii Domadɛɛge la, ne Korowii nee baa sɔɔ la, ne o chal waa fuga ta la bwaa di danseɛ dɛɛ tɛo dɛɛ bagle wesiwi beŋkpoŋ.
Dɛ ya dɛ yarada nɛwɛnyini danseɛ aa, amɔ yaa Korowii kwaa yarada aa? O kwaa laanee kpega gwaa nɛwɛnyini kwa. Korowii gbagbaa kpɔ waa nɔ di o Bie danseɛ.

Anomanta nomɛlbwa waa yarada Korowii Bie la la, naate dɔ gɛ danseɛ nɔ o gbabir bambile bini dɛ won jemɛ kɛŋɔ a ɛ kpela. Kɛ nomɛlbwa waa wola Korowii yarada la gelɔ Korowii waa la ɛ nyosone, dɛkalkɛŋɔ naate aa gɛ Korowii aa bol o Bie la waa la yarada.
Waa Korowii aa bola a ɛ danseɛ laanee nɔ: O tɛ yaa o mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa la, asɛ o Bie la bee gɛ mkpa la ge le.
Nomɛlbwa waa kpɔ o te pɛl Korowii Bie la dɔ a gɛ mkpa nɔ. Nomɛlbwa waa wola o te kpɔe pɛl Korowii Bie la ta mkpa la dɔe.
N chwerɛ waa nɔ baa tɛ he banɔ la haa dɛ yarada Korowii Bie la ásɛ he jemɛ kɛŋɔ he dɔ Korowii mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe la.
Ya dɔ hwɛga Korowii be kɛŋɔ wobɛlbwa yaa soŋo la, dɛ a ɛ o tetoowa aa, wɛɛ no ya bee.
Dɛ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ no ya be kwaa yaa dɛ soŋo la te naa, amɔ te dɛ ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya dɔɔ dɔ kwaa yaa dɛ soŋe o be la.

Dɛ he na he dɔŋ wɛɛ ɛ wechɔga aa, soŋe Korowii tɛo. Wɛɛ tɛo mkpaa. N ŋɔ gɛ naa, banɔ la baa wola seo wechɔga ɛɛ laanee n ŋɔ hé soŋe tɛ. Wechɔga ane lole, dɛ he ɛa aa, a chɛ kɛŋɔ he sewɛ. N ta ŋɔe ŋɔ hé soŋe Korowii tɛ nɛn a te bɔr.
Waa aa wola were bwa ɛ wechɔga, kɛ wechɔga bwa laa ɛ seo wechɔga.
Ya jemɔ kɛ nomɛlbwa waa ɛ Korowii bie la aa teŋɛ dɛɛ ɛ wechɔga, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii Bie la dɛ nyiŋi naate nɛɛ asɛ Bɔnsam bɛ won ɛo wobɛlbwa.
Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ ya bwa ɛ Korowii bii, asɛ nɛra baa dɔ harɛ nɔ ta gbo liire ne kwaa aa lɔ harɛ nɔ ta bwa ge do Bɔnsam lɔga.

Ya jemɔ kɛŋɔ Korowii Bie la balɔ dɛ ba tɛ yaa liire yá kpɔ jemɛ Korowii tenten la. Korowii tenten la lawɛ yaa pɛl o nɛ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ o kpɔ ya te pɛl o Bie Yeesu Kristo la. O ɛ Korowii tenten, dɛ dɔ mkpa aa wola jaga dɔe bwa.
N bidɛɛga, hé nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ dɛ laa he te kpɔ komɛlbwa waa wola Korowii tenten ɛɛ la ta dɛ toma.

Men Nomoa Jɔnee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ haah la Korowii aa kpɔɔ cheg dɛ tɛ o te la, ne o bii maa koh beŋkpoŋ ya bwa aa ɛa Korowii kasinteŋ waa la ta dɛɛ nyin ba la. N gbo laa dɛɛ nyin ba gɛ. Nɛra baa jemɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa la bwa ge jao,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ kasinteŋ la lɔ ya bwa bambile bini. Wɛɛ do lee dɛɛ la saŋ bɛlbwa.
Ń Naa Korowii ne o Bie Yeesu Kristo sune ya bwa sekwara nɛ, dɛ cha yaa, dɛ tɛ yaa bosɔɔhna yá won jemɛ kasinteŋ la dɛ dɔ nɛnnyin.
N sie lɛo kohona kɛ maa na he bii la bane kɛ ba teŋɛ kasinteŋ waa la ta gɛ ya Mɛɛ waa lɔ nyundua la aa ŋɔa yáa ɛ la.
Kɛ n bidɛɛge, taraken n dɛ soŋe, dɛɛ teŋɛ waa Korowii aa bola bil la ta. Wefala laa. Dɛ́ hɛ́ɛ nyin dɔŋa.
Dɛ ya dɛ nyin dɔŋa aa, dɛ ya dɛ teŋɛ o waa la ta. O waa laanee kɛŋɔ dɔŋa nyina, gɛ haa noa logla la. Anomanta hɛ́ɛ ɛ he wobɛlbwa dɔŋa nyina ta.
Nyosonteŋna tenten balɔ taraken. Banee wola yarada kɛŋɔ Yeesu Kristo ba harɛ nɔ ta kɛŋɔ nɛwɛnyini la. Nomɛlbwa waa wola gɛ yarada la, o ɛ nyosonteŋni dɛ ɛ Yeesu Kristo dɔm.
Hɛ́ɛ nyiŋi he te kɛrɛdɛ dɛ bɛ gel he toma ɛ pɛɛ, ásɛ he won dɔ he tɔnɔ bwa dɛ le a ta.

Nomɛlbwa waa dɛ bagle Yeesu Kristo waa la dɛ kpɔ o gbabir nyu bini liire dɛɛ ja la, amɔ dɛ Korowii ta naate nɛɛ teŋɛ. Nomɛlbwa waa jemɛ Yeesu Kristo webagla la dɛɛ bagla gɛ aa doa la, dɛ Korowii ne o Bie la teŋɛ o nɛɛ kɛrɛdɛ.
Dɛ nomɛlbwa ba he be dɛ baa bagle heyaa anɔ la aa wola Yeesu Kristo waa la ane ɛɛ yaa, he bɛ naate lɛ so he be, he bɛ o sie kwara lɛ.
Nomɛlbwa waa lɛ gɛ te la sie la, o ge gba ja naate wechɔga la ta.
N dɔ waa taeh dɛ́ bol he be, kɛ maa chwerɛ do tɔn ta. N dɛ nyin kɛ n ba he be ya sie ɛ anɛ asɛ n bol he be. Belaa ya sie ɛɛ ba lɛɛ kohona.
He nime la Korowii aa kpɔɔ cheg tɛ o te la, o bii dɛ na heyaa kohona.
Men Nomoa Jɔnee chwerɛ tɔn nɔ dɛɛ tɛ n dandɛɛge Gayos maa koh beŋkpoŋ ya bwa aa ɛa Korowii kasinteŋ waa la ta la dɛɛ nyin he waa la.
N dandɛɛge, n dɛ soŋe Korowii o chae he dɔ bokpega kɛrɛdɛ, he waa bwa do wer kɛŋɔ he ne Korowii baah naa do wer la.
Yabala bane balɔ dɛ ba bol he waa n be ŋɔ he dɛ teŋɛ kasinteŋ waa la ta. Dɛ́ he we-ɛɛla bwa dɛ bagle gɛ. Anomanta n baah sɔɔh mɛ taeh.
Saŋ bɛlbwa maa no n bii waa kɛŋɔ ba dɛ teŋɛ kasinteŋ la ta la, n baah dɛ sɔɔh mɛ gwaa komɛlbwa.
N dandɛɛge, gɛ he yon lɛ asɔre tena haa wola ban jemɛ kwara, kɛ dɛ won kpɔ ba ka dawɛ he nɛɛ dɛɛ nyiŋ ba la, he dɛ teŋɛ ŋwɛnɛ la ta kɛrɛdɛ.
Ba bol he waa bagle asɔre tena dɛ tɛɛ sɔn, dɛ bagle gɛ haa nyin ba. Anomanta dɛ ba dɛ ba kaala aa, cha ba ba ŋwɛnɛ la ta gɛ aa chɛ kɛ Korowii nɛn ɛ,
dɛkalkɛŋɔ Yeesu toma waa ba koh dɛɛ valɛ. Baa suuga lɛɛ dɛɛ le nɛra baa wola Korowii waa yaradae la be.
Anomanta a wer kɛŋɔ ya cha nɛra baa dɛ ɛ a gɛ toma nɔ. Dɛ ya wono dɛɛ cha dɔŋa gɛ naa, dɛ Korowii kasinteŋ waa la tomaa ya bwa ɛɛ ɛ la.
N fa chwerɛ waane dɛ tɛ asɔre tena bela, kɛ Dayɔtrafes aa dɛ nyin nomonome nomanta, o vɛh ya waa la.

Anomanta dɛ n balaa, mɛɛ bol o waa, dɛ bol gɛ waa dɛ chɔg yaa dɛ kpɔ waa dɛɛ dawɛ yaa la. A gbo laa wɛɛ ɛ. O ta sɛɛh dɛɛ nyiŋi yabala baa vala dɛɛ bol Yeesu Kristo waa la. Dɛ bane ge dɛ nyin ba lɛɛ ba dɛɛ nyiŋ ba aa, waa gelɛ baa lɛɛ ba, dɛ yon doŋi ba bwa le ba bini.
N dandɛɛge, bɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la nɛɛ teŋɛ. Kɛ dɛɛ teŋɛ nɛra baa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la nɛ. Banɔ la baa dɛ ɛ wedɛɛga la ɛ Korowii bilola. Nomɛlbwa ge waa dɛ ɛ wechɔga la aa Korowii jemɛ.
Gasi toole Demetros ge nɛ. Nomɛlbwa dɛ bol o waa ga. Kasinteŋ la waa dɛ teŋɛ o ta la ge dɛ diu danseɛ. Ya gba dɛ diu danseɛ gɛ. He jemɔ kɛŋɔ yaa nyosone teŋe.
N dɔ waa taeh dɛɛ nyin n bol he be. Kɛ maa nyin kɛŋɔ n chwera do tɔn ta.
N dɛ nyin kɛŋɔ n ba chɔɔre taraken bɔr ásɛ ya sie ɛ anɛ ya bol wa. Kórowii tɛɛ bosɔɔhna. He daamanar baa lɔ bonɔ la bwa dɛ nae. Ya dɛ na ya daamanar bwa.
Tɔn nɔ le men Jud maa ɛ Yeesu Kristo bonɔɔ dɛ ɛ Jems nime la be. N chwerɔ dɛɛ tɛ he nɛra N Naa Korowii waa bera ɛ ya Mɛɛ la aa dɛ nyin heya, dɛ le heyaa tɛ o te, asɛ Yeesu Kristo gee nyiŋ heyaa la.
Kórowii na he sum kohona, dɛ tɛ heyaa bosɔɔhna kohona, dɛ cha heyaa hɛɛ nyin dɔŋa kohona.

N dandɛɛga, n siwi fe swɛɛrɔ mɛɛ nyin kɛ n chwerɛ heyaa tɔn dɛ bagle lɛɛ Yeesu aa lɛ n ne he bwa la wa, asɛ n berɛ na kɛŋɔ a chɛ kɛ n chwerɛ heyaa bug nɔ ta dɛ do heyaa gbemba, ásɛ hɛɛ yo waa yaa dɛ yarada la wa. Korowiirii fa bagle o nɛra gɛ baa dɛɛ tomɔ. Gɛ waa bag ba la aa berɛ bwa.

Nɛra bane sɔɔh dɛ ba koo he baah haa wola jemɛ. Baa Korowii tomɛ, dɛɛ bol ŋɔ nɛra ɛɛ wonoo dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa, dɛkalkɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ sune nɛra nɛ. Ba dɛ ɛ gɛ ásɛ dɛ fe dɔ bɔr che dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa baa dɛ nyin. A gɛ nɛra nɔ vɛh ya Nomoa beŋkpoŋ Yeesu Kristo waa dɔ yaa la kɛŋɔ ba Dɔɔree on. Saŋ la bwaa Korowii Tɔn bagle gɛ Korowii aa pa ba bolchɔge dɛɛ ba ba deŋne tɛra.
N jemɔ kɛŋɔ he jemɔ, kɛ n dɛ nyin kɛ n lii heyaa gɛ Korowii faa lɛ Israel tena le Ijipt tena nɔn ta, asɛ a habɔɔ bane aa wola o waa yaradae la, o kpoo ba la.

Nyundua toroma ge aa wola gelɛ bela Korowii aa tɛɛ ba ŋɔ bá di kpegri magre ba ne, dɛ le ba dobɔr la, o tɔ ba do biro ta, dɛ do kwaa ba nɔɔra ta waa wola ban foo ta bwa, dɛ́ ka tel kɛŋɔ o tɔpejen waa dɛ ba nɛra waa bola dɛ pa bole la.

Gɛɛ Sodom ne Gomoora tena ne bwɛɛre a faa lɔ ba jwɛɛh la tena ge faa chɔ dɔŋa baa ne haah ŋwɛnɛdoŋ ta aa wola were ne bola, dɛɛ chɔg ba te. Baa ɛ gɛ la, Korowii gelɔ nii chole ba nɛɛ ásɛ nɛra bwa na dɛ jemɛ kɛŋɔ Korowii dɛ tɛr wechɔg-ɛɛ deŋne nii aa wola dime bwa ne.
Gɛ a saŋ la tena faa ɛa Korowii ha ba la, gɛɛ nɛnchɔga baa lɔ he baah nɔ che ba deera baa dɛ dee ta dɛɛ ɛ wedoŋa ba bwadabii ne, dɛ vɛh Korowii ɔma, dɛɛ ɛ nyundua toroma nɛnhɛlwa.

Nyundua toroma bwa nomoa Maekel gba ta a dɔŋa ɛɛ bwa. O ne Bɔnsam aa dɛ yo dɛɛ tɔŋle dɔŋa Mosis lale waa dɛ́ jemɛ ba bini onɔ la waa dɔɔ la, Maekel kwaraa ta liire kɛ ó bol Bɔnsam wobochɔge. O waa waa bola bwaa kɛŋɔ, "Korowiirii dɛ dii kasinteŋ."
Waa nɛra nɔ aa wola a mun jemɛ la, wobochɔgaa ba bol dɛɛ yaga. Ba ne ola bwa beŋkpoŋ, dɛkalkɛŋɔ ola ta liire dɔe. Waa aa ɛ á bwara sɔɔhna la, anee aa ɛ. Gɛɛ ba ge do. An gee dɛɛ chɔg ba.
Bá bwɛɛlɛ! Ba teŋɛ Keen ŋwɛnɛchɔge la ta. Ba koh suuganyin waa dɛ kpɔ ba te jo wechɔga Balam faa ɛa la ta. Ba dɛ vuugi Korowii kɛŋɔ Kora faa dɛ ɛ la. Korowii ɛɛ chɔg baa kɛŋɔ waa chɔg Kora la ken.

He yon cheme dɛ pɛ dɛɛ di kondikwaa aa dɛ bagle beŋkpoŋri ɛɛ haa dɔa he Dɔɔ tom nɔ ta la, a gɛ nɛra la lɔ he baah kɛŋɔ doŋa dɛɛ chɔg he wer. Ba ta sihiih dɔe. Ba gbo waa baa dawɛ, baa nɛra waa dawɛ. Ba waa ta hwɛga dɔe kɛŋɔ baama peu aa dɛ kaa a ne aa wola bwaala nee ne ba la. Ba do kɛŋɔ daa aa wola won a nɔna saŋ nɔnɛ, asɛ ba chugra ta a den serewe kwaraa la.

Ba do kɛ mpo nehaŋma a nyoa aa kpega kohona ken. Gɛ a yon dɛɛ vuugi, a fufug doŋa ɛɛ le baŋ la, gɛɛ baa vuugi waa, asɛ ba sihihwa ɛɛ le baŋ. Ba do kɛ weweela aa wola chebɔr beŋkpoŋ dɔe, baa wola hwɛga kpɔe dɛɛ do a nɛɛ dɛɛ valɛ jwaana la. Biro kpirikpirii Korowii kwaa ba bá ka do bela saŋ bɛlbwa.
Adam natɛɛ ge naa Enɔk fa na ba waa dɛ bol ba waa ken: "N Dɔɔ ɛɛ ba o nyundua toromedɛɛga kagboŋa nee,
dɛ ba bol nɛra bwa waa dɛ pa bole. Wɛɛ pa ba bolchɔge ba wechɔga baa ɛa dɛ vɛh Korowii waa ta teŋa la waa, dɛ pa nɛra baa wola Korowii tomɛ bolchɔge ba nɛnhɛlwobochɔga baa bola dɛɛ yagɔ la wa."
